
the sonnets

 1

from fairest creatur desir increas 
that therebi beauti rose might never die 
but riper time deceas 
hi tender heir might bear memori 
but thou contract thine bright eye 
feed st thi light flame self substanti fuel 
make famin abund lie 
thi self thi foe thi sweet self cruel 
thou art world fresh ornament 
and herald gaudi spring 
within thine bud buriest thi content 
and tender churl mak st wast niggard 
 piti world els glutton 
 to eat world due grave thee 


 2

when forti winter shall besieg thi brow 
and dig deep trench thi beauti field 
thi youth proud liveri gaze 
will tatter weed small worth held 
then ask thi beauti lie 
where treasur thi lusti day 
to say within thine deep sunken eye 
were eat shame thriftless prais 
how much prais deserv thi beauti use 
if thou couldst answer thi fair child mine
shal sum count make old excus 
prove beauti success thine 
 thi new made thou art old 
 and see thi blood warm thou feel st cold 


 3

look thi glass tell face thou viewest 
now time face form anoth 
whose fresh repair thou renewest 
thou dost beguil world unbless mother 
for fair whose unear womb
disdain tillag thi husbandri 
or fond tomb
of self love stop poster 
thou art thi mother glass thee
cal back love april prime 
so thou window thine age shalt see 
despit wrinkl thi golden time 
 but thou live rememb 
 die singl thine imag die thee 


 4

unthrifti loveli dost thou spend 
upon thi self thi beauti legaci 
natur bequest give noth doth lend 
and frank lend free 
then beauteou niggard dost thou abus 
the bounteou largess given thee give 
profitless usur dost thou use
so great sum sum yet canst live 
for traffic thi self alon 
thou thi self thi sweet self dost deceiv 
then natur call thee gone 
what accept audit canst thou leav 
 thi unus beauti must tomb thee 
 which use live th executor 


 5

those hour gentl work frame
th love gaze everi eye doth dwell
wil play tyrant 
and unfair fairli doth excel 
for never rest time lead summer on
to hideou winter confound 
sap check frost lusti leav quit gone 
beauti er snow bare everi 
then summer distil left
a liquid prison pent wall glass 
beauti effect beauti bereft 
nor remembr 
 but flower distil though winter meet 
 lees show substanc still live sweet 


 6

then let winter rag hand defac 
in thee thi summer ere thou distil 
make sweet vial treasur thou place 
with beauti treasur ere self kill 
that use forbidden usuri 
which happi pay will loan 
that thi self breed anoth thee 
or ten time happier ten one 
ten time thi self happier thou art 
if ten thine ten time refigur thee 
then could death thou shouldst depart 
leav thee live poster 
 be self will thou art much fair 
 to death conquest make worm thine heir 


 7

lo orient graciou light
lift burn head eye
doth homag new appear sight 
serv look sacr majesti 
and climb steep heavenli hill 
resembl strong youth middl age 
yet mortal look ador beauti still 
attend golden pilgrimag 
but highmost pitch weari car 
like feebl age reeleth day 
the eye fore duteou convert are
from low tract look anoth way 
 so thou thi self go thi noon 
 unlook diest unless thou get son 


 8

music hear hear st thou music sadli 
sweet sweet war joy delight joy 
whi lov st thou thou receiv st gladli 
or els receiv st pleasur thine annoy 
if true concord well tune sound 
bi union marri offend thine ear 
they sweetli chide thee confounds
in singl part thou shouldst bear 
mark one string sweet husband anoth 
strike mutual order 
resembl sire child happi mother 
who one one pleas note sing 
 whose speechless song mani seem one 
 sing thee thou singl wilt prove none 


 9

i fear wet widow eye 
that thou consum st thi self singl life 
ah thou issueless shalt hap die 
the world wail thee like makeless wife 
the world thi widow still weep 
that thou form thee hast left behind 
when everi privat widow well may keep 
bi children eye husband shape mind 
look unthrift world doth spend
shift place still world enjoy 
but beauti wast hath world end 
and kept unus user destroy 
 no love toward other bosom sits
 that murd rou shame commit 


 10

for shame deni thou bear st love any
who thi self art unprovid 
grant thou wilt thou art belov mani 
but thou none lov st evid 
for thou art possess murd rou hate 
that gainst thi self thou stick st conspir 
seek beauteou roof ruinate
which repair thi chief desir 
o chang thi thought i may chang mind 
shall hate fairer lodg gentl love 
be thi presenc graciou kind 
or thi self least kind heart prove 
 make thee anoth self love 
 that beauti still may live thine thee 


 11

a fast thou shalt wane fast thou grow st 
in one thine thou departest 
and fresh blood youngli thou bestow st 
thou mayst call thine thou youth convertest 
herein live wisdom beauti increas 
without folli age cold decay 
if mind time ceas 
and threescor year would make world away 
let natur hath made store 
harsh featureless rude barrenli perish 
look best endow gave thee 
which bounteou gift thou shouldst bounti cherish 
 she carv thee seal meant therebi 
 thou shouldst print let copi die 


 12

when i count clock tell time 
and see brave day sunk hideou night 
when i behold violet past prime 
and sabl curl silver er white 
when lofti tree i see barren leav 
which erst heat canopi herd
and summer green gird sheaves
born bier white bristli beard 
then thi beauti i question make
that thou among wast time must go 
sinc sweet beauti forsak 
and die fast see other grow 
 and noth gainst time scyth make defence
 save breed brave take thee henc 


 13

o self love are
no longer self live 
against come end prepar 
and sweet semblanc give 
so beauti hold lease
find determin were
your self self deceas 
when sweet issu sweet form bear 
who let fair hous fall decay 
which husbandri honour might uphold 
against stormi gust winter day
and barren rage death etern cold 
 o none unthrift dear love know 
 you father let son say 


 14

not star i judgement pluck 
and yet methink i astronomi 
but tell good evil luck 
of plagu dearth season qualiti 
nor i fortun brief minut tell 
point thunder rain wind 
or say princ shall go well
bi oft predict i heaven find 
but thine eye knowledg i deriv 
and constant star i read art
a truth beauti shall togeth thrive
if thi self store thou wouldst convert 
 or els thee i prognost 
 thi end truth beauti doom date 


 15

when i consid everi thing grows
hold perfect littl moment 
that huge stage presenteth nought shows
whereon star secret influenc comment 
when i perceiv men plant increas 
cheer check even self sky 
vaunt youth sap height decreas 
and wear brave state memori 
then conceit inconst stay 
set rich youth sight 
where wast time debateth decay
to chang day youth sulli night 
 and war time love 
 as take i engraft new 


 16

but wherefor mightier way
mak war upon bloodi tyrant time 
and fortifi self decay
with mean bless barren rhyme 
now stand top happi hour 
and mani maiden garden yet unset 
with virtuou wish would bear live flower 
much liker paint counterfeit 
so line life life repair
which time pencil pupil pen
neith inward worth outward fair
can make live self eye men 
 to give away self keep self still 
 and must live drawn sweet skill 


 17

who believ vers time come
if fill high desert 
though yet heaven know tomb
which hide life show half part 
if i could write beauti eye 
and fresh number number grace 
the age come would say poet lie 
such heavenli touch ne er touch earthli face 
so paper yellow age 
be scorn like old men less truth tongu 
and true right term poet rage 
and stretch metr antiqu song 
 but child aliv time 
 you live twice rhyme 


 18

shall i compar thee summer day 
thou art love temper 
rough wind shake darl bud may 
and summer leas hath short date 
sometim hot eye heaven shine 
and often gold complexion dim 
and everi fair fair sometim declin 
bi chanc natur chang cours untrim 
but thi etern summer shall fade 
nor lose possess fair thou ow st 
nor shall death brag thou wand rest shade 
when etern line time thou grow st 
 so long men breath eye see 
 so long live give life thee 


 19

devour time blunt thou lion paw 
and make earth devour sweet brood 
pluck keen teeth fierc tiger jaw 
and burn long live phoenix blood 
make glad sorri season thou fleet st 
and whate er thou wilt swift foot time
to wide world fade sweet 
but i forbid thee one heinou crime 
o carv thi hour love fair brow 
nor draw line thine antiqu pen 
him thi cours untaint allow 
for beauti pattern succeed men 
 yet thi worst old time despit thi wrong 
 my love shall vers ever live young 


 20

a woman face natur hand paint 
hast thou master mistress passion 
a woman gentl heart acquainted
with shift chang fals women fashion 
an eye bright less fals roll 
gild object whereupon gazeth 
a man hue hue control 
which steal men eye women soul amazeth 
and woman wert thou first creat 
till natur wrought thee fell dote 
and addit thee defeat 
bi ad one thing purpos noth 
 but sinc prick thee women pleasur 
 mine thi love thi love use treasur 


 21

so muse 
stir paint beauti vers 
who heaven self ornament doth use 
and everi fair fair doth rehears 
make couplement proud compare
with sun moon earth sea rich gem 
with april first born flower thing rare 
that heaven air huge rondur hem 
o let true love truli write 
and believ love fair 
a mother child though bright
a gold candl fix heaven air 
 let say like hearsay well 
 i prais purpos sell 


 22

mi glass shall persuad i old 
so long youth thou one date 
but thee time furrow i behold 
then look i death day expiat 
for beauti doth cover thee 
i seemli raiment heart 
which thi breast doth live thine 
how i elder thou art 
o therefor love thyself wari 
a i self thee 
bear thi heart i keep chary
a tender nurs babe fare ill 
 presum thi heart mine slain 
 thou gav st thine give back 


 23

a unperfect actor stage 
who fear put besid part 
or fierc thing replet much rage 
whose strength abund weaken heart 
so i fear trust forget say 
the perfect ceremoni love rite 
and mine love strength seem decay 
o ercharg burthen mine love might 
o let look eloqu 
and dumb presag speak breast 
who plead love look recompens 
more tongu hath express 
 o learn read silent love hath writ 
 to hear eye belong love fine wit 


 24

mine eye hath play painter hath stell 
thi beauti form tabl heart 
mi bodi frame wherein ti held 
and perspect best painter art 
for painter must see skill 
to find true imag pictur lie 
which bosom shop hang still 
that hath window glaze thine eye 
now see good turn eye eye done 
mine eye drawn thi shape thine me
ar window breast sun
delight peep gaze therein thee 
 yet eye cun want grace art 
 they draw see know heart 


 25

let favour star 
of public honour proud titl boast 
whilst i fortun triumph bars
unlook joy i honour 
great princ favourit fair leav spread 
but marigold sun eye 
and pride lie buri 
for frown glori die 
the pain warrior famous fight 
after thousand victori foil 
i book honour raze quit 
and rest forgot toil 
 then happi i love beloved
 where i may remov remov 


 26

lord love vassalage
thi merit hath duti strongli knit 
to thee i send written embassage
to wit duti show wit 
duti great wit poor mine
may make seem bare want word show 
but i hope good conceit thine
in thi soul thought nake bestow 
till whatsoev star guid move 
point gracious fair aspect 
and put apparel tatter love 
to show worthi thi sweet respect 
 then may i dare boast i love thee 
 till show head thou mayst prove 


 27

weari toil i hast bed 
the dear respos limb travel tire 
but begin journey head
to work mind bodi work expir 
for thought far i abid 
intend zealou pilgrimag thee 
and keep droop eyelid open wide 
look dark blind see 
save soul imaginari sight
pres thi shadow sightless view 
which like jewel hung ghastli night 
make black night beauteou old face new 
 lo thu day limb night mind 
 for thee self quiet find 


 28

how i return happi plight
that debar benefit rest 
when day oppress eas night 
but day night night day oppress 
and though enemi either reign 
do consent shake hand tortur 
the one toil complain
how far i toil still farther thee 
i tell day pleas thou art bright 
and dost grace cloud blot heaven 
so flatter i swart complexion night 
when sparkl star twire thou gild st even 
 but day doth daili draw sorrow longer 
 and night doth nightli make grief length seem stronger


 29

when disgrac fortun men eye 
i alon beweep outcast state 
and troubl deaf heaven bootless cri 
and look upon self curs fate 
wish like one rich hope 
featur like like friend possess 
desir man art man scope 
with i enjoy content least 
yet thought self almost despis 
hapli i think thee state 
 like lark break day arising
from sullen earth sing hymn heaven gate 
 for thi sweet love rememb wealth bring 
 that i scorn chang state king 


 30

when session sweet silent thought 
i summon remembr thing past 
i sigh lack mani thing i sought 
and old woe new wail dear time wast 
then i drown eye unus flow 
for preciou friend hid death dateless night 
and weep afresh love long sinc cancel woe 
and moan th expens mani vanish sight 
then i griev grievanc foregon 
and heavili woe woe tell er
th sad account fore bemoan moan 
which i new pay paid 
 but i think thee dear friend 
 all loss restor sorrow end 


 31

thi bosom endear heart 
which i lack suppos dead 
and reign love love love part 
and friend i thought buri 
how mani holi obsequi tear
hath dear religi love stol n mine eye 
a interest dead appear 
but thing remov hidden thee lie 
thou art grave buri love doth live 
hung trophi lover gone 
who part thee give 
that due mani thine alon 
 their imag i love i view thee 
 and thou hast 


 32

if thou surviv well content day 
when churl death bone dust shall cover
and shalt fortun survey
thes poor rude line thi deceas lover 
compar bett ring time 
and though outstrip everi pen 
reserv love rhyme 
exceed height happier men 
o vouchsaf love thought 
 had friend muse grown grow age 
a dearer birth love brought
to march rank better equipag 
 but sinc die poet better prove 
 their style i read love 


 33

full mani gloriou morn i seen 
flatter mountain top sovereign eye 
kiss golden face meadow green 
gild pale stream heavenli alchemi 
anon permit basest cloud ride 
with ugli rack celesti face 
and forlorn world visag hide
st unseen west disgrac 
even sun one earli morn shine 
with triumphant splendour brow 
but alack one hour mine 
the region cloud hath mask 
 yet love whit disdaineth 
 sun world may stain heaven sun staineth 


 34

whi didst thou promis beauteou day 
and make travel forth without cloak 
to let base cloud ertak way 
hide thi brav ry rotten smoke 
 ti enough cloud thou break 
to dri rain storm beaten face 
for man well salv speak 
that heal wound cure disgrac 
nor thi shame give physic grief 
though thou repent yet i still loss 
th offend sorrow lend weak relief
to bear strong offenc cross 
 ah tear pearl thi love shed 
 and rich ransom ill deed 


 35

no griev thou hast done 
rose thorn silver fountain mud 
cloud eclips stain moon sun 
and loathsom canker live sweetest bud 
all men make fault even i 
author thi trespass compar 
mi self corrupt salv thi amiss 
excus thi sin thi sin 
for thi sensual fault i bring sens 
thi advers parti thi advoc 
and gainst self law plea commenc 
such civil war love hate 
 that i accessari need must 
 to sweet thief sourli rob 


 36

let confess two must twain 
although undivid love one 
so shall blot remain 
without thi help born alon 
in two love one respect 
though live separ spite 
which though alter love sole effect 
yet doth steal sweet hour love delight 
i may evermor acknowledg thee 
lest bewail guilt thee shame 
nor thou public kind honour 
unless thou take honour thi name 
 but i love thee sort 
 as thou mine mine thi good report 


 37

a decrepit father take delight 
to see activ child deed youth 
so i made lame fortun dearest spite
tak comfort thi worth truth 
for whether beauti birth wealth wit 
or more
entitl thi part crown sit 
i make love engraft store 
so i lame poor despis 
whilst shadow doth substanc give 
that i thi abund suffic 
and part thi glori live 
 look best best i wish thee 
 thi wish i ten time happi 


 38

how muse want subject invent
whil thou dost breath pour st vers 
thine sweet argument excel 
for everi vulgar paper rehears 
o give thi self thank aught 
worthi perus stand thi sight 
for dumb can not write thee 
when thou thi self dost give invent light 
be thou tenth muse ten time worth
than old nine rhymer invoc 
and call thee let bring forth
etern number outliv long date 
 if slight muse pleas curiou day 
 the pain mine thine shall prais 


 39

o thi worth manner may i sing 
when thou art better part 
what mine prais mine self bring 
and mine i prais thee 
even let us divid live 
and dear love lose name singl one 
that separ i may give 
that due thee thou deserv st alon 
o absenc torment wouldst thou prove 
were thi sour leisur gave sweet leav 
to entertain time thought love 
which time thought sweetli doth deceiv 
 and thou teachest make one twain 
 by prais doth henc remain 


 40

take love love yea take 
what hast thou thou hadst 
no love love thou mayst true love call 
all mine thine thou hadst 
then love thou love receivest 
i can not blame thee love thou usest 
but yet blame thou thi self deceivest
bi wil tast thi self refusest 
i forgiv thi robberi gentl thief
although thou steal thee poverti 
and yet love know greater grief
to bear greater wrong hate known injuri 
 lascivi grace ill well show 
 kill spite yet must foe 


 41

those pretti wrong liberti commit 
when i sometim absent thi heart 
thi beauti thi year full well befit 
for still temptat follow thou art 
gentl thou art therefor 
beauteou thou art therefor assail 
and woman woo woman son 
will sourli leav till prevail 
ay yet thou mightst seat forbear 
and chide thi beauti thi stray youth 
who lead thee riot even there
wher thou art forc break twofold truth 
 her thi beauti tempt thee 
 thine thi beauti fals 


 42

that thou hast grief 
and yet may said i love dearli 
that hath thee wail chief 
a loss love touch nearli 
love offend thu i excus ye 
thou dost love thou know st i love 
and sake even doth abus 
suff ring friend sake approv 
if i lose thee loss love gain 
and lose friend hath found loss 
both find i lose twain 
and sake lay cross 
 but joy friend i one 
 sweet flatteri love alon 


 43

when i wink mine eye best see 
for day view thing unrespect 
but i sleep dream look thee 
and darkli bright bright dark direct 
then thou whose shadow shadow doth make bright
how would thi shadow form form happi show 
to clear day thi much clearer light 
when unse eye thi shade shine 
how would i say mine eye bless made 
bi look thee live day 
when dead night thi fair imperfect shade 
through heavi sleep sightless eye doth stay 
 all day night see till i see thee 
 and night bright day dream show thee 


 44

if dull substanc flesh thought 
injuri distanc stop way 
for despit space i would brought 
from limit far remot thou dost stay 
no matter although foot stand
upon farthest earth remov thee 
for nimbl thought jump sea land 
a soon think place would 
but ah thought kill i thought
to leap larg length mile thou art gone 
but much earth water wrought 
i must attend time leisur moan 
 receiv nought element slow 
 but heavi tear badg either woe 


 45

the two slight air purg fire 
are thee wherev i abid 
the first thought desir 
these present absent swift motion slide 
for quicker element gone
in tender embassi love thee 
mi life made four two alon 
sink death oppress melancholi 
until life composit recur 
bi swift messeng return thee 
who even come back assur 
of thi fair health recount 
 thi told i joy longer glad 
 i send back straight grow sad 


 46

mine eye heart mortal war 
how divid conquest thi sight 
mine eye heart thi pictur sight would bar 
mi heart mine eye freedom right 
mi heart doth plead thou dost lie 
 a closet never pierc crystal eye 
but defend doth plea deni 
and say thi fair appear lie 
to side titl impanelled
a quest thought tenant heart 
and verdict determined
th clear eye moieti dear heart part 
 as thu mine eye due thi outward part 
 and heart right thi inward love heart 


 47

betwixt mine eye heart leagu took 
and doth good turn unto 
when mine eye famish look 
or heart love sigh doth smother 
with love pictur eye doth feast 
and paint banquet bid heart 
anoth time mine eye heart guest 
and thought love doth share part 
so either thi pictur love 
thi self away art present still 
for thou farther thought canst move 
and i still thee 
 or sleep thi pictur sight
 awak heart heart eye delight 


 48

how care i i took way 
each trifl truest bar thrust 
that use might unus stay
from hand falsehood sure ward trust 
but thou jewel trifl 
most worthi comfort greatest grief 
thou best dearest mine care 
art left prey everi vulgar thief 
thee i lock chest 
save thou art though i feel thou art 
within gentl closur breast 
from whenc pleasur thou mayst come part 
 and even thenc thou wilt stol n i fear 
 for truth prove thievish prize dear 


 49

against time ever time come 
when i shall see thee frown defect 
when thi love hath cast utmost sum 
call audit advis respect 
against time thou shalt strang pass 
and scarc greet sun thine eye 
when love convert thing was
shal reason find settl graviti 
against time i ensconc here
within knowledg mine desert 
and hand self uprear 
to guard law reason thi part 
 to leav poor thou hast strength law 
 sinc love i alleg caus 


 50

how heavi i journey way 
when i seek weari travel end 
doth teach case repos say
 thu far mile measur thi friend 
the beast bear tire woe 
plod dulli bear weight 
a instinct wretch know
hi rider love speed made thee 
the bloodi spur can not provok 
that sometim anger thrust hide 
which heavili answer groan 
more sharp spur side 
 for groan doth put mind 
 my grief lie onward joy behind 


 51

thu love excus slow offenc 
of dull bearer thee i speed 
from thou art i hast thenc 
till i return post need 
o excus poor beast find 
when swift extrem seem slow 
then i spur though mount wind 
in wing speed motion shall i know 
then hors desir keep pace 
therefor desir perfect st love made 
shall neigh dull flesh fieri race 
but love love thu shall excus jade 
 sinc thee go went wil slow 
 toward thee i run give leav go 


 52

so i rich whose bless key 
can bring sweet lock treasur 
the everi hour survey 
for blunt fine point seldom pleasur 
therefor feast solemn rare 
sinc seldom come long year set 
like stone worth thinli place 
or captain jewel carcanet 
so time keep chest
or wardrob robe doth hide 
to make special instant special blest 
bi new unfold imprison pride 
 bless whose worthi give scope 
 be triumph lack hope 


 53

what substanc whereof made 
that million strang shadow tend 
sinc everi one hath everi one one shade 
and one everi shadow lend 
describ adoni counterfeit 
i poorli imit 
on helen cheek art beauti set 
and grecian tire paint new 
speak spring foison year 
the one doth shadow beauti show 
the bounti doth appear 
and everi bless shape know 
 in extern grace part 
 but like none none constant heart 


 54

o much doth beauti beauteou seem 
bi sweet ornament truth doth give 
the rose look fair fairer deem
for sweet odour doth live 
the canker bloom full deep dye 
a perfum tinctur rose 
hang thorn play wantonli 
when summer breath mask bud disclos 
but virtu show 
they live unwoo unrespect fade 
die sweet rose 
of sweet death sweetest odour made 
 and beauteou love youth 
 when shall fade vers distil truth 


 55

not marbl gild monuments
of princ shall outliv power rhyme 
but shall shine bright contents
than unswept stone besmear sluttish time 
when wast war shall statu overturn 
and broil root work masonri 
nor mar sword war quick fire shall burn 
the live record memori 
 gainst death oblivi enmity
shal pace forth prais shall still find room 
even eye posterity
that wear world end doom 
 so till judgment self aris 
 you live dwell lover eye 


 56

sweet love renew thi forc said
thi edg blunter appetit 
which day feed allay 
to morrow sharpen former might 
so love thou although day thou fill
thi hungri eye even till wink ful 
to morrow see kill
th spirit love perpetu dul 
let sad interim like ocean be
which part shore two contract new 
come daili bank see 
return love blest may view 
 or call winter full care 
 make summer welcom thrice wish rare 


 57

be slave i tend 
upon hour time desir 
i preciou time spend 
nor servic till requir 
nor dare i chide world without end hour 
whilst i sovereign watch clock 
nor think bitter absenc sour 
when bid servant adieu 
nor dare i question jealou thought 
where may affair suppos 
but like sad slave stay think nought
sav happi make 
 so true fool love 
 though thing think ill 


 58

that god forbid made first slave 
i thought control time pleasur 
or hand th account hour crave 
be vassal bound stay leisur 
o let suffer beck 
th imprison absenc liberti 
and patienc tame suffer bide check 
without accus injuri 
be list charter strong 
that self may privilag time
to doth belong 
your self pardon self crime 
 i wait though wait hell 
 not blame pleasur ill well 


 59

if noth new 
hath brain beguil 
which labour invent bear amis
th second burthen former child 
o record could backward look 
even five hundr cours sun 
show imag antiqu book 
sinc mind first charact done 
that i might see old world could say 
to compos wonder frame 
whether mend whether better 
or whether revolut 
 o sure i wit former day 
 to subject wors given admir prais 


 60

like wave make toward pebbl shore 
so minut hasten end 
each chang place goe 
in sequent toil forward contend 
nativ main light 
crawl matur wherewith crown 
crook eclips gainst glori fight 
and time gave doth gift confound 
time doth transfix flourish set youth 
and delv parallel beauti brow 
feed rariti natur truth 
and noth stand scyth mow 
 and yet time hope vers shall stand
 prais thi worth despit cruel hand 


 61

i thi thi imag keep open
mi heavi eyelid weari night 
dost thou desir slumber broken 
while shadow like thee mock sight 
i thi spirit thou send st thee
so far home deed pri 
to find shame idl hour 
the scope tenur thi jealousi 
o thi love though much great 
it love keep mine eye awak 
mine true love doth rest defeat 
to play watchman ever thi sake 
 for thee watch i whilst thou dost wake elsewher 
 from far other near 


 62

sin self love possesseth mine eye 
and soul everi part 
and sin remedi 
it ground inward heart 
methink face graciou mine 
no shape true truth account 
and self mine worth defin 
a i worth surmount 
but glass show self indeed
b chopt tan antiqu 
mine self love quit contrari i read 
self self love iniqu 
 ti thee self self i prais 
 paint age beauti thi day 


 63

against love shall i now
with time injuri hand crush erworn 
when hour drain blood fill brow
with line wrinkl youth morn
hath travel age steepi night 
and beauti whereof king
ar vanish vanish sight 
steal away treasur spring 
for time i fortify
against confound age cruel knife 
that shall never cut memory
mi sweet love beauti though lover life 
 hi beauti shall black line seen 
 and shall live still green 


 64

when i seen time fell hand defaced
th rich proud cost outworn buri age 
when sometim lofti tower i see rase 
and brass etern slave mortal rage 
when i seen hungri ocean gain
advantag kingdom shore 
and firm soil win wateri main 
increas store loss loss store 
when i seen interchang state 
or state self confound decay 
ruin hath taught thu ruminate
that time come take love away 
 thi thought death can not choose
 but weep fear lose 


 65

sinc brass stone earth boundless sea 
but sad mortal ersway power 
how rage shall beauti hold plea 
whose action stronger flower 
o shall summer honey breath hold 
against wrack sieg batt ring day 
when rock impregn stout 
nor gate steel strong time decay 
o fear medit alack 
shall time best jewel time chest lie hid 
or strong hand hold swift foot back 
or spoil beauti forbid 
 o none unless miracl might 
 that black ink love may still shine bright 


 66

tire rest death i cri 
a behold desert beggar born 
and needi noth trim jolliti 
and purest faith unhappili forsworn 
and gild honour shame misplac 
and maiden virtu rude strumpet 
and right perfect wrong disgrac 
and strength limp sway disabled
and art made tongu tie author 
and folli doctor like control skill 
and simpl truth miscal simplic 
and captiv good attend captain ill 
 tire would i gone 
 save die i leav love alon 


 67

ah wherefor infect live 
and presenc grace impieti 
that sin advantag achiev 
and lace self societi 
whi fals paint imit cheek 
and steal dead seem live hue 
whi poor beauti indirectli seek 
rose shadow sinc rose true 
whi live natur bankrupt 
beggar blood blush live vein 
for hath exchequ 
and proud mani live upon gain 
 o store show wealth 
 in day long sinc last bad 


 68

thu cheek map day outworn 
when beauti live die flower 
befor bastard sign fair born 
or durst inhabit live brow 
befor golden tress dead 
the right sepulchr shorn away 
to live second life second head 
ere beauti dead fleec made anoth gay 
in holi antiqu hour seen 
without ornament self true 
make summer anoth green 
rob old dress beauti new 
 and map doth natur store 
 to show fals art beauti yore 


 69

those part thee world eye doth view 
want noth thought heart mend 
all tongu voic soul give thee due 
utter bare truth even foe commend 
thi outward thu outward prais crown 
but tongu give thee thine 
in accent prais confound
bi see farther eye hath shown 
they look beauti thi mind 
and guess measur thi deed 
then churl thought although eye kind 
to thi fair flower add rank smell weed 
 but thi odour matcheth thi show 
 the soil thou dost common grow 


 70

that thou art blame shall thi defect 
for slander mark ever yet fair 
the ornament beauti suspect 
a crow fli heaven sweetest air 
so thou good slander doth approv 
thi worth greater woo time 
for canker vice sweetest bud doth love 
and thou present st pure unstain prime 
thou hast pass ambush young day 
either assail victor charg 
yet thi prais can not thi prais 
to tie envi evermor enlarg 
 if suspect ill mask thi show 
 then thou alon kingdom heart shouldst owe 


 71

no longer mourn i dead 
than shall hear surli sullen bell
giv warn world i fled
from vile world vilest worm dwell 
nay read line rememb 
the hand writ i love 
that i sweet thought would forgot 
if think make woe 
o i say look upon vers 
when i perhap compound clay 
do much poor name rehears 
but let love even life decay 
 lest wise world look moan 
 and mock i gone 


 72

o lest world task recit 
what merit live love
aft death dear love forget quit 
for noth worthi prove 
unless would devis virtuou lie 
to mine desert 
and hang prais upon deceas i 
than niggard truth would willingli impart 
o lest true love may seem fals 
that love speak well untru 
mi name buri bodi 
and live shame 
 for i shame i bring forth 
 and love thing noth worth 


 73

that time year thou mayst behold 
when yellow leav none hang
upon bough shake cold 
bare ruin choir late sweet bird sang 
in thou seest twilight day 
a sunset fadeth west 
which black night doth take away 
death second self seal rest 
in thou seest glow fire 
that ash youth doth lie 
a death bed whereon must expir 
consum nourish 
 thi thou perceiv st make thi love strong 
 to love well thou must leav ere long 


 74

but content fell arrest 
without bail shall carri away 
mi life hath line interest 
which memori still thee shall stay 
when thou reviewest thou dost review 
the part consecr thee 
the earth earth due 
mi spirit thine better part 
so thou hast lost dreg life 
the prey worm bodi dead 
the coward conquest wretch knife 
too base thee rememb 
 the worth contain 
 and thee remain 


 75

so thought food life 
or sweet season shower ground 
and peac i hold strife
a twixt miser wealth found 
now proud enjoy anon
doubt filch age steal treasur 
now count best alon 
then better world may see pleasur 
sometim full feast sight 
and clean starv look 
possess pursu delight
sav must took 
 thu i pine surfeit day day 
 or glutton away 


 76

whi vers barren new pride 
so far variat quick chang 
whi time i glanc aside
to new found method compound strang 
whi write i still one ever 
and keep invent note weed 
that everi word doth almost tell name 
show birth proceed 
o know sweet love i alway write 
and love still argument 
so best dress old word new 
spend alreadi spent 
 for sun daili new old 
 so love still tell told 


 77

thi glass show thee thi beauti wear 
thi dial thi preciou minut wast 
these vacant leav thi mind imprint bear 
and book learn mayst thou tast 
the wrinkl thi glass truli show 
of mouth grave give thee memori 
thou thi dial shadi stealth mayst know 
time thievish progress etern 
look thi memori can not contain 
commit wast blank thou shalt find
thos children nurs deliv thi brain 
to take new acquaint thi mind 
 these offic oft thou wilt look 
 shall profit thee much enrich thi book 


 78

so oft i invok thee muse 
and found fair assist vers 
a everi alien pen hath got use 
and thee poesi dispers 
thine eye taught dumb high sing 
and heavi ignor aloft fli 
have ad feather learn wing 
and given grace doubl majesti 
yet proud i compil 
whose influenc thine born thee 
in other work thou dost mend style 
and art thi sweet grace grace 
 but thou art art dost advance
 as high learn rude ignor 


 79

whilst i alon call upon thi aid 
mi vers alon thi gentl grace 
but graciou number decay 
and sick muse doth give place 
i grant sweet love thi love argument
deserv travail worthier pen 
yet thee thi poet doth invent 
he rob thee pay thee 
he lend thee virtu stole word 
from thi behaviour beauti doth give
and found thi cheek afford
no prais thee thee doth live 
 then thank doth say 
 sinc owe thee thou thi self dost pay 


 80

o i faint i write 
know better spirit doth use name 
and prais thereof spend might 
to make tongu tie speak fame 
but sinc worth wide ocean 
the humbl proudest sail doth bear 
mi sauci bark inferior far 
on broad main doth wil appear 
your shallowest help hold afloat 
whilst upon soundless deep doth ride 
or wreck i worthless boat 
he tall build goodli pride 
 then thrive i cast away 
 the worst love decay 


 81

or i shall live epitaph make 
or surviv i earth rotten 
from henc memori death can not take 
although part forgotten 
your name henc immort life shall 
though i gone world must die 
the earth yield common grave 
when entomb men eye shall lie 
your monument shall gentl vers 
which eye yet creat shall er read 
and tongu shall rehears 
when breather world dead 
 you still shall live virtu hath pen 
 where breath breath even mouth men 


 82

i grant thou wert marri muse 
and therefor mayst without attaint erlook
th dedic word writer use
of fair subject bless everi book 
thou art fair knowledg hue 
find thi worth limit past prais 
and therefor art enforc seek anew 
some fresher stamp time better day 
and love yet devis 
what strain touch rhetor lend 
thou truli fair wert truli sympath 
in true plain word thi true tell friend 
 and gross paint might better use 
 where cheek need blood thee abus 


 83

i never saw paint need 
and therefor fair paint set 
i found thought i found exceed 
that barren tender poet debt 
and therefor i slept report 
that self extant well might show 
how far modern quill doth come short 
speak worth worth doth grow 
thi silenc sin imput 
which shall glori dumb 
for i impair beauti mute 
when other would give life bring tomb 
 there live life one fair eye 
 than poet prais devis 


 84

who say say 
than rich prais alon 
in whose confin immur store 
which exampl equal grew 
lean penuri within pen doth dwell 
that subject lend small glori 
but write tell 
that dignifi stori 
let copi writ 
not make wors natur made clear 
and counterpart shall fame wit 
make style admir everi 
 you beauteou bless add curs 
 be fond prais make prais wors 


 85

mi tongu tie muse manner hold still 
while comment prais richli compil 
reserv charact golden quill 
and preciou phrase muse file 
i think good thought whilst write good word 
and like unlett clerk still cri amen 
to everi hymn abl spirit afford 
in polish form well refin pen 
hear prais i say ti ti true 
and prais add someth 
but thought whose love you
 though word come hindmost hold rank 
 then other breath word respect 
 me dumb thought speak effect 


 86

wa proud full sail great vers 
bound prize preciou 
that ripe thought brain inhears 
make tomb womb wherein grew 
wa spirit spirit taught write 
abov mortal pitch struck dead 
no neither compeer night
giv aid vers astonish 
he affabl familiar ghost
which nightli gull intellig 
a victor silenc can not boast 
i sick fear thenc 
 but counten fill line 
 then lack i matter enfeebl mine 


 87

farewel thou art dear possess 
and like enough thou know st thi estim 
the charter thi worth give thee releas 
mi bond thee determin 
for i hold thee thi grant 
and rich deserv 
the caus fair gift want 
and patent back swerv 
thi self thou gav st thi worth know 
or thou gav st els mistak 
so thi great gift upon mispris grow 
come home better judgement make 
 thu i thee dream doth flatter 
 in sleep king wake matter 


 88

when thou shalt dispos set light 
and place merit eye scorn 
upon thi side self i fight 
and prove thee virtuou though thou art forsworn 
with mine weak best acquaint 
upon thi part i set story
of fault conceal wherein i attaint 
that thou lose shalt win much glori 
and i gainer 
for bend love thought thee 
the injuri self i 
do thee vantag doubl vantag 
 such love thee i belong 
 that thi right self bear wrong 


 89

say thou didst forsak fault 
and i comment upon offenc 
speak lame i straight halt 
against thi reason make defenc 
thou canst love disgrac half ill 
to set form upon desir chang 
a i self disgrac know thi 
i acquaint strangl look strang 
be absent thi walk tongu 
thi sweet belov name shall dwell 
lest i much profan wronk 
and hapli old acquaint tell 
 for thee self i vow debat 
 for i must ne er love thou dost hate 


 90

then hate thou wilt ever 
now world bent deed cross 
join spite fortun make bow 
and drop loss 
ah heart hath scape sorrow 
come rearward conquer woe 
give windi night raini morrow 
to linger purpos overthrow 
if thou wilt leav leav last 
when petti grief done spite 
but onset come shall i taste
at first worst fortun might 
 and strain woe seem woe 
 compar loss thee seem 


 91

some glori birth skill 
some wealth bodi forc 
some garment though new fangl ill 
some hawk hound hors 
and everi humour hath adjunct pleasur 
wherein find joy rest 
but particular measur 
all i better one gener best 
thi love better high birth 
richer wealth prouder garment cost 
of delight hawk hors 
and thee men pride i boast 
 wretch alon thou mayst take 
 all away wretchcd make 


 92

but thi worst steal thi self away 
for term life thou art assur mine 
and life longer thi love stay 
for depend upon love thine 
then need i fear worst wrong 
when least life hath end 
i see better state belongs
than thi humour doth depend 
thou canst vex inconst mind 
sinc life thi revolt doth lie 
o happi titl i find 
happi thi love happi die 
 but bless fair fear blot 
 thou mayst fals yet i know 


 93

so shall i live suppos thou art true 
like deceiv husband love face 
may still seem love though alter new 
thi look thi heart place 
for live hatr thine eye 
therefor i can not know thi chang 
in mani look fals heart history
i writ mood frown wrinkl strang 
but heaven thi creation decre 
that thi face sweet love ever dwell 
whate er thi thought thi heart work 
thi look noth thenc sweet tell 
 how like eve appl doth thi beauti grow 
 if thi sweet virtu answer thi show 


 94

they power hurt none 
that thing show 
who move other stone 
unmov cold temptat slow 
they rightli inherit heaven grace 
and husband natur rich expens 
tibey lord owner face 
other steward excel 
the summer flower summer sweet 
though self live die 
but flower base infect meet 
the basest weed outbrav digniti 
 for sweetest thing turn sourest deed 
 lili fester smell far wors weed 


 95

how sweet love dost thou make shame 
which like canker fragrant rose 
doth spot beauti thi bud name 
o sweet dost thou thi sin enclos 
that tongu tell stori thi day 
 make lascivi comment thi sport 
cannot disprais kind prais 
name thi name bless ill report 
o mansion vice got 
which habit chose thee 
where beauti veil doth cover everi blot 
and thing turn fair eye see 
 take heed dear heart larg privileg 
 the hardest knife ill use doth lose edg 


 96

some say thi fault youth wanton 
some say thi grace youth gentl sport 
both grace fault love less 
thou mak st fault grace thee resort 
a finger throne queen 
the basest jewel well esteem 
so error thee seen 
to truth translat true thing deem 
how mani lamb might stern wolf betray 
if like lamb could look translat 
how mani gazer mightst thou lead away 
if thou wouldst use strength thi state 
 but i love thee sort 
 as thou mine mine thi good report 


 97

how like winter hath absenc been
from thee pleasur fleet year 
what freez i felt dark day seen 
what old decemb bare everywher 
and yet time remov summer time 
the teem autumn big rich increas 
bear wanton burden prime 
like widow womb lord deceas 
yet abund issu seem me
but hope orphan unfath fruit 
for summer pleasur wait thee 
and thou away bird mute 
 or sing ti dull cheer 
 that leav look pale dread winter near 


 98

from i absent spring 
when proud pie april dress trim 
hath put spirit youth everi thing 
that heavi saturn laugh leap 
yet lay bird sweet smell
of differ flower odour hue 
could make summer stori tell 
or proud lap pluck grew 
nor i wonder lili white 
nor prais deep vermilion rose 
they sweet figur delight 
drawn pattern 
 yet seem winter still away 
 as shadow i play 


 99

the forward violet thu i chide 
sweet thief whenc didst thou steal thi sweet smell 
if love breath the purpl pride
which thi soft check complexion dwell 
in love vein thou hast grossli dy 
the lili i condemn thi hand 
and bud marjoram stol n thi hair 
the rose fear thorn stand 
one blush shame anoth white despair 
a third red white stol n 
and robberi annex thi breath 
but theft pride growth
a veng canker eat death 
 more flower i note yet i none could see 
 but sweet colour stol n thee 


 100

where art thou muse thou forget st long 
to speak give thee thi might 
spend st thou thi furi worthless song 
darken thi power lend base subject light 
return forget muse straight redeem 
in gentl number time idli spent 
sing ear doth thi lay esteem 
and give thi pen skill argument 
rise resti muse love sweet face survey 
if time wrinkl graven 
if satir decay 
and make time spoil despis everywher 
 give love fame faster time wast life 
 so thou prevent st scyth crook knife 


 101

o truant muse shall thi amend 
for thi neglect truth beauti dy 
both truth beauti love depend 
so dost thou therein dignifi 
make answer muse wilt thou hapli say 
 truth need colour colour fix 
beauti pencil beauti truth lay 
but best best never intermix 
becaus need prais wilt thou dumb 
excus silenc lie thee 
to make much outliv gild tomb 
and prais age yet 
 then thi offic muse i teach thee 
 to make seem long henc show 


 102

mi love strengthen though weak seem 
i love less though less show appear 
that love merchand whose rich esteem 
the owner tongu doth publish everi 
our love new spring 
when i wont greet lay 
a philomel summer front doth sing 
and stop pipe growth riper day 
not summer less pleasant now
than mourn hymn hush night 
but wild music burthen everi bough 
and sweet grown common lose dear delight 
 therefor like i sometim hold tongu 
 becaus i would dull song 


 103

alack poverti muse bring forth 
that scope show pride 
the argument bare worth
than hath ad prais besid 
o blame i write 
look glass appear face 
that goe blunt invent quit 
dull line disgrac 
were sin strive mend 
to mar subject well 
for pass vers tend 
than grace gift tell 
 and much vers sit 
 your glass show look 


 104

to fair friend never old 
for first eye i eye 
such seem beauti still three winter cold 
have forest shook three summer pride 
three beauteou spring yellow autumn turn 
in process season i seen 
three april perfum three hot june burn 
sinc first i saw fresh yet green 
ah yet doth beauti like dial hand 
steal figur pace perceiv 
so sweet hue methink still doth stand
hath motion mine eye may deceiv 
 for fear hear thou age unbr 
 ere born beauti summer dead 


 105

let love call idolatri 
nor belov idol show 
sinc alik song prais be
to one one still ever 
kind love day morrow kind 
still constant wondrou excel 
therefor vers constanc confin 
one thing express leav differ 
fair kind true argument 
fair kind true vari word 
and chang invent spent 
three theme one wondrou scope afford 
 fair kind true often live alon 
 which three till never kept seat one 


 106

when chronicl wast time 
i see descript fairest wight 
and beauti make beauti old rhyme 
in prais ladi dead love knight 
then blazon sweet beauti best 
of hand foot lip eye brow 
i see antiqu pen would express 
even beauti master 
so prais prophecies
of time prefigur 
and look divin eye 
they skill enough worth sing 
 for behold present day 
 have eye wonder lack tongu prais 


 107

not mine fear prophet soul 
of wide world dream thing come 
can yet leas true love control 
suppos forfeit confin doom 
the mortal moon hath eclips endur 
and sad augur mock presag 
incertainti crown assur 
and peac proclaim oliv endless age 
now drop balmi time 
mi love look fresh death subscrib 
sinc spite i live poor rhyme 
while insult er dull speechless tribe 
 and thou shalt find thi monument 
 when tyrant crest tomb brass spent 


 108

what brain ink may charact 
which hath figur thee true spirit 
what new speak regist 
that may express love thi dear merit 
noth sweet boy yet like prayer divin 
i must day say er 
count old thing old thou mine i thine 
even first i hallow thi fair name 
so etern love love fresh case 
weigh dust injuri age 
nor give necessari wrinkl place 
but make antiqu aye page 
 find first conceit love bred 
 where time outward form would show dead 


 109

o never say i fals heart 
though absenc seem flame qualifi 
a easi might i self depart 
a soul thi breast doth lie 
that home love i rang 
like travel i return 
just time time exchang 
so self bring water stain 
never believ though natur reign 
all frailti besieg kind blood 
that could preposter stain 
to leav noth thi sum good 
 for noth wide univers i call 
 save thou rose thou art 


 110

ala ti true i gone 
and made self motley view 
gore mine thought sold cheap dear 
made old offenc affect new 
most true i look truth
ask strang 
these blench gave heart anoth youth 
and wors essay prove thee best love 
now done shall end 
mine appetit i never grind
on newer proof tri older friend 
a god love i confin 
 then give welcom next heaven best 
 even thi pure love breast 


 111

o sake fortun chide 
the guilti goddess harm deed 
that better life provid 
than public mean public manner breed 
thenc come name receiv brand 
and almost thenc natur subdued
to work like dyer hand 
piti wish i renew 
whilst like will patient i drink 
potion eisel gainst strong infect 
no bitter i bitter think 
nor doubl penanc correct correct 
 piti dear friend i assur ye 
 even piti enough cure 


 112

your love piti doth th impress fill 
which vulgar scandal stamp upon brow 
for care i call well ill 
so er green bad good allow 
you world i must strive 
to know shame prais tongu 
none els i none aliv 
that steel sens chang right wrong 
in profound abysm i throw care
of other voic adder sens 
to critic flatter stop 
mark neglect i dispens 
 you strongli purpos bred 
 that world besid methink dead 


 113

sinc i left mine eye mind 
and govern go 
doth part function partli blind 
seem see effectu 
for form deliv heart
of bird flower shape doth latch 
of quick object hath mind part 
nor vision hold doth catch 
for see rud st gentlest sight 
the sweet favour deform st creatur 
the mountain sea day night 
the crow dove shape featur 
 incap replet 
 my true mind thu maketh mine untru 


 114

or whether doth mind crown you
drink monarch plagu flatteri 
or whether shall i say mine eye saith true 
and love taught alchemi 
to make monster thing indigest 
such cherubin sweet self resembl 
creat everi bad perfect best
a fast object beam assembl 
o ti first ti flatteri see 
and great mind kingli drink 
mine eye well know gust gree 
and palat doth prepar cup 
 if poison ti lesser sin 
 that mine eye love doth first begin 


 115

those line i writ lie 
even said i could love dearer 
yet judgment knew reason 
mi full flame afterward burn clearer 
but reckon time whose million accidents
creep twixt vow chang decre king 
tan sacr beauti blunt sharp st intent 
divert strong mind cours alt ring thing 
ala fear time tyranni 
might i say now i love best 
when i certain er incertainti 
crown present doubt rest 
 love babe might i say so
 to give full growth still doth grow 


 116

let marriag true minds
admit impedi love love
which alter alter find 
or bend remov remov 
o ever fix mark
that look tempest never shaken 
it star everi wand ring bark 
whose worth unknown although height taken 
love time fool though rosi lip cheeks
within bend sickl compass come 
love alter brief hour week 
but bear even edg doom 
 if error upon prove 
 i never writ man ever love 


 117

accus thu i scant 
wherein i great desert repay 
forgot upon dearest love call 
whereto bond tie day day 
that i frequent unknown mind 
and given time dear purchas right 
that i hoist sail winds
which transport farthest sight 
book wil error 
and proof surmis accumul 
bring within level frown 
but shoot waken hate 
 sinc appeal say i strive prove
 the constanc virtu love 


 118

like make appetit keen
with eager compound palat urg 
a prevent maladi unseen 
we sicken shun sick purg 
even full ne er cloy sweet 
to bitter sauc i frame feed 
and sick welfar found kind meet 
to diseas ere true need 
thu polici love anticipate
th ill grew fault assur 
and brought medicin health state
which rank good would ill cure 
 but thenc i learn find lesson true 
 drug poison feil sick 


 119

what potion i drunk siren tears
distil limbeck foul hell within 
appli fear hope hope fear 
still lose i saw self win 
what wretch error hath heart commit 
whilst hath thought self bless never 
how mine eye sphere fitted
in distract mad fever 
o benefit ill i find true
that better evil still made better 
and ruin love built anew
grow fairer first strong far greater 
 so i return rebuk content 
 and gain ill thrice i spent 


 120

that unkind befriend 
and sorrow i feel 
need must i transgress bow 
unless nerv brass hammer steel 
for unkind shaken
a i pass hell time 
and i tyrant leisur taken
to weigh i suffer crime 
o night woe might remembered
mi deepest sens hard true sorrow hit 
and soon tendered
th humbl salv wound bosom fit 
 but trespass becom fee 
 mine ransom must ransom 


 121

 ti better vile vile esteem 
when receiv reproach 
and pleasur lost deem 
not feel other see 
for other fals adulter eyes
g salut sportiv blood 
or frailti frailer spi 
which will count bad i think good 
no i i level
at abus reckon 
i may straight though bevel 
bi rank thought deed must shown
 unless gener evil maintain 
 all men bad bad reign 


 122

thi gift thi tabl within brain
ful charact last memori 
which shall idl rank remain
beyond date even etern 
or least long brain heart
hav faculti natur subsist 
till raze oblivion yield part
of thee thi record never miss 
that poor retent could much hold 
nor need i talli thi dear love score 
therefor give i bold 
to trust tabl receiv thee 
 to keep adjunct rememb thee
 were import forget 


 123

no time thou shalt boast i chang 
thi pyramid built newer might
to noth novel noth strang 
they dress of former sight 
our date brief therefor admir 
what thou dost foist upon us old 
and rather make born desir 
than think heard told 
thi regist thee i defi 
not wond ring present past 
for thi record see doth lie 
made less thi continu hast 
 thi i vow shall ever 
 i true despit thi scyth thee 


 124

if dear love child state 
it might fortun bastard unfath 
a subject time love time hate 
weed among weed flower flower gather 
no build far accid 
it suffer smile pomp falls
und blow thrall discont 
whereto th invit time fashion call 
it fear polici heret 
which work leas short number hour 
but alon stand huge polit 
that grow heat drown shower 
 to i wit call fool time 
 which die good live crime 


 125

were aught i bore canopi 
with extern outward honour 
or laid great base etern 
which prove short wast ruin 
have i seen dweller form favour
los pay much rent
for compound sweet forgo simpl savour 
piti thriver gaze spent 
no let obsequi thi heart 
and take thou oblat poor free 
which mix second know art 
but mutual render thee 
 henc thou suborn inform true soul
 when impeach stand least thi control 


 126

o thou love boy thi power 
dost hold time fickl glass fickl hour 
who hast wane grown therein show st 
thi lover wither thi sweet self grow st 
if natur sovereign mistress wrack 
a thou goest onward still pluck thee back 
she keep thee purpos skill
may time disgrac wretch minut kill 
yet fear o thou minion pleasur 
she may detain still keep treasur 
 her audit though delay answer must 
 and quietu render thee 


 127

in old age black count fair 
or bore beauti name 
but black beauti success heir 
and beauti slander bastard shame 
for sinc hand hath put natur power 
fair foul art fals borrow face 
sweet beauti hath name holi bower 
but profan live disgrac 
therefor mistress eye raven black 
her eye suit mourner seem 
at born fair beauti lack 
slander creation fals esteem 
 yet mourn becom woe 
 that everi tongu say beauti look 


 128

how oft thou music music play st 
upon bless wood whose motion sounds
with thi sweet finger thou gentli sway st
the wiri concord mine ear confound 
do i envi jack nimbl leap 
to kiss tender inward thi hand 
whilst poor lip harvest reap 
at wood bold thee blush stand 
to tickl would chang state
and situat danc chip 
o er thi finger walk gentl gait 
make dead wood blest live lip 
 sinc sauci jack happi 
 give thi finger thi lip kiss 


 129

th expens spirit wast shame
i lust action till action lust
i perjur murd rou bloodi full blame 
savag extrem rude cruel trust 
enjoy sooner despis straight 
past reason hunt sooner had
past reason hate swallow bait 
on purpos laid make taker mad 
mad pursuit possess 
had quest extrem 
a bliss proof prove woe 
befor joy propos behind dream 
 all world well know yet none know well 
 to shun heaven lead men hell 


 130

mi mistress eye noth like sun 
coral far red lip red 
if snow white breast dun 
if hair wire black wire grow head 
i seen rose damask red white 
but rose see i cheek 
and perfum delight 
than breath mistress reek 
i love hear speak yet well i know 
that music hath far pleas sound 
i grant i never saw goddess go 
mi mistress walk tread ground 
 and yet heaven i think love rare 
 as beli fals compar 


 131

thou art tyrann thou art 
a whose beauti proudli make cruel 
for well thou know st dear dote heart
thou art fairest preciou jewel 
yet good faith say thee behold 
thi face hath power make love groan 
to say err i dare bold 
although i swear self alon 
and sure fals i swear 
a thousand groan think thi face 
one anoth neck wit bear
thi black fairest judgment place 
 in noth art thou black save thi deed 
 and thenc slander i think proce 


 132

thine eye i love piti 
know thi heart torment disdain 
have put black love mourner 
look pretti ruth upon pain 
and truli morn sun heaven
bett becom grey cheek east 
nor full star usher even
doth half glori sober west
a two mourn eye becom thi face 
o let well beseem thi heart
to mourn sinc mourn doth thee grace 
and suit thi piti like everi part 
 then i swear beauti black 
 and foul thi complexion lack 


 133

beshrew heart make heart groan
for deep wound give friend 
i enough tortur alon 
but slave slaveri sweet st friend must 
me self thi cruel eye hath taken 
and next self thou harder hast engross 
of self thee i forsaken 
a torment thrice three fold thu cross 
prison heart thi steel bosom ward 
but friend heart let poor heart bail 
whoe er keep let heart guard 
thou canst use rigour gaol 
 and yet thou wilt i pent thee 
 perforc thine 


 134

so i confess thine 
and i self mortgag thi 
mi self i forfeit mine 
thou wilt restor comfort still 
but thou wilt free 
for thou art covet kind 
he learn sureti like write 
under bond fist doth bind 
the statut thi beauti thou wilt take 
thou usur put st forth use 
and sue friend came debtor sake 
so i lose unkind abus 
 him i lost thou hast 
 he pay whole yet i free 


 135

whoever hath wish thou hast thi 
and will boot will overplu 
more enough i vex thee still 
to thi sweet make addit thu 
wilt thou whose larg spaciou 
not vouchsaf hide thine 
shall other seem right graciou 
and fair accept shine 
the sea water yet receiv rain still 
and abund addeth store 
so thou rich add thi will
on mine make thi larg 
 let unkind fair beseech kill 
 think one one will 


 136

if thi soul check thee i come near 
swear thi blind soul i thi will 
and thi soul know admit 
thu far love love suit sweet fulfil 
will fulfil treasur thi love 
ay fill full will one 
in thing great receipt case prove 
among number one reckon none 
then number let pass untold 
though thi store account i one must 
for noth hold pleas thee hold 
that noth someth sweet thee 
 make name thi love love still 
 and thou lov st name will 


 137

thou blind fool love dost thou mine eye 
that behold see see 
they know beauti see lie 
yet best take worst 
if eye corrupt partial look 
be anchor bay men ride 
whi eye falsehood hast thou forg hook 
whereto judgment heart tie 
whi heart think sever plot 
which heart know wide world common place 
or mine eye see say not
to put fair truth upon foul face 
 in thing right true heart eye er 
 and fals plagu transfer 


 138

when love swear made truth 
i believ though i know lie 
that might think untutor youth 
unlearn world fals subtleti 
thu vainli think think young 
although know day past best 
simpli i credit fals speak tongu 
on side thu simpl truth suppress 
but wherefor say unjust 
and wherefor say i i old 
o love best habit seem trust 
and age love love year told 
 therefor i lie 
 and fault lie flatter 


 139

o call justifi wrong 
that thi unkind lay upon heart 
wound thine eye thi tongu 
use power power slay art 
tell thou lov st elsewher sight 
dear heart forbear glanc thine eye asid 
what need st thou wound cun thi might
i erpress defenc bide 
let excus thee ah love well know 
her pretti look mine enemi 
and therefor face turn foe 
that elsewher might dart injuri 
 yet sinc i near slain 
 kill outright look rid pain 


 140

be wise thou art cruel press
mi tongu tie patienc much disdain 
lest sorrow lend word word express 
the manner piti want pain 
if i might teach thee wit better 
though love yet love tell 
a testi sick men death near 
no news health physician know 
for i despair i grow mad 
and mad might speak ill thee 
now ill wrest world grown bad 
mad slander mad ear believ 
 that i may thou beli 
 bear thine eye straight though thi proud heart go wide 


 141

in faith i love thee mine eye 
for thee thousand error note 
but ti heart love despis 
who despit view pleas dote 
nor mine car thi tongu tune delight 
nor tender feel base touch prone 
nor tast smell desir invited
to sensual feast thee alon 
but five wit five sens can
dissuad one foolish heart serv thee 
who leav unsway like man 
thi proud heart slave vassal wretch 
 onli plagu thu far i count gain 
 that make sin award pain 


 142

love sin thi dear virtu hate 
hate sin ground sin love 
o mine compar thou thine state 
and thou shalt find merit reprov 
or lip thine 
that profan scarlet ornament 
and seal fals bond love oft mine 
rob other bed revenu rent 
be law i love thee thou lov st 
whom thine eye woo mine importun thee 
root piti thi heart grow 
thi piti may deserv piti 
 if thou dost seek thou dost hide 
 by self exampl mayst thou deni 


 143

lo care huswif run catch 
one feather creatur broke away 
set babe make swift dispatch
in pursuit thing would stay 
whilst neglect child hold chase 
cri catch whose busi care bent 
to follow fli face 
not prize poor infant discont 
so run st thou fli thee 
whilst i thi babe chase thee afar behind 
but thou catch thi hope turn back 
and play mother part kiss kind 
 so i pray thou mayst thi will 
 if thou turn back loud cri still 


 144

two love i comfort despair 
which like two spirit suggest still 
the better angel man right fair 
the worser spirit woman colour ill 
to win soon hell femal evil 
tempteth better angel side 
and would corrupt saint devil 
woo puriti foul pride 
and whether angel turn fiend 
suspect i may yet directli tell 
but friend 
i guess one angel anoth hell 
 yet shall i ne er know live doubt 
 till bad angel fire good one 


 145

those lip love hand make 
breath forth sound said i hate 
to languish sake 
but saw woeful state 
straight heart merci come 
chide tongu ever sweet 
wa use give gentl doom 
and taught thu anew greet 
 i hate alter end 
that follow gentl day 
doth follow night like fiend
from heaven hell flown away 
 i hate hate away threw 
 and save life say 


 146

poor soul centr sin earth 
mi sin earth rebel power array 
whi dost thou pine within suffer dearth
paint thi outward wall costli gay 
whi larg cost short leas 
dost thou upon thi fade mansion spend 
shall worm inheritor excess
eat thi charg thi bodi end 
then soul live thou upon thi servant loss 
and let pine aggrav thi store 
buy term divin sell hour dross 
within fed without rich 
 so shall thou feed death feed men 
 and death dead die 


 147

mi love fever long still 
for longer nurseth diseas 
feed doth preserv ill 
th uncertain sickli appetit pleas 
mi reason physician love 
angri prescript kept
hath left i desper approv 
desir death physic except 
past cure i reason past care 
and frantic mad evermor unrest 
mi thought discours mad men 
at random truth vainli express 
 for i sworn thee fair thought thee bright 
 who art black hell dark night 


 148

o eye hath love put head 
which correspond true sight 
or judgment fled 
that censur fals see aright 
if fair whereon fals eye dote 
what mean world say 
if love doth well denot 
love eye true men 
how o love eye true 
that vex watch tear 
no marvel though i mistak view 
the sun self see till heaven clear 
 o cun love tear thou keep st blind 
 lest eye well see thi foul fault find 


 149

canst thou o cruel say i love thee 
when i self thee partak 
do i think thee i forgot
am self tyrant thi sake 
who hateth thee i call friend 
on frown st thou i fawn upon 
nay thou lour st i spend
reveng upon self present moan 
what merit i self respect 
that proud thi servic despis 
when best doth worship thi defect 
command motion thine eye 
 but love hate i know thi mind 
 those see thou lov st i blind 


 150

o power hast thou power might 
with insuffici heart sway 
to make give lie true sight 
and swear bright doth grace day 
whenc hast thou becom thing ill 
that refus thi deed 
there strength warrantis skill 
that mind thi worst best exce 
who taught thee make love thee 
the i hear see caus hate 
o though i love other abhor 
with other thou shouldst abhor state 
 if thi unworthi rais love 
 more worthi i belov thee 


 151

love young know conscienc 
yet know conscienc born love 
then gentl cheater urg amiss 
lest guilti fault thi sweet self prove 
for thou betray i betray
mi nobler part gross bodi treason 
mi soul doth tell bodi may 
triumph love flesh stay farther reason 
but rise thi name doth point thee 
a triumphant prize proud pride 
he content thi poor drudg 
to stand thi affair fall thi side 
 no want conscienc hold i call 
 her love whose dear love i rise fall 


 152

in love thee thou know st i forsworn 
but thou art twice forsworn love swear 
in act thi bed vow broke new faith torn 
in vow new hate new love bear 
but two oath breach i accus thee 
when i break twenti i perjur 
for vow oath misus thee 
and honest faith thee lost 
for i sworn deep oath thi deep kind 
oath thi love thi truth thi constanc 
and enlighten thee gave eye blind 
or made swear thing see 
 for i sworn thee fair perjur i 
 to swear truth foul 


 153

cupid laid brand fell asleep 
a maid dian advantag found 
and love kindl fire quickli steep
in cold valley fountain ground 
which borrow holi fire love 
a dateless live heat still endur 
and grew seet bath yet men prove 
against strang maladi sovereign cure 
but mistress eye love brand new fire 
the boy trial need would touch breast 
i sick withal help bath desir 
and thither hie sad distemp guest 
 but found cure bath help lie 
 where cupid got new fire mistress eye 


 154

the littl love god lie asleep 
laid side heart inflam brand 
whilst mani nymph vow chast life keep 
came trip maiden hand 
the fairest votari took fire 
which mani legion true heart warm 
and gener hot desir 
wa sleep virgin hand disarm 
thi brand quench cool well 
which love fire took heat perpetu 
grow bath health remedi 
for men discas i mistress thrall 
 came cure i prove 
 love fire heat water water cool love 


the end



al s well that end well

helena

which ascrib heaven fate sky

our slow design dull

to join like like kiss like nativ thing 
imposs strang attempt those
that weigh pain sens suppose

to show merit miss love 
the king diseas project may deceiv 
but intent fix leav

scene ii pari a room king palac 

 flourish cornet enter king franc letter lord and
 other attend 

king 
the florentin senoy th ear 
have fought equal fortun continue
a brave war 

first lord 
so ti report sir 

king 
nay ti credibl receiv 
a certainti vouch cousin austria 
with caution florentin move us
for speedi aid wherein dearest friend
prejud busi would seem
to us make denial 

first lord 
hi love wisdom 
approv majesti may plead
for amplest credenc 

king 
he hath arm answer 
and florenc deni come 
yet gentlemen mean see
th tuscan servic freeli leave
to stand either part 

second lord 
it well may serve
a nurseri gentri sick
for breath exploit 

king 
what come 

 enter bertram lafew parol 

first lord 
it count rossillon good lord 
young bertram 

king 
youth thou bear st thi father face 
frank natur rather curiou hast 
hath well compo thee thi father moral parts
mayst thou inherit welcom pari 

bertram 
mi thank duti majesti 

king 
i would i corpor sound 
a thi father friendship
first tri soldiership he look far
into servic time was
discipl bravest he last long 
but us haggish age steal 
and wore us act it much repair me
to talk good father youth
h wit i well observe
today young lord may jest
til scorn return unnoted
er hide leviti honour
so like courtier contempt bitterness
wer pride sharp 
hi equal awak honour 
clock knew true minut when
except bid speak time
hi tongu obey hand who him
h us creatur anoth place 
and bow emin top low rank 
make proud humil 
in poor prais humbl such man
might copi younger time 
which follow well would demonstr now
but goer backward 

bertram 
hi good remembr sir 
li richer thought tomb 
so approof live epitaph
a royal speech 

king 
would i he would alway say 
methink i hear plausiv words
h scatter ear graft them
to grow bear let live 
thi good melancholi oft began
on catastroph heel pastim 
when let live quoth 
 after flame lack oil snuff
of younger spirit whose apprehens senses
al new thing disdain whose judgment are
mer father garment whose constancies
expir fashion thi wish 
i wish 
sinc i wax honey bring home 
i quickli dissolv hive

know enough on bed death
mani receipt gave chiefli one 
which dearest issu practic 
and old experi darl 
he bade store tripl eye 
safer mine two dear i 
and hear high majesti touch d
with malign caus wherein honour
of dear father gift stand chief power 
i come tender applianc 
with bound humbl

but may credul cure 
when learn doctor leav us and
th congreg colleg concluded
that labour art never ransom nature
from inaid estat i say must not
so stain judgment corrupt hope 
to prostitut past cure malady
to empir dissev so
our great self credit esteem
a senseless help help past sens deem

humbl entreat royal thoughts
a modest one bear back

thou thought st help thank i give
a one near death wish live 
but full i know thou know st part 
i know peril thou art

what i hurt tri 
sinc set rest gainst remedi 
he greatest work finisher
oft weakest minist 
so holi writ babe hath judgment shown 
when judg babe great flood flown
from simpl sourc great sea dried
when miracl great st deni 
oft expect fail oft there
wher promis oft hits
wher hope coldest despair fit 

king

thi pain us must thyself paid 
proffer took reap thank reward

it him thing knows
a ti us squar guess show 
but presumpt us when
th help heaven count act men 
dear sir endeavour give consent 
of heaven make experi 
i impostor proclaim
myself level mine aim 
but know i think think i know sure 
mi art past power past cure 

king

hop st thou cure 

helena

ere twice hors sun shall bring
their fieri torcher diurnal ring 
ere twice murk occident damp
moist hesperu hath quench sleepi lamp 
or four twenti time pilot glass
hath told thievish minut pass 
what infirm sound part shall fli 
health shall live free sick freeli die 

king

what dar st thou ventur 

helena 
tax impud 
a strumpet bold divulg shame

sear otherwis ne wors worst extended
with vildest tortur let life end 

king

hi power sound within organ weak 
and imposs would slay
in common sens sens save anoth way 
thi life dear life rate
worth name life thee hath estim 
youth beauti wisdom courag all
that happi prime happi call 
thou hazard need must intimate
skil infinit monstrou desper 
sweet practis thi physic i tri 
that minist thine death i die

of i spoke unpiti let die 
and well deserv not help death fee 
but i help promis

with branch imag thi state 
but one thi vassal i know
i free ask thee bestow

thi perform shall serv 
so make choic thi time i 
thi resolv patient thee still reli 
more i question thee i must 
though know could trust 
from whenc thou cam st tend rest
unquest welcom undoubt bless 
give help ho if thou proceed
a high word deed shall match thi deed

must answer rais i know well 
she breed father charg 
a poor physician daughter wife disdain
rath corrupt ever 

king 
 ti titl thou disdain st which
i build strang blood 
of colour weight heat pour togeth 
would quit confound distinct yet stand off
in differ mighti if be
al virtuou save thou dislik st 
a poor physician daughter thou dislik st 
of virtu name but 
from lowest place virtuou thing proceed 
the place dignifi doer deed 
where great addit swell virtu none 
it dropsi honour good alone
i good without name vile 
the properti go 
not titl she young wise fair 
in natur immedi heir 
and breed honour honour scorn
which challeng honour born 
and like sire honour thrive
when rather act derive
than fore goer the mere word slave 
debauch everi tomb everi grave
a lie trophi oft dumb
wher dust damn oblivion tomb
of honour bone inde what said 
if thou canst like creatur maid 
i creat rest virtu she
i dower honour wealth 

bertram 
i can not love strive 

king 
thou wrong st thyself thou shouldst strive choos 

helena 
that well restor lord i glad 
let rest go 

king 
mi honour stake defeat 
i must produc power here take hand 
proud scorn boy unworthi good gift 
that dost vile mispris shackl up
mi love desert canst dream
w pois us defect scale 
shall weigh thee beam wilt know
it us plant thine honour where
w pleas grow check thi contempt 
obey travail thi good 
believ thi disdain presently
do thine fortun obedi right
which thi duti owe power claim 
or i throw thee care ever
into stagger careless lapse
of youth ignor reveng hate
loos upon thee name justic 
without term piti speak thine answer 

bertram 
pardon graciou lord i submit
mi fanci eye when i consider
what great creation dole honour
fli bid i find late
wa nobler thought base now
th prais king ennobl 
i twere born 

king 
take hand 
and tell thine i promise
a counterpois thi estat 
a balanc replet 

bertram 
i take hand 

king 
good fortun favour king
smil upon contract whose ceremony
shal seem expedi born brief 
and perform tonight the solemn feast
shal attend upon come space 
expect absent friend as thou lov st 
thi love religi els err

scene iii the a room countess palac 

 flourish enter king countess lafew lord gentlemen guard c 

king 
we lost jewel esteem
wa made much poorer son 
a mad folli lack sens know
her estim home

and i beseech majesti make it
natur rebellion done blaze youth 
when oil fire strong reason forc 
o erbear burn

mi honour ladi 
i forgiven forgotten 
though reveng high bent upon 
and watch time shoot

thi i must say 
but first i beg pardon young lord
did majesti mother ladi 
offenc mighti note himself
th greatest wrong he lost wife
whos beauti astonish survey
of richest eye whose word ear took captiv 
whose dear perfect heart scorn serve
humbl call mistress 

king 
prais lost
mak remembr dear well call hither 
we reconcil first view shall kill
al repetit let ask pardon

and deeper oblivion bury
th incens relic let approach

so ti

king

 enter bertram 

lafew

i day season 
for thou mayst see sunshin hail
in but brightest beams
distract cloud give way stand thou forth 
the time fair

mi high repent blames
dear sovereign pardon 

king 
all whole 
not one word consum time 
let take instant forward top 
for old quick st decrees
th inaud noiseless foot time
st ere effect you remember
th daughter lord 

bertram 
admiringli lieg at first
i stuck choic upon ere heart
durst make bold herald tongu 
where impress mine eye infix 
contempt scorn perspect lend 
which warp line everi favour 
scorn fair colour express stolen 
extend contract proportions
to hideou object thenc came
that men prai 
sinc i lost lov mine eye
th dust offend 

king 
well excu 
that thou didst love strike score away
from great compt love come late 
like remors pardon slowli carri 
to great sender turn sour offenc 
cri that good gone our rash faults
mak trivial price seriou thing 
not know know grave 
oft displeasur unjust 
destroy friend weep dust 
our love wake cri see done 
while shame hate sleep afternoon 
be sweet helen knell forget 
send forth amor token fair maudlin 
the main consent stay
to see widow second marriag day 

countess 
which better first o dear heaven bless 
or ere meet o natur cess 

lafew 
come son hous name
must digest give favour 
to sparkl spirit daughter 
that may quickli come

act i


scen i alexandria a room cleopatra palac 

 enter demetriu philo 

philo 
nay dotag gener s
o erflow measur those goodli eye 
that er file muster war
hav glow like plate mar bend turn
th offic devot view
upon tawni front hi captain heart 
which scuffl great fight hath burst
th buckl breast reneg temper
and becom bellow fan
to cool gipsi lust 

 flourish enter antoni cleopatra ladi train with
 eunuch fan

into strumpet fool behold see

if scarc beard caesar sent

how love 

cleopatra 
perchanc nay like 
you must stay longer dismission
i come caesar therefor hear antoni 
where fulvia process caesar i would say both 
call messeng as i egypt queen 
thou blushest antoni blood thine
i caesar homag els thi cheek pay shame
when shrill tongu fulvia scold the messeng 

antoni 
let rome tiber melt wide arch
of rang empir fall here space 
kingdom clay our dungi earth alike
fe beast man the nobl life
i thu _embracing_ mutual pair
and twain i bind 
on pain punish world weet
w stand peerless

excel falsehood 
whi marri fulvia love 
i seem fool i antony
wil

now love love soft hour 
let confound time confer harsh 
there minut live stretch
without pleasur what sport tonight 

cleopatra 
hear ambassador 

antoni

whom everyth becom chide laugh 
to weep whose everi passion fulli strives
to make thee fair admir 
no messeng thine alone
tonight wander street note
th qualiti peopl come queen 
last night desir speak us
