especi cleopatra wholli depend abod 

antoni 
no light answer let officers
hav notic purpos i shall break
th caus expedi queen 
and get leav part for alone
th death fulvia urgent touch 
do strongli speak us letter too
of mani contriv friend rome
petit us home sextu pompeius
hath given dare caesar commands
th empir sea our slipperi peopl 
whose love never link deserver
til desert past begin throw
pompey great dignities
upon son high name power 
higher blood life stand up
for main soldier whose qualiti go 
the side th world may danger much breeding
which like courser hair hath yet life
and serpent poison say pleasure
to whose place us requires
our quick remov henc

i shall

so mightili betray yet first
i saw treason plant 

antoni 
cleopatra 

cleopatra 
whi i think mine true 
though swear shake throne god 
who fals fulvia riotou mad 
to entangl mouth made vows
which break swear 

antoni 
most sweet queen 

cleopatra 
nay pray seek colour go 
but bid farewel go when su stay 
then time word no go 
etern lip eye 
bliss brow bent none part poor
but race heaven they still 
or thou greatest soldier world 
art turn greatest liar 

antoni 
how ladi 

cleopatra 
i would i thi inch thou shouldst know
ther heart egypt 

antoni 
hear queen 
the strong necess time commands
our servic awhil full heart
remain use our italy
shin er civil sword sextu pompeius
mak approach port rome 
equal two domest powers
bre scrupul faction hate grown strength 
are newli grown love condemn pompey 
rich father honour creep apace
into heart thrived
upon present state whose number threaten 
and quiet grown sick rest would purge
bi desper chang my particular 
and safe go 
i fulvia death 

cleopatra 
though age folli could give freedom 
it childish can fulvia die 

antoni 
she dead queen 
look thi sovereign leisur read
th garboil awak last best 
see die 

cleopatra 
o fals love 
where sacr vial thou shouldst fill
with sorrow water now i see i see 
in fulvia death mine receiv shall 

antoni 
quarrel prepar know
th purpos i bear ceas 
a shall give th advic by fire
that quicken nilu slime i go hence
thi soldier servant make peac war
a thou affect 

cleopatra 
cut lace charmian come 
but let i quickli ill well 
so antoni love 

antoni 
mi preciou queen forbear 
and give true evid love stands
an honour trial 

cleopatra 
so fulvia told 
i prithe turn asid weep 
then bid adieu say tears
belong egypt good play one scene
of excel dissembl let look
lik perfect honour 

antoni 
you heat blood no 

cleopatra 
you better yet meetli 

antoni 
now sword 

cleopatra 
and target still mend 
but best look prithe charmian 
how herculean roman become
th carriag chafe 

antoni 
i leav ladi 

cleopatra 
courteou lord one word 
sir i must part 
sir i love 
that know well someth i would 
o oblivion antoni 
and i forgotten 

antoni 
but royalty
hold idl subject i take you
for idl 

cleopatra 
 ti sweat labour
to bear idl near heart
a cleopatra but sir forgiv 
sinc becom kill not
ey well your honour call henc 
therefor deaf unpiti folli 
and god go upon sword
sit laurel victori smooth success
b strew feet 

antoni 
let us go come 
our separ abid flies
that thou resid goe yet 
and i henc fleet remain thee 
away

 enter octaviu caesar lepidu train

you may see lepidu henceforth know 
it caesar natur vice hate
our great competitor from alexandria
thi news fish drink wastes
th lamp night revel manlike
than cleopatra queen ptolemy
mor womanli hardli gave audienc or
vouchsaf think partner you shall find there
a man abstract faults
that men follow 

lepidu 
i must think are
evil enough darken good 
hi fault seem spot heaven 
more fieri night black hereditary
rath purchas can not change
than choos 

caesar 
you indulg let grant not
amiss tumbl bed ptolemi 
to give kingdom mirth sit
and keep turn tippl slave 
to reel street noon stand buffet
with knave smell sweat say becom 
a composur must rare indeed
whom thing can not blemish yet must antony
no way excus foil bear
so great weight light if filled
hi vacanc voluptu 
full surfeit dryness bones
cal but confound time
that drum sport speak loud
a state ti chid
a rate boy matur knowledg 
pawn experi present pleasure
and rebel judgment 

 enter messeng 

lepidu 
here news 

messeng 
thi bid done everi hour 
most nobl caesar shalt thou report
how ti abroad pompey strong sea 
and appear belov those
that fear caesar to ports
th discont repair men reports
g much wrong 

caesar 
i known less 
it hath taught us primal state
that wish 
and eb man ne er love till ne er worth love 
come dear lack thi common bodi 
like vagabond flag upon stream 
goe back lackey vari tide 
to rot motion 

 enter second messeng 

second messeng 
caesar i bring thee word
menecr mena famou pirat 
make sea serv ear wound
with keel everi kind mani hot inroads
they make itali border maritime
lack blood think flush youth revolt 
no vessel peep forth ti soon
taken seen pompey name strike more
than could war resist 

caesar 
antoni 
leav thi lascivi wassail when thou once
wa beaten modena thou slew st
hirtiu pansa consul thi heel
did famin follow thou fought st 
though daintili brought patienc more
than savag could suffer thou didst drink
th stale hors gild puddle
which beast would cough thi palat deign
th roughest berri rudest hedg 
yea like stag snow pastur sheet 
the bark tree thou brows on alps
it report thou didst eat strang flesh
which die look and 
it wound thine honour i speak 
wa born like soldier thi cheek
so much lank 

lepidu 
 ti piti 

caesar 
let shame quickly
dr rome ti time twain
did show th field end
assembl immedi council pompey
thr idl

i shall furnish inform rightly
both sea land i able
to front present time 

caesar 
till encounter
it busi farewel 

lepidu

of stir abroad i shall beseech sir 
to let partak 

caesar

i knew bond

act ii

how varriu

i tell 
the barg sat like burnish throne 
burn water the poop beaten gold 
purpl sail perfum that
th wind love sick oar silver 
which tune flute kept stroke made
th water beat follow faster 
a amor stroke for person 
it beggar descript lie
in pavilion cloth gold tissu 
o erpictur venu see
th fanci outwork natur on side her
stood pretti dimpl boy like smile cupid 
with diver colour fan whose wind seem
to glow delic cheek cool 
and undid

o rare antoni

so mani mermaid tend th eye 
and made bend adorn at helm
a seem mermaid steer the silken tackle
swel touch flower soft hands
that yare frame offic from barge
a strang invis perfum hit sense
of adjac wharf the citi cast
her peopl upon antoni 
enthron th market place sit alon 
whistl th air vacanc 
had gone gaze cleopatra 
and made gap natur

rare egyptian

it better becam guest 
which entreat our courteou antoni

and ordinari pay heart
for eye eat

royal wench

he plough crop

hop forti pace public street
and lost breath spoke pant 
that make defect perfect 
and breathless pour breath forth

h infinit varieti other women cloy

i th east pleasur lie

scene vi near misenum 

 flourish enter pompey mena one door drum trumpet 
 anoth caesar lepidu antoni enobarbu maecena agrippa 
 soldier march 

pompey 
your hostag i mine 
and shall talk fight 

caesar 
most meet
that first come word therefor we
our written purpos us sent 
which thou hast consid let us know
if twill tie thi discont sword
and carri back sicili much tall youth
that els must perish 

pompey 
to three 
the senat alon great world 
chief factor god i know
wherefor father reveng want 
have son friend sinc juliu caesar 
who philippi good brutu ghost 
there saw labour what t
that move pale cassiu conspir and what
mad honour honest roman brutu 
with arm rest courtier beauteou freedom 
to drench capitol would
hav one man man and it
hath made rig navi whose burden
th anger ocean foam i meant
to scourg th ingratitud despit rome
cast nobl father 

caesar

act iii


scen i a plain syria 

 enter ventidiu triumph siliu roman 
 offic soldier dead bodi pacoru born 

ventidiu 
now dart parthia art thou struck now
pleas fortun marcu crassu death
mak reveng bear king son body
befor armi thi pacoru orod 
pay marcu crassu 

siliu 
nobl ventidiu 
whilst yet parthian blood thi sword warm 
the fugit parthian follow spur media 
mesopotamia shelter whither
th rout fli so thi grand captain antony
shal set thee triumphant chariot and
put garland thi head 

ventidiu 
o siliu siliu 
i done enough a lower place note well 
may make great act for learn siliu 
better leav undon deed
acquir high fame serv away 
caesar antoni ever won
mor offic person sossiu 
one place syria lieuten 
for quick accumul renown 
which achiev th minut lost favour 
who th war captain can
becom captain captain ambit 
the soldier virtu rather make choic loss
than gain darken 
i could antoniu good 
but twould offend offence
should perform perish 

siliu 
thou hast ventidiu that
without soldier sword
grant scarc distinct thou wilt write antoni 

ventidiu 
i humbl signifi name 
that magic word war effect 
how banner well paid rank 
the ne er yet beaten hors parthia
w jade th field 

siliu 
where 

ventidiu 
he purposeth athen whither haste
th weight must convey permit 
we shall appear on pass along

 enter antoni octavia

but pay term honour cold sickly
h vent narrow measur lent

or teeth

 enter agrippa maecena caesar

contemn rome done more
in alexandria here manner

wer publicli enthron at feet sat

h gave stablish egypt made her
of lower syria cypru lydia

al revenu

demand like

whi stolen upon us thu you come not
lik caesar sister the wife antony
should armi usher and
th neigh hors tell approach
long ere appear the tree th way
should born men expect faint 
long nay dust
should ascend roof heaven 
rais popul troop but come
a market maid rome prevented
th ostent love left unshown 
i often left unlov we met you
bi sea land suppli everi stage
with augment greet

good lord

on free my lord mark antoni 
hear prepar war acquainted
mi griev ear withal whereon i begged
hi pardon return

be abstract tween lust

do say lord

and affair come wind 
where

no wrong sister cleopatra
hath nod he hath given empire
up whore levying
th king th earth war he hath assembled
bocchu king libya archelaus
of cappadocia philadelpho king
of paphlagonia thracian king adalla

herod jewri mithrid king
of comagen polemon amynta 
the king mede lycaonia 
with larger list sceptr

that afflict

til perceiv wrong led
and neglig danger cheer heart 
be troubl time drives
o er content strong necess 
but let determin thing destiny
hold unbewail way welcom rome 
noth dear you abused
beyond mark thought high god 
to justic make ministers
of us love best comfort 
and ever welcom us

in abomin turn off

that nois us

i sir

b ever known patienc my dear st sister

scen oliv s hous frederick s court forest arden

act i scene i orchard oliv s house

ent orlando adam

 orlando as i rememb adam upon fashion bequeath me
 poor thousand crown thou say st charg my
 brother bless breed well begin my
 sad my brother jaqu keep school report speaks
 goldenli profit for part keep rustic home 
 speak properli stay home unkept call
 keep gentleman birth differ from
 stall ox hi hors bred better besid that
 fair feed taught manag and
 end rider dearli hir i brother gain nothing
 growth anim dunghil are
 much bound i besid noth so
 plenti give someth natur gave his
 counten seem take he let feed hind 
 bar place brother much lie mine my
 gentil educ thi adam griev and
 spirit father i think within begin mutiny
 servitud i longer endur though yet i know
 wise remedi avoid

 adam yonder come master brother

 adam retir

 oliv know sir

 first born tradit take not
 away blood twenti brother betwixt us i as
 much father albeit i confess coming
 nearer rever

 orlando come come elder brother young 
 oliv wilt thou lay hand villain

 boy he father thrice villain say such

 remembr accord

 enter charles

 charl good morrow worship 
 oliv good monsieur charl what new news new
 court

 old duke banish younger brother new duke 
 three four love lord put voluntary
 exil whose land revenu enrich new duke

 oliv can tell rosalind duke daughter banished
 father

 follow exil die stay behind she at
 court less belov uncl own
 daughter never two ladi love 
 oliv where old duke live 
 charl they say alreadi forest arden many
 merri men live like old robin hood
 england they say mani young gentlemen flock everi day 
 fleet time carelessli golden world 
 oliv what wrestl morrow new duke 
 charl marri i sir i came acquaint a
 matter i given sir secretli understand younger
 brother orlando hath disposit come disgui against
 tri fall to morrow sir i wrestl credit he
 escap without broken limb shall acquit well 
 your brother young tender love i would
 loath foil i must honour come
 therefor love i came hither acquaint
 withal either might stay intend 
 brook disgrac well shall run is
 thing search altogeth 
 oliv charl i thank thee thi love thou shalt
 find i kindli requit i notic my
 brother purpos herein underhand mean labour to
 dissuad resolut i tell thee 
 charl stubbornest young fellow franc full of
 ambit enviou emul everi man good part secret
 villain contriv natur brother 
 therefor use thi discret i lief thou didst break his
 neck finger and thou wert best look thou
 dost slight disgrac mightili grace
 thee practis thee poison entrap
 thee treacher devic never leav thee till he
 hath ta en thi life indirect mean i
 assur thee almost tear i speak one
 young villain day live i speak brotherly
 i anatom thee i must blush
 weep thou must look pale wonder 
 charl i heartili glad i came hither if come
 morrow i give payment if ever go alon 
 i never wrestl prize and god keep worship 
 exit
 oliv farewel good charl now i stir gamest i
 hope i shall see end soul yet i know 
 hate noth yet gentl never school and
 yet learn full nobl devic sort enchantingly
 belov inde much heart world and
 especi peopl best know i am
 altogeth mispris but shall long wrestler
 shall clear noth remain i kindl boy

scen ii a lawn duke s palace

ent rosalind celia

 celia i pray thee rosalind sweet coz merri 
 rosalind dear celia i show mirth i mistress and
 would yet i merrier unless could teach forget

 extraordinari pleasur

 mine thee

 hath taken away thi father perforc i render thee

 rose merri

 let see think fall love

 good earnest sport neither safety
 pure blush thou mayst honour come 
 rosalind what shall sport

 gift women

 enter touchstone

 celia no natur hath made fair creatur may by
 fortun fall fire though natur hath given us wit to
 flout fortun hath fortun sent fool cut off

 fortun make natur natur cutter natur wit

 will suddenli break forth sir fare well

ent celia rosalind

 celia whi cousin rosalind cupid merci 
 not word

 throw come lame reason

 lam reason mad without 
 celia but father 
 rosalind no child father o full of
 brier work day world 
 celia they bur cousin thrown upon thee holiday
 fooleri walk trodden path petticoats
 catch 
 rosalind i could shake coat bur my

 celia hem away

 enter duke frederick lords

 rosalind let love love i
 look come duke 
 celia with eye full anger 
 frederick mistress dispatch safest hast 
 and get court 
 rosalind me uncl 
 frederick you cousin 
 within ten day thou beest found
 so near public court twenti mile 
 thou diest 
 rosalind i beseech grace 
 let knowledg fault bear 
 if i hold intellig 
 or acquaint mine desir 
 if i dream frantic 
 as i trust i dear uncl 
 never much thought unborn
 did i offend high 
 frederick thu traitor 
 if purgat consist word 
 they innoc grace 
 let suffic thee i trust thee 
 rosalind yet mistrust can not make traitor 
 tell whereon likelihood depend 
 frederick thou art thi father daughter enough 
 rosalind so i high took dukedom 
 so i high banish 
 treason inherit lord 
 or deriv friend 
 what my father traitor 
 then good lieg mistak much
 to think poverti treacher 
 celia dear sovereign hear speak 
 frederick ay celia stay sake 
 els father rang along 
 celia i entreat stay 
 it pleasur remors 
 i young time valu 
 but i know if traitor 
 whi i still slept togeth 
 rose instant learn play eat togeth 
 and whereso er went like juno swan 
 still went coupl insepar 
 frederick she subtl thee smooth 
 her silenc patienc 
 speak peopl piti 
 thou art fool she rob thee thi name 
 and thou wilt show bright seem virtuous
 when gone then open thi lip 
 firm irrevoc doom
 which i pass upon banish 
 celia pronounc sentenc lieg 
 i can not live compani 
 frederick you fool you niec provid 
 if outstay time upon mine honour 
 and great word die 
 exeunt duke lords
 celia o poor rosalind whither wilt thou go 
 wilt thou chang father i give thee mine 
 i charg thee thou griev i 
 rosalind i caus 
 celia thou hast cousin 
 prithe cheer know st thou duke
 hath banish daughter 
 rosalind that hath 
 celia no hath rosalind lack love
 which teacheth thee thou i one 
 shall sund red shall part sweet girl 
 no let father seek anoth heir 
 therefor devis may fli 
 whither go bear us 
 and seek take charg upon 
 to bear grief leav 
 for heaven sorrow pale 
 say thou canst i go along thee 
 rosalind whi whither shall go 
 celia to seek uncl forest arden 
 rosalind ala danger us 
 maid travel forth far 
 beauti provoketh thiev sooner gold 
 celia i put poor mean attir 
 and kind umber smirch face 
 the like shall pass along 
 and never stir assail 
 rosalind were better 
 becaus i common tall 
 that i suit point like man 
 a gallant curtl axe upon thigh 
 a boar spear hand heart
 lie hidden woman fear 
 we swash martial outsid 
 as mani mannish coward have
 that outfac semblanc 
 celia what shall i call thee thou art man 
 rosalind i wors name jove page 
 and therefor look call ganymed 
 but call 
 celia someth hath refer state 
 no longer celia aliena 
 rosalind but cousin assay steal
 the clownish fool father court 
 would comfort travel 
 celia he go along er wide world 
 leav alon woo let away 
 and get jewel wealth togeth 
 devis fittest time safest way
 to hide us pursuit made
 after flight now go content
 to liberti banish exeunt

act ii scene i the forest arden

ent duke senior amien two three lord like foresters

 duke senior now co mate brother exil 
 hath old custom made life sweet
 than paint pomp are woods
 more free peril enviou court 
 here feel penalti adam 
 the season differ ici fang
 and churlish chide winter wind 
 which bite blow upon bodi 
 even till i shrink cold i smile say
 thi flatteri counsellors
 that feelingli persuad i 
 sweet use advers 
 which like toad ugli venom 
 wear yet preciou jewel head 
 and life exempt public haunt 
 find tongu tree book run brook 
 sermon stone good everyth 
 i would chang 
 amien happi grace 
 that translat stubborn fortune
 into quiet sweet style 
 duke senior come shall go kill us venison 
 and yet irk poor dappl fool 
 be nativ burgher desert citi 
 should confin fork heads
 have round haunch gor 
 first lord inde lord 
 the melancholi jaqu griev 
 and kind swear usurp
 than doth brother hath banish 
 to day lord amien myself
 did steal behind lay along
 under oak whose antiqu root peep out
 upon brook brawl along wood 
 to place poor sequest red stag 
 that hunter aim ta en hurt 
 did come languish inde lord 
 the wretch anim heav forth groans
 that discharg stretch leathern coat
 almost burst big round tears
 cour one anoth innoc nose
 in piteou chase thu hairi fool 
 much mark melancholi jaqu 
 stood th extremest verg swift brook 
 augment tear 
 duke senior but said jaqu 
 did moral spectacl 
 first lord o ye thousand simil 
 first weep needless stream 
 poor deer quoth thou mak st testament
 as worldl give thi sum more
 to much then alon 
 left abandon velvet friend 
 ti right quoth thu miseri doth part
 the flux compani anon careless herd 
 full pastur jump along him
 and never stay greet ay quoth jaques
 sweep fat greasi citizen 
 ti fashion wherefor look
 upon poor broken bankrupt 
 thu invect pierceth through
 the bodi countri citi court 
 yea life swear we
 are mere usurp tyrant wors 
 to fright anim kill up
 in assign nativ dwell place 
 duke senior and leav contempl 
 second lord we lord weep commenting
 upon sob deer 
 duke senior show place 
 i love cope sullen fit 
 for full matter 
 first lord i bring straight exeunt

scen ii the duke s palace

ent duke frederick lords

 frederick can possibl man saw 
 it can not villain court
 are consent suffer 
 first lord i can not hear see 
 the ladi attend chamber 
 saw abe morn early
 they found bed untreasur mistress 
 second lord my lord roynish clown oft
 your grace wont laugh also miss 
 hisperia princess gentlewoman 
 confess secretli erheard
 your daughter cousin much commend
 the part grace wrestler
 that late foil sinewi charl 
 and believ wherev gone 
 that youth sure compani 
 frederick send brother fetch gallant hither 
 if absent bring brother 
 i make find do suddenli 
 and let search inquisit quail
 to bring foolish runaway exeunt

scen iii befor oliv s house

ent orlando adam meeting

 orlando who 
 adam what young master o gentl master 
 o sweet master o memory
 of old sir rowland whi make 
 whi virtuou whi peopl love 
 and wherefor gentl strong valiant 
 whi would fond overcome
 the bonni prizer humor duke 
 your prais come swiftli home 
 know master kind men
 their grace serv enemi 
 no your virtu gentl master 
 are sanctifi holi traitor 
 o world comely
 envenom bear 
 orlando whi matter 
 adam o unhappi youth 
 come within door within roof
 the enemi grace live 
 your brother brother yet son 
 yet son i call son
 of i call father 
 hath heard prais night means
 to burn lodg use lie 
 and within if fail 
 he mean cut 
 i overheard practic 
 thi place hous butcheri 
 abhor fear enter 
 orlando whi whither adam wouldst thou go 
 adam no matter whither come 
 orlando what wouldst thou go beg food 
 or base boist rou sword enforce
 a thievish live common road 
 thi i must know 
 yet i i 
 i rather subject malice
 of divert blood bloodi brother 
 adam but i five hundr crown 
 the thrifti hire i sav father 
 which i store foster nurs 
 when servic old limb lie lame 
 and unregard age corner thrown 
 take he doth raven feed 
 yea provid cater sparrow 
 be comfort age here gold 
 all i give let servant 
 though i look old yet i strong lusti 
 for youth i never apply
 hot rebelli liquor blood 
 nor unbash forehead woo
 the mean weak debil 
 therefor age lusti winter 
 frosti kindli let go 
 i servic younger man
 in busi necess 
 orlando o good old man well thee appears
 the constant servic antiqu world 
 when servic sweat duti meed 
 thou art fashion time 
 where none sweat promot 
 and choke servic up
 even thee 
 but poor old man thou prun st rotten tree
 that can not much blossom yield
 in lieu thi pain husbandri 
 but come thi way go along togeth 
 and ere thi youth wage spent
 we light upon settl low content 
 adam master go i follow the
 to last gasp truth loyalti 
 from seventeen year till almost four score
 here live i live 
 at seventeen year mani fortun seek 
 but fourscor late week 
 yet fortun can not recompens better
 than die well master debtor exeunt

scen iv the forest arden

ent rosalind ganymed celia aliena clown alias
touchstone

 rosalind o jupit weari spirit 
 touchston i care spirit leg weari 
 rosalind i could find heart disgrac man apparel 
 cri like woman i must comfort weaker vessel as
 doublet hose ought show courag petticoat 
 therefor courag good aliena 
 celia i pray bear i can not go 
 touchston for part i rather bear bear 
 yet i bear cross i bear i think you
 money purs 
 rosalind well forest arden 
 touchston ay i arden fool i i at
 home i better place travel must content 

 enter corin silvius

 rosalind ay good touchston look come a
 young man old solemn talk 
 corin that way make scorn still 
 silviu o corin thou knew st i love 
 corin i partli guess i lov ere 
 silviu no corin old thou canst guess 
 though thi youth thou wast true lover
 as ever sigh upon midnight pillow 
 but thi love ever like mine 
 as sure i think never man love 
 how mani action ridiculous
 hast thou drawn thi fantasi 
 corin into thousand i forgotten 
 silviu o thou didst never love heartili

 that ever love make thee run 
 thou hast lov 
 or thou hast sat i 
 wear thi hearer thi mistress prais 
 thou hast lov

 abruptli passion make 
 thou hast lov

 mortal natur natur love mortal
 folli

 touchston nay i shall ne er ware mine wit till i break
 shin

 is much upon fashion 
 touchston and mine grow someth stale

 corin who call 
 touchston your better sir 
 corin els wretch 
 rosalind peac i say good even friend 
 corin and gentl sir 
 rosalind i prithe shepherd love gold
 can desert place buy entertain 
 bring us may rest feed 
 here young maid travel much oppress 
 and faint succour 
 corin fair sir i piti 
 and wish sake mine 
 my fortun abl reliev 
 but i shepherd anoth man 
 and shear fleec i graze 
 my master churlish disposit 
 and littl reck find way heaven
 by deed hospit 
 besid cote flock bound feed 
 are sale sheepcot 
 by reason absenc nothing
 that feed come see

 rosalind what shall buy flock pastur 
 corin that young swain saw erewhil 
 that littl care buy thing

 and thou shalt pay us 
 celia and mend thi wage i like place 
 and willingli could wast time

scen vi the forest

ent orlando adam

 adam dear master i go o i die food here lie
 i measur grave farewel kind master 
 orlando whi adam no greater heart thee live a
 littl comfort littl cheer thyself littl if uncouth
 forest yield anyth savag i either food or
 bring food thee thi conceit nearer death thy
 power for sake comfort hold death awhil the
 arm end i present i bring thee
 someth eat i give thee leav die thou
 diest i come thou art mocker labour well said 
 thou look st cheerli i thee quickli yet thou
 liest bleak air come i bear thee shelter 
 thou shalt die lack dinner live
 anyth desert cheerli good adam exeunt

scen vii the forest

a tabl set enter duke senior amien lord like outlaws

 duke senior i think transform beast 
 for i nowher find like man 
 first lord my lord even gone henc 
 here merri hear song 
 duke senior if compact jar grow music 
 we shall shortli discord sphere 
 go seek tell i would speak 

 enter jaques

 first lord he save labour approach 
 duke senior whi monsieur life 
 that poor friend must woo compani 
 what look merrili 
 jaqu a fool fool i met fool th forest 
 a motley fool a miser world 
 as i live food i met fool 
 who laid bask sun 
 and rail ladi fortun good term 
 in good set term yet motley fool 
 good morrow fool quoth i no sir quoth 
 call fool till heaven hath sent fortun 
 and drew dial poke 
 and look lack lustr eye 
 say wise it ten clock 
 thu may see quoth world wag 
 ti hour ago sinc nine 
 and one hour twill eleven 
 and hour hour ripe ripe 
 and hour hour rot rot 
 and therebi hang tale when i hear
 the motley fool thu moral time 
 my lung began crow like chanticleer
 that fool deep contempl 
 and i laugh san intermission
 an hour dial o nobl fool 
 a worthi fool motley wear 
 duke senior what fool 
 jaqu o worthi fool one hath courtier 
 and say ladi young fair 
 they gift know brain 
 which dri remaind biscuit
 after voyag hath strang place cramm d
 with observ vents
 in mangl form o i fool 
 i ambiti motley coat 
 duke senior thou shalt one 
 jaqu it suit 
 provid weed better judgments
 of opinion grow rank them
 that i wise i must liberty
 withal larg charter wind 
 to blow i pleas fool 
 and gall folli 
 they must laugh and sir must 
 the plain way parish church 
 he fool doth wise hit
 doth foolishli although smart 
 not seem senseless bob 
 the wise man folli anatomiz d
 even squand ring glanc fool 
 invest motley give leave
 to speak mind i through
 cleans foul bodi th infect world 
 if patient receiv medicin 
 duke senior fie thee i tell thou wouldst 
 jaqu what counter would i good 
 duke senior most mischiev foul sin chide sin 
 for thou thyself hast libertin 
 as sensual brutish sting 
 and th emboss sore head evils
 that thou licens free foot hast caught
 wouldst thou disgorg gener world 
 jaqu whi cri pride
 that therein tax privat parti 
 doth flow huge sea 
 till wearer mean ebb 
 what woman citi i name
 when i say citi woman bears
 the cost princ unworthi shoulder 
 who come say i mean 
 when one neighbour 
 or basest function
 that say braveri cost 
 think i mean therein suits
 hi folli mettl speech 
 there let see wherein
 my tongu hath wrong right 
 then hath wrong free 
 whi tax like wild goos fli 
 unclaim man but come 

 enter orlando sword drawn

 orlando forbear eat 
 jaqu whi i eat none yet

 jaqu of kind cock come

 that civil thou seem st empti

 of bare distress hath ta en show
 of smooth civil yet arn i inland bred

 he die touch fruit
 till i affair answer 
 jaqu an answer reason i must die

 more forc move us gentl 
 orlando i almost die food let 
 duke senior sit feed welcom tabl 
 orlando speak gentli pardon i pray 
 i thought thing savag 
 and therefor put i countenance
 of stern command but whate er are
 that desert inaccess 
 under shade melancholi bough 
 lose neglect creep hour time 
 if ever look better day 
 if ever bell knoll church 
 if ever sat good man feast 
 if ever eyelid wip tear 
 and know ti piti piti 
 let gentl strong enforc 
 in hope i blush hide sword 
 duke senior true seen better day 
 and holi bell knoll church 
 and sat good men feast wip eyes
 of drop sacr piti hath engend red

 and take upon command help have
 that want may minist red 
 orlando then forbear food littl 
 while like doe i go find fawn 
 and give food there old poor man
 who hath mani weari step
 limp pure love till first suffic 
 oppress two weak evil age hunger 
 i touch bit 
 duke senior go find 
 and noth wast till return 
 orlando i thank ye blest good comfort 
 exit
 duke senior thou seest alon unhappi 
 thi wide univers theatre
 present woeful pageant scene
 wherein play 
 jaqu all world stage 
 and men women mere player 
 they exit entranc 
 and one man time play mani part 
 hi act seven age at first infant 
 mewl puke nurs arm 
 then whine school boy satchel
 and shine morn face creep like snail
 unwillingli school and lover 
 sigh like furnac woeful ballad
 made mistress eyebrow then soldier 
 full strang oath beard like pard 
 jealou honour sudden quick quarrel 
 seek bubbl reputation
 even cannon mouth and justic 
 in fair round belli good capon lin 
 with eye sever beard formal cut 
 full wise saw modern instanc 
 and play part the sixth age shifts
 into lean slipper pantaloon 
 with spectacl nose pouch side 
 hi youth hose well sav world wide
 for shrunk shank big manli voic 
 turn toward childish trebl pipes
 and whistl sound last scene 
 that end strang event histori 
 is second childish mere oblivion 
 san teeth san eye san tast san everi thing

act iii scene i the palace

ent duke frederick oliv lords

 frederick not see sinc sir sir can not 
 but i better part made merci 
 i seek absent argument
 of reveng thou present but look 
 find thi brother whereso er 
 seek candl bring dead living
 within twelvemonth turn thou more
 to seek live territori 
 thi land thing thou dost call thine
 worth seizur seiz hand 
 till thou canst quit thee thi brother mouth
 of think thee 
 oliv o high knew heart 
 i never lov brother life

scen ii the forest

ent orlando paper

 orlando hang vers wit love 
 and thou thrice crown queen night survey
 with thi chast eye thi pale sphere 
 thi huntress name full life doth sway 
 o rosalind tree shall book 
 and bark thought i charact 
 that everi eye forest looks
 shall see thi virtu wit everi 
 run run orlando carv everi tree

 enter corin touchstone

 corin and like shepherd life master touchston 
 touchston truli shepherd respect good
 life respect shepherd life nought 
 in respect solitari i like well in
 respect privat vile life now in
 respect field pleaseth well respect
 court tediou as spare life 
 look fit humour well plenty
 goe much stomach hast philosophi in
 thee shepherd 
 corin no i know one sicken wors at
 eas want money mean content is
 without three good friend properti rain wet 
 fire burn good pastur make fat sheep a
 great caus night lack sun hath
 learn wit natur art may complain good breed 
 come dull kindr 
 touchston such one natur philosoph wast ever in
 court shepherd 
 corin no truli 
 touchston then thou art damn 
 corin nay i hope 
 touchston truli thou art damn like ill roast egg on
 one side 
 corin for court your reason 
 touchston whi thou never wast court thou never saw st good
 manner thou never saw st good manner thi manner must
 wick wicked sin sin damnat thou art
 parlou state shepherd 
 corin not whit touchston those good manner the
 court ridicul countri behaviour the
 countri mockabl court you told salut not
 court kiss hand courtesi would be
 uncleanli courtier shepherd 
 touchston instanc briefli come instanc 
 corin whi still handl ewe fell you
 know greasi

 greas mutton wholesom sweat man shallow 
 shallow a better instanc i say come 
 corin besid hand hard 
 touchston your lip feel sooner shallow a
 sounder instanc come 
 corin and often tarr surgeri our
 sheep would us kiss tar the courtier hand are
 perfum civet 
 touchston most shallow man thou worm meat respect good
 piec flesh inde learn wise perpend civet is
 baser birth tar uncleanli flux cat mend
 instanc shepherd 
 corin you courtli wit i rest 
 touchston wilt thou rest damn god help thee shallow man god
 make incis thee thou art raw 
 corin sir i true labour i earn i eat get i
 wear owe man hate envi man happi glad other
 men good content harm greatest pride is
 see ewe graze lamb suck

 ram togeth offer get live the

 lamb twelvemonth crook pate old cuckoldli ram

 devil shepherd i can not see els how
 thou shouldst scape

 enter rosalind read paper

 rosalind from east western ind 
 no jewel like rosalind 
 her worth mount wind 
 through world bear rosalind 
 all pictur fairest lin d
 are black rosalind 
 let face kept mind
 but fair rosalind

 butter women rank market

 thi fals gallop vers infect

 enter orlando jaques

 true lover forest els sigh everi minut and

 clock orlando and swift foot time had been
 proper rosalind by mean sir time travel diver paces

 trot withal time gallop withal stand still
 withal orlando i prithe doth trot withal rosalind marri 
 trot hard young maid contract marriage

 time pace hard seem length seven year 
 orlando who ambl time withal rosalind with priest lacks
 latin rich man hath gout one sleeps
 easili can not studi live merrili because
 feel pain one lack burden lean wasteful
 learn know burden heavi tediou penuri these
 time ambl withal orlando who doth gallop withal rosalind 
 with thief gallow though go softli foot can
 fall think soon orlando who stay still
 withal rosalind with lawyer vacat sleep
 term term perceiv time move 
 orlando where dwell pretti youth rosalind with this
 shepherdess sister skirt forest like fringe
 upon petticoat orlando are nativ place rosalind as
 coney see dwell kindl orlando your
 accent someth finer could purchas remov a
 dwell rosalind i told mani inde old
 religi uncl mine taught speak youth an
 inland man one knew courtship well fell in

 hath gener tax whole sex withal orlando can you
 rememb princip evil laid charg of
 women rosalind there none princip like one
 anoth halfpenc everi one fault seem monstrou till his
 fellow fault came match orlando i prithe recount of
 rosalind no i cast away physic that
 sick there man haunt forest abus young
 plant carv rosalind bark hang ode upon
 hawthorn elegi brambl forsooth deifi name
 rosalind if i could meet fanci monger i would give some
 good counsel seem quotidian love upon 
 orlando i love shak i pray tell your
 remedi rosalind there none uncl mark upon he
 taught know man love cage rush i am
 sure prison orlando what mark rosalind a
 lean cheek blue eye sunken have
 unquestion spirit beard neglect 
 i pardon simpli having
 beard younger brother revenu then hose be
 ungart bonnet unband sleev unbutton shoe
 unti everi thing demonstr careless
 desol but man rather point devic in

 orlando fair youth i would i could make thee believ i love 
 rosalind me believ you may soon make love
 believ i warrant apter confess she
 that one point women still give lie
 conscienc but good sooth hang the
 vers tree wherein rosalind admir orlando i swear
 thee youth white hand rosalind i that
 unfortun rosalind but much love rhymes
 speak orlando neither rhyme reason express much 
 rosalind love mere mad i tell deserv well
 dark hous whip madmen reason not
 punish cure lunaci ordinari the
 whipper love yet i profess cure counsel 
 orlando did ever cure rosalind ye one this
 manner he imagin love mistress i set him
 everi day woo time would i moonish
 youth griev effemin changeabl long like proud 
 fantast apish shallow inconst full tear full of

 anyth boy women part cattl this

 suitor mad humour love live humour mad 
 forswear full stream world live a

 heart good youth rosalind nay must call rosalind come

scen iii the forest

ent touchston audrey jaqu behind

 touchston come apac good audrey i fetch goat 
 audrey and audrey i man yet doth simpl feature
 content 
 audrey your featur lord warrant us what featur 
 touchston i thee thi goat most
 caprici poet honest ovid among goth 
 jaqu asid o knowledg ill inhabit wors jove a
 thatch hous 
 touchston when man vers can not understood man s
 good wit second forward child understand it
 strike man dead great reckon littl room 
 truli i would god made thee poetic 
 audrey i know poetic is honest deed and
 word is true thing 
 touchston no truli truest poetri feign 
 lover given poetri swear poetri may
 said lover feign 
 audrey do wish god made poetic 
 touchston i truli thou swear st thou art honest 
 thou wert poet i might hope thou didst
 feign 
 audrey would honest

 enter rosalind celia corin distance

 phebe i would thi execution 
 i fli thee i would injur thee 
 thou tell st murder mine eye 
 ti pretti sure probabl 
 that eye frail st softest thing 
 who shut coward gate atomi 
 should call tyrant butcher murder 
 now i frown thee heart 
 and mine eye wound let kill thee 
 now counterfeit swoon fall 
 or thou canst o shame shame 
 lie say mine eye murder 
 now show wound mine eye hath made thee 
 scratch thee pin remains
 some scar lean upon rush 
 the cicatric capabl impressure

 which i dart thee hurt thee 
 nor i sure forc eyes
 that hurt

 if ever ever may near

 that love keen arrow make

 come thou near time come 
 afflict thi mock piti

 mother

 over wretch what though beauti

 i think mean tangl eye 
 no faith proud mistress hope

 that old carlot master

 silviu my errand fair youth

 by stern brow waspish action
 which use write

 i guiltless messeng

 and play swagger bear bear

 were man rare phoenix od

 thi letter devic

 phebe write

 and turn extrem love

 that old glove twa hand 
 she huswif hand matter

 read

 that maiden heart hath burn

 did ever hear rail 

 while eye man woo 
 that could vengeanc 

 mean beast 

 if scorn bright eyne
 have power rais love mine

 would work mild aspect 
 while chid i love

 he bring love the

 will faith offer take
 of i make

 enter oliver

 oliv good morrow fair one pray know 
 where purlieu forest stands
 a sheep cote fenc oliv tree 
 celia west place neighbour bottom 
 the rank osier murmur stream
 left right hand bring place 
 but hour hous doth keep 
 there none within 
 oliv if eye may profit tongu 
 then i know descript 
 such garment year the boy fair 
 of femal favour bestow himself
 like ripe sister woman low 
 and browner brother are you
 the owner hous i inquir 
 celia it boast ask say 
 oliv orlando doth commend 
 and youth call rosalind
 he send bloodi napkin are 
 rosalind i what must understand 
 oliv some shame know me
 what man i 
 thi handkerch stain 
 celia i pray tell 
 oliv when last young orlando part 
 he left promis return again
 within hour pace forest 
 chew food sweet bitter fanci 
 lo befel he threw eye asid 
 and mark object present 
 under oak whose bough moss age 
 and high top bald dri antiqu 
 a wretch rag man ergrown hair 
 lay sleep back about neck
 a green gild snake wreath 
 who head nimbl threat approach d
 the open mouth suddenli 
 see orlando unlink 
 and indent glide slip away
 into bush bush shade
 a lioness udder drawn dri 
 lay couch head ground catlik watch 
 when sleep man stir tis
 the royal disposit beast
 to prey noth doth seem dead 
 thi seen orlando approach man 
 and found brother elder brother 
 celia o i heard speak brother 
 and render unnatural
 that liv amongst men 
 oliv and well might 
 for well i know unnatur 
 rosalind but orlando leav 
 food suck hungri lioness 
 oliv twice turn back purpo 
 but kind nobler ever reveng 
 and natur stronger occas 
 made give battl lioness 
 who quickli fell hurtling
 from miser slumber i awak 
 celia are brother 
 rosalind wa rescu 
 celia wa oft contriv kill 
 oliv twa i ti i i shame
 to tell i sinc conversion
 so sweetli tast thing i 
 rosalind but bloodi napkin 
 oliv by 
 when first last betwixt us two 
 tear recount kindli bath 
 as i came desert place 
 in brief led gentl duke 
 who gave fresh array entertain 
 commit unto brother love 
 who led instantli unto cave 
 there stripp upon arm
 the lioness torn flesh away 
 which bled faint 
 and cri faint upon rosalind 
 brief i recov bound wound 
 and small space strong heart 
 he sent hither stranger i 
 to tell stori might excuse
 hi broken promis give napkin 
 dy blood unto shepherd youth
 that sport doth call rosalind

 celia whi ganymed sweet ganymed 
 oliv mani swoon look blood 
 celia there cousin ganymed 
 oliv look recov

 celia we lead thither

scen iii the forest

ent touchston audrey

 touchston to morrow joy day audr morrow we
 marri 
 audrey i desir heart i hope no
 dishonest desir desir woman world here come
 two banish duke page 

 enter two pages

 first page well met honest gentleman 
 touchston by troth well met come sit sit song 
 second page we sit th middl 
 first page shall clap roundli without hawk or
 spit say hoars prologues
 bad voic 
 second page i faith faith tune like two gipsies
 hors 

 song 
 it lover lass 
 with hey ho hey nonino 
 that er green corn field pass
 in spring time pretti ring time 
 when bird sing hey ding ding ding 
 sweet lover love spring 

 between acr rye 
 with hey ho hey nonino 
 these pretti countri folk would lie 
 in spring time c 

 thi carol began hour 
 with hey ho hey nonino 
 how life flower 
 in spring time c 

 and therefor take present time 
 with hey ho hey nonino 
 for love crown prime 
 in spring time c 

 touchston truli young gentlemen though great
 matter ditti yet note untun 
 first page you deceiv sir kept time lost our
 time 
 touchston by troth ye i count time lost hear such
 foolish song god buy god mend voic come 
 audrey exeunt

scen iv the forest

ent duke senior amien jaqu orlando oliv celia

 duke senior dost thou believ orlando boy
 can hath promis 
 orlando i sometim believ sometim 
 as fear hope know fear 

 enter rosalind silviu phebe

 rosalind patienc while compact urg 
 you say i bring rosalind 
 you bestow orlando 
 duke senior that would i i kingdom give 
 rosalind and say i bring 
 orlando that would i i kingdom king 
 rosalind you say marri i will 
 phebe that i i die hour 
 rosalind but refus marri 
 you give faith shepherd 
 phebe so bargain 
 rosalind you say phebe 
 silviu though death one thing 
 rosalind i promi make matter even 
 keep word o duke give daughter 
 you orlando receiv daughter 
 keep word phebe marri 
 or els refus wed shepherd 
 keep word silviu marri her
 if refus henc i go 
 to make doubt even 
 exeunt rosalind celia
 duke senior i rememb shepherd boy
 some live touch daughter favour 
 orlando my lord first time i ever saw him
 methought brother daughter 
 but good lord boy forest born 
 and hath tutor rudiments
 of mani desper studi uncl 
 whom report great magician 
 obscur circl forest 

 enter touchston audrey

 jaqu there sure anoth flood toward coupl are
 come ark here come pair strang beast which
 tongu call fool 
 touchston salut greet 
 jaqu good lord bid welcom thi motley minded
 gentleman i often met forest he hath a
 courtier swear 
 touchston if man doubt let put purgat 
 i trod measur i flatt red ladi i been
 polit friend smooth mine enemi i undone
 three tailor i four quarrel like fought
 one 
 jaqu and ta en 
 touchston faith met found quarrel upon the
 seventh caus 
 jaqu how seventh caus good lord like fellow 
 duke senior i like well 
 touchston god ild sir i desir like i press in
 sir amongst rest countri copul swear
 forswear accord marriag bind blood break a
 poor virgin sir ill favour thing sir mine a
 poor humour mine sir take man els rich
 honesti dwell like miser sir poor hous pearl
 foul oyster 
 duke senior by faith swift sententi 
 touchston accord fool bolt sir dulcet
 diseas 
 jaqu but seventh caus find quarrel on
 seventh caus 
 touchston upon lie seven time remov bear bodi more
 seem audrey thu sir i dislik cut certain
 courtier beard sent word i said beard not
 cut well mind thi call retort
 courteou if i sent word well cut would
 send word cut pleas thi call quip
 modest if well cut disabl judgment 
 thi call repli churlish if well cut 
 would answer i spake true thi call reproof
 valiant if well cut would say i lie this
 call countercheck quarrelsom and lie
 circumstanti lie direct 
 jaqu and oft say beard well cut 
 touchston i durst go lie circumstanti nor
 durst give lie direct measur swords
 part 
 jaqu can nomin order degre lie 
 touchston o sir quarrel print book have
 book good manner i name degre the first 
 retort courteou second quip modest third the
 repli churlish fourth reproof valiant fifth the
 countercheck quarrelsom sixth lie circumst 
 seventh lie direct all may avoid lie
 direct may avoid if i knew seven
 justic could take quarrel parti were
 met one thought if if you
 said i said and shook hand swore
 brother your if peac maker much virtu if 
 jaqu is rare fellow lord 
 he good thing yet fool 
 duke senior he use folli like stalk hors the
 present shoot wit 

 enter hymen rosalind celia still music

 hymen then mirth heaven 
 when earthli thing made even
 aton togeth 
 good duke receiv thi daughter 
 hymen heaven brought 
 yea brought hither 
 that thou mightst join hand 
 whose heart within bosom 
 rosalind to duke to i give i 
 to orlando to i give i 
 duke senior if truth sight daughter 
 orlando if truth sight rosalind 
 phebe if sight shape true 
 whi love adieu 
 rosalind i father 
 i husband 
 nor ne er wed woman 
 hymen peac ho i bar confus 
 ti i must make conclusion
 of strang event 
 here eight must take hands
 to join hymen band 
 if truth hold true content 
 you cross shall part 
 you heart heart 
 you love must accord 
 or woman lord 
 you sure togeth 
 as winter foul weather 
 while wedlock hymn sing 
 feed question 
 that reason wonder may diminish 
 how thu met thing finish 

 song
 wed great juno crown 
 o bless bond board bed 
 ti hymen peopl everi town 
 high wedlock honour 
 honour high honour renown 
 to hymen god everi town 

 duke senior o dear niec welcom thou art 
 even daughter welcom less degre 
 phebe i eat word thou art mine 
 thi faith fanci thee doth combin 

 enter jaqu de boys

 jaqu de boy let audienc word two 
 i second son old sir rowland 
 that bring tide fair assembl 
 duke frederick hear everi day
 men great worth resort forest 
 address mighti power foot 
 in conduct purpos take
 hi brother put sword 
 and skirt wild wood came 
 where meet old religi man 
 after question converted
 both enterpris world 
 hi crown bequeath banish brother 
 and land restor again
 that exil thi true
 i engag life 
 duke senior welcom young man 
 thou offer st fairli thi brother wed 
 to one land withheld 
 a land larg potent dukedom 
 first forest let us ends
 that well begun well begot 
 and everi happi number 
 that endur shrewd day night us 
 shall share good return fortun 
 accord measur state 
 meantim forget new fall n digniti 
 and fall rustic revelri 
 play music bride bridegroom 
 with measur heap joy th measur fall 
 jaqu sir patienc if i heard rightli 
 the duke hath put religi life 
 and thrown neglect pompou court 
 jaqu de boy he hath 
 jaqu to i out convertites
 there much matter heard learn 
 to duke you former honour i bequeath 
 your patienc virtu well deserv 
 to orlando you love true faith doth merit 
 to oliv you land love great allies
 to silviu you long well deserv bed 
 to touchston and wrangl thi love voyage
 is two month victual so pleasur 
 i danc measur 
 duke senior stay jaqu stay 
 jaqu to see pastim i what would have
 i stay know abandon cave exit
 duke senior proce proceed we begin rite 
 as trust end true delight a danc exeunt

epilogue
 epilogu 
 rosalind it fashion see ladi epilogu but
 unhandsom see lord prologu if it
 true good wine need bush ti true good play
 need epilogu yet good wine use good bush and
 good play prove better help good epilogu what a
 case i neither good epilogu cannot
 insinu behalf good play i not
 furnish like beggar therefor beg becom my
 way conjur i begin women i charge
 o women love bear men like much of
 play pleas i charg o men love
 bear women i perceiv simp ring none you
 hate women play may pleas 
 if i woman i would kiss mani beard that
 plea complexion lik breath i defied
 i sure mani good beard good face 
 sweet breath kind offer i make curtsi 
 bid farewel
