scen ephesus


act i

scen i a hall duke palac 

 enter duke egeon jailer offic attend 

egeon 
proce solinu procur fall 
and doom death end woe 

duke 
merchant syracusa plead 
i partial infring law 
the enmiti discord late
sprung rancor outrag duke
to merchant well deal countrymen 
who want guilder redeem live 
have seal rigor statut blood 
exclud piti threat ning look 
for sinc mortal intestin jars
 twixt thi sediti countrymen us 
it hath solemn synod decre 
both syracusian 
to admit traffic advers town 
nay born ephesus
b seen syracusian mart fair 
again syracusian born
com bay ephesu die 
hi good confisc duke dispos 
unless thousand mark levied
to quit penalti ransom 
thi substanc valu highest rate 
cannot amount unto hundr mark 
therefor law thou art condemn die 

egeon 
yet comfort word done 
mi woe end likewis even sun 

duke 
well syracusian say brief cause
whi thou departedst thi nativ home 
and caus thou cam st ephesu 

egeon 
a heavier task could impo d
than i speak grief unspeak 
yet world may wit end
wa wrought natur vile offenc 
i utter sorrow give leav 
in syracusa i born wed
unto woman happi 
and hap bad 
with i liv joy wealth increa d
bi prosper voyag i often made
to epidamnum till factor death 
and great care good random left 
drew kind embrac spous 
from absenc six month old
befor almost faint under
th pleas punish women bear 
had made provis follow 
and soon safe arriv i 
there long became
a joy mother two goodli son 
and strang one like other
a could distinguish name 
that hour self inn 
a mean woman delivered
of burden male twin alik 
those parent exceed poor 
i bought brought attend son 
mi wife meanli proud two boy 
made daili motion home return 
unwil i agre ala soon
w came aboard 
a leagu epidamnum sail d
befor alway wind obey deep
gav tragic instanc harm 
but longer retain much hope 
for obscur light heaven grant
did convey unto fear minds
a doubt warrant immedi death 
which though would gladli embrac 
yet incess weep wife 
weep saw must come 
and piteou plain pretti babe 
that mourn fashion ignor fear 
forc seek delay 
and mean none 
the sailor sought safeti boat 
and left ship sink ripe us 
mi wife care latter born 
had fast ned unto small spare mast 
such sea fare men provid storm 
to one twin bound 
whilst i like heed 
the children thu dispo wife i 
fix eye care fix 
fast ned either end mast 
and float straight obedi stream 
wa carri toward corinth thought 
at length sun gaze upon earth 
disper vapour offend us 
and benefit wish light
th sea wax calm discovered
two ship far make amain us 
of corinth epidauru 
but ere came o let say 
gather sequel went 

duke 
nay forward old man break 
for may piti though pardon thee 

egeon 
o god done i now
worthili term merciless us 
for ere ship could meet twice five leagu 
we encount mighti rock 
which violent born upon 
our help ship split midst 
so unjust divorc us 
fortun left us alike
what delight sorrow 
her part poor soul seem burdened
with lesser weight lesser woe 
wa carri speed wind 
and sight three taken up
bi fishermen corinth thought 
at length anoth ship seiz us 
and know hap save 
gave health welcom ship wrack guest 
and would reft fisher prey 
had bark slow sail 
and therefor homeward bend cours 
thu heard sever bliss 
that misfortun life prolong d
to tell sad stori mishap 

duke 
and sake thou sorrowest 
do favour dilat full
what befal n thee till 

egeon 
mi youngest boy yet eldest care 
at eighteen year becam inquisitive
aft brother importun me
that attend case like 
reft brother retain name 
might bear compani quest 
whom whilst i labour love see 
i hazard loss i lov 
five summer i spent farthest greec 
roam clean bound asia 
and coast homeward came ephesu 
hopeless find yet loath leav unsought
or place harbour men 
but must end stori life 
and happi i time death 
could travel warrant live 

duke 
hapless egeon fate mark d
to bear extrem dire mishap 
now trust law 
against crown oath digniti 
which princ would may disannul 
mi soul sue advoc thee 
but though thou art adjudg death 
and pass sentenc may recal d
but honour great disparag 
yet i favour thee i 
therefor merchant i limit thee day
to seek thi health benefici help 
tri friend thou hast ephesu 
beg thou borrow make sum 
and live thou art doom die 
jailer take thi custodi 

jailer 
i lord 

egeon 
hopeless helpless doth egeon wend 
but procrastin lifeless end 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii a public place 

 enter antipholu dromio syracus merchant 

merchant 
therefor give epidamnum 
lest good soon confisc 
thi day syracusian merchant
i apprehend arriv 
and abl buy life 
accord statut town
di ere weari sun set west 
there money i keep 

antipholu of syracus 
go bear centaur host 
and stay dromio till i come thee 
within hour dinnertim 
till i view manner town 
perus trader gaze upon build 
and return sleep within mine inn 
for long travel i stiff weari 
get thee away 

dromio of syracus 
mani man would take word 
and go inde good mean 

 _exit dromio _ 

antipholu of syracus 
a trusti villain sir oft 
when i dull care melancholi 
lighten humour merri jest 
what walk town 
and go inn dine 

merchant 
i invit sir certain merchant 
of i hope make much benefit 
i crave pardon soon five clock 
pleas i meet upon mart 
and afterward consort till bedtim 
mi present busi call 

antipholu of syracus 
farewel till i go lose 
and wander view citi 

merchant 
sir i commend content 

 _exit merchant _ 

antipholu of syracus 
he commend mine content
commend thing i can not get 
i world like drop water
that ocean seek anoth drop 
who fail find fellow forth 
unseen inquisit confound 
so i find mother brother 
in quest unhappi lose 

 enter dromio ephesu 

here come almanac true date 
what how chanc thou art return soon 

dromio of ephesu 
return soon rather approach late 
the capon burn pig fall spit 
the clock hath strucken twelv upon bell 
mi mistress made one upon cheek 
she hot meat cold 
the meat cold come home 
you come home stomach 
you stomach broke fast 
but know ti fast pray 
are penit default today 

antipholu of syracus 
stop wind sir tell i pray 
where left money i gave 

dromio of ephesu 
o sixpenc i wednesday last
to pay saddler mistress crupper 
the saddler sir i kept 

antipholu of syracus 
i sportiv humour 
tell dalli money 
we stranger dar st thou trust
so great charg thine custodi 

dromio of ephesu 
i pray jest sir sit dinner 
i mistress come post 
if i return i shall post inde 
for score fault upon pate 
methink maw like mine clock 
and strike home without messeng 

antipholu of syracus 
come dromio come jest season 
reserv till merrier hour 
where gold i gave charg thee 

dromio of ephesu 
to sir gave gold 

antipholu of syracus 
come sir knave done foolish 
and tell thou hast dispo thi charg 

dromio of ephesu 
mi charg fetch mart
hom hous phoenix sir dinner 
mi mistress sister stay 

antipholu of syracus 
now i christian answer me
in safe place bestow money 
or i shall break merri sconc yours
that stand trick i undispo 
where thousand mark thou hadst 

dromio of ephesu 
i mark upon pate 
some mistress mark upon shoulder 
but thousand mark 
if i pay worship 
perchanc bear patient 

antipholu of syracus 
thi mistress mark mistress slave hast thou 

dromio of ephesu 
your worship wife mistress phoenix 
she doth fast till come home dinner 
and pray hie home dinner 

antipholu of syracus 
what wilt thou flout thu unto face 
be forbid there take sir knave 

dromio of ephesu 
what mean sir god sake hold hand 
nay sir i take heel 

 _exit dromio _ 

antipholu of syracus 
upon life devic other
th villain er raught money 
they say town full cozenag 
a nimbl juggler deceiv eye 
dark work sorcer chang mind 
soul kill witch deform bodi 
disguis cheater prate mountebank 
and mani like liberti sin 
if prove i gone sooner 
i centaur go seek slave 
i greatli fear money safe 

 _exit _ 



act ii

scen i a public place 

 enter adriana wife antipholu ephesu luciana her
 sister 

adriana 
neither husband slave return d
that hast i sent seek master 
sure luciana two clock 

luciana 
perhap merchant hath invit 
and mart somewher gone dinner 
good sister let us dine never fret 
a man master liberti 
time master see time 
they go come if patient sister 

adriana 
whi liberti 

luciana 
becaus busi still lie door 

adriana 
look i serv take ill 

luciana 
o know bridl 

adriana 
there none ass bridl 

luciana 
whi headstrong liberti lash woe 
there noth situat heaven eye
but hath bound earth sea sky 
the beast fish wing fowls
ar male subject control 
man divin master 
lord wide world wild wat ry sea 
indu intellectu sens soul 
of pre emin fish fowl 
are master femal lord 
then let attend accord 

adriana 
thi servitud make keep unw 

luciana 
not troubl marriag bed 

adriana 
but wed would bear sway 

luciana 
ere i learn love i practis obey 

adriana 
how husband start 

luciana 
till come home i would forbear 

adriana 
patienc unmov no marvel though paus 
they meek caus 
a wretch soul brui advers 
we bid quiet hear cri 
but burd ned like weight pain 
a much complain 
so thou hast unkind mate griev thee 
with urg helpless patienc would reliev 
but thou live see like right bereft 
thi fool begg patienc thee left 

luciana 
well i marri one day tri 
here come man husband nigh 

 enter dromio ephesu 

adriana 
say tardi master hand 

dromio of ephesu 
nay two hand two ear wit 

adriana 
say didst thou speak know st thou mind 

dromio of ephesu 
ay ay told mind upon mine ear 
beshrew hand i scarc could understand 

luciana 
spake doubt thou couldst feel mean 

dromio of ephesu 
nay struck plainli i could well feel blow withal
so doubt i could scarc understand 

adriana 
but say i prithe come home 
it seem hath great care pleas wife 

dromio of ephesu 
whi mistress sure master horn mad 

adriana 
horn mad thou villain 

dromio of ephesu 
i mean cuckold mad 
but sure stark mad 
when i desir come home dinner 
he ask thousand mark gold 
 ti dinner time quoth i my gold quoth 
 your meat doth burn quoth i my gold quoth 
 will come home quoth i my gold quoth 
 where thousand mark i gave thee villain 
 the pig quoth i burn my gold quoth 
 my mistress sir quoth i hang thi mistress 
i know thi mistress thi mistress 

luciana 
quoth 

dromio of ephesu 
quoth master 
 i know quoth hous wife mistress 
so errand due unto tongu 
i thank i bare home upon shoulder 
for conclus beat 

adriana 
go back thou slave fetch home 

dromio of ephesu 
go back new beaten home 
for god sake send messeng 

adriana 
back slave i break thi pate across 

dromio of ephesu 
and bless cross beat 
between i shall holi head 

adriana 
henc prate peasant fetch thi master home 

dromio of ephesu 
am i round 
that like footbal spurn thu 
you spurn henc spurn hither 
if i last servic must case leather 

 _exit _ 

luciana 
fie impati loureth face 

adriana 
hi compani must minion grace 
whilst i home starv merri look 
hath home age th allur beauti took
from poor cheek hath wast 
are discours dull barren wit 
if volubl sharp discours marr 
unkind blunt marbl hard 
do gay vestment affect bait 
that fault master state 
what ruin found
bi ruin then ground
of defeatur my decay fair
a sunni look would soon repair 
but unruli deer break pale
and feed home poor i stale 

luciana 
self harm jealousi fie beat henc 

adriana 
unfeel fool wrong dispens 
i know eye doth homag otherwher 
or els let would 
sister know promi chain 
would alon love would detain 
so would keep fair quarter bed 
i see jewel best enamelled
wil lose beauti yet gold bide still
that other touch yet often touch will
wear gold man hath name
bi falsehood corrupt doth shame 
sinc beauti can not pleas eye 
i weep left away weep die 

luciana 
how mani fond fool serv mad jealousi 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the 

 enter antipholu syracus 

antipholu of syracus 
the gold i gave dromio laid up
saf centaur heed slave
i wander forth care seek 
bi comput mine host report 
i could speak dromio sinc first
i sent mart see come 

 enter dromio syracus 

how sir merri humour alter 
a love stroke jest 
you know centaur receiv gold 
your mistress sent home dinner 
mi hous phoenix wast thou mad 
that thu madli thou didst answer 

dromio of syracus 
what answer sir spake i word 

antipholu of syracus 
even even half hour sinc 

dromio of syracus 
i see sinc sent henc 
home centaur gold gave 

antipholu of syracus 
villain thou didst deni gold receipt 
and told st mistress dinner 
for i hope thou felt st i displea 

dromio of syracus 
i glad see merri vein 
what mean jest i pray master tell 

antipholu of syracus 
yea dost thou jeer flout teeth 
think st thou i jest hold take thou 

 _beat dromio _ 

dromio of syracus 
hold sir god sake jest earnest 
upon bargain give 

antipholu of syracus 
becaus i familiarli sometimes
do use fool chat 
your sauci jest upon love 
and make common seriou hour 
when sun shine let foolish gnat make sport 
but creep cranni hide beam 
if jest know aspect 
and fashion demeanour look 
or i beat method sconc 

dromio of syracus 
sconc call would leav batter i rather it
a head and use blow long i must get sconc head 
and ensconc els i shall seek wit shoulder but i
pray sir i beaten 

antipholu of syracus 
dost thou know 

dromio of syracus 
noth sir i beaten 

antipholu of syracus 
shall i tell 

dromio of syracus 
ay sir wherefor say everi hath wherefor 

antipholu of syracus 
whi first flout wherefor 
for urg second time 

dromio of syracus 
wa ever man thu beaten season 
when wherefor neither rhyme reason 
well sir i thank 

antipholu of syracus 
thank sir 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir someth gave noth 

antipholu of syracus 
i make amend next give noth someth 
but say sir dinner time 

dromio of syracus 
no sir i think meat want i 

antipholu of syracus 
in good time sir 

dromio of syracus 
bast 

antipholu of syracus 
well sir twill dri 

dromio of syracus 
if sir i pray eat none 

antipholu of syracus 
your reason 

dromio of syracus 
lest make choler purchas anoth dri bast 

antipholu of syracus 
well sir learn jest good time 
there time thing 

dromio of syracus 
i durst deni choler 

antipholu of syracus 
bi rule sir 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir rule plain plain bald pate father time
himself 

antipholu of syracus 
let hear 

dromio of syracus 
there time man recov hair grow bald by
natur 

antipholu of syracus 
may fine recoveri 

dromio of syracus 
ye pay fine periwig recov lost hair another
man 

antipholu of syracus 
whi time niggard hair plenti an
excr 

dromio of syracus 
becaus bless bestow beast hath
scant men hair hath given wit 

antipholu of syracus 
whi mani man hath hair wit 

dromio of syracus 
not man hath wit lose hair 

antipholu of syracus 
whi thou didst conclud hairi men plain dealer without wit 

dromio of syracus 
the plainer dealer sooner lost yet loseth kind of
jol 

antipholu of syracus 
for reason 

dromio of syracus 
for two sound one 

antipholu of syracus 
nay sound i pray 

dromio of syracus 
sure one 

antipholu of syracus 
nay sure thing fals 

dromio of syracus 
certain one 

antipholu of syracus 
name 

dromio of syracus 
the one save money spend tire at
dinn drop porridg 

antipholu of syracus 
you would time prove time thing 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir name e en time recov hair lost by
natur 

antipholu of syracus 
but reason substanti time recov 

dromio of syracus 
thu i mend time bald therefor world end
wil bald follow 

antipholu of syracus 
i knew twould bald conclus 
but soft waft us yonder 

 enter adriana luciana 

adriana 
ay ay antipholu look strang frown 
some mistress hath thi sweet aspect 
i adriana thi wife 
the time thou unurg wouldst vow
that never word music thine ear 
that never object pleas thine eye 
that never touch well welcom thi hand 
that never meat sweet savour thi tast 
unless i spake look touch carv thee 
how come husband o come 
that thou art estrang thyself 
thyself i call strang 
that undivid incorpor 
am better thi dear self better part 
ah tear away thyself 
for know love easi mayst thou fall
a drop water break gulf 
and take unmingl thenc drop again
without addit diminish 
a take thyself 
how dearli would touch thee quick 
should st thou hear i licenti 
and bodi consecr thee 
bi ruffian lust contamin 
wouldst thou spit spurn 
and hurl name husband face 
and tear stain skin harlot brow 
and fals hand cut wed ring 
and break deep divorc vow 
i know thou canst therefor see thou 
i possess adulter blot 
mi blood mingl crime lust 
for two one thou play fals 
i digest poison thi flesh 
be strumpet thi contagion 
keep fair leagu truce thi true bed 
i live distain thou undishonour 

antipholu of syracus 
plead fair dame i know 
in ephesu i two hour old 
a strang unto town talk 
who everi word wit scann 
want wit one word understand 

luciana 
fie brother world chang 
when wont use sister thu 
she sent dromio home dinner 

antipholu of syracus 
bi dromio 

dromio of syracus 
bi 

adriana 
bi thee thou didst return 
that buffet thee blows
deni hous wife 

antipholu of syracus 
did convers sir gentlewoman 
what cours drift compact 

dromio of syracus 
i sir i never saw till time 

antipholu of syracus 
villain thou liest even words
didst thou deliv mart 

dromio of syracus 
i never spake life 

antipholu of syracus 
how thu call us name 
unless inspir 

adriana 
how ill agre gravity
to counterfeit thu grossli slave 
abet thwart mood 
be wrong exempt 
but wrong wrong contempt 
come i fasten sleev thine 
thou art elm husband i vine 
whose weak marri thi stronger state 
make thi strength commun 
if aught possess thee dross 
usurp ivi brier idl moss 
who want prune intrusion
infect thi sap live thi confus 

antipholu of syracus 
to speak move theme 
what i marri dream 
or sleep i think i hear 
what error drive eye ear amiss 
until i know sure uncertainty
i entertain offer fallaci 

luciana 
dromio go bid servant spread dinner 

dromio of syracus 
o bead i cross sinner 
thi fairi land o spite spite 
we talk goblin owl sprite 
if obey ensu 
they suck breath pinch us black blue 

luciana 
whi prat st thou thyself answer st 
dromio thou drone thou snail thou slug thou sot 

dromio of syracus 
i transform master i 

antipholu of syracus 
i think thou art mind i 

dromio of syracus 
nay master mind shape 

antipholu of syracus 
thou hast thine form 

dromio of syracus 
no i ape 

luciana 
if thou art chang aught ti ass 

dromio of syracus 
 ti true ride i long grass 
 ti i ass els could never be
but i know well know 

adriana 
come come longer i fool 
to put finger eye weep
whilst man master laugh woe scorn 
come sir dinner dromio keep gate 
husband i dine today 
and shrive thousand idl prank 
sirrah ask master 
say dine forth let creatur enter 
come sister dromio play porter well 

antipholu of syracus 
am i earth heaven hell 
sleep wake mad well advi 
known unto disgui 
i say say persev 
and mist adventur go 

dromio of syracus 
master shall i porter gate 

adriana 
ay let none enter lest i break pate 

luciana 
come come antipholu dine late 

 _exeunt _ 



act iii

scen i the 

 enter antipholu ephesu man dromio ephesu angelo the
 goldsmith balthasar merchant 

antipholu of ephesu 
good signior angelo must excus us 
mi wife shrewish i keep hour 
say i linger shop
to see make carcanet 
and tomorrow bring home 
but villain would face 
he met mart i beat 
and charg thousand mark gold 
and i deni wife hous 
thou drunkard thou didst thou mean 

dromio of ephesu 
say sir i know i know 
that beat mart i hand show 
if skin parchment blow gave ink 
your handwrit would tell i think 

antipholu of ephesu 
i think thou art ass 

dromio of ephesu 
marri doth appear
bi wrong i suffer blow i bear 
i kick kick pass 
you would keep heel bewar ass 

antipholu of ephesu 
you sad signior balthasar pray god cheer
may answer good good welcom 

balthasar 
i hold dainti cheap sir welcom dear 

antipholu of ephesu 
o signior balthasar either flesh fish
a tabl full welcom make scarc one dainti dish 

balthasar 
good meat sir common everi churl afford 

antipholu of ephesu 
and welcom common noth word 

balthasar
smal cheer great welcom make merri feast 

antipholu of ephesu 
ay niggardli host spare guest 
but though cate mean take good part 
better cheer may better heart 
but soft door lock go bid let us 

dromio of ephesu 
maud bridget marian cice gillian ginn 

dromio of syracus 
 _within _ mome malt hors capon coxcomb idiot patch 
either get thee door sit hatch 
dost thou conjur wench thou call st store
when one one mani go get thee door 

dromio of ephesu 
what patch made porter my master stay street 

dromio of syracus 
let walk whenc came lest catch cold feet 

antipholu of ephesu 
who talk within ho open door 

dromio of syracus 
right sir i tell tell wherefor 

antipholu of ephesu 
wherefor for dinner i dine today 

dromio of syracus 
nor today must come may 

antipholu of ephesu 
what art thou keep st hous i owe 

dromio of syracus 
the porter time sir name dromio 

dromio of ephesu 
o villain thou hast stolen mine offic name 
the one ne er got credit mickl blame 
if thou hadst dromio today place 
thou wouldst chang thi face name thi name ass 

 enter luce conceal antipholu ephesu companion 

luce 
 _within _ what coil dromio gate 

dromio of ephesu 
let master luce 

luce 
faith come late 
and tell master 

dromio of ephesu 
o lord i must laugh 
have proverb shall i set staff 

luce 
have anoth when tell 

dromio of syracus 
if thi name call luce luce thou hast answer well 

antipholu of ephesu 
do hear minion let us i hope 

luce 
i thought ask 

dromio of syracus 
and said 

dromio of ephesu 
so come help well struck blow blow 

antipholu of ephesu 
thou baggag let 

luce 
can tell whose sake 

dromio of ephesu 
master knock door hard 

luce 
let knock till ach 

antipholu of ephesu 
you cri minion i beat door 

luce 
what need pair stock town 

 enter adriana conceal antipholu ephesu companion 

adriana 
 _within _ who door keep nois 

dromio of syracus 
bi troth town troubl unruli boy 

antipholu of ephesu 
are wife might come 

adriana 
your wife sir knave go get door 

dromio of ephesu 
if went pain master knave would go sore 

angelo 
here neither cheer sir welcom we would fain either 

balthasar 
in debat best shall part neither 

dromio of ephesu 
they stand door master bid welcom hither 

antipholu of ephesu 
there someth wind can not get 

dromio of ephesu 
you would say master garment thin 
your cake warm within stand cold 
it would make man mad buck bought sold 

antipholu of ephesu 
go fetch someth i break ope gate 

dromio of syracus 
break break i break knave pate 

dromio of ephesu 
a man may break word sir word wind 
ay break face break behind 

dromio of syracus 
it seem thou want st break upon thee hind 

dromio of ephesu 
here much upon thee i pray thee let 

dromio of syracus 
ay fowl feather fish fin 

antipholu of ephesu 
well i break go borrow crow 

dromio of ephesu 
a crow without feather master mean 
for fish without fin fowl without feather 
if crow help us sirrah pluck crow togeth 

antipholu of ephesu 
go get thee gone fetch iron crow 

balthasar 
have patienc sir o let 
herein war reput 
and draw within compass suspect
th unviol honour wife 
onc long experi wisdom 
her sober virtu year modesti 
plead part caus unknown 
and doubt sir well excuse
whi time door made 
be rul depart patienc 
and let us tiger dinner 
and even come alone
to know reason strang restraint 
if strong hand offer break in
now stir passag day 
a vulgar comment made 
and suppos common rout
against yet ungal estimation
that may foul intrus enter 
and dwell upon grave dead 
for slander live upon success 
for ever hou get possess 

antipholu of ephesu 
you prevail i depart quiet 
and despit mirth mean merri 
i know wench excel discours 
pretti witti wild yet gentl 
there dine thi woman i mean 
mi wife i protest without desert 
hath oftentim upbraid withal 
to dinner get home
and fetch chain i know ti made 
bring i pray porpentin 
for hous that chain i bestow
 be noth spite wife 
upon mine hostess good sir make hast 
sinc mine door refus entertain 
i knock elsewher see disdain 

angelo 
i meet place hour henc 

antipholu of ephesu 
do jest shall cost expens 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the 

 enter luciana antipholu syracus 

luciana 
and may quit forgot
a husband offic shall antipholu 
even spring love thi love spring rot 
shall love build grow ruinou 
if wed sister wealth 
then wealth sake use kind 
or like elsewher stealth 
muffl fals love show blind 
let sister read eye 
be thi tongu thi shame orat 
look sweet speak fair becom disloyalti 
apparel vice like virtu harbing 
bear fair presenc though heart taint 
teach sin carriag holi saint 
be secret fals what need acquaint 
what simpl thief brag attaint 
 ti doubl wrong truant bed
and let read thi look board 
shame hath bastard fame well manag 
ill deed doubl evil word 
ala poor women make us believ 
be compact credit love us 
though other arm show us sleev 
we motion turn may move us 
then gentl brother get 
comfort sister cheer call wife 
 ti holi sport littl vain
when sweet breath flatteri conquer strife 

antipholu of syracus 
sweet mistress name els i know 
nor wonder hit mine 
less knowledg grace show not
than earth wonder earth divin 
teach dear creatur think speak 
lay open earthi gross conceit 
smother error feebl shallow weak 
the fold mean word deceit 
against soul pure truth labour you
to make wander unknown field 
are god would creat new 
transform power i yield 
but i i well i know
your weep sister wife mine 
nor bed homag i owe 
far far i declin 
o train sweet mermaid thi note
to drown thi sister flood tear 
sing siren thyself i dote 
spread er silver wave thi golden hair 
and bed i take thee lie 
and gloriou supposit think
h gain death hath mean die 
let love light drown sink 

luciana 
what mad reason 

antipholu of syracus 
not mad mate i know 

luciana 
it fault springeth eye 

antipholu of syracus 
for gaze beam fair sun 

luciana 
gaze clear sight 

antipholu of syracus 
a good wink sweet love look night 

luciana 
whi call love call sister 

antipholu of syracus 
thi sister sister 

luciana 
that sister 

antipholu of syracus 
no 
it thyself mine self better part 
mine eye clear eye dear heart dearer heart 
mi food fortun sweet hope aim 
mi sole earth heaven heaven claim 

luciana 
all sister els 

antipholu of syracus 
call thyself sister sweet i aim thee 
thee i love thee lead life 
thou hast husband yet i wife 
give thi hand 

luciana 
o soft sir hold still 
i fetch sister get goodwil 

 _exit luciana _ 

 enter dromio syracus 

antipholu of syracus 
whi dromio runn st thou fast 

dromio of syracus 
do know sir am i dromio am i man am i 

antipholu of syracus 
thou art dromio thou art man thou art thyself 

dromio of syracus 
i ass i woman man besid 

antipholu of syracus 
what woman man besid thyself 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir besid i due woman one claim 
one haunt one 

antipholu of syracus 
what claim lay thee 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir claim would lay hors would
hav beast i beast would but
that beastli creatur lay claim 

antipholu of syracus 
what 

dromio of syracus 
a rever bodi ay one man may speak without
h say sir rever i lean luck match yet is
sh wondrou fat marriag 

antipholu of syracus 
how dost thou mean fat marriag 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir kitchen wench greas i know not
what use put make lamp run by
her light i warrant rag tallow burn a
poland winter if live till doomsday burn week longer
than whole world 

antipholu of syracus 
what complexion 

dromio of syracus 
swart like shoe face noth like clean kept for 
she sweat man may go oversho grime 

antipholu of syracus 
that fault water mend 

dromio of syracus 
no sir ti grain noah flood could 

antipholu of syracus 
what name 

dromio of syracus 
nell sir name three quarter ell three
quart measur hip hip 

antipholu of syracus 
then bear breadth 

dromio of syracus 
no longer head foot hip hip she spheric 
like globe i could find countri 

antipholu of syracus 
in part bodi stand ireland 

dromio of syracus 
marri sir buttock i found bog 

antipholu of syracus 
where scotland 

dromio of syracus 
i found barren hard palm hand 

antipholu of syracus 
where franc 

dromio of syracus 
in forehead arm revert make war hair 

antipholu of syracus 
where england 

dromio of syracus 
i look chalki cliff i could find white 
but i guess stood chin salt rheum ran between
fr 

antipholu of syracus 
where spain 

dromio of syracus 
faith i saw i felt hot breath 

antipholu of syracus 
where america indi 

dromio of syracus 
o sir upon nose er embellish rubi carbuncl 
sapphir declin rich aspect hot breath spain who
sent whole armado carrack ballast nose 

antipholu of syracus 
where stood belgia netherland 

dromio of syracus 
o sir i look low to conclud drudg divin laid
claim call dromio swore i assur told what
privi mark i mark shoulder mole my
neck great wart left arm i amaz ran a
witch and i think breast made faith my
heart steel transform curtal dog made me
turn wheel 

antipholu of syracus 
go hie thee present post road 
and wind blow way shore 
i harbour town tonight 
if bark put forth come mart 
where i walk till thou return 
if everyon know us know none 
 ti time i think trudg pack gone 

dromio of syracus 
a bear man would run life 
so fli i would wife 

 _exit _ 

antipholu of syracus 
there none witch inhabit 
and therefor ti high time i henc 
she doth call husband even soul
doth wife abhor but fair sister 
possess gentl sovereign grace 
of enchant presenc discours 
hath almost made traitor 
but lest guilti self wrong 
i stop mine ear mermaid song 

 enter angelo chain 

angelo 
master antipholu 

antipholu of syracus 
ay name 

angelo 
i know well sir lo chain 
i thought ta en porpentin 
the chain unfinish made stay thu long 

antipholu of syracus 
what i shall 

angelo 
what pleas sir i made 

antipholu of syracus 
made sir i bespok 

angelo 
not twice twenti time 
go home pleas wife withal 
and soon supper time i visit 
and receiv money chain 

antipholu of syracus 
i pray sir receiv money 
for fear ne er see chain money 

angelo 
you merri man sir fare well 

 _exit _ 

antipholu of syracus 
what i think i can not tell 
but i think man vain
that would refus fair offer chain 
i see man need live shift 
when street meet golden gift 
i mart dromio stay 
if ship put straight away 

 _exit _ 



act iv

scen i the 

 enter merchant angelo offic 

merchant 
you know sinc pentecost sum due 
and sinc i much importun 
nor i i bound
to persia want guilder voyag 
therefor make present satisfact 
or i attach offic 

angelo 
even sum i owe you
i grow antipholu 
and instant i met you
h chain five clock
i shall receiv money 
pleaseth walk hous 
i discharg bond thank 

 enter antipholu ephesu dromio ephesu the
 courtesan 

offic 
that labour may save see come 

antipholu of ephesu 
while i go goldsmith hous go thou
and buy rope end i bestow
among wife confederates
for lock door day 
but soft i see goldsmith get thee gone 
buy thou rope bring home 

dromio of ephesu 
i buy thousand pound year i buy rope 

 _exit dromio _ 

antipholu of ephesu 
a man well holp trust 
i promis presenc chain 
but neither chain goldsmith came 
belik thought love would last long
if chain togeth therefor came 

angelo 
save merri humour note
how much chain weigh utmost carat 
the fine gold charg fashion 
which doth amount three odd ducat more
than i stand debt gentleman 
i pray see present discharg 
for bound sea stay 

antipholu of ephesu 
i furnish present money 
besid i busi town 
good signior take stranger hous 
and take chain bid wife
disburs sum receipt thereof 
perchanc i soon 

angelo 
then bring chain 

antipholu of ephesu 
no bear lest i come time enough 

angelo 
well sir i have chain 

antipholu of ephesu 
and i sir i hope 
or els may return without money 

angelo 
nay come i pray sir give chain 
both wind tide stay gentleman 
and i blame held long 

antipholu of ephesu 
good lord use dallianc excuse
your breach promis porpentin 
i chid bring 
but like shrew first begin brawl 

merchant 
the hour steal i pray sir dispatch 

angelo 
you hear importun the chain 

antipholu of ephesu 
whi give wife fetch money 

angelo 
come come know i gave even 
either send chain send token 

antipholu of ephesu 
fie run humour breath 
come chain i pray let see 

merchant 
mi busi can not brook dallianc 
good sir say whe er answer 
if i leav offic 

antipholu of ephesu 
i answer what i answer 

angelo 
the money owe chain 

antipholu of ephesu 
i owe none till i receiv chain 

angelo 
you know i gave half hour sinc 

antipholu of ephesu 
you gave none you wrong much say 

angelo 
you wrong sir deni 
consid stand upon credit 

merchant 
well offic arrest suit 

offic 
i charg duke name obey 

angelo 
thi touch reput 
either consent pay sum 
or i attach offic 

antipholu of ephesu 
consent pay thee i never 
arrest foolish fellow thou dar st 

angelo 
here thi fee arrest offic 
i would spare brother case
if scorn appar 

offic 
i arrest sir you hear suit 

antipholu of ephesu 
i obey thee till i give thee bail 
but sirrah shall buy sport dear
a metal shop answer 

angelo 
sir sir i shall law ephesu 
to notori shame i doubt 

 enter dromio syracus bay 

dromio of syracus 
master bark epidamnum
that stay till owner come aboard 
and sir bear away our fraughtag sir 
i convey aboard i bought
th oil balsamum aqua vita 
the ship trim merri wind
blow fair land stay nought all
but owner master 

antipholu of ephesu 
how madman whi thou peevish sheep 
what ship epidamnum stay 

dromio of syracus 
a ship sent hire waftag 

antipholu of ephesu 
thou drunken slave i sent thee rope 
and told thee purpos end 

dromio of syracus 
you sent rope end soon 
you sent bay sir bark 

antipholu of ephesu 
i debat matter leisur 
and teach ear list heed 
to adriana villain hie thee straight 
give key tell desk
that cover er turkish tapestry
ther purs ducat let send 
tell i arrest street 
and shall bail hie thee slave gone 
on offic prison till come 

 _exeunt merchant angelo offic antipholu ephesu _ 

dromio of syracus 
to adriana din 
where dowsabel claim husband 
she big i hope compass 
thither i must although 
for servant must master mind fulfil 

 _exit _ 

scene ii the 

 enter adriana luciana 

adriana 
ah luciana tempt thee 
might st thou perceiv auster eye
that plead earnest yea 
look red pale sad merrili 
what observ mad st thou case
of heart meteor tilt face 

luciana 
first deni right 

adriana 
he meant none spite 

luciana 
then swore stranger 

adriana 
and true swore though yet forsworn 

luciana 
then plead i 

adriana 
and said 

luciana 
that love i begg begg 

adriana 
with persuas tempt thi love 

luciana 
with word honest suit might move 
first prais beauti speech 

adriana 
did st speak fair 

luciana 
have patienc i beseech 

adriana 
i can not i hold still 
mi tongu though heart shall 
he deform crook old sere 
ill fac wors bodi shapeless everywher 
viciou ungentl foolish blunt unkind 
stigmat make wors mind 

luciana 
who would jealou one 
no evil lost wail gone 

adriana 
ah i think better i say 
and yet would herein other eye wors 
far nest lapw cri away 
mi heart pray though tongu curs 

 enter dromio syracus 

dromio of syracus 
here go desk purs sweet make hast 

luciana 
how hast thou lost thi breath 

dromio of syracus 
bi run fast 

adriana 
where thi master dromio well 

dromio of syracus 
no tartar limbo wors hell 
a devil everlast garment hath 
one whose hard heart button steel 
a fiend fairi pitiless rough 
a wolf nay wors fellow buff 
a back friend shoulder clapper one countermands
th passag alley creek narrow land 
a hound run counter yet draw dryfoot well 
one judgment carri poor soul hell 

adriana 
whi man matter 

dromio of syracus 
i know matter he rest case 

adriana 
what arrest tell whose suit 

dromio of syracus 
i know whose suit arrest well 
but suit buff rest i tell 
will send mistress redempt money desk 

adriana 
go fetch sister thi i wonder 

 _exit luciana _ 

thu unknown debt 
tell arrest band 

dromio of syracus 
not band stronger thing 
a chain chain do hear ring 

adriana 
what chain 

dromio of syracus 
no bell ti time i gone 
it two ere i left clock strike one 

adriana 
the hour come back that i never hear 

dromio of syracus 
o ye hour meet sergeant turn back fear 

adriana 
a time debt how fondli dost thou reason 

dromio of syracus 
time bankrupt owe worth season 
nay thief have heard men say
that time come steal night day 
if debt theft sergeant way 
hath reason turn back hour day 

 enter luciana 

adriana 
go dromio money bear straight 
and bring thi master home immedi 
come sister i press conceit 
conceit comfort injuri 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iii the 

 enter antipholu syracus 

antipholu of syracus 
there man i meet doth salut me
a i well acquaint friend 
and everyon doth call name 
some tender money invit 
some give thank kind 
some offer commod buy 
even tailor call shop 
and show silk bought 
and therewith took measur bodi 
sure imaginari wile 
and lapland sorcer inhabit 

 enter dromio syracus 

dromio of syracus 
master gold sent 
what got pictur old adam new apparel 

antipholu of syracus 
what gold what adam dost thou mean 

dromio of syracus 
not adam kept paradis adam keep the
prison goe calf skin kill the
prodig came behind sir like evil angel bid you
forsak liberti 

antipholu of syracus 
i understand thee 

dromio of syracus 
no whi ti plain case went like bass viol case of
leath man sir gentlemen tire give a
sob rest sir take piti decay men gives
them suit duranc set rest exploits
with mace morri pike 

antipholu of syracus 
what thou mean st offic 

dromio of syracus 
ay sir sergeant band bring man answer it
that break band one think man alway go bed and
say god give good rest 

antipholu of syracus 
well sir rest fooleri is ship put forth
tonight may gone 

dromio of syracus 
whi sir i brought word hour sinc bark _expedition_
put forth tonight hinder sergeant tarry
for hoy _delay_ here angel sent deliver
y 

antipholu of syracus 
the fellow distract i 
and wander illus 
some bless power deliv us henc 

 enter courtesan 

courtesan 
well met well met master antipholu 
i see sir found goldsmith 
i chain promi today 

antipholu of syracus 
satan avoid i charg thee tempt 

dromio of syracus 
master mistress satan

written appear men like angel light light effect of
fir fire burn ergo light wench burn come near
her

 _exeunt antipholu syracus dromio syracus _ 

courtesan 
now doubt antipholu mad 
els would never demean 
a ring hath mine worth forti ducat 
and promi chain 
both one deni 
the reason i gather mad 
besid present instanc rage 
i mad tale told today dinner
of door shut entranc 
belik wife acquaint fit 
on purpos shut door way 
mi way hie home hous 
and tell wife lunat 
he rush hous took perforce
mi ring away thi cours i fittest choos 
for forti ducat much lose 

 _exit _ 

scene iv the 

 enter antipholu ephesu offic 

antipholu of ephesu 
fear man i break away 
i give thee ere i leav thee much money 
to warrant thee i rest 
mi wife wayward mood today 
and lightli trust messenger
that i attach ephesu 
i tell twill sound harshli ear 

 enter dromio ephesu rope end

how sir i sent

whi sir i gave money rope

from hour nativ instant noth his
hand servic blow when i cold heat with
beat i warm cool beat i wake it
when i sleep rais i sit driven door it
when i go home welcom home i return nay i bear
it shoulder beggar wont brat i think hath
lam i shall beg door door

act v

scene i the 

 enter merchant angelo 

angelo 
i sorri sir i hinder 
but i protest chain 
though dishonestli doth deni 

merchant 
how man esteem citi 

angelo 
of reverend reput sir 
of credit infinit highli belov 
second none live citi 
hi word might bear wealth time 

merchant 
speak softli yonder i think walk 

 enter antipholu syracus dromio syracus 

angelo 
 ti self chain neck
which forswor monstrous 
good sir draw near i speak 
signior antipholu i wonder much
that would put shame troubl 
and without scandal 
with circumst oath deny
thi chain wear openli 
besid charg shame imprison 
you done wrong honest friend 
who stay controversi 
had hoist sail put sea today 
thi chain deni 

antipholu of syracus 
i think i i never deni 

merchant 
ye sir forswor 

antipholu of syracus 
who heard deni forswear 

merchant 
these ear mine thou know st hear thee 
fie thee wretch ti piti thou liv st
to walk honest men resort 

antipholu of syracus 
thou art villain impeach thu 
i prove mine honour mine honesty
against thee present thou dar st stand 

merchant 
i dare defi thee villain 

 _they draw _ 

 enter adriana luciana courtesan other 

adriana

some get within take sword away

thi priori spoil 

 _exeunt antipholu syracus dromio syracus the
 priori _ 

 enter ladi abbess 

abbess 
be quiet peopl wherefor throng hither 

adriana 
to fetch poor distract husband henc 
let us come may bind fast
and bear home recoveri 

angelo 
i knew perfect wit 

merchant 
i sorri i draw 

abbess 
how long hath possess held man 

adriana 
thi week hath heavi sour sad 
and much differ man 
but till afternoon passion
n er brake extrem rage 

abbess 
hath lost much wealth wreck sea 
buri dear friend hath els eye
stray affect unlaw love 
a sin prevail much youth men
who give eye liberti gaze 
which sorrow subject 

adriana 
to none except last 
name love drew oft home 

abbess 
you reprehend 

adriana 
whi i 

abbess 
ay rough enough 

adriana 
a roughli modesti would let 

abbess 
hapli privat 

adriana 
and assembl 

abbess 
ay enough 

adriana 
it copi confer 
in bed slept urg 
at board fed urg 
alon subject theme 
in compani i often glanc 
still i tell vile bad 

abbess 
and thereof came man mad 
the venom clamour jealou woman
poison deadli mad dog tooth 
it seem sleep hinder thi rail 
and thereof come head light 
thou say st meat sauc thi upbraid 
unquiet meal make ill digest 
thereof rage fire fever bred 
and fever fit mad 
thou say st sport hinder thi brawl 
sweet recreat barr doth ensue
but moodi dull melancholi 
kinsman grim comfortless despair 
and heel huge infecti troop
of pale distemperatur foe life 
in food sport life preserv rest
to disturb would mad man beast 
the consequ thi jealou fits
hath scar thi husband use wit 

luciana 
she never reprehend mildli 
when demean rough rude wildli 
whi bear rebuk answer 

adriana 
she betray reproof 
good peopl enter lay hold 

abbess 
no creatur enter hous 

adriana 
then let servant bring husband forth 

abbess 
neither he took place sanctuari 
and shall privileg hands
til i brought wit 
or lose labour assay 

adriana 
i attend husband nurs 
diet sick offic 
and attorney 
and therefor let home 

abbess 
be patient i let stir
til i use approv mean i 
with wholesom syrup drug holi prayer 
to make formal man 
it branch parcel mine oath 
a charit duti order 
therefor depart leav 

adriana 
i henc leav husband 
and ill doth beseem holiness
to separ husband wife 

abbess 
be quiet depart thou shalt 

 _exit abbess _ 

luciana 
complain unto duke indign 

adriana 
come go i fall prostrat feet 
and never rise tear prayers
hav grace come person hither
and take perforc husband abbess 

merchant 
bi i think dial point five 
anon i sure duke person
com way melancholi vale 
the place death sorri execution
behind ditch abbey 

angelo 
upon caus 

merchant 
to see reverend syracusian merchant 
who put unluckili bay
against law statut town 
behead publicli offenc 

angelo 
see come we behold death 

luciana 
kneel duke pass abbey 

 enter duke attend egeon barehead headsman and
 offic 

duke 
yet proclaim publicli 
if friend pay sum 
he shall die much tender 

adriana 
justic sacr duke abbess 

duke 
she virtuou reverend ladi 
it can not hath done thee wrong 

adriana 
may pleas grace antipholu husband 
who i made lord i had
at import letter ill day
a outrag fit mad took 
that desp rate hurri street 
with bondman mad 
do displeasur citizens
bi rush hous bear thence
r jewel anyth rage like 
onc i get bound sent home 
whilst take order wrong i went 
that furi commit 
anon i wot strong escap 
he broke guard 
and mad attend 
each one ire passion drawn sword 
met us madli bent us 
chase us away till rais aid 
we came bind then fled
into abbey whither pursu 
and abbess shut gate us 
and suffer us fetch 
nor send forth may bear henc 
therefor graciou duke thi command
let brought forth born henc help 

duke 
long sinc thi husband serv war 
and i thee engag princ word 
when thou didst make master thi bed 
to grace good i could 
go knock abbey gate 
and bid ladi abbess come 
i determin i stir 

 enter messeng 

messeng 
o mistress mistress shift save 
mi master man broke loos 
beaten maid row bound doctor 
whose beard sing brand fire 
and ever blaze threw him
great pail puddl mire quench hair 
mi master preach patienc while
hi man scissor nick like fool 
and sure unless send present help 
between kill conjur 

adriana 
peac fool thi master man 
and fals thou dost report us 

messeng 
mistress upon life i tell true 
i breath almost sinc i see 
he cri vow take 
to scorch face disfigur 

 _cri within _ 

hark hark i hear mistress fli gone 

duke 
come stand fear noth guard halberd 

adriana 
ay husband wit you
that born invis 
even hou abbey 
and past thought human reason 

 enter antipholu dromio ephesu 

antipholu of ephesu 
justic graciou duke o grant justic 
even servic long sinc i thee
when i bestrid thee war took
deep scar save thi life even blood
that i lost thee grant justic 

egeon 
unless fear death doth make dote 
i see son antipholu dromio 

antipholu of ephesu 
justic sweet princ woman 
she thou gav st wife 
that hath abus dishonour me
even strength height injuri 
beyond imagin wrong
that day hath shameless thrown 

duke 
discov thou shalt find 

antipholu of ephesu 
thi day great duke shut door upon me
whil harlot feast hous 

duke 
a grievou fault say woman didst thou 

adriana 
no good lord myself sister
today dine togeth so befal soul
a fals burden withal 

luciana 
ne er may i look day sleep night
but tell high simpl truth 

angelo 
o perjur woman they forsworn 
in madman justli chargeth 

antipholu of ephesu 
mi lieg i advis i say 
neither disturb effect wine 
nor headi rash provok rage ire 
albeit wrong might make one wiser mad 
thi woman lock day dinner 
that goldsmith pack 
could wit 
who part go fetch chain 
promis bring porpentin 
where balthasar i dine togeth 
our dinner done come thither 
i went seek in street i met 
and compani gentleman 
there perjur goldsmith swear down
that i day receiv chain 
which god know i saw for which
h arrest offic 
i obey sent peasant home
for certain ducat he none return 
then fairli i bespok officer
to go person hous 
bi th way met
mi wife sister rabbl more
of vile confeder along them
they brought one pinch hungri lean face villain 
a mere anatomi mountebank 
a threadbar juggler fortun teller 
a needi hollow ey sharp look wretch 
a live dead man thi pernici slave 
forsooth took conjur 
and gaze mine eye feel puls 
and face twere outfac 
cri i possess then altogether
they fell upon bound bore thenc 
and dark dankish vault home
ther left man bound togeth 
till gnaw teeth bond sunder 
i gain freedom immediately
ran hither grace i beseech
to give ampl satisfaction
for deep shame great indign 

angelo 
mi lord truth thu far i wit 
that din home lock 

duke 
but chain thee 

angelo 
he lord ran here
thes peopl saw chain neck 

merchant 
besid i sworn ear mine
heard confess chain 
after first forswor mart 
and thereupon i drew sword 
and fled abbey 
from whenc i think come miracl 

antipholu of ephesu 
i never came within abbey wall 
nor ever didst thou draw thi sword 
i never saw chain help heaven 
and fals burden withal 

duke 
whi intric impeach 
i think drunk circ cup 
if hou would 
if mad would plead coldli 
you say din home goldsmith here
deni say sirrah say 

dromio of ephesu 
sir dine porpentin 

courtesan 
he finger snatch ring 

antipholu of ephesu 
 ti true lieg ring i 

duke 
saw st thou enter abbey 

courtesan 
a sure lieg i see grace 

duke 
whi strang go call abbess hither 
i think mate stark mad 

 _exit one abbess _ 

egeon 
most mighti duke vouchsaf speak word 
hapli i see friend save life
and pay sum may deliv 

duke 
speak freeli syracusian thou wilt 

egeon 
i name sir call antipholu 
and bondman dromio 

dromio of ephesu 
within hour i bondman sir 
but i thank gnaw two cord 
now i dromio man unbound 

egeon 
i sure rememb 

dromio of ephesu 
ourselv rememb sir 
for late bound 
you pinch patient sir 

egeon 
whi look strang know well 

antipholu of ephesu 
i never saw life till 

egeon 
o grief hath chang sinc saw last 
and care hour time deform hand 
have written strang defeatur face 
but tell yet dost thou know voic 

antipholu of ephesu 
neither 

egeon 
dromio thou 

dromio of ephesu 
no trust sir i 

egeon 
i sure thou dost 

dromio of ephesu 
ay sir i sure i whatsoev man deni are
now bound believ 

egeon 
not know voic o time extrem 
hast thou crack split poor tongue
in seven short year son
know feebl key untun care 
though grain face mine hid
in sap consum winter drizzl snow 
and conduit blood froze 
yet hath night life memori 
mi wast lamp fade glimmer left 
mi dull deaf ear littl use hear 
all old wit i can not err 
tell thou art son antipholu 

antipholu of ephesu 
i never saw father life 

egeon 
but seven year sinc syracusa boy 
thou know st part perhap son 
thou sham st acknowledg miseri 

antipholu of ephesu 
the duke know citi 
can wit 
i ne er saw syracusa life 

duke 
i tell thee syracusian twenti years
hav i patron antipholu 
dure time ne er saw syracusa 
i see thi age danger make thee dote 

 enter abbess antipholu syracus dromio syracus 

abbess 
most mighti duke behold man much wrong 

 _all gather see _ 

adriana 
i see two husband mine eye deceiv 

duke 
one men _genius_ 
and natur man 
and spirit who deciph 

dromio of syracus 
i sir dromio command away 

dromio of ephesu 
i sir dromio pray let stay 

antipholu of syracus 
egeon art thou els ghost 

dromio of syracus 
o old master hath bound 

abbess 
whoever bound i loos bond 
and gain husband liberti 
speak old egeon thou st man
that hadst wife call emilia 
that bore thee burden two fair son 
o thou st egeon speak 
and speak unto emilia 

duke 
whi begin morn stori right 
these two antipholu two like 
and two dromio one semblanc 
besid urg wreck sea 
these parent children 
which accident met togeth 

egeon 
if i dream thou art emilia 
if thou art tell son
that float thee fatal raft 

abbess 
bi men epidamnum i
and twin dromio taken 
but rude fishermen corinth
bi forc took dromio son 
and left epidamnum 
what becam i can not tell 
i fortun see 

duke 
antipholu thou cam st corinth first 

antipholu of syracus 
no sir i i came syracus 

duke 
stay stand apart i know 

antipholu of ephesu 
i came corinth graciou lord 

dromio of ephesu 
and i 

antipholu of ephesu 
brought town famou warrior 
duke menaphon renown uncl 

adriana 
which two dine today 

antipholu of syracus 
i gentl mistress 

adriana 
and husband 

antipholu of ephesu 
no i say nay 

antipholu of syracus 
and i yet call 
and fair gentlewoman sister 
did call brother what i told 
i hope i shall leisur make good 
if dream i see hear 

angelo 
that chain sir 

antipholu of syracus 
i think sir i deni 

antipholu of ephesu

angelo 
i think i sir i deni 

adriana

bi dromio i think brought 

dromio of ephesu 
no none 

antipholu of syracus 
thi purs ducat i receiv 
and dromio man bring 
i see still meet man 
and i ta en 
and thereupon error aros 

antipholu of ephesu 
these ducat pawn i father 

duke 
it shall need thi father hath life 

courtesan 
sir i must diamond 

antipholu of ephesu 
there take much thank good cheer 

abbess 
renown duke vouchsaf take pains
to go us abbey 
and hear larg discours fortun 
and assembl place 
that sympathis one day error
hav suffer wrong go keep us compani 
and shall make full satisfact 
thirti three year i gone travail
of son till present hour
mi heavi burden ne er deliv 
the duke husband children 
and calendar nativ 
go gossip feast go 
after long grief nativ 

duke 
with heart i gossip feast 

 _exeunt except two dromio two brother _ 

dromio of syracus

antipholu of ephesu

dromio of syracus 
your good lay host sir centaur 

antipholu of syracus 
he speak i master dromio 
come go us we look anon 
embrac thi brother rejoic 

 _exeunt antipholu syracus antipholu ephesu _ 

dromio of syracus 
there fat friend master hous 
that kitchen today dinner 
she shall sister wife 

dromio of ephesu 
methink glass brother 
i see i sweet face youth 
will walk see gossip 

dromio of syracus 
not i sir elder 

dromio of ephesu 
that question shall tri 

dromio of syracus 
we draw cut senior till lead thou first 

dromio of ephesu 
nay thu 
we came world like brother brother 
and let go hand hand one anoth 

 _exeunt _ 




the tragedi of coriolanus

dramati personae

 caiu marciu afterward caiu marciu coriolanus

 cominius

 meneniu agrippa friend coriolanus

 tribun people

 juniu brutus

 a roman herald
 nicanor roman
 tullu aufidiu gener volscians
 lieuten aufidius
 conspir with aufidius
 adrian volscian
 a citizen antium
 two volscian guards

 volumnia mother coriolanus
 virgilia wife coriolanus
 valeria friend virgilia
 gentlewoman attend virgilia

 roman volscian senat patrician aedil lictor 
 soldier citizen messeng servant aufidiu other
 attendants

scen rome neighbourhood corioli neighbourhood 
antium

act i scene i rome a street

ent compani mutin citizen stave club other
weapons

 first citizen befor proceed hear speak 
 all speak speak 
 first citizen you resolv rather die famish 
 all resolv resolv 
 first citizen first know caiu marciu chief enemi the
 peopl 
 all we know know 
 first citizen let us kill corn own
 price is verdict 
 all no talk let done away away 
 second citizen one word good citizen 
 first citizen we account poor citizen patrician good 
 what author surfeit would reliev us would yield

 reliev us human think dear the
 lean afflict us object miseri an
 inventori particular abund suffer a
 gain let us reveng pike ere become
 rake god know i speak hunger bread in
 thirst reveng

 commonalti

 countri 
 first citizen veri well could content give good
 report pay proud 
 second citizen nay speak malici 
 first citizen i say unto hath done famous it
 end though soft conscienc men content say it
 countri pleas mother be
 partli proud even altitud virtu 
 second citizen what can not help natur account a
 vice you must way say covet

 enter meneniu agrippa

 second citizen worthi meneniu agrippa one hath alway lov d
 peopl 
 first citizen he one honest enough would rest 
 meneniu what work countrymen hand where go you
 with bat club the matter speak i pray 
 first citizen our busi unknown th senat have
 inkl fortnight intend ll
 show em deed they say poor suitor strong breath 
 shall know strong arm 
 meneniu whi master good friend mine honest neighbour 
 will undo 
 first citizen we can not sir undon alreadi 
 meneniu i tell friend charit care
 have patrician for want 
 your suffer dearth may well
 strike heaven stave lift them
 against roman state whose cours on
 the way take crack ten thousand curbs
 of strong link asund ever
 appear impedi for dearth 
 the god patrician make and
 your knee arm must help alack 
 you transport calamity
 thither attend slander
 the helm th state care like father 
 when curs enemi 
 first citizen care us true inde they ne er car us
 yet suffer us famish storehous cramm with
 grain make edict usuri support usur repeal daily
 wholesom act establish rich provid more
 pierc statut daili chain restrain poor if the
 war eat us love bear
 us

 confess wondrou malici 
 or accu folli i shall tell you
 a pretti tale it may heard 
 but sinc serv purpos i venture
 to stale littl 
 first citizen well i hear sir yet must think to
 fob disgrac tale but pleas deliv

 rebel belli thu accu 
 that like gulf remain

 still cupboard viand never bearing
 like labour rest th instruments

 unto appetit affect common
 of whole bodi the belli answer

 to th discont member mutin parts

 first citizen y long

 your grave belli deliber 
 not rash like accus thu answer 
 true incorpor friend quoth he

 which live upon fit

 enter caiu marcius

 hail nobl marciu 
 marciu thank what matter dissenti rogues
 that rub poor itch opinion 
 make scab 
 first citizen we ever good word 
 marciu he give good word thee flatter
 beneath abhor what would cur 
 that like peac war the one affright 
 the make proud he trust 
 where find lion find hare 
 where fox gees surer 
 than coal fire upon ice
 or hailston sun your virtu is
 to make worthi whose offenc subdu 
 and curs justic who deserv greatness
 deserv hate affect are
 a sick man appetit desir that
 which would increas evil he depends
 upon favour swim fin lead 
 and hew oak rush hang ye trust ye 
 with everi minut chang mind
 and call nobl hate 
 him vile garland what matter
 that sever place city
 you cri nobl senat 
 under god keep awe else
 would feed one anoth what seek 
 meneniu for corn rate whereof say
 the citi well stor 
 marciu hang em they say 
 they sit th fire presum know
 what done th capitol like rise 
 who thrive declin side faction give out
 conjectur marriag make parti strong 
 and feebl stand liking
 below cobbl shoe they say grain enough 
 would nobil lay asid ruth
 and let use sword i make quarry
 with thousand quarter slave high
 as i could pick lanc 
 meneniu nay almost thoroughli persuad 
 for though abundantli lack discret 
 yet pass cowardli but i beseech 
 what say troop 
 marciu they dissolv hang em 
 they said hungri sigh forth proverb 
 that hunger broke stone wall dog must eat 
 that meat made mouth god sent not
 corn rich men with shreds
 they vent complain answer 
 and petit grant strang one 
 to break heart generosity
 and make bold power look pale threw caps
 as would hang horn th moon 
 shout emul 
 meneniu what grant 
 marciu five tribun defend vulgar wisdom 
 of choic one juniu brutu 
 siciniu velutu i know sdeath 
 the rabbl first unroof city
 ere prevail time
 win upon power throw forth greater themes
 for insurrect argu 
 meneniu thi strang 
 marciu go get home fragment 

 enter messeng hastily

 messeng where caiu marciu 
 marciu here what matter 
 messeng the news sir volsc arm

 our musti superflu see best elder

 juniu brutu siciniu velutus

 first senat marciu ti true late told us 
 the volsc arm 
 marciu they leader

 and i anyth i 
 i would wish 
 cominiu you fought togeth

 upon parti i revolt make
 onli war he lion
 that i proud hunt 
 first senat then worthi marciu 
 attend upon cominiu war 
 cominiu it former promis 
 marciu sir 
 and i constant titu lartiu thou
 shalt see strike tullu face 
 what art thou stiff stand st 
 lartiu no caiu marciu 
 i lean upon one crutch fight other
 ere stay behind busi 
 meneniu o true bred 
 first senat your compani th capitol i know 
 our greatest friend attend us 
 lartiu to cominiu lead 
 to marciu follow cominiu must follow 
 right worthi prioriti 
 cominiu nobl marciu 
 first senat to citizen henc home gone 
 marciu nay let follow 
 the volsc much corn take rat thither
 to gnaw garner worship mutin 
 your valour put well forth pray follow 
 ciitzen steal away exeunt siciniu brutus
 siciniu wa ever man proud marciu 
 brutu he equal 
 siciniu when chosen tribun peopl 
 brutu mark lip eye 
 siciniu nay taunt 
 brutu be mov spare gird god 
 siciniu bemock modest moon 
 brutu the present war devour he grown
 too proud valiant 
 siciniu such natur 
 tickl good success disdain shadow
 which tread noon but i wonder
 hi insol brook commanded
 under cominiu

 in alreadi well grac cannot
 better held attain by

 shall gener fault though perform
 to th utmost man giddi censure
 will cri marciu o he
 had born busi

 of demerit rob cominiu
