scen ii corioli the senat hous 

enter tullu aufidiu senat corioli

 first senat so opinion aufidiu 
 that rome ent red counsels
 and know proceed 
 aufidiu is 
 what ever thought state
 that could brought bodili act ere rome
 had circumvent ti four day gone
 sinc i heard thenc word i think
 i letter ye 
 read they press power known
 whether east west the dearth great 
 the peopl mutin rumour 
 cominiu marciu old enemi 
 who rome wors hate 
 and titu lartiu valiant roman 
 these three lead preparation
 whither ti bent most like ti 
 consid 
 first senat our armi field 
 we never yet made doubt rome ready
 to answer us 
 aufidiu nor think folly
 to keep great pretenc veil till when
 they need must show hatch 
 it seem appear rome by discovery
 we shall short ned aim was
 to take mani town ere almost rome
 should know afoot 
 second senat nobl aufidiu 
 take commiss hie band 
 let us alon guard corioli 
 if set remove
 bring armi i think find
 th prepar us 
 aufidiu o doubt 
 i speak certainti nay 
 some parcel power forth alreadi 
 and hitherward i leav honour 
 if caiu marciu chanc meet 
 ti sworn us shall ever strike
 till one 
 all the god assist 
 aufidiu and keep honour safe 
 first senat farewel 
 second senat farewel 
 all farewel exeunt

scen iii rome marciu house

ent volumnia virgilia mother wife marciu set them
down two low stool sew

 volumnia i pray daughter sing express more
 comfort sort if son husband i freelier
 rejoic absenc wherein honour the
 embrac bed would show love when yet
 tender bodi son womb youth
 comeli pluck gaze way day of
 king entreati mother sell hour her
 behold i consid honour would becom person 
 better pictur like hang th wall if
 renown made stir plea let seek danger where
 find fame to cruel war i sent whenc he
 return brow bound oak i tell thee daughter i
 sprang joy first hear man child than
 first see prove man 
 virgilia but die busi madam 
 volumnia then good report son i therein
 would found issu hear profess sincer i dozen
 son love alik none less dear thine my
 good marciu i rather eleven die nobli country
 one voluptu surfeit action 

 enter gentlewoman

 gentlewoman madam ladi valeria come visit 
 virgilia beseech give leav retir 
 volumnia inde shall 
 methink i hear hither husband drum 
 see pluck aufidiu th hair 
 as children bear volsc shun 
 methink i see stamp thu call thu 
 come coward you got fear 
 though born rome hi bloodi brow
 with mail hand wipe forth goe 
 like harvest man task mow
 or lose hire 
 virgilia hi bloodi brow o jupit blood 
 volumnia away fool it becom man
 than gilt trophi the breast hecuba 
 when suckl hector look lovelier
 than hector forehead spit forth blood
 at grecian sword contemn tell valeria
 we fit bid welcom exit gentlewoman
 virgilia heaven bless lord fell aufidiu 
 volumnia he beat aufidiu head knee
 and tread upon neck 

 re enter gentlewoman with valeria usher

 valeria my ladi good day 
 volumnia sweet madam 
 virgilia i glad see ladyship 
 valeria how you manifest housekeep what are
 sew a fine spot good faith how little
 son 
 virgilia i thank ladyship well good madam 
 volumnia he rather see sword hear drum look
 upon schoolmast 
 valeria o word father son i swear ti very
 pretti boy o troth i look upon wednesday half an
 hour togeth confirm counten i saw run
 gild butterfli caught let go
 come up
 catch whether fall enrag how
 twa set teeth tear o i warrant he
 mammock 
 volumnia one father mood 
 valeria inde la ti nobl child 
 virgilia a crack madam 
 valeria come lay asid stitcheri i must play the
 idl huswif afternoon 
 virgilia no good madam i door 
 valeria not door 
 volumnia she shall shall 
 virgilia inde patienc i threshold
 till lord return war 
 valeria fie confin unreason come you
 must go visit good ladi lie 
 virgilia i wish speedi strength visit my
 prayer i can not go thither 
 volumnia whi i pray 
 virgilia ti save labour i want love 
 valeria you would anoth penelop yet say yarn
 spun ulyss absenc fill ithaca full moth 
 come i would cambric sensibl finger you
 might leav prick piti come shall go us 
 virgilia no good madam pardon inde i forth 
 valeria in truth la go i tell excel news
 husband 
 virgilia o good madam none yet 
 valeria verili i jest came news him
 last night 
 virgilia inde madam 
 valeria in earnest true i heard senat speak thu it
 volsc armi forth cominiu the
 gener gone one part roman power your lord and
 titu lartiu set citi corioli they
 noth doubt prevail make brief war thi true 
 mine honour i pray go us 
 virgilia give excus good madam i obey everything
 hereaft 
 volumnia let alon ladi disease
 better mirth 
 valeria in troth i think would fare well come 
 good sweet ladi prithe virgilia turn thi solem 
 door go along us 
 virgilia no word madam inde i must i wish much
 mirth 
 valeria well farewel exeunt

scen iv befor corioli

ent marciu titu lartiu drum colour captain and
soldi to messenger

 marciu yonder come news wager met 
 lartiu my hors 
 marciu ti done 
 lartiu agre 
 marciu say gener met enemi 
 messeng they lie view spoke yet 
 lartiu so good hors mine 
 marciu i buy 
 lartiu no i sell give lend i will
 for half hundr year summon town 
 marciu how far lie armi 
 messeng within mile half 
 marciu then shall hear larum 
 now mar i prithe make us quick work 
 that smoke sword may march hence
 to help field friend come blow thi blast 

 they sound parley enter two senat other 
 wall corioli

 tullu aufidiu within wall 
 first senat no man fear less 
 that lesser littl drum afar hark drums
 are bring forth youth we break walls
 rather shall pound us gate 
 which yet seem shut pinn rush 
 they open alarum far hark far 
 there aufidiu list work makes
 amongst cloven armi 
 marciu o 
 lartiu their nois instruct ladder ho 

 enter armi volsces

 marciu they fear us issu forth citi 
 now put shield heart fight
 with heart proof shield advanc brave titu 
 they disdain us much beyond thought 
 which make sweat wrath come fellow 
 he retir i take volsc 
 and shall feel mine edg 

 alarum the roman beat back trench 
 re enter marciu cursing

 marciu all contagion south light 
 you shame rome herd boil plagues
 plaster er may abhorr d
 farther seen one infect another
 against wind mile you soul geese
 that bear shape men run
 from slave ape would beat pluto hell 
 all hurt behind back red face pale
 with flight agu fear mend charg home 
 or fire heaven i leav foe
 and make war look come 
 if stand fast beat wive 
 as us trench follow 

 anoth alarum the volsc fli marciu follows
 gates

 so gate ope prove good second 
 ti follow fortun widen 
 not flier mark like 

 marciu enter gate 

 first soldier fool hardi i 
 second soldier not i marciu shut 
 first soldier see shut 
 all to th pot i warrant alarum continu 

 re enter titu lartius

 lartiu what becom marciu 
 all slain sir doubtless 
 first soldier follow flier heel 
 with enter upon sudden 
 clapp gate he alon 
 to answer citi 
 lartiu o nobl fellow 
 who sensibl outdar senseless sword 
 and bow stand st thou art left marciu 
 a carbuncl entir big thou art 
 were rich jewel thou wast soldier
 even cato wish fierc terrible
 onli stroke thi grim look and
 the thunder like percuss thi sounds
 thou mad st thine enemi shake world
 were fever trembl 

 re enter marciu bleed assault enemy

 first soldier look sir 
 lartiu o ti marciu 
 let fetch make remain alik 
 they fight enter citi 

scene v within corioli a street

ent certain roman spoils

 first roman thi i carri rome 
 second roman and i 
 third roman a murrain i took silver 
 alarum continu still afar 

 enter marciu titu lartiu with trumpeter

 marciu see mover prize hours
 at crack drachma cushion leaden spoon 
 iron doit doublet hangmen would
 buri wore base slave 
 ere yet fight done pack down 
 exeunt pillagers
 and hark nois gener make to 
 there man soul hate aufidiu 
 pierc roman valiant titu take
 conveni number make good citi 
 whilst i spirit haste
 to help cominiu 
 lartiu worthi sir thou bleed st 
 thi exercis hath violent
 for second cours fight 
 marciu sir prais 
 my work hath yet warm fare well 
 the blood i drop rather physical
 than danger to aufidiu thus
 i appear fight 
 lartiu now fair goddess fortun 
 fall deep love thee great charms
 misguid thi oppos sword bold gentleman 
 prosper thi page 
 marciu thi friend less
 than placeth highest so farewel 
 lartiu thou worthiest marciu exit marcius
 go sound thi trumpet market place 
 call thither offic th town 
 where shall know mind away exeunt

scen vi near camp cominius

ent cominiu retir soldiers

 cominiu breath friend well fought come off
 like roman neither foolish stands
 nor cowardli retir believ sir 
 we shall charg while struck 
 by interim convey gust heard
 the charg friend the roman god 
 lead success wish 
 that power smile front encount ring 
 may give thank sacrific 

 enter a messenger

 thi news 
 messeng the citizen corioli issued
 and given lartiu marciu battl 
 i saw parti trench driven 
 and i came away 
 cominiu though thou speak st truth 
 methink thou speak st well how long sinc 
 messeng abov hour lord 
 cominiu ti mile briefli heard drum 
 how couldst thou mile confound hour 
 and bring thi news late 
 messeng spi volsces
 held chase i forc wheel
 three four mile els i sir 
 half hour sinc brought report 

 enter marcius

 cominiu who yonder
 that appear flay o god 
 he stamp marciu i have
 befor time seen thu 
 marciu come i late 
 cominiu the shepherd know thunder tabor
 more i know sound marciu tongue
 from everi meaner man 
 marciu come i late 
 cominiu ay come blood other 
 but mantl 
 marciu o let clip ye
 in arm sound i woo heart
 as merri nuptial day done 
 and taper burn bedward 
 cominiu flower warrior 
 how titu lartiu 
 marciu as man busi decre 
 condemn death exil 
 ransom piti threat ning th 
 hold corioli name rome
 even like fawn greyhound leash 
 to let slip 
 cominiu where slave
 which told beat trench 
 where call hither 
 marciu let alon 
 he inform truth but gentlemen 
 the common file plagu tribun 
 the mous ne er shunn cat budge
 from rascal wors 
 cominiu but prevail 
 marciu will time serv tell i think 
 where enemi are lord th field 
 if ceas till 
 cominiu marciu 
 we disadvantag fought did
 retir win purpos 
 marciu how lie battl know side
 they plac men trust 
 cominiu as i guess marciu 
 their band th vaward antiat 
 of best trust er aufidiu 
 their heart hope 
 marciu i beseech 
 by battl wherein fought 
 by th blood shed togeth th vows
 we made endur friend directly
 set aufidiu antiat 
 and delay present 
 fill air sword advanc dart 
 we prove hour 
 cominiu though i could wish
 you conduct gentl bath
 and balm appli yet dare i never
 deni ask take choic those
 that best aid action 
 marciu those they
 that will if 
 as sin doubt love painting
 wherein see smear fear
 lesser person ill report 
 if think brave death outweigh bad life
 and countri dearer 
 let alon mani mind 
 wave thu express disposit 
 and follow marciu they shout wave their
 sword take arm cast cap 
 o alon make sword 
 if show outward you
 but four volsc none is
 abl bear great aufidius
 a shield hard a certain number 
 though thank must i select rest
 shall bear busi fight 
 as caus obey pleas march 
 and four shall quickli draw command 
 which men best inclin 
 cominiu march fellow 
 make good ostent shall
 divid us exeunt

scen vii the gate corioli

titu lartiu set guard upon corioli go drum and
trumpet toward cominiu caiu marciu enter lieuten 
other soldier scout

 lartiu so let port guard keep duties
 as i set if i send dispatch
 those centuri aid rest serve
 for short hold if lose field
 we can not keep town 
 lieuten fear care sir 
 lartiu henc shut gate upon 
 our guider come th roman camp conduct us exeunt

scen viii a field battl roman volscian camps

alarum battl enter marciu aufidiu sever doors

 marciu i fight none thee i hate thee
 wors promis breaker 
 aufidiu we hate alik 
 not afric own serpent i abhor
 more thi fame envi fix thi foot 
 marciu let first budger die slave 
 and god doom 
 aufidiu if i fli marciu 
 halloa like hare 
 marciu within three hour tullu 
 alon i fought corioli wall 
 and made work i plea ti blood
 wherein thou seest mask for thi revenge
 wrench thi power th highest 
 aufidiu wert thou hector
 that whip bragg progeni 
 thou shouldst scape 

 here fight certain volsc come aid
 aufidiu marciu fight till driven in
 breathless

 offici valiant sham me
 in condemn second exeunt

scen ix the roman camp

flourish alarum a retreat sound enter one door 
cominiu roman anoth door marciu arm a
scarf

 cominiu if i tell thee er thi day work 
 thou believ thi deed i report it
 where senat shall mingl tear smile 
 where great patrician shall attend shrug 
 i th end admir ladi shall frighted
 and gladli quak hear dull tribun 
 that fusti plebeian hate thine honour 
 shall say heart we thank gods
 our rome hath soldier 
 yet cam st thou morsel feast 
 have fulli din 

 enter titu lartiu power pursuit

 lartiu o gener 
 here steed caparison 
 hadst thou beheld 
 marciu pray mother 
 who charter extol blood 
 when prais griev i done
 as done i induc d
 as countri 
 he effect good will
 hath overta en mine act 
 cominiu you shall be
 the grave deserv rome must know
 the valu twere concealment
 wors theft less traduc 
 to hide do silenc that
 which spire top prais vouch 
 would seem modest therefor i beseech 
 in sign reward
 what done armi hear 
 marciu i wound upon smart
 to hear rememb red 
 cominiu should 
 well might fester gainst ingratitude
 and tent death of hors 
 whereof ta en good good store all
 the treasur field achiev citi 
 we render tenth ta en forth
 befor common distribut at
 your choic 
 marciu i thank gener 
 but can not make heart consent take
 a bribe pay sword i refus 
 and stand upon common part those
 that beheld 

 a long flourish they cri marciu marciu 
 cast cap lanc cominiu lartiu stand bare

 may instrument profane
 never sound when drum trumpet shall
 i th field prove flatter let court citi be
 made fals fac sooth when steel grows
 soft parasit silk let made
 an overtur th war no i say 
 for i wash nose bled 
 or foil debil wretch without note
 here mani els done shout forth
 in acclam hyperbol 
 as i lov littl dieted
 in prais sauc lie 
 cominiu too modest 
 more cruel good report grateful
 to us give truli by patienc 
 if gainst incen put 
 like one mean proper harm manacl 
 then reason safe therefor known 
 as us world caiu marcius
 wear war garland token 
 my nobl steed known camp i give 
 with trim belong time 
 for corioli him
 with th applaus clamour host 
 caiu marciu coriolanu 
 bear th addit nobli ever 
 flourish trumpet sound drum 
 all caiu marciu coriolanu 
 coriolanu i go wash 
 and face fair shall perceive
 whether i blush howbeit i thank 
 i mean stride steed times
 to undercrest good addition
 to th fair power 
 cominiu so tent 
 where ere repos us write
 to rome success you titu lartiu 
 must corioli back send us rome
 the best may articulate
 for good 
 lartiu i shall lord 
 coriolanu the god begin mock i now
 refu princ gift bound beg
 of lord gener 
 cominiu take ti 
 coriolanu i sometim lay corioli
 at poor man hous us kindli 
 he cri i saw prison 
 but aufidiu within view 
 and wrath erwhelm piti i request you
 to give poor host freedom 
 cominiu o well begg 
 were butcher son should
 be free wind deliv titu 
 lartiu marciu name 
 coriolanu by jupit forgot 
 i weari yea memori tir 
 have wine 
 cominiu go tent 
 the blood upon visag dri ti time
 it look come exeunt

scen x the camp volsces

a flourish cornet enter tullu aufidiu bloodi two three
soldiers

 aufidiu the town ta en 
 first soldier twill deliv back good condit 
 aufidiu condit 
 i would i roman i can not 
 be volsc i condit 
 what good condit treati find
 i th part merci five time marciu 
 i fought thee often hast thou beat 
 and wouldst i think encounter
 as often eat by th element 
 if e er i meet beard beard 
 he mine i mine emulation
 hath honour where
 i thought crush equal forc 
 true sword sword i potch way 
 or wrath craft may get 
 first soldier he devil 
 aufidiu bolder though subtl my valour poison d
 with suff ring stain him
 shall fli nor sleep sanctuari 
 be nake sick fane capitol 
 the prayer priest time sacrific 
 embarqu furi shall lift up
 their rotten privileg custom gainst
 my hate marciu where i find it
 at home upon brother guard even 
 against hospit canon would i
 wash fierc hand heart go th citi 
 learn ti held must
 be hostag rome 
 first soldier will go 
 aufidiu i attend cypress grove i pray 
 ti south citi mill bring word thither
 how world goe pace it
 i may spur journey 
 first soldier i shall sir exeunt

act ii scene i rome a public place

ent meneniu two tribun peopl siciniu and
brutus

 meneniu the augur tell shall news tonight 
 brutu good bad

 marciu

 meneniu pray wolf love 
 siciniu the lamb

 nobl marciu

 meneniu he bear inde live fike lamb you two are
 old men tell one thing i shall ask 
 both tribun well sir 
 meneniu in enorm marciu poor two not
 abund

 siciniu especi pride 
 brutu and top other boast

 citi i mean us th right hand file do 
 both tribun whi censur 
 meneniu becaus talk pride angri

 meneniu whi ti great matter littl thief of
 occas rob great deal patienc give your
 disposit rein angri pleasur the
 least take pleasur you blame
 marciu proud 
 brutu we alon sir 
 meneniu i know littl alon help are
 mani els action would grow wondrou singl your
 abil infant like much alon you talk of
 pride o could turn eye toward nape your
 neck make interior survey good selv o
 could 
 both tribun what sir 
 meneniu whi discov brace unmerit 
 proud violent testi magistr alia fool rome 
 siciniu meneniu known well enough 
 meneniu i known humor patrician one loves
 cup hot wine drop allay tiber said to
 someth imperfect favour first complaint hasty
 tinder like upon trivial motion one convers more
 buttock night forehead the
 morn what i think i utter spend malic breath 
 meet two wealsmen i can not call you
 lycurgus drink give touch palat advers i
 make crook face i can not say worship have
 deliv matter well i find ass compound with
 major part syllabl though i must content to
 bear say reverend grave men yet lie
 deadli tell good face if see the
 map microcosm follow i known well enough 
 what harm bisson conspectu glean this
 charact i known well enough 
 brutu come sir come know well enough 
 meneniu you know neither thing you are
 ambiti poor knave cap leg wear good
 wholesom forenoon hear caus orang wife and
 fosset seller rejourn controversi threepence
 second day audienc when hear matter
 parti parti chanc pinch the
 colic make face like mummer set bloodi flag
 patienc roar chamber pot dismiss
 controversi bleed entangl hear all
 peac make caus call parties
 knave you pair strang one 
 brutu come come well understood perfect giber
 tabl necessari bencher capitol 
 meneniu our priest must becom mocker shall
 encount ridicul subject when speak
 best unto purpos worth wag your
 beard beard deserv honour grave to
 stuff botcher cushion entomb ass s
 pack saddl yet must say marciu proud a
 cheap estim worth predecessor sinc deucalion 
 though peradventur best em hereditary
 hangmen god den worship more conversation
 would infect brain herdsmen beastly
 plebeian i bold take leav 
 brutu siciniu go asid 

 enter volumnia virgilia valeria

 how fair nobl ladi moon she
 earthli nobler whither follow eye fast

 love juno let go

 approb

 marciu come home 
 volumnia virgilia nay ti true 
 volumnia look letter state hath anoth 
 wife anoth i think one home

 virgilia ye certain letter i saw 
 meneniu a letter it give estat seven year 
 health time i make lip physician the

 wound he wont come home wound

 got

 stay i would fidiu the

 coriolanu and live yet to valeria o sweet ladi 
 pardon

 o welcom home and welcom gener 
 and welcom 
 meneniu a hundr thousand welcom i could weep
 and i could laugh i light heavi welcom 
 a curs begin root heart
 that glad see thee you three
 that rome dote yet faith men

 we call nettl nettl and

 ere hous i shade head 
 the good patrician must visit 
 from i receiv greet 
 but chang honour 
 volumnia i lived
 to see inherit wish 
 and build fanci only
 there one thing want i doubt but
 our rome cast upon thee 
 coriolanu know good mother 
 i rather servant way
 than sway 
 cominiu on capitol 
 flourish cornet exeunt state 

 brutu siciniu come forward

 brutu all tongu speak blear sights
 are spectacl see your prattl nurse
 into raptur let babi cry
 while chat kitchen malkin pins
 her richest lockram bout reechi neck 
 clamb ring wall eye stall bulk window 
 are smother lead fill ridg hor d
 with variabl complexion agreeing
 in earnest see seld shown flamens
 do press among popular throng puff
 to win vulgar station veil dames
 commit war white damask in
 their nice gawd cheek th wanton spoil
 of phoebu burn kiss such pother 
 as whatsoev god lead him
 were slili crept human power 
 and gave grace postur 
 siciniu on sudden
 i warrant consul 
 brutu then offic may
 dure power go sleep 
 siciniu he can not temp rate transport honours
 from begin end will
 lose hath 
 brutu in comfort 
 siciniu doubt not
 the common stand they
 upon ancient malic forget
 with least caus new honour which
 that give make i littl question
 as proud 
 brutu i heard swear 
 were stand consul never would he
 appear th market place put
 the napless vestur humil 
 nor show manner wounds
 to th peopl beg stink breath 
 siciniu ti right 
 brutu it word o would miss rather
 than carri suit gentri him
 and desir nobl 
 siciniu i wish better
 than hold purpos put it
 in execut 
 brutu ti like 
 siciniu it shall good will 
 a sure destruct 
 brutu so must fall out
 to author for end 
 we must suggest peopl hatred
 he still hath held power would
 have made mule silenc pleader and
 disproperti freedom hold them
 in human action capacity
 of soul fit world
 than camel war provand
 onli bear burden sore blows
 for sink 
 siciniu thi say suggested
 at time soar insolence
 shall touch peopl time shall want 
 if put upon easy
 as set dog sheep fire
 to kindl dri stubbl blaze
 shall darken ever

 brutu what matter

 that marciu shall consul 
 i seen dumb men throng see and

 as jove statu common made

scen ii rome the capitol

ent two offic lay cushion capitol

 first offic come come almost how mani stand for
 consulship 
 second offic three say ti thought everi one
 coriolanu carri 
 first offic that brave fellow vengeanc proud and
 love common peopl 
 second offic faith mani great men have
 flatter peopl ne er love many
 love know wherefor they
 love know hate upon better ground 
 therefor coriolanu neither care whether love or
 hate manifest true knowledg their
 disposit nobl careless let plainly
 see 
 first offic if care whether love 
 wave indiffer twixt neither good harm 
 seek hate greater devot can
 render leav noth undon may fulli discover
 opposit now seem affect malic and
 displeasur peopl bad dislik to
 flatter love 
 second offic he hath deserv worthili countri his
 ascent easi degre been
 suppl courteou peopl bonnet without further
 deed estim report but
 hath plant honour eye action in
 heart tongu silent confess
 much kind ingrat injuri report otherwise
 malic give lie would pluck reproof
 rebuk everi car heard 
 first offic no worthi man make way they
 come 

 a sennet enter patrician tribunes
 of the peopl lictor coriolanu 
 meneniu cominiu consul siciniu and
 brutu take place 
 coriolanu stands

 meneniu have determin volsc and
 to send titu lartiu remain 
 as main point meet 
 to gratifi nobl servic that
 hath thu stood countri therefor pleas 
 most reverend grave elder desire
 the present consul last general
 in well found success report
 a littl worthi work perform d
 by caiu marciu coriolanu whom
 we met thank remember
 with honour like coriolanu sit 
 first senat speak good cominiu 
 leav noth length make us think
 rather state defect requital
 than stretch master th peopl 
 we request kindest ear 
 your love motion toward common bodi 
 to yield pass 
 siciniu we convented
 upon pleas treati hearts
 inclin honour advance
 the theme assembl 
 brutu which rather
 we shall bless remember
 a kinder valu peopl than
 he hath hereto priz 
 meneniu that 
 i would rather silent pleas you
 to hear cominiu speak 
 brutu most willingli 
 but yet caution pertinent
 than rebuk give 
 meneniu he love peopl 
 but tie bedfellow 
 worthi cominiu speak 
 coriolanu rise offer go away 
 nay keep place 
 first senat sit coriolanu never shame hear
 what nobli done 
 coriolanu your honour pardon 
 i rather wound heal again
 than hear say i got 
 brutu sir i hope
 my word disbench 
 coriolanu no sir yet oft 
 when blow made stay i fled word 
 you sooth therefor hurt but peopl 
 i love weigh 
 meneniu pray sit 
 coriolanu i rather one scratch head th sun
 when alarum struck idli sit
 to hear noth monster exit
 meneniu master peopl 
 your multipli spawn flatter 
 that thousand one good one see
 he rather ventur limb honour
 than one ear hear proce cominiu 
 cominiu i shall lack voic deed coriolanus
 should utter feebli it held
 that valour chiefest virtu and
 most dignifi haver if 
 the man i speak can not world
 be singli counterpoi at sixteen year 
 when tarquin made head rome fought
 beyond mark other dictat 
 whom prais i point saw fight
 when amazonian chin drove
 the bristl lip bestrid
 an erpress roman th consul view
 slew three oppos tarquin self met 
 and struck knee in day feat 
 when might act woman scene 
 he prov best man th field meed
 wa brow bound oak hi pupil age
 man ent red thu wax like sea 
 and brunt seventeen battl since
 he lurch sword garland for last 
 befor corioli let say
 i can not speak home he stopp flier 
 and rare exampl made coward
 turn terror sport weed before
 a vessel sail men obey d
 and fell stem hi sword death stamp 
 where mark took face foot
 he thing blood whose everi motion
 wa tim die cri alon ent red
 the mortal gate th citi painted
 with shunless destini aidless came 
 and sudden enforc struck
 corioli like planet now 
 when din war gan pierce
 hi readi sens straight doubl spirit
 re quick ned flesh fatig 
 and battl came did
 run reek er live men if
 twere perpetu spoil till call d
 both field citi never stood
 to eas breast pant 
 meneniu worthi man 
 first senat he can not measur fit honours
 which devis 
 cominiu our spoil kick 
 and look upon thing preciou were
 the common muck world he covet less
 than miseri would give rewards
 hi deed content
 to spend time end 
 meneniu he right nobl 
 let call 
 first senat call coriolanu 
 offic he doth appear 

 re enter coriolanus

 meneniu the senat coriolanu well plea d
 to make thee consul 
 coriolanu i owe still
 my life servic 
 meneniu it remains
 that speak peopl 
 coriolanu i beseech you
 let erleap custom i cannot
 put gown stand nake entreat them
 for wound sake give suffrag pleas you
 that i may pass 
 siciniu sir people
 must voic neither bate

 meneniu put 
 pray go fit custom and
 take predecessor 
 your honour form 
 coriolanu it part
 that i shall blush act might well
 be taken peopl 
 brutu mark

 as i receiv hire
 of breath

scen iii rome the forum

 deni

 wound speak tell us nobl deed we
 must also tell nobl accept ingratitud is
 monstrou multitud ingrat make a
 monster multitud member should
 bring monstrou member 
 first citizen and make us better thought littl help
 serv stood corn stuck
 call us mani head multitud

 brown black abram bald our
 wit divers colour truli i think wits
 issu one skull would fli east west north 
 south consent one direct way to
 point th compass

 fli

 liberti twould sure southward 
 second citizen whi way

 enter coriolanu gown humil 
 menenius

 here come gown humil mark behaviour 
 we stay togeth come he

 request particular wherein everi one us single
 honour give voic tongu

 meneniu o sir right known
 the worthiest men done

 my tongu pace look sir wounds
 i got countri servic when
 some certain brethren roar ran
 from th nois drum

 you must speak you must desir them
 to think upon

 i would would forget like virtues
 which divin lose em

 i leav pray speak em i pray

 gain

 peopl

 better die better starv 
 than crave hire first deserv

 to beg hob dick appear

 what custom will thing

 re enter meneniu brutu sicinius

 endu peopl voic remains
 that th offici mark invest you
 anon meet senat

 to meet anon upon approb

 he look methinks
 ti warm heart

 hi humbl weed will dismiss peopl 

 re enter citizens

 siciniu how master have chose man 
 first citizen he voic sir 
 brutu we pray god may deserv love 
 second citizen amen sir to poor unworthi notic 
 he mock us begg voic 
 third citizen certainli 
 he flout us downright 
 first citizen no ti kind speech mock us 
 second citizen not one amongst us save says
 he us us scorn he show us
 hi mark merit wound receiv countri 
 siciniu whi i sure 
 all no man saw em 
 third citizen he said wound could show in
 privat 
 and hat thu wave scorn 
 i would consul say age custom
 but voic permit 
 your voic therefor when grant 
 here i thank voic thank 
 your sweet voic now left voic 
 i wa mockeri 
 siciniu whi either ignor see 
 or see childish friendliness
 to yield voic 
 brutu could told 
 as lesson power
 but petti servant state 
 he enemi ever spake against
 your liberti charter bear
 i th bodi weal arriving
 a place potenc sway th state 
 if still malignantli remain
 fast foe th plebeii voic might
 be curs you said
 that worthi deed claim less
 than stood graciou nature
 would think upon voic and
 translat malic toward love 
 stand friendli lord 
 siciniu thu said 
 as fore advi touch spirit
 and tri inclin pluck d
 either graciou promis might 
 as caus call held 
 or els would gall surli natur 
 which easili endur article
 ty aught so put rage 
 you ta en th advantag choler
 and pass unelect 
 brutu did perceive
 he solicit free contempt
 when need love think
 that contempt shall bruis you
 when hath power crush whi bodies
 no heart among or tongu cry
 against rectorship judgment 
 siciniu have you
 ere deni asker 
 of ask mock bestow
 your su tongu 
 third citizen he confirm may deni yet 
 second citizen and deni 
 i five hundr voic sound 
 first citizen i twice five hundr friend piece
 em 
 brutu get henc instantli tell friends
 they chose consul take
 their liberti make voice
 than dog often beat barking
 as therefor kept 
 siciniu let assembl 
 and safer judgment revoke
 your ignor elect enforc pride
 and old hate unto besid forget not
 with contempt wore humbl weed 
 how suit scorn love 
 think upon servic took you
 th apprehens present portanc 
 which gibingli ungrav fashion
 after inveter hate bear 
 brutu lay
 a fault us tribun labour 
 no impedi must
 cast elect 
 siciniu say chose him
 more command guided
 by true affect mind 
 pre occupi rather must do
 than made grain
 to voic consul lay fault us 
 brutu ay spare us say read lectur 
 how youngli began serv countri 
 how long continu stock spring 
 the nobl hous th marcian whenc came
 that ancu marciu numa daughter son 
 who great hostiliu king 
 of hous publiu quintu 
 that best water brought conduit hither 
 and censorinu nobli name 
 twice peopl chosen censor 
 wa great ancestor 
 siciniu one thu descend 
 that hath besid well person wrought
 to set high place commend
 to remembr found 
 scale present bear past 
 that fix enemi revoke
 your sudden approb 
 brutu say ne er done 
 harp still put 
 and present drawn number 
 repair th capitol 
 citizen almost all
 repent elect exeunt plebeians
 brutu let go 
 thi mutini better put hazard
 than stay past doubt greater 
 if natur fall rage
 with refus observ answer
 the vantag anger 
 siciniu to th capitol come 
 we stream th peopl 
 and shall seem partli ti 
 which goad onward exeunt

act iii scene i rome a street

cornet enter coriolanu meneniu gentri cominiu 
titu lartiu senators

 coriolanu tullu aufidiu made new head 
 lartiu he lord cau d
 our swifter composit 
 coriolanu so volsc stand first 
 readi time shall prompt make road
 upon 
 cominiu they worn lord consul so
 that shall hardli age see
 their banner wave 
 coriolanu saw aufidiu 
 lartiu on safeguard came curse
 against volsc vilely
 yield town he retir antium 
 coriolanu spoke 
 lartiu he lord 
 coriolanu how what 
 lartiu how often met sword sword 
 that thing upon earth hated
 your person would pawn fortunes
 to hopeless restitut might
 be call vanquish 
 coriolanu at antium live 
 lartiu at antium 
 coriolanu i wish i caus seek 
 to oppos hatr fulli welcom home 

 enter siciniu brutus

 behold tribun peopl 
 the tongu th common mouth i despis 
 for prank author 
 against nobl suffer 
 siciniu pass 
 coriolanu ha what 
 brutu it danger go 
 coriolanu what make chang 
 meneniu the matter 
 cominiu hath pass nobl common 
 brutu cominiu 
 coriolanu have i children voic 
 first senat tribun give way shall th market place 
 brutu the peopl incen 
 siciniu stop 
 or fall broil 
 coriolanu are herd 
 must voic yield now
 and straight disclaim tongu what offic 
 you mouth rule teeth 
 have set 
 meneniu be calm calm 
 coriolanu it purpo thing grow plot 
 to curb nobil 
 suffer live can not rule
 nor ever rul 
 brutu call plot 
 the peopl cri mock late 
 when corn given grati repin 
 scandal suppliant peopl call them
 time pleaser flatter foe nobl 
 coriolanu whi known 
 brutu not 
 coriolanu have inform sithenc 
 brutu how i inform 
 cominiu you like busi 
 brutu not unlike
 each way better 
 coriolanu whi i consul by yond cloud 
 let deserv ill make me
 your fellow tribun 
 siciniu you show much that
 for peopl stir pass
 to bound must enquir way 
 which gentler spirit 
 or never nobl consul 
 nor yoke tribun 
 meneniu let calm 
 cominiu the peopl abu set thi palt ring
 becom rome coriolanus
 deserv dishonour rub laid falsely
 i th plain way merit 
 coriolanu tell corn 
 thi speech i speak 
 meneniu not 
 first senat not heat sir 
 coriolanu now i live i 
 my nobler friend i crave pardon 
 for mutabl rank scent meini let them
 regard i flatter and
 therein behold i say 
 in sooth nourish gainst senate
 the cockl rebellion insol sedit 
 which plough sow scatter 
 by mingl us honour number 
 who lack virtu power that
 which given beggar 
 meneniu well 
 first senat no word beseech 
 coriolanu how 
 as countri i shed blood 
 not fear outward forc shall lungs
 coin word till decay measles
 which disdain tetter us yet sought
 the way catch 
 brutu you speak th people
 as god punish not
 a man infirm 
 siciniu twere well
 we let peopl know 
 meneniu what choler 
 coriolanu choler 
 were i patient midnight sleep 
 by jove twould mind 
 siciniu it mind
 that shall remain poison 
 not poison 
 coriolanu shall remain 
 hear triton minnow mark you
 hi absolut shall 
 cominiu twa canon 
 coriolanu shall 
 o good unwis patrician whi 
 you grave reckless senat thus
 given hydra choos officer
 that peremptori shall but
 the horn nois th monster want spirit
 to say turn current ditch 
 and make channel if power 
 then vail ignor none awake
 your danger leniti if learn 
 be common fool 
 let cushion you plebeian

 which often made senat

 seal i end withal thi doubl worship

 can not conclud yea no
 of gener ignor must omit

scen ii rome the hous coriolanus

ent coriolanu nobles

 coriolanu let pull mine ear present me
 death wheel wild hors heel 
 or pile ten hill tarpeian rock 
 that precipit might stretch
 below beam sight yet i still
 be thu 
 first patrician you nobler 
 coriolanu i muse mother
 doe approv wont
 to call woollen vassal thing created
 to buy sell groat show bare heads
 in congreg yawn still wonder 
 when one ordin stood up
 to speak peac war 

 enter volumnia

 i talk 
 whi wish milder would me
 fals natur rather say i play
 the man i 
 volumnia o sir sir sir 
 i would put power well on
 befor worn 
 coriolanu let go 
 volumnia you might enough man are
 with strive less lesser been
 the thwart disposit if
 you show ye dispo 
 ere lack power cross 
 coriolanu let hang

 enter meneniu senators

 meneniu come come rough someth rough 
 you must return mend 
 first senat there remedi 
 unless good city
 cleav midst perish 
 volumnia pray counsel 
 i heart littl apt 
 but yet brain lead use anger
 to better vantag 
 meneniu well said nobl woman 
 befor thu stoop th herd that
 the violent fit th time crave physic
 for whole state i would put mine armour 
 which i scarc bear 
 coriolanu what must i 
 meneniu return th tribun 
 coriolanu well 
 meneniu repent spoke 
 coriolanu for i can not god 
 must i 
 volumnia you absolut 
 though therein never noble
 but extrem speak i heard say
 honour polici like unsev friend 
 i th war grow togeth grant tell me
 in peac th lose
 that combin 
 coriolanu tush tush 
 meneniu a good demand 
 volumnia if honour war seem
 the best ends
 you adopt polici less worse
 that shall hold companionship peace
 with honour war sinc both
 it stand like request 
 coriolanu whi forc 
 volumnia becaus lie speak
 to th peopl instruct 
 nor th matter heart prompt 
 but word rote in
 your tongu though bastard syllables
 of allow bosom truth 
 now dishonour all
 than take town gentl word 
 which els would put fortun and
 the hazard much blood 
 i would dissembl natur where
 my fortun friend stake requir d
 i honour i this
 your wife son senat nobl 
 and rather show gener louts
 how frown spend fawn upon em
 for inherit love safeguard
 of want might ruin 
 meneniu nobl ladi 
 come go us speak fair may salv 
 not danger present los
 of past 
 volumnia i prithe my son 
 go bonnet thi hand 
 and thu far stretch 
 thi knee buss stone busines
 action eloqu eye th ignorant
 more learn ear wave thi head 
 which often thu correct thi stout heart 
 now humbl ripest mulberry
 that hold handl or say them
 thou art soldier bred broil 
 hast soft way thou dost confess 
 were fit thee use claim 
 in ask good love thou wilt frame
 thyself forsooth hereaft far
 as thou hast power person 
 meneniu thi done
 even speak heart 
 for pardon ask free
 as word littl purpos 
 volumnia prithe 
 go rul although i know thou hadst rather
 follow thine enemi fieri gulf
 than flatter bower 

 enter cominius

 here cominiu 
 cominiu i th market place sir ti fit
 you make strong parti defend yourself
 by calm absenc anger 
 meneniu onli fair speech 
 cominiu i think twill serv he
 can thereto frame spirit 
 volumnia he must 
 prithe say go 
 coriolanu must i go show unbarb sconc must i
 with base tongu give nobl heart
 a lie must bear well i 
 yet singl plot lose 
 thi mould marciu dust grind 
 and throw wind to th market place 
 you put part never
 i shall discharg th life 
 cominiu come come prompt 
 volumnia i prithe sweet son thou hast said
 my prais made thee first soldier 
 to prais perform part
 thou hast done 
 coriolanu well i must 
 away disposit possess me
 some harlot spirit my throat war turn 
 which quier drum pipe
 small eunuch virgin voice
 that babi lull asleep the smile knaves
 tent cheek schoolboy tear take up
 the glass sight a beggar tongue
 make motion lip arm knee 
 who bow stirrup bend like his
 that hath receiv alm i 
 lest i surceas honour mine truth 
 and bodi action teach mind
 a inher base 
 volumnia at thi choic 
 to beg thee dishonour
 than thou come ruin let
 thi mother rather feel thi pride fear
 thi danger stout i mock death
 with big heart thou do thou list 
 thi valiant mine thou suck dst 
 but owe thi pride thyself 
 coriolanu pray content 
 mother i go market place 
 chide i mountebank love 
 cog heart come home belov d
 of trade rome look i go 
 commend wife i return consul 
 or never trust tongu do
 i th way flatteri 
 volumnia do exit
 cominiu away the tribun attend arm yourself
 to answer mildli prepar d
 with accus i hear strong
 than upon yet 
 coriolanu the word mildli pray let us go 
 let accus invent i
 will answer mine honour 
 meneniu ay mildli 
 coriolanu well mildli mildli exeunt

 what come

 that pass consul full voic

 from rome season offic wind

 for traitor peopl

 as i pray god

 what seen heard speak

 serv well rome

 brutu i talk know 
 coriolanu you 
 meneniu is promis made mother 
 cominiu know i pray 
 coriolanu i know 
 let pronounc steep tarpeian death 
 vagabond exil flay pent linger
 but grain day i would buy
 their merci price one fair word 
 nor check courag give 
 to say good morrow 
 siciniu for 
 as much lie time time
 envi peopl seek means
 to pluck away power last
 given hostil stroke presence
 of dread justic ministers
 that distribut name th peopl 
 and power us tribun 
 ev n instant banish citi 
 in peril precipitation
 from rock tarpeian never more
 to enter rome gate i th peopl name 
 i say shall

 he banish shall 
 cominiu hear master common friend 
 siciniu he sentenc hear 
 cominiu let speak 
 i consul show rome
 her enemi mark upon i love
 my countri good respect tender 
 more holi profound mine life 
 my dear wife estim womb increase

 speak

 brutu there said banish 
 as enemi peopl countri 
 it shall 
 plebeian it shall shall 
 coriolanu you common cri cur whose breath i hate
 as reek th rotten fen whose love i prize
 as dead carcass unburi men
 that corrupt air i banish 
 and remain uncertainti 
 let everi feebl rumour shake heart 
 your enemi nod plume 
 fan despair have power still
 to banish defend till length
 your ignor find till feel 
 make reserv yourselves
 still foe deliv you
 as abat captiv nation
 that without blow despising
 for citi thu i turn back 
 there world elsewher

act iv scene i rome befor gate city

ent coriolanu volumnia virgilia meneniu cominiu the
young nobil rome

 coriolanu come leav tear brief farewel the beast
 with mani head butt away nay mother 
 where ancient courag you us d
 to say extrem trier spirit 
 that common chanc common men could bear 
 that sea calm boat alike
 show mastership float fortun blow 
 when struck home gentl wound craves
 a nobl cun you us load me
 with precept would make invincible
 the heart conn 
 virgilia o heaven o heaven 
 coriolanu nay i prithe woman 
 volumnia now red pestil strike trade rome 
 and occup perish 
 coriolanu what 
 i shall lov i lack nay mother 
 resum spirit wont say 
 if wife hercul 
 six labour done sav d
 your husband much sweat cominiu 
 droop adieu farewel wife mother 
 i well yet thou old true meneniu 
 thi tear salter younger man s
 and venom thine eye my sometim gener 
 i seen thee stern thou hast oft beheld
 heart hard ning spectacl tell sad women
 ti fond wail inevit stroke 
 as ti laugh em my mother wot well
 my hazard still solac and
 believ lightli though i go alon 
 like lone dragon fen
 make fear talk seen son
 will exceed common caught
 with cautel bait practic 
 volumnia my first son 
 whither wilt thou go take good cominius
 with thee awhil determin course
 more wild expostur chance
 that start th way thee 
 virgilia o god 
 cominiu i follow thee month devis the
 where thou shalt rest thou mayst hear us 
 and thee time thrust forth
 a caus thi repeal shall send
 o er vast world seek singl man 
 and lose advantag doth ever cool
 i th absenc needer 
 coriolanu fare ye well 
 thou hast year upon thee thou art full
 of war surfeit go rove one
 that yet unbrui bring gate 
 come sweet wife dearest mother and
 my friend nobl touch i forth 
 bid farewel smile i pray come 
 while i remain ground shall
 hear still never aught
 but like formerli 
 meneniu that worthily
 as ear hear come let weep 
 if i could shake one seven years
 from old arm leg good god 
 i thee everi foot 
 coriolanu give thi hand 
 come exeunt

scene iv antium befor aufidiu house

ent coriolanu mean apparel disgui muffled

 coriolanu a goodli citi antium citi 
 ti i made thi widow mani heir
 of fair edific fore wars
 have i heard groan drop then know 
 lest thi wive spit boy stone 
 in puni battl slay 

 enter a citizen

 save sir 
 citizen and 
 coriolanu direct 
 where great aufidiu lie is antium 
 citizen he feast nobl state
 at hous night 
 coriolanu which hous beseech 
 citizen thi 
 coriolanu thank sir farewel exit citizen
 o world thi slipperi turn friend fast sworn 
 whose doubl bosom seem wear one heart 
 whose hour whose bed whose meal exercise
 are still togeth twin twere love 
 unsepar shall within hour 
 on dissens doit break out
 to bitterest enmiti fellest foe 
 whose passion whose plot broke sleep
 to take one chanc 
 some trick worth egg shall grow dear friends
 and interjoin issu so 
 my birthplac hate i love upon
 thi enemi town i enter if slay 
 he fair justic give way 
 i countri servic

 aufidiu where fellow

 and harsh sound thine

 bear command though thi tackl torn 
 thou show st nobl vessel what thi name 
 coriolanu prepar thi brow frown know st thou yet 
 aufidiu i know thee thi name 
 coriolanu my name caiu marciu hath done
 to thee particularli volsc 
 great hurt mischief thereto wit may
 my surnam coriolanu the pain servic 
 the extrem danger drop blood
 shed thankless countri requited
 but surnam good memory
 and wit malic displeasure
 which thou shouldst bear onli name remain 
 the cruelti envi peopl 
 permit dastard nobl who
 have forsook hath devour rest 
 an suffer th voic slave be
 whoop rome now extremity
 hath brought thi hearth hope 
 mistak save life if

 i would void thee mere spite 
 to full quit banish 
 stand i thee then thou hast
 a heart wreak thee wilt revenge
 thine particular wrong stop maims
 of shame seen thi countri speed thee straight
 and make miseri serv thi turn so use it
 that reveng servic may prove
 as benefit thee i fight
 against cank red countri spleen
 of fiend but be
 thou dar st prove fortunes
 th art tir word i also am
 longer live weari present
 my throat thee thi ancient malic 
 which cut would show thee fool 
 sinc i ever follow thee hate 
 drawn tun blood thi countri breast 
 and can not live thi shame unless
 it thee servic 
 aufidiu o marciu marciu 
 each word thou hast spoke hath weed heart
 a root ancient envi if jupiter
 should yond cloud speak divin thing 
 and say ti true i believ more
 than thee nobl marciu let twine
 mine arm bodi against
 my grain ash hundr time hath broke
 and scarr moon splinter i clip
 the anvil sword contest
 as hotli nobli thi love
 as ever ambiti strength i did
 contend thi valour know thou first

 than i first wed mistress saw

 onc hew thi target thi brawn

 dreamt encount twixt thyself

 had quarrel els rome that

 even

 of design he bear proudlier 
 even person i thought would

 had born action else
 to left sole

 when shall come account know not
 what i urg although seem

 to th vulgar eye bear thing fairly
 and show good husbandri volscian state

 as draw sword yet hath left undone

 whene er come account

 and nobil rome

 will rash repeal hasty

 by sovereignti natur first was

 set host my partner action

 i born busi

 a privat whisper friends
 that thought sure

 whom crack heart i sent rome

 nay god inde their latest refuge

 enter mourn habit virgilia volumnia valeria 
 young marciu attendants

 my wife come foremost honour mould
 wherein trunk fram hand
 the grandchild blood but affect 
 all bond privileg natur break 
 let virtuou obstin 
 what curtsi worth dove eye 
 which make god forsworn i melt not
 of stronger earth other my mother bow 
 as olympu molehil should
 in supplic nod young boy
 hath aspect intercess which
 great natur cri deni let volsces
 plough rome harrow itali i never
 be gosl obey instinct stand
 as man author himself
 and knew kin 
 virgilia my lord husband 
 coriolanu these eye i wore rome 
 virgilia the sorrow deliv us thu chang d
 make think 
 coriolanu like dull actor now
 i forgot part i 
 even full disgrac best flesh 
 forgiv tyranni say 
 for forgiv roman o kiss
 long exil sweet reveng 
 now jealou queen heaven kiss
 i carri thee dear true lip
 hath virgin e er sinc you god i prate 
 and nobl mother world
 leav unsalut sink knee th earth kneel 
 of thi deep duti impress show
 than common son 
 volumnia o stand blest 
 whilst softer cushion flint
 i kneel thee unproperly
 show duti mistaken while
 between child parent kneel 
 coriolanu what 
 your knee correct son 
 then let pebbl hungri beach
 fillip star let mutin winds
 strike proud cedar gainst fieri sun 
 murd ring imposs make
 what can not slight work 
 volumnia thou art warrior 
 i holp frame thee do know ladi 
 coriolanu the nobl sister publicola 
 the moon rome chast icicle
 that curdi frost purest snow 
 and hang dian templ dear valeria 
 volumnia thi poor epitom 
 which th interpret full time
 may show like 
 coriolanu the god soldier 
 with consent suprem jove inform
 thi thought nobl thou mayst prove
 to shame unvulner stick th wars
 like great sea mark stand everi flaw 
 and save eye thee 
 volumnia your knee sirrah 
 coriolanu that brave boy 
 volumnia even wife ladi 
 are suitor 
 coriolanu i beseech peac 
 or ask rememb 
 the thing i forsworn grant may never
 be held denial do bid me
 dismiss soldier capitulate
 again rome mechan tell not
 wherein i seem unnatur desir not
 t allay rage reveng with
 your colder reason 
 volumnia o 
 you said grant us thing 
 for noth els ask that
 which deni alreadi yet ask 
 that fail request blame
 may hang upon hard therefor hear us 
 coriolanu aufidiu volsc mark ll
 hear nought rome privat your request 
 volumnia should silent speak raiment
 and state bodi would bewray life
 we led sinc thi exil think thyself
 how unfortun live women
 are come hither sinc thi sight should
 make eye flow joy heart danc comfort 
 constrain weep shake fear sorrow 
 make mother wife child see
 the son husband father tearing
 hi countri bowel and poor we
 thine enmiti capit thou bar st us
 our prayer god comfort
 that enjoy for 
 ala countri pray 
 whereto bound togeth thi victori 
 whereto bound alack must lose
 the countri dear nurs els thi person 
 our comfort countri we must find
 an evid calam though had
 our wish side win either thou
 must foreign recreant led
 with manacl street else
 triumphantli tread thi countri ruin 
 and bear palm brave shed
 thi wife children blood for son 
 i purpos wait fortun till
 these war determin i persuad thee
 rather show nobl grace parts
 than seek end one thou shalt sooner
 march assault thi countri tread 
 trust thou shalt thi mother womb
 that brought thee world 
 virgilia ay mine 
 that brought forth boy keep name
 live time 
 boy a shall tread 
 i run away till i bigger i fight 
 coriolanu not woman tender be
 requir child woman face see 
 i sat long rise 
 volumnia nay go us thu 
 if request tend
 to save roman therebi destroy
 the volsc serv might condemn us
 as poison honour no suit
 is reconcil volsces
 may say thi merci show romans
 thi receiv either side
 give hail thee cri be blest
 for make peac thou know st great son 
 the end war uncertain certain 
 that thou conquer rome benefit
 which thou shalt therebi reap name
 whose repetit dogg curs 
 whose chronicl thu writ the man nobl 
 but last attempt wip 
 destroy countri name remains
 to th ensu age abhorr speak son 
 thou hast affect fine strain honour 
 to imit grace god 
 to tear thunder wide cheek th air 
 and yet charg thi sulphur bolt
 that rive oak whi dost speak 
 think st thou honour nobl man
 still rememb wrong daughter speak 
 he care weep speak thou boy 
 perhap thi childish move more
 than reason there man world
 more bound mother yet let prate
 like one th stock thou hast never thi life
 show thi dear mother courtesi 
 when poor hen fond second brood 
 ha cluck thee war safe home
 loaden honour say request unjust 
 and spurn back 
 thou art honest god plagu thee 
 that thou restrain st duti which
 to mother part belong he turn away 
 down ladi let us shame knee 
 to surnam coriolanu long pride
 than piti prayer down an end 
 thi last so home rome 
 and die among neighbour nay behold 
 thi boy can not tell would have
 but kneel hold hand fellowship 
 doe reason petit strength
 than thou hast deni come let us go 
 thi fellow volscian mother 
 hi wife corioli child
 like chanc yet give us dispatch 
 i hush citi afir 
 and i speak littl 
 he hold hand silent 
 coriolanu o mother mother 
 what done behold heaven ope 
 the god look unnatur scene
 they laugh o mother mother o 
 you happi victori rome 
 but son believ o believ 
 most danger prevail 
 if mortal but let come 
 aufidiu though i can not make true war 
 i frame conveni peac now good aufidiu 
 were stead would heard
 a mother less grant less aufidiu 
 aufidiu i mov withal 
 coriolanu i dare sworn 
 and sir littl thing make
 mine eye sweat compass but good sir 
 what peac fl make advis for part 
 i rome i back pray you
 stand caus o mother wife 
 aufidiu asid i glad thou hast set thi merci thy
 honour
 at differ thee out i work
 myself former fortun 
 coriolanu to ladi ay 
 but drink togeth shall bear
 a better wit back word 
 on like condit counter seal 
 come enter us ladi deserve
 to templ built all swords
 in itali confeder arm 
 could made peac exeunt

scen iv rome a public place

ent meneniu sicinius

 meneniu see yond coign th capitol yond cornerston 
 siciniu whi 
 meneniu if possibl displac little
 finger hope ladi rome especi his
 mother may prevail but i say hope 
 throat sentenc stay upon execut 
 siciniu is possibl short time alter the
 condit man 
 meneniu there differ grub butterfli yet
 butterfli grub thi marciu grown man to
 dragon wing creep thing 
 siciniu he lov mother dearli 
 meneniu so rememb mother now
 eight year old hors the tart face sour ripe
 grape walk move like engin ground
 shrink tread he abl pierc corslet with
 eye talk like knell hum batteri he sit in
 state thing made alexand what bid done is
 finish bid he want noth god but
 etern heaven throne 
 siciniu ye merci report truli 
 meneniu i paint charact mark merci mother
 shall bring there merci is
 milk male tiger shall poor citi find and this
 long 
 siciniu the god good unto us 
 meneniu no case god good unto us 
 when banish respect return to
 break neck respect us 

 enter messenger

 messeng sir save life fli hous 
 the plebeian got fellow tribune
 and hale swear if
 the roman ladi bring comfort home
 they give death inch 

 enter anoth messenger

 siciniu what news 
 second messeng good news good news the ladi prevail 
 the volscian dislodg marciu gone 
 a merrier day never yet greet rome 
 no th expuls tarquin 
 siciniu friend

 second messeng as certain i know sun fire 
 where lurk make doubt 
 ne er arch hurri blown tide
 as recomfort th gate whi hark

 make sun danc hark a shout within

 is worth consul senat patrician

 i given doit hark joy

ent tullu aufidiu attendents

 to purg word dispatch

 enter three four conspir aufidiu faction

 most welcom 
 first conspir how gener 
 aufidiu even so
 as man alm empoison 
 and chariti slain 
 second conspir most nobl sir 
 if hold intent wherein
 you wish us parti deliv you
 of great danger 
 aufidiu sir i can not tell 
 we must proceed find peopl 
 third conspir the peopl remain uncertain whilst
 twixt differ fall either
 make survivor heir 
 aufidiu i know 
 and pretext strike admits

 mine honour truth heighten 
 he water new plant dew flatteri 
 seduc friend end
 he bow natur never known before
 but rough unsway free

 when stand consul lost
 by lack stoop 
 aufidiu that i would spoken 
 be banish came unto hearth 
 present knife throat i took

 in desir nay let choose
 out file project accomplish

 which end took pride
 to wrong till last

 for less spoil glori 
 aufidiu there 
 for sinew shall stretch upon 
 at drop women rheum are
 as cheap lie sold blood labour
 of great action therefor shall die

 drum and

 first conspir your nativ town enter like post 
 and welcom home returns
 split air nois 
 second conspir and patient fool 
 whose children hath slain base throat tear
 with give glori

 ere express move people
 with would say let feel sword

 hi reason bodi

 here come lord 

 enter lord city

 lord you welcom home 
 aufidiu i deserv 
 but worthi lord heed perused
 what i written 
 lord we 
 first lord and griev hear 
 what fault made last i think
 might found easi fine end
 where begin give away

 enter coriolanu march drum colour 
 common him

 coriolanu hail lord i return soldier 
 no infect countri love
 than i part henc still subsisting
 under great command you know
 that prosper i attempt and
 with bloodi passag led war even to
 the gate rome our spoil brought home
 doth counterpois full third part
 the charg action we made peace
 with less honour antiates
 than shame th roman deliv 
 subscrib th consul patrician

 we compound

 but tell traitor highest degree
 he hath abu power 
 coriolanu traitor how 
 aufidiu ay traitor marciu 
 coriolanu marciu

 i grace thee robberi thi stol n name
 coriolanu corioli 
 you lord head th state perfidiously
 he betray busi given 
 for certain drop salt citi rome 
 i say citi wife mother 
 break oath resolut like

 counsel th war nurs tears
 he whin roar away victori 
 that page blush men heart
 look wond ring other

 coriolanu ha

 coriolanu measureless liar thou hast made heart
 too great contain boy o slave

 who wear stripe impress upon that
 must bear beat grave shall join
 to thrust lie unto

scen britain itali 


act i

scen i britain the garden cymbelin palac 

 enter two gentlemen 

first gentleman 
you meet man frown bloods
no obey heaven courtiers
stil seem king 

second gentleman 
but matter 

first gentleman 
hi daughter heir kingdom whom
h purpo wife sole son widow
that late marri hath referr herself
unto poor worthi gentleman she wed 
her husband banish imprison all
i outward sorrow though i think king
b touch heart 

second gentleman 
none king 

first gentleman 
he hath lost so queen 
that desir match but courtier 
although wear face bent
of king look hath heart not
glad thing scowl 

second gentleman 
and 

first gentleman 
he hath miss princess thing
too bad bad report hath 
i mean marri alack good man 
and therefor banish creatur such
a seek region earth
for one like would someth failing
in compar i think
so fair outward stuff within
endow man 

second gentleman 
you speak far 

first gentleman 
i extend sir within 
crush togeth rather unfold
hi measur duli 

second gentleman 
what name birth 

first gentleman 
i can not delv root father
wa call siciliu join honour
against roman cassibelan 
but titl tenantiu whom
h serv glori admir success 
so gain sur addit leonatu 
and besid gentleman question 
two son war th time 
di sword hand father 
then old fond issu took sorrow
that quit gentl ladi 
big gentleman theme decea d
a born the king take babe
to protect call posthumu leonatu 
breed make bed chamber 
put learn time
could make receiv took 
a air fast twa minist red 
and spring becam harvest liv court 
which rare prai lov 
a sampl youngest th mature
a glass feat graver
a child guid dotard to mistress 
for banish price
proclaim esteem virtu 
bi elect may truli read
what kind man 

second gentleman 
i honour him
even report but pray tell 
i sole child th king 

first gentleman 
hi child 
he two son worth hear 
mark eldest three year old 
i th swath cloth nursery
wer stol n hour guess knowledge
which way went 

second gentleman 
how long ago 

first gentleman 
some twenti year 

second gentleman 
that king children convey 
so slackli guard search slow
that could trace 

first gentleman 
howso er ti strang 
or neglig may well laugh 
yet true sir 

second gentleman 
i well believ 

first gentleman 
we must forbear come gentleman 
the queen princess 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the 

 enter queen posthumu imogen 

queen 
no assur shall find daughter 
after slander stepmoth 
evil ey unto you prison but
your gaoler shall deliv keys
that lock restraint for posthumu 
so soon i win th offend king 
i known advoc marri yet
th fire rage twere good
you lean unto sentenc patience
your wisdom may inform 

posthumu 
pleas high 
i henc today 

queen 
you know peril 
i fetch turn garden pitying
th pang barr affect though king
hath charg speak togeth 

 _exit _ 

imogen 
o dissembl courtesi how fine tyrant
can tickl wound my dearest husband 
i someth fear father wrath nothing
 alway reserv holi duti what
hi rage you must gone 
and i shall abid hourli shot
of angri eye comfort live
but jewel world
that i may see 

posthumu 
mi queen mistress 
o ladi weep lest i give cause
to suspect tenderness
than doth becom man i remain
th loyal st husband e er plight troth 
mi resid rome one philario 
who father friend me
known letter thither write queen 
and mine eye i drink word send 
though ink made gall 

 enter queen 

queen 
be brief i pray 
if king come i shall incur i know not
how much displeasur _asid _ yet i move him
to walk way i never wrong
but buy injuri friend 
pay dear offenc 

 _exit _ 

posthumu 
should take leave
a long term yet live 
the loath depart would grow adieu 

imogen 
nay stay littl 
were ride forth air 
such part petti look love 
thi diamond mother take heart 
but keep till woo anoth wife 
when imogen dead 

posthumu 
how anoth 
you gentl god give i 
and sear embrac next
with bond death remain remain thou here

 _put ring _ 

while sens keep and sweetest fairest 
a i poor self exchang 
to infinit loss trifles
i still win for sake wear 
it manacl love i place it
upon fairest prison 

 _put bracelet arm _ 

imogen 
o god 
when shall see 

 enter cymbelin lord 

posthumu 
alack king 

cymbelin 
thou basest thing avoid henc sight
if command thou fraught court
with thi unworthi thou diest away 
thou rt poison blood 

posthumu 
the god protect 
and bless good remaind court 
i gone 

 _exit _ 

imogen 
there can not pinch death
mor sharp 

cymbelin 
o disloy thing 
that shouldst repair youth thou heap st
a year age

i beseech sir 
harm vexat 
i senseless wrath touch rare
subdu pang fear 

cymbelin 
past grace obedi 

imogen 
past hope despair way past grace 

cymbelin 
that mightst sole son queen 

imogen 
o bless i might i chose eagl 
and avoid puttock 

cymbelin 
thou took st beggar wouldst made throne
a seat base 

imogen 
no i rather added
a lustr 

cymbelin 
o thou vile one 

imogen 
sir 
it fault i lov posthumu 
you bred playfellow is
a man worth woman overbuy me
almost sum pay 

cymbelin 
what art thou mad 

imogen 
almost sir heaven restor would i were
a neat herd daughter leonatus
our neighbour shepherd son 

 enter queen 

cymbelin 
thou foolish thing 
 _to queen _ they togeth you done
not command away 
and pen

dear ladi daughter peac sweet sovereign 
leav us make comfort
out best advic

a drop blood day age 
die folli

 enter pisanio

here servant how sir what news

mi lord son drew master

ha

there might

and help anger parted
bi gentlemen hand

i glad

your son father friend take part
to draw upon exil o brave sir 
i would afric togeth 
myself needl i might prick
th goer back whi came master

to bring left notes
of command i subject 
when plea employ

thi hath been
your faith servant i dare lay mine honour
h remain

scene iv britain cymbelin palac 

 enter imogen pisanio 

imogen 
i would thou grew st unto shore th 
and question st everi sail write 
and i twere paper lost 
a offer merci what last
that spake thee

it queen queen

then wav handkerchief 

pisanio 
and kiss madam 

imogen 
senseless linen happier therein i 
and

no madam long
a could make eye ear
distinguish other keep
th deck glove hat handkerchief 
still wave fit stir mind
could best express slow soul sail 
how swift ship 

imogen 
thou shouldst made him
a littl crow less ere left
to eye 

pisanio 
madam i 

imogen 
i would broke mine eyestr crack but
to look upon till diminution
of space point sharp needl 
nay follow till melt from
th small gnat air then
hav turn mine eye wept but good pisanio 
when shall hear 

pisanio 
be assur madam 
with next vantag 

imogen 
i take leav had
most pretti thing say ere i could tell him
how i would think certain hours
such thought i could make swear
th she itali betray
min interest honour charg 
at sixth hour morn noon midnight 
t encount orison then
i heaven ere i could
giv part kiss i set
betwixt two charm word come father 
and like tyrann breath north
shak bud grow

desir high compani

scene v rome philario hous 

 enter philario iachimo frenchman dutchman spaniard

hi side i perus item

which make without within

from matter

bound less life 

 enter posthumu 

here come briton let entertain amongst suits
with gentlemen know stranger qualiti i beseech

nobl friend mine how worthi i leav appear
hereaft rather stori hear

ev pay yet pay still

countryman piti put together
with mortal purpos bore upon import so
slight trivial natur

bi pardon sir i young travel rather shunn go
even i heard everi action guid other 
experi upon mend judgement i offend say is
mend quarrel altogeth slight

faith ye put arbitr sword two
that would likelihood confound one have
fal n 

iachimo 
can manner ask differ

safe i think twa content public may without
contradict suffer report it much like argument that
fel last night us fell prais country
mistress gentleman time vouch upon warrant of
bloodi affirm fair virtuou wise chast 
constant qualifi less attempt rarest our
ladi franc 

iachimo 
that ladi live gentleman opinion worn
out 

posthumu 
she hold virtu still i mind 

iachimo 
you must far prefer fore itali 

posthumu 
be far provok i franc i would abat noth 
though i profess ador friend

a fair good kind hand hand comparison been
someth fair good ladi britain if went

hav beheld i could believ excel mani i not
seen preciou diamond ladi

what esteem

more world enjoy

cun thief way accomplish courtier would hazard the

frail i noth doubt store thiev notwithstand i
fear ring

let us leav gentlemen

strang familiar first 

iachimo 
with five time much convers i get ground fair

opportun friend 

posthumu 
no 

iachimo

mi opinion ervalu someth but i make wager rather against
your confid reput bar offenc herein

iachimo 
what

will i shall lend diamond till return let be

i lay

hav enjoy dearest bodili part mistress ten thousand
ducat diamond if i come leav her

fre entertain 

posthumu

far shall answer make voyag upon give me
directli understand prevail i enemi

counsel straight away britain lest bargain catch

scene vi britain cymbelin palac 

 enter queen ladi corneliu 

queen 
while yet dew ground gather flower 
make hast note 

ladi 
i madam 

queen 
dispatch 

 _exeunt ladi _ 

now master doctor brought drug 

corneliu 
pleaseth high ay here madam 

 _present box _ 

but i beseech grace without offenc 
 my conscienc bid ask wherefor have
command poison compounds
which mover languish death 
but though slow deadli 

queen 
i wonder doctor 
thou ask st question have i been
thi pupil long hast thou learn how
to make perfum distil preserv yea so
that great king doth woo oft
for confect have thu far proceeded
 unless thou think st devilish meet
that i amplifi judgement in
oth conclus i tri forces
of thi compound creatur as
w count worth hang none human 
to tri vigour apply
allay act gather
their sever virtu effect

your highness
shal practic make hard heart 
besid see effect be
both noisom infecti 

queen 
o content thee 

 enter pisanio 

 _asid _ here come flatter rascal upon him
wil i first work he master 
an enemi son how pisanio

 _to pisanio _ hark thee word

 _asid _ i like she doth think has
strang ling ring poison i know spirit 
and trust one malic with
a drug damn natur those has
wil stupefi dull sens awhil 
which first perchanc prove cat dog 
then afterward higher is
no danger show death make 
more lock spirit time 
to fresh reviv she fool d
with fals effect i truer
so fals

until i send thee

 _exit _ 

queen 
weep still say st thou dost thou think time
sh quench let instruct enter
wher folli possess do thou work 
when thou shalt bring word love son 
i tell thee instant thou art then
a great thi master greater for
hi fortun lie speechless name
i last gasp return can not nor
continu to shift being
i exchang one miseri anoth 
and everi day come come decay
a day work what shalt thou expect
to depend thing lean 
who can not new built friends
so much prop 

 _the queen drop box pisanio take _ 

thou tak st up
thou know st take thi labour 
it thing i made hath king
fiv time redeem death i know
what cordial nay i prithe take 
it earnest good
that i mean thee tell thi mistress how
th case stand thyself 
think chanc thou changest think
thou hast thi mistress still boot son 
who shall take notic thee i move king
to shape thi prefer such
a thou lt desir i chiefli 
that set thee desert bound
to load thi merit richli call women 
think word 

 _exit pisanio _ 

a sli constant knave 
not shak agent master 
and remembranc hold
th hand fast lord i given that
which take shall quit unpeopl her
of lieger sweet 
except bend humour shall assur d
to tast

 _exeunt cloten first lord _ 

that crafti devil mother

 _sleep iachimo come trunk _ 

iachimo 
the cricket sing man er labour sense
repair rest our tarquin thus
did softli press rush ere waken d
the chastiti wound cytherea 
how brave thou becom st thi bed fresh lili 
and whiter sheet that i might touch 
but kiss one kiss rubi unparagon 
how dearli ti breath that
perfum chamber thu the flame th taper
bow toward would peep lids
to see th enclos light canopied
und window white azur lac d
with blue heaven tinct but design
to note chamber i write 
such pictur window such
th adorn bed arra figur 
whi content th stori 
ah natur note body
abov ten thousand meaner movables
would testifi enrich mine inventori 
o sleep thou ape death lie dull upon 
and sens monument 
thu chapel lie come come 

 _take bracelet _ 

a slipperi gordian knot hard

a strongli conscienc within 
to th mad lord on left breast
a mole cinqu spot like crimson drops
i th bottom cowslip here voucher
strong ever law could make secret
wil forc think i pick lock ta en
th treasur honour no to end 
whi i write rivet 
screw memori she hath read late
th tale tereu leaf turn down
wher philomel gave i enough 
to th trunk shut spring 
swift swift dragon night dawning
may bare raven eye i lodg fear 
though heavenli angel hell

scene iv rome philario hous 

 enter posthumu philario 

posthumu

to win king i bold honour
wil remain

what mean make

not abid chang time 
quak present winter state wish
that warmer day would come in fear hopes
i bare gratifi love fail 
i must die much debtor

your good company
o erpay i by king
hath heard great augustu caiu lucius
wil commiss throughli i think
h grant tribut send th arrearag 
or look upon roman whose remembrance
i yet fresh grief

statist though i none like 
that prove war shall hear
th legion gallia sooner landed
in fear britain tidings
of penni tribut paid our countrymen
ar men order juliu csar
smil lack skill found courage
worthi frown their disciplin 
now mingl courag make known
to approv peopl such
that mend upon world

wa mine britain ring

that tast bed hand
and ring if foul opinion

to shall find

i confirm oath i doubt not

you need

could rare exactli wrought

or

thi thing

depend brand

for satisfi breast
