did call father i know where
when i stamp some coiner tools
mad counterfeit yet mother seem d
the dian time so doth wife
th nonpareil o vengeanc vengeanc 
me law pleasur restrain 
and pray oft forbear with
a pudenc rosi sweet view t
might well warm old saturn i thought her
a chast unsunn snow o devil 
thi yellow iachimo hour 
or less first perchanc spoke 
like full acorn boar german one 
cri o mount found opposition
but look oppos she
should encount guard could i find out
th woman part for motion
that tend vice man i affirm
it woman part be lie note 
the woman flatter deceiv 
lust rank thought reveng 
ambit covet chang pride disdain 
nice long slander mutabl 
all fault man may name nay hell know 
whi part rather 
for even vice
they constant chang still
on vice minut old one
not half old i write 
detest curs yet ti greater skill
in true hate pray 
the devil can not plagu better 

 _exit _ 



act iii

scen i britain a hall cymbelin palac 

 enter state cymbelin queen cloten lord one door at
 anoth caiu luciu attend 

cymbelin 
now say would augustu csar us 

luciu 
when juliu csar whose remembr yet
liv men eye ear tongues
b theme hear ever britain 
and conquer cassibelan thine uncl 
famou csar prais whit less
than feat deserv him
and success grant rome tribut 
yearli three thousand pound thee lately
i left untend 

queen 
and kill marvel 
shall ever 

cloten 
there mani csar ere anoth juliu britain world by
itself noth pay wear nose 

queen 
that opportun 
which take resume
w rememb sir lieg 
the king ancestor togeth with
th natur braveri isl stands
a neptun park ribb pal in
with rock unscal roar water 
with sand bear enemi boats
but suck th top mast a kind conquest
csar made made brag
of came saw overcam with shame
 the first ever touch carried
from coast twice beaten shipping
 poor ignor baubl terribl sea 
like egg shell mov upon surg crack d
a easili gainst rock joy whereof
th fam cassibelan point
 o giglot fortun master csar sword 
made lud town rejoic fire bright
and briton strut courag 

cloten 
come tribut paid our kingdom stronger than
it time i said moe csar other
of may crook nose owe straight arm none 

cymbelin 
son let mother end 

cloten 
we yet mani among us gripe hard cassibelan i say
i one i hand whi tribut whi pay tribut if
csar hide sun us blanket put moon his
pocket pay tribut light els sir tribut 
pray 

cymbelin 
you must know 
till injuri roman extort
thi tribut us free csar ambit 
which swell much almost stretch
th side th world colour here
did put yoke upon shake of
becom warlik peopl reckon
ourselv 

cloten 
we 

cymbelin 
say csar 
our ancestor mulmutiu which
ordain law whose use sword csar
hath much mangl whose repair franchise
shal power hold good deed 
though rome therefor angri mulmutiu made law 
who first britain put
hi brow within golden crown call d
himself king 

luciu 
i sorri cymbelin 
that i pronounc augustu csar
 csar hath moe king servant than
thyself domest offic thine enemi 
receiv war confusion
in csar name pronounc i gainst thee look
for furi resist thu defi 
i thank thee 

cymbelin 
thou art welcom caiu 
thi csar knight youth i spent
much i gather honour 
which seek perforc 
behov keep utter i perfect
that pannonian dalmatian for
their liberti arm precedent
which read would show briton cold 
so csar shall find 

luciu 
let proof speak 

cloten 
hi majesti bid welcom make pastim us day two or
long if seek us afterward term shall find us in
our salt water girdl if beat us you
fal adventur crow shall fare better and
ther end 

luciu 
so sir 

cymbelin 
i know master pleasur mine 
all remain welcom 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii britain anoth room cymbelin palac 

 enter pisanio read letter 

pisanio 
how adulteri wherefor write not
what monster accus leonatu 
o master strang infection
i fall n thi ear what fals italian
 as poison tongu hand hath prevail d
on thi readi hear disloy no 
she punish truth undergo 
more goddess like wife like assaults
a would take virtu o master 
thi mind low were
thi fortun how i murder 
upon love truth vow i
hav made thi command i her blood 
if good servic never
let count servic how look i
that i seem lack humanity
so much fact come 

 _read _ 

 do the letter
that i sent command
shal give thee opportun o damn paper 
black ink thee senseless baubl 
art thou fedari act look st
so virgin like without lo come 

 enter imogen 

i ignor i command 

imogen 
how pisanio 

pisanio 
madam letter lord 

imogen 
who thi lord that lord leonatu 
o learn inde astronomer
that knew star i charact 
he lay futur open you good god 
let contain relish love 
of lord health content yet not
that two asund let griev 
some grief med cinabl one 
for doth physic love content 
all good wax thi leav blest be
you bee make lock counsel lovers
and men danger bond pray alik 
though forfeit cast prison yet
you clasp young cupid tabl good news god 

 _read _ 

_justic father wrath take dominion 
could cruel o dearest creatur would
even renew eye take notic i cambria at
milford haven what love advis follow 
so wish happi remain loyal vow your
increas love 
 leonatu posthumu _

o hors wing hear st thou pisanio 
he milford haven read tell me
how far ti thither if one mean affairs
may plod week may i
glid thither day then true pisanio 
who long st like see thi lord long st
 o let bate like yet long st 
but fainter kind o like 
for mine beyond beyond say speak thick 
 love counsellor fill bore hearing
to th smother sens far is
to bless milford and th way
tel wale made happi as
t inherit but first 
how may steal henc gap
that shall make time henc going
and return excus but first get henc 
whi excus born ere begot 
we talk hereaft prithe speak 
how mani score mile may well rid
 twixt hour hour 

pisanio 
one score twixt sun sun 
madam enough much 

imogen 
whi one rode execut man 
could never go slow i heard ride wagers
wher hors nimbler sands
that run th clock behalf but fool ry 
go bid woman feign sick say
sh home father provid presently
a ride suit costlier would fit
a franklin huswif 

pisanio 
madam best consid 

imogen 
i see man nor 
nor ensu fog them
that i can not look away i prithe 
do i bid thee there say 
access none milford way 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iii wale a mountain countri cave 

 enter cave belariu guideriu arviragu 

belariu 
a goodli day keep hous such
whos roof low stoop boy gate
instruct ador heaven bow you
to morn holi offic the gate monarchs
ar arch high giant may jet through
and keep impiou turban without
good morrow sun hail thou fair heaven 
we hous th rock yet use thee hardly
a prouder liver 

guideriu 
hail heaven 

arviragu 
hail heaven 

belariu 
now mountain sport up yond hill 
your leg young i tread flat consid 
when perceiv like crow 
that place lessen set 
and may revolv tale i told you
of court princ trick war 
thi servic servic done 
but allow to apprehend thus
draw us profit thing see 
and often comfort shall find
th shard beetl safer hold
than full wing eagl o life
i nobler attend check 
richer noth robe 
prouder rustl unpaid silk 
such gain cap make fine 
yet keep book uncross no life 

guideriu 
out proof speak we poor unfledg 
have never wing view th nest know not
what air home hapli life best 
if quiet life best sweeter you
that sharper known well corresponding
with stiff age but unto us is
a cell ignor travel abe 
a prison debtor dares
to stride limit 

arviragu 
what speak of
when old when shall hear
th rain wind beat dark decemb 
in pinch cave shall discours 
the freez hour away we seen noth 
we beastli subtl fox prey 
like warlik wolf eat 
our valour chase fli cage
w make choir doth prison bird 
and sing bondag freeli 

belariu 
how speak 
did know citi usuri 
and felt knowingli art th court 
a hard leav keep whose top climb
i certain fall slipp ry that
th fear bad fall toil th war 
a pain seem seek danger
i th name fame honour die th search 
and hath oft sland rou epitaph
a record fair act nay mani time 
doth ill deserv well wors 
must curtsi censur o boy story
th world may read bodi mark d
with roman sword report once
first best note cymbelin lov 
and soldier theme name
wa far then i tree
whos bough bend fruit but one night
a storm robberi call 
shook mellow hang nay leav 
and left bare weather 

guideriu 
uncertain favour 

belariu 
mi fault noth i told oft 
but two villain whose fals oath prevail d
befor perfect honour swore cymbeline
i confeder roman so
follow banish twenti years
thi rock demesn world 
where i liv honest freedom paid
mor piou debt heaven all
th fore end time but th mountain 
thi hunter languag he strikes
th venison first shall lord th feast 
to two shall minist 
and fear poison attends
in place greater state i meet valley 

 _exeunt guideriu arviragu _ 

how hard hide spark natur 
these boy know littl son th king 
nor cymbelin dream aliv 
they think mine though train thu meanly
i th cave wherein bow thought hit
th roof palac natur prompt them
in simpl low thing princ much
beyond trick other thi polydor 
the heir cymbelin britain who
th king father call guideriu jove 
when three foot stool i sit tell
th warlik feat i done spirit fli out
into stori say thu mine enemi fell 
and thu i set foot neck even then
th princ blood flow cheek sweat 
strain young nerv put posture
that act word the younger brother cadwal 
onc arviragu like figure
strik life speech show much more
hi conceiv hark game rou 
o cymbelin heaven conscienc knows
thou didst unjustli banish whereon 
at three two year old i stole babe 
think bar thee success as
thou reft land euriphil 
thou wast nurs took thee mother 
and everi day honour grave 
myself belariu morgan call 
they take natur father the game 

 _exit _ 

scene iv wale near milford haven 

 enter pisanio imogen 

imogen 
thou told st came hors place
wa near hand ne er long mother so
to see first i pisanio man 
where posthumu what thi mind
that make thee stare thu wherefor break sigh
from th inward thee one paint thus
would interpret thing perplex d
beyond self explic put thyself
into haviour less fear ere wildness
vanquish staider sens what matter 
whi tender st thou paper with
a look untend if summer news 
smile winterli thou need st
but keep count nanc still my husband hand 
that drug damn itali hath crafti 
and hard point speak man thi tongue
may take extrem read
would even mortal 

pisanio 
pleas read 
and shall find wretch man thing
th disdain fortun

the testimoni whereof lie bleed i speak weak
surmis proof strong grief certain i
expect reveng that part thou pisanio must act thy
faith taint breach let thine hand take
away life i shall give thee opportun milford haven hath
mi letter purpos thou fear strike make
m certain done thou art pandar dishonour and
equ disloy _

hath cut throat alreadi no ti slander 
whose edg sharper sword whose tongue
outvenom worm nile whose breath
rid post wind doth belie
al corner world king queen state 
maid matron nay secret grave 
thi viper slander enter what cheer madam

to lie watch think

to break fear dream 
and cri awak that fals bed 
i

ala good ladi 

imogen

thou didst accus incontin 
thou look dst like villain methink 
thi favour good enough some jay itali 
whose mother paint hath betray 
poor i stale garment fashion 
and i richer hang th walls
i must ripp to piec o 
men vow women traitor all good seem 
bi thi revolt o husband shall thought
put villaini born grow 
but worn bait ladi 

pisanio 
good madam hear 

imogen 
true honest men heard like fals nea 
were time thought fals sinon weeping
did scandal mani holi tear took pity
from true wretched so thou posthumu 
wilt lay leaven proper men 
goodli gallant shall fals perjur d
from thi great fail come fellow thou honest 
do thou thi master bid thou seest 
a littl wit obedi look 
i draw sword take hit
th innoc mansion love heart 
fear ti empti thing grief 
thi master indeed
th rich do bid strike 
thou mayst valiant better caus 
but thou seem st coward 

pisanio 
henc vile instrument 
thou shalt damn hand 

imogen 
whi i must die 
and i thi hand thou art
no servant thi master against self slaughter
ther prohibit divine
that craven weak hand come heart 
someth afor soft soft defenc 
obedi scabbard what 
the scriptur loyal leonatus
al turn heresi away away 
corrupt faith shall more
b stomach heart thu may poor fools
believ fals teacher though betray d
do feel treason sharpli yet traitor
stand wors case woe and thou posthumu 
that didst set disobedi gainst king
mi father make put contempt suits
of princ fellow shalt hereaft find
it act common passag but
a strain rare i griev myself
to think thou shalt disedg her
that thou tirest thi memory
wil pang prithe dispatch 
the lamp entreat butcher where thi knife 
thou art slow thi master bid 
when i desir 

pisanio 
o graciou ladi 
sinc i receiv command busines
i slept one wink 

imogen 
do bed 

pisanio 
i wake mine eyebal first 

imogen 
wherefor then
didst undertak whi hast thou abu d
so mani mile pretenc thi place 
mine action thine hors labour

for absent whereunto i never
purpos return whi hast thou gone far
to unbent thou hast ta en thi stand 
th elect deer thee 

pisanio 
but win time
to lose bad employ which
i consid cours good ladi 
hear patienc 

imogen 
talk thi tongu weari speak 
i heard i strumpet mine ear 
therein fals struck take greater wound 
nor tent bottom but speak 

pisanio 
then madam 
i thought would back 

imogen 
most like 
bring kill 

pisanio 
not neither 
but i wise honest then
mi purpos would prove well it can not be
but master abu some villain 
ay singular art hath done both
thi curs injuri 

imogen 
some roman courtezan 

pisanio 
no life 
i give notic dead send him
som bloodi sign ti commanded
i you shall miss court 
and well confirm 

imogen 
whi good fellow 
what shall i where bide how live 
or life comfort i am
dead husband 

pisanio 
if back th court 

imogen 
no court father ado
with harsh nobl simpl noth 
that cloten whose love suit hath me
a fear sieg 

pisanio 
if court 
then britain must bide 

imogen 
where 
hath britain sun shine day night 
are britain i th world volume
our britain seem 
in great pool swan nest prithe think
ther liver britain 

pisanio 
i glad
you think place th ambassador 
luciu roman come milford haven
tomorrow now could wear mind
dark fortun disguise
that appear must yet be
but self danger tread course
pretti full view yea happili near
th resid posthumu nigh least 
that though action visibl yet
report render hourli ear
a truli move 

imogen 
o mean 
though peril modesti death 
i would adventur 

pisanio 
well point 
you must forget woman change
command obedi fear niceness
 the handmaid women truli 
woman pretti self waggish courag 
readi gibe quick answer sauci and
a quarrel weasel nay must
forget rarest treasur cheek 
expos o harder heart 
alack remedi greedi touch
of common kiss titan forget
your laboursom dainti trim wherein
y made great juno angri 

imogen 
nay brief 
i see thi end almost
a man alreadi 

pisanio 
first make like one 
fore think i alreadi fit
 ti cloak bag doublet hat hose all
that answer would serv 
and imit borrow
from youth season fore nobl lucius
pres desir servic tell him
wherein happi make know
if head ear music doubtless
with joy embrac honour 
and doubl holi your mean abroad 
you rich i never fail
begin supplyment 

imogen 
thou art comfort
th god diet prithe away 
there consid even
al good time give us thi attempt
i soldier abid with
a princ courag away i prithe 

pisanio

lest miss i suspect of
your carriag court my nobl mistress 
here box i queen 
what preciou if sick sea
or stomach qualm land dram this
wil drive away distemp to shade 
and fit manhood may gods
direct best 

imogen 
amen i thank thee 

 _exeunt sever _ 

scene v britain cymbelin palac 

 enter cymbelin queen cloten luciu lord

w slight suffer 

 _exit attend _ 

queen

 _exit cloten _ 

pisanio thou stand st posthumu

that els rare chok point

shal

scene vi wale befor cave belariu 

 enter imogen alon boy cloth 

imogen 
i see man life tediou one 
i tir two night together
hav made ground bed i sick
but resolut help milford 
when mountain top pisanio show thee 
thou wast within ken o jove i think
found fli wretch i mean 
where reliev two beggar told me
i could miss way will poor folk lie 
that afflict know tis
a punish trial ye wonder 
when rich one scarc tell true to laps fulness
i sorer lie need falsehood
i wors king beggar my dear lord 
thou art one th fals one now i think thee
mi hunger gone even i was
at point sink food but 
here path ti savag hold 
i best call i dare call yet famin 
ere clean erthrow natur make valiant 
plenti peac breed coward hard ever
of hardi mother ho 
if anyth civil speak savag 
take lend ho no answer then i enter 
best draw sword mine enemy
but fear sword like scarc look 
such foe good heaven 

 _exit cave _ 

scene vii the 

 enter belariu guideriu arviragu 

belariu 
you polydor prov best woodman and
ar master feast cadwal i
wil play cook servant ti match 
the sweat industri would dri die
but end work come stomachs
wil make home savouri weariness
can snore upon flint resti sloth
find pillow hard now peac 
poor hous keep st thyself 

guideriu 
i thoroughli weari 

arviragu 
i weak toil yet strong appetit 

guideriu 
there cold meat th cave brows that
whilst kill cook 

belariu 
 _look cave _ stay come 
but eat victual i think
her fairi 

guideriu 
what matter sir 

belariu 
bi jupit angel 
an earthli paragon behold divineness
no elder boy 

 enter imogen 

imogen 
good master harm 
befor i enter i call thought
to begg bought i took good troth 
i stol n nought would though i found
gold strew th floor here money meat 
i would left board soon
a i made meal parted
with pray rs provid 

guideriu 
money youth 

arviragu 
all gold silver rather turn dirt 
a ti better reckon those
who worship dirti god 

imogen 
i see angri 
know kill fault i should
hav die i made 

belariu 
whither bound 

imogen 
to milford haven 

belariu 
what name 

imogen 
fidel sir i kinsman who
i bound itali embark milford 
to go almost spent hunger 
i fall n offenc 

belariu 
prithe fair youth 
think us churl measur good minds
bi rude place live well encount 
 ti almost night shall better cheer
er depart thank stay eat 
boy bid welcom 

guideriu 
were woman youth 
i woo hard groom in honesty
i bid i buy 

arviragu 
i make comfort
h man i love brother 
and welcom i give him
aft long absenc most welcom 
be sprightli fall mongst friend

to thee posthumu

scene viii rome a public place 

 enter two roman senat tribun

th fall n briton incite

act iv

 enter cloten alon

i near th place meet pisanio mapp d
it truli how fit garment serv whi mistress who
wa made made tailor fit the rather 
save rever word ti said woman fit come by
fit therein i must play workman i dare speak for
it vain glori man glass confer own
chamb i mean line bodi well drawn less
young strong beneath fortun beyond the
advantag time birth alik convers general
servic remark singl opposit yet this
imperceiver thing love despit what mortal 
posthumu thi head grow upon thi shoulder shall
within hour thi mistress enforc thi garment cut to
piec face done spurn home her
fath may hapli littl angri rough usag my
moth power testi shall turn my
commend my hors tie safe out sword sore
purpos fortun put hand thi description
of meet place fellow dare deceiv

a i love father

thou divin natur thou thyself thou blazon st

to royalti unlearn honour untaught 
civil seen valour
that wildli grow yield crop
a sow yet still strange
what cloten us portend 
or death bring us

 enter belariu bodi cloten

 _exeunt imogen _ 

imogen 
 _awak _ ye sir milford haven which way 
i thank by yond bush pray far thither 
 od pittikin six mile yet 
i gone night faith i lie sleep 
but soft bedfellow o god goddess 

 _see bodi _ 

these flow rs like pleasur world 
thi bloodi man care i hope i dream 
for i thought i cave keeper 
and cook honest creatur but ti 
 twa bolt noth shot noth 
which brain make fume our eyes
ar sometim like judgement blind good faith 
i trembl still fear be
yet left heaven small drop pity
a wren eye fear god part 
the dream still even i wake is
without within imagin felt 
a headless man the garment posthumu 
i know shape leg hand 
hi foot mercuri martial thigh 
the brawn hercul jovial face 
murder heaven how ti gone pisanio 
all curs mad hecuba gave greek 
and mine boot dart thee thou 
conspir irregul devil cloten 
hath cut lord to write read
b henceforth treacher damn pisanio
hath forg letter damn pisanio 
from bravest vessel world
struck main top o posthumu ala 
where thi head where ay 
pisanio might kill thee heart 
and left head how pisanio 
 ti cloten malic lucr them
hav laid woe o ti pregnant pregnant 
the drug gave said precious
and cordial i found it
murd rou th sens that confirm home 
thi pisanio deed cloten o 
give colour pale cheek thi blood 
that horrid may seem those
which chanc find us o lord lord

what dream late war purpos

success th roman host

with defunct sleep upon dead 
let see boy face 

captain 
he aliv lord

than thine worth prefer thee go

such i twice er i weep sigh

 enter cymbelin lord pisanio attend 

cymbelin 
again bring word ti 

 _exit attend _ 

a fever absenc son 
a mad life danger heaven 
how deepli touch imogen 
the great part comfort gone queen
upon desper bed time
when fear war point son gone 
so need present it strike past
th hope comfort but thee fellow 
who need must know departur and
dost seem ignor enforc thee
bi sharp tortur 

pisanio 
sir life 
i humbl set mistress 
i noth know remain gone 
nor purpos return beseech high 
hold loyal servant 

lord 
good lieg 
the day miss 
i dare bound true shall perform
al part subject loyal for cloten 
there want dilig seek 
and doubt found

the time troublesom 
 _to pisanio _ we slip season jealousy
do yet depend 

lord

of roman gentlemen senat sent

i amaz matter 

lord 
good lieg

than hear come readi 
the want put pow rs motion
that long move

and meet time seek us we fear not
what itali annoy us but
w griev chanc away 

 _exeunt pisanio _ 

pisanio 
i heard letter master since
i wrote imogen slain ti strang 
nor hear i mistress promise
to yield often tide neither know i
what betid cloten remain
perplex the heaven still must work 
wherein i fals i honest true true 
these present war shall find i love countri 
even note th king i fall 
all doubt time let clear 
fortun bring boat steer 

 _exit _ 

scene iv wale befor cave belariu 

 enter belariu guideriu arviragu 

guideriu 
the nois round us 

belariu 
let us 

arviragu 
what pleasur sir find life lock it
from action adventur

nay hope
hav hide us thi way romans
must briton slay us receiv us
for barbar unnatur revolts
dur use slay us 

belariu 
son 
we higher mountain secur us 
to king parti go newness
of cloten death known muster d
among band may drive us render
wher liv extort that
which done whose answer would death 
drawn tortur 

guideriu 
thi sir doubt
in time noth becom you
nor satisfi us 

arviragu 
it likely
that hear roman hors neigh 
behold quarter fire eyes
and ear cloy importantli 
that wast time upon note 
to know whenc 

belariu 
o i known
of mani armi mani year 
though cloten young see wore him
from remembr and besid king
hath deserv servic love 
who find exil want breed 
the certainti hard life aye hopeless
to courtesi cradl promi 
but still hot summer tanl and
th shrink slave winter 

guideriu 
than 
better ceas pray sir th armi 
i brother known yourself
so thought thereto ergrown 
cannot question 

arviragu 
bi sun shine 
i thither what thing i never
did see man die scarc ever look blood
but coward hare hot goat venison 
never bestrid hors save one had
a rider like ne er wore rowel
nor iron heel i asham d
to look upon holi sun have
th benefit blest beam remaining
so long poor unknown 

guideriu 
bi heaven i go 
if bless sir give leav 
i take better care 
the hazard therefor due fall by
th hand roman 

arviragu 
so say i amen 

belariu 
no reason i sinc live set
so slight valuat reserve
mi crack one care have boy 
if countri war chanc die 
that bed lad i lie 
lead lead _asid _ the time seem long blood think scorn
til fli show princ born 

 _exeunt _ 



act v

scene i britain the roman camp 

 enter posthumu alon bloodi handkerchief 

posthumu 
yea bloodi cloth i keep thee i wish d
thou shouldst colour thu you marri one 
if take cours many
must murder wive much better themselves
for wri littl o pisanio 
everi good servant command 
no bond one god you
should ta en vengeanc fault i never
had liv put saved
th nobl imogen repent struck
m wretch worth vengeanc but alack 
you snatch henc littl fault love 
to fall you permit
to second ill ill elder wors 
and make dread doer thrift 
but imogen do best will 
and make blest obey i brought hither
among th italian gentri fight
against ladi kingdom ti enough
that britain i kill thi mistress peac 
i give wound thee therefor good heaven 
hear patient purpos i disrob me
of italian weed suit myself
a britain peasant so i fight
against part i come i die
for thee o imogen even life
i everi breath death and thu unknown 
piti hate face peril
myself i dedic let make men know
mor valour habit show 
god put strength th leonati 
to shame guis th world i begin
th fashion less without within 

 _exit _ 

scene ii britain a field battl british roman
camp 

 enter luciu iachimo roman armi one door british
 armi anoth leonatu posthumu follow like poor soldier 
 they march go alarum then enter skirmish 
 iachimo posthumu he vanquisheth disarmeth iachimo then
 leav 

iachimo 
the heavi guilt within bosom
tak manhood i beli ladi 
the princess countri air t
revengingli enfeebl could carl 
a drudg natur subdu me
in profess knighthood honour borne
a i wear mine titl scorn 
if thi gentri britain go before
thi lout exce lord odds
i scarc men god 

 _exit _ 

 the battl continu briton fli cymbelin taken then enter
 rescu belariu guideriu arviragu 

belariu

the lane guard noth rout us but
th villaini fear 

guideriu arviragu 
stand stand fight 

 enter posthumu second briton rescu cymbelin and

luciu

for friend kill friend disord such
a war hoodwink

 ti fresh suppli

let reinforc fli 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iii anoth part field 

 enter posthumu briton lord 

lord 
cam st thou made stand 

posthumu 
i 
though seem come flier 

lord 
i 

posthumu 
no blame sir lost 
but heaven fought the king himself
of wing destitut armi broken 
and back briton seen fli 
through strait lane enemi full heart 
loll tongu slaught ring work
mor plenti tool struck down
som mortal slightli touch falling
mer fear strait pass damm d
with dead men hurt behind coward living
to die length ned shame 

lord 
where lane 

posthumu 
close battl ditch wall turf 
which gave advantag ancient soldier 
an honest one i warrant deserv d
so long breed white beard came 
in countri athwart lane
h two stripl lad like run
th countri base commit slaughter 
with face fit mask rather fairer
than preserv ca shame 
made good passag cri fled
 our britain hart die fli men 
to dark fleet soul fli backward stand 
or roman give 
like beast shun beastli may save
but look back frown stand stand these three 
three thousand confid act mani 
for three perform file all
th rest noth word stand stand 
accommod place charming
with nobl could turn d
a distaff lanc gild pale look 
part shame part spirit renew turn coward
but exampl o sin war
damn first beginn gan look
th way grin like lions
upon pike th hunter then began
a stop th chaser retir anon
a rout confus thick forthwith fli 
chicken way stoop eagl slave 
the stride victor made coward 
like fragment hard voyag became
th life th need have found back door open
of unguard heart heaven wound 
some slain die friends
o erborn th former wave ten cha one
ar one slaughterman twenti

 _read _ _when lion whelp shall unknown without
seek find embrac piec tender air a
stat cedar shall lopp branch dead mani year 
shall reviv joint old stock freshli grow then
shal posthumu end miseri britain fortun flourish in

the fit apt construct thi name 
be leo natu doth import much 
 _to cymbeline_ the piec tender air thi virtuou daughter 
which call _molli aer_ _molli aer_
w term _mulier_ _mulier_ i divine
i constant wife even now
answ letter oracl 
unknown unsought clipp about
with tender air 

cymbelin 
thi hath seem 

soothsay 
the lofti cedar royal cymbelin 
person thee thi lopp branch point
thi two son forth belariu stol n 
for mani year thought dead reviv 
to majest cedar join whose issue
promis britain peac plenti

well

although victor submit csar
and roman empir promising
to pay wont tribut which
w dissuad wick queen 
whom heaven justic 
have laid heavi hand 

soothsay 
the finger pow rs tune
th harmoni peac the vision
which i made known luciu ere stroke
of yet scarc cold battl instant
i full accomplish roman eagl 
from south west wing soar aloft 
lessen beam th sun
so vanish foreshow princ eagl 
th imperi csar csar unite
hi favour radiant cymbelin 
which shine west 

cymbelin 
laud god 
and let crook smoke climb nostrils
from bless altar publish peace
to subject set forward let
a roman british ensign wave
friendli togeth so lud town march 
and templ great jupiter
our peac ratifi seal feast 
set never war ceas 
ere bloodi hand wash peac 

 _exeunt _

he 

francisco

 ti struck twelv get thee bed francisco 

francisco 
for relief much thank ti bitter cold 
and i sick heart 

barnardo 
have quiet guard 

francisco 
not mous stir

if meet horatio marcellu 
the rival watch bid make hast

a piec 

barnardo

what thing appear tonight 

barnardo 
i seen noth 

marcellu 
horatio say ti fantasi 
and let belief take hold him
touch dread sight twice seen us 
therefor i entreat along
with us watch minut night 
that apparit come
h may approv eye speak 

horatio 
tush tush twill appear 

barnardo 
sit awhil 
and let us assail ear 
that fortifi stori 
what two night seen 

horatio 
well sit 
and let us hear barnardo speak 

barnardo 
last night 
when yond star westward pole 
had made cours illum part heaven
wher burn marcellu 
the bell beat one 

marcellu 
peac break thee look come 

 enter ghost 

barnardo 
in figur like king dead 

marcellu 
thou art scholar speak horatio 

barnardo 
look like king mark horatio 

horatio 
most like it harrow fear wonder 

barnardo
it would spoke 

marcellu

togeth fair warlik form
in majesti buri denmark
did sometim march by heaven i charg thee speak

it offend 

barnardo 
see stalk away

 _exit ghost _ 

marcellu 
 ti gone answer 

barnardo 
how horatio you trembl look pale 
i someth fantasi 
what think 

horatio 
befor god i might believe
without sensibl true avouch
of mine eye 

marcellu 
i like king 

horatio 
a thou art thyself 
such armour on
when th ambiti norway combat 
so frown angri parle
h smote sled polack ice 
 ti strang 

marcellu 
thu twice jump dead hour 
with martial stalk hath gone watch 

horatio 
in particular thought work i know 
but gross scope opinion 
thi bode strang erupt state 

marcellu 
good sit tell know 
whi strict observ watch
so nightli toil subject land 
and daili cast brazen cannon
and foreign mart implement war 
whi impress shipwright whose sore task
do divid sunday week 
what might toward sweati haste
doth make night joint labour day 
who inform 

horatio 
that i 
at least whisper goe our last king 
whose imag even appear us 
wa know fortinbra norway 
thereto prick emul pride 
dar combat valiant hamlet 
for side known world esteem 
did slay fortinbra seal compact 
well ratifi law heraldri 
did forfeit life lands
which stood seiz conqueror 
against moieti competent
wa gage king return d
to inherit fortinbra 
had vanquish cov nant
and carriag articl design 
hi fell hamlet now sir young fortinbra 
of unimprov mettl hot full 
hath skirt norway 
shark list lawless resolut 
for food diet enterprise
that hath stomach 
a doth well appear unto state 
but recov us strong hand
and term compulsatori foresaid lands
so father lost and i take 
i main motiv prepar 
the sourc watch chief head
of post hast rummag land 

barnardo 
i think e en 
well may sort portent figure
com arm watch like king
that question war 

horatio 
a mote troubl mind eye 
in high palmi state rome 
a littl ere mightiest juliu fell 
the grave stood tenantless sheet dead
did squeak gibber roman street 
a star train fire dew blood 
disast sun moist star 
upon whose influenc neptun empir stand 
wa sick almost doomsday eclips 
and even like precurs fierc event 
a harbing preced still fates
and prologu omen come 
have heaven earth togeth demonstrated
unto climatur countrymen 

 re enter ghost 

but soft behold lo come 
i cross though blast stay illus 
if thou hast sound use voic 
speak 
if good thing done 
that may thee eas grace 
speak 
if thou art privi thi countri fate 
which happili foreknow may avoid 
o speak 
or thou hast uphoard thi life
extort treasur womb earth 
for say spirit oft walk death 
speak stay speak 

 _the cock crow _ 

stop marcellu 

marcellu 
shall i strike partisan

do stand 

barnardo 
 ti 

horatio 
 ti 

 _exit ghost _ 

marcellu 
 ti gone 
we wrong majest 
to offer show violenc 
for air invulner 
and vain blow malici mockeri 

barnardo 
it speak cock crew 

horatio 
and start like guilti thing
upon fear summon i heard
th cock trumpet morn 
doth lofti shrill sound throat
awak god day warn 
whether sea fire earth air 
th extravag er spirit hies
to confin and truth herein
thi present object made probat 

marcellu 
it fade crow cock 
some say ever gainst season comes
wherein saviour birth celebr 
the bird dawn singeth night long 
and say spirit dare stir abroad 
the night wholesom planet strike 
no fairi take witch hath power charm 
so hallow graciou time 

horatio 
so i heard part believ 
but look morn russet mantl clad 
walk er dew yon high eastward hill 
break watch advic 
let us impart seen tonight
unto young hamlet upon life 
thi spirit dumb us speak 
do consent shall acquaint 
a need love fit duti 

marcellu 
let i pray i morn know
wher shall find conveni 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii elsinor a room state castl 

 enter claudiu king denmark gertrud queen hamlet poloniu 
 laert voltemand 
corneliu lord attend 

king 
though yet hamlet dear brother death
th memori green us befitted
to bear heart grief whole kingdom
to contract one brow woe 
yet far hath discret fought nature
that wisest sorrow think 
togeth remembr 
therefor sometim sister queen 
th imperi jointress warlik state 
have twere defeat joy 
with one auspici one drop eye 
with mirth funer dirg marriag 
in equal scale weigh delight dole 
taken wife herein barr d
your better wisdom freeli gone
with affair along for thank 
now follow know young fortinbra 
hold weak suppos worth 
or think late dear brother death
our state disjoint frame 
colleagu dream advantag 
he hath fail pester us messag 
import surrend lands
lost father bond law 
to valiant brother so much 
now ourself time meet 
thu much busi writ
to norway uncl young fortinbra 
who impot bed rid scarc hears
of nephew purpos suppress
hi gait herein levi 
the list full proport made
out subject dispatch
y good corneliu voltemand 
for bearer greet old norway 
give person power
to busi king scope
of dilat articl allow 
farewel let hast commend duti 

corneliu voltemand 
in thing show duti 

king 
we doubt noth heartili farewel 

 _exeunt voltemand corneliu _ 

and laert news 
you told us suit what laert 
you can not speak reason dane 
and lose voic what wouldst thou beg laert 
that shall offer thi ask 
the head nativ heart 
the hand instrument mouth 
than throne denmark thi father 
what wouldst thou laert 

laert 
dread lord 
your leav favour return franc 
from whenc though willingli i came denmark
to show duti coron 
yet i must confess duti done 
mi thought wish bend toward franc 
and bow graciou leav pardon 

king 
have father leav what say poloniu 

poloniu 
he hath lord wrung slow leave
bi laboursom petit last
upon i seal hard consent 
i beseech give leav go 

king 
take thi fair hour laert time thine 
and thi best grace spend thi 
but cousin hamlet son 

hamlet 
 _asid _ a littl kin less kind 

king 
how cloud still hang 

hamlet 
not lord i much sun 

queen 
good hamlet cast thi night colour 
and let thine eye look like friend denmark 
do ever thi vail lids
seek thi nobl father dust 
thou know st ti common live must die 
pass natur etern 

hamlet 
ay madam common 

queen 
if 
whi seem particular thee 

hamlet 
seem madam nay i know seem 
 ti alon inki cloak good mother 
nor customari suit solemn black 
nor windi suspir forc breath 
no fruit river eye 
nor deject haviour visag 
togeth form mood show grief 
that denot truli these inde seem 
for action man might play 
but i within passeth show 
these trap suit woe 

king 
 ti sweet commend natur hamlet 
to give mourn duti father 
but must know father lost father 
that father lost lost survivor bound
in filial oblig term
to obsequi sorrow but persevere
in obstin condol course
of impiou stubborn ti unmanli grief 
it show incorrect heaven 
a heart unfortifi mind impati 
an understand simpl unschool 
for know must common
a vulgar thing sens 
whi peevish opposition
tak heart fie ti fault heaven 
a fault dead fault natur 
to reason absurd whose common theme
i death father still hath cri 
from first cors till die today 
 thi must we pray throw earth
thi unprevail woe think us
a father let world take note
y immedi throne 
and less nobil love
than dearest father bear son
do i impart toward for intent
in go back school wittenberg 
it retrograd desir 
and beseech bend remain
her cheer comfort eye 
our chiefest courtier cousin son 

queen 
let thi mother lose prayer hamlet 
i pray thee stay us go wittenberg 

hamlet 
i shall best obey madam 

king 
whi ti love fair repli 
be ourself denmark madam come 
thi gentl unforc accord hamlet
sit smile heart grace whereof 
no jocund health denmark drink today
but great cannon cloud shall tell 
and king rous heaven shall bruit 
re speak earthli thunder come away 

 _exeunt hamlet _ 

hamlet 
o solid flesh would melt 
thaw resolv dew 
or everlast fix d
hi canon gainst self slaughter o god o god 
how weari stale flat unprofitable
seem use world 
fie oh fie ti unweed garden
that grow seed thing rank gross nature
possess mere that come 
but two month dead nay much two 
so excel king this
hyperion satyr love mother 
that might beteem wind heaven
visit face roughli heaven earth 
must i rememb whi would hang him
a increas appetit grown
bi fed yet within month 
let think frailti thi name woman 
a littl month ere shoe old
with follow poor father body
lik niob tear whi even 
o god a beast want discours reason
would mourn longer marri mine uncl 
mi father brother like father
than i hercul within month 
ere yet salt unright tears
had left flush gall eye 
she marri o wick speed post
with dexter incestu sheet 
it can not come good 
but break heart i must hold tongu 

 enter horatio marcellu barnardo 

horatio 
hail lordship

horatio i forget

the lord 
and poor servant ever

sir good friend 
i chang name 
and make wittenberg horatio 
marcellu

a truant disposit good lord

nor shall ear violenc 
to make truster report
against i know truant 
but affair elsinor 
we teach drink deep ere depart

i think see mother wed

inde lord follow hard upon

season admir while
with attent ear till i may deliver
upon wit gentlemen
thi marvel

for god love let hear

two night togeth gentlemen 
marcellu barnardo watch
in dead wast middl night 
been thu encount a figur like father 
arm point exactli cap  pie

go slow state thrice walk d
bi oppress fear surpris eye 
within truncheon length whilst distil d
almost jelli act fear 
stand dumb speak thi me
in dread secreci impart 
and i third night kept watch 
where deliv time 
form thing word made true good 
the apparit come i knew father 
these hand like

but

and vanish sight

to let know

 _exeunt horatio marcellu barnardo _ 

mi father spirit arm all well 
i doubt foul play would night come 
till sit still soul foul deed rise 
though earth erwhelm men eye 

 _exit _ 

scene iii a room poloniu hous 

 enter laert ophelia 

laert 
mi necessari embark farewel 
and sister wind give benefit
and convoy assist sleep 
but let hear 

ophelia 
do doubt 

laert 
for hamlet trifl favour 
hold fashion toy blood 
a violet youth primi natur 
forward perman sweet last 
the perfum supplianc minut 
no 

ophelia 
no 

laert 
think 
for natur crescent grow alone
in thew bulk templ wax 
the inward servic mind soul
grow wide withal perhap love 
and soil cautel doth besmirch
th virtu must fear 
hi great weigh 
for subject birth 
he may unvalu person 
carv choic depends
th sanctiti health whole state 
and therefor must choic circumscrib d
unto voic yield body
whereof head then say love 
it fit wisdom far believ it
a particular act place
may give say deed further
than main voic denmark goe withal 
then weigh loss honour may sustain
if credent ear list song 
or lose heart chast treasur open
to unmast importun 
fear ophelia fear dear sister 
and keep rear affect 
out shot danger desir 
the chariest maid prodig enough
if unmask beauti moon 
virtu scope calumni stroke 
the canker gall infant spring
too oft button disclo 
and morn liquid dew youth
contagi blastment immin 
be wari best safeti lie fear 
youth rebel though none els near 

ophelia 
i shall th effect good lesson keep
a watchman heart but good brother 
do ungraci pastor 
show steep thorni way heaven 
whilst like puff reckless libertine
himself primros path dallianc tread 
and reck rede 

laert 
o fear 
i stay long but father come 

 enter poloniu 

a doubl bless doubl grace 
occas smile upon second leav 

poloniu 
yet laert aboard aboard shame 
the wind sit shoulder sail 
and stay there bless 

 _lay hand laert head _ 

and precept thi memory
look thou charact give thi thought tongu 
nor unproport thought act 
be thou familiar mean vulgar 
those friend thou hast adopt tri 
grappl unto thi soul hoop steel 
but dull thi palm entertainment
of new hatch unfledg comrad beware
of entranc quarrel 
bear th oppos may bewar thee 
give everi man thine ear thi voic 
take man censur reserv thi judgment 
costli thi habit thi purs buy 
but express fanci rich gaudi 
for apparel oft proclaim man 
and franc best rank station
ar select gener chief 
neither borrow lender 
for loan oft lose friend 
and borrow dull edg husbandri 
thi thine self true 
and must follow night day 
thou canst fals man 
farewel bless season thee 

laert 
most humbl i take leav lord 

poloniu 
the time invit go servant tend 

laert 
farewel ophelia rememb well
what i said 

ophelia 
 ti memori lock 
and shall keep key 

laert 
farewel 

 _exit _ 

poloniu 
what ophelia hath said 

ophelia 
so pleas someth touch lord hamlet 

poloniu 
marri well bethought 
 ti told hath oft late
given privat time yourself
hav audienc free bounteou 
if ti put 
and way caution i must tell you
you understand clearly
a behov daughter honour 
what give truth 

ophelia 
he hath lord late made mani tenders
of affect 

poloniu 
affect pooh you speak like green girl 
unsift peril circumst 
do believ tender call 

ophelia 
i know lord i think 

poloniu 
marri i teach think babi 
that ta en tender true pay 
which sterl tender dearli 
or crack wind poor phrase 
roam thu tender fool 

ophelia 
mi lord hath importun love
in honour fashion 

poloniu 
ay fashion may call go go 

ophelia 
and hath given counten speech lord 
with almost holi vow heaven 

poloniu 
ay spring catch woodcock i know 
when blood burn prodig soul
lend tongu vow blaze daughter 
give light heat extinct 
even promis make 
you must take fire from time
b someth scanter maiden presenc 
set entreat higher rate
than command parley for lord hamlet 
believ much young 
and larger tether may walk
than may given in ophelia 
do believ vow broker 
not dye invest show 
but mere implor unholi suit 
breath like sanctifi piou bawd 
the better beguil thi 
i would plain term time forth
hav slander moment leisure
a give word talk lord hamlet 
look i charg come way 

ophelia 
i shall obey lord 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iv the platform 

 enter hamlet horatio marcellu 

hamlet 
the air bite shrewdli cold 

horatio 
it nip eager air 

hamlet 
what hour 

horatio 
i think lack twelv 

marcellu 
no struck 

horatio 
inde i heard it draw near season
wherein spirit held wont walk 

 _a flourish trumpet ordnanc shot within _ 

what mean lord 

hamlet 
the king doth wake tonight take rous 
keep wassail swagger upspr reel 
and drain draught rhenish 
the kettl drum trumpet thu bray out
th triumph pledg 

horatio 
i custom 

hamlet 
ay marri 
and mind though i nativ 
and manner born custom
mor honour breach observ 
thi heavi head revel east west
mak us traduc tax nation 
they clepe us drunkard swinish phrase
soil addit inde takes
from achiev though perform height 
the pith marrow attribut 
so oft chanc particular men
that viciou mole natur 
a birth wherein guilti 
sinc natur can not choos origin 
bi ergrowth complexion 
oft break pale fort reason 
or habit much erleavens
th form plausiv manner men 
carri i say stamp one defect 
be natur liveri fortun star 
hi virtu els pure grace 
a infinit man may undergo 
shall gener censur take corruption
from particular fault the dram evil
doth nobl substanc often doubt
to scandal 

horatio 
look lord come 

 enter ghost 

hamlet 
angel minist grace defend us 
be thou spirit health goblin damn 
bring thee air heaven blast hell 
be thi intent wick charit 
thou com st question shape
that i speak thee i call thee hamlet 
king father royal dane o answer 
let burst ignor tell
whi thi canoniz bone hears death 
have burst cerement sepulchr 
wherein saw thee quietli inurn 
hath op ponder marbl jaws
to cast thee what may mean 
that thou dead cors complet steel 
revisit st thu glimps moon 
make night hideou fool nature
so horridli shake disposition
with thought beyond reach soul 
say wherefor what 

 _ghost beckon hamlet _ 

horatio 
it beckon go away 
a impart desire
to alon 

marcellu 
look courteou action
it wave remov ground 
but go 

horatio 
no mean 

hamlet 
it speak i follow 

horatio 
do lord 

hamlet 
whi fear 
i set life pin fee 
and soul 
be thing immort 
it wave forth i follow 

horatio 
what tempt toward flood lord 
or dread summit cliff
that beetl er base sea 
and assum horribl form
which might depriv sovereignti reason 
and draw mad think 
the place put toy desper 
without motiv everi brain
that look mani fadom sea
and hear roar beneath 

hamlet 
it wave still 
go i follow thee 

marcellu 
you shall go lord 

hamlet 
hold hand 

horatio 
be rul shall go 

hamlet 
mi fate cri 
and make petti arteri body
a hardi nemean lion nerv 

 _ghost beckon _ 

still i call unhand gentlemen 

 _break free _ 

bi heaven i make ghost let 
i say away go i follow thee 

 _exeunt ghost hamlet _

marcellu

 _exeunt _ 

scene v a remot part castl 

 enter ghost hamlet

i

when i sulph rou torment flames
must render

to i shall unfold

hamlet 
what 

ghost 
i thi father spirit 
doom certain term walk night 
and day confin fast fire 
till foul crime done day nature
ar burnt purg away but i forbid
to tell secret prison hous 
i could tale unfold whose lightest word
would harrow thi soul freez thi young blood 
make thi two eye like star start sphere 
thi knot combin lock part 
and particular hair stand end
lik quill upon fret porcupin 
but etern blazon must be
to ear flesh blood list list o list 
if thou didst ever thi dear father love 

hamlet 
o god 

ghost 
reveng foul unnatur murder 

hamlet 
murder 

ghost 
murder foul best 
but foul strang unnatur 

hamlet 
hast know i wing swift
a medit thought love
may sweep reveng 

ghost 
i find thee apt 
and duller shouldst thou fat weed
that rot eas leth wharf 
wouldst thou stir now hamlet hear 
 ti given sleep orchard 
a serpent stung whole ear denmark
i forg process death
rankli abu know thou nobl youth 
the serpent sting thi father life
now wear crown 

hamlet 
o prophet soul 
mine uncl 

ghost 
ay incestu adulter beast 
with witchcraft wit traitor gift 
o wick wit gift power
so seduc shame lust
th seem virtuou queen 
o hamlet fall 
from whose love dignity
that went hand hand even vow
i made marriag decline
upon wretch whose natur gift poor
to mine but virtu never mov 
though lewd court shape heaven 
so lust though radiant angel link 
will sate celesti bed
and prey garbag 
but soft methink i scent morn air 
brief let sleep within orchard 
mi custom alway afternoon 
upon secur hour thi uncl stole
with juic curs hebenon vial 
and porch ear pour
th leper distil whose effect
hold enmiti blood man
that swift quicksilv cours through
th natur gate alley bodi 
and sudden vigour doth posset
and curd like eager drop milk 
the thin wholesom blood so mine 
and instant tetter bark 
most lazar like vile loathsom crust
al smooth bodi 
thu i sleep brother hand 
of life crown queen dispatch 
cut even blossom sin 
unhou led disappoint unanel 
no reckon made sent account
with imperfect head 
o horribl o horribl horribl 
if thou hast natur thee bear 
let royal bed denmark be
a couch luxuri damn incest 
but howsoev thou pursu st act 
taint thi mind let thi soul contrive
against thi mother aught leav heaven 
and thorn bosom lodg 
to prick sting fare thee well 
the glow worm show matin near 
and gin pale uneffectu fire 
adieu adieu adieu hamlet rememb 

 _exit _ 

hamlet 
o host heaven o earth what els 
and shall i coupl hell o fie hold heart 
and sinew grow instant old 
but bear stiffli rememb thee 
ay thou poor ghost memori hold seat
in distract globe rememb thee 
yea tabl memory
i wipe away trivial fond record 
all saw book form pressur past 
that youth observ copi 
and thi command alon shall live
within book volum brain 
unmix baser matter ye heaven 
o pernici woman 
o villain villain smile damn villain 
mi tabl meet i set 
that one may smile smile villain 
at least i sure may denmark

so uncl now word 
it adieu adieu rememb 
i sworn

hamlet

there thing heaven earth horatio 
than dreamt philosophi but come 
here never help merci 
how strang odd soe er i bear 
a i perchanc hereaft shall think meet
to put antic disposit 
that time see never shall 
with arm encumb thu head shake 
or pronounc doubt phrase 
a well know we could would 
or if list speak there might 
or ambigu give note
that know aught 
so grace merci need help 
swear 

ghost 
 _beneath _ swear 

hamlet

with love i commend 
and poor man hamlet is
may express love friend 
god will shall lack let us go togeth 
and still finger lip i pray 
the time joint o curs spite 
that ever i born set right 
nay come let go togeth

to youth liberti

 enter ophelia 

how ophelia matter 

ophelia

poloniu 
with name god 

ophelia 
mi lord i sew chamber 
lord hamlet doublet unbrac 
no hat upon head stock foul 
ungart red gyve ankl 
pale shirt knee knock 
and look piteou purport
a loos hell
to speak horror come

mad thi love 

ophelia 
mi lord i know truli i fear 

poloniu 
what said 

ophelia 
he took wrist held hard 
then goe length arm 
and hand thu er brow 
he fall perus face
a would draw long stay 
at last littl shake mine arm 
and thrice head thu wave 
he rai sigh piteou profound
a seem shatter bulk
and end that done let go 
and head shoulder turn d
he seem find way without eye 
for door went without help 
and last bend light 

poloniu 
come go i go seek king 
thi ecstasi love 
whose violent properti fordo 
and lead desper undertak 
a oft passion heaven
that afflict natur i sorri 
what given hard word late 

ophelia 
no good lord command 
i repel letter denied
hi access 

poloniu 
that hath made mad 
i sorri better heed judgment
i quot i fear trifl 
and meant wreck thee but beshrew jealousi 
it seem proper age
to cast beyond opinions
a common younger sort
to lack discret come go king 
thi must known kept close might move
mor grief hide hate utter love

scene ii a room castl 

 enter king queen rosencrantz guildenstern attend 

king 
welcom dear rosencrantz guildenstern 
moreov much long see 
the need use provoke
our hasti send someth heard
of hamlet transform i call 
sinc th exterior inward man
resembl what 
more father death thu hath put him
so much th understand 
i can not dream i entreat both
that young day brought 
and sinc neighbour youth humour 
that vouchsaf rest court
som littl time companies
to draw pleasur gather 
so much occas may glean 
whether aught us unknown afflict thus
that open lie within remedi 

queen 
good gentlemen hath much talk 
and sure i two men living
to adher if pleas you
to show us much gentri good will
a expend time us awhil 
for suppli profit hope 
your visit shall receiv thanks
a fit king remembr 

rosencrantz 
both majesties
might sovereign power us 
put dread pleasur command
than entreati

and give full bent 
to lay servic freeli feet
to command

mi much chang son go 
and bring gentlemen hamlet

welcom good friend 
say voltemand brother norway 

voltemand

upon first sent suppress
hi nephew levi appear d
to prepar gainst polack 
but better look truli found
it high whereat griev 
that sick age impotence
wa fals born hand send arrests
on fortinbra brief obey

make vow uncl never more
to give th assay arm majesti 
whereon old norway overcom joy

and commiss employ soldiers
so levi polack 
with entreati herein shown

a therein set

most welcom home

that find caus effect

 enter four five player 

you welcom master welcom i glad see thee well 
welcom good friend o old friend thi face valanc sinc i
saw thee last com st thou beard denmark what young lady
and mistress by r ladi ladyship nearer heaven i
saw last altitud chopin pray god voic like a
piec uncurr gold crack within ring master you
ar welcom we e en like french falcon fli anything
w see we speech straight come give us tast your
qual come passion speech 

first player 
what speech lord 

hamlet 
i heard thee speak speech never act it
wa play i rememb pleas million 
 twa caviar gener but i receiv other 
whose judgment matter cri top mine excellent
play well digest scene set much modesti as
cun i rememb one said sallet line make
th matter savouri matter phrase might indit the
author affect call honest method wholesom as
sweet much handsom fine one speech i
chiefli love twa aenea tale dido thereabout it
especi speak priam slaughter if live your
memori begin line let see let see 
 _the rug pyrrhu like th hyrcanian beast _
it begin pyrrhu 
 _the rug pyrrhu whose sabl arm 
 black purpos night resemble
 when lay couch omin hors 
 hath dread black complexion smear d
 with heraldri dismal head foot
 now total gule horridli trick d
 with blood father mother daughter son 
 bak impast parch street 
 that lend tyrann damn light
 to vile murder roast wrath fire 
 and thu ersiz coagul gore 
 with eye like carbuncl hellish pyrrhus

 _anon find

 but whiff wind fell sword
 th unnerv father fall then senseless ilium 
 seem feel blow flame top

 which declin milki head
 of reverend priam seem th air stick 
 so paint tyrant pyrrhu stood 
 and like neutral matter

 a silenc heaven rack stand still 
 the bold wind speechless orb below
 as hush death anon dread thunder
 doth rend region pyrrhu paus

 and never cyclop hammer fall
 on mar armour forg proof etern

 now fall priam

 in gener synod take away power

hamlet 
ay god b wi ye now i alon 
o rogu peasant slave i 
i monstrou player 
but fiction dream passion 
could forc soul conceit
that work visag wan 
tear eye distract aspect 
a broken voic whole function suiting
with form conceit and noth 
for hecuba 
what hecuba hecuba 
that weep what would 
had motiv cue passion
that i he would drown stage tears
and cleav gener ear horrid speech 
make mad guilti appal free 
confound ignor amaz inde 
the faculti eye ear yet i 
a dull muddi mettl rascal peak
lik john dream unpregn caus 
and say noth no king
upon whose properti dear life
a damn defeat made am i coward 
who call villain break pate across 
pluck beard blow face 
tweak nose give lie th throat
a deep lung who 
ha swound i take can not be
but i pigeon liver lack gall
to make oppress bitter ere this
i fat region kites
with slave offal bloodi bawdi villain 
remorseless treacher lecher kindless villain 
oh vengeanc 
whi ass i thi brave 
that i son dear father murder 
prompt reveng heaven hell 
must like whore unpack heart words
and fall curs like drab 
a scullion fie upon foh 
about brain i heard
that guilti creatur sit play 
have cun scene 
been struck soul presently
they proclaim malefact 
for murder though tongu speak
with miracul organ i players
play someth like murder father
befor mine uncl i observ look 
i tent quick if blench 
i know cours the spirit i seen
may devil devil hath power
t assum pleas shape yea perhaps
out weak melancholi 
a potent spirit 
abus damn i grounds
mor rel the play thing
wherein i catch conscienc king

act iii

of true state

 enter hamlet 

hamlet 
to question 
whether ti nobler mind suffer
th sling arrow outrag fortun 
or take arm sea troubl 
and oppos end to die sleep 
no sleep say end
th heart ach thousand natur shocks
that flesh heir ti consummation
devoutli wish to die sleep 
to sleep perchanc dream ay rub 
for sleep death dream may come 
when shuffl mortal coil 
must give us paus there respect
that make calam long life 
for would bear whip scorn time 
the oppressor wrong proud man contum 
the pang dispriz love law delay 
the insol offic spurns
that patient merit unworthi take 
when might quietu make
with bare bodkin who would fardel bear 
to grunt sweat weari life 
but dread someth death 
the undiscov countri whose bourn
no travel return puzzl 
and make us rather bear ill have
than fli other know 
thu conscienc make coward us 
and thu nativ hue resolution
i sickli er pale cast thought 
and enterpris great pith moment 
with regard current turn awry
and lose name action soft 
the fair ophelia nymph thi orisons
b sin rememb

ophelia

the courtier soldier scholar eye tongu sword 
th expect rose fair state 
the glass fashion mould form

blast ecstasi o woe 
t seen i seen see i see 

 enter king poloniu 

king 
love hi affect way tend 
nor spake though lack form littl 
wa like mad there someth soul
o er melancholi sit brood 
and i doubt hatch disclose
wil danger prevent 
i quick determination
thu set shall speed england
for demand neglect tribut 
hapli sea countri differ 
with variabl object shall expel
thi someth settl matter heart 
whereon brain still beat put thus
from fashion what think 

poloniu 
it shall well but yet i believe
th origin commenc grief
sprung neglect love how ophelia 
you need tell us lord hamlet said 
we heard my lord pleas 
but hold fit play 
let queen mother alon entreat him
to show grief let round 
and i plac pleas ear
of confer if find 
to england send confin where
your wisdom best shall think 

king 
it shall 
mad great one must unwatch go

 enter king queen 

player king 
full thirti time hath phoebu cart gone round
neptun salt wash tellu orb ground 
and thirti dozen moon borrow sheen
about world time twelv thirti 
sinc love heart hymen hands
unit commutu sacr band 

player queen 
so mani journey may sun moon
mak us count er ere love done 
but woe sick late 
so far cheer former state 
that i distrust yet though i distrust 
discomfort lord noth must 
for women fear love hold quantiti 
in neither aught extrem 
now love proof hath made know 
and love siz fear 
where love great littlest doubt fear 
where littl fear grow great great love grow 

player king 
faith i must leav thee love shortli 
mi oper power function leav 
and thou shalt live fair world behind 
honour belov hapli one kind
for husband shalt thou 

player queen 
o confound rest 
such love must need treason breast 
in second husband let accurst 
none wed second kill first 

hamlet 
 _asid _ wormwood wormwood 

player queen 
the instanc second marriag move
ar base respect thrift none love 
a second time i kill husband dead 
when second husband kiss bed 

player king 
i believ think speak 
but determin oft break 
purpos slave memori 
of violent birth poor valid 
which like fruit unrip stick tree 
but fall unshaken mellow 
most necessari ti forget
to pay debt 
what passion propos 
the passion end doth purpos lose 
the violenc either grief joy
their enactur destroy 
where joy revel grief doth lament 
grief joy joy griev slender accid 
thi world aye ti strange
that even love fortun chang 
for ti question left us yet prove 
whether love lead fortun els fortun love 
the great man mark favourit fli 
the poor advanc make friend enemi 
and hitherto doth love fortun tend 
for need shall never lack friend 
and want hollow friend doth tri 
directli season enemi 
but orderli end i begun 
our will fate contrari run
that devic still overthrown 
our thought end none 
so think thou wilt second husband wed 
but die thi thought thi first lord dead 

player queen 
nor earth give food heaven light 
sport repos lock day night 
to desper turn trust hope 
an anchor cheer prison scope 
each opposit blank face joy 
meet i would well destroy 
both henc pursu last strife 
if widow ever i wife 

hamlet 
 _to ophelia _ if break 

player king 
 ti deepli sworn sweet leav awhil 
mi spirit grow dull fain i would beguile
th tediou day sleep

and never come mischanc us twain

 _exeunt hamlet _ 

 ti witch time night 
when churchyard yawn hell breath out
contagion world now could i drink hot blood 
and bitter busi day
would quak look soft mother 
o heart lose thi natur let ever
th soul nero enter firm bosom 
let cruel unnatur 
i speak dagger use none 
mi tongu soul hypocrit 
how word somev shent 
to give seal never soul consent 

 _exit _ 

scene iii a room castl 

 enter king rosencrantz guildenstern 

king 
i like stand safe us
to let mad rang therefor prepar 
i commiss forthwith dispatch 
and england shall along 
the term estat may endure
hazard near us doth hourli grow
out lunaci 

guildenstern 
we provid 
most holi religi fear is
to keep mani mani bodi safe
that live feed upon majesti 

rosencrantz 
the singl peculiar life bound
with strength armour mind 
to keep noyanc much more
that spirit upon whose weal depend rest
th live mani the ceas majesty
di alon like gulf doth draw
what near it massi wheel
fix summit highest mount 
to whose huge spoke ten thousand lesser things
ar morti adjoin fall 
each small annex petti consequ 
attend boist rou ruin never alone
did king sigh gener groan 

king 
arm i pray speedi voyag 
for fetter put upon fear 
which goe free foot 

rosencrantz guildenstern 
we hast us 

 _exeunt rosencrantz guildenstern _ 

 enter poloniu 

poloniu 
mi lord go mother closet 
behind arra i convey myself
to hear process i warrant tax home 
and said wise said 
 ti meet audienc mother 
sinc natur make partial erhear
th speech vantag fare well lieg 
i call upon ere go bed 
and tell i know 

king 
thank dear lord 

 _exit poloniu _ 

o offenc rank smell heaven 
it hath primal eldest curs upon 
a brother murder pray i 
though inclin sharp 
mi stronger guilt defeat strong intent 
and like man doubl busi bound 
i stand paus i shall first begin 
and neglect what curs hand
wer thicker brother blood 
i rain enough sweet heavens
to wash white snow whereto serv mercy
but confront visag offenc 
and prayer twofold forc 
to forestal ere come fall 
or pardon then i look 
mi fault past but o form prayer
can serv turn forgiv foul murder 
that can not sinc i still possess d
of effect i murder 
mi crown mine ambit queen 
may one pardon retain th offenc 
in corrupt current world
off gild hand may shove justic 
and oft ti seen wick prize itself
buy law but ti 
there shuffl action lies
in true natur compel d
even teeth forehead fault 
to give evid what what rest 
tri repent what 
yet one can not repent 
o wretch state o bosom black death 
o lime soul struggl free 
art engag help angel make assay 
bow stubborn knee heart string steel 
be soft sinew new born babe 
all may well 

 _retir kneel _ 

 enter hamlet 

hamlet 
now might i pat pray 
and i and goe heaven 
and i reveng that would scann 
a villain kill father that
i sole son villain send
to heaven o hire salari reveng 
he took father grossli full bread 
with crime broad blown flush may 
and audit stand know save heaven 
but circumst cours thought 
 ti heavi and i reveng 
to take purg soul 
when fit season passag no 
up sword know thou horrid hent 
when drunk asleep rage 
or th incestu pleasur bed 
at game swear act
that relish salvat 
then trip heel may kick heaven 
and soul may damn black
a hell whereto goe my mother stay 
thi physic prolong thi sickli day

to give world assur man 
thi husband look follow

blast wholesom brother have eye

th hey day blood tame humbl

would step sens sure

nor sens ecstaci ne er thrall d

to serv differ what devil t
that thu hath cozen hoodman blind

ear without hand eye smell san 
or sickli part one true sense

rebelli hell

to flame youth let virtu wax 
and melt fire proclaim shame
when compuls ardour give charg 
sinc frost activ doth burn 
and reason pander

that trespass mad speak

whilst rank corrupt mine within 
infect unseen confess heaven

and either curb devil throw out
with wondrou potenc onc good night 
and desir ble

 _exeunt hamlet _ 

how occas inform 
and spur dull reveng what man
if chief good market time
b sleep feed a beast 
sure made us larg discours 
look gave us not
that capabl godlik reason
to fust us unu now whether be
besti oblivion craven scruple
of think precis th event 
a thought quarter hath one part wisdom
and ever three part coward i know
whi yet i live say thing 
sith i caus strength means
to exampl gross earth exhort 
wit armi mass charg 
led delic tender princ 
whose spirit divin ambit puff 
make mouth invis event 
expos mortal unsure
to fortun death danger dare 
even eggshel rightli great
i stir without great argument 
but greatli find quarrel straw
when honour stake how stand i 
that father kill mother stain 
excit reason blood 
and let sleep shame i see
th immin death twenti thousand men
that fantasi trick fame 
go grave like bed fight plot
whereon number can not tri caus 
which tomb enough continent
to hide slain o time forth 
mi thought bloodi noth worth

 _exit horatio _ 

o poison deep grief springs
al father death o gertrud gertrud 
when sorrow come come singl spi 
but battalion first father slain 
next son gone violent author
of remov peopl muddi 
thick unwholesom thought whispers
for good poloniu death done greenly
in hugger mugger inter poor ophelia
divid fair judgment 
without pictur mere beast 
last much contain 
her brother secret come franc 
feed wonder keep cloud 
and want buzzer infect ear
with pestil speech father death 
wherein necess matter beggar 
will noth stick person arraign
in ear ear o dear gertrud 
like murder piec mani places
g superflu death

horatio 
 _read _ horatio thou shalt overlook give these
fellow mean king they letter ere were
two day old sea pirat warlik appoint gave us
chas find slow sail put compelled
valour grappl i board on instant got
clear ship i alon becam prison they dealt
with like thiev merci but knew i do
a good turn let king letter i sent and
repair thou much hast thou wouldst fli death i have
word speak thine ear make thee dumb yet much too
light bore matter these good fellow bring thee
wher i rosencrantz guildenstern hold cours england 
of i much tell thee farewel 
 he thou knowest thine 
 hamlet 

come i give way letter 
and speedier may direct me

and i aim

for perfect but reveng come

and think pastim you shortli shall hear

and i hope teach imagin

laert 
it hamlet hamlet thou art slain 
no medicin world thee good 
in thee half hour life 
the treacher instrument thi hand

hath turn lo i lie

 _di _ 

hamlet

that mute audienc act 
had i time fell sergeant death 
i strict arrest o i could tell 
but let horatio i dead 
thou liv st report caus aright
to unsatisfi 

horatio 
never believ 
i antiqu roman dane 
here yet liquor left 

hamlet 
a th art man 
give cup let go heaven i 
o good horatio wound name 
thing stand thu unknown shall live behind 
if thou didst ever hold thi heart 
absent thee felic awhil 
and harsh world draw thi breath pain 
to tell stori

what warlik nois 

osric

to ambassador england gives
thi warlik volley 

hamlet

i can not live hear news england 
but i prophesi th elect lights

so tell occurr less 
which solicit the rest silenc

 enter fortinbra english ambassador other 

fortinbra 
where sight

what would see 
if aught woe wonder ceas search 

fortinbra 
thi quarri cri havoc o proud death 
what feast toward thine etern cell 
that thou mani princ shot
so bloodili hast struck 

first ambassador 
the sight dismal 
and affair england come late 
the ear senseless give us hear 
to tell command fulfil 
that rosencrantz guildenstern dead 
where thank 

horatio 
not mouth 
had th abil life thank 
he never gave command death 
but sinc jump upon bloodi question 
you polack war england
ar arriv give order bodies
high stage place view 
and let speak th yet unknow world
how thing came so shall hear
of carnal bloodi unnatur act 
of accident judgment casual slaughter 
of death put cun forc caus 
and upshot purpos mistook
fal n inventor head all i
truli deliv

i right memori kingdom 
which claim vantag doth invit

and mouth whose voic draw

even men mind wild lest mischance
on plot error happen

speak loudli

scene england wale 

act i

scen i london a room palac 

 enter king henri westmoreland sir walter blunt other 

king 
so shaken wan care 
find time fright peac pant 
and breath short wind accent new broils
to commenc strand afar remot 
no thirsti entranc soil
shal daub lip children blood 
no shall trench war channel field 
nor bruis floweret arm hoofs
of hostil pace oppos eye 
which like meteor troubl heaven 
all one natur one substanc bred 
did late meet intestin shock
and furiou close civil butcheri 
shall mutual well beseem rank 
march one way opposed
against acquaint kindr alli 
the edg war like ill sheath knife 
no shall cut master therefor friend 
a far sepulchr christ 
whose soldier whose bless cross
w impress engag fight 
forthwith power english shall levi 
to chase pagan holi fields
ov whose acr walk bless feet
which fourteen hundr year ago nail d
for advantag bitter cross 
but purpos twelvemonth old 
and bootless ti tell go 
therefor meet then let hear
of gentl cousin westmoreland 
what yesternight council decree
in forward dear expedi 

westmoreland 
mi lieg hast hot question 
and mani limit charg set down
but yesternight athwart came
a post wale loaden heavi news 
whose worst nobl mortim 
lead men herefordshir fight
against th irregular wild glendow 
wa rude hand welshman taken 
a thousand peopl butcher 
upon whose dead corps misus 
such beastli shameless transform 
bi welshwomen done may be
without much shame told spoken 

king 
it seem tide broil
brak busi holi land 

westmoreland 
thi match graciou lord 
for uneven unwelcom news
cam north thu import 
on holi rood day gallant hotspur 
young harri perci brave archibald 
that ever valiant approv scot 
at holmedon met 
where spend sad bloodi hour 
a discharg artilleri 
and shape likelihood news told 
for brought heat
and pride content take hors 
uncertain issu way 

king 
here dear true industri friend 
sir walter blunt new light hors 
stain variat soil
betwixt holmedon seat 
and hath brought us smooth welcom news 
the earl dougla discomfit 
ten thousand bold scot two twenti knight 
balk blood sir walter see
on holmedon plain prison hotspur took
mordak earl fife eldest son
to beaten dougla earl athol 
of murray angu menteith 
and honour spoil 
a gallant prize ha cousin 

westmoreland 
faith ti conquest princ boast 

king 
yea thou makest sad makest sin
in envi lord northumberland
should father blest son 
a son theme honour tongu 
amongst grove straightest plant 
who sweet fortun minion pride 
whilst i look prais 
see riot dishonour stain brow
of young harri o could proved
that night trip fairi exchanged
in cradl cloth children lay 
and call mine perci plantagenet 
then would i harri mine 
but let thought what think coz 
of young perci pride prison 
which adventur hath surpris 
to use keep send word 
i shall none mordak earl fife 

westmoreland 
thi uncl teach worcest 
malevol aspect 
which make prune bristl up
th crest youth digniti 

king 
but i sent answer 
and caus awhil must neglect
our holi purpos jerusalem 
cousin wednesday next council we
wil hold windsor inform lord 
but come speed us 
for said done
than anger utter 

westmoreland 
i lieg 

 exeunt 

scene ii the an apart princ henri 

 enter princ henri falstaff 

falstaff 
now hal time day lad 

princ 
thou art fat wit drink old sack unbutton thee
aft supper sleep upon bench noon thou hast
forgotten demand truli thou wouldst truli know what a
devil hast thou time day unless hour cups
of sack minut capon bless sun fair hot
wench flame colour taffeta i see reason thou shouldst be
so superflu demand time day 

falstaff 
inde come near hal take purs go the
moon seven star phoebu wander knight
so fair and i pr ythee sweet wag thou art king god save
thi grace majesti i say grace thou wilt none 

princ 
what none 

falstaff 
no troth much serv prologu egg and
butt 

princ 
well come roundli roundli 

falstaff 
marri sweet wag thou art king let us squires
of night bodi call thiev day beauti let us be
diana forest gentlemen shade minion moon let
men say men good govern govern sea by
our nobl chast mistress moon whose counten we
steal 

princ 
thou say st well hold well fortun us are
th moon men doth ebb flow like sea govern the
sea moon as proof a purs gold most
resolut snatch monday night dissolut spent on
tuesday morn got swear lay spent cri bring
in ill low ebb foot ladder in
a high flow ridg gallow 

falstaff 
bi lord thou say st true lad and hostess the
tavern sweet wench 

princ 
a honey hybla old lad castl and buff
jerkin sweet robe duranc 

falstaff 
how mad wag thi quip thi quidditi what
a plagu i buff jerkin 

princ 
whi pox i hostess tavern 

falstaff 
well thou hast call reckon mani time oft 

princ 
did i ever call thee pay thi part 

falstaff 
no i give thee thi due thou hast paid 

princ 
yea elsewher far coin would stretch would
not i use credit 

falstaff 
yea use appar thou art
heir appar but i pr ythee sweet wag shall gallows
stand england thou art king resolut thu fobb as
it rusti curb old father antic law do thou 
when thou art king hang thief 

princ 
no thou shalt 

falstaff 
shall i o rare by lord i brave judg 

princ 
thou judgest fals alreadi i mean thou shalt hang the
thiev becom rare hangman 

falstaff 
well hal well sort jump humour well as
wait court i tell 

princ 
for obtain suit 

falstaff 
yea obtain suit whereof hangman hath lean wardrob 
 sblood i melancholi gib cat lugg bear 

princ 
or old lion lover lute 

falstaff 
yea drone lincolnshir bagpip 

princ 
what say st thou hare melancholi moor ditch 

falstaff 
thou hast unsavouri simil art inde most
compar rascalliest sweet young princ but hal i pr ythee
troubl vaniti i would god thou i knew a
commod good name bought an old lord council
r day street sir i mark him
not yet talk wise i regard yet he
talk wise street 

princ 
thou didst well wisdom cri street man
regard 

falstaff 
o thou hast damnabl iter art inde abl corrupt a
saint thou hast done much harm upon hal god forgiv thee 
befor i knew thee hal i knew noth i man should
speak truli littl better one wick i must give over
thi life i give lord i i a
villain i damn never king son christendom 

princ 
where shall take purs morrow jack 

falstaff 
zound thou wilt lad i make one i call me
villain baffl 

princ 
i see good amend life thee pray purs take 

falstaff 
whi hal ti vocat hal ti sin man labour his
voc 

 enter poin 

poin 
now shall know gadshil set match o men be
sav merit hole hell hot enough thi the
most omnipot villain ever cri stand true man 

princ 
good morrow ned 

poin 
good morrow sweet hal what say monsieur remors say sir john
sack sugar jack agre devil thee thi soul 
that thou soldest good friday last cup madeira a
cold capon leg

princ

poin

of crown tarri home hang

go

you chop

camest blood royal thou darest stand ten
shil

well day i madcap

whi well said 

princ

falstaff 
bi lord i traitor thou art king 

princ 
i care 

poin 
sir john i pr ythee leav princ alon i lay him
down reason adventur shall go 

falstaff
