profit thou speakest may move hear may be
believ true princ may recreat sake prove false
thief poor abus time want counten farewel you
shal find eastcheap 

princ 
farewel thou latter spring farewel all hallown summer 

 exit falstaff 

poin 
now good sweet honey lord ride us morrow i jest
to execut i can not manag alon falstaff bardolph peto and
gadshil shall rob men alreadi waylaid yourself
and i booti i do
not rob cut head shoulder 

princ 
but shall part set forth 

poin 
whi set forth appoint place
of meet wherein pleasur fail they
adventur upon exploit shall sooner
achiev set upon 

princ 
ay ti like know us hors habit 
and everi appoint 

poin 
tut hors shall see i tie wood our
visard chang leav sirrah i cases
of buckram nonc immask note outward garment 

princ 
but i doubt hard us 

poin 
well two i know true bred coward ever
turn back third fight longer see reason 
i forswear arm the virtu jest the
incomprehens lie fat rogu tell us we
meet supper thirti least fought ward what
blow extrem endur reproof lie the
jest 

princ 
well i go thee provid us thing necessari meet me
to night eastcheap i sup farewel 

poin 
farewel lord 

 exit 

princ 
i know awhil uphold
th unyok humour idl 
yet herein i imit sun 
who doth permit base contagi clouds
to smother beauti world 
that pleas 
be want may wonder 
bi break foul ugli mists
of vapour seem strangl 
if year play holiday 
to sport would tediou work 
but seldom come wish come 
and noth pleaseth rare accid 
so loos behaviour i throw 
and pay debt i never promis 
bi much better word i 
bi much shall i falsifi men hope 
and like bright metal sullen ground 
mi reform glitter er fault 
shall show goodli attract eyes
than hath foil set 
i offend make offenc skill 
redeem time men think least i 

 exit 

scene iii the same a room palac 

 enter king henri northumberland worcest hotspur sir walter
blunt other 

king 
mi blood hath cold temper 
unapt stir indign 
and found accordingli 
you tread upon patienc sure
i henceforth rather 
mighti fear condit 
which hath smooth oil soft young 
and therefor lost titl respect
which proud soul ne er pay proud 

worcest 
our hous sovereign lieg littl deserves
th scourg great use 
and great hands
hav holp make portli 

northumberland 
mi good lord 

king 
worcest get thee gone i see
dang disobedi thine eye 
o sir presenc bold peremptori 
and majesti might never yet endure
th moodi frontier servant brow 
you good leav leav us need
your use counsel shall send 

 exit worcest 

 to northumberland 

you speak 

northumberland 
yea good lord 
those prison high name demand 
which harri perci holmedon took 
were say strength denied
a deliv majesti 
either envi therefor misprision
i guilti fault son 

hotspur 
mi lieg i deni prison 
but i rememb fight done 
when i dri rage extrem toil 
breathless faint lean upon sword 
came certain lord neat trimli dress 
fresh bridegroom chin new reap d
show like stubbl land harvest home 
he perfum like millin 
and twixt finger thumb held
a pouncet box ever anon
h gave nose took away 
who therewith angri next came 
took snuff still smile talk 
and soldier bore dead bodi 
he call untaught knave unmannerli 
to bring slovenli unhandsom corse
betwixt wind nobil 
with mani holiday ladi terms
h question amongst rest demanded
mi prison majesti behalf 
i smart wound cold 
out grief impatience
to pester popinjay 
answer neglectingli i know 
he made mad
to see shine brisk smell sweet 
and talk like wait gentlewoman
of gun drum wound god save mark 
and tell sovereign st thing earth
wa parmaceti inward bruis 
and great piti 
thi villain salt petr digg d
out bowel harmless earth 
which mani good tall fellow destroy d
so cowardli vile gun 
he would soldier 
thi bald unjoint chat lord 
i answer indirectli i said 
and i beseech let report
com current accusation
betwixt love high majesti 

blunt 
the circumst consid good lord 
whatev harri perci said
to person place 
at time rest told 
may reason die never rise
to wrong way impeach
what said unsay 

king 
whi yet doth deni prison 
but proviso except 
that charg shall ransom straight
hi brother law foolish mortim 
who soul hath wil betray d
the live lead fight
against great magician damn glendow 
whose daughter hear earl march
hath late marri shall coffer 
be empti redeem traitor home 
shall buy treason indent fears
when lost forfeit 
no barren mountain let starv 
for i shall never hold man friend
whos tongu shall ask one penni cost
to ransom home revolt mortim 

hotspur 
revolt mortim 
he never fall sovereign lieg 
but chanc war prove true
ne one tongu wound 
those mouth wound valiantli took 
when gentl severn sedgi bank 
in singl opposit hand hand 
he confound best part hour
in chang hardiment great glendow 
three time breath three time drink 
upon agreement swift severn flood 
who affright bloodi look 
ran fear among trembl reed 
and hid crisp head hollow bank
blood stain valiant combat 
never base rotten policy
colour work deadli wound 
nor never could nobl mortimer
rec mani willingli 
then let slander revolt 

king 
thou dost beli perci thou dost beli 
he never encount glendow 
i tell thee 
he durst well met devil alone
a owen glendow enemi 
art asham but sirrah henceforth
let hear speak mortim 
send prison speediest mean 
or shall hear kind me
a displeas my lord northumberland 
we licens departur son 
send us prison hear 

 exeunt king henri blunt train 

hotspur 
an devil come roar 
i send i straight 
and tell i els heart 
although hazard head 

northumberland 
what drunk choler stay paus awhil 
here come uncl 

 re enter worcest 

hotspur 
speak mortim 
zound i speak let soul
want merci i join 
yea part i empti vein 
and shed dear blood drop drop dust 
but i lift trod mortimer
a high air unthank king 
a ingrat canker bolingbrok 

north 
 to worcest 
brother king hath made nephew mad 

worcest 
who struck heat i gone 

hotspur 
he forsooth prison 
and i urg ransom again
of wife brother cheek look pale 
and face turn eye death 
trembl even name mortim 

worcest 
i can not blame proclaim d
bi richard dead next blood 

northumberland 
he i heard proclam 
and unhappi king 
whose wrong us god pardon set forth
upon irish expedit 
from whenc intercept return
to depos shortli murder 

worcest 
and whose death world wide mouth
liv scandal foulli spoken 

hotspur 
but soft i pray king richard then
proclaim brother edmund mortimer
heir crown 

northumberland 
he hear 

hotspur 
nay i can not blame cousin king 
that wish barren mountain starv 
but shall set crown
upon head forget man 
and sake wear detest blot
of murder suborn shall 
that world curs undergo 
be agent base second mean 
the cord ladder hangman rather 
o pardon i descend low 
to show line predicament
wherein rang subtl king 
shall shame spoken day 
or fill chronicl time come 
that men nobil power
did gage unjust behalf 
a god pardon done 
to put richard sweet love rose 
and plant thorn canker bolingbrok 
and shall shame spoken 
that fool discard shook off
bi shame ye underw 
no yet time serv wherein may redeem
your banish honour restor yourselves
into good thought world 
reveng jeer disdain contempt
of proud king studi day night
to answer debt owe you
even bloodi payment death 
therefor i say 

worcest 
peac cousin say 
and i unclasp secret book 
and quick conceiv discontent
i read matter deep danger 
a full peril adventur spirit
a er walk current roar loud
on unsteadfast foot spear 

hotspur 
if fall good night sink swim 
send danger east unto west 
so honour cross north south 
and let grappl o blood stirs
to rous lion start hare 

northumberland 
imagin great exploit
dr beyond bound patienc 

hotspur 
bi heaven methink easi leap 
to pluck bright honour pale face moon 
or dive bottom deep 
where fathom line could never touch ground 
and pluck drown honour lock 
so doth redeem thenc might wear
without corriv digniti 
but upon half face fellowship 

worcest 
he apprehend world figur 
but form attend 
good cousin give audienc 

hotspur 
i cri merci 

worcest 
those nobl scots
that prison 

hotspur 
i keep 
bi god shall scot 
no scot would save soul shall 
i keep hand 

worcest 
you start away 
and lend ear unto purpos 
those prison shall keep 

hotspur 
nay i flat 
he said would ransom mortim 
forbad tongu speak mortim 
but i find lie asleep 
and ear i holla mortim 
nay 
i starl shall taught speak
noth mortim give 
to keep anger still motion 

worcest 
hear cousin word 

hotspur 
all studi i solemnli defi 
save gall pinch bolingbrok 
and sword buckler princ wale 
but i think father love 
and would glad met mischanc 
i poison pot ale 

worcest 
farewel kinsman i talk you
when better temper attend 

northumberland 
whi wasp stung impati fool
art thou break woman mood 
ti thine ear tongu thine 

hotspur 
whi look i whipp scourg rod 
nettl stung pismir i hear
of vile politician bolingbrok 
in richard time call place 
a plagu upon gioucestershir 
 twa madcap duke uncl kept 
hi uncl york i first bow knee
unto king smile bolingbrok 
when came back ravenspurg 

northumberland 
at berkeley castl 

hotspur 
you say true 
whi candi deal courtesy
thi fawn greyhound proffer 
look infant fortun came age 
and gentl harri perci kind cousin 
o devil take cozen god forgiv 
good uncl tell tale i done 

worcest 
nay 
we stay leisur 

hotspur 
i done faith 

worcest 
then scottish prison 
deliv without ransom straight 
and make dougla son mean
for power scotland diver reasons
which i shall send written assur 
will easili grant 
 to northumberland you lord 
your son scotland thu employ 
shall secretli bosom creep
of nobl prelat well belov 
th archbishop 

hotspur 
of york 

worcest 
true bear hard
hi brother death bristol lord scroop 
i speak estim 
a i think might i know
i rumin plot set 
and stay behold face
of occas shall bring 

hotspur 
i smell upon life well 

northumberland 
befor game foot thou still lett st slip 

hotspur 
whi can not choos nobl plot 
and power scotland york
to join mortim ha 

worcest 
and shall 

hotspur 
in faith exceedingli well aim 

worcest 
and ti littl reason bid us speed 
to save head rais head 
for bear even 
the king alway think debt 
and think think unsatisfi 
till hath found time pay us home 
and see alreadi doth begin
to make us stranger look love 

hotspur 
he reveng 

worcest 
cousin farewel go this
than i letter shall direct cours 
when time ripe suddenli 
i steal glendow lord mortim 
where dougla power 
a i fashion shall happili meet 
to bear fortun strong arm 
which hold much uncertainti 

northumberland 
farewel good brother shall thrive i trust 

hotspur 
uncl adieu o let hour short 
till field blow groan applaud sport 

 exeunt 

act ii

scen i rochest an inn yard 

 enter carrier lantern hand 

first carrier 
heigh ho four day i hang 
charl wain new chimney yet hors not
pack what ostler 

ostler 
 within anon anon

scene iii warkworth a room castl 

 enter hotspur read letter 

hotspur 
 but mine part lord i could well content be
ther respect love i bear hous he could content 
whi in respect love bear hous he
show love barn better love hous 
let see the purpos undertak danger whi 
that certain ti danger take cold sleep drink but
i tell lord fool nettl danger pluck this
flow safeti the purpos undertak danger friend you
hav name uncertain time unsort whole plot too
light counterpois great opposit say say
you i say unto shallow cowardli hind and
you lie what lack brain by lord plot good
plot ever laid friend true constant good plot good
friend full expect excel plot good friend 
what frosti spirit rogu whi lord york commend the

 enter ladi perci 

how kate i must leav within two hour 

ladi perci 
o good lord thu alon 
for offenc i fortnight been
a banish woman harri bed 
tell sweet lord take thee
thi stomach pleasur thi golden sleep 
whi dost thou bend thine eye upon earth 
and start often thou sitt st alon 
whi hast thou lost fresh blood thi cheek 
and given treasur right thee
to thick eye muse curst melancholi 
in thi faint slumber i thee watch 
and heard thee murmur tale iron war 
speak term manag thi bound steed 
cri courag field and thou hast talk d
of salli retir trench tent 
of palisado frontier parapet 
of basilisk cannon culverin 
of prison ransom soldier slain 
and current headi fight 
thi spirit within thee hath war 
and thu hath bestirr thee thi sleep 
that bead sweat stood upon thi brow 
like bubbl late disturb stream 
and thi face strang motion appear 
such see men restrain breath
on great sudden hest o portent 
some heavi busi hath lord hand 
and i must know els love

what ho

i love do love

and i horseback i swear

whith i go reason whereabout 
whither i must i must conclud 
thi even must i leav gentl kate 
i know wise yet wise
than harri perci wife constant 
but yet woman secreci 
no ladi closer i well believe
th wilt utter thou dost know 
and far i trust thee gentl kate

princ 
with three four loggerhead amongst three fourscor hogshead i
hav sound base string humil sirrah i sworn
broth leash drawer call christian
nam tom dick franci they take alreadi upon their
salv though i princ wale yet i king of
courtesi tell flatli i proud jack like falstaff a
corinthian lad mettl good boy lord call
m i king england i shall command good lads
in eastcheap they call drink deep die scarlet you
breath water cri hem bid play to
conclud i good profici one quarter hour i
can drink tinker languag life i tell
the ned thou hast lost much honour thou wert in
thi action but sweet ned sweeten name ned i give thee
thi pennyworth sugar clapp even hand an
und skinker one never spake english life than
eight shill sixpenc you welcom shrill

so but ned drive away time till falstaff come i pr ythee

end gave sugar thou never leav call franci that
hi tale may noth anon step asid i show thee
a preced

scene ii london a room palac 

 enter king henri princ henri lord 

king 
lord give us leav princ wale i
must privat confer near hand 
for shall present need 

 exeunt lord 

i know whether god 
for displeas servic i done 
that hi secret doom blood
h breed reveng scourg 
but thou dost thi passag life 
make believ thou art mark d
for hot vengeanc rod heaven
to punish mistread tell els 
could inordin low desir 
such poor base lewd mean attempt 
such barren pleasur rude societi 
a thou art match withal graft 
accompani great thi blood 
and hold level thi princ heart 

princ 
so pleas majesti i would i could
quit offenc clear excuse
a well i doubtless i purge
myself mani i charg withal 
yet extenu let beg 
a reproof mani tale devised
bi smile pick thank base news monger 
which oft ear great need must hear 
i may thing true wherein youth
hath faulti wander irregular 
find pardon true submiss 

king 
god pardon thee yet let wonder harri 
at thi affect hold wing
quit flight thi ancestor 
thi place council thou hast rude lost 
which thi younger brother suppli 
and art almost alien hearts
of court princ blood 
the hope expect thi time
i ruin soul everi man
prophet forethink thi fall 
had i lavish presenc 
so common hackney eye men 
so stale cheap vulgar compani 
opinion help crown 
had still kept loyal possess 
and left reputeless banish 

a fellow mark likelihood 
bi seldom seen i could stir
but like comet i wonder 
that men would tell children thi 
other would say where bolingbrok 
and i stole courtesi heaven 
and dress humil 
that i pluck allegi men heart 
loud shout salut mouth 
even presenc crown king 
thu i keep person fresh new 
mi presenc like robe pontif 
ne er seen wonder state 
seldom sumptuou show like feast 
and rare solemn 
the skip king ambl down
with shallow jester rash bavin wit 
soon kindl soon burnt card state 
mingl royalti caper fool 
had great name profan scorn 
and gave counten name 
to laugh gibe boy stand push
of everi beardless vain compar 
grew companion common street 
enfeoff popular 
that dalli swallow men eye 
they surfeit honey began
to loath tast sweet whereof little
mor littl much much 
so occas seen 
he cuckoo june 
heard regard seen eyes
a sick blunt commun 
afford extraordinari gaze 
such bent sun like majesty
when shine seldom admir eye 
but rather drows hung eyelid 
slept face render aspect
a cloudi men use adversari 
be presenc glut gorg full 
and line harri stand st thou 
for thou hast lost thi princ privilege
with vile particip eye
but weari thi common sight 
save mine hath desir see thee 
which doth i would 
make blind foolish tender 

princ 
i shall hereaft thrice graciou lord 
be 

king 
for world 
a thou art hour richard then
when i franc set foot ravenspurg 
and even i perci 
now sceptr soul boot 
he hath worthi interest state
than thou shadow success 
for right colour like right 
he doth fill field har realm 
turn head lion arm jaw 
and debt year thou 
lead ancient lord reverend bishop on
to bloodi battl bruis arm 
what never die honour hath got
against renown dougla whose high deed 
whose hot incurs great name arm 
hold soldier chief majority
and militari titl capital
through kingdom acknowledg christ 
thrice hath hotspur mar swath cloth 
thi infant warrior enterprises
discomfit great dougla ta en 
enlarg made friend 
to fill mouth deep defianc 
and shake peac safeti throne 
and say perci northumberland 
th archbishop grace york dougla mortimer
capitul us 
but wherefor i tell news thee 
whi harri i tell thee foe 
which art near st dearest enemi 
thou art like enough vassal fear 
base inclin start spleen 
to fight perci pay 
to dog heel curtsi frown 
to show much thou art degener 

princ 
do think shall find 
and god forgiv much sway d
your majesti good thought away 
i redeem perci head 
and close gloriou day 
be bold tell i son 
when i wear garment blood 
and stain favour bloodi mask 
which wash away shall scour shame 
and shall day whene er light 
that child honour renown 
thi gallant hotspur prais knight 
and unthought harri chanc meet 
for everi honour sit helm 
would multitud head
mi shame redoubl time come 
that i shall make northern youth exchange
hi gloriou deed indign 
perci factor good lord 
t engross gloriou deed behalf 
and i call hall strict account 
that shall render everi glori 
yea even slightest worship time 
or i tear reckon heart 
thi name god i promis 
the i perform surviv 
i beseech majesti may salve
th long grown wound intemper 
if end life cancel band 
and i die hundr thousand deaths
er break smallest parcel vow 

king 
a hundr thousand rebel die 
thou shalt charg sovereign trust herein 

 enter sir walter blunt 

how good blunt thi look full speed 

blunt

lord mortim scotland hath sent word
that dougla english rebel met
th eleventh month shrewsburi 
a mighti fear head 
if promis kept everi hand 
a ever offer foul play state 

king

with son lord john lancast 
for advertis five day old

on thursday march 
our meet bridgenorth harri you
shal march glostershir account 
our busi valu twelv day hence
our gener forc bridgenorth shall meet 
our hand full busi let away 
advantag feed fat men delay

act v

scene i the king camp near shrewsburi 

 enter king henri princ henri lancast sir walter blunt sir
john falstaff 

king 
how bloodili sun begin peer
abov yon buski hill day look pale
at distemperatur 

princ 
the southern wind
doth play trumpet purpos 
and hollow whistl leaves
foretel tempest bluster day 

king 
then loser let sympath 
for noth seem foul win 

 the trumpet sound enter worcest vernon 

how lord worcest ti well
that i meet upon terms
a meet you deceiv trust 
and made us doff easi robe peac 
to crush old limb ungentl steel 
thi well lord well 
what say unknit
thi churlish knot abhor war 
and move obedi orb again
wher give fair natur light 
and exhal meteor 
a prodigi fear portent
of broach mischief unborn time 

worcest 
hear lieg 
for mine part i could well content
to entertain lag end life
with quiet hour i protest 
i sought day dislik 

king 
you sought come 

falstaff 
rebellion lay way found 

princ 
peac chewet peac 

worcest 
it pleas majesti turn looks
of favour hous 
and yet i must rememb lord 
we first dearest friend 
for staff offic i break
in richard time post day night
to meet way kiss hand 
when yet place account
noth strong fortun i 
it brother son 
that brought home boldli outdare
th danger time you swore us 
and swear oath doncast 
that noth purpos gainst state 
nor claim new fall n right 
the seat gaunt dukedom lancast 
to swore aid but short space
it rain fortun shower head 
and flood great fell 
what help absent king 
what injuri wanton time 
the seem suffer born 
and contrari wind held king
so long unlucki irish wars
that england reput dead 
and swarm fair advantag 
you took occas quickli woo d
to gripe gener sway hand 
forgot oath us doncast 
and fed us use us so
a ungentl gull cuckoo bird 
useth sparrow oppress nest 
grew feed great bulk 
that even love thirst come near sight
for fear swallow nimbl wing
w enforc safeti sake fly
out sight rais present head 
wherebi stand oppos means
a forg 
bi unkind usag danger counten 
and violat faith troth
sworn ti younger enterpris 

king 
these thing inde articul 
proclaim market cross read church 
to face garment rebellion
with fine colour may pleas eye
of fickl changel poor discont 
which gape rub elbow news
of hurlyburli innov 
and never yet insurrect want
such water colour impaint caus 
nor moodi beggar starv time
of pellmel havoc confus 

princ 
in armi mani soul
shal pay full dearli encount 
if join trial tell nephew 
the princ wale doth join world
in prais henri perci hope 
thi present enterpris set head 
i think braver gentleman 
more activ valiant valiant young 
more dare bold alive
to grace latter age nobl deed 
for part i may speak shame 
i truant chivalri 
and i hear doth account 
yet father majesti 
i content shall take odds
of great name estim 
and save blood either side 
tri fortun singl fight 

king 
and princ wale dare ventur thee 
albeit consider infinite
do make no good worcest 
we love peopl well even love
that misl upon cousin part 
and take offer grace 
both yea everi man
shal friend i 
so tell cousin bring word
what yield 
rebuk dread correct wait us 
and shall offic so gone 
we troubl repli 
we offer fair take advisedli 

 exit worcest vernon 

princ 
it accept life 
the dougla hotspur together
ar confid world arm 

king

for answer set 
and god befriend us caus

point friendship

say thi prayer farewel

i forward call well ti matter 
honour prick yea honour prick i come

but i harri monmouth tell tell 
how show task seem contempt

did hear challeng urg modestli

to gentl exercis proof arm 
he gave duti man

and becam like princ inde

of teach learn instantli 
there paus let tell world 
if outliv envi day 
england never owe sweet hope 
so much misconstru wanton

upon folli never i hear
of princ wild liberti

that shall shrink courtesi 
arm arm speed fellow soldier friend 
better consid do
than i well gift tongu 
can lift blood persuas 

 enter messeng 

messeng 
mi lord letter 

hotspur 
i can not read 
o gentlemen time life short 
to spend short base long 
if life ride upon dial point 
still end th arriv hour 
an live live tread king 
if die brave death princ die us 
now conscienc arm fair 
when intent bear 

 enter anoth messeng 

messeng

hotspur

for i profess talk

a sword whose temper i intend stain
with best blood i meet withal
in adventur peril day 
now esper perci set

and music let us embrac 
for heaven earth us never shall
a second time courtesi

 alarum enter dougla 

dougla 
anoth king grow like hydra head 
i dougla fatal those

that wear colour what art thou 
that counterfeit st person king 

king 
the king dougla griev heart
so mani shadow thou hast met 
and king i two boys
seek perci thyself field 
but see thou fall st luckili 
i assay thee defend thyself 

dougla

and yet faith thou bear st thee like king 
but mine i sure thou art whoe er thou 
and thu i win thee 

 they fight king danger enter princ henri 

princ 
hold thi head vile scot thou art like
nev hold spirits
of valiant shirley stafford blunt arm 
it princ wale threaten thee 
who never promiseth mean pay 

 they fight dougla fli 

cheerli lord fare grace 
sir nichola gawsey hath succour sent 
and hath clifton i clifton straight 

king 
stay breath awhil 
thou hast redeem thi lost opinion 
and show thou makest tender life 
in fair rescu thou hast brought 

princ 
o god much injury
that ever said i hearken death 
if i might let alone
th insult hand dougla 
which would speedi end
a poison potion world 
and save treacher labour son 

king

 exit 

 enter hotspur 

hotspur 
if i mistak thou art harri monmouth 

princ 
thou speak st i would deni name 

hotspur 
mi name harri perci 

princ 
whi i see
a valiant rebel name 
i princ wale think perci 
to share glori 
two star keep motion one sphere 
nor one england brook doubl reign 
of harri perci princ wale 

hotspur 
nor shall harri hour come
to end one us would god
thi name arm great mine 

princ 
i make greater ere i part thee 
and bud honour thi crest
i crop make garland head 

hotspur 
i longer brook thi vaniti 

 they fight 

 enter falstaff 

falstaff 
well said hal hal nay shall find boy play i
can tell 

 re enter dougla fight falstaff fall he
wer dead exit dougla hotspur wound fall 

hotspur 
o harri thou hast robb youth 
i better brook loss brittl life
than proud titl thou hast 
they wound thought wors thi sword flesh 
but thought slave life life time fool 
and time take survey world 
must stop o i could prophesi 
but earthi cold hand death
li tongu perci thou art dust 
and food 

 die 

princ 
for worm brave perci fare thee well great heart 
ill weav ambit much art thou shrunk 
when bodi contain spirit 
a kingdom small bound 
but two pace vilest earth
i room enough thi earth bear thee dead
bear aliv stout gentleman 
if thou wert sensibl courtesi 
i make dear show zeal 
but let favour hide thi mangl face 
and even thi behalf i thank myself
for fair rite tender 
adieu take thi prais thee heaven 
thi ignomini sleep thee grave 
but rememb thi epitaph 

 see falstaff ground 

what old acquaint could flesh
keep littl life poor jack farewel 
i could better spare better man 
o i heavi miss thee 
if i much love vaniti 
death hath struck fat deer day 
though mani dearer bloodi fray 
embowel i see thee 
till blood nobl perci lie 

 exit 

falstaff

scene v anoth part field 

 the trumpet sound enter king henri princ henri

vernon prison 

king 
thu ever rebellion find rebuk 
ill spirit worcest send grace 
pardon term love 
and wouldst thou turn offer contrari 
misus tenour thi kinsman trust 
three knight upon parti slain day 
a nobl earl mani creatur els 
had aliv hour 
if like christian thou hadst truli borne
betwixt armi true intellig 

worcest 
what i done safeti urg 
and i embrac fortun patient 
sinc avoid fail 

king

other offend paus upon 

 exeunt worcest vernon guard 

how goe field 

princ 
the nobl scot lord dougla saw
th fortun day quit turn 
the nobl perci slain men
upon foot fear fled rest 
and fall hill bruised
that pursuer took at tent
th dougla i beseech grace
i may dispos 

king 
with heart 

princ 
then brother john lancast you
thi honour bounti shall belong 
go dougla deliv him
up pleasur ransomless free 
hi valour shown upon crest day 
hath taught us cherish high deeds
even bosom adversari 

king 
then remain divid power 
you son john cousin westmoreland 
toward york shall bend dearest speed 
to meet northumberland prelat scroop 
who hear busili arm 
myself son harri toward wale 
to fight glendow earl march 
rebellion land shall lose sway 
meet check anoth day 
and sinc busi fair done 
let us leav till

 scene england

induction
 induct 
 warkworth befor northumberland s castle

 enter rumour paint full tongues

 rumour open ear stop
 the vent hear loud rumour speak 
 i orient droop west 
 make wind post hors still unfold
 the act commenc ball earth 
 upon tongu continu slander ride 
 the everi languag i pronounc 
 stuf ear men fals report 
 i speak peac covert emniti 
 under smile safeti wound world 
 and rumour i 
 make fear muster prepar defenc 
 while big year swoln grief 
 is thought child stern tyrant war 
 and matter rumour pipe
 blown surmis jealousi conjectur 
 and easi plain stop
 that blunt monster uncount head 
 the still discord wav ring multitud 
 can play upon but need i thus
 my well known bodi anatomize
 among household whi rumour 
 i run king harri victori 
 who bloodi field shrewsburi 
 hath beaten young hotspur troop 
 quench flame bold rebellion
 even rebel blood but mean i
 to speak true first my offic is
 to nois abroad harri monmouth fell
 under wrath nobl hotspur sword 
 and king dougla rage
 stoop anoint head low death 
 thi i rumour peasant towns
 between royal field shrewsbury
 and worm eaten hold rag stone 
 where hotspur father old northumberland 
 lie crafti sick the post come tire 
 and man bring news
 than learnt from rumour tongues
 they bring smooth comfort fals wors true wrong 
 exit

act i scene i warkworth befor northumberland s castle

ent lord bardolph

 lord bardolph who keep gate ho 

 the porter open gate

 where earl 
 porter what shall i say 
 lord bardolph tell thou earl
 that lord bardolph doth attend 
 porter hi lordship walk forth orchard 
 pleas honour knock gate 
 and answer 

 enter northumberland

 lord bardolph here come earl exit porter
 northumberland what news lord bardolph everi minut now
 should father stratagem 
 the time wild content like horse
 full high feed madli hath broke loose
 and bear 
 lord bardolph nobl earl 
 i bring certain news shrewsburi 
 northumberland good god 
 lord bardolph as good heart wish 
 the king almost wound death 
 and fortun lord son 
 princ harri slain outright blunts
 kill hand dougla young princ john 
 and westmoreland stafford fled field 
 and harri monmouth brawn hulk sir john 
 is prison son o day 
 so fought follow fairli 
 came till dignifi time 
 sinc cxsar fortun 
 northumberland how deriv 
 saw field came shrewsburi 
 lord bardolph i spake one lord came thenc 
 a gentleman well bred good name 
 that freeli rend red news true 

 enter travers

 northumberland here come servant traver i sent
 on tuesday last listen news 
 lord bardolph my lord i rode way 
 and furnish certainties
 more hapli may retail 
 northumberland now traver good tide come 
 traver my lord sir john umfrevil turn back
 with joy tide better hor 
 out rode after came spur hard
 a gentleman almost forspent speed 
 that stopp breath bloodi hors 
 he ask way chester him
 i demand news shrewsburi 
 he told rebellion bad luck 
 and young harri perci spur cold 
 with gave abl hors head
 and bend forward struck arm heels
 against pant side poor jade
 up rowel head start 
 he seem run devour way 
 stay longer question 
 northumberland ha again 
 said young harri perci spur cold 
 of hotspur coldspur rebellion
 had met ill luck 
 lord bardolph my lord i tell 
 if young lord son day 
 upon mine honour silken point
 i give baroni never talk 
 northumberland whi gentleman rode travers
 give instanc loss 
 lord bardolph who 
 he hild fellow stol n
 the hors rode upon life 
 spoke ventur look come news 

 enter morton

 northumberland yea man brow like titl leaf 
 foretel natur tragic volum 
 so look strand whereon imperi flood
 hath left wit usurp 
 say morton didst thou come shrewsburi 
 morton i ran shrewsburi nobl lord 
 where hate death put ugliest mask
 to fright parti 
 northumberland how doth son brother 
 thou tremblest white thi cheek
 is apter thi tongu tell thi errand 
 even man faint spiritless 
 so dull dread look woe begon 
 drew priam curtain dead night
 and would told half troy burnt 
 but priam found fire ere tongu 
 and i perci death ere thou report st 
 thi thou wouldst say your son thu thu 
 your brother thu fought nobl dougla 
 stop greedi ear bold deed 
 but end stop ear inde 
 thou hast sigh blow away prais 
 end brother son dead 
 morton dougla live brother yet 
 but lord son 
 northumberland whi dead 
 see readi tongu suspicion hath 
 he fear thing would know
 hath instinct knowledg other eyes
 that fear chanc yet speak morton 
 tell thou earl divin lie 
 and i take sweet disgrace
 and make thee rich wrong 
 morton you great gainsaid 
 your spirit true fear certain 
 northumberland yet say perci dead 
 i see strang confess thine eye 
 thou shak st thi head hold st fear sin
 to speak truth if slain say 
 the tongu offend report death 
 and doth sin doth beli dead 
 not say dead aliv 
 yet first bringer unwelcom news
 hath lose offic tongue
 sound ever sullen bell 
 rememb red toll depart friend 
 lord bardolph i can not think lord son dead 
 morton i sorri i forc believe
 that i would god i seen 
 but mine eye saw bloodi state 
 rend ring faint quittanc weari breath 
 to harri monmouth whose swift wrath beat down
 the never daunt perci earth 
 from whenc life never sprung 
 in death whose spirit lent fire
 even dullest peasant camp 
 be bruit took fire heat away
 from best temper courag troop 
 for metal parti steel 
 which abat rest
 turn like dull heavi lead 
 and thing heavi itself
 upon enforc fli greatest speed 
 so men heavi hotspur loss 
 lend weight light fear
 that arrow fled swifter toward aim
 than soldier aim safeti 
 fli field then nobl worcester
 too soon ta en prison furiou scot 
 the bloodi dougla whose well labour sword
 had three time slain th appear king 
 gan vail stomach grace shame
 of turn back flight 
 stumbl fear took the sum all
 is king hath hath sent out
 a speedi power encount lord 
 under conduct young lancaster
 and westmoreland thi news full 
 northumberland for i shall time enough mourn 
 in poison physic news 
 have well would made sick 
 be sick measur made well 
 and wretch whose fever weak ned joint 
 like strengthless hing buckl life 
 impati fit break like fire
 out keeper arm even limb 
 weak ned grief enrag grief 
 are thrice henc therefor thou nice crutch 
 a scali gauntlet joint steel
 must glove hand henc thou sickli coif 
 thou art guard wanton head
 which princ flesh conquest aim hit 
 now bind brow iron approach
 the rag st hour time spite dare bring
 to frown upon th enrag northumberland 
 let heaven kiss earth now let natur hand
 keep wild flood confin let order die 
 and let world longer stage
 to feed content ling ring act 
 but let one spirit first born cain
 reign bosom heart set
 on bloodi cours rude scene may end
 and dark burier dead 
 lord bardolph thi strain passion doth wrong lord 
 morton sweet earl divorc wisdom honour 
 the live love complices
 lean health give er
 to stormi passion must perforc decay 
 you cast th event war nobl lord 
 and summ account chanc said
 let us make head it pre surmise
 that dole blow son might drop 
 you knew walk er peril edg 
 more like fall get er 
 you advi flesh capable
 of wound scar forward spirit
 would lift trade danger rang 
 yet say go forth none 
 though strongli apprehend could restrain
 the stiff born action what hath befal n 
 or hath bold enterpris brought forth
 more like 
 lord bardolph we engag loss
 knew ventur danger seas
 that wrought life twa ten one 
 and yet ventur gain propo d
 chok respect like peril fear 
 and sinc erset ventur 
 come put forth bodi good 
 morton ti time and nobl lord 
 i hear certain dare speak truth 
 the gentl archbishop york up
 with well appoint pow rs he man
 who doubl sureti bind follow 
 my lord son corps 
 but shadow show men fight 
 for word rebellion divide
 the action bodi soul 
 and fight queasi constrain 
 as men drink potion weapon only
 seem side spirit souls
 thi word rebellion froze 
 as fish pond but bishop
 turn insurrect religion 
 suppo sincer holi thought 
 he follow bodi mind 
 and doth enlarg rise blood
 of fair king richard scrap pomfret stone 
 deriv heaven quarrel caus 
 tell doth bestrid bleed land 
 gasp life great bolingbrok 
 and less flock follow 
 northumberland i knew speak truth 
 thi present grief wip mind 
 go counsel everi man
 the aptest way safeti reveng 
 get post letter make friend speed 
 never never yet need exeunt

scen ii london a street

ent sir john falstaff page bear sword buckler

 page he said sir water good healthi water but
 parti owe might moe diseas he
 knew 
 falstaff men sort take pride gird the brain of
 foolish compound clay man abl invent anything
 intend laughter i invent invent on
 i witti caus wit in
 men i walk thee like sow hath
 overwhelm litter one if princ put thee into
 servic reason set i
 judgment thou whoreson mandrak thou art fitter be
 worn cap wait heel i never mann with
 agat till i inset neither gold nor
 silver vile apparel send back your
 master jewel juven princ master whose
 chin yet fledg i sooner beard grow the
 palm hand shall get one cheek yet he
 stick say face face royal god may finish it
 ti hair amiss yet he may keep still at
 face royal barber shall never earn sixpenc

 father bachelor he may keep grace almost

scen iii york the archbishop s palace

ent archbishop thoma mowbray earl marshal lord hast 
and lord bardolph

 archbishop thu heard caus known mean 
 and nobl friend i pray all
 speak plainli opinion hope 
 and first lord marshal say 
 mowbray i well allow occas ami 
 but gladli would better satisfied
 how mean advanc ourselves
 to look forehead bold big enough
 upon power puissanc king 
 hast our present muster grow upon file
 to five twenti thousand men choic 
 and suppli live larg hope
 of great northumberland whose bosom burns
 with incens fire injuri 
 lord bardolph the question lord hast standeth thu 
 whether present five twenti thousand
 may hold head without northumberland 
 hast with may 
 lord bardolph yea marri point 
 but without thought feebl 
 my judgment step far
 till assist hand 
 for theme bloodi fac 
 conjectur expect surmise
 of aid incertain admit 
 archbishop ti true lord bardolph indeed
 it young hotspur case shrewsburi 
 lord bardolph it lord lin hope 
 eat air promis suppli 
 flatt ring project power
 much smaller smallest thought 
 and great imagination
 proper madmen led power death 
 and wink leapt destruct 
 hast but leav never yet hurt
 to lay likelihood form hope 
 lord bardolph ye present qualiti war 
 inde instant action caus foot 
 live hope earli spring
 we see th appear bud prove fruit
 hope give much warrant despair
 that frost bite when mean build 
 we first survey plot draw model 
 and see figur hous 
 then must rate cost erect 
 which find outweigh abil 
 what draw anew model
 in fewer offic least desist
 to build much great work 
 which almost pluck kingdom down
 and set anoth survey
 the plot situat model 
 consent upon sure foundat 
 question surveyor know estate
 how abl work undergo 
 to weigh opposit else
 we fortifi paper figur 
 use name men instead men 
 like one draw model house
 beyond power build half 
 give er leav part creat cost
 a nake subject weep clouds
 and wast churlish winter tyranni 
 hast grant hope yet like fair birth 
 should still born possess d
 the utmost man expect 
 i think bodi strong enough 
 even equal king 
 lord bardolph what king five twenti thousand 
 hast to us nay much lord bardolph 
 for divis time brawl 
 are three head one power french 
 and one glendow perforc third
 must take us so unfirm king
 in three divid coffer sound
 with hollow poverti empti 
 archbishop that draw sever strength together
 and come us full puissance
 need dread 
 hast if 
 he leav back unarm french welsh
 bay heel never fear 
 lord bardolph who like lead forc hither 
 hast the duke lancast westmoreland 
 against welsh harri monmouth 
 but substitut french
 i certain notic 
 archbishop let us 
 and publish occas arm 
 the commonwealth sick choic 
 their greedi love hath surfeit 
 an habit giddi unsure
 hath buildeth vulgar heart 
 o thou fond mani loud applause
 didst thou beat heaven bless bolingbroke
 befor thou wouldst 
 and trimm thine desir 
 thou beastli feeder art full him
 that thou provok st thyself cast 
 so thou common dog didst thou disgorge
 thi glutton bosom royal richard 
 and thou wouldst eat thi dead vomit 
 and howl st find what trust time 
 they richard liv would die
 are becom enamour grave 
 thou threw st dust upon goodli head 
 when proud london came sigh on
 after th admir heel bolingbrok 
 criest o earth yield us king 
 and take thou o thought men accur 
 past come seem best thing present worst 
 mowbray shall go draw number set 
 hast we time subject time bid gone 
 exeunt

 temper would endur tempest exclam are not

 falstaff what gross sum i owe thee 
 hostess marri thou wert honest man thyself money
 thou didst swear upon parcel gilt goblet sit in
 dolphin chamber round tabl sea coal fire upon
 wednesday wheeson week princ broke thi head for
 like father sing man windsor thou didst swear to
 i wash thi wound marri make my
 ladi thi wife canst thou deni did goodwif keech the

 prawn wherebi thou didst desir eat wherebi i told

 gone stair desir familiar with
 poor peopl say ere long call madam 
 and didst thou kiss bid fetch thirty
 shill i put thee thi book oath deni thou
 canst

 town eldest son like she hath in
 good case truth poverti hath distract but
 foolish offic i beseech i may redress

scen iii warkworth befor castle

ent northumberland ladi northumberland ladi percy

 northumberland i pray thee love wife gentl daughter 
 give even way unto rough affair 
 put visag times
 and like perci troublesom 
 ladi northumberland i given i speak 
 do wisdom guid 
 northumberland ala sweet wife honour pawn 
 and go noth redeem 
 ladi perci o yet god sake go war 
 the time father broke word 
 when endear 
 when perci heart dear harri 
 threw mani northward look see father
 bring power long vain 
 who persuad stay home 
 there two honour lost son 
 for god heaven brighten 
 for stuck upon sun
 in grey vault heaven light
 did chivalri england move
 to brave act he inde glass
 wherein nobl youth dress 
 he leg practi gait 
 and speak thick natur made blemish 
 becam accent valiant 
 for could speak low tardily
 would turn perfect abuse
 to seem like speech gait 
 in diet affect delight 
 in militari rule humour blood 
 he mark glass copi book 
 that fashion other and o wondrou 
 o miracl men leav 
 second none unsecond 
 to look upon hideou god war
 in disadvantag abid field
 where noth sound hotspur name
 did seem defens so left 
 never o never ghost wrong
 to hold honour precis nice
 with other let alon 
 the marshal archbishop strong 
 had sweet harri half number 
 to day might i hang hotspur neck 
 have talk monmouth grave 
 northumberland beshrew heart 
 fair daughter draw spirit me
 with new lament ancient oversight 
 but i must go meet danger 
 or seek anoth place 
 and find wors provid 
 ladi northumberland o fli scotland
 till nobl arm commons
 have puissanc made littl tast 
 ladi perci if get ground vantag king 
 then join like rib steel 
 to make strength stronger love 
 first let tri so son 
 he suff red came i widow 
 and never shall length life enough
 to rain upon remembr mine eye 
 that may grow sprout high heaven 
 for record nobl husband 
 northumberland come come go ti mind
 as tide swell unto height 
 that make still stand run neither way 
 fain would i go meet archbishop 
 but mani thousand reason hold back 
 i resolv scotland there i 
 till time vantag crave compani exeunt

act iii scene i westminst the palace

ent king nightgown page

 king go call earl surrey warwick 
 but ere come bid er read letters
 and well consid make good speed exit page
 how mani thousand poorest subjects
 are hour asleep o sleep o gentl sleep 
 natur soft nurs i frighten thee 
 that thou weigh eyelid 
 and steep sens forget 
 whi rather sleep liest thou smoki crib 
 upon uneasi pallet stretch thee 
 and hush buzz night fli thi slumber 
 than perfum chamber great 
 under canopi costli state 
 and lull sound sweetest melodi 
 o thou dull god liest thou vile
 in loathsom bed leav st kingli couch
 a watch case common larum bell 
 wilt thou upon high giddi mast
 seal ship boy eye rock brains
 in cradl rude imperi surg 
 and visit wind 
 who take ruffian billow top 
 curl monstrou head hang them
 with deaf clamour slipperi cloud 
 that hurli death awak 
 canst thou o partial sleep give thi repose
 to wet sea boy hour rude 
 and calmest stillest night 
 with applianc mean boot 
 deni king then happi low lie 
 uneasi lie head wear crown 

 enter warwick surrey

 warwick mani good morrow majesti 
 king is good morrow lord 
 warwick ti one clock past 
 king whi good morrow lord 
 have read er letter i sent 
 warwick we lieg 
 king then perceiv bodi kingdom
 how foul rank diseas grow 
 and danger near heart 
 warwick it bodi yet distemp 
 which former strength may restored
 with good advic littl medicin 
 my lord northumberland soon cool 
 king o god one might read book fate 
 and see revolut times
 make mountain level contin 
 weari solid firm melt itself
 into sea time see
 the beachi girdl ocean
 too wide neptun hip chanc mock 
 and chang fill cup alteration
 with diver liquor o seen 
 the happiest youth view progress 
 what peril past cross ensu 
 would shut book sit die 
 ti ten year gone
 sinc richard northumberland great friend 
 did feast togeth two year after
 were war it eight year since
 thi perci man nearest soul 
 who like brother toil affairs
 and laid love life foot 
 yea sake even eye richard
 gave defianc but 
 to warwick you cousin nevil i may rememb 
 when richard eye brim full tear 
 then check rate northumberland 
 did speak word prov propheci 
 northumberland thou ladder which
 my cousin bolingbrok ascend throne 
 though god know i intent
 but necess bow state
 that i great compel kiss 
 the time shall come thu follow 
 the time come foul sin gather head 
 shall break corrupt went 
 foretel time condition
 and divis amiti 
 warwick there histori men live 
 figur natur time decea 
 the observ man may prophesi 
 with near aim main chanc things
 as yet come life seeds
 and weak begin lie intreasur 
 such thing becom hatch brood time 
 and necessari form 
 king richard might creat perfect guess
 that great northumberland fals 
 would seed grow greater fals 
 which find ground root upon
 unless 
 king are thing necess 
 then let us meet like necess 
 and word even cri us 
 they say bishop northumberland
 are fifti thousand strong 
 warwick it can not lord 
 rumour doth doubl like voic echo 
 the number fear pleas grace
 to go bed upon soul lord 
 the power alreadi sent forth
 shall bring prize easili 
 to comfort i receiv d
 a certain instanc glendow dead 
 your majesti hath fortnight ill 
 and unseason hour perforc must ad
 unto sick 
 king i take counsel 
 and inward war hand 
 we would dear lord unto holi land exeunt

 shallow by mass i call anyth i would done

 archbishop what well appoint leader front us

 the princ lord john duke lancast 
 archbishop say lord westmoreland peac 
 what doth concern come

 came like base abject rout 
 led bloodi youth guard rag

 i say damn commot appear d
 in true nativ proper shape

 had dress ugli form
 of base bloodi insurrection

 turn book grave ink blood

 to loud trumpet point war

 briefli end disea d
 and surfeit wanton hours
 have brought burn fever 
 and must bleed disease
 our late king richard infect die 
 but nobl lord westmoreland 
 i take physician 
 nor i enemi peace
 troop throng militari men 
 but rather show awhil like fear war
 to diet rank mind sick happi 
 and purg th obstruct begin stop
 our vein life hear plainli 
 i equal balanc justli weigh d
 what wrong arm may wrong suffer 
 and find grief heavier offenc 
 we see way stream time doth run
 and enforc quiet there
 by rough torrent occas 
 and summari grief 
 when time shall serv show articl 
 which long ere offer king 
 and might suit gain audienc 
 when wrong would unfold grief 
 we deni access unto person 
 even men done us wrong 
 the danger day newli gone 
 whose memori written earth
 with yet appear blood examples
 of everi minut instanc present 
 hath put us ill beseem arm 
 not break peac branch 
 but establish peac inde 
 concur name qualiti

 wherein gall king

 or belong

 that feel bruis day

 upon honour

 constru time necess

 yet part appear 
 either king present time 
 that inch ground
 to build grief were restor d
 to duke norfolk signiori

 wa forc perforc compel banish

 that indict dint sword
 have sinc miscarri bolingbrok

 but mere digress purpos

 to know grief tell grace
 that give audienc wherein

 for lo within ken armi lie

 to give admitt thought fear 
 our battl full name 
 our men perfect use arm

 in ampl virtu father

 of condit shall stand upon 
 westmoreland that intend gener name 
 i muse make slight question

 for contain gener grievanc

 all member caus henc

 to us purpos confin

 which must decid

 mowbray there thing within bosom tell me
 that condit peac stand 
 hast fear make peace
 upon larg term absolute
 as condit shall consist upon 
 our peac shall stand firm rocki mountain 
 mowbray yea valuat shall such
 that everi slight fals deriv caus 
 yea everi idl nice wanton reason 
 shall king tast action 
 that royal faith martyr love 
 we shall winnow rough wind
 that even corn shall seem light chaff 
 and good bad find partit 
 archbishop no lord note king weary
 of dainti pick grievanc 
 for hath found end one doubt death
 reviv two greater heir life 
 and therefor wipe tabl clean 
 and keep tell tale memory
 that may repeat histori los
 to new remembr for full well knows
 he can not precis weed land
 as misdoubt present occas 
 hi foe enroot friends
 that pluck unfix enemi 
 he doth unfasten shake friend 
 so land like offens wife
 that hath enrag offer stroke 
 as strike hold infant 
 and hang resolv correct arm
 that uprear execut 
 hast besid king hath wast rods
 on late offend doth lack
 the instrument chastis 
 so power like fangless lion 
 may offer hold 
 archbishop ti true 
 and therefor assur good lord marshal 
 if make aton well 
 our peac like broken limb unit 
 grow stronger break 
 mowbray be

 falstaff i would wit twere better your
 dukedom good faith young sober blood boy doth not
 love man can not make laugh marvel 
 drink wine there never none demur boy come
 proof thin drink doth cool blood and
 make mani fish meal fall kind male
 green sick marri get wench they
 gener fool coward us 
 inflamm a good sherri sack hath two fold
 oper it ascend brain dri all
 foolish dull crudi vapour environ make it
 apprehens quick forget full nimbl fieri and
 delect shape deliv er voic tongu 
 birth becom excel wit the second properti of
 excel sherri warm blood 
 cold settl left liver white pale the
 badg pusillanim cowardic sherri warm 
 make cours inward part extrem it
 illumineth face beacon give warn the
 rest littl kingdom man arm vital
 common inland petti spirit muster their
 captain heart great puff retinu 
 doth deed courag valour come sherri so
 skill weapon noth without sack sets
 work learn mere hoard gold kept devil
 till sack commenc set act use hereof comes
 princ harri valiant cold blood did
 natur inherit father hath like lean steril and
 bare land manur husband till excellent
 endeavour drink good good store fertil sherri 
 becom hot valiant if i thousand son 
 first human principl i would teach to
 forswear thin potat addict sack

scen iv westminst the jerusalem chamber

ent king princ thoma of clarenc princ humphrey of
gloucest 
warwick others

 king now lord god doth give success end
 to debat bleedeth door 
 we youth lead higher field 
 and draw sword sanctifi 
 our navi address power connect 
 our substitut absenc well invest 
 and everyth lie level wish 
 onli want littl person strength 
 and paus us till rebel afoot 
 come underneath yoke govern 
 warwick both doubt majesty
 shall soon enjoy 
 king humphrey son gloucest 
 where princ brother 
 princ humphrey i think gone hunt lord windsor 
 king and accompani 
 princ humphrey i know lord 
 king is brother thoma clarenc 
 princ humphrey no good lord presenc 
 clarenc what would lord father 
 king noth well thee thoma clarenc 
 how chanc thou art princ thi brother 
 he love thee thou dost neglect thoma 
 thou hast better place affection
 than thi brother cherish boy 
 and nobl offic thou mayst effect
 of mediat i dead 
 between great thi brethren 
 therefor omit blunt love 
 nor lose good advantag grace
 by seem cold careless 
 for graciou observ 
 he hath tear piti hand
 open day melt chariti 
 yet notwithstand incen flint 
 as humor winter sudden
 as flaw congeal spring day 
 hi temper therefor must well observ 
 chide fault rever 
 when perceiv blood inclin mirth 
 but moodi give line scope
 till passion like whale ground 
 confound work learn thoma 
 and thou shalt prove shelter thi friend 
 a hoop gold bind thi brother 
 that unit vessel blood 
 mingl venom suggest 
 as forc perforc age pour 
 shall never leak though work strong
 as aconitum rash gunpowd 
 clarenc i shall observ care love 
 king whi art thou windsor thoma 
 clarenc he day dine london 
 king and accompani canst thou tell 
 clarenc with poin continu follow 
 king most subject fattest soil weed 
 and nobl imag youth 
 is overspread therefor grief
 stretch beyond hour death 
 the blood weep heart i shape 
 in form imaginari th unguid days
 and rotten time shall look upon
 when i sleep ancestor 
 for headstrong riot hath curb 
 when rage hot blood counsellors
 when mean lavish manner meet togeth 
 o wing shall affect fly
 toward front peril oppo decay 
 warwick my graciou lord look beyond quit 
 the princ studi companions
 like strang tongu wherein gain languag 
 ti need immodest word
 be look upon learnt attain 
 your high know come use
 but known hate so like gross term 
 the princ perfect time 
 cast follow memory
 shall pattern measur live
 by grace must mete live 
 turn past evil advantag 
 king ti seldom bee doth leav comb
 in dead carrion 

 enter westmoreland

 who westmoreland 
 westmoreland health sovereign new happiness
 ad deliv 
 princ john son doth kiss grace hand 
 mowbray bishop scroop hast 
 are brought correct law 
 there rebel sword unsheath 
 but peac put forth oliv everywher 
 the manner action hath borne
 here leisur may high read 
 with everi cours particular 
 king o westmoreland thou art summer bird 
 which ever haunch winter sings
 the lift day 

 enter harcourt

 look news 
 harcourt from enemi heaven keep majesti 
 and stand may fall
 as i come tell 
 the earl northumberland lord bardolph 
 with great power english scot 
 are shriev yorkshir overthrown 
 the manner true order fight
 thi packet pleas contain larg 
 king and wherefor good news make sick 
 will fortun never come hand full 
 but write fair word still foulest letter 
 she either give stomach food 
 such poor health els feast 
 and take away stomach rich
 that abund enjoy 
 i rejoic happi news 
 and sight fail brain giddi 
 o come near i much ill 
 princ humphrey comfort majesti 
 clarenc o royal father 
 westmoreland my sovereign lord cheer look 
 warwick be patient princ know fits
 are high ordinari 
 stand give air straight well 
 clarenc no can not long hold pang 
 th incess care labour mind
 hath wrought mure confin in
 so thin life look break 
 princ humphrey the peopl fear observe
 unfath heir loathli birth natur 
 the season chang manner year
 had found month asleep leapt 
 clarenc the river hath thrice flow ebb 
 and old folk time dote chronicl 
 say littl time before
 that great grandsir edward sick die 
 warwick speak lower princ king recov 
 princ humphrey thi apoplexi certain end 
 king i pray take bear hence
 into chamber softli pray exeunt

scen v westminst anoth chamber

th king lie bed clarenc gloucest warwick other in
attendance

 king let nois made gentl friend 
 unless dull favour hand
 will whisper music weari spirit 
 warwick call music room 
 king set crown upon pillow 
 clarenc hi eye hollow chang much 
 warwick less nois less nois 

 enter princ henry

 princ who saw duke clarenc 
 clarenc i brother full heavi 
 princ how rain within door none abroad 
 how doth king 
 princ humphrey exceed ill 
 princ heard good news yet tell 
 princ humphrey he alt red much upon hear 
 princ if sick joy recov without physic 
 warwick not much nois lord sweet princ speak low 
 the king father dispo sleep 
 clarenc let us withdraw room 
 warwick will pleas grace go along us 
 princ no i sit watch king 
 exeunt prince
 whi doth crown lie upon pillow 
 be troublesom bedfellow 
 o polish perturb golden care 
 that keep st port slumber open wide
 to mani watch night sleep 
 yet sound half deepli sweet
 as whose brow home biggen bound
 snore watch night o majesti 
 when thou dost pinch thi bearer thou dost sit
 like rich armour worn heat day
 that scald st safeti by gate breath
 there lie downi feather stir 
 did suspir light weightless down
 perforc must move my graciou lord father 
 thi sleep sound inde sleep
 that golden rigol hath divorc d
 so mani english king thi due me
 is tear heavi sorrow blood
 which natur love filial tender 
 shall o dear father pay thee plenteous 
 my due thee imperi crown 
 which immedi thi place blood 
 deriv put crown lo sit 
 which god shall guard put world whole strength
 into one giant arm shall force
 thi lineal honour thi thee
 will i mine leav ti left exit
 king warwick gloucest clarenc 

 re enter warwick gloucest clarence

 clarenc doth king call 
 warwick what would majesti how fare grace 
 king whi leav alon lord 
 clarenc we left princ brother lieg 
 who undertook sit watch 
 king the princ wale where let see 
 he 
 warwick thi door open gone way 
 princ humphrey he came chamber stay 
 king where crown who took pillow 
 warwick when withdrew lieg left 
 king the princ hath ta en henc go seek 
 is hasti doth suppose
 my sleep death 
 find lord warwick chide hither 
 exit warwick
 thi part conjoin disease
 and help end see son thing 
 how quickli natur fall revolt
 when gold becom object 
 for foolish care fathers
 have broke sleep thought 
 their brain care bone industri 
 for engross pil up
 the cank red heap strang achiev gold 
 for thought invest
 their son art martial exercis 
 when like bee toll everi flower
 the virtuou sweet 
 our thigh wax mouth honey pack 
 we bring hive like bee 
 are murd red pain thi bitter taste
 yield engross end father 

 re enter warwick

 now stay long
 till friend sick hath determin 
 warwick my lord i found princ next room 
 wash kindli tear gentl cheek 
 with deep demeanour great sorrow 
 that tyranni never quaff blood 
 would behold wash knife
 with gentl eye drop he come hither 
 king but wherefor take away crown 

 re enter princ henry

 lo come come hither harri 
 depart chamber leav us alon 
 exeunt king prince
 princ i never thought hear speak 
 king thi wish father harri thought 
 i stay long thee i weari thee 
 dost thou hunger mine empti chair
 that thou wilt need invest thee honours
 befor thi hour ripe o foolish youth 
 thou seek st great overwhelm thee 
 stay littl cloud dignity
 is held fall weak wind
 that quickli drop day dim 
 thou hast stol n hour 
 were thine without offens death
 thou hast seal expect 
 thi life manifest thou lov dst 
 and thou wilt die assur 
 thou hid st thousand dagger thi thought 
 which thou hast whet thi stoni heart 
 to stab half hour life 
 what canst thou forbear half hour 
 then get thee gone dig grave thyself 
 and bid merri bell ring thine ear
 that thou art crown i dead 
 let tear bedew hearse
 be drop balm sanctifi thi head 
 onli compound forgotten dust 
 give gave thee life unto worm 
 pluck offic break decre 
 for time come mock form 
 harri fifth crown up vaniti 
 down royal state all sage counsellor henc 
 and english court assembl 
 from everi region ape idl 
 now neighbour confin purg scum 
 have ruffian swear drink danc 
 revel night rob murder commit
 the oldest sin newest kind way 
 be happi troubl 
 england shall doubl gild trebl guilt 
 england shall give offic honour might 
 for fifth harri curb licens plucks
 the muzzl restraint wild dog
 shall flesh tooth everi innoc 
 o poor kingdom sick civil blow 
 when care could withhold thi riot 
 what wilt thou riot thi care 
 o thou wilt wilder 
 peopl wolv thi old inhabit 
 princ o pardon lieg but tear 
 the moist impedi unto speech 
 i forestal dear deep rebuke
 ere grief spoke i heard
 the cours far there crown 
 and wear crown immortally
 long guard kneel if i affect more
 than honour renown 
 let obedi rise 
 which inward true duteou spirit
 teacheth prostrat exterior bend 
 god wit i came in
 and found cours breath within majesti 
 how cold struck heart if i feign 
 o let present wild die 
 and never live show th incredul world
 the nobl chang i purpos 
 come look think dead 
 and dead almost lieg think 
 i spake unto crown sens 
 and thu upbraid the care thee depending
 hath fed upon bodi father 
 therefor thou best gold art worst gold 
 other less fine carat preciou 
 preserv life med cine potabl 
 but thou fine honour renown 
 hast eat thi bearer thu royal lieg 
 accus i put head 
 to tri enemy
 that face murd red father 
 the quarrel true inheritor 
 but infect blood joy 
 or swell thought strain pride 
 if rebel vain spirit mine
 did least affect welcome
 give entertain might 
 let god ever keep head 
 and make poorest vassal 
 that doth awe terror kneel 
 king o son 
 god put thi mind take henc 
 that thou mightst win thi father love 
 plead wise excus 
 come hither harri sit thou bed 
 and hear i think latest counsel
 that ever i shall breath god know son 
 by path indirect crook ways
 i met crown i know well
 how troublesom sat upon head 
 to thee shall descend better quiet 
 better opinion better confirm 
 for soil achiev goes
 with earth it seem me
 but honour snatch boist rou hand 
 and i mani live upbraid
 my gain assist 
 which daili grew quarrel bloodsh 
 wound suppos peac all bold fears
 thou seest peril i answer 
 for reign hath scene
 act argument and death
 chang mood purcha d
 fall upon thee fairer sort 
 so thou garland wear st success 
 yet though thou stand st sure i could 
 thou art firm enough sinc grief green 
 and friend thou must make thi friend 
 have sting teeth newli ta en 
 by whose fell work i first advanc 
 and whose power i well might lodg fear
 to displac avoid 
 i cut purpos now
 to lead mani holi land 
 lest rest lie still might make look
 too near unto state therefor harri 
 be thi cours busi giddi minds
 with foreign quarrel action henc born 
 may wast memori former day 
 more would i lung wast so
 that strength speech utterli deni 
 how i came crown o god forgiv 
 and grant may thee true peac live 
 princ my graciou lieg 
 you wore kept gave 
 then plain right must possess 
 which i common pain
 gainst world right maintain 

 enter princ john of lancast warwick lord others

 king look look come john lancast 
 princ john health peac happi royal father 
 king thou bring st happi peac son john 
 but health alack youth wing flown
 from bare wither trunk upon thi sight
 my worldli busi make period 
 where lord warwick 
 princ my lord warwick 
 king doth name particular belong
 unto lodg i first swoon 
 warwick ti call jerusalem nobl lord 
 king laud god even life must end 
 it hath prophesi mani year 
 i die jerusalem 
 which vainli i suppo holi land 
 but bear chamber i lie 
 in jerusalem shall harri die exeunt

 davi here sir

 marvel foul linen 
 shallow well conceit davi thi busi davi

 clement perk th hill 
 shallow there mani complaint davi visor that
 visor arrant knave knowledg

 friend request an honest man sir abl speak for

 credit worship the knave mine honest friend sir

 shallow i thank thee heart kind master bardolph 
 to page and welcom tall fellow come sir john

 exit shallow bardolph look hors exeunt bardolph
 page if i saw quantiti i make four
 dozen beard hermit stave master shallow it a
 wonder thing see semblabl coher men s
 spirit they observ bear themselves
 like foolish justic convers turned
 justic like serv man their spirit marri in
 conjunct particip societi flock
 togeth consent like mani wild gees if i suit to
 master shallow i would humour men imput of
 near master men i would curri master
 shallow man could better command servant it is
 certain either wise bear ignor carriag caught 
 men take diseas one anoth therefor let men take heed
 compani i devis matter enough shallow
 keep princ harri continu laughter wear six
 fashion four term two action shall laugh
 without intervallum o much lie slight
 oath jest sad brow fellow never
 ach shoulder o shall see laugh till
 face like wet cloak ill laid 
 shallow within sir john 
 falstaff i come master shallow i come master shallow

scen ii westminst the palace

ent sever warwick lord chief justice

 warwick how lord chief justic whither away 
 chief justic how doth king 
 warwick exceed well care end 
 chief justic i hope dead 
 warwick he walk way natur 
 and purpos live

 the servic i truli life
 hath left open injuri 
 warwick inde i think young king love 
 chief justic i know doth arm myself
 to welcom condit time 
 which can not look hideous upon me
 than i drawn fantasi 

 enter lancast clarenc gloucest 
 westmoreland others

 warwick here come heavi issu dead harri 
 o live harri temper
 of worst three gentlemen 
 how mani nobl hold places
 that must strike sail spirit vile sort

 princ john good morrow cousin warwick good morrow 
 gloucest clarenc good morrow cousin

 warwick we rememb argument
 is heavi admit much talk 
 princ john well peac hath made us heavi 
 chief justic peac us lest heavier 
 princ humphrey o good lord lost friend inde 
 and i dare swear borrow face
 of seem sorrow sure

 you stand coldest expect 
 i sorrier would twere otherwis 
 clarenc well must speak sir john falstaff fair 
 which swim stream qualiti

 led th imparti conduct soul

 enter king henri the fifth attended

 chief justic good morrow god save majesti 
 king thi new gorgeou garment majesti 
 sit easi think 
 brother mix sad fear 
 thi english turkish court 
 not amurath amurath succe 
 but harri harri yet sad good brother 
 for faith well becom 
 sorrow royal appears
 that i deepli put fashion 
 and wear heart whi sad 
 but entertain good brother 
 than joint burden laid upon us 
 for heaven i bid assur 
 i father brother 
 let bear love i bear care 
 yet weep harri dead i 
 but harri live shall convert tears
 by number hour happi 
 brother we hope otherwis majesti 
 king you look strang 
 you i think assur i love 
 chief justic i assur i measur rightli 
 your majesti hath caus hate 
 king no 
 how might princ great hope forget
 so great indign laid upon 
 what rate rebuk roughli send prison 
 th immedi heir england wa easi 
 may wash leth forgotten 
 chief justic i use person father 
 the imag power lay 
 and th administr law 
 while i busi commonwealth 
 your high pleas forget place 
 the majesti power law justic 
 the imag king i present 
 and struck seat judgment 
 whereon offend father 
 i gave bold way authority
 and commit if deed ill 
 be content wear garland 
 to son set decre nought 
 to pluck justic aw bench 
 to trip cours law blunt sword
 that guard peac safeti person 
 nay spurn royal imag 
 and mock work second bodi 
 question royal thought make case 
 be father propos son 
 hear digniti much profan 
 see dread law loos slight 
 behold son disdain 
 and imagin take part
 and power soft silenc son 
 after cold consider sentenc 
 and king speak state
 what i done misbecam place 
 my person lieg sovereignti 
 king you right justic weigh well 
 therefor still bear balanc sword 
 and i wish honour may increase
 till live see son mine
 offend obey i 
 so shall i live speak father word 
 happi i man bold
 that dare justic proper son 
 and less happi son
 that would deliv great so
 into hand justic you commit 
 for i commit hand
 th unstain sword us bear 
 with remembr use same
 with like bold imparti spirit
 as done gainst there hand 
 you shall father youth 
 my voic shall sound prompt mine ear 
 and i stoop humbl intents
 to well practi wise direct 
 and princ believ i beseech 
 my father gone wild grave 
 for tomb lie affect 
 and spirit sadli i surviv 
 to mock expect world 
 to frustrat propheci raze out
 rotten opinion hath writ down
 after seem the tide blood me
 hath proudli flow vaniti till 
 now doth turn ebb back sea 
 where shall mingl state flood 
 and flow henceforth formal majesti 
 now call high court parliament 
 and let us choos limb nobl counsel 
 that great bodi state may go
 in equal rank best govern nation 
 that war peac may be
 as thing acquaint familiar us 
 in father shall foremost hand 
 our coron done accit 
 as i rememb red state 
 and god consign good intent 
 no princ peer shall caus say 
 god shorten harri happi life one day exeunt

 falstaff my king jove i speak thee heart 
 king i know thee old man fall thi prayer 
 how ill white hair becom fool jester 
 i long dreamt kind man 
 so surfeit swell old profan 
 but awak i despis dream 
 make less thi bodi henc thi grace 
 leav gormand know grave doth gape
 for thee thrice wider men 
 repli fool born jest 
 presum i thing i 
 for god doth know shall world perceiv 
 that i turn away former self 
 so i kept compani

 approach thou shalt thou wast 
 the tutor feeder riot 
 till i banish thee pain death 
 as i done rest mislead

 shall well provid

epilogu epilogu 

 first fear curtsi last speech my fear your
 displeasur curtsi duti speech beg pardon 
 if look good speech undo i to
 say mine make inde i say i
 doubt prove mine mar but purpos the
 ventur be known well i late in
 end displeas play pray patienc to
 promis better i meant inde pay if
 like ill ventur come unluckili home i break my
 gentl creditor lose here i promi i would i
 commit bodi merci bate i pay you
 debtor promis infinit i kneel
 inde pray queen if tongue
 can not entreat acquit command use leg 
 and yet light payment danc debt but a
 good conscienc make possibl satisfact would i 
 all gentlewomen forgiven if gentlemen 
 gentlemen agre gentlewomen never
 seen assembl one word i beseech if you
 much cloy fat meat humbl author continue
 stori sir john make merri fair
 katherin franc anyth i know falstaff shall die
 sweat unless alreadi kill hard opinion for
 oldcastl die martyr man my tongu weari 
 leg i bid good night 




the life of king henri v


contents

act i
prologu 
scene i london an ant chamber king palac 
scene ii the the presenc chamber

choru

scene ii southampton a council chamber

scene iv franc the king palac 

act iii
choru 
scene i franc befor harfleur 
scene ii the 
scene iii befor gate
