scene england afterward franc 


prologu 

 enter choru 

choru 
o muse fire would ascend
th brightest heaven invent 
a kingdom stage princ act 
and monarch behold swell scene 
then warlik harri like 
assum port mar heel 
leash like hound famin sword fire
crouch employ but pardon gentl 
the flat unrais spirit hath dar d
on unworthi scaffold bring forth
so great object can cockpit hold
th vasti field franc or may cram
within wooden o casques
that affright air agincourt 
o pardon sinc crook figur may
attest littl place million 
and let us cipher great accompt 
on imaginari forc work 
suppos within girdl walls
ar confin two mighti monarchi 
whose high uprear abut fronts
th peril narrow ocean part asund 
piec imperfect thought 
into thousand part divid one man 
and make imaginari puissanc 
think talk hors see them
print proud hoof th receiv earth 
for ti thought must deck king 
carri jump er time 
turn accomplish mani years
into hour glass suppli 
admit choru histori 
who prologu like humbl patienc pray 
gentli hear kindli judg play 

 _exit _ 



act i

scen i london an ant chamber king palac 

 enter archbishop canterburi bishop eli 

canterburi 
mi lord i tell self bill urg d
which eleventh year last king reign
wa like inde us passed
but scambl unquiet time
did push farther question 

eli 
but lord shall resist 

canterburi 
it must thought if pass us 
we lose better half possess 
for tempor land men devout
bi testament given church 
would strip us valu thu 
a much would maintain king honour 
full fifteen earl fifteen hundr knight 
six thousand two hundr good esquir 
and relief lazar weak age 
of indig faint soul past corpor toil 
a hundr almshous right well suppli 
and coffer king besid 
a thousand pound th year thu run bill 

eli 
thi would drink deep 

canterburi 
 twould drink cup 

eli 
but prevent 

canterburi 
the king full grace fair regard 

eli 
and true lover holi church 

canterburi 
the cours youth promi 
the breath sooner left father body
but wild mortifi 
seem die yea moment
consider like angel came
and whip th offend adam 
leav bodi paradise
t envelop contain celesti spirit 
never sudden scholar made 
never came reform flood
with headi curranc scour fault 
nor never hydra head wilfulness
so soon lose seat 
a king 

eli 
we bless chang 

canterburi 
hear reason divinity
and admir inward wish
you would desir king made prelat 
hear debat commonwealth affair 
you would say hath studi 
list discours war shall hear
a fear battl render music 
turn caus polici 
the gordian knot unloos 
familiar garter speak 
the air charter libertin still 
and mute wonder lurketh men ears
to steal sweet honey sentenc 
so art practic part life
must mistress theoric 
which wonder grace glean 
sinc addict cours vain 
hi compani unlett rude shallow 
hi hour fill riot banquet sport 
and never note studi 
ani retir sequestration
from open haunt popular 

eli 
the strawberri grow underneath nettl 
and wholesom berri thrive ripen best
neighbour fruit baser qualiti 
and princ obscur contemplation
und veil wild doubt 
grew like summer grass fastest night 
unseen yet cresciv faculti 

canterburi 
it must miracl ceas 
and therefor must need admit means
how thing perfect 

eli 
but good lord 
how mitig bill
urg common doth majesty
inclin 

canterburi 
he seem indiffer 
or rather sway upon part
than cherish th exhibitor us 
for i made offer majesti 
upon spiritu convocation
and regard caus hand 
which i open grace larg 
a touch franc give greater sum
than ever one time clergi yet
did predecessor part withal 

eli 
how offer seem receiv lord 

canterburi 
with good accept majesti 
save time enough hear 
a i perceiv grace would fain done 
the sever unhidden passages
of true titl certain dukedom 
and gener crown seat franc 
deriv edward great grandfath 

eli 
what th impedi broke 

canterburi 
the french ambassador upon instant
crav audienc hour i think come
to give hear is four clock 

eli 
it 

canterburi 
then go know embassi 
which i could readi guess declare
befor frenchman speak word 

eli 
i wait upon i long hear 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the the presenc chamber 

 enter king henri gloucest bedford clarenc warwick westmorland 
 exet attend 

king henri 
where graciou lord canterburi 

exet 
not presenc 

king henri 
send good uncl 

westmorland 
shall call th ambassador lieg 

king henri 
not yet cousin we would resolv 
befor hear thing weight
that task thought concern us franc 

 enter archbishop canterburi bishop eli 

canterburi 
god angel guard sacr throne
and make long becom 

king henri 
sure thank 
mi learn lord pray proceed
and justli religi unfold
whi law salic france
or bar us claim 
and god forbid dear faith lord 
that fashion wrest bow read 
or nice charg understand soul
with open titl miscreat whose right
suit nativ colour truth 
for god doth know mani health
shal drop blood approbation
of rever shall incit us 
therefor take heed impawn person 
how awak sleep sword war 
we charg name god take heed 
for never two kingdom contend
without much fall blood whose guiltless drops
ar everi one woe sore complaint
 gainst whose wrong give edg unto swords
that make wast brief mortal 
under conjur speak lord 
for hear note believ heart
that speak conscienc washed
a pure sin baptism 

canterburi 
then hear graciou sovereign peer 
that owe live services
to imperi throne there bar
to make high claim france
but produc pharamond 
_in terram salicam mulier ne succedant_ 
 no woman shall succeed salic land 
which salic land french unjustli gloze
to realm franc pharamond
th founder law femal bar 
yet author faith affirm
that land salic germani 
between flood sala elb 
where charl great subdu saxon 
there left behind settl certain french 
who hold disdain german women
for dishonest manner life 
establish law wit female
should inheritrix salic land 
which salic i said twixt elb sala 
i day germani call meissen 
then doth well appear salic law
wa devis realm franc 
nor french possess salic land
until four hundr one twenti years
aft defunct king pharamond 
idli suppo founder law 
who die within year redemption
four hundr twenti six charl great
subdu saxon seat french
beyond river sala year
eight hundr five besid writer say 
king pepin depos childer 
did heir gener descended
of blithild daughter king clothair 
make claim titl crown franc 
hugh capet also usurp crown
of charl duke lorrain sole heir male
of true line stock charl great 
to find titl show truth 
though pure truth corrupt naught 
convey heir ladi lingar 
daughter charlemain son
to lewi emperor lewi son
of charl great also king lewi tenth 
who sole heir usurp capet 
could keep quiet conscienc 
wear crown franc till satisfied
that fair queen isabel grandmoth 
wa lineal ladi ermengar 
daughter charl foresaid duke lorrain 
bi marriag line charl great
wa unit crown franc 
so clear summer sun 
king pepin titl hugh capet claim 
king lewi satisfact appear
to hold right titl femal 
so king franc unto day 
howbeit would hold salic law
to bar high claim femal 
and rather choos hide net
than ampli imbar crook titles
usurp progenitor 

king henri 
may i right conscienc make claim 

canterburi 
the sin upon head dread sovereign 
for book number writ 
 when man die let inheritance
descend unto daughter graciou lord 
stand unwind bloodi flag 
look back mighti ancestor 
go dread lord great grandsir tomb 
from claim invok warlik spirit 
and great uncl edward black princ 
who french ground play tragedi 
make defeat full power franc 
while mighti father hill
stood smile behold lion whelp
forag blood french nobil 
o nobl english could entertain
with half forc full pride france
and let anoth half stand laugh 
all work cold action 

eli 
awak remembr valiant dead 
and puissant arm renew feat 
you heir sit upon throne 
the blood courag renown them
run vein thrice puissant liege
i may morn youth 
ripe exploit mighti enterpris 

exet 
your brother king monarch earth
do expect rous 
a former lion blood 

westmorland 
they know grace hath caus mean might 
so hath high never king england
had nobl richer loyal subject 
whose heart left bodi england
and lie pavilion field franc 

canterburi 
o let bodi follow dear lieg 
with blood sword fire win right 
in aid whereof spiritualty
wil rais high mighti sum
a never clergi one time
br ancestor 

king henri 
we must arm invad french 
but lay proport defend
against scot make road upon us
with advantag 

canterburi 
they march graciou sovereign 
shall wall suffici defend
our inland pilfer border 

king henri 
we mean cours snatcher 
but fear main intend scot 
who hath still giddi neighbour us 
for shall read great grandfather
nev went forc france
but scot unfurnish kingdom
cam pour like tide breach 
with ampl brim full forc 
gall glean land hot assay 
girdl grievou sieg castl town 
that england empti defenc 
hath shook trembl ill neighbourhood 

canterburi 
she hath fear harm lieg 
for hear exampl 
when chivalri hath franc 
and mourn widow nobl 
she hath well defended
but taken impound stray
th king scot send france
to fill king edward fame prison king 
and make chronicl rich praise
a ooz bottom sea
with sunken wreck sumless treasuri 

westmorland 
but say old true 
 if franc win 
then scotland first begin 
for eagl england prey 
to unguard nest weasel scot
com sneak suck princ egg 
play mous absenc cat 
to tear havoc eat 

exet 
it follow cat must stay home 
yet crush necess 
sinc lock safeguard necessari 
and pretti trap catch petti thiev 
while arm hand doth fight abroad 
the advis head defend home 
for govern though high low lower 
put part doth keep one consent 
congre full natur close 
like music 

canterburi 
therefor doth heaven divide
th state man diver function 
set endeavour continu motion 
to fix aim butt 
obedi work honey bee 
creatur rule natur teach
th act order peopl kingdom 
they king offic sort 
where like magistr correct home 
other like merchant ventur trade abroad 
other like soldier arm sting 
make boot upon summer velvet bud 
which pillag merri march bring home
to tent royal emperor 
who busi majesti surveys
th sing mason build roof gold 
the civil citizen knead honey 
the poor mechan porter crowd in
their heavi burden narrow gate 
the sad eye justic surli hum 
deliv er executor pale
th lazi yawn drone i infer 
that mani thing full reference
to one consent may work contrari 
a mani arrow loos sever way 
come one mark mani way meet one town 
a mani fresh stream meet one salt sea 
a mani line close dial centr 
so mani thousand action afoot 
end one purpos well borne
without defeat therefor franc lieg 
divid happi england four 
whereof take one quarter franc 
and withal shall make gallia shake 
if thrice power left home 
cannot defend door dog 
let us worri nation lose
th name hardi polici 

king henri 
call messeng sent dauphin 

 _exeunt attend _ 

now well resolv god help 
and nobl sinew power 
franc bend awe 
or break piec or sit 
rule larg ampl empery
o er franc almost kingli dukedom 
or lay bone unworthi urn 
tombless remembr 
either histori shall full mouth
speak freeli act els grave 
like turkish mute shall tongueless mouth 
not worshipp waxen epitaph 

 enter ambassador franc 

now well prepar know pleasure
of fair cousin dauphin hear
your greet king 

first ambassador 
may pleas majesti give us leave
fre render charg 
or shall sparingli show far off
th dauphin mean embassi 

king henri 
we tyrant christian king 
unto whose grace passion subject
a wretch fett red prison 
therefor frank uncurb plainness
tel us dauphin mind 

ambassador 
thu 
your high late send franc 
did claim certain dukedom right
of great predecessor king edward third 
in answer claim princ master
say savour much youth 
and bid advi nought france
that nimbl galliard 
you can not revel dukedom 
he therefor send meeter spirit 
thi tun treasur lieu 
desir let dukedom claim
hear thi dauphin speak 

king henri 
what treasur uncl 

exet 
tenni ball lieg 

king henri 
we glad dauphin pleasant us 
hi present pain thank 
when match racket ball 
we franc god grace play set
shal strike father crown hazard 
tell hath made match wrangler
that court franc disturb d
with chace and understand well 
how come er us wilder day 
not measur use made 
we never valu poor seat england 
and therefor live henc give ourself
to barbar licenc ti ever common
that men merriest home 
but tell dauphin i keep state 
be like king show sail greatness
when i rous throne franc 
for i laid majesty
and plod like man work day 
but i rise full glory
that i dazzl eye franc 
yea strike dauphin blind look us 
and tell pleasant princ mock his
hath turn ball gun stone soul
shal stand sore charg wast vengeance
that shall fli mani thousand widows
shal mock mock dear husband 
mock mother son mock castl 
and yet ungotten unborn
that shall caus curs dauphin scorn 
but lie within god 
to i appeal whose name
tel dauphin i come on
to veng i may put forth
mi right hand well hallow caus 
so get henc peac tell dauphin
hi jest savour shallow wit 
when thousand weep laugh 
convey safe conduct fare well 

 _exeunt ambassador _ 

exet 
thi merri messag 

king henri 
we hope make sender blush 
therefor lord omit happi hour
that may give further expedit 
for thought us franc 
save god run busi 
therefor let proport wars
b soon collect thing thought upon
that may reason swift add
mor feather wing god 
we chide dauphin father door 
therefor let everi man task thought 
that fair action may foot brought 

 _exeunt _ 



act ii

 flourish enter choru 

choru 
now youth england fire 
and silken dallianc wardrob lie 
now thrive armour honour thought
reign sole breast everi man 
they sell pastur buy hors 
follow mirror christian king 
with wing heel english mercuri 
for sit expect air 
and hide sword hilt unto point
with crown imperi crown coronet 
promi harri follow 
the french advi good intelligence
of dread prepar 
shake fear pale policy
seek divert english purpos 
o england model thi inward great 
like littl bodi mighti heart 
what mightst thou honour would thee 
were thi children kind natur 
but see thi fault franc hath thee found out
a nest hollow bosom fills
with treacher crown three corrupt men 
one richard earl cambridg second 
henri lord scroop masham third 
sir thoma grey knight northumberland 
have gilt franc o guilt inde 
confirm conspiraci fear franc 
and hand grace king must die 
if hell treason hold promis 
ere take ship franc southampton 
linger patienc digest
th abus distanc forc play 
the sum paid traitor agre 
the king set london scene
i transport gentl southampton 
there playhous must sit 
and thenc franc shall convey safe 
and bring back charm narrow seas
to give gentl pass may 
we offend one stomach play 
but till king come forth till 
unto southampton shift scene 

 _exit _ 

scene i london a street 

 enter corpor nym lieuten bardolph 

bardolph 
well met corpor nym 

nym 
good morrow lieuten bardolph 

bardolph 
what ancient pistol friend yet 

nym 
for part i care i say littl time shall serv there
shal smile shall may i dare fight i
wil wink hold mine iron it simpl one though 
it toast chees endur cold anoth man sword
wil end 

bardolph 
i bestow breakfast make friend three
sworn brother franc let good corpor nym 

nym 
faith i live long i may certain when
i can not live longer i i may that rest is
th rendezv 

bardolph 
it certain corpor marri nell quickli and
certainli wrong troth plight 

nym 
i can not tell thing must may men may sleep may
hav throat time say knive have
edg it must may though patienc tire mare yet she
wil plod there must conclus well i can not tell 

 enter pistol hostess 

bardolph 
here come ancient pistol wife good corpor patient 
how mine host pistol 

pistol 
base tike call st thou host 
now hand i swear i scorn term 
nor shall nell keep lodger 

hostess 
no troth long can not lodg board dozen or
fourteen gentlewomen live honestli prick needl 
but thought keep bawdi hous straight _nym pistol
draw _ o well day ladi drawn we shall see wilful
adulteri murder commit 

bardolph 
good lieuten good corpor offer noth 

nym 
pish 

pistol 
pish thee iceland dog thou prick ear cur iceland 

hostess 
good corpor nym show thi valour put sword 

nym 
will shog i would _solus_ 

pistol 
_solus_ egregi dog o viper vile 
the _solus_ thi mervail face 
the _solus_ thi teeth thi throat 
and thi hate lung yea thi maw perdi 
and wors within thi nasti mouth 
i retort _solus_ thi bowel 
for i take pistol cock 
and flash fire follow 

nym 
i barbason can not conjur i humour knock you
indiffer well if grow foul pistol i scour you
with rapier i may fair term if would walk i would
prick gut littl good term i may the
humour 

pistol 
o braggart vile damn furiou wight 
the grave doth gape dote death near 
therefor exhal 

bardolph 
hear hear i say he strike first stroke i run
him hilt i soldier 

 _draw _ 

pistol 
an oath mickl might furi shall abat 
give thi fist thi fore foot give 
thi spirit tall 

nym 
i cut thi throat one time fair term the
humour 

pistol 
 coupl gorg 
that word i thee defi 
o hound crete think st thou spous get 
no spital go 
and powder tub infamy
fetch forth lazar kite cressid kind 
doll tearsheet name espous 
i i hold quondam quickly
for _pauca_ enough 
go 

 enter boy 

boy 
mine host pistol must come master hostess he is
veri sick would bed good bardolph put thi face his
sheet offic warm pan faith ill 

bardolph 
away rogu 

hostess 
bi troth yield crow pud one day 
the king kill heart 
good husband come home present 

 _exeunt hostess boy _ 

bardolph 
come shall i make two friend we must franc togeth the
devil keep knive cut one anoth throat

let flood erswel fiend food howl

that i humour

 _they draw _ 

bardolph 
bi sword make first thrust i kill this
sword i 

pistol 
sword oath oath must cours 

bardolph

whi enemi prithe put

unto camp profit accru 
give thi hand

 enter hostess 

hostess 
a ever come women come quickli sir john

scene ii southampton a council chamber 

 enter exet bedford westmorland 

bedford 
 fore god grace bold trust traitor 

exet 
they shall apprehend 

westmorland 
how smooth even bear 
a allegi bosom sat
crown faith constant loyalti 

bedford 
the king hath note intend 
bi intercept dream 

exet 
nay man bed fellow 
whom hath dull cloy graciou favour 
that foreign purs sell
hi sovereign life death treacheri 

 trumpet sound enter king henri scroop cambridg grey 

king henri 
now sit wind fair aboard 
mi lord cambridg kind lord masham 
and gentl knight give thought 
think power bear us
wil cut passag forc franc 
do execut act
for head assembl 

scroop 
no doubt lieg man best 

king henri 
i doubt sinc well persuaded
w carri heart us hence
that grow fair consent 
nor leav one behind doth wish
success conquest attend us 

cambridg 
never monarch better fear lov d
than majesti there i think subject
that sit heart grief uneasiness
und sweet shade govern 

grey 
true father enemies
hav steep gall honey serv you
with heart creat duti zeal 

king henri 
we therefor great caus thank 
and shall forget offic hand
soon quittanc desert merit
accord weight worthi 

scroop 
so servic shall steel sinew toil 
and labour shall refresh hope 
to grace incess servic 

king henri 
we judg less uncl exet 
enlarg man commit yesterday 
that rail person we consider
it excess wine set 
and advic pardon 

scroop 
that merci much secur 
let punish sovereign lest example
bre suffer kind 

king henri 
o let us yet merci 

cambridg 
so may high yet punish 

grey 
sir 
you show great merci give life
aft tast much correct 

king henri 
ala much love care me
ar heavi orison gainst poor wretch 
if littl fault proceed distemp 
shall wink shall stretch eye
when capit crime chew swallow digest 
appear us we yet enlarg man 
though cambridg scroop grey dear care
and tender preserv person 
would punish and french caus 
who late commission 

cambridg 
i one lord 
your high bade ask today 

scroop 
so lieg 

grey 
and i royal sovereign 

king henri 
then richard earl cambridg 
there lord scroop masham sir knight 
grey northumberland 
read know i know worthi 
mi lord westmorland uncl exet 
we aboard tonight whi gentlemen 
what see paper lose
so much complexion look ye chang 
their cheek paper whi read 
that coward cha blood
out appear 

cambridg 
i confess fault 
and submit high merci 

grey scroop 
to appeal 

king henri 
the merci quick us late 
bi counsel suppress kill 
you must dare shame talk merci 
for reason turn bosom 
a dog upon master worri 
see princ nobl peer 
these english monster my lord cambridg 
you know apt love accord
to furnish appertinents
belong honour man
hath light crown lightli conspir d
and sworn unto practic france
to kill us hampton which
thi knight less bounti bound us
than cambridg hath likewis sworn but o
what shall i say thee lord scroop thou cruel 
ingrat savag inhuman creatur 
thou didst bear key counsel 
that knew st bottom soul 
that almost mightst coin gold 
wouldst thou practi thi use 
may possibl foreign hire
could thee extract one spark evil
that might annoy finger ti strang 
that though truth stand gross
a black white eye scarc see 
treason murder ever kept togeth 
a two yoke devil sworn either purpos 
work grossli natur cause
that admir whoop 
but thou gainst proport didst bring in
wond wait treason murder 
and whatsoev cun fiend was
that wrought upon thee preposterously
hath got voic hell excel 
and devil suggest treasons
do botch bungl damnation
with patch colour form fetch d
from glist ring semblanc pieti 
but temper thee bade thee stand 
gave thee instanc thou shouldst treason 
unless dub thee name traitor 
if demon hath gull thee thus
should lion gait walk whole world 
he might return vasti tartar back 
and tell legion i never win
a soul easi englishman 
o hast thou jealousi infected
th sweet affianc show men duti 
whi didst thou seem grave learn 
whi didst thou come nobl famili 
whi didst thou seem religi 
whi didst thou or spare diet 
free gross passion mirth anger 
constant spirit swerv blood 
garnish deck modest complement 
not work eye without ear 
and purg judgement trust neither 
such fine bolt didst thou seem 
and thu thi fall hath left kind blot
to mark full fraught man best indued
with suspicion i weep thee 
for revolt thine methink like
anoth fall man their fault open 
arrest answer law 
and god acquit practic 

exet 
i arrest thee high treason name richard earl of
cambridg 
i arrest thee high treason name henri lord scroop of
masham 
i arrest thee high treason name thoma grey knight of
northumberland 

scroop 
our purpos god justli hath discov 
and i repent fault death 
which i beseech high forgiv 
although bodi pay price 

cambridg 
for gold franc seduc 
although i admit motive
th sooner effect i intend 
but god thank prevent 
which i suffer heartili rejoic 
beseech god pardon 

grey 
never faith subject rejoice
at discoveri danger treason
than i hour joy er 
prevent damn enterpris 
mi fault bodi pardon sovereign 

king henri 
god quit merci hear sentenc 
you conspir royal person 
join enemi proclaim coffers
receiv golden earnest death 
wherein would sold king slaughter 
hi princ peer servitud 
hi subject oppress contempt 
and whole kingdom desol 
touch person seek reveng 
but kingdom safeti must tender 
whose ruin sought laws
w deliv get therefor henc 
poor miser wretch death 
the tast whereof god merci give
y patienc endur true repentance
of dear offenc bear henc 

 _exeunt cambridg scroop grey guard _ 

now lord franc enterpris whereof
shal us like gloriou 
we doubt fair lucki war 
sinc god gracious hath brought light
thi danger treason lurk way
to hinder begin we doubt now
but everi rub smooth way 
then forth dear countrymen let us deliver
our puissanc hand god 
put straight expedit 
cheerli sea the sign war advanc 
no king england king franc

scene iv franc the king palac 

 flourish enter french king dauphin duke berri and
 brittani constabl other 

french king 
thu come english full power upon us 
and care us concerns
to answer royal defenc 
therefor duke berri brittani 
of brabant orlean shall make forth 
and princ dauphin swift dispatch 
to line new repair town war
with men courag mean defend 
for england approach make fierce
a water suck gulf 
it fit us provident
a fear may teach us late examples
left fatal neglect english
upon field 

dauphin 
mi redoubt father 
it meet arm us gainst foe 
for peac dull kingdom 
though war known quarrel question 
but defenc muster prepar 
should maintain assembl collect 
a war expect 
therefor i say ti meet go forth
to view sick feebl part franc 
and let us show fear 
no heard england
wer busi whitsun morri danc 
for good lieg idli king 
her sceptr fantast borne
bi vain giddi shallow humor youth 
that fear attend 

constabl 
o peac princ dauphin

with great state heard embassi 
how well suppli nobl counsellor 
how modest except withal
how terribl constant resolut 
and shall find vaniti forespent
wer outsid roman brutu 
cover discret coat folli 
a garden ordur hide roots
that shall first spring delic

but though think matter 
in case defenc ti best weigh
th enemi mighti seem 
so proport defenc fill 
which weak niggardli project 
doth like miser spoil coat scanting
a littl cloth 

french king

and princ look strongli arm meet 
the kindr hath flesh upon us 
and bred bloodi strain
that haunt us familiar path 
wit much memor shame
when cressi battl fatal struck 
and princ captiv hand
of black name edward black princ wale 
while mountain sire mountain stand 
up air crown golden sun 
saw heroic seed smil see

th pattern god french fathers
had twenti year made thi stem
of victori stock let us fear
th nativ mighti fate

that divest lay apart

from fam famou ancestor

your crown kingdom indirectli held
from nativ true challeng

even heart rake

on poor soul hungri war

thi claim threat ning messag

to expressli i bring greet

back brother england

act iii

 flourish enter choru 

choru 
thu imagin wing swift scene fli 
in motion less celerity
than thought suppos seen
th well appoint king hampton pier

with silken streamer young phoebu fan 
play fanci behold
upon hempen tackl ship boy climb

to sound confu behold threaden sail 
born invis creep wind 
draw huge bottom furrow sea

scene i franc befor harfleur 

 alarum enter king henri exet bedford gloucest soldier 
 scale ladder 

king henri 
onc unto breach dear friend 
or close wall english dead 
in peac noth becom man
a modest still humil 
but blast war blow ear 
then imit action tiger 
stiffen sinew summon blood 
disguis fair natur hard favour rage 
then lend eye terribl aspect 
let pri portag head
lik brass cannon let brow erwhelm it
a fear gall rock
o erhang jutti confound base 
swill wild wast ocean 
now set teeth stretch nostril wide 
hold hard breath bend everi spirit
to full height on noblest english 
whose blood fet father war proof 
father like mani alexand 
have part morn till even fought 
and sheath sword lack argument 
dishonour mother attest
that call father beget 
be copi men grosser blood 
and teach war and good yeomen 
whose limb made england show us here
th mettl pastur let us swear
that worth breed i doubt 
for none mean base 
that hath nobl lustr eye 
i see stand like greyhound slip 
strain upon start the game afoot 
follow spirit upon charge
cri god harri england saint georg

scene iii befor gate 

 the governor citizen wall english forc 
 enter king henri train 

king henri 
how yet resolv governor town 
thi latest parl admit 
therefor best merci give 
or like men proud destruction
defi us worst i soldier 
a name thought becom best 
if i begin batteri 
i leav half achiev harfleur
til ash lie buri 
the gate merci shall shut 
and flesh soldier rough hard heart 
in liberti bloodi hand shall range
with conscienc wide hell mow like grass
your fresh fair virgin flow ring infant 
what impiou war 
array flame like princ fiend 
do smirch complexion fell feats
enlink wast desol 
what caus 
if pure maiden fall hand
of hot forc violat 
what rein hold licenti wickedness
when hill hold fierc career 
we may bootless spend vain command
upon enrag soldier spoil
a send precept leviathan
to come ashor therefor men harfleur 
take piti town peopl 
while yet soldier command 
while yet cool temper wind grace
o erblow filthi contagi clouds
of headi murder spoil villaini 
if moment look see
th blind bloodi soldier foul hand
defil lock shrill shriek daughter 
your father taken silver beard 
and reverend head dash wall 
your nake infant spit upon pike 
while mad mother howl confu d
do break cloud wive jewry
at herod bloodi hunt slaughtermen 
what say will yield avoid 
or guilti defenc thu destroy 

governor 
our expect hath day end 
the dauphin succour entreat 
return us power yet ready
to rais great sieg therefor great king 
we yield town live thi soft merci 
enter gate dispos us 
for longer defens 

king henri 
open gate come uncl exet 
go enter harfleur remain 
and fortifi strongli gainst french 
use merci for us dear uncl 
the winter come sick growing
upon soldier retir calai 
tonight harfleur guest 
tomorrow march addrest 

 flourish the king train enter town

scene v the 

 enter king franc dauphin duke bourbon the
 constabl franc other 

french king 
 ti certain hath pass river somm 

constabl 
and fought withal lord 
let us live franc let us quit all
and give vineyard barbar peopl 

dauphin 
_o dieu vivant_ shall spray us 
the empti father luxuri 
our scion put wild savag stock 
spirt suddenli cloud 
and overlook grafter 

bourbon 
norman bastard norman norman bastard 
_mort de vie_ march along
unfought withal i sell dukedom 
to buy slobberi dirti farm
in nook shotten isl albion 

constabl 
_dieu de batailles_ mettl 
i climat foggi raw dull 
on despit sun look pale 
kill fruit frown can sodden water 
a drench sur rein jade barley broth 
decoct cold blood valiant heat 
and shall quick blood spirit wine 
seem frosti o honour land 
let us hang like rope icicles
upon hous thatch while frosti people
sweat drop gallant youth rich field 
poor may call nativ lord 

dauphin 
bi faith honour 
our madam mock us plainli say
our mettl bred give
their bodi lust english youth
to new store franc bastard warrior 

bourbon 
they bid us english danc school 
and teach lavolta high swift coranto 
say grace heel 
and lofti runaway 

french king 
where montjoy herald speed henc 
let greet england sharp defianc 
up princ spirit honour edged
mor sharper sword hie field 
charl delabreth high constabl franc 
you duke orlean bourbon berri 
alenon brabant bar burgundi 
jacqu chatillon rambur vaudemont 
beaumont grandpr roussi fauconbridg 
foix lestral boucicault charoloi 
high duke great princ baron lord knight 
for great seat quit great shame 
bar harri england sweep land
with pennon paint blood harfleur 
rush host doth melt snow
upon valley whose low vassal seat
th alp doth spit void rheum upon 
go upon power enough 
and captiv chariot rouen
br prison 

constabl 
thi becom great 
sorri i number 
hi soldier sick famish march 
for i sure shall see armi 
he drop heart sink fear
and achiev offer us ransom 

french king 
therefor lord constabl hast montjoy 
and let say england send
to know will ransom give 
princ dauphin shall stay us rouen 

dauphin 
not i beseech majesti 

french king

now forth lord constabl princ 
and quickli bring us word england fall

possess pridg enforc retir duke of
exet master pridg i tell majesti duke a
prav man

what men lost fluellen 

fluellen

marri part i think duke hath lost never man one
that like execut rob church one bardolph your
majesti know man hi face bubukl whelk knob

 tucket enter montjoy 

montjoy

mi master mind 

king henri

montjoy 
thu say king say thou harri england though seem dead 
we sleep advantag better soldier rash tell him
w could rebuk harfleur thought good to
bruis injuri till full ripe now speak upon cue and
our voic imperi england shall repent folli see his
weak admir suffer bid therefor consid his
ransom must proport loss born subject we
hav lost disgrac digest weight answer 
hi pettish would bow for loss exchequ too
poor effus blood muster kingdom too
faint number disgrac person kneel our

condemn pronounc so far king master much my
offic

what thi name i know thi qualiti 

montjoy 
montjoy 

king henri 
thou dost thi offic fairli turn thee back 
and tell thi king i seek 
but could will march calais
without impeach say sooth 
though ti wisdom confess much
unto enemi craft vantag 
mi peopl sick much enfeebl 
mi number lessen i have
almost better mani french 
who health i tell thee herald 
i thought upon one pair english legs
did march three frenchmen yet forgiv god 
that i brag thu thi air france
hath blown vice i must repent 
go therefor tell thi master i 
mi ransom frail worthless trunk 
mi armi weak sickli guard 
yet god tell come 
though franc anoth neighbour
stand way there thi labour montjoy 
go bid thi master well advis 
if may pass hind red 
we shall tawni ground red blood
discolour montjoy fare well 
the sum answer 
we would seek battl 
nor say shun 
so tell master 

montjoy 
i shall deliv thank high

gloucest

and tomorrow bid march away

act iv

 enter choru 

choru 
now entertain conjectur time
when creep murmur pore dark
fil wide vessel univers 
from camp camp foul womb night
th hum either armi stilli sound 
that fix sentinel almost receive
th secret whisper watch 
fire answer fire pali flames
each battl see umber face 
steed threaten steed high boast neighs
pierc night dull ear tents
th armour accomplish knight 
with busi hammer close rivet 
give dread note prepar 
the countri cock crow clock toll 
and third hour drowsi morn name 
proud number secur soul 
the confid lusti french
do low rate english play dice 
and chide crippl tardi gait night
who like foul ugli witch doth limp
so tedious away the poor condemn english 
like sacrific watch fires
sit patient inli ruminate
th morn danger gestur sad 
invest lank lean cheek war worn coat 
present unto gaze moon
so mani horrid ghost o behold
th royal captain ruin band
walk watch watch tent tent 
let cri prais glori head 
for forth goe visit host 
bid good morrow modest smile 
and call brother friend countrymen 
upon royal face note
how dread armi hath enround 
nor doth dedic one jot colour
unto weari watch night 
but freshli look bear attaint
with cheer semblanc sweet majesti 
that everi wretch pine pale 
behold pluck comfort look 
a largess univers like sun
hi liber eye doth give everyon 
thaw cold fear mean gentl all
behold may unworthi defin 
a littl touch harri night 
and scene must battl fli 
where o piti shall much disgrace
with four five vile rag foil 
right ill dispo brawl ridicul 
the name agincourt yet sit see 
mind true thing mock rie 

 _exit _ 

scene i the english camp agincourt 

 enter king henri bedford gloucest 

king henri 
gloucest ti true great danger 
the greater therefor courag 
good morrow brother bedford god almighti 
there soul good thing evil 
would men observingli distil 
for bad neighbour make us earli stirrer 
which health good husbandri 
besid outward conscienc 
and preacher us admonishing
that dress us fairli end 
thu may gather honey weed 
and make moral devil

human condit hi ceremoni laid naked appears

that know 

bate 
ay seek know enough know
w king subject if caus wrong obedi the
k wipe crime us 

william 
but caus good king hath heavi reckoning
to make leg arm head chopp a
battl shall join togeth latter day cri we die at
such place swear cri surgeon upon
their wive left poor behind upon debt owe some
upon children rawli left i afeard die well that
di battl charit dispos anyth when
blood argument now men die well be
a black matter king led disobey were
against proport subject 

king henri 
so son father sent merchandis sinfully
miscarri upon sea imput wicked rule 
should impos upon father sent servant under
hi master command transport sum money assail by
robb die mani irreconcil iniqu may call the
busi master author servant damnat but this
i the king bound answer particular end of
hi soldier father son master servant for
they purpos death purpos servic 
besid king caus never spotless come
to arbitr sword tri unspotted
soldi some peradventur guilt premedit and
contriv murder beguil virgin broken seal of
perjuri make war bulwark gored
th gentl bosom peac pillag robberi now men
hav defeat law outrun nativ punish though can
outstrip men wing fli god war beadl 
war vengeanc men punish breach
of king law king quarrel where fear the
death born life away would safe they
perish then die unprovid king guilti of
their damnat guilti impieti the
which visit everi subject duti king but
everi subject soul therefor everi soldier the
war everi sick man bed wash everi mote his
consci die death advantag die the
tim blessedli lost wherein prepar gain him
that escap sin think make god free an
off he let outliv day see hi great teach
oth prepar

k answer

lustili

poor privat displeasur monarch you may as

 _exeunt soldier _ 

 upon king let us live soul 
our debt care wive 
our children sin lay king 
we must bear o hard condit 
twin born great subject breath
of everi fool whose sens feel
but wring what infinit heart ease
must king neglect privat men enjoy 
and king privat 
save ceremoni save gener ceremoni 
and art thou thou idol ceremoni 
what kind god art thou suffer st more
of mortal grief thi worshipp 
what thi rent what thi come 
o ceremoni show thi worth 
what thi soul ador 
art thou aught els place degre form 
creat awe fear men 
wherein thou art less happi fear d
than fear 
what drink st thou oft instead homag sweet 
but poison flatteri o sick great great 
and bid thi ceremoni give thee cure 
think st thou fieri fever go out
with titl blown adul 
will give place flexur low bend 
canst thou thou command st beggar knee 
command health no thou proud dream 
that play st subtli king repos 
i king find thee i know
 ti balm sceptr ball 
the sword mace crown imperi 
the intertissu robe gold pearl 
the farc titl run fore king 
the throne sit tide pomp
that beat upon high shore world 
no thrice gorgeou ceremoni 
not laid bed majest 
can sleep soundli wretch slave 
who bodi fill vacant mind
get rest cramm distress bread 
never see horrid night child hell 
but like lackey rise set
sweat eye phoebu night
sleep elysium next day dawn 
doth rise help hyperion hors 
and follow ever run year 
with profit labour grave 
and ceremoni wretch 
wind day toil night sleep 
had fore hand vantag king 
the slave member countri peac 
enjoy gross brain littl wots
what watch king keep maintain peac 
whose hour peasant best advantag 

 enter erpingham 

erpingham

collect togeth tent 
i thee 

erpingham

 _exit _ 

king henri 
o god battl steel soldier heart 
possess fear take now
th sens reckon oppos numbers
pluck heart not today o lord 
o today think upon fault
mi father made compass crown 
i richard bodi inter new 
and bestow contrit tears
than issu forc drop blood 
five hundr poor i yearli pay 
who twice day wither hand hold up
toward heaven pardon blood i built
two chantri sad solemn priests
s still richard soul more i 
though i noth worth 
sinc penit come 
implor pardon

i know thi errand i go thee 
the day friend thing stay

that hot blood may spin english eye

how shall behold natur tear 

 enter messeng 

messeng 
the english embattl french peer 

constabl 
to hors gallant princ straight hors 
do behold yon poor starv band 
and fair show shall suck away soul 
leav shale husk men 
there work enough hand 
scarc blood enough sickli veins
to give nake curtl axe stain 
that french gallant shall today draw 
and sheath lack sport let us blow 
the vapour valour erturn 
 ti posit gainst except lord 
that superflu lackey peasant 
who unnecessari action swarm
about squar battl enough
to purg field hild foe 
though upon mountain basi by
took stand idl specul 
but honour must what say 
a littl littl let us 
and done then let trumpet sound
th tucket sonanc note mount 
for approach shall much dare field
that england shall crouch fear yield 

 enter grandpr 

grandpr 
whi stay long lord franc 
yond island carrion desper bone 
ill favouredli becom morn field 
their rag curtain poorli let loos 
and air shake pass scorn 
big mar seem bankrupt beggar host 
and faintli rusti beaver peep 
the horsemen sit like fix candlesticks
with torch stave hand poor jades
lob head droop hide hip 
the gum rope pale dead eye 
and pale dull mouth gimmal bit
li foul chew grass still motionless 
and executor knavish crow 
fli er impati hour 
descript can not suit words
to demonstr life battl 
in life lifeless show 

constabl 
they said prayer stay death 

dauphin 
shall go send dinner fresh suits
and give fast hors provend 
and fight 

constabl 
i stay guard field 
i banner trumpet take 
and use hast come come away 
the sun high outwear day

scene iii the english camp 

 enter gloucest bedford exet erpingham host 
 salisburi westmorland 

gloucest 
where king 

bedford 
the king rode view battl 

westmorland 
of fight men full three score thousand 

exet 
there five one besid fresh 

salisburi 
god arm strike us ti fear odd 
god wi princ i charg 
if meet till meet heaven 
then joy nobl lord bedford 
mi dear lord gloucest good lord exet 
and kind kinsman warrior adieu 

bedford 
farewel good salisburi good luck go thee 

exet

and yet i thee wrong mind thee 
for thou art fram firm truth valour 

 _exit salisburi _ 

bedford 
he full valour kind 
princ 

 enter king 

westmorland 
o here
but one ten thousand men england
that work today 

king 
what wish 
mi cousin westmorland no fair cousin 
if mark die enough
to countri loss live 
the fewer men greater share honour 
god i pray thee wish one man 
bi jove i covet gold 
nor care i doth feed upon cost 
it yearn men garment wear 
such outward thing dwell desir 
but sin covet honour 
i offend soul aliv 
no faith coz wish man england 
god peac i would lose great honour
a one man methink would share me
for best hope i o wish one 
rather proclaim westmorland host 
that hath stomach fight 
let depart hi passport shall made 
and crown convoy put purs 
we would die man company
that fear fellowship die us 
thi day call feast crispian 
he outliv day come safe home 
will stand tip toe day name 
and rous name crispian 
he shall live day see old age 
will yearli vigil feast neighbour 
and say tomorrow saint crispian 
then strip sleev show scar 
and say these wound i crispian day 
old men forget yet shall forgot 
but rememb advantages
what feat day then shall name 
familiar mouth household word 
harri king bedford exet 
warwick talbot salisburi gloucest 
be flow cup freshli rememb 
thi stori shall good man teach son 
and crispin crispian shall ne er go 
from day end world 
but shall rememb 
we happi band brother 
for today shed blood me
shal brother ne er vile 
thi day shall gentl condit 
and gentlemen england abed
shal think accur 
and hold manhood cheap while speaks
that fought us upon saint crispin day 

 enter salisburi 

salisburi 
mi sovereign lord bestow speed 
the french brave battl set 
and expedi charg us 

king henri 
all thing readi mind 

westmorland 
perish man whose mind backward 

king henri 
thou dost wish help england coz 

westmorland 
god lieg would i alon 
without help could fight royal battl 

king henri 
whi thou hast unwish five thousand men 
which like better wish us one 
you know place god 

 tucket enter montjoy 

montjoy 
onc i come know thee king harri 
if thi ransom thou wilt compound 
befor thi assur overthrow 
for certainli thou art near gulf 
thou need must englut besid merci 
the constabl desir thee thou wilt mind
thi follow repent souls
may make peac sweet retire
from field wretch poor bodies
must lie fester 

king henri 
who hath sent thee 

montjoy 
the constabl franc 

king henri 
i pray thee bear former answer back 
bid achiev sell bone 
good god mock poor fellow thu 
the man sell lion skin
whil beast liv kill hunt 
a mani bodi shall doubt
find nativ grave upon i trust 
shall wit live brass day work 
and leav valiant bone franc 
di like men though buri dunghil 
they shall fam sun shall greet 
and draw honour reek heaven 
leav earthli part choke clime 
the smell whereof shall breed plagu franc 
mark abound valour english 
that dead like bullet graze 
break second cours mischief 
kill relaps mortal 
let speak proudli tell constable
w warrior work day 
our gay gilt besmirch d
with raini march pain field 
there piec feather host 
good argument i hope fli 
and time hath worn us slovenri 
but mass heart trim 
and poor soldier tell yet ere night
they fresher robe pluck
th gay new coat er french soldier heads
and turn servic if 
a god pleas shall ransom then
wil soon levi herald save thou thi labour 
come thou ransom gentl herald

which i leav em 
shall yield littl tell constabl

w kept togeth chivalri

and gave tear

act v

 enter choru 

choru 
vouchsaf read stori 
that i may prompt 
i humbl pray admit excuse
of time number due cours thing 
which can not huge proper life
b present now bear king
toward calai grant seen 
heav away upon wing thoughts
athwart sea behold english beach
pal flood men wive boy 
whose shout clap voic deep mouth sea 
which like mighti whiffler fore king
seem prepar way so let land 
and solemnli see set london 
so swift pace hath thought even now
you may imagin upon blackheath 
where lord desir borne
hi bruis helmet bend sword
befor citi he forbid 
be free vain self gloriou pride 
give full trophi signal ostent
quit god but behold 
in quick forg work hous thought 
how london doth pour citizen 
the mayor brethren best sort 
like senat th antiqu rome 
with plebeian swarm heel 
go forth fetch conquer caesar 
a lower love likelihood 
were gener graciou empress 
a good time may ireland come 
bring rebellion broach sword 
how mani would peac citi quit 
to welcom much much caus 
did harri now london place 
a yet lament french
invit king england stay home 
the emperor come behalf franc 
to order peac omit
al occurr whatev chanc 
till harri back return franc 
there must bring play d
the interim rememb ring ti past 
then brook abridg eye advance
aft thought straight back franc 

 _exit _

scene ii franc a royal palac 

 enter one door king henri exet bedford warwick gloucest 
 westmorland clarenc huntingdon lord at anoth queen
 isabel french king princess katharin alic other
 ladi duke burgundi french 

king henri 
peac meet wherefor met 
unto brother franc sister 
health fair time day joy good wishes
to fair princ cousin katharin 
and branch member royalti 
bi great assembl contriv 
we salut duke burgundi 
and princ french peer health 

french king 
right joyou behold face 
most worthi brother england fairli met 
so princ english everi one 

queen isabel 
so happi issu brother england 
of good day graciou meeting
a glad behold eye 
your eye hitherto born them
against french met bent
th fatal ball murder basilisk 
the venom look fairli hope 
have lost qualiti day
shal chang grief quarrel love 

king henri 
to cri amen thu appear 

queen isabel 
you english princ i salut 

burgundi 
mi duti equal love 
great king franc england that i labour 
with wit pain strong endeavour 
to bring imperi majesties
unto bar royal interview 
your mighti part best wit 
sinc offic hath far prevail d
that face face royal eye eye 
you congreet let disgrac me
if i demand royal view 
what rub impedi 
whi nake poor mangl peac 
dear nurs art plenti joy birth 
should best garden world 
our fertil franc put love visag 
ala hath franc long cha 
and husbandri doth lie heap 
corrupt fertil 
her vine merri cheerer heart 
unprun die hedg even pleach 
like prison wildli overgrown hair 
put forth disord twig fallow leas
th darnel hemlock rank fumitori 
doth root upon coulter rusts
that deracin savageri 
the even mead erst brought sweetli forth
th freckl cowslip burnet green clover 
want scyth uncorrect rank 
conceiv idl noth teems
but hate dock rough thistl kecksi bur 
lose beauti util 
and vineyard fallow mead hedg 
defect natur grow wild 
even hous children
hav lost learn want time 
the scienc becom countri 
but grow like savag soldier will
that noth medit blood 
to swear stern look diffu attir 
and everyth seem unnatur 
which reduc former favour
y assembl speech entreats
that i may know let gentl peace
should expel inconveniences
and bless us former qualiti 

king henri 
if duke burgundi would peac 
whose want give growth imperfections
which cite must buy peace
with full accord demand 
whose tenour particular effects
y enschedul briefli hand 

burgundi 
the king hath heard yet
ther answer made 

king henri 
well peac 
which urg lie answer 

french king 
i cursorari eye
o erglanc articl pleaseth grace
to appoint council presently
to sit us better heed
to survey suddenly
pass accept peremptori answer 

king henri 
brother shall go uncl exet 
and brother clarenc brother gloucest 
warwick huntington go king 
and take free power ratifi 
augment alter wisdom best
shal see advantag digniti 
anyth demand 
and consign thereto will fair sister 
go princ stay us 

queen isabel 
our graciou brother i go 
hapli woman voic may good 
when articl nice urg stood 

king henri 
yet leav cousin katharin us 
she capit demand compri d
within fore rank articl 

queen isabel 
she hath good leav 

 _exeunt except henri katharin alic _ 

king henri 
fair katharin fair 
will vouchsaf teach soldier terms
such enter ladi ear
and plead love suit gentl heart 

katharin 
your majesti shall mock i can not speak england 

king henri 
o fair katharin love soundli french heart i
wil glad hear confess brokenli english tongu 
do like kate 

katharin 
_pardonnez moi_ i can not tell wat like 

king henri 
an angel like kate like angel 

katharin 
_que dit il que je sui semblabl  le ang _

alic 
_oui vraiment sauf votr grce ainsi dit il _

king henri 
i said dear katharin i must blush affirm 

katharin 
_o bon dieu le langu de homm sont plein de tromperi _

king henri 
what say fair one that tongu men full deceit 

alic 
_oui_ dat de tongu de man full deceit dat de
princess 

king henri 
the princess better englishwoman i faith kate woo is
fit thi understand i glad thou canst speak better
english thou couldst thou wouldst find plain king
that thou wouldst think i sold farm buy crown i know no
way minc love directli say i love if
you urg farther say do faith i wear suit 
give answer faith clap hand bargain how
say ladi 

katharin 
_sauf votr honneur_ understand well 

king henri 
marri would put vers danc sake kate 
whi undid one i neither word measur and
for i strength measur yet reason measure
in strength if i could win ladi leap frog vault my
saddl armour back correct brag be
it spoken i quickli leap wife or i might buffet for
mi love bound hors favour i could lay like a
butch sit like jack ape never but god kate 
i can not look greenli gasp eloqu i cunning
in protest downright oath i never use till urg 
nor never break urg if thou canst love fellow temper 
kate whose face worth sunburn never look glass
for love anyth see let thine eye thi cook i speak
to thee plain soldier if thou canst love take 
to say thee i shall die true thi love the
lord yet i love thee and thou liv st dear kate take a
fellow plain uncoin constanc perforc must thee
right hath gift woo place these
fellow infinit tongu rhyme ladi 
favour alway reason what speaker is
but prater rhyme ballad a good leg fall straight
back stoop black beard turn white curl pate grow
bald fair face wither full eye wax hollow good
heart kate sun moon rather sun the
moon shine bright never chang keep course
truli if thou would one take take take a
soldi take soldier take king and say st thou my
lov speak fair fairli i pray thee 

katharin 
i possibl dat i love de enemi franc 

king henri 
no possibl love enemi franc kate 
in love love friend franc i love france
so well i part villag i all
min kate franc mine i is
franc mine 

katharin 
i can not tell wat dat 

king henri 
no kate i tell thee french i sure hang upon my
tongu like new marri wife husband neck hardli be
shook _je quand sur le possess de franc et quand vou avez le
possess de moi_ let see saint deni my
spe _donc votr est franc et vou te mienn _ it easi for
m kate conquer kingdom speak much french i
shal never move thee french unless laugh 

katharin

l anglai lequel je parl _

king henri

most truli fals must need grant much one but kate

king henri

wa think civil war got therefor i creat with
a stubborn outsid aspect iron i come woo

with envi happi

 _flourish _ 

queen isabel 
god best maker marriag 
combin heart one realm one 
a man wife two one love 
so twixt kingdom spousal 
that never may ill offic fell jealousi 
which troubl oft bed bless marriag 
thrust paction kingdom 
to make divorc incorpor leagu 
that english may french french englishmen 
receiv god speak amen 

all 
amen 

king henri 
prepar marriag day 
mi lord burgundi take oath 
and peer sureti leagu 
then shall i swear kate 
and may oath well kept prosper 

 _sennet exeunt _ 

epilogu 

 enter choru 

choru 
thu far rough unabl pen 
our bend author hath pursu stori 
in littl room confin mighti men 
mangl start full cours glori 
small time small greatli lived
thi star england fortun made sword 
bi world best garden achiev 
and left son imperi lord 
henri sixth infant band crown king
of franc england king succeed 
whose state mani manag 
that lost franc made england bleed 
which oft stage hath shown sake 
in fair mind let accept take 

 _exit _ 




the first part of henri the sixth

dramati personae

 king henri the sixth
 duke of gloucest uncl king protector
 duke of bedford uncl king regent france
 thoma beaufort duke of exet great uncl king
 henri beaufort great uncl king bishop of winchest 
 afterward cardinal
 john beaufort earl of somerset afterward duke
 richard plantagenet son richard late earl cambridg 
 afterward duke of york
 earl of warwick
 earl of salisbury
 earl of suffolk
 lord talbot afterward earl of shrewsbury
 john talbot son
 edmund mortim earl of march
 sir john fastolfe
 sir william lucy
 sir william glansdale
 sir thoma gargrave
 mayor london
 woodvil lieuten tower
 vernon white rose york faction
 basset red rose lancast faction
 a lawyer
 gaoler mortimer
 charl dauphin afterward king france
 reignier duke of anjou titular king naples
 duke of burgundy
 duke of alencon
 bastard of orleans
 governor of paris
 master gunner of orlean son
 gener of the french forc bordeaux
 a french sergeant
 a porter
 an old shepherd father joan la pucelle
 margaret daughter reignier afterward marri to
 king henry
 countess of auvergne
 joan la pucel commonli call joan of arc

 messeng english french attend fiend appearing
 la pucelle

scen england france

th first part king henri sixth

act i scene 1 

westminst abbey

dead march enter funer king henri the fifth attend by
th duke of bedford regent franc duke of gloucest 
protector duke of exet earl of warwick bishop of
winchester

 bedford hung heaven black yield day to
 night comet import chang time state 
 brandish crystal tress sky
 and scourg bad revolt stars
 that consent unto henri death 
 king henri fifth famou live long 
 england ne er lost king much worth 
 gloucest england ne er king time 
 virtu deserv command 
 hi brandish sword blind men beam 
 hi arm spread wider dragon wing 
 hi sparkl eye replet wrath fire 
 more dazzl drove back enemies
 than mid day sun fierc bent face 
 what i say hi deed exceed speech 
 he ne er lift hand conquer 
 exet we mourn black mourn blood 
 henri dead never shall reviv 
 upon wooden coffin attend 
 and death dishonour victory
 we state presenc glorifi 
 like captiv bound triumphant car 
 what shall curs planet mishap
 that plot thu glori overthrow 
 or shall think subtl wit french
 conjur sorcer afraid 
 by magic vers contriv end 
 winchest he king bless king king 
 unto french dread judgment day
 so dread sight 
 the battl lord host fought 
 the church prayer made prosper 
 gloucest the church where had churchmen
 pray 
 hi thread life soon decay 
 none like effemin princ 
 whom like school boy may overaw 
 winchest gloucest whate er like thou art
 protector
 and lookest command princ realm 
 thi wife proud holdeth thee awe
 more god religi churchmen may 
 gloucest name religion thou lov st flesh 
 and ne er throughout year church thou go st 
 except pray thi foe 
 bedford ceas ceas jar rest mind peac 
 let altar herald wait us 
 instead gold offer arm 
 sinc arm avail henri dead 
 poster await wretch year 
 when mother moist ned eye babe shall suck 
 our isl made nourish salt tear 
 and none women left wail dead 
 henri fifth thi ghost i invoc 
 prosper realm keep civil broil 
 combat advers planet heaven 
 a far gloriou star thi soul make
 than juliu caesar bright

 enter messenger

 messeng my honour lord health 
 sad tide bring i franc 
 of loss slaughter discomfitur 
 guienn champagn rheim orlean 
 pari guysor poictier quit lost 
 bedford what say st thou man dead henri cors 
 speak softli loss great towns
 will make burst lead rise death 
 gloucest is pari lost is rouen yield 
 if henri recal life 
 these news would caus yield ghost 
 exet how lost what treacheri us 
 messeng no treacheri want men money 
 amongst soldier muttered
 that maintain sever faction 
 and whilst field dispatch fought 
 you disput gener 
 one would ling ring war littl cost 
 anoth would fli swift wanteth wing 
 a third think without expens 
 by guil fair word peac may obtain 
 awak awak english nobil 
 let sloth dim honour new begot 
 cropp flower de luce arm 
 of england coat one half cut away 
 exet were tear want funer 
 these tide would call forth flow tide 
 bedford me concern regent i franc 
 give steel coat i fight franc 
 away disgrac wail robe 
 wound i lend french instead eye 
 to weep intermiss miseri 

 enter second messenger

 second messeng lord view letter full bad
 mischanc 
 franc revolt english quit 
 except petti town import 
 the dauphin charl crown king rheim 
 the bastard orlean join 
 reignier duke anjou doth take part 
 the duke alencon flieth side 
 exet the dauphin crown king fli 
 o whither shall fli reproach 
 gloucest we fli enemi throat 
 bedford thou slack i fight 
 bedford gloucest doubt st thou forward 
 an armi i muster thought 
 wherewith alreadi franc overrun 

 enter third messenger

 third messeng my graciou lord add your
 lament 
 wherewith bedew king henri hears 
 i must inform dismal fight
 betwixt stout lord talbot french 
 winchest what wherein talbot overcam is 
 third messeng o wherein lord talbot was
 erthrown 
 the circumst i tell larg 
 the tenth august last dread lord 
 retir sieg orlean 
 have full scarc six thousand troop 
 by three twenti thousand french
 wa round encompass set upon 
 no leisur enrank men 
 he want pike set archer 
 instead whereof sharp stake pluck hedges
 they pitch ground confusedly
 to keep horsemen break 
 more three hour fight continu 
 where valiant talbot human thought 
 enact wonder sword lanc 
 hundr sent hell none durst stand 
 here everywher enrag slew
 the french exclaim devil arm 
 all whole armi stood agaz 
 hi soldier spi undaunt spirit 
 a talbot talbot cri amain 
 and rush bowel battl 
 here conquest fulli seal up
 if sir john fastolf play coward 
 he vaward plac behind
 with purpos reliev follow 
 cowardli fled struck one stroke 
 henc grew gener wreck massacr 
 enclos enemi 
 a base walloon win dauphin grace 
 thrust talbot spear back 
 whom franc chief assembl strength 
 durst presum look face 
 bedford is talbot slain then i slay 
 for live idli pomp eas 
 whilst worthi leader want aid 
 unto dastard foemen betray 
 third messeng o live took prison 
 and lord scale lord hungerford 
 most rest slaughter took likewis 
 bedford hi ransom none i shall pay 
 i hale dauphin headlong throne 
 hi crown shall ransom friend 
 four lord i chang one 
 farewel master task i 
 bonfir franc forthwith i make
 to keep great saint georg feast withal 
 ten thousand soldier i take 
 whose bloodi deed shall make europ quak 
 third messeng so need orlean besieg 
 the english armi grown weak faint 
 the earl salisburi craveth supply
 and hardli keep men mutini 
 sinc watch multitud 
 exet rememb lord oath henri sworn 
 either quell dauphin utterli 
 or bring obedi yoke 
 bedford i rememb take leave
 to go prepar exit
 gloucest i tower hast i can
 to view th artilleri munit 
 and i proclaim young henri king exit
 exet to eltham i young king 
 be ordain special governor 
 and safeti i best devis exit
 winchest asid each hath place function to
 attend 
 i left noth remain 
 but long i jack offic 
 the king eltham i intend steal 
 and sit chiefest stern public weal exeunt

 scene 2 

 franc befor orleans

 sound flourish enter charl the dauphin alencon 
 reignier march drum soldiers

 charl mar true move even heavens
 so earth day known 
 late shine upon english side 
 now victor upon us smile 
 what town moment 
 at pleasur lie near orlean 
 otherwhil famish english like pale ghost 
 faintli besieg us one hour month 
 alencon they want porridg fat bull
 beev 
 either must diet like mules
 and provend tie mouth 
 or piteou look like drown mice 
 reignier let rais sieg whi live idli 
 talbot taken wont fear 
 remaineth none mad brain salisburi 
 and may well fret spend gall
 nor men money hath make war 
 charl sound sound alarum rush 
 now honour forlorn french 
 him i forgiv death killeth 
 when see go back one foot flee exeunt

 here alarum they beaten hack english with
 great loss re enter charl alencon reignier

 charl who ever saw like what men i 
 dog coward dastard i would ne er fled
 but left midst enemi 
 reignier salisburi desper homicid 
 he fighteth one weari life 
 the lord like lion want food 
 do rush upon us hungri prey 
 alencon froissart countryman records
 england oliv rowland bred
 dure time edward third reign 
 more truli may verifi 
 for none samson goliases
 it sendeth forth skirmish one ten 
 lean raw bon rascal who would e er suppose
 they courag audac 
 charl let leav town hare brain d
 slave 
 and hunger enforc eager 
 of old i know rather teeth
 the wall tear forsak sieg 
 reignier i think odd gimmer device
 their arm set like clock still strike 
 els ne er could hold 
 by consent even let alon 
 alencon be 

 enter bastard of orleans

 bastard where princ dauphin i news 
 charl bastard orlean thrice welcom us 
 bastard methink look sad cheer appal 
 hath late overthrow wrought offenc 
 be dismay succour hand 
 a holi maid hither i bring 
 which vision sent heaven 
 ordain rais tediou siege
 and drive english forth bound franc 
 the spirit deep propheci hath 
 exceed nine sibyl old rome 
 what past come descri 
 speak shall i call believ word 
 for certain unfal 
 charl go call exit bastard 
 but first tri skill 
 reignier stand thou dauphin place 
 question proudli let thi look stern 
 by mean shall sound skill hath 

 re enter bastard of orlean with
 joan la pucelle

 reignier fair maid thou wilt wondrou feat 
 pucel reignier thou thinkest beguil 
 where dauphin come come behind 
 i know thee well though never seen 
 be amaz noth hid 
 in privat i talk thee apart 
 stand back lord give us leav awhil 
 reignier she take upon brave first dash 
 pucel dauphin i birth shepherd daughter 
 my wit untrain kind art 
 heaven ladi graciou hath plea d
 to shine contempt estat 
 lo whilst i wait tender lambs
 and sun parch heat display cheek 
 god mother deign appear 
 and vision full majesty
 will leav base vocation
 and free countri calamity
 her aid promi assur success 
 in complet glori reveal 
 and wherea i black swart 
 with clear ray infu me
 that beauti i bless may see 
 ask question thou canst possibl 
 and i answer unpremedit 
 my courag tri combat thou dar st 
 and thou shalt find i exceed sex 
 resolv thou shalt fortunate
 if thou receiv thi warlik mate 
 charl thou hast astonish thi high term 
 onli proof i thi valour make
 in singl combat thou shalt buckl 
 and thou vanquishest thi word true 
 otherwis i renounc confid 
 pucel i prepar keen edg sword 
 deck five flower de luce side 
 the tourain saint katherin churchyard 
 out great deal old iron i chose forth 
 charl then come god name i fear woman 
 pucel and i live i ne er fli man 
 here fight joan la pucel overcom 
 charl stay stay thi hand thou art amazon 
 and fightest sword deborah 
 pucel christ mother help els i weak 
 charl whoe er help thee ti thou must help 
 impati i burn thi desir 
 my heart hand thou hast subdu 
 excel pucel thi name 
 let thi servant sovereign 
 ti french dauphin sueth thee thu 
 pucel i must yield rite love 
 for profess sacr 
 when i chase thi foe henc 
 then i think upon recompens 
 charl meantim look graciou thi prostrat thrall 
 reignier my lord methink long talk 
 alencon doubtless shrive woman smock 
 els ne er could long protract speech 
 reignier shall disturb sinc keep mean 
 alencon he may mean poor men know 
 these women shrewd tempter tongu 
 reignier my lord what devis 
 shall give er orlean 
 pucel whi i say distrust recreant 
 fight till last gasp i guard 
 charl what say i confirm fight 
 pucel assign i english scourg 
 thi night sieg assuredli i rais 
 expect saint martin summer halcyon day 
 sinc i enter war 
 glori like circl water 
 which never ceaseth enlarg itself
 till broad spread dispers nought 
 with henri death english circl end 
 dispers glori includ 
 now i like proud insult ship
 which caesar fortun bare 
 charl wa mahomet inspir dove 
 thou eagl art inspir 
 helen mother great constantin 
 nor yet saint philip daughter like thee 
 bright star venu fall n earth 
 how may i rever worship thee enough 
 alencon leav delay let us rais sieg 
 reignier woman thou canst save honour 
 drive orlean immortaliz 
 charl present tri come let away 
 no prophet i trust prove fals exeunt

 scene 3 

 london befor tower gates

 enter duke of gloucest serv men
 blue coats

 gloucest i come survey tower day 
 sinc henri death i fear convey 
 where warder wait 
 open gate ti gloucest call 
 first warder within who knock so
 imperi 
 first serv man it nobl duke gloucest 
 second warder within whoe er may be
 let 
 first serv man villain answer lord
 protector 
 first warder within the lord protect we
 answer 
 we otherwis 
 gloucest who will whose stand but
 mine 
 there none protector realm i 
 break gate i warrant 
 shall i flout thu dunghil groom 
 gloucest s men rush tower gate and
 woodvil lieuten speak within 
 woodvil within what nois what traitors
 
 gloucest lieuten whose voic i hear 
 open gate gloucest would enter 
 woodvil within have patienc nobl duke i may
 open 
 the cardin winchest forbid 
 from i express commandment
 that thou none thine shall let 
 gloucest faint heart woodvil prizest fore 
 arrog winchest haughti prelate
 whom henri late sovereign ne er could brook 
 thou art friend god king 
 open gate i shut thee shortli 
 serv men open gate unto lord protector 
 or burst open come quickli 

 enter protector tower gate winchester
 men tawni coats

 winchest how ambiti humphri what means
 
 gloucest peel priest dost thou command be
 shut 
 winchest i thou usurp proditor 
 and protector king realm 
 gloucest stand back thou manifest conspir 
 thou contriv st murder dead lord 
 thou giv st whore indulg sin 
 i canvass thee thi broad cardin hat 
 if thou proceed thi insol 
 winchest nay stand thou back i budg foot 
 thi damascu thou curs cain 
 to slay thi brother abel thou wilt 
 gloucest i slay thee i drive thee back 
 thi scarlet robe child bear cloth
 i use carri thee place 
 winchest do thou dar st i beard thee thi face 
 gloucest what i dar beard face 
 draw men privileg place
 blue coat tawni coat priest bewar beard 
 i mean tug cuff soundli 
 under feet i stamp thi cardin hat 
 in spite pope digniti church 
 here cheek i drag thee 
 winchest gloucest thou wilt answer the
 pope 
 gloucest winchest goos i cri a rope rope 
 now beat henc let stay 
 thee i chase henc thou wolf sheep array 
 out tawni coat out scarlet hypocrit 

 here gloucest s men beat cardin s
 men enter hurli burli mayor of
 london officers

 mayor fie lord suprem magistr 
 thu contumeli break peac 
 gloucest peac mayor thou know st littl wrong 
 here beaufort regard god king 
 hath distrain tower use 
 winchest here gloucest foe citizen 
 one still motion war never peac 
 o ercharg free purs larg fine 
 that seek overthrow religion 
 becaus protector realm 
 and would armour tower 
 to crown king suppress princ 
 gloucest i will answer thee word blow 
 here skirmish 
 mayor nought rest tumultu strife
 but make open proclam 
 come offic loud e er thou canst 
 cri 
 offic cri all manner men assembl arms
 day god peac king charge
 command high name repair to
 sever dwell place wear handl or
 use sword weapon dagger henceforward upon
 pain death 
 gloucest cardin i breaker law 
 but shall meet break mind larg 
 winchest gloucest meet thi cost sure 
 thi heart blood i day work 
 mayor i call club away 
 thi cardin haughti devil 
 gloucest mayor farewel thou dost thou
 mayst 
 winchest abomin gloucest guard thi head 
 for i intend ere long 
 exeunt sever gloucest winchester
 servants
 mayor see coast clear depart 
 good god nobl stomach bear 
 i fight forti year exeunt

 scene 4 

 franc befor orleans

 enter wall master gunner
 of orlean boy

 master gunner sirrah thou know st orlean is
 besieg 
 and english suburb 
 boy father i know oft shot 
 how er unfortun i miss aim 
 master gunner but thou shalt be thou rul d
 
 chief master gunner i town 
 someth i must procur grace 
 the princ espial inform me
 how english suburb close intrench 
 wont secret grate iron bars
 in yonder tower overp citi 
 and thenc discov advantage
 they may vex us shot assault 
 to intercept inconveni 
 a piec ordnanc gainst i plac 
 and even three day i watch d
 if i could see now thou watch 
 for i stay longer 
 if thou spi st run bring word 
 and thou shalt find governor exit
 boy father i warrant take care 
 i never troubl i may spi exit

 enter salisburi talbot turret with
 sir william glansdal sir thoma gargrav 
 others

 salisburi talbot life joy return 
 how wert thou handl prison 
 or mean got st thou relea 
 discours i prithe turret top 
 talbot the earl bedford prisoner
 call brave lord ponton de santrail 
 for i exchang ransom 
 but baser man arm far
 onc contempt would barter 
 which i disdain scorn crave death
 rather i would vile esteem 
 in fine redeem i i desir 
 but o treacher fastolf wound heart
 whom bare fist i would execut 
 if i brought power 
 salisburi yet tell st thou thou wert entertain 
 talbot with scoff scorn contumeli taunt 
 in open market place produc me
 to public spectacl 
 here said terror french 
 the scarecrow affright children 
 then broke i offic led 
 and nail digg stone ground
 to hurl behold shame 
 my grisli counten made other fli 
 none durst come near fear sudden death 
 in iron wall deem secur 
 so great fear name mongst spread
 that suppo i could rend bar steel
 and spurn piec post adam 
 wherefor guard chosen shot i had
 that walk everi minut 
 and i stir bed 
 readi shoot heart 

 enter boy linstock

 salisburi i griev hear torment endur 
 but reveng suffici 
 now supper time orlean 
 here grate i count one
 and view frenchmen fortifi 
 let us look sight much delight thee 
 sir thoma gargrav sir william glansdal 
 let express opinions
 where best place make batt ry next 
 gargrav i think north gate stand lord 
 glansdal and i bulwark bridg 
 talbot for aught i see citi must famish 
 or light skirmish enfeebl 
 here shoot salisburi gargrave
 fall 
 salisburi o lord merci us wretch sinner 
 gargrav o lord merci woeful man 
 talbot what chanc suddenli hath cross us 
 speak salisburi least thou canst speak 
 how far st thou mirror martial men 
 one thi eye thi cheek side struck 
 accurs tower accurs fatal hand
 that hath contriv woeful tragedi 
 in thirteen battl salisburi ercam 
 henri fifth first train war 
 whilst trump sound drum struck 
 hi sword ne er leav strike field 
 yet liv st thou salisburi though thi speech doth fail 
 one eye thou hast look heaven grace 
 the sun one eye vieweth world 
 heaven thou graciou none alive
 if salisburi want merci thi hand 
 bear henc bodi i help buri 
 sir thoma gargrav hast thou life 
 speak unto talbot nay look 
 salisburi cheer thi spirit comfort 
 thou shalt die whiles
 he beckon hand smile 
 as say when i dead gone 
 rememb aveng french 
 plantagenet i like thee nero 
 play lute behold town burn 
 wretch shall franc name 
 here alarum thunder lighten 
 what stir what tumult heaven 
 whenc cometh alarum nois 

 enter messenger

 messeng my lord lord french gather d
 head
 the dauphin one joan la pucel join 
 a holi prophetess new risen 
 is come great power rais sieg 
 here salisburi lifteth groan 
 talbot hear hear die salisburi doth groan 
 it irk heart can not reveng 
 frenchmen i salisburi 
 pucel puzzel dolphin dogfish 
 your heart i stamp hors heels
 and make quagmir mingl brain 
 convey salisburi tent 
 and tri dastard frenchmen dare 
 alarum exeunt

 scene 5 

 befor orleans

 here alarum talbot pursueth the
 dauphin driveth then enter joan la pucelle
 drive englishmen then enter talbot

 talbot where strength valour forc 
 our english troop retir i can not stay 
 a woman clad armour chaseth 

 enter la pucelle

 here come i bout thee 
 devil devil dam i conjur thee 
 blood i draw thee thou art witch
 and straightway give thi soul thou serv st 
 pucel come come ti i must disgrac thee 
 here fight 
 talbot heaven suffer hell prevail 
 my breast i burst strain courag 
 and shoulder crack arm asund 
 but i chastis high mind strumpet 
 they fight 
 pucel talbot farewel thi hour yet come 
 i must go victual orlean forthwith 
 a short alarum enter town soldier 
 o ertak thou canst i scorn thi strength 
 go go cheer thi hungri starv men 
 help salisburi make testament 
 thi day mani shall exit
 talbot my thought whirl like potter wheel 
 i know i i 
 a witch fear forc like hannib 
 drive back troop conquer list 
 so bee smoke dove noisom stench
 are hive hous driven away 
 they call us fierc english dog 
 now like whelp cri run away 
 a short alarum 
 hark countrymen either renew fight
 or tear lion england coat 
 renounc soil give sheep lion stead 
 sheep run half treacher wolf 
 or hors oxen leopard 
 as fli oft subdu slave 
 alarum here anoth skirmish 
 it retir trench 
 you consent unto salisburi death 
 for none would strike stroke reveng 
 pucel ent red orleans
 in spite us aught could 
 o would i die salisburi 
 the shame hereof make hide head 
 exit talbot alarum retreat

 scene 6 

 orleans

 flourish enter wall la pucel charl 
 reignier alencon soldiers

 pucel advanc wave colour wall 
 rescu orlean english 
 thu joan la pucel hath perform word 
 charl divinest creatur astraea daughter 
 how shall i honour thee success 
 thi promis like adoni garden 
 that one day bloom fruit next 
 franc triumph thi gloriou prophetess 
 recov town orlean 
 more bless hap ne er befal state 
 reignier whi ring bell aloud throughout the
 town 
 dauphin command citizen make bonfires
 and feast banquet open streets
 to celebr joy god hath given us 
 alencon all franc replet mirth joy
 when shall hear play men 
 charl ti joan day 
 for i divid crown 
 and priest friar realm
 shall process sing endless prais 
 a stateli pyrami i rear
 than rhodop memphi ever 
 in memori dead 
 her ash urn precious
 than rich jewel coffer dariu 
 transport shall high festivals
 befor king queen franc 
 no longer saint deni cri 
 but joan la pucel shall franc saint 
 come let us banquet royally
 after golden day victori flourish exeunt

act ii scene 1 

befor orleans

ent french sergeant two sentinels

 sergeant sir take place vigil 
 if nois soldier perceive
 near wall appar sign
 let us knowledg court guard 
 first sentinel sergeant shall exit sergeant 
 thu poor servitor 
 when other sleep upon quiet bed 
 constrain watch dark rain cold 

 enter talbot bedford burgundi forc 
 scale ladder drum beat dead
 march

 talbot lord regent redoubt burgundi 
 by whose approach region artoi 
 wallon picardi friend us 
 thi happi night frenchmen secur 
 have day carou banquet 
 embrac opportun 
 as fit best quittanc deceit 
 contriv art bale sorceri 
 bedford coward franc much wrong fame 
 despair arm fortitud 
 to join witch help hell 
 burgundi traitor never compani 
 but pucel term pure 
 talbot a maid say 
 bedford a maid martial 
 burgundi pray god prove masculin ere long 
 if underneath standard french
 she carri armour hath begun 
 talbot well let practis convers spirit 
 god fortress whose conquer name
 let us resolv scale flinti bulwark 
 bedford ascend brave talbot follow thee 
 talbot not togeth better far i guess 
 that make entranc sever way 
 that chanc one us fail
 the yet may rise forc 
 bedford agre i yond corner 
 burgundi and i 
 talbot and talbot mount make grave
