 now salisburi thee right
 of english henri shall night appear
 how much duti i bound 
 the english scale wall cri saint georg 
 talbot 
 sentinel arm arm the enemi doth make assault 

 the french leap er wall shirt 
 enter sever way bastard alencon reignier 
 half readi half unready

 alencon how lord what unreadi 
 bastard unreadi ay glad scap well 
 reignier twa time i trow wake leav bed 
 hear alarum chamber door 
 alencon of exploit sinc first i follow arms
 ne er heard i warlik enterprise
 more ventur desper 
 bastard i think talbot fiend hell 
 reignier if hell heaven sure favour him
 alencon here cometh charl i marvel sped 

 enter charl la pucelle

 bastard tut holi joan defens guard 
 charl is thi cun thou deceit dame 
 didst thou first flatter us withal 
 make us partak littl gain
 that loss might ten time much 
 pucel wherefor charl impati friend 
 at time power alik 
 sleep wake must i still prevail
 or blame lay fault 
 improvid soldier had watch good
 thi sudden mischief never could fall n 
 charl duke alencon default
 that captain watch night 
 did look better weighti charg 
 alencon had quarter safe kept
 as whereof i govern 
 we thu shame surpri 
 bastard mine secur 
 reignier and mine lord 
 charl and part night 
 within quarter mine precinct
 i employ pass fro
 about reliev sentinel 
 then way first break 
 pucel question lord case 
 how way ti sure found place
 but weakli guard breach made 
 and rest shift this
 to gather soldier scatter disper 
 and lay new platform endamag 

 alarum enter english soldier crying
 a talbot a talbot they fli leav their
 cloth behind

 soldier i bold take left 
 the cri talbot serv sword 
 for i loaden mani spoil 
 use weapon name exit

 scene 2 

 orlean within town

 enter talbot bedford burgundi captain 
 others

 bedford the day begin break night fled
 whose pitchi mantl veil earth 
 here sound retreat ceas hot pursuit 
 retreat sound 
 talbot bring forth bodi old salisbury
 and advanc market place 
 the middl centr curs town 
 now i paid vow unto soul 
 for everi drop blood drawn him
 there hath least five frenchmen die night 
 and hereaft age may behold
 what ruin happen reveng 
 within chiefest templ i erect
 a tomb wherein corps shall interr 
 upon everi one may read 
 shall engrav sack orlean 
 the treacher manner mourn death 
 and terror franc 
 but lord bloodi massacr 
 i muse met dauphin grace 
 hi new come champion virtuou joan arc 
 nor fals confeder 
 bedford ti thought lord talbot fight began 
 rou sudden drowsi bed 
 they amongst troop arm men
 leap er wall refug field 
 burgundi myself far i could well discern
 for smoke duski vapour night 
 am sure i scar dauphin trull 
 when arm arm came swiftli run 
 like pair love turtl doves
 that could live asund day night 
 after thing set order 
 we follow power 

 enter messenger

 messeng all hail lord which princ train
 call ye warlik talbot acts
 so much applaud realm franc 
 talbot here talbot would speak 
 messeng the virtuou ladi countess auvergn 
 with modesti admir thi renown 
 by entreat great lord thou wouldst vouchsafe
 to visit poor castl lie 
 that may boast hath beheld man
 whose glori fill world loud report 
 burgundi is even nay i see wars
 will turn peac comic sport 
 when ladi crave encount red 
 you may lord despis gentl suit 
 talbot ne er trust world men
 could prevail oratori 
 yet hath woman kind overrul 
 and therefor tell i return great thanks
 and submiss attend 
 will honour bear compani 
 bedford no truli ti manner 
 and i heard said unbidden guests
 are often welcomest gone 
 talbot well alon sinc remedi 
 i mean prove ladi courtesi 
 come hither captain whisper you perceiv mind 
 captain i lord mean accordingli exeunt

 scene 3 

 auvergn the castle

 enter countess porter

 countess porter rememb i gave charg 
 and done bring key 
 porter madam i 
 countess the plot laid thing fall right 
 i shall famou exploit 
 as scythian tomyri cyru death 
 great rumour dread knight 
 and achiev less account 
 fain would mine eye wit mine ears
 to give censur rare report 

 enter messeng talbot 

 messeng madam accord ladyship desir 
 by messag crav lord talbot come 
 countess and welcom what man 
 messeng madam 
 countess is scourg franc 
 is talbot much fear abroad
 that name mother still babe 
 i see report fabul fals 
 i thought i seen hercul 
 a second hector grim aspect
 and larg proport strong knit limb 
 ala child silli dwarf 
 it can not weak writhl shrimp
 should strike terror enemi 
 talbot madam i bold troubl 
 but sinc ladyship leisur 
 i sort time visit go 
 countess what mean go ask whither he
 goe 
 messeng stay lord talbot ladi craves
 to know caus abrupt departur 
 talbot marri wrong belief 
 i go certifi talbot 

 re enter porter with keys

 countess if thou art thou prison 
 talbot prison to 
 countess to blood thirsti lord
 and caus i train thee hous 
 long time thi shadow hath thrall 
 for galleri thi pictur hang 
 but substanc shall endur like
 and i chain leg arm thine
 that hast tyranni mani years
 wast countri slain citizen 
 and sent son husband captiv 
 talbot ha ha ha 
 countess laughest thou wretch thi mirth shall turn to
 moan 
 talbot i laugh see ladyship fond
 to think aught talbot shadow
 whereon practis sever 
 countess whi art thou man 
 talbot i inde 
 countess then i substanc 
 talbot no i shadow 
 you deceiv substanc 
 for see smallest part
 and least proport human 
 i tell madam whole frame 
 it spaciou lofti pitch
 your roof suffici contain 
 countess thi riddl merchant nonc 
 he yet 
 how contrarieti agre 
 talbot that i show present 

 wind horn drum strike 
 peal ordnanc enter soldiers

 how say madam are persuaded
 that talbot shadow 
 these substanc sinew arm strength 
 with yoketh rebelli neck 
 razeth citi subvert town 
 and moment make desol 
 countess victori talbot pardon abus 
 i find thou art less fame hath bruit 
 and may gather thi shape 
 let presumpt provok thi wrath 
 for i sorri reverence
 i entertain thee thou art 
 talbot be dismay fair ladi misconster
 the mind talbot mistake
 the outward composit bodi 
 what done hath offend 
 nor satisfact i crave
 but patienc may
 tast wine see cate 
 for soldier stomach alway serv well 
 countess with heart think honoured
 to feast great warrior hous exeunt

 scene 4 

 london the templ garden

 enter earl of somerset suffolk warwick 
 richard plantagenet vernon anoth lawyer

 plantagenet great lord gentlemen mean this
 silenc 
 dare man answer case truth 
 suffolk within templ hall loud 
 the garden conveni 
 plantagenet then say i maintain truth 
 or els wrangl somerset th error 
 suffolk faith i truant law
 and never yet could frame 
 and therefor frame law unto 
 somerset judg lord warwick us 
 warwick between two hawk fli higher pitch 
 between two dog hath deeper mouth 
 between two blade bear better temper 
 between two hors doth bear best 
 between two girl hath merriest eye
 i perhap shallow spirit judgment 
 but nice sharp quillet law 
 good faith i wiser daw 
 plantagenet tut tut mannerli forbear 
 the truth appear nake side
 that purblind eye may find 
 somerset and side well apparel 
 so clear shine evid 
 that glimmer blind man eye 
 plantagenet sinc tongu tie loath speak 
 in dumb signific proclaim thought 
 let true born gentleman
 and stand upon honour birth 
 if suppos i plead truth 
 from brier pluck white rose 
 somerset let coward flatter 
 but dare maintain parti truth 
 pluck red rose thorn 
 warwick i love colour without colour
 of base insinu flatteri 
 i pluck white rose plantagenet 
 suffolk i pluck red rose young somerset 
 and say withal i think held right 
 vernon stay lord gentlemen pluck more
 till conclud upon whose side
 the fewest rose cropp tree
 shall yield right opinion 
 somerset good master vernon well object 
 if i fewest i subscrib silenc 
 plantagenet and i 
 vernon then truth plain case 
 i pluck pale maiden blossom 
 give verdict white rose side 
 somerset prick finger pluck 
 lest bleed paint white rose red 
 and fall side 
 vernon if i lord opinion bleed 
 opinion shall surgeon hurt
 and keep side still i 
 somerset well well come els 
 lawyer to somerset unless studi book be
 fals 
 the argument held wrong 
 in sign whereof i pluck white rose 
 plantagenet now somerset argument 
 somerset here scabbard medit that
 shall dye white rose bloodi red 
 plantagenet meantim cheek counterfeit our
 rose 
 for pale look fear witnessing
 the truth side 
 somerset no plantagenet 
 ti fear anger thi cheeks
 blush pure shame counterfeit rose 
 and yet thi tongu confess thi error 
 plantagenet hath thi rose canker somerset 
 somerset hath thi rose thorn plantagenet 
 plantagenet ay sharp pierc maintain truth 
 while thi consum canker eat falsehood 
 somerset well i find friend wear bleed rose 
 that shall maintain i said true 
 where fals plantagenet dare seen 
 plantagenet now maiden blossom hand 
 i scorn thee thi fashion peevish boy 
 suffolk turn thi scorn way plantagenet 
 plantagenet proud pole i scorn and
 thee 
 suffolk i turn part thereof thi throat 
 somerset away away good william de la pole 
 we grace yeoman convers 
 warwick now god thou wrong st somerset 
 hi grandfath lionel duke clarenc 
 third son third edward king england 
 spring crestless yeomen deep root 
 plantagenet he bear place privileg 
 or durst craven heart say thu 
 somerset by him made i maintain words
 on plot ground christendom 
 wa thi father richard earl cambridg 
 for treason execut late king day 
 and treason stand st thou attaint 
 corrupt exempt ancient gentri 
 hi trespass yet live guilti thi blood 
 and till thou restor thou art yeoman 
 plantagenet my father attach attaint 
 condemn die treason traitor 
 and i prove better men somerset 
 were grow time ripen 
 for partak pole 
 i note book memory
 to scourg apprehens 
 look well say well warn 
 somerset ay thou shalt find us readi thee still 
 and know us colour thi foes
 for friend spite thee shall wear 
 plantagenet and soul pale angri rose 
 as cogniz blood drink hate 
 will i ever faction wear 
 until wither grave 
 or flourish height degre 
 suffolk go forward chok thi ambit 
 and farewel i meet thee next exit
 somerset have thee pole farewel ambitious
 richard exit
 plantagenet how i brav must perforc endure
 
 warwick thi blot object house
 shall wip next parliament 
 call truce winchest gloucest 
 and thou creat york 
 i live account warwick 
 meantim signal love thee 
 against proud somerset william pole 
 will i upon thi parti wear rose 
 and i prophesi brawl day 
 grown faction templ garden 
 shall send red rose white
 a thousand soul death deadli night 
 plantagenet good master vernon i bound you
 that behalf would pluck flower 
 vernon in behalf still i wear 
 lawyer and i 
 plantagenet thank gentl sir 
 come let us four dinner i dare say
 thi quarrel drink blood anoth day exeunt

 scene 5 

 the tower london

 enter mortim brought chair gaolers

 mortim kind keeper weak decay age 
 let die mortim rest 
 even like man new hale rack 
 so fare limb long imprison 
 and grey lock pursuiv death 
 nestor like age age care 
 argu end edmund mortim 
 these eye like lamp whose wast oil spent 
 wax dim draw exig 
 weak shoulder overborn burden grief 
 and pithless arm like wither vine
 that droop sapless branch ground 
 yet feet whose strengthless stay numb 
 unabl support lump clay 
 swift wing desir get grave 
 as wit i comfort 
 but tell keeper nephew come 
 first keeper richard plantagenet lord come 
 we sent unto templ unto chamber 
 and answer return come 
 mortim enough soul shall satisfi 
 poor gentleman wrong doth equal mine 
 sinc henri monmouth first began reign 
 befor whose glori i great arm 
 thi loathsom sequestr i 
 and even sinc hath richard obscur 
 depriv honour inherit 
 but arbitr despair 
 just death kind umpir men miseri 
 with sweet enlarg doth dismiss henc 
 i would troubl likewis expir 
 that might recov lost 

 enter richard plantagenet

 first keeper my lord love nephew come 
 mortim richard plantagenet friend come 
 plantagenet ay nobl uncl thu ignobl us 
 your nephew late despis richard come 
 mortim direct mine arm i may embrac neck
 and bosom spend latter gasp 
 o tell lip touch cheek 
 that i may kindli give one faint kiss 
 and declar sweet stem york great stock 
 whi didst thou say late thou wert despi 
 plantagenet first lean thine age back mine arm 
 and eas i tell thee diseas 
 thi day argument upon case 
 some word grew twixt somerset 
 among term us lavish tongue
 and upbraid father death 
 which obloquy set bar tongu 
 els like i requit 
 therefor good uncl father sake 
 in honour true plantagenet 
 and allianc sake declar cause
 my father earl cambridg lost head 
 mortim that caus fair nephew imprison me
 and hath detain flow ring youth
 within loathsom dungeon pine 
 wa curs instrument deceas 
 plantagenet discov larg caus 
 for i ignor can not guess 
 mortim i fade breath permit
 and death approach ere tale done 
 henri fourth grandfath king 
 depo nephew richard edward son 
 the first begotten law heir
 of edward king third descent 
 dure whose reign perci north 
 find usurp unjust 
 endeavour advanc throne 
 the reason mov warlik lord this
 wa young richard thu remov 
 leav heir begotten bodi 
 i next birth parentag 
 for mother i deriv am
 from lionel duke clarenc third son
 to king edward third wherea he
 from john gaunt doth bring pedigre 
 be fourth heroic line 
 but mark haughti great attempt
 they labour plant right heir 
 i lost liberti live 
 long henri fifth 
 succeed father bolingbrok reign 
 thi father earl cambridg deriv d
 from famou edmund langley duke york 
 marri sister thi mother 
 again piti hard distress 
 levi armi ween redeem
 and instal diadem 
 but rest fell nobl earl 
 and behead thu mortim 
 in titl rest suppress 
 plantagenet of which lord honour last 
 mortim true thou seest i issu 
 and faint word warrant death 
 thou art heir rest i wish thee gather 
 but yet wari thi studiou care 
 plantagenet thi grave admonish prevail 
 but yet methink father execution
 wa noth less bloodi tyranni 
 mortim with silenc nephew thou polit 
 strong fix hous lancaster
 and like mountain remov 
 but thi uncl remov henc 
 as princ court cloy d
 with long continu settl place 
 plantagenet o uncl would part young years
 might redeem passag age 
 mortim thou dost wrong slaughterer
 doth
 which giveth mani wound one kill 
 mourn except thou sorrow good 
 onli give order funer 
 and farewel fair thi hope 
 and prosper thi life peac war die 
 plantagenet and peac war befal thi part soul 
 in prison hast thou spent pilgrimag 
 and like hermit overpass thi day 
 well i lock counsel breast 
 and i imagin let rest 
 keeper convey henc i myself
 will see burial better life 
 exeunt gaoler hear bodi mortimer
 here die duski torch mortim 
 chok ambit meaner sort 
 and wrong bitter injuri 
 which somerset hath offer hous 
 i doubt honour redress 
 and therefor hast i parliament 
 either restor blood 
 or make ill th advantag good exit

act iii scene 1 

london the parliament house

flourish enter king exet gloucest warwick somerset and
suffolk bishop of winchest richard plantagenet other 
gloucest offer put bill winchest snatch tears
it

 winchest com st thou deep premedit line 
 with written pamphlet studious devi 
 humphrey gloucest thou canst accuse
 or aught intend st lay unto charg 
 do without invent suddenli 
 i sudden extempor speech
 purpos answer thou canst object 
 gloucest presumptu priest place command my
 patienc 
 or thou shouldst find thou hast dishonour 
 think although write i preferr d
 the manner thi vile outrag crime 
 that therefor i forg able
 verbatim rehears method pen 
 no prelat thi audaci wicked 
 thi lewd pestifer dissenti prank 
 as infant prattl thi pride 
 thou art pernici usur 
 froward natur enemi peac 
 lascivi wanton well beseems
 a man thi profess degre 
 and thi treacheri manifest
 in thou laid st trap take life 
 as well london bridg tower 
 besid i fear thi thought sift 
 the king thi sovereign quit exempt
 from enviou malic thi swell heart 
 winchest gloucest i defi thee lord vouchsafe
 to give hear i shall repli 
 if i covet ambiti pervers 
 as i poor 
 or hap i seek advance
 or rais keep wont call 
 and dissens preferreth peace
 more i except i provok 
 no good lord offend 
 it incen hath incen duke 
 it one sway 
 no one king 
 and engend thunder breast
 and make roar accus forth 
 but shall know i good
 gloucest as good 
 thou bastard grandfath 
 winchest ay lordli sir i pray 
 but one imperi anoth throne 
 gloucest am i protector sauci priest 
 winchest and i prelat church 
 gloucest ye outlaw castl keep 
 and useth patronag theft 
 winchest unrever gloucest 
 gloucest thou art reverend
 touch thi spiritu function thi life 
 winchest rome shall remedi 
 warwick roam thither 
 somerset my lord duti forbear 
 warwick ay see bishop overborn 
 somerset methink lord religi 
 and know offic belong 
 warwick methink lordship humbler 
 it fitteth prelat plead 
 somerset ye holi state touch near 
 warwick state holi unhallow 
 is grace protector king 
 plantagenet asid plantagenet i see must hold his
 tongu 
 lest said speak sirrah 
 must bold verdict enter talk lord 
 els would i fling winchest 
 king henri uncl gloucest winchest 
 the special watchmen english weal 
 i would prevail prayer might prevail
 to join heart love amiti 
 o scandal crown
 that two nobl peer ye jar 
 believ lord tender year tell
 civil dissens viper worm
 that gnaw bowel commonwealth 
 a nois within down tawni coat 
 what tumult 
 warwick an uproar i dare warrant 
 begun malic bishop men 
 a nois stone stone 

 enter mayor of london attended

 mayor o good lord virtuou henri 
 piti citi london piti us 
 the bishop duke gloucest men 
 forbidden late carri weapon 
 have fill pocket full pebbl stones
 and band contrari part 
 do pelt fast one anoth pate
 that mani giddi brain knock 
 our window broke everi street 
 and fear compel shut shop 

 enter skirmish retain gloucest and
 winchest bloodi pates

 king henri we charg allegi ourself 
 to hold slaught ring hand keep peac 
 pray uncl gloucest mitig strife 
 first serv man nay forbidden stone ll
 fall teeth 
 second serv man do ye dare resolut 
 skirmish 
 gloucest you household leav peevish broil 
 and set unaccustom fight asid 
 third serv man my lord know grace a
 man
 just upright royal birth
 inferior none majesti 
 and ere suffer princ 
 so kind father commonw 
 to disgrac inkhorn mate 
 we wive children fight
 and bodi slaught red thi foe 
 first serv man ay pare nails
 shall pitch field dead begin 
 gloucest stay stay i say 
 and love say 
 let persuad forbear awhil 
 king henri o discord doth afflict soul 
 can lord winchest behold
 my sigh tear relent 
 who piti 
 or studi prefer peac 
 if holi churchmen take delight broil 
 warwick yield lord protector yield winchest 
 except mean obstin repulse
 to slay sovereign destroy realm 
 you see mischief murder 
 hath enact enmiti 
 then peac except ye thirst blood 
 winchest he shall submit i never yield 
 gloucest compass king command stoop 
 or i would see heart ere priest
 should ever get privileg 
 warwick behold lord winchest duke
 hath banish moodi discont furi 
 as smooth brow doth appear 
 whi look still stem tragic 
 gloucest here winchest i offer thee hand 
 king henri fie uncl beaufort i heard preach
 that malic great grievou sin 
 and maintain thing teach 
 but prove chief offend 
 warwick sweet king the bishop hath kindli gird 
 for shame lord winchest relent 
 what shall child instruct 
 winchest well duke gloucest i yield thee 
 love thi love hand hand i give 
 gloucest asid ay i fear hollow
 heart 
 see friend love countrymen 
 thi token serveth flag truce
 betwixt follow 
 so help god i dissembl 
 winchest asid so help god i intend 
 king henri o love uncl kind duke gloucest 
 how joy i made contract 
 away master troubl us 
 but join friendship lord done 
 first serv man content i surgeon 
 second serv man and i 
 third serv man and i see physic tavern
 afford exeunt servant mayor c 
 warwick accept scroll graciou sovereign 
 which right richard plantagenet
 we exhibit majesti 
 gloucest well urg lord warwick sweet
 princ 
 an grace mark everi circumst 
 you great reason richard right 
 especi occasions
 at eltham place i told majesti 
 king henri and occas uncl forc 
 therefor love lord pleasur is
 that richard restor blood 
 warwick let richard restor blood 
 so shall father wrong recompen 
 winchest as rest willeth winchest 
 king henri if richard true alone
 but whole inherit i give
 that doth belong unto hous york 
 from whenc spring lineal descent 
 plantagenet thi humbl servant vow obedience
 and humbl servic till point death 
 king henri stoop set knee foot 
 and reguerdon duti done
 i girt thee valiant sword york 
 rise richard like true plantagenet 
 and rise creat princ duke york 
 plantagenet and thrive richard thi foe may fall 
 and duti spring perish they
 that grudg one thought majesti 
 all welcom high princ mighti duke york 
 somerset asid perish base princ ignobl duke of
 york 
 gloucest now best avail majesty
 to cross sea crown franc 
 the presenc king engend love
 amongst subject loyal friend 
 as disanim enemi 
 king henri when gloucest say word king henry
 goe 
 for friendli counsel cut mani foe 
 gloucest your ship alreadi readi 
 sennet flourish exeunt exeter
 exet ay may march england franc 
 not see like ensu 
 thi late dissens grown betwixt peers
 burn feign ash forg love
 and last break flame 
 as fest red member rot degree
 till bone flesh sinew fall away 
 so base enviou discord breed 
 and i fear fatal propheci 
 which time henri nam fifth
 wa mouth everi suck babe 
 that henri born monmouth win 
 and henri born windsor lose 
 which plain exet doth wish
 hi day may finish ere hapless time exit

 scene 2 

 franc befor rouen

 enter la pucel disgui four soldier dressed
 like countrymen sack upon backs

 pucel these citi gate gate rouen 
 through polici must make breach 
 take heed wari place word 
 talk like vulgar sort market men
 that come gather money corn 
 if entranc i hope shall 
 and find sloth watch weak 
 i sign give notic friend 
 that charl dauphin may encount 
 first soldier our sack shall mean sack citi 
 and lord ruler rouen 
 therefor knock knock 
 watch within qui est la 
 pucel paysan pauvr gen de france
 poor market folk come sell corn 
 watch enter go market bell rung 
 pucel now rouen i shake thi bulwark the
 ground 

 la pucel c enter town 

 enter charl bastard alencon reignier forces

 charl saint deni bless happi stratagem 
 and sleep secur rouen 
 bastard here ent red pucel practis 
 now specify
 here best safest passag 
 alencon by thrust torch yonder tower 
 which discern show mean is
 no way weak ent red 

 enter la pucel top thrust out
 torch burning

 pucel behold happi wed torch
 that joineth rouen unto countrymen 
 but burn fatal talbotit exit
 bastard see nobl charl beacon friend 
 the burn torch yonder turret stand 
 charl now shine like comet reveng 
 a prophet fall foe 
 alencon defer time delay danger end 
 enter cri the dauphin present 
 and execut watch alarum exeunt

 an alarum enter talbot excursion

 talbot franc thou shalt rue treason thi tear 
 if talbot surviv thi treacheri 
 pucel witch damn sorceress 
 hath wrought hellish mischief unawar 
 that hardli escap pride franc exit

 an alarum excurs bedford brought sick in
 chair enter talbot burgundi without 
 within la pucel charl bastard alencon 
 reignier walls

 pucel good morrow gallant want ye corn bread 
 i think duke burgundi fast
 befor buy rate 
 twa full darnel like tast 
 burgundi scoff vile fiend shameless courtezan 
 i trust ere long choke thee thine 
 and make thee curs harvest corn 
 charl your grace may starv perhap time 
 bedford o let word deed reveng treason 
 pucel what good grey beard break a
 lanc 
 and run tilt death within chair 
 talbot foul fiend franc hag despit 
 encompass thi lust paramour 
 becom thee taunt valiant age
 and twit cowardic man half dead 
 damsel i bout 
 or els let talbot perish shame 
 pucel are ye hot sir yet pucel hold thi peac 
 if talbot thunder rain follow 
 the english parti whisper togeth council 
 god speed parliament who shall speaker 
 talbot dare ye come forth meet us field 
 pucel belik lordship take us fool 
 to tri 
 talbot i speak rail hecat 
 but unto thee alencon rest 
 will ye like soldier come fight 
 alencon signior 
 talbot signior hang base mulet franc 
 like peasant foot boy keep wall 
 and dare take arm like gentlemen 
 pucel away captain let get us wall 
 for talbot mean good look 
 god b uy lord came tell you
 that exeunt walls
 talbot and ere long 
 or els reproach talbot greatest fame 
 vow burgundi honour thi hous 
 prick public wrong sustain franc 
 either get town die 
 and i sure english henri lives
 and father conqueror 
 as sure late betray town
 great coeur de lion heart buried
 so sure i swear get town die 
 burgundi my vow equal partner thi vow 
 talbot but ere go regard die princ 
 the valiant duke bedford come lord 
 we bestow better place 
 fitter sick crazi age 
 bedford lord talbot dishonour 
 here i sit wall rouen 
 and partner weal woe 
 burgundi courag bedford let us persuad 
 bedford not gone henc i read
 that stout pendragon litter sick
 came field vanquish foe 
 methink i reviv soldier heart 
 becaus i ever found 
 talbot undaunt spirit die breast 
 then heaven keep old bedford safe 
 and ado brave burgundi 
 but gather forc hand
 and set upon boast enemi 
 exeunt town bedford attendants

 an alarum excurs enter sir john fastolf 
 captain

 captain whither away sir john fastolf hast 
 fastolf whither away to save flight 
 we like overthrow 
 captain what will leav lord talbot 
 fastolf ay 
 all talbot world save life exit
 captain cowardli knight ill fortun follow thee 
 exit town

 retreat excurs la pucel alencon 
 charl fly

 bedford now quiet soul depart heaven pleas 
 for i seen enemi overthrow 
 what trust strength foolish man 
 they late dare scoffs
 are glad fain flight save 
 bedford die carri two chair 

 an alarum re enter talbot burgundi rest

 talbot lost recov day 
 thi doubl honour burgundi 
 yet heaven glori victori 
 burgundi warlik martial talbot burgundy
 enshrin thee heart erects
 thi nobl deed valour monument 
 talbot thank gentl duke but pucel 
 i think old familiar asleep 
 now bastard brave charl gleek 
 what amort rouen hang head grief
 that valiant compani fled 
 now take order town 
 place therein expert offic 
 and depart pari king 
 for young henri nobl lie 
 burgundi what lord talbot pleaseth burgundi 
 talbot but yet go let forget
 the nobl duke bedford late decea 
 but see exequi fulfil rouen 
 a braver soldier never couch lanc 
 a gentler heart never sway court 
 but king mightiest potent must die 
 for end human miseri exeunt

 scene 3 

 the plain near rouen

 enter charl bastard alencon la pucel 
 forces

 pucel dismay princ accid 
 nor griev rouen recov 
 care cure rather corros 
 for thing remedi 
 let frantic talbot triumph while
 and like peacock sweep along tail 
 we pull plume take away train 
 if dauphin rest rul 
 charl we guid thee hitherto 
 and thi cun diffid 
 one sudden foil shall never breed distrust
 bastard search thi wit secret polici 
 and make thee famou world 
 alencon we set thi statu holi place 
 and thee reverenc like bless saint 
 employ thee sweet virgin good 
 pucel then thu must doth joan devis 
 by fair persuas mix sug red word 
 we entic duke burgundy
 to leav talbot follow us 
 charl ay marri sweet could 
 franc place henri warrior 
 nor nation boast us 
 but extirp provinc 
 alencon for ever expul franc 
 and tide earldom 
 pucel your honour shall perceiv i work
 to bring matter wish end 
 drum sound afar 
 hark sound drum may perceive
 their power march unto pari ward 

 here sound english march enter pass over
 distanc talbot forces

 there goe talbot colour spread 
 and troop english 

 french march enter duke of burgundi and
 forces

 now rearward come duke 
 fortun favour make lag behind 
 summon parley talk 
 trumpet sound parley 
 charl a parley duke burgundi 
 burgundi who crave parley burgundi 
 pucel the princ charl franc thi countryman 
 burgundi what say st thou charl i marching
 henc 
 charl speak pucel enchant thi word 
 pucel brave burgundi undoubt hope franc 
 stay let thi humbl handmaid speak thee 
 burgundi speak tediou 
 pucel look thi countri look fertil franc 
 and see citi town defac d
 by wast ruin cruel foe 
 as look mother lowli babe
 when death doth close tender die eye 
 see see pine maladi franc 
 behold wound unnatur wound 
 which thou thyself hast given woeful breast 
 o turn thi edg sword anoth way 
 strike hurt hurt help 
 one drop blood drawn thi countri bosom
 should griev thee stream foreign gore 
 return thee therefor flood tear 
 and wash away thi countri stain spot 
 burgundi either hath bewitch word 
 or natur make suddenli relent 
 pucel besid french franc exclaim thee 
 doubt thi birth law progeni 
 who join st thou lordli nation
 that trust thee profit sake 
 when talbot hath set foot franc 
 and fashion thee instrument ill 
 who english henri lord 
 and thou thrust like fugit 
 call mind mark proof 
 wa duke orlean thi foe 
 and england prison 
 but heard thine enemy
 they set free without ransom paid 
 in spite burgundi friend 
 see thou fight st thi countrymen 
 and join st thi slaughtermen 
 come come return return thou wander lord 
 charl rest take thee arm 
 burgundi i vanquish haughti word hers
 have batt red like roar cannon shot
 and made almost yield upon knee 
 forgiv countri sweet countrymen
 and lord accept hearti kind embrac 
 my forc power men 
 so farewel talbot i longer trust thee 
 pucel done like frenchman asid turn turn
 
 charl welcom brave duke thi friendship make us
 fresh 
 bastard and doth beget new courag breast 
 alencon pucel hath brave play part 
 and doth deserv coronet gold 
 charl now let us lord join power 
 and seek may prejudic foe exeunt

 scene 4 

 pari the palace

 enter king gloucest winchest york 
 suffolk somerset warwick exet 
 vernon basset other to with
 soldier talbot

 talbot my graciou princ honour peer 
 hear arriv realm 
 i awhil given truce unto wars
 to duti sovereign 
 in sign whereof arm hath reclaim d
 to obedi fifti fortress 
 twelv citi seven wall town strength 
 besid five hundr prison esteem 
 let fall sword high feet 
 and submiss loyalti heart
 ascrib glori conquest got
 first god next unto grace kneel 
 king henri is lord talbot uncl gloucest 
 that hath long resid franc 
 gloucest ye pleas majesti lieg 
 king henri welcom brave captain victori lord 
 when i young yet i old 
 i rememb father said
 a stouter champion never handl sword 
 long sinc resolv truth 
 your faith servic toil war 
 yet never tast reward 
 or reguerdon much thank 
 becaus till never saw face 
 therefor stand good deserts
 we creat earl shrewsburi 
 and coron take place 
 sennet flourish exeunt vernon basset
 vernon now sir hot sea 
 disgrac colour i wear
 in honour nobl lord york
 dar st thou maintain former word thou spak st 
 basset ye sir well dare patronage
 the enviou bark sauci tongue
 against lord duke somerset 
 vernon sirrah thi lord i honour 
 basset whi as good man york 
 vernon hark ye in wit take ye 
 strike 
 basset villain thou knowest law arm such
 that whoso draw sword ti present death 
 or els blow broach thi dearest blood 
 but i unto majesti crave
 i may liberti veng wrong 
 when thou shalt see i meet thee thi cost 
 vernon well miscreant i soon 
 and meet sooner would exeunt

act iv scene 1 

park the palace

ent king gloucest winchest york suffolk somerset 
warwick 
talbot exet governor of pari others

 gloucest lord bishop set crown upon head 
 winchest god save king henri name sixth 
 gloucest now governor pari take oath
 governor kneel 
 that elect king 
 esteem none friend friend 
 and none foe shall pretend
 malici practic state 
 thi shall ye help righteou god 
 exeunt governor train

 enter sir john fastolfe

 fastolf my graciou sovereign i rode calai 
 to hast unto coron 
 a letter deliv hand 
 writ grace th duke burgundi 
 talbot shame duke burgundi thee 
 i vow base knight i meet thee next
 to tear garter thi craven leg pluck 
 which i done unworthily
 thou wast instal high degre 
 pardon princ henri rest 
 thi dastard battl patay 
 when i six thousand strong 
 and french almost ten one 
 befor met stroke given 
 like trusti squir run away 
 in assault lost twelv hundr men 
 myself diver gentlemen beside
 were surpri taken prison 
 then judg great lord i done amiss 
 or whether coward ought wear
 thi ornament knighthood yea 
 gloucest to say truth fact infamous
 and ill beseem common man 
 much knight captain leader 
 talbot when first order ordain lord 
 knight garter nobl birth 
 valiant virtuou full haughti courag 
 such grown credit war 
 not fear death shrink distress 
 but alway resolut extrem 
 he furnish sort
 doth usurp sacr name knight 
 profan honour order 
 and i worthi judg 
 be quit degrad like hedg born swain
 that doth presum boast gentl blood 
 king henri stain thi countrymen thou hear st thy
 doom 
 be pack therefor thou wast knight 
 henceforth banish thee pain death 
 exit fastolfe
 and lord protector view letter
 sent uncl duke burgundi 
 gloucest view superscript what mean his
 grace hath chang style 
 no plain bluntli to king 
 hath forgot sovereign 
 or doth churlish superscription
 pretend alter good 
 what read i upon especi caus 
 mov compass countri wreck 
 togeth piti complaints
 of oppress feed upon 
 forsaken pernici faction 
 and join charl right king franc 
 o monstrou treacheri can so
 that allianc amiti oath 
 there found fals dissembl guil 
 king henri what doth uncl burgundi revolt 
 gloucest he doth lord becom foe 
 king henri is worst letter doth contain 
 gloucest it worst lord write 
 king henri whi lord talbot shall talk with
 him
 and give chastis abus 
 how say lord content 
 talbot content lieg ye i prevent 
 i begg i might employ 
 king henri then gather strength march unto him
 straight 
 let perceiv ill brook treason 
 and offenc flout friend 
 talbot i go lord heart desir still
 you may behold confus foe exit

 enter vernon basset

 vernon grant combat graciou sovereign 
 basset and lord grant combat 
 york thi servant hear nobl princ 
 somerset and mine sweet henri favour 
 king henri be patient lord give leav speak 
 say gentlemen make thu exclaim 
 and wherefor crave combat 
 vernon with lord hath done wrong 
 basset and i hath done wrong 
 king henri what wrong whereof both
 complain first let know i answer 
 basset cross sea england franc 
 thi fellow enviou carp tongu 
 upbraid rose i wear 
 say sanguin colour leaves
 did repres master blush cheeks
 when stubbornli repugn truth
 about certain question law
 argu betwixt duke york 
 with vile ignomini terms
 in confut rude reproach
 and defenc lord worthi 
 i crave benefit law arm 
 vernon and petit nobl lord 
 for though seem forg quaint conceit
 to set gloss upon bold intent 
 yet know lord i provok 
 and first took except badg 
 pronounc pale flower
 bewray faint master heart 
 york will malic somerset left 
 somerset your privat grudg lord york 
 though ne er cunningli smother 
 king henri good lord mad rule brainsick
 men when slight frivol cause
 such factiou emul shall aris 
 good cousin york somerset 
 quiet i pray peac 
 york let dissens first tri fight 
 and high shall command peac 
 somerset the quarrel toucheth none us alon 
 betwixt let us decid 
 york there pledg accept somerset 
 vernon nay let rest began first 
 basset confirm mine honour lord 
 gloucest confirm confound strife 
 and perish ye audaci prate 
 presumptu vassal asham d
 with immodest clamor outrage
 to troubl disturb king us 
 and lord methink well
 to bear pervers object 
 much less take occas mouths
 to rais mutini betwixt 
 let persuad take better cours 
 exet it griev high good lord friend 
 king henri come hither would combat 
 henceforth i charg love favour 
 quit forget quarrel caus 
 and lord rememb 
 in franc amongst fickl waver nation 
 if perceiv dissens looks
 and within disagre 
 how grudg stomach provok d
 to wil disobedi rebel 
 besid infami arise
 when foreign princ shall certified
 that toy thing regard 
 king henri peer chief nobility
 destroy lost realm franc 
 o think upon conquest father 
 my tender year let us forgo
 that trifl bought blood 
 let umpir doubt strife 
 i see reason i wear rose 
 put red rose 
 that one therefor suspicious
 i inclin somerset york 
 both kinsmen i love 
 as well may upbraid crown 
 becaus forsooth king scot crown 
 but discret better persuade
 than i abl instruct teach 
 and therefor hither came peac 
 so let us still continu peac love 
 cousin york institut grace
 to regent part franc 
 and good lord somerset unite
 your troop horsemen band foot 
 and like true subject son progenitor 
 go cheer togeth digest
 your angri choler enemi 
 ourself lord protector rest 
 after respit return calai 
 from thenc england i hope ere long
 to present victories
 with charl alencon traitor rout 
 flourish exeunt york warwick 
 exet vernon
 warwick my lord york i promis king
 prettili methought play orat 
 york and yet i like 
 in wear badg somerset 
 warwick tush fanci blame 
 i dare presum sweet princ thought harm 
 york an i wist let rest 
 other affair must manag 
 exeunt exeter
 exet well didst thou richard suppress thi voic 
 for passion thi heart burst 
 i fear seen deciph there
 more rancor spite furiou rage broil 
 than yet imagin suppo 
 but howso er simpl man sees
 thi jar discord nobil 
 thi shoulder court 
 thi factiou bandi favourit 
 but doth presag ill event 
 ti much sceptr children hand 
 but envi breed unkind divis 
 there come ruin begin confus exit

 scene 2 

 franc befor bordeaux

 enter talbot trump drum

 talbot go gate bordeaux trumpet 
 summon gener unto wall 

 trumpet sound parley enter aloft the
 gener of the french others

 english john talbot captain call forth 
 servant arm harri king england 
 and thu would open citi gate 
 be humbl us call sovereignvours
 and homag obedi subject 
 and i withdraw bloodi power 
 but frown upon proffer peac 
 you tempt furi three attend 
 lean famin quarter steel climb fire 
 who moment even earth
 shall lay state air brave tower 
 if forsak offer love 
 gener of the french thou omin fear owl of
 death 
 our nation terror bloodi scourg 
 the period thi tyranni approacheth 
 on us thou canst enter death 
 for i protest well fortifi 
 and strong enough issu fight 
 if thou retir dauphin well appoint 
 stand snare war tangl thee 
 on either hand thee squadron pitch d
 to wall thee liberti flight 
 and way canst thou turn thee redress
 but death doth front thee appar spoil
 and pale destruct meet thee face 
 ten thousand french ta en sacrament
 to rive danger artillery
 upon christian soul english talbot 
 lo thou stand st breath valiant man 
 of invinc unconqu spirit 
 thi latest glori thi praise
 that i thi enemi due thee withal 
 for ere glass begin run
 finish process sandi hour 
 these eye see thee well coloured
 shall see thee wither bloodi pale dead 
 drum afar 
 hark hark the dauphin drum warn bell 
 sing heavi music thi timor soul 
 and mine shall ring thi dire departur exit
 talbot he fabl i hear enemi 
 out light horsemen perus wing 
 o neglig heedless disciplin 
 how park bound pale
 a littl herd england timor deer 
 maz yelp kennel french cur 
 if english deer blood 
 not rascal like fall pinch 
 but rather moodi mad desper stag 
 turn bloodi hound head steel
 and make coward stand aloof bay 
 sell everi man life dear mine 
 and shall find dear deer us friend 
 god saint georg talbot england right 
 prosper colour danger fight exeunt

 scene 3 

 plain gascony

 enter york trumpet mani soldier a
 messeng meet him

 york are speedi scout return again
 that dogg mighti armi dauphin 
 messeng they return lord give out
 that march bordeaux power
 to fight talbot march along 
 by espial discovered
 two mightier troop dauphin led 
 which join made march for
 bordeaux 
 york a plagu upon villain somerset
 that thu delay promis supply
 of horsemen levi sieg 
 renown talbot doth expect aid 
 and i lout traitor villain
 and can not help nobl chevali 
 god comfort necess 
 if miscarri farewel war franc 

 enter sir william lucy

 luci thou princ leader english strength 
 never need earth franc 
 spur rescu nobl talbot 
 who girdl waist iron
 and hemm grim destruct 
 to bordeaux warlik duke bordeaux york 
 els farewel talbot franc england honour 
 york o god somerset proud heart
 doth stop cornet talbot place 
 so save valiant gentleman
 by forfeit traitor coward 
 mad ire wrath furi make weep
 that thu die remiss traitor sleep 
 luci o send succour distress lord 
 york he die lose i break warlik word 
 we mourn franc smile we lose daili get 
 all long vile traitor somerset 
 luci then god take merci brave talbot soul 
 and son young john two hour since
 i met travel toward warlik father 
 thi seven year talbot see son 
 and meet live done 
 york ala joy shall nobl talbot have
 to bid young son welcom grave 
 away vexat almost stop breath 
 that sund red friend greet hour death 
 luci farewel fortun can
 but curs caus i can not aid man 
 main bloi poictier tour away
 long somerset delay exit forces
 luci thu vultur sedition
 feed bosom great command 
 sleep neglect doth betray loss
 the conquest scarc cold conqueror 
 that ever live man memori 
 henri fifth while cross 
 live honour land hurri loss exit

 scene 4 

 other plain gascony

 enter somerset with forc offic of
 talbot s him

 somerset it late i can not send 
 thi expedit york talbot
 too rashli plot gener force
 might salli town
 be buckl the dare talbot
 hath sulli gloss former honour
 by unheed desper wild adventur 
 york set fight die shame 
 that talbot dead great york might bear name 
 offic here sir william luci me
 set er match forc forth aid 

 enter sir william lucy

 somerset how sir william whither sent 
 luci whither lord from bought sold lord
 talbot 
 who ring bold advers 
 cri nobl york somerset
 to beat assail death weak legion 
 and while honour captain there
 drop bloodi sweat war weari limbs
 and advantag ling ring look rescu 
 you fals hope trust england honour 
 keep aloof worthless emul 
 let privat discord keep away
 the levi succour lend aid 
 while renown nobl gentleman 
 yield life unto world odd 
 orlean bastard charl burgundi 
 alencon reignier compass 
 and talbot perisheth default 
 somerset york set york sent aid 
 luci and york fast upon grace exclaim 
 swear withhold levi host 
 collect expedit 
 somerset york lie might sent hors 
 i owe littl duti less love 
 and take foul scorn fawn send 
 luci the fraud england forc franc 
 hath entrapp nobl mind talbot 
 never england shall bear life 
 but die betray fortun strife 
 somerset come go i dispatch horsemen straight 
 within six hour aid 
 luci too late come rescu ta en slain 
 for fli could would fled 
 and fli would talbot never though might 
 somerset if dead brave talbot adieu 
 luci hi fame live world shame exeunt

 scene 5 

 the english camp near bordeaux

 enter talbot john son

 talbot o young john talbot i send thee
 to tutor thee stratagem war 
 that talbot name might thee reviv d
 when sapless age weak unabl limbs
 should bring thi father droop chair 
 but o malign ill bode star 
 now thou art come unto feast death 
 a terribl unavoid danger 
 therefor dear boy mount swiftest hors 
 and i direct thee thou shalt escape
 by sudden flight come dalli gone 
 john is name talbot i son 
 and shall i fli o love mother 
 dishonour honour name 
 to make bastard slave 
 the world say talbot blood
 that base fled nobl talbot stood 
 talbot fli reveng death i slain 
 john he fli ne er return 
 talbot if stay sure die 
 john then let stay father fli 
 your loss great regard 
 my worth unknown loss known 
 upon death french littl boast 
 in hope lost 
 flight can not stain honour 
 but mine exploit done 
 you fled vantag everi one swear 
 but i bow say fear 
 there hope ever i stay
 if first hour i shrink run away 
 here knee i beg mortal 
 rather life preserv infami 
 talbot shall thi mother hope lie one tomb 
 john ay rather i shame mother womb 
 talbot upon bless i command thee go 
 john to fight i fli foe 
 talbot part thi father may sav thee 
 john no part shame 
 talbot thou never hadst renown canst lose 
 john ye renown name shall flight abus 
 talbot thi father charg shall clear thee stain 
 john you can not wit slain 
 if death appar fli 
 talbot and leav follow fight die 
 my age never taint shame 
 john and shall youth guilti blame 
 no i sever side
 than twain divid 
 stay go like i 
 for live i father die 
 talbot then i take leav thee fair son 
 born eclips thi life afternoon 
 come side side togeth live die 
 and soul soul franc heaven fli exeunt

 scene 6 

 a field battle

 alarum excurs wherein john talbot hemm d
 talbot rescu him

 talbot saint georg victori fight soldier fight 
 the regent hath talbot broke word
 and left us rage franc sword 
 where john talbot paus take thi breath 
 i gave thee life rescu thee death 
 john o twice father twice i thi son 
 the life thou gav st first lost done
 till thi warlik sword despit fate 
 to determin time thou gav st new date 
 talbot when dauphin crest thi sword struck
 fire 
 it warm thi father heart proud desire
 of bold fac victori then leaden age 
 quicken youth spleen warlik rage 
 beat alencon orlean burgundi 
 and pride gallia rescu thee 
 the ire bastard orlean drew blood
 from thee boy maidenhood
 of thi first fight i soon encountered
 and interchang blow i quickli shed
 some bastard blood disgrace
 bespok thu contamin base 
 and misbegotten blood i spill thine 
 mean right poor pure blood mine
 which thou didst forc talbot brave boy 
 here purpos bastard destroy 
 came strong rescu speak thi father care 
 art thou weari john how dost thou fare 
 wilt thou yet leav battl boy fli 
 now thou art seal son chivalri 
 fli reveng death i dead 
 the help one stand littl stead 
 o much folli well i wot 
 to hazard live one small boat 
 if i day die frenchmen rage 
 to morrow i shall die mickl age 
 by noth gain i stay 
 ti short ning life one day 
 in thee thi mother die household name 
 my death reveng thi youth england fame 
 all hazard thi stay 
 all sav thou wilt fli away 
 john the sword orlean hath made smart 
 these word draw life blood heart 
 on advantag bought shame 
 to save paltri life slay bright fame 
 befor young talbot old talbot fli 
 the coward hors bear fall die 
 and like peasant boy franc 
 to shame scorn subject mischanc 
 sure glori 
 an i fli i talbot son 
 then talk flight boot 
 if son talbot die talbot foot 
 talbot then follow thou thi desp rate sire crete 
 thou icaru thi life sweet 
 if thou wilt fight fight thi father side 
 and commend prov let die pride exeunt

 scene 7 

 anoth part field

 alarum excurs enter old talbot led servant

 talbot where life mine gone 
 o young talbot where valiant john 
 triumphant death smear captiv 
 young talbot valour make smile thee 
 when perceiv shrink knee 
 hi bloodi sword brandish 
 and like hungri lion commence
 rough deed rage stern impati 
 but angri guardant stood alon 
 tend ring ruin assail none 
 dizzi ey furi great rage heart
 suddenli made side start
 into clust ring battl french 
 and sea blood boy drench
 hi overmount spirit die 
 my icaru blossom pride 

 enter soldier bear bodi john talbot

 servant o dear lord lo son born 
 talbot thou antic death laugh st us scorn 
 anon thi insult tyranni 
 coupl bond perpetu 
 two talbot wing lither sky 
 in thi despit shall scape mortal 
 o thou whose wound becom hard favour death 
 speak thi father ere thou yield thi breath 
 brave death speak whether 
 imagin frenchman thi foe 
 poor boy smile methink say 
 had death french death die day 
 come come lay father arm 
 my spirit longer bear harm 
 soldier adieu i i would 
 now old arm young john talbot grave die 

 enter charl alencon burgundi bastard 
 la pucel forces

 charl had york somerset brought rescu 
 we found bloodi day 
 bastard how young whelp talbot rage wood 
 did flesh puni sword frenchmen blood 
 pucel onc i encount red thu i said 
 thou maiden youth vanquish maid 
 but proud majest high scorn
 he answer thu young talbot born
 to pillag giglot wench 
 so rush bowel french 
 he left proudli unworthi fight 
 burgundi doubtless would made nobl knight 
 see lie inhears arms
 of bloodi nurser harm 
 bastard hew piec hack bone asund 
 whose life england glori gallia wonder 
 charl o forbear for fled
 dure life let us wrong dead 

 enter sir william luci attend french
 herald preceding

 luci herald conduct dauphin tent 
 to know hath obtain glori day 
 charl on submiss messag art thou sent 
 luci submiss dauphin ti mere french word 
 we english warrior wot mean 
 i come know prison thou hast ta en 
 and survey bodi dead 
 charl for prison ask st thou hell prison 
 but tell thou seek st 
 luci but great alcid field 
 valiant lord talbot earl shrewsburi 
 creat rare success arms
 great earl washford waterford valenc 
 lord talbot goodrig urchinfield 
 lord strang blackmer lord verdun alton 
 lord cromwel wingfield lord furniv sheffield 
 the thrice victori lord falconbridg 
 knight nobl order saint georg 
 worthi saint michael golden fleec 
 great marshal henri sixth
 of war within realm franc 
 pucel here silli state style inde 
 the turk two fifti kingdom hath 
 write tediou style 
 him thou magnifi st tide 
 stink fli blown lie feet 
 luci is talbot slain frenchmen scourg 
 your kingdom terror black nemesi 
 o mine eye ban bullet turn 
 that i rage might shoot face 
 o i could dead life 
 it enough fright realm franc 
 were pictur left amongst 
 it would amaz proudest 
 give bodi i may bear hence
 and give burial beseem worth 
 pucel i think upstart old talbot ghost 
 he speak proud command spirit 
 for god sake let keep 
 they would stink putrefi air 
 charl go take bodi henc 
 luci i bear henc ash shall be
 rear d
 a phoenix shall make franc afeard 
 charl so rid thou
 wilt 
 and pari conquer vein 
 all bloodi talbot slain exeunt

act v scene 1 

london the palace

sennet enter king gloucest exeter

 king henri have peru letter pope 
 the emperor earl armagnac 
 gloucest i lord intent 
 they humbl sue unto excellence
 to godli peac conclud of
 between realm england franc 
 king henri how doth grace affect motion 
 gloucest well good lord means
 to stop effus christian blood
 and stablish quiet everi side 
 king henri ay marri uncl i alway thought
 it impiou unnatural
 that imman bloodi strife
 should reign among professor one faith 
 gloucest besid lord sooner effect
 and surer bind knot amiti 
 the earl armagnac near knit charl 
 a man great author franc 
 proffer daughter grace
 in marriag larg sumptuou dowri 
 king henri marriag uncl ala year young
 and fitter studi books
 than wanton dallianc paramour 
 yet call th ambassador pleas 
 so let answer everi one 
 i shall well content choice
 tend god glori countri weal 

 enter cardin habit
 beaufort papal legat two ambassadors

 exet what is lord winchest instal d
 and call unto cardin degre 
 then i perceiv verified
 henri fifth sometim prophesi 
 if come cardin 
 he make cap co equal crown 
 king henri my lord ambassador sever suits
 have consid debat 
 your purpos good reason 
 and therefor certainli resolv d
 to draw condit friendli peac 
 which lord winchest mean
 shall transport present franc 
 gloucest and proffer lord master 
 i inform high larg 
 as like ladi virtuou gift 
 her beauti valu dower 
 he doth intend shall england queen 
 king henri to ambassador in argument proof of
 contract 
 bear jewel pledg affect 
 and lord protector see guarded
 and safe brought dover inshipp 
 commit fortun sea 

 exeunt winchest legate
 winchest stay lord legat shall first receive
 the sum money i promised
 should deliv holiness
 for cloth grave ornament 
 legat i attend upon lordship leisur 
 winchest asid now winchest submit i
 trow 
 or inferior proudest peer 
 humphrey gloucest thou shalt well perceive
 that neither birth authority
 the bishop overborn thee 
 i either make thee stoop bend thi knee 
 or sack countri mutini exeunt

 scene 2 

 franc plain anjou

 enter charl burgundi alencon bastard 
 reignier la pucel forces

 charl these news lord may cheer drooping
 spirit 
 ti said stout parisian revolt
 and turn unto warlik french 
 alencon then march pari royal charl franc 
 and keep back power dallianc 
 pucel peac amongst turn us 
 els ruin combat palac 

 enter scout

 scout success unto valiant gener 
 and happi accomplic 
 charl what tide send scout i prithe speak 
 scout the english armi divid was
 into two parti conjoin one 
 and mean give battl present 
 charl somewhat sudden sir warn 
 but present provid 
 burgundi i trust ghost talbot 
 now gone lord need fear 
 pucel of base passion fear accur 
 command conquest charl shall thine 
 let henri fret world repin 
 charl then lord franc fortun 
 exeunt

 scene 3 

 befor angiers

 alarum excurs enter la pucelle

 pucel the regent conquer frenchmen fli 
 now help ye charm spell periapt 
 and ye choic spirit admonish me
 and give sign futur accid thunder 
 you speedi helper substitutes
 under lordli monarch north 
 appear aid enterpris 

 enter fiends

 thi speedi quick appear argu proof
 of accustom dilig 
 now ye familiar spirit cull d
 out power region earth 
 help franc may get field 
 they walk speak 
 o hold silenc long 
 where i wont feed blood 
 i lop member give you
 in earnest benefit 
 so condescend help 
 they hang head 
 no hope redress my bodi shall
 pay recompens grant suit 
 they shake head 
 can not bodi blood sacrifice
 entreat wont further 
 then take soul bodi soul 
 befor england give french foil 
 they depart 
 see forsak now time come
 that franc must vail lofti plume crest
 and let head fall england lap 
 my ancient incant weak 
 and hell strong buckl 
 now franc thi glori droopeth dust exit

 excurs enter french english fight 
 la pucel york fight hand hand la pucelle
 taken the french fly

 york damsel franc i think i fast 
 unchain spirit spell charm 
 and tri gain liberti 
 a goodli prize fit devil grace 
 see ugli witch doth bend brows
 as circ would chang shape 
 pucel chang worser shape thou canst 
 york o charl dauphin proper man 
 no shape pleas dainti eye 
 pucel a plagu mischief fight charl thee 
 and may ye suddenli surpri d
 by bloodi hand sleep bed 
 york fell ban hag enchantress hold thi tongu 
 pucel i prithe give leav curs awhil 
 york curs miscreant thou comest stake 
 exeunt

 alarum enter suffolk margaret hand

 suffolk be thou wilt thou art prison 
 gaze 
 o fairest beauti fear fli 
 for i touch thee rever hand 
 i kiss finger etern peac 
 and lay gentli thi tender side 
 who art thou say i may honour thee 
 margaret margaret name daughter king 
 the king napl whoso er thou art 
 suffolk an earl i suffolk i call 
 be offend natur miracl 
 thou art allot ta en 
 so doth swan downi cygnet save 
 keep prison underneath wing 
 yet servil usag offend 
 go free suffolk friend she go 
 o stay asid i power let pass 
 my hand would free heart say 
 as play sun upon glassi stream 
 twinkl anoth counterfeit beam 
 so seem gorgeou beauti mine eye 
 fain would i woo yet i dare speak 
 i call pen ink write mind 
 fie de la pole disabl thyself 
 hast tongu is thi prison 
 wilt thou daunt woman sight 
 ay beauti princ majesti such
 confound tongu make sens rough 
 margaret say earl suffolk thi name 
 what ransom must i pay i pass 
 for i perceiv i thi prison 
 suffolk asid how canst thou tell deni thy
 suit 
 befor thou make trial love 
 margaret whi speak st thou what ransom must i
 pay 
 suffolk asid she beauti therefor woo 
 she woman therefor 
 margaret wilt thou accept ransom yea 
 suffolk asid fond man rememb thou hast a
 wife 
 then margaret thi paramour 
 margaret i best leav hear 
 suffolk asid there marr lie cooling
 card 
 margaret he talk random sure man mad 
 suffolk asid and yet dispens may 
 margaret and yet i would would answer 
 suffolk asid i win ladi margaret for 
 whi king tush wooden thing 
 margaret he talk wood it carpent 
 suffolk asid yet fanci may satisfi 
 and peac establish realm 
 but remain scrupl 
 for though father king napl 
 duke anjou main yet poor 
 and nobil scorn match 
 margaret hear ye captain leisur 
 suffolk asid it shall disdain ne er much 
 henri youth quickli yield 
 madam i secret reveal 
 margaret asid what though i enthral he seems
 knight 
 and way dishonour 
 suffolk ladi vouchsaf listen i say 
 margaret asid perhap i shall rescu french 
 and i need crave courtesi 
 suffolk sweet madam give hear cause
 margaret asid tush women captiv ere
 
 suffolk ladi wherefor talk 
 margaret i cri merci ti quid quo 
 suffolk say gentl princess would suppose
 your bondag happi made queen 
 margaret to queen bondag vile
 than slave base servil 
 for princ free 
 suffolk and shall 
 if happi england royal king free 
 margaret whi concern freedom unto 
 suffolk i undertak make thee henri queen 
 to put golden sceptr thi hand
 and set preciou crown upon thi head 
 if thou wilt condescend 
 margaret what 
 suffolk hi love 
 margaret i unworthi henri wife 
 suffolk no gentl madam i unworthi am
 to woo fair dame wife
 and portion choic 
 how say madam are ye content 
 margaret an father pleas i content 
 suffolk then call captain colour forth 
 and madam father castl walls
 we crave parley confer 

 sound parley enter reignier walls

 see reignier see thi daughter prison 
 reignier to 
 suffolk to 
 reignier suffolk remedi 
 i soldier unapt weep
 or exclaim fortun fickl 
 suffolk ye remedi enough lord 
 consent thi honour give consent 
 thi daughter shall wed king 
 whom i pain woo thereto 
 and easi held imprisonment
 hath gain thi daughter princ liberti 
 reignier speak suffolk think 
 suffolk fair margaret knows
 that suffolk doth flatter face feign 
 reignier upon thi princ warrant i descend
 to give thee answer thi demand 
 exit reignier walls
 suffolk and i expect thi come 

 trumpet sound enter reignier below

 reignier welcom brave earl territori 
 command anjou honour pleas 
 suffolk thank reignier happi sweet child 
 fit made companion king 
 what answer make grace unto suit 
 reignier sinc thou dost deign woo littl worth
 to princ bride lord 
 upon condit i may quietly
 enjoy mine countri main anjou 
 free oppress stroke war 
 my daughter shall henri pleas 
 suffolk that ransom i deliv 
 and two counti i undertake
 your grace shall well quietli enjoy 
 reignier and i henri royal name 
 as deputi unto graciou king 
 give thee hand sign plight faith 
 suffolk reignier franc i give thee kingli thank 
 becaus traffic king 
 asid and yet methink i could well content
 to mine attorney case 
 i england news 
 and make marriag solemniz 
 so farewel reignier set diamond safe
 in golden palac becom 
 reignier i embrac thee i would embrace
 the christian princ king henri 
 margaret farewel lord good wish prais and
 prayer 
 shall suffolk ever margaret she go 
 suffolk farewel sweet madam but hark margaret
 no princ commend king 
 margaret such commend becom maid 
 a virgin servant say 
 suffolk word sweetli plac modestli direct 
 but madam i must troubl again
 no love token majesti 
 margaret ye good lord pure unspot heart 
 never yet taint love i send king 
 suffolk and withal kiss 
 margaret that thyself i presume
 to send peevish token king 
 exeunt reignier margaret
 suffolk o wert thou but suffolk stay 
 thou mayst wander labyrinth 
 there minotaur ugli treason lurk 
 solicit henri wondrou prais 
 bethink thee virtu surmount 
 and natur grace extinguish art 
 repeat semblanc often sea 
 that thou com st kneel henri feet 
 thou mayst bereav wit wonder exit

 scene 4 

 camp duke of york anjou

 enter york warwick others
 york bring forth sorceress condemn burn 

 enter la pucel guard shepherd

 shepherd ah joan kill thi father heart outright 
 have i sought everi countri far near 
 and chanc find thee 
 must i behold thi timeless cruel death 
 ah joan sweet daughter joan i die thee 
 pucel decrepit miser base ignobl wretch 
 i descend gentler blood 
 thou art father friend mine 
 shepherd out my lord pleas ti 
 i beget parish know 
 her mother liveth yet testify
 she first fruit bach lorship 
 warwick graceless wilt thou deni thi parentag 
 york thi argu kind life hath 
 wick vile death conclud 
 shepherd fie joan thou wilt obstacl 
 god know thou art collop flesh 
 and thi sake i shed mani tear 
 deni i prithe gentl joan 
 pucel peasant avaunt you suborn man
 of purpos obscur nobl birth 
 shepherd ti true i gave nobl priest
 the morn i wed mother 
 kneel take bless good girl 
 wilt thou stoop now curs time
 of thi nativ i would milk
 thi mother gave thee thou suck dst breast
 had littl ratsban thi sake 
 or els thou didst keep lamb afield 
 i wish raven wolf eaten thee 
 dost thou deni thi father curs drab 
 o burn burn hang good exit
 york take away hath liv long 
 to fill world viciou qualiti 
 pucel first let tell condemn 
 not begotten shepherd swain 
 but issu progeni king 
 virtuou holi chosen above
 by inspir celesti grace 
 to work exceed miracl earth 
 i never wick spirit 
 but pollut lust 
 stain guiltless blood innoc 
 corrupt taint thousand vice 
 becaus want grace other 
 you judg straight thing impossible
 to compass wonder help devil 
 no misconceiv joan arc hath been
 a virgin tender infanc 
 chast immacul thought 
 whose maiden blood thu rigor effu 
 will cri vengeanc gate heaven 
 york ay ay away execut 
 warwick and hark ye sir maid 
 spare fagot let enow 
 place barrel pitch upon fatal stake 
 that tortur may shorten 
 pucel will noth turn unrel heart 
 then joan discov thine infirmity
 that warranteth law thi privileg 
 i child ye bloodi homicid 
 murder fruit within womb 
 although ye hale violent death 
 york now heaven forfend the holi maid child 
 warwick the greatest miracl e er ye wrought 
 is strict precis come 
 york she dauphin juggl 
 i imagin would refug 
 warwick well go bastard live 
 especi sinc charl must father 
 pucel you deceiv child none 
 it alencon enjoy love 
 york alencon notori machiavel 
 it die thousand live 
 pucel o give leav i delud 
 twa neither charl yet duke i nam 
 but reignier king napl prevail 
 warwick a marri man that intoler 
 york whi girl i think know well
 there mani may accus 
 warwick it sign hath liber free 
 york and yet forsooth virgin pure 
 strumpet thi word condemn thi brat thee 
 use entreati vain 
 pucel then lead henc i leav my
 curs 
 may never gloriou sun reflex beams
 upon countri make abod 
 but dark gloomi shade death
 environ till mischief despair
 drive break neck hang 
 exit guarded
 york break thou piec consum ash 
 thou foul accurs minist hell 

 enter cardin beaufort attended

 cardin lord regent i greet excellence
 with letter commiss king 
 for know lord state christendom 
 mov remors outrag broil 
 have earnestli implor gener peace
 betwixt nation aspir french 
 and hand dauphin train
 approacheth confer matter 
 york is travail turn effect 
 after slaughter mani peer 
 so mani captain gentlemen soldier 
 that quarrel overthrown
 and sold bodi countri benefit 
 shall last conclud effemin peac 
 have lost part town 
 by treason falsehood treacheri 
 our great progenitor conquer 
 o warwick warwick i forese grief
 the utter loss realm franc 
 warwick be patient york if conclud peac 
 it shall strict sever covenants
 as littl shall frenchmen gain therebi 

 enter charl alencon bastard reignier others

 charl sinc lord england thu agreed
 that peac truce shall proclaim franc 
 we come inform yourselves
 what condit leagu must 
 york speak winchest boil choler chokes
 the hollow passag poison voic 
 by sight bale enemi 
 cardin charl rest enact thu 
 that regard king henri give consent 
 of mere compass leniti 
 to eas countri distress war 
 an suffer breath fruit peac 
 you shall becom true liegemen crown 
 and charl upon condit thou wilt swear
 to pay tribut submit thyself 
 thou shalt plac viceroy 
 and still enjoy thi regal digniti 
 alencon must shadow 
 adorn templ coronet
 and yet substanc author 
 retain privileg privat man 
 thi proffer absurd reasonless 
 charl ti known alreadi i possess d
 with half gallian territori 
 and therein reverenc law king 
 shall i lucr rest unvanquish 
 detract much prerogative
 as call viceroy whole 
 no lord ambassador i rather keep
 that i covet 
 be cast possibl 
 york insult charl hast thou secret means
 us intercess obtain leagu 
 and matter grow compromise
 stand st thou aloof upon comparison 
 either accept titl thou usurp st 
 of benefit proceed king
 and challeng desert 
 or plagu thee incess war 
 reignier to charl my lord well in
 obstinacy
 to cavil cours contract 
 if neglect ten one
 we shall find like opportun 
 alencon to charl to say truth policy
 to save subject massacre
 and ruthless slaughter daili seen
 by proceed hostil 
 and therefor take compact truce 
 although break pleasur serv 
 warwick how say st thou charl shall condition
 stand 
 charl it shall 
 onli reserv claim interest
 in town garrison 
 york then swear allegi majesti 
 as thou art knight never disobey
 nor rebelli crown england
 thou thi nobl crown england 
 charl rest give token fealti 
 so dismiss armi ye pleas 
 hang ensign let drum still 
 for entertain solemn peac exeunt

 scene 5 

 london the palace

 enter suffolk confer king 
 gloucest exeter

 king henri your wondrou rare descript nobl earl 
 of beauteou margaret hath astonish 
 her virtu grace extern gift 
 do breed love settl passion heart 
 and like rigour tempestu gusts
 provok mightiest hulk tide 
 so i driven breath renown
 either suffer shipwreck arrive
 where i may fruition love 
 suffolk tush good lord thi superfici tale
 is prefac worthi prais 
 the chief perfect love dame 
 had i suffici skill utter 
 would make volum entic line 
 abl ravish dull conceit 
 and divin 
 so full replet choic delight 
 but humbl lowli mind
 she content command
 command i mean virtuou intent 
 to love honour henri lord 
 king henri and otherwis henri ne er presum 
 therefor lord protector give consent
 that margaret may england royal queen 
 gloucest so i give consent flatter sin 
 you know lord high betroth d
 unto anoth ladi esteem 
 how shall dispens contract 
 and defac honour reproach 
 suffolk as doth ruler unlaw oath 
 or one triumph vow d
 to tri strength forsaketh yet lists
 by reason adversari odd 
 a poor earl daughter unequ odd 
 and therefor may broke without offenc 
 gloucest whi i pray margaret than
 
 her father better earl 
 although gloriou titl excel 
 suffolk ye lord father king 
 the king napl jerusalem 
 and great author france
 as allianc confirm peac 
 and keep frenchmen allegi 
 gloucest and earl armagnac may 
 becaus near kinsman unto charl 
 exet besid wealth doth warrant liber dower 
 where reignier sooner receiv give 
 suffolk a dow r lord disgrac king 
 that abject base poor 
 to choos wealth perfect love 
 henri abl enrich queen 
 and seek queen make rich 
 so worthless peasant bargain wive 
 as market men oxen sheep hors 
 marriag matter worth
 than dealt attorneyship 
 not grace affect 
 must companion nuptial bed 
 and therefor lord sinc affect 
 it reason bindeth us
 in opinion preferr 
 for wedlock forc hell 
 an age discord continu strife 
 wherea contrari bringeth bliss 
 and pattern celesti peac 
 whom match henri king 
 but margaret daughter king 
 her peerless featur join birth 
 approv fit none king 
 her valiant courag undaunt spirit 
 more women commonli seen 
 will answer hope issu king 
 for henri son unto conqueror 
 is like beget conqueror 
 if ladi high resolve
 as fair margaret link love 
 then yield lord conclud me
 that margaret shall queen none 
 king henri whether forc report 
 my nobl lord suffolk that
 my tender youth never yet attaint
 with passion inflam love 
 i can not tell i assur 
 i feel sharp dissens breast 
 such fierc alarum hope fear 
 as i sick work thought 
 take therefor ship post lord franc 
 agre coven procure
 that ladi margaret vouchsaf come
 to cross sea england crown d
 king henri faith anoint queen 
 for expens suffici charg 
 among peopl gather tenth 
 be gone i say till return
 i rest perplex thousand care 
 and good uncl banish offenc 
 if censur 
 not i know excuse
 thi sudden execut 
 and conduct compani 
 i may revolv rumin grief exit
 gloucest ay grief i fear first last 
 exeunt gloucest exeter
 suffolk thu suffolk hath prevail thu goe 
 as youth pari greec 
 with hope find like event love
 but prosper better troyan 
 margaret shall queen rule king 
 but i rule king realm exit




th second part of king henri the sixth

 a spirit rais him
