scene england

act i scene i london the palace

flourish trumpet hautboy enter king duke humphrey of
gloucest salisburi warwick cardin beaufort one side 
the queen suffolk york somerset buckingham other

 suffolk as high imperi majesty
 i charg depart franc 
 as procur excel 
 to marri princess margaret grace 
 so famou ancient citi tour 
 in presenc king franc sicil 
 the duke orlean calab bretagn alencon 
 seven earl twelv baron twenti reverend bishop 
 i perform task espou 
 and humbl upon bend knee 
 in sight england lordli peer 
 deliv titl queen
 to graciou hand substance
 of great shadow i repres 
 the happiest gift ever marqui gave 
 the fairest queen ever king receiv 
 king henri suffolk aris welcom queen margaret 
 i express kinder sign love
 than kind kiss o lord lend life 
 lend heart replet thank 
 for thou hast given beauteou face
 a world earthli bless soul 
 if sympathi love unit thought 
 queen great king england graciou lord 
 the mutual confer mind hath 
 by day night wake dream 
 in courtli compani bead 
 with mine alder liefest sovereign 
 make bolder salut king
 with ruder term wit affords
 and joy heart doth minist 
 king henri her sight ravish grace speech 
 her word clad wisdom majesti 
 make wond ring fall weep joy 
 such ful heart content 
 lord one cheer voic welcom love 
 all kneel long live queen margaret england happi 
 queen we thank flourish 
 suffolk my lord protector pleas grace 
 here articl contract peace
 between sovereign french king charl 
 for eighteen month conclud consent 
 gloucest read imprimi it agre french king
 charl william de la pole marquess suffolk ambassador
 henri king england said henri shall espous the
 ladi margaret daughter unto reignier king napl sicilia 
 jerusalem crown queen england ere thirtieth
 may next ensu 
 item that duchi anjou counti main shall be
 releas deliv king father 
 let paper fall 
 king henri uncl 
 gloucest pardon graciou lord 
 some sudden qualm hath struck heart 
 and dimm mine eye i read 
 king henri uncl winchest i pray read 
 cardin read item it agre the
 duchi anjou main shall releas deliv over
 king father sent king of
 england proper cost charg without dowri 
 king henri they pleas us well lord marquess kneel 
 we creat thee first duke suffolk 
 and girt thee sword cousin york 
 we discharg grace regent
 i th part franc till term eighteen months
 be full expir thank uncl winchest 
 gloucest york buckingham somerset 
 salisburi warwick 
 we thank great favour done
 in entertain princ queen 
 come let us speed provide
 to see coron perform 
 exeunt king queen suffolk
 gloucest brave peer england pillar state 
 to duke humphrey must unload grief
 your grief common grief land 
 what brother henri spend youth 
 hi valour coin peopl war 
 did often lodg open field 
 in winter cold summer parch heat 
 to conquer franc true inherit 
 and brother bedford toil wits
 to keep polici henri got 
 have somerset buckingham 
 brave york salisburi victori warwick 
 receiv deep scar franc normandi 
 or hath mine uncl beaufort 
 with learn council realm 
 studi long sat council house
 earli late debat fro
 how franc frenchmen might kept awe 
 and high infancy
 crown pari despit foe 
 and shall labour honour die 
 shall henri conquest bedford vigil 
 your deed war counsel die 
 o peer england shame leagu 
 fatal marriag cancel fame 
 blot name book memori 
 raze charact renown 
 defac monument conquer franc 
 undo never 
 cardin nephew mean passion discours 
 thi peror circumst 
 for franc ti keep still 
 gloucest ay uncl keep 
 but imposs 
 suffolk new made duke rule roast 
 hath given duchi anjou maine
 unto poor king reignier whose larg style
 agre lean purs 
 salisburi now death him die 
 these counti key normandi 
 but wherefor weep warwick valiant son 
 warwick for grief past recoveri 
 for hope conquer again
 my sword shed hot blood mine eye tear 
 anjou main win 
 those provinc arm mine conquer 
 and citi i got wounds
 deliv peac word 
 mort dieu 
 york for suffolk duke may suffoc 
 that dim honour warlik isl 
 franc torn rent heart
 befor i would yield leagu 
 i never read england king had
 larg sum gold dowri wive 
 and king henri give away own
 to match bring vantag 
 gloucest a proper jest never heard 
 that suffolk demand whole fifteenth
 for cost charg transport 
 she stay franc starv franc 
 befor 
 cardin my lord gloucest ye grow hot 
 it pleasur lord king 
 gloucest my lord winchest i know mind 
 ti speech mislik 
 but ti presenc doth troubl ye 
 rancour proud prelat thi face
 i see thi furi i longer stay
 we shall begin ancient bicker 
 lord farewel say i gone 
 i prophesi franc lost ere long exit
 cardin so goe protector rage 
 ti known mine enemi 
 nay enemi unto 
 and great friend i fear king 
 consid lord next blood
 and heir appar english crown 
 had henri got empir marriage
 and wealthi kingdom west 
 there reason displea 
 look lord let smooth words
 bewitch heart wise circumspect 
 what though common peopl favour 
 call humphrey good duke gloucest 
 clap hand cri loud voice
 jesu maintain royal excel 
 with god preserv good duke humphrey 
 i fear lord flatter gloss 
 he found danger protector 
 buckingham whi protect sovereign 
 he age govern 
 cousin somerset join 
 and togeth duke suffolk 
 we quickli hois duke humphrey seat 
 cardin thi weighti busi brook delay 
 i duke suffolk present exit
 somerset cousin buckingham though humphrey pride
 and great place grief us 
 yet let us watch haughti cardin 
 hi insol intolerable
 than princ land besid 
 if gloucest displac protector 
 buckingham or thou i somerset protector 
 despit duke humphrey cardin 
 exeunt buckingham somerset
 salisburi pride went ambit follow 
 while labour prefer 
 behov us labour realm 
 i never saw humphrey duke gloucester
 did bear like nobl gentleman 
 oft i seen haughti cardin 
 more like soldier man th church 
 as stout proud lord 
 swear like ruffian demean himself
 unlik ruler commonw 
 warwick son comfort age 
 thi deed thi plain thi housekeep 
 hath greatest favour common 
 except none good duke humphrey 
 and brother york thi act ireland 
 in bring civil disciplin 
 thi late exploit done heart france
 when thou wert regent sovereign 
 have made thee fear honour peopl 
 join togeth public good 
 in bridl suppress
 the pride suffolk cardin 
 with somerset buckingham ambit 
 and may cherish duke humphrey deeds
 while tend profit land 
 warwick so god help warwick love land
 and common profit countri 
 york and say york asid hath greatest caus 
 salisburi then let make hast away look unto main 
 warwick unto main o father main lost 
 that main main forc warwick win 
 and would kept long breath last 
 main chanc father meant i meant main 
 which i win franc els slain 
 exeunt warwick salisbury
 york anjou main given french 
 pari lost state normandy
 stand tickl point gone 
 suffolk conclud articl 
 the peer agre henri well plea d
 to chang two dukedom duke fair daughter 
 i can not blame 
 ti thine give away 
 pirat may make cheap pennyworth pillag 
 and purchas friend give courtezan 
 still revel like lord till gone 
 while silli owner goods
 weep wring hapless hands
 and shake head trembl stand aloof 
 while shar born away 
 readi starv dare touch 
 so york must sit fret bite tongu 
 while land bargain sold 
 methink realm england franc ireland 
 bear proport flesh blood
 as fatal brand althaea burnt
 unto princ heart calydon 
 anjou main given unto french 
 cold news i hope franc 
 even i fertil england soil 
 a day come york shall claim 
 and therefor i take nevil part 
 and make show love proud duke humphrey 
 and i spi advantag claim crown 
 for golden mark i seek hit 
 nor shall proud lancast usurp right 
 nor hold sceptr childish fist 
 nor wear diadem upon head 
 whose church like humour fit crown 
 then york still awhil till time serv 
 watch thou wake other asleep 
 to pri secret state 
 till henri surfeit joy love
 with new bride england dear bought queen 
 and humphrey peer fall n jar 
 then i rais aloft milk white rose 
 with whose sweet smell air shall perfum 
 and standard bear arm york 
 to grappl hous lancast 
 and forc perforc i make yield crown 
 whose bookish rule hath pull fair england exit

scen ii the duke of gloucest s house

ent duke wife eleanor

 duchess whi droop lord like ripen corn
 hang head cere plenteou load 
 whi doth great duke humphrey knit brow 
 as frown favour world 
 whi thine eye fix sullen earth 
 gaze seem dim thi sight 
 what see st thou king henri diadem 
 encha honour world 
 if gaze grovel thi face
 until thi head circl 
 put forth thi hand reach gloriou gold 
 what short i lengthen mine 
 and togeth heav 
 we togeth lift head heaven 
 and never abas sight low
 as vouchsaf one glanc unto ground 
 gloucest o nell sweet nell thou dost love thi lord 
 banish canker ambiti thought 
 and may thought i imagin ill
 against king nephew virtuou henri 
 be last breath mortal world 
 my troublou dream night doth make sad 
 duchess what dream lord tell i requit it
 with sweet rehears morn dream 
 gloucest methought staff mine offic badg court 
 wa broke twain i forgot 
 but i think th cardin 
 and piec broken wand
 were plac head edmund duke somerset
 and william de la pole first duke suffolk 
 thi dream doth bode god know 
 duchess tut noth argument
 that break stick gloucest grove
 shall lose head presumpt 
 but list humphrey sweet duke 
 methought i sat seat majesty
 in cathedr church westminst 
 and chair king queen crown 
 where henri dame margaret kneel 
 and head set diadem 
 gloucest nay eleanor must i chide outright 
 presumptu dame ill nurtur eleanor 
 art thou second woman realm 
 and protector wife belov 
 hast thou worldli pleasur command
 abov reach compass thi thought 
 and wilt thou still hammer treachery
 to tumbl thi husband thyself
 from top honour disgrac feet 
 away let hear 
 duchess what lord are choleric
 with eleanor tell dream 
 next time i keep dream unto myself
 and check 
 gloucest nay angri i plea 

 enter messenger

 messeng my lord protector ti high pleasure
 you prepar ride unto saint alban 
 where king queen mean hawk 
 gloucest i go come nell thou wilt ride us 
 duchess ye good lord i follow present 
 exeunt gloucest messenger
 follow i must i can not go 
 while gloucest bear base humbl mind 
 were i man duke next blood 
 i would remov tediou stumbl blocks
 and smooth way upon headless neck 
 and woman i slack
 to play part fortun pageant 
 where sir john nay fear man 
 we alon none thee i 

 enter hume

 hume jesu preserv royal majesti 
 duchess what say st thou majesti i grace 
 hume but grace god hume advic 
 your grace titl shall multipli 
 duchess what say st thou man hast thou yet conferr d
 with margeri jourdain cun witch eie 
 with roger bolingbrok conjur 
 and undertak good 
 hume thi promis show highness
 a spirit rai depth underground
 that shall make answer questions
 as grace shall propound him
 duchess it enough i think upon question 
 when saint alban make return
 we see thing effect full 
 here hume take reward make merri man 
 with thi confeder weighti caus exit
 hume hume must make merri duchess gold 
 marri shall but sir john hume 
 seal lip give word mum 
 the busi asketh silent secreci 
 dame eleanor give gold bring witch 
 gold can not come amiss devil 
 yet i gold fli anoth coast 
 i dare say rich cardin 
 and great new made duke suffolk 
 yet i find plain 
 they know dame eleanor aspir humour 
 have hire undermin duchess 
 and buzz conjur brain 
 they say a crafti knave need broker 
 yet i suffolk cardin broker 
 hume take heed shall go near
 to call pair crafti knave 
 well stand thu i fear last
 hume knaveri duchess wreck 
 and attaintur humphrey fall
 sort i shall gold exit

 matter king

 queen and love protected
 under wing protector grace 
 begin suit anew sue 
 tear supplic 
 away base cullion suffolk let go 
 all come let gone exeunt
 queen my lord suffolk say guis 
 is fashion court england 
 is govern britain isl 
 and royalti albion king 
 what shall king henri pupil still 
 under surli gloucest govern 
 am i queen titl style 
 and must made subject duke 
 i tell thee pole citi tours
 thou ran st tilt honour love
 and stol st away ladi heart franc 
 i thought king henri resembl thee
 in courag courtship proport 
 but mind bent holi 
 to number ave mari bead 
 hi champion prophet apostl 
 hi weapon holi saw sacr writ 
 hi studi tilt yard loves
 are brazen imag canon saint 
 i would colleg cardinals
 would choos pope carri rome 
 and set tripl crown upon head 
 that state fit holi 
 suffolk madam patient as i cause
 your high came england i
 in england work grace full content 
 queen besid haughti protector beaufort
 the imperi churchman somerset buckingham 
 and grumbl york least these
 but england king 
 suffolk and all
 can not england nevil 
 salisburi warwick simpl peer 
 queen not lord vex half much
 as proud dame lord protector wife 
 she sweep court troop ladi 
 more like empress duke humphrey wife 
 stranger court take queen 
 she bear duke revenu back 
 and heart scorn poverti 
 shall i live aveng 
 contemptu base born callet 
 she vaunt mongst minion day
 the train worst wear gown
 wa better worth father land 
 till suffolk gave two dukedom daughter 
 suffolk madam lim bush 
 and plac quir entic birds
 that light listen lay 
 and never mount troubl 
 so let rest and madam list 
 for i bold counsel 
 although fanci cardin 
 yet must join lord 
 till brought duke humphrey disgrac 
 as duke york late complaint
 will make littl benefit 
 so one one weed last 
 and shall steer happi helm 

 sound sennet enter king duke humphrey 
 cardin beaufort buckingham york somerset salisburi 
 warwick duchess of gloucester

 king henri for part nobl lord i care 
 or somerset york one 
 york if york ill demean franc 
 then let denay regentship 
 somerset if somerset unworthi place 
 let york regent i yield 
 warwick whether grace worthi yea 
 disput york worthier 
 cardin ambiti warwick let thi better speak 
 warwick the cardin better field 
 buckingham all presenc thi better warwick 
 warwick warwick may live best 
 salisburi peac son and show reason buckingham 
 whi somerset preferr 
 queen becaus king forsooth 
 gloucest madam king old enough himself
 to give censur these women matter 
 queen if old enough need grace
 to protector excel 
 gloucest madam i protector realm 
 and pleasur resign place 
 suffolk resign leav thine insol 
 sinc thou wert king king thou 
 the commonwealth hath daili run wrack 
 the dauphin hath prevail beyond sea 
 and peer nobl realm
 have bondmen thi sovereignti 
 cardin the common hast thou rack clergi bags
 are lank lean thi extort 
 somerset thi sumptuou build thi wife attire
 have cost mass public treasuri 
 buckingham thi cruelti execution
 upon offend hath exceed law 
 and left thee merci law 
 queen thi sale offic town franc 
 if known suspect great 
 would make thee quickli hop without thi head 
 exit gloucest the queen drop queen fan
 give fan what minion ye 
 she give duchess box ear 
 i cri merci madam 
 duchess wa i yea i proud frenchwoman 
 could i come near beauti nail 
 i could set ten command face 
 king henri sweet aunt quiet twa 
 duchess against good king look time 
 she hamper thee dandl thee like babi 
 though place master wear breech 
 she shall strike dame eleanor unreveng exit
 buckingham lord cardin i follow eleanor 
 and listen humphrey proce 
 she tickl fume need spur 
 she gallop far enough destruct exit

 re enter gloucester

 gloucest now lord choler overblown
 with walk quadrangl 
 i come talk commonwealth affair 
 as spite fals object 
 prove i lie open law

 as i duti love king countri 
 but matter hand 
 i say sovereign york meetest man
 to regent realm franc 
 suffolk befor make elect give leave
 to show reason littl forc 
 that york unmeet man 
 york i tell thee suffolk i unmeet 
 first i can not flatter thee pride 
 next i appoint place 
 my lord somerset keep here
 without discharg money furnitur 
 till franc dauphin hand 
 last time i danc attend will
 till pari besieg famish lost 
 warwick that i wit fouler fact
 did never traitor land commit 
 suffolk peac headstrong warwick 
 warwick imag pride i hold peac

 suffolk becaus man accu treason 
 pray god duke york excus 
 york doth one accus york traitor

 suffolk pleas majesti man
 that doth accus master high treason 
 hi word richard duke york
 wa right heir unto english crown 
 and majesti usurp 
 king henri say man thi word 
 horner an shall pleas majesti i never said thought
 matter god wit i fals accu the
 villain 
 peter hold hand by ten bone lord did
 speak garret one night scour my
 lord york armour 
 york base dunghil villain mechan 
 i thi head thi traitor speech

 let rigour law

 accus prentic i correct fault
 day vow upon knee would even with
 i good wit therefor i beseech your
 majesti cast away honest man villain s
 accus

 let somerset regent er french 
 becaus york breed suspicion 
 and let day appoint them
 for singl combat conveni place 
 for hath wit servant malic 
 thi law duke humphrey doom

 horner and i accept combat willingli

 i shall never abl fight blow o lord heart

ent margeri jourdain witch two priest hume southwel 
and bolingbroke

 hume come master duchess i tell expects
 perform promis

 ladyship behold hear exorc 
 hume ay els fear courag

 invinc spirit shall conveni master hume that
 aloft busi i pray go 
 god name leav us exit hume mother jourdain you
 prostrat grovel earth john southwel read and
 let us work 

 enter duchess aloft follow hume

 duchess well said master welcom to gear the
 sooner better 
 bolingbrok patienc good ladi wizard know time 
 deep night dark night silent night 
 the time night troy set fire 
 the time screech owl cri ban dog howl 
 and spirit walk ghost break grave 
 that time best fit work hand 
 madam sit fear raise
 we make fast within hallow verg 

 here ceremoni belong make circl 
 bolingbrok southwel read conjuro te c 
 it thunder lighten terribl spirit riseth 

 spirit adsum 
 margeri jourdain asmath 
 by etern god whose name power
 thou tremblest answer i shall ask 
 for till thou speak thou shalt pass henc 
 spirit ask thou wilt i said done 
 bolingbrok read first king shall becom 
 spirit the duke yet live henri shall depos 
 but outliv die violent death 
 as spirit speak southwel write answer 
 bolingbrok what fate await duke suffolk 
 spirit by water shall die take end

 spirit let shun castl 
 safer shall upon sandi plains
 than castl mount stand 
 have done i hardli endur 
 bolingbrok descend dark burn lake 
 fals fiend avoid thunder lightn exit spirit

act ii scene i saint albans

ent king queen gloucest cardin suffolk with
falcon halloing

 queen believ lord fli brook 
 i saw better sport seven year day 
 yet leav wind high 
 and ten one old joan gone 
 king henri but point lord falcon made 
 and pitch flew rest 
 to see god hi creatur work 
 yea man bird fain climb high 
 suffolk no marvel like majesti 
 my lord protector hawk tow r well 
 they know master love aloft 
 and bear thought falcon pitch 
 gloucest my lord ti base ignobl mind
 that mount higher bird soar 
 cardin i thought much would cloud 
 gloucest ay lord cardin think 
 were good grace could fli heaven 
 king henri the treasuri everlast joy 
 cardin thi heaven earth thine eye thoughts
 beat crown treasur thi heart 
 pernici protector danger peer 
 that smooth st king commonw 
 gloucest what cardin priesthood grown peremptori 
 tantaen animi coelestibu ira 
 churchmen hot good uncl hide malic 
 with holi 
 suffolk no malic sir well becomes
 so good quarrel bad peer 
 gloucest as lord 
 suffolk whi lord 
 an like lordli lord protectorship 
 gloucest whi suffolk england know thine insol 
 queen and thi ambit gloucest 
 king henri i prithe peac 
 good queen whet furiou peer 
 for bless peacemak earth 
 cardin let bless peac i make
 against proud protector sword 
 gloucest asid cardin faith holi uncl would twere
 come 
 cardin asid gloucest marri thou dar st 
 gloucest asid cardin make factiou number the
 matter 
 in thine person answer thi abus 
 cardin asid gloucest ay thou dar st peep an
 thou dar st 
 thi even east side grove 
 king henri how lord 
 cardin believ cousin gloucest 
 had man put fowl suddenli 
 we sport asid gloucest come thy
 two hand sword 
 gloucest true uncl 
 cardin asid gloucest are ye advi the east side of
 grove 
 gloucest asid cardin cardin i 
 king henri whi uncl gloucest 
 gloucest talk hawk noth els lord 
 asid cardin now god mother priest 
 i shave crown 
 or fenc shall fail 
 cardin asid gloucest medic teipsum 
 protector see well protect 
 king henri the wind grow high stomach lord 
 how irksom music heart 
 when string jar hope harmoni 
 i pray lord let compound strife 

 enter townsman saint alban cri a miracl 

 gloucest what mean nois 
 fellow miracl dost thou proclaim 
 townsman a miracl a miracl 
 suffolk come king tell miracl 
 townsman forsooth blind man saint alban shrine
 within half hour hath receiv sight 
 a man ne er saw life 
 king henri now god prai believ souls
 give light dark comfort despair 

 enter mayor of saint alban brethren 
 bear simpcox two chair 
 wife multitud following

 cardin here come townsmen procession
 to present high man 
 king henri great comfort earthli vale 
 although sight sin multipli 
 gloucest stand master bring near king 
 hi high pleasur talk 
 king henri good fellow tell us circumst 
 that thee may glorifi lord 
 what hast thou long blind restor 
 simpcox born blind pleas grace 
 wife ay inde 
 suffolk what woman 
 wife hi wife like worship 
 gloucest hadst thou mother thou couldst better
 told 
 king henri where wert thou born 
 simpcox at berwick north like grace 
 king henri poor soul god good hath great thee 
 let never day night unhallow pass 
 but still rememb lord hath done 
 queen tell good fellow cam st thou chanc 
 or devot holi shrine 
 simpcox god know pure devot call d
 a hundr time oft ner sleep 
 by good saint alban said simpcox come 
 come offer shrine i help thee 
 wife most true forsooth mani time oft
 myself heard voic call 
 cardin what art thou lame 
 simpcox ay god almighti help 
 suffolk how cam st thou 
 simpcox a fall tree 
 wife a plum tree master 
 gloucest how long hast thou blind 
 simpcox o born master 
 gloucest what wouldst climb tree 
 simpcox but life i youth 
 wife too true bought climb dear 
 gloucest mass thou lov dst plum well wouldst ventur 
 simpcox ala good master wife desir damsons
 and made climb with danger life 
 gloucest a subtl knave but yet shall serv 
 let see thine eye wink open 
 in opinion yet thou seest well 
 simpcox ye master clear day i thank god saint alban 
 gloucest say st thou what colour cloak 
 simpcox red master red blood 
 gloucest whi well said what colour gown 
 simpcox black forsooth coal black jet 
 king henri whi thou know st colour jet 
 suffolk and yet i think jet never see 
 gloucest but cloak gown day mani 
 wife never day life 
 gloucest tell sirrah name 
 simpcox ala master i know 
 gloucest what name 
 simpcox i know 
 gloucest nor 
 simpcox no inde master 
 gloucest what thine name 
 simpcox saunder simpcox pleas master 
 gloucest then saunder sit lie st knave in
 christendom if thou hadst born blind thou mightst well
 known name thu name sever colour we
 wear sight may distinguish colour suddenli to
 nomin imposs my lord saint alban here
 hath done miracl would ye think cun be
 great could restor crippl leg 
 simpcox o master could 
 gloucest my master saint alban beadl in
 town thing call whip 
 mayor ye lord pleas grace 
 gloucest then send one present 
 mayor sirrah go fetch beadl hither straight 
 exit attendant
 gloucest now fetch stool hither a stool
 brought now sirrah mean save whip 
 leap stool run away 
 simpcox ala master i abl stand alon 
 you go tortur vain 

 enter beadl whips

 gloucest well sir must find leg 
 sirrah beadl whip till leap stool 
 beadl i lord come sirrah doublet
 quickli 
 simpcox ala master shall i i abl stand 

 after beadl hath hit leap over
 stool run away follow cry
 a miracl 

 king henri o god seest thou bearest long 
 queen it made laugh see villain run 
 gloucest follow knave take drab away 
 wife ala sir pure need 
 gloucest let whipp everi market town till they
 come berwick whenc came 
 exeunt mayor beadl wife c 
 cardin duke humphrey done miracl day 
 suffolk true made lame leap fli away 
 gloucest but done miracl i 
 you made day lord whole town fli 

 enter buckingham

 king henri what tide cousin buckingham 
 buckingham such heart doth trembl unfold 
 a sort naughti person lewdli bent 
 under counten confederacy
 of ladi eleanor protector wife 
 the ringlead head rout 
 have practi danger state 
 deal witch conjur 
 whom apprehend fact 
 rais wick spirit ground 
 demand king henri life death
 and high privi council 
 as larg grace shall understand 
 cardin and lord protector means
 your ladi forthcom yet london 
 thi news i think hath turn weapon edg 
 ti like lord keep hour 
 gloucest ambiti churchman leav afflict heart 
 sorrow grief vanquish power 
 and vanquish i i yield the
 or meanest groom 
 king henri o god mischief work wick one 
 heap confus head therebi 
 queen gloucest see taintur thi nest 
 and look thyself faultless thou wert best 
 gloucest madam heaven i appeal
 how i lov king commonw 
 and wife i know stand 
 sorri i hear i heard 
 nobl forgot
 honour virtu conver such
 as like pitch defil nobil 
 i banish bed company
 and give prey law shame 
 that hath dishonour gloucest honest name 
 king henri well night repos us 
 to morrow toward london back again
 to look busi thoroughly
 and call foul offend answer 
 and pois caus justic equal scale 
 whose beam stand sure whose right caus prevail 
 flourish exeunt

scen ii london the duke of york s garden

ent york salisburi warwick

 york now good lord salisburi warwick 
 our simpl supper end give leave
 in close walk satisfi myself
 in crave opinion tide 
 which infal england crown 
 salisburi my lord i long hear full 
 warwick sweet york begin thi claim good 
 the nevil thi subject command 
 york then thu 
 edward third lord seven son 
 the first edward black princ princ wale 
 the second william hatfield third 
 lionel duke clarenc next whom
 wa john gaunt duke lancast 
 the fifth edmund langley duke york 
 the sixth thoma woodstock duke gloucest 
 william windsor seventh last 
 edward black princ die father
 and left behind richard son 
 who edward third death reign king
 till henri bolingbrok duke lancast 
 the eldest son heir john gaunt 
 crown name henri fourth 
 seiz realm depo right king 
 sent poor queen franc whenc came 
 and pomfret know 
 harmless richard murder traitor 
 warwick father duke hath told truth 
 thu got hous lancast crown 
 york which hold forc right 
 for richard first son heir dead 
 the issu next son reign 
 salisburi but william hatfield die without heir 
 york the third son duke clarenc whose line
 i claim crown issu philipp daughter 
 who marri edmund mortim earl march 
 edmund issu roger earl march 
 roger issu edmund ann eleanor 
 salisburi thi edmund reign bolingbrok 
 as i read laid claim unto crown 
 and owen glendow king 
 who kept captiv till die 
 but rest 
 york hi eldest sister ann 
 my mother heir unto crown 
 marri richard earl cambridg was
 to edmund langley edward third fifth son son 
 by i claim kingdom heir
 to roger earl march son
 of edmund mortim marri philipp 
 sole daughter unto lionel duke clarenc 
 so issu elder son
 succe younger i king 
 warwick what plain proceed plain 
 henri doth claim crown john gaunt 
 the fourth son york claim third 
 till lionel issu fail reign 
 it fail yet flourish thee
 and thi son fair slip stock 
 then father salisburi kneel togeth 
 and privat plot first
 that shall salut right sovereign
 with honour birthright crown 
 both long live sovereign richard england king 
 york we thank lord but i king
 till i crown sword stain d
 with heart blood hous lancast 
 and suddenli perform 
 but advic silent secreci 
 do i danger day 
 wink duke suffolk insol 
 at beaufort pride somerset ambit 
 at buckingham crew 
 till snar shepherd flock 
 that virtuou princ good duke humphrey 
 ti seek seek 
 shall find death york prophesi 
 salisburi my lord break know mind full 
 warwick my heart assur earl warwick
 shall one day make duke york king 
 york and nevil i assur 
 richard shall live make earl warwick
 the greatest man england king exeunt

scen iii london a hall justice

sound trumpet enter king state queen gloucest york

guard duchess of gloucest margeri jourdain hume southwel 
and bolingbroke

 king henri stand forth dame eleanor cobham gloucest wife 
 in sight god us guilt great 
 receiv sentenc law sins
 such god book adjudg death 
 you four henc prison back 
 from thenc unto place execut 
 the witch smithfield shall burnt ash 
 and three shall strangl gallow 
 you madam nobli born 
 despoil honour life 
 shall three day open penanc done 
 live countri banishment
 with sir john stanley isl man 
 duchess welcom banish welcom death 
 gloucest eleanor law thou seest hath judg thee 
 i can not justifi law condemn 
 exeunt duchess prison guarded
 mine eye full tear heart grief 
 ah humphrey dishonour thine age
 will bring thi head sorrow ground 
 i beseech majesti give leav go 
 sorrow would solac mine age would eas 
 king henri stay humphrey duke gloucest ere thou go 
 give thi staff henri himself
 protector god shall hope 
 my stay guid lantern feet 
 and go peac humphrey less belov d
 than thou wert protector thi king 
 queen i see reason king years
 should protect like child 
 god king henri govern england realm 
 give staff sir king realm 
 gloucest my staff here nobl henri staff 
 as willingli i resign
 as ere thi father henri made mine 
 and even willingli thi feet i leav it
 as other would ambiti receiv 
 farewel good king i dead gone 
 may honour peac attend thi throne exit
 queen whi henri king margaret queen 
 and humphrey duke gloucest scarc 
 that bear shrewd maim two pull 
 hi ladi banish limb lopp 
 thi staff honour raught let stand
 where best fit henri hand 
 suffolk thu droop lofti pine hang spray 
 thu eleanor pride die youngest day 
 york lord let go pleas majesti 
 thi day appoint combat 
 and readi appel defend 
 the armour man enter list 
 so pleas high behold fight 
 queen ay good lord purpos therefore
 left i court see quarrel tri 
 king henri a god name see list thing fit 
 here let end god defend right 
 york i never saw fellow wors best 
 or afraid fight appel 
 the servant armour lord 

 enter one door horner armour his
 neighbour drink much is
 drunk enter drum and
 staff sand bag fasten the
 door peter man drum sandbag 
 prentic drink him

 first neighbour here neighbour horner i drink cup of
 sack fear neighbour shall well enough 
 second neighbour and neighbour cup charneco 
 third neighbour and pot good doubl beer neighbour 
 drink fear man 
 horner let come faith i pledg fig
 peter 
 first prentic here peter i drink thee afraid 
 second prentic be merri peter fear thi master fight
 credit prentic 
 peter i thank drink pray i pray i
 think i taken last draught world here robin an
 i die i give thee apron will thou shalt my
 hammer tom take money i o lord
 bless i pray god i never abl deal master 
 hath learnt much fenc alreadi 
 salisburi come leav drink fall blow 
 sirrah thi name 
 peter peter forsooth 
 salisburi peter what 
 peter thump 
 salisburi thump then see thou thump thi master well 
 horner master i come hither upon man s
 instig prove knave honest man and

 ill king queen therefor peter have
 thee right blow

 thi master way

scen iv london a street

ent duke humphrey men mourn cloaks

 gloucest thu sometim hath brightest day cloud 
 and summer evermor succeeds
 barren winter wrath nip cold 
 so care joy abound season fleet 
 sir clock 
 serv man ten lord 
 gloucest ten hour appoint me
 to watch come punish duchess 
 uneath may endur flinti streets
 to tread tender feel feet 
 sweet nell ill thi nobl mind abrook
 the abject peopl gaze thi face 
 with enviou look laugh thi shame 
 that erst follow thi proud chariot wheels
 when thou didst ride triumph street 
 but soft i think come i prepare
 my tear stain eye see miseri 

 enter duchess of gloucest white sheet 
 taper burn hand sir john
 stanley sheriff officers

 serv man so pleas grace take sheriff 
 gloucest no stir live let pass 
 duchess come lord see open shame 
 now thou dost penanc look gaze 
 see giddi multitud point
 and nod head throw eye thee 
 ah gloucest hide thee hate look 
 and thi closet pent rue shame
 and ban thine enemi mine thine 
 gloucest be patient gentl nell forget grief 
 duchess ah gloucest teach forget 
 for whilst i think i thi marri wife
 and thou princ protector land 
 methink i thu led along 
 mail shame paper back 
 and follow rabbl rejoice
 to see tear hear deep fet groan 
 the ruthless flint doth cut tender feet 
 and i start enviou peopl laugh
 and bid advis i tread 
 ah humphrey i bear shame yoke 
 trowest thou e er i look upon world
 or count happi enjoy sun 
 no dark shall light night day 
 to think upon pomp shall hell 
 sometim i say i duke humphrey wife 
 and princ ruler land 
 yet rul princ 
 as stood whilst i forlorn duchess 
 wa made wonder point stock
 to everi idl rascal follow 
 but thou mild blush shame 
 nor stir noth till axe death
 hang thee sure shortli 
 for suffolk all
 with hateth thee hate us 
 and york impiou beaufort fals priest 
 have lim bush betray thi wing 
 and fli thou thou canst tangl thee 
 but fear thou thi foot snar 
 nor never seek prevent thi foe 
 gloucest ah nell forbear thou aimest awri 
 i must offend i attaint 
 and i twenti time mani foe 
 and twenti time power 
 all could procur scathe
 so long i loyal true crimeless 
 wouldst rescu thee reproach 
 whi yet thi scandal wip away 
 but i danger breach law 
 thi greatest help quiet gentl nell 
 i pray thee sort thi heart patienc 
 these day wonder quickli worn 

 enter herald

 herald i summon grace majesti parliament 
 holden buri first next month 
 gloucest and consent ne er ask herein 
 thi close deal well i exit herald
 my nell i take leav master sheriff 
 let penanc exceed king commiss 
 sheriff an pleas grace commiss stay 
 and sir john stanley appoint now
 to take isl man 
 gloucest must sir john protect ladi 
 stanley so i given charg may pleas grace 
 gloucest entreat wors i pray
 you use well world may laugh 
 and i may live kind if
 you and sir john farewel 
 duchess what gone lord bid farewel 
 gloucest wit tear i can not stay speak 
 exeunt gloucest servants
 duchess art thou gone all comfort go thee 
 for none abid my joy death 
 death whose name i oft afeard 
 becaus i wish world etern 
 stanley i prithe go take henc 
 i care whither i beg favour 
 onli convey thou art command 
 stanley whi madam isl man 
 there us accord state 
 duchess that bad enough i reproach 
 and shall i us reproach 
 stanley like duchess duke humphrey ladi 
 accord state shall us 
 duchess sheriff farewel better i fare 
 although thou hast conduct shame 
 sheriff it offic madam pardon 
 duchess ay ay farewel thi offic discharg 
 come stanley shall go 
 stanley madam penanc done throw sheet 
 and go attir journey 
 duchess my shame shift sheet 
 no hang upon richest robes
 and show attir i 
 go lead way i long see prison exeunt

act iii scene i the abbey buri st edmunds

sound sennet enter king queen cardin suffolk york 
buckingham salisburi warwick parliament

 king henri i muse lord gloucest come 
 ti wont hindmost man 
 whate er occas keep us 
 queen can see ye observe
 the strang alter counten 
 with majesti bear 
 how insol late becom 
 how proud peremptori unlik 
 we know time sinc mild affabl 
 and glanc far look
 immedi upon knee 
 that court admir submiss 
 but meet morn 
 when everi one give time day 
 he knit brow show angri eye
 and passeth stiff unbow knee 
 disdain duti us belong 
 small cur regard grin 
 but great men trembl lion roar 
 and humphrey littl man england 
 first note near descent 
 and fall next mount 
 me seemeth polici 
 respect rancor mind bear 
 and advantag follow deceas 
 that come royal person
 or admit high council 
 by flatteri hath common heart 
 and pleas make commot 
 ti fear follow 
 now ti spring weed shallow root 
 suffer ergrow garden
 and choke herb want husbandri 
 the rever care i bear unto lord
 made collect danger duke 
 if fond woman fear 
 which fear better reason supplant 
 i subscrib say i wrong duke 
 my lord suffolk buckingham york 
 reprov alleg 
 or els conclud word effectu 
 suffolk well hath high seen duke 
 and i first put speak mind 
 i think i told grace tale 
 the duchess suborn 
 upon life began devilish practic 
 or privi fault 
 yet reput high descent 
 as next king success heir 
 and high vaunt nobil 
 did instig bedlam brainsick duchess
 by wick mean frame sovereign fall 
 smooth run water brook deep 
 and simpl show harbour treason 
 the fox bark would steal lamb 
 no sovereign gloucest man
 unsound yet full deep deceit 
 cardin did contrari form law 
 devis strang death small offenc done 
 york and protectorship 
 levi great sum money realm
 for soldier pay franc never sent 
 by mean whereof town day revolt 
 buckingham tut petti fault fault unknown
 which time bring light smooth duke humphrey 
 king henri my lord care us 
 to mow thorn would annoy foot 
 is worthi prais shall i speak conscienc 
 our kinsman gloucest innocent
 from mean treason royal person
 as suck lamb harmless dove 
 the duke virtuou mild well given
 to dream evil work downfal 
 queen ah danger fond affianc 
 seem dove hi feather borrow 
 for dispos hate raven 
 is lamb hi skin sure lent 
 for inclin raven wolf 
 who can not steal shape mean deceit 
 take heed lord welfar us all
 hang cut short fraud man 

 enter somerset

 somerset all health unto graciou sovereign 
 king henri welcom lord somerset what news franc 
 somerset that interest territories
 is utterli bereft lost 
 king henri cold news lord somerset god done 
 york asid cold news i hope france
 as firmli i hope fertil england 
 thu blossom blast bud 
 and caterpillar eat leav away 
 but i remedi gear ere long 
 or sell titl gloriou grave 

 enter gloucester

 gloucest all happi unto lord king 
 pardon lieg i stay long 
 suffolk nay gloucest know thou art come soon 
 unless thou wert loyal thou art 
 i arrest thee high treason 
 gloucest well suffolk thou shalt see blush
 nor chang counten arrest 
 a heart unspot easili daunt 
 the purest spring free mud
 as i clear treason sovereign 
 who accus wherein i guilti 
 york ti thought lord took bribe france
 and protector stay soldier pay 
 by mean whereof high hath lost franc 
 gloucest is thought what think 
 i never robb soldier pay
 nor ever one penni bribe franc 
 so help god i watch night 
 ay night night studi good england 
 that doit e er i wrest king 
 or groat i hoard use 
 be brought trial day 
 no mani pound mine proper store 
 becaus i would tax needi common 
 have i dispurs garrison 
 and never ask restitut 
 cardin it serv well lord say much 
 gloucest i say truth help god 
 york in protectorship devise
 strang tortur offend never heard 
 that england defam tyranni 
 gloucest whi ti well known while i protector
 piti fault 
 for i melt offend tear 
 and lowli word ransom fault 
 unless bloodi murder 
 or foul feloni thief fleec poor passeng 
 i never gave condign punish 
 murder inde bloodi sin i tortur d
 abov felon trespass els 
 suffolk my lord fault easi quickli answer 
 but mightier crime laid unto charg 
 whereof can not easili purg 
 i arrest hi high name 
 and commit lord cardinal
 to keep time trial 
 king henri my lord gloucest ti special hope
 that clear suspens 
 my conscienc tell innoc 
 gloucest ah graciou lord day danger 
 virtu chok foul ambit 
 and chariti cha henc rancour hand 
 foul suborn predomin 
 and equiti exil high land 
 i know complot life 
 and death might make island happy
 and prove period tyranni 
 i would expend willing 
 but mine made prologu play 
 for thousand yet suspect peril
 will conclud plot tragedi 
 beaufort red sparkl eye blab heart malic 
 and suffolk cloudi brow stormi hate 
 sharp buckingham unburden tongue
 the enviou load lie upon heart 
 and dog york reach moon 
 whose overween arm i pluck back 
 by fals accus doth level life 
 and sovereign ladi rest 
 causeless laid disgrac head 
 and best endeavour stirr up
 my liefest lieg mine enemi 
 ay laid head togeth 
 myself notic conventicl 
 and make away guiltless life 
 i shall want fals wit condemn me
 nor store treason augment guilt 
 the ancient proverb well effect 
 a staff quickli found beat dog 
 cardin my lieg rail intoler 
 if care keep royal person
 from treason secret knife traitor rage
 be thu upbraid chid rate 
 and offend grant scope speech 
 twill make cool zeal unto grace 
 suffolk hath twit sovereign ladi here
 with ignomini word though clerkli couch 
 as suborn swear
 fals alleg erthrow state 
 queen but i give loser leav chide 
 gloucest far truer spoke meant i lose inde 
 beshrew winner play fals 
 and well loser may leav speak 
 buckingham he wrest sens hold us day 
 lord cardin prison 
 cardin sir take away duke guard sure 
 gloucest ah thu king henri throw away crutch
 befor leg firm bear bodi 
 thu shepherd beaten thi side 
 and wolv gnarl shall gnaw thee first 
 ah fear fals ah 
 for good king henri thi decay i fear exit guarded
 king henri my lord wisdom seemeth best
 do undo ourself 
 queen what high leav parliament 
 king henri ay margaret heart drown grief 
 whose flood begin flow within mine eye 
 my bodi round engirt miseri 
 for miser discont 
 ah uncl humphrey thi face i see
 the map honour truth loyalti 
 and yet good humphrey hour come
 that e er i prov thee fals fear thi faith 
 what lour star envi thi estate
 that great lord margaret queen 
 do seek subvers thi harmless life 
 thou never didst wrong man wrong 
 and butcher take away calf 
 and bind wretch beat stray 
 bear bloodi slaughter hous 
 even remorseless born henc 
 and dam run low 
 look way harmless young one went 
 and nought wail darl loss 
 even bewail good gloucest case
 with sad unhelp tear dimm eyes
 look can not good 
 so mighti vow enemi 
 hi fortun i weep twixt groan
 say who traitor gloucest none exit
 queen free lord cold snow melt sun hot beam 
 henri lord cold great affair 
 too full foolish piti gloucest show
 beguil mourn crocodile
 with sorrow snare relent passeng 
 or snake roll flow ring bank 
 with shine checker slough doth sting child
 that beauti think excel 
 believ lord none wise i 
 and yet herein i judg mine wit good 
 thi gloucest quickli rid world
 to rid us fear 
 cardin that die worthi polici 
 but yet want colour death 
 ti meet condemn cours law 
 suffolk but mind polici 
 the king labour still save life 
 the common hapli rise save life 
 and yet trivial argument 
 more mistrust show worthi death 
 york so would die 
 suffolk ah york man aliv fain i 
 york ti york hath reason death 
 but lord cardin lord suffolk 
 say think speak soul 
 were one empti eagl set
 to guard chicken hungri kite
 as place duke humphrey king protector 
 queen so poor chicken sure death 
 suffolk madam ti true mad then
 to make fox surveyor fold 
 who accu crafti murder 
 hi guilt idli post 
 becaus purpos execut 
 no let die fox 
 by natur prov enemi flock 
 befor chap stain crimson blood 
 as humphrey prov reason lieg 
 and stand quillet slay 
 be gin snare subtleti 
 sleep wake ti matter 
 so dead good deceit
 which mate first first intend deceit 
 queen thrice nobl suffolk ti resolut spoke 
 suffolk not resolut except much done 
 for thing often spoke seldom meant 
 but heart accordeth tongu 
 see deed meritori 
 and preserv sovereign foe 
 say word i priest 
 cardin but i would dead lord suffolk 
 ere take due order priest 
 say consent censur well deed 
 and i provid execution 
 i tender safeti lieg 
 suffolk here hand deed worthi 
 queen and say i 
 york and i and three spoke 
 it skill greatli impugn doom 

 enter post

 post great lord ireland i come amain
 to signifi rebel up
 and put englishmen unto sword 
 send succour lord stop rage betim 
 befor wound grow uncur 
 for green great hope help 
 cardin a breach crave quick expedi stop 
 what counsel give weighti caus 
 york that somerset sent regent thither 
 ti meet lucki ruler employ 
 wit fortun hath franc 
 somerset if york far fet polici 
 had regent instead 
 he never would stay franc long 
 york no lose thou hast done 
 i rather would lost life betimes
 than bring burden dishonour home
 by stay long till lost 
 show one scar charact thi skin 
 men flesh preserv whole seldom win 
 queen nay spark prove rage fire 
 if wind fuel brought feed 
 no good york sweet somerset still 
 thi fortun york hadst thou regent 
 might happili prov far wors 
 york what wors nought nay shame take 
 somerset and number thee wishest shame 
 cardin my lord york tri fortun 
 th uncivil kern ireland arms
 and temper clay blood englishmen 
 to ireland lead band men 
 collect choic counti 
 and tri hap irishmen 
 york i lord pleas majesti 
 suffolk whi author consent 
 and establish confirm 
 then nobl york take thou task hand 
 york i content provid soldier lord 
 while i take order mine affair 
 suffolk a charg lord york i see perform 
 but return fals duke humphrey 
 cardin no i deal him
 that henceforth shall troubl us 
 and break day almost spent 
 lord suffolk i must talk event 
 york my lord suffolk within fourteen days
 at bristol i expect soldier 
 for i ship ireland 
 suffolk i see truli done lord york 
 exeunt york
 york now york never steel thi fear thoughts
 and chang misdoubt resolut 
 be thou hop st thou art
 resign death worth th enjoy 
 let pale fac fear keep mean born man
 and find harbour royal heart 
 faster spring time show rs come thought thought 
 and thought think digniti 
 my brain busi labour spider 
 weav tediou snare trap mine enemi 
 well nobl well ti politicli done
 to send pack host men 
 i fear warm starv snake 
 who cherish breast sting heart 
 twa men i lack give 
 i take kindli yet well assur d
 you put sharp weapon madman hand 
 while i ireland nourish mighti band 
 i stir england black storm
 shall blow ten thousand soul heaven hell 
 and fell tempest shall ceas rage
 until golden circuit head 
 like gloriou sun transpar beam 
 do calm furi mad bred flaw 
 and minist intent
 i seduc headstrong kentishman 
 john cade ashford 
 to make commot full well 
 under tide john mortim 
 in ireland i seen stubborn cade
 oppos troop kern 
 and fought long tiff thigh darts
 were almost like sharp quill porpentin 
 and end rescu i seen
 him caper upright like wild morisco 
 shake bloodi dart bell 
 full often like shag hair crafti kern 
 hath convers enemi 
 and undiscov come again
 and given notic villaini 
 thi devil shall substitut 
 for john mortim dead 
 in face gait speech doth resembl 
 by i shall perceiv common mind 
 how affect hous claim york 
 say taken rack tortur 
 i know pain inflict upon him
 will make say i mov arm 
 say thrive ti great like 
 whi ireland come i strength 
 and reap harvest rascal sow 
 for humphrey dead shall 
 and henri put apart next exit

scen ii buri st edmund a room state

ent two three murder run stage murder of
duk humphrey

 first murder run lord suffolk let know
 we dispatch duke command 
 second murder o what done 
 didst ever hear man penit 

 enter suffolk

 first murder here come lord 
 suffolk now sir dispatch thing 
 first murder ay good lord dead 
 suffolk whi well said go get hous 
 i reward ventur deed 
 the king peer hand 
 have laid fair bed is thing well 
 accord i gave direct 
 first murder ti good lord 
 suffolk away gone exeunt murderers

 sound trumpet enter king queen 
 cardin somerset attendants

 king henri go call uncl presenc straight 
 say intend tri grace day 
 if guilti ti publish 
 suffolk i call present nobl lord exit
 king henri lord take place i pray 
 proce straiter gainst uncl gloucester
 than true evid good esteem 
 he approv practic culpabl 
 queen god forbid malic prevail
 that faultless may condemn nobleman 
 pray god may acquit suspicion 
 king henri i thank thee meg word content much 

 re enter suffolk

 how whi look st thou pale whi tremblest thou 
 where uncl what matter suffolk 
 suffolk dead bed lord gloucest dead 
 queen marri god forfend 
 cardin god secret judgment i dream night
 the duke dumb could speak word 
 the king swoon 
 queen how fare lord help lord the king dead 
 somerset rear bodi wring nose 
 queen run go help help o henri ope thine eye 
 suffolk he doth reviv madam patient 
 king o heavenli god 
 queen how fare graciou lord 
 suffolk comfort sovereign graciou henri comfort 
 king henri what doth lord suffolk comfort 
 came right sing raven note 
 whose dismal tune bereft vital pow rs 
 and think chirp wren 
 by cri comfort hollow breast 
 can chase away first conceiv sound 
 hide thi poison sug red word 
 lay thi hand forbear i say 
 their touch affright serpent sting 
 thou bale messeng sight 
 upon thi eye ball murder tyranny
 sit grim majesti fright world 
 look upon thine eye wound 
 yet go away come basilisk 
 and kill innoc gazer thi sight 
 for shade death i shall find joy 
 in life doubl death gloucest dead 
 queen whi rate lord suffolk thu 
 although duke enemi 
 yet christian like lament death 
 and foe 
 might liquid tear heart offend groan 
 or blood consum sigh recal life 
 i would blind weep sick groan 
 look pale primros blood drink sigh 
 and nobl duke aliv 
 what know i world may deem 
 for known hollow friend 
 it may judg i made duke away 
 so shall name slander tongu wound 
 and princ court fill reproach 
 thi get i death ay unhappi 
 to queen crown infami 
 king henri ah woe gloucest wretch man 
 queen be woe wretch 
 what dost thou turn away hide thi face 
 i loathsom leper look 
 what art thou like adder waxen deaf 
 be poison kill thi forlorn queen 
 is thi comfort shut gloucest tomb 
 whi dame margaret ne er thi joy 
 erect statu worship 
 and make imag alehous sign 
 wa i nigh wreck upon sea 
 and twice awkward wind england bank
 drove back unto nativ clime 
 what bode well forewarn wind
 did seem say seek scorpion nest 
 nor set foot unkind shore 
 what i cur gentl gust 
 and loo forth brazen cave 
 and bid blow toward england bless shore 
 or turn stern upon dread rock 
 yet aeolu would murder 
 but left hate offic unto thee 
 the pretti vault sea refu drown 
 know thou wouldst drown shore
 with tear salt sea thi unkind 
 the split rock cow r sink sands
 and would dash rag side 
 becaus thi flinti heart hard 
 might thi palac perish margaret 
 as far i could ken thi chalki cliff 
 when thi shore tempest beat us back 
 i stood upon hatch storm 
 and duski sky began rob
 my earnest gape sight thi land view 
 i took costli jewel neck 
 a heart bound diamond 
 and threw toward thi land the sea receiv 
 and i wish thi bodi might heart 
 and even i lost fair england view 
 and bid mine eye pack heart 
 and call blind duski spectacles
 for lose ken albion wish coast 
 how often i tempt suffolk tongu 
 the agent thi foul inconst 
 to sit witch ascaniu did
 when mad dido would unfold
 hi father act commenc burn troy 
 am i witch like or thou fals like 
 ay i die margaret 
 for henri weep thou dost live long 

 nois within enter warwick salisburi 
 mani commons

 warwick it report mighti sovereign 
 that good duke humphrey traitor murd red
 by suffolk cardin beaufort mean 
 the common like angri hive bees
 that want leader scatter down
 and care sting reveng 
 myself calm spleen mutiny
 until hear order death 
 king henri that dead good warwick ti true 
 but die god know henri 
 enter chamber view breathless corps 
 and comment upon sudden death 
 warwick that shall i lieg stay salisburi 
 with rude multitud till i return exit
 exit salisburi commons
 king henri o thou judgest thing stay thought 
 my thought labour persuad soul
 some violent hand laid humphrey life 
 if suspect fals forgiv god 
 for judgment doth belong thee 
 fain would i go chafe pali lips
 with twenti thousand kiss drain
 upon face ocean salt tears
 to tell love unto dumb deaf trunk 
 and finger feel hand un feel 
 but vain mean obsequi 
 and survey dead earthi imag 
 what make sorrow greater 

 bed put forth bodi enter warwick

 warwick come hither graciou sovereign view bodi 
 king henri that see deep grave made 
 for soul fled worldli solac 
 for see i see life death 
 warwick as sure soul intend live
 with dread king took state upon him
 to free us father wrath curs 
 i believ violent hand laid
 upon life thrice fame duke 
 suffolk a dread oath sworn solemn tongu 
 what instanc give lord warwick vow 
 warwick see blood settl face 
 oft i seen time part ghost 
 of ashi semblanc meagr pale bloodless 
 be descend labour heart 
 who conflict hold death 
 attract aidanc gainst enemi 
 which heart cool ne er returneth
 to blush beautifi cheek 
 but see face black full blood 
 hi eye ball liv 
 stare full ghastli like strangl man 
 hi hair uprear nostril stretch struggl 
 hi hand abroad display one grasp d
 and tugg life strength subdu 
 look sheet hair see stick 
 hi well proport beard made rough rug 
 like summer corn tempest lodg 
 it can not murd red 
 the least sign probabl 
 suffolk whi warwick duke death 
 myself beaufort protect 
 and i hope sir murder 
 warwick but vow duke humphrey foe 
 and forsooth good duke keep 
 ti like would feast like friend 
 and ti well seen found enemi 
 queen then belik suspect noblemen
 as guilti duke humphrey timeless death 
 warwick who find heifer dead bleed fresh 
 and see fast butcher axe 
 but suspect twa made slaughter 
 who find partridg puttock nest
 but may imagin bird dead 
 although kite soar unbloodi beak 
 even suspici tragedi 
 queen are butcher suffolk where knife 
 is beaufort term kite where talon 
 suffolk i wear knife slaughter sleep men 
 but veng sword rust eas 
 that shall scour rancor heart
 that slander murder crimson badg 
 say thou dar st proud lord warwickshir 
 that i faulti duke humphrey death 
 exeunt cardin somerset others
 warwick what dare warwick fals suffolk dare 
 queen he dare calm contumeli spirit 
 nor ceas arrog control 
 though suffolk dare twenti thousand time 
 warwick madam still rever may i say 
 for everi word speak behalf
 is slander royal digniti 
 suffolk blunt wit lord ignobl demeanour 
 if ever ladi wrong lord much 
 thi mother took blame bed
 some stern untutor churl nobl stock
 wa graft crab tree slip whose fruit thou art 
 and never nevil nobl race 
 warwick but guilt murder buckler thee 
 and i rob deathsman fee 
 quit thee therebi ten thousand shame 
 and sovereign presenc make mild 
 i would fals murd rou coward thi knee
 make thee beg pardon thi pass speech
 and say thi mother thou meant st 
 that thou thyself born bastardi 
 and fear homag done 
 give thee thi hire send thi soul hell 
 pernici blood sucker sleep men 
 suffolk thou shalt wake i shed thi blood 
 if presenc thou dar st go 
 warwick away even i drag thee henc 
 unworthi though thou art i cope thee 
 and servic duke humphrey ghost 
 exeunt suffolk warwick
 king henri what stronger breastplat heart untaint 
 thrice arm hath quarrel 
 and nake though lock steel 
 whose conscienc injustic corrupt 
 a nois within 
 queen what nois 

 re enter suffolk warwick weapon drawn

 king whi lord wrath weapon drawn
 here presenc dare bold 
 whi tumultu clamour 
 suffolk the trait rou warwick men buri 
 set upon mighti sovereign 

 re enter salisbury

 salisburi to common within sir stand apart king
 shall know mind 
 dread lord common send word me
 unless lord suffolk straight done death 
 or banish fair england territori 
 they violenc tear palace
 and tortur grievou ling ring death 
 they say good duke humphrey die 
 they say fear high death 
 and mere instinct love loyalti 
 free stubborn opposit intent 
 as thought contradict like 
 make thu forward banish 
 they say care royal person 
 that high intend sleep
 and charg man disturb rest 
 in pain dislik pain death 
 yet notwithstand strait edict 
 were serpent seen fork tongue
 that slili glide toward majesti 
 it necessari wak 
 lest suffer harm slumber 
 the mortal worm might make sleep etern 
 and therefor cri though forbid 
 that guard whe er 
 from fell serpent fals suffolk 
 with whose envenom fatal sting
 your love uncl twenti time worth 
 they say shame bereft life 
 common within an answer king lord salisburi 
 suffolk ti like common rude unpolish hind 
 could send messag sovereign 
 but lord glad employ 
 to show quaint orat 
 but honour salisburi hath won
 is lord ambassador
 sent sort tinker king 
 common within an answer king break 
 king henri go salisburi tell me
 i thank tender love care 
 and i cite 
 yet i purpos entreat 
 for sure thought hourli prophesy
 mischanc unto state suffolk mean 
 and therefor hi majesti i swear 
 whose far unworthi deputi i 
 he shall breath infect air
 but three day longer pain death 
 exit salisbury
 queen o henri let plead gentl suffolk 
 king henri ungentl queen call gentl suffolk 
 no i say thou dost plead 
 thou wilt add increas unto wrath 
 had i said i would kept word 
 but i swear irrevoc 
 if three day space thou st found
 on ground i ruler 
 the world shall ransom thi life 
 come warwick come good warwick go 
 i great matter impart thee 
 exeunt queen suffolk
 queen mischanc sorrow go along 
 heart discont sour affliction
 be playfellow keep compani 
 there two devil make third 
 and threefold vengeanc tend upon step 
 suffolk ceas gentl queen execr 
 and let thi suffolk take heavi leav 
 queen fie coward woman soft heart wretch 
 ha thou spirit curs thine enemi 
 suffolk a plagu upon wherefor i curs 
 would curs kill doth mandrak groan 
 i would invent bitter search term 
 as curst harsh horribl hear 
 deliv strongli fix teeth 
 with full mani sign deadli hate 
 as lean fac envi loathsom cave 
 my tongu stumbl mine earnest word 
 mine eye sparkl like beaten flint 
 mine hair fix end one distract 
 ay everi joint seem curs ban 
 and even burden heart would break 
 should i curs poison drink 
 gall wors gall daintiest tast 
 their sweetest shade grove cypress tree 
 their chiefest prospect murd ring basilisk 
 their softest touch smart lizard sting 
 their music fright serpent hiss 
 and bode screech owl make consort full 
 foul terror dark seat hell 
 queen enough sweet suffolk thou torment st thyself 
 and dread curs like sun gainst glass 
 or like overcharg gun recoil 
 and turn forc upon thyself 
 suffolk you bade ban bid leav 
 now ground i banish 
 well could i curs away winter night 
 though stand nake mountain top
 where bite cold would never let grass grow 
 and think minut spent sport 
 queen o let entreat thee ceas give thi hand 
 that i may dew mourn tear 
 nor let rain heaven wet place
 to wash away woeful monument 
 o could kiss print thi hand 
 that thou might st think upon seal 
 through thousand sigh breath thee 
 so get thee gone i may know grief 
 ti surmi while thou art stand 
 as one surfeit think want 
 i repeal thee well assur 
 adventur banish 
 and banish i thee 
 go speak even gone 
 o go yet even thu two friend condemn d
 embrac kiss take ten thousand leav 
 loather hundr time part die 
 yet farewel farewel life thee 
 suffolk thu poor suffolk ten time banish 
 onc king three time thrice thee 
 ti land i care wert thou thenc 
 a wilder popul enough 
 so suffolk thi heavenli compani 
 for thou art world 
 with everi sever pleasur world 
 and thou art desol 
 i live thou joy thi life 
 myself joy nought thou liv st 

 enter vaux

 queen whither goe vaux fast what news i prithe 
 vaux to signifi unto majesty
 that cardin beaufort point death 
 for suddenli grievou sick took him
 that make gasp stare catch air 
 blasphem god curs men earth 
 sometim talk duke humphrey ghost
 were side sometim call king
 and whisper pillow 
 the secret overcharg soul 
 and i sent tell majesty
 that even cri aloud 
 queen go tell heavi messag king exit vaux
 ay what world what news 
 but wherefor griev i hour poor loss 
 omit suffolk exil soul treasur 
 whi suffolk mourn i thee 
 and southern cloud contend tear 
 their earth increas mine sorrow 
 now get thee henc king thou know st come 
 if thou found thou art dead 
 suffolk if i depart thee i can not live 
 and thi sight die else
 but like pleasant slumber thi lap 
 here could i breath soul air 
 as mild gentl cradl babe
 dy mother dug lip 
 where thi sight i rage mad
 and cri thee close mine eye 
 to thee thi lip stop mouth 
 so shouldst thou either turn fli soul 
 or i breath thi bodi 
 and liv sweet elysium 
 to die thee die jest 
 from thee die tortur death 
 o let stay befal may befal 
 queen away though part fret corros 
 it appli death wound 
 to franc sweet suffolk let hear thee 
 for whereso er thou art world globe
 i iri shall find thee 
 suffolk i go 
 queen and take heart thee she kiss 
 suffolk a jewel lock woeful st cask
 that ever contain thing worth 
 even split bark sunder 
 thi way fall i death 
 queen thi way exeunt severally

scen iii london cardin beaufort s bedchamber

ent king salisburi warwick cardin bed

 king henri how fare lord speak beaufort thi sovereign 
 cardin if thou st death i give thee england treasur 
 enough purchas anoth island 
 so thou wilt let live feel pain 
 king henri ah sign evil life
 where death approach seen terribl 
 warwick beaufort thi sovereign speak thee 
 cardin bring unto trial 
 die bed where die 
 can i make men live whe er 
 o tortur i confess 
 aliv then show 
 i give thousand pound look upon 
 he hath eye dust hath blind 
 comb hair look look stand upright 
 like lime twig set catch wing soul 
 give drink bid apothecary
 bring strong poison i bought 
 king henri o thou etern mover heaven 
 look gentl eye upon wretch 
 o beat away busi meddl fiend
 that lay strong sieg unto wretch soul 
 and bosom purg black despair 
 warwick see pang death make grin
 salisburi disturb let pass peaceabl 
 king henri peac soul god good pleasur 
 lord card nal thou think st heaven bliss 
 hold thi hand make signal thi hope 
 he die make sign o god forgiv 
 warwick so bad death argu monstrou life 
 king henri forbear judg sinner 
 close eye draw curtain close 
 and let us medit exeunt

act iv scene i the coast kent

alarum fight sea ordnanc goe enter lieuten a
shipmast mate walter whitmor sailor suffolk and
oth gentlemen prisoners

 lieuten the gaudi blab remors day
 is crept bosom sea 
 and loud howl wolv arous jades
 that drag tragic melancholi night 
 who drowsi slow flag wings
 clip dead men grave misti jaws
 breath foul contagi dark air 
 therefor bring forth soldier prize 
 for whilst pinnac anchor down 
 here shall make ransom sand 
 or blood stain discolour shore 
 master prison freeli give i thee 
 and thou art mate make boot 
 the walter whitmor thi share 
 first gentleman what ransom master let know 
 master a thousand crown els lay head 
 mate and much shall give goe 
 lieuten what think much pay two thousand crown 
 and bear name port gentlemen 
 cut villain throat die shall 
 the live lost fight
 be counterpoi petti sum 
 first gentleman i give sir therefor spare life 
 second gentleman and i write home straight 
 whitmor i lost mine eye lay prize aboard 
 to suffolk and therefor reveng shalt thou die 
 and i might 
 lieuten be rash take ransom let live 
 suffolk look georg i gentleman 
 rate thou wilt thou shalt paid 
 whitmor and i name walter whitmor 
 how whi start st thou what doth death affright 
 suffolk thi name affright whose sound death 
 a cun man calcul birth
 and told water i die 
 yet let make thee bloodi mind 
 thi name gualtier rightli sound 
 whitmor gualtier walter i care 
 never yet base dishonour blur name
 but sword wip away blot 
 therefor merchant like i sell reveng 
 broke sword arm torn defac 
 and i proclaim coward world 
 suffolk stay whitmor thi prison princ 
 the duke suffolk william de la pole 
 whitmor the duke suffolk muffl rag 
 suffolk ay rag part duke 
 jove sometim went disgui i 
 lieuten but jove never slain thou shalt 
 suffolk obscur lowli swain king henri blood 
 the honour blood lancast 
 must shed jade groom 
 hast thou kiss thi hand held stirrup 
 barehead plod foot cloth mule 
 and thought thee happi i shook head 
 how often hast thou wait cup 
 fed trencher kneel board 
 when i feast queen margaret 
 rememb let make thee crestfal n 
 ay allay thu thi abort pride 
 how void lobbi hast thou stood
 and duli wait come forth 
 thi hand mine hath writ thi behalf 
 and therefor shall charm thi riotou tongu 
 whitmor speak captain shall i stab forlorn swain 
 lieuten first let word stab hath 
 suffolk base slave thi word blunt art thou 
 lieuten convey henc longboat side
 strike head 
 suffolk thou dar st thi 
 lieuten pool 
 suffolk pool 
 lieuten ay kennel puddl sink whose filth dirt
 troubl silver spring england drink 
 now i dam thi yawn mouth
 for swallow treasur realm 
 thi lip kiss queen shall sweep ground 
 and thou smil dst good duke humphrey death
 against senseless wind shalt grin vain 
 who contempt shall hiss thee 
 and wed thou hag hell
 for dare affi mighti lord
 unto daughter worthless king 
 have neither subject wealth diadem 
 by devilish polici art thou grown great 
 and like ambiti sylla overgorg d
 with gobbet thi mother bleed heart 
 by thee anjou main sold franc 
 the fals revolt norman thorough thee
 disdain call us lord picardy
 hath slain governor surpri fort 
 and sent rag soldier wound home 
 the princ warwick nevil 
 whose dread sword never drawn vain 
 as hate thee rise arm 
 and hous york thrust crown
 by shame murder guiltless king
 and lofti proud encroach tyranni 
 burn reveng fire whose hope colours
 advanc half fac sun strive shine 
 under writ inviti nubibu 
 the common kent arm 
 and conclud reproach beggary
 is crept palac king 
 and thee away convey henc 
 suffolk o i god shoot forth thunder
 upon paltri servil abject drudg 
 small thing make base men proud villain 
 be captain pinnac threaten more
 than bargulu strong illyrian pirat 
 drone suck eagl blood rob beehiv 
 it imposs i die
 by lowli vassal thyself 
 thi word move rage remors 
 i go messag queen franc 
 i charg thee waft safe cross channel 
 lieuten walter 
 whitmor come suffolk i must waft thee thi death 
 suffolk gelidu timor occupat artu thee i fear 
 whitmor thou shalt caus fear i leav thee 
 what ye daunt now ye stoop 
 first gentleman my graciou lord entreat speak fair 
 suffolk suffolk imperi tongu stem rough 
 us command untaught plead favour 
 far honour these
 with humbl suit rather let head
 stoop block knee bow any
 save god heaven king 
 and sooner danc upon bloodi pole
 than stand uncov vulgar groom 
 true nobil exempt fear 
 more i bear dare execut 
 lieuten hale away let talk 
 suffolk come soldier show cruelti ye 
 that death may never forgot 
 great men oft die vile bezonian 
 a roman sworder banditto slave
 murder sweet tulli brutu bastard hand
 stabb juliu caesar savag islanders
 pompey great suffolk die pirat 
 exit walter suffolk
 lieuten and whose ransom set 
 it pleasur one depart 
 therefor come us let go 
 exeunt first gentleman

 re enter whitmor suffolk s body

 whitmor there let head lifeless bodi lie 
 until queen mistress buri exit
 first gentleman o barbar bloodi spectacl 
 hi bodi i bear unto king 
 if reveng yet friend 
 so queen live held dear

scen ii blackheath

ent georg bevi john holland

 georg come get thee sword though made lath have
 two day 
 john they need sleep 
 georg i tell thee jack cade clothier mean dress the
 commonwealth turn set new nap upon 
 john so need ti threadbar well i say never
 merri world england sinc gentlemen came 
 georg o miser age virtu regard handicraftsmen 
 john the nobil think scorn go leather apron 
 georg nay king council good workmen 
 john true yet said labour thi vocat is
 much say let magistr labour men and
 therefor magistr 
 georg thou hast hit better sign brave
 mind hard hand 
 john i see i see there best son tanner of
 wingham

 leather 
 john and dick butcher

 cut like calf

 the weaver sawyer infinit numbers

 lace

 cage

 proof

 reform there shall england seven halfpenni loaves

 brother drum soldiers

 hi son i deni

 dukedom main

alarum fight wherein stafford slain 
enter cade rest

 cade where dick butcher ashford 
 dick here sir

 thou shalt licenc kill a
 hundr lack one 
 dick i desir

 humphrey s brigandin thi monument victori i bear

 london mayor sword born us

 let prison

 london exeunt

scen iv london the palace

ent king supplic queen suffolk s head 
the duke of buckingham lord say

 queen oft i heard grief soften mind
 and make fear degener 
 think therefor reveng ceas weep 
 but ceas weep look 
 here may head lie throb breast 
 but bodi i embrac 
 buckingham what answer make grace rebel 
 supplic 
 king henri i send holi bishop entreat 
 for god forbid mani simpl souls
 should perish sword and i 
 rather bloodi war shall cut short 
 will parley jack cade gener 
 but stay i read 
 queen ah barbar villain hath love face
 rul like wander planet 
 and could enforc relent
 that unworthi behold 
 king henri lord say jack cade hath sworn thi head 
 say ay i hope high shall 
 king henri how madam 
 still lament mourn suffolk death 
 i fear love i dead 
 thou wouldst mourn much 
 queen no love i mourn die thee 

 enter a messenger

 king henri how what news whi com st thou hast 
 messeng the rebel southwark fli lord 
 jack cade proclaim lord mortim 
 descend duke clarenc hous 
 and call grace usurp openli 
 and vow crown westminst 
 hi armi rag multitude
 of hind peasant rude merciless 
 sir humphrey stafford brother death
 hath given heart courag proceed 
 all scholar lawyer courtier gentlemen 
 they call fals caterpillar intend death 
 king henri o graceless men know 
 buckingham my graciou lord retir killingworth
 until power rai put 
 queen ah duke suffolk aliv 
 these kentish rebel would soon appea 
 king henri lord say traitor hate thee 
 therefor away us killingworth 
 say so might grace person danger 
 the sight odiou eye 
 and therefor citi i stay
 and live alon secret i may 

 enter anoth messenger

 second messeng jack cade hath gotten london bridg 
 the citizen fli forsak hous 
 the rascal peopl thirst prey 
 join traitor jointli swear
 to spoil citi royal court 
 buckingham then linger lord away take hors 
 king henri come margaret god hope succour us 
 queen my hope gone suffolk decea 
 king henri to lord say farewel lord trust kentish
 rebel 
 buckingham trust nobodi fear betray 
 say the trust i mine innoc 
 and therefor i bold resolut exeunt

scen v london the tower

ent lord scale upon tower walk then enter two three
citizen below

 scale how is jack cade slain 
 first citizen no lord like slain have
 bridg kill withstand 
 the lord mayor crave aid honour the
 tower defend citi rebel 
 scale such aid i spare shall command 
 but i troubl 
 the rebel assay win tower 
 but get smithfield gather head 
 and thither i send matthew goff 
 fight king countri live 
 and farewel i must henc exeunt

scen vi london cannon street

ent jack cade rest strike staff london stone

 cade now mortim lord citi and sit upon
 london stone i charg command citi cost the
 piss conduit run noth claret wine first year our
 reign and henceforward shall treason call me
 lord mortim 

 enter soldier running

 soldier jack cade jack cade 
 cade knock they kill 
 smith if fellow wise never call ye jack cade 
 i think hath fair warn 
 dick my lord armi gather togeth smithfield 
 cade come let go fight but first go set
 london bridg fire burn tower 
 come let away exeunt

scen vii london smithfield

alarum matthew goff slain rest then enter jack
cad company

 cade so sir now go pull savoy other th 
 inn court 
 dick i suit unto lordship 
 cade be lordship thou shalt word 
 dick onli law england may come mouth 
 john asid mass twill sore law thrust in
 mouth spear ti whole yet 
 smith asid nay john stink law breath
 stink eat toast chees 
 cade i thought upon shall away burn the
 record realm my mouth shall parliament of
 england 
 john asid then like bite statut unless his
 teeth pull 
 cade and henceforward thing shall common 

 enter messenger

 messeng my lord prize prize here lord say sold
 town franc made us pay one twenti fifteen and
 one shine pound last subsidi 

 enter georg bevi lord say

 cade well shall behead ten time ah thou say 
 thou serg nay thou buckram lord now art thou within point
 blank jurisdict regal what canst thou answer my
 majesti give normandi unto mounsieur basimecu the
 dauphin franc be known unto thee presenc even
 presenc lord mortim i besom must
 sweep court clean filth thou art thou hast most
 traitor corrupt youth realm erect a
 grammar school wherea forefath other
 book score talli thou hast caus print to
 us contrari king crown digniti thou
 hast built paper mill it prove thi face thou
 hast men thee usual talk noun verb and
 abomin word christian ear endur hear 
 thou hast appoint justic peac call poor men before
 matter abl answer moreov thou
 hast put prison could read thou
 hast hang inde caus have
 worthi live thou dost ride foot cloth dost
 thou 
 say what 
 cade marri thou ought st let thi hors wear cloak when
 honest men thou go hose doublet 
 dick and work shirt exampl am
 butcher 
 say you men kent 
 dick what say kent 
 say noth ti bona terra mala gen 
 cade away away he speak latin 
 say hear speak bear 
 kent commentari caesar writ 
 is term civil st place isl 
 sweet countri full rich 
 the peopl liber valiant activ wealthi 
 which make hope void piti 
 i sold main i lost normandi 
 yet recov would lose life 
 justic favour i alway done 
 pray rs tear mov gift could never 
 when i aught exact hand 
 but maintain king realm 
 larg gift i bestow learn clerk 
 becaus book preferr king 
 and see ignor curs god 
 knowledg wing wherewith fli heaven 
 unless possess devilish spirits
 you can not forbear murder 
 thi tongu hath parley unto foreign kings
 for behoof 
 cade tut struck st thou one blow field 
 say great men reach hand oft i struck
 those i never saw struck dead 
 georg o monstrou coward what come behind folk 
 say these cheek pale watch good 
 cade give box th ear make em red 
 say long sit determin poor men causes
 hath made full sick diseas 
 cade ye shall hempen caudl help hatchet 
 dick whi dost thou quiver man 
 say the palsi fear provok 
 cade nay nod us say i even with
 i see head stand steadier pole 
 take away behead 
 say tell wherein i offend 
 have i affect wealth honour speak 
 are chest fill extort gold 
 is apparel sumptuou behold 
 whom i injur ye seek death 
 these hand free guiltless bloodshed 
 thi breast harbour foul deceit thought 
 o let live 
 cade asid i feel remors word i ll
 bridl he shall die plead well for
 life away he familiar tongu he
 speak god name go take away i say strike
 head present break son law s
 hous sir jame cromer strike head bring them
 upon two pole hither 
 all it shall done 
 say ah countrymen make pray rs 
 god obdur 
 how would fare depart soul 
 and therefor yet relent save life 
 cade away i command ye exeunt with
 lord say the proudest peer realm shall wear head
 shoulder unless pay tribut shall a
 maid marri shall pay maidenhead ere they
 men shall hold capit charg and
 command wive free heart wish tongue
 tell 
 dick my lord shall go cheapsid take up
 commod upon bill 
 cade marri present 
 all o brave 

 re enter one heads

 cade but braver let kiss one anoth they
 lov well aliv now part lest they
 consult give town franc soldier
