 will give sad littl cure 
 brother england may content
 thi widow ladi in right came 
 which god know turn anoth way 
 to vantag 
 king john we heal 
 for creat young arthur duke britain 
 and earl richmond rich fair town
 we make lord call ladi constanc 
 some speedi messeng bid repair
 to solemn i trust shall 
 if fill measur 
 yet measur satisfi so
 that shall stop exclam 
 go well hast suffer us
 to unlook unprepar pomp 
 exeunt bastard
 bastard mad world mad king mad composit 
 john stop arthur tide whole 
 hath willingli depart part 
 and franc whose armour conscienc buckl 
 whom zeal chariti brought field
 as god soldier round ear
 with purpos changer sli devil 
 that broker still break pate faith 
 that daili break vow win 
 of king beggar old men young men maid 
 who extern thing lose
 but word maid cheat poor maid 
 that smooth fac gentleman tickl commod 
 commod bia world 
 the world peis well 
 made run even upon even ground 
 till advantag vile draw bia 
 thi sway motion commod 
 make take head indiffer 
 from direct purpos cours intent 
 and bia commod 
 thi bawd broker chang word 
 clapp outward eye fickl franc 
 hath drawn determin aid 
 from resolv honour war 
 to base vile conclud peac 
 and rail i commod 
 but hath woo yet 
 not i power clutch hand
 when fair angel would salut palm 
 but hand unattempt yet 
 like poor beggar raileth rich 
 well while i beggar i rail
 and say sin rich 
 and rich virtu shall be
 to say vice beggari 
 sinc king break faith upon commod 
 gain lord i worship thee exit

act iii scene 1 

franc the french king s camp

ent constanc arthur salisbury

 constanc gone marri gone swear peac 
 fals blood fals blood join gone friend 
 shall lewi blanch blanch provinc 
 it thou hast misspok misheard 
 be well advi tell er thi tale 
 it can not thou dost say ti 
 i trust i may trust thee thi word
 is vain breath common man 
 believ i believ thee man 
 i king oath contrari 
 thou shalt punish thu fright 
 for i sick capabl fear 
 oppress wrong therefor full fear 
 a widow husbandless subject fear 
 a woman natur born fear 
 and though thou confess thou didst jest 
 with vex spirit i can not take truce 
 but quak trembl day 
 what dost thou mean shake thi head 
 whi dost thou look sadli son 
 what mean hand upon breast thine 
 whi hold thine eye lament rheum 
 like proud river peer er bound 
 be sad sign confirm thi word 
 then speak thi former tale 
 but one word whether thi tale true 
 salisburi as true i believ think false
 that give caus prove say true 
 constanc o thou teach believ sorrow 
 teach thou sorrow make die 
 and let belief life encount so
 as doth furi two desper men
 which meet fall die 
 lewi marri blanch o boy art thou 
 franc friend england becom 
 fellow gone i can not brook thi sight 
 thi news hath made thee ugli man 
 salisburi what harm i good ladi done
 but spoke harm other done 
 constanc which harm within heinou is
 as make harm speak 
 arthur i beseech madam content 
 constanc if thou bid st content wert grim 
 ugli sland rou thi mother womb 
 full unpleas blot sightless stain 
 lame foolish crook swart prodigi 
 patch foul mole eye offend mark 
 i would care i would content 
 for i love thee thou
 becom thi great birth deserv crown 
 but thou art fair thi birth dear boy 
 natur fortun join make thee great 
 of natur gift thou mayst lili boast 
 and half blown rose fortun o 
 she corrupt chang thee 
 sh adulter hourli thine uncl john 
 and golden hand hath pluck france
 to tread fair respect sovereignti 
 and made majesti bawd 
 franc bawd fortun king john 
 that strumpet fortun usurp john 
 tell thou fellow franc forsworn 
 envenom word get thee gone
 and leav woe alon i alone
 am bound bear 
 salisburi pardon madam 
 i may go without king 
 constanc thou mayst thou shalt i go thee 
 i instruct sorrow proud 
 for grief proud make owner stoop 
 to state great grief 
 let king assembl grief great
 that support huge firm earth
 can hold seat ground 
 here i sorrow sit 
 here throne bid king come bow 

 enter king john king philip lewi blanch 
 elinor bastard austria attendants

 king philip ti true fair daughter bless day
 ever franc shall kept festiv 
 to solemn day gloriou sun
 stay cours play alchemist 
 turn splendour preciou eye
 the meagr cloddi earth glitter gold 
 the yearli cours bring day about
 shall never see holiday 
 constanc rise a wick day holi day 
 what hath day deserv hath done
 that golden letter set
 among high tide calendar 
 nay rather turn day week 
 thi day shame oppress perjuri 
 or must stand still let wive child
 pray burden may fall day 
 lest hope prodigi cross 
 but day let seamen fear wreck 
 no bargain break day made 
 thi day thing begun come ill end 
 yea faith hollow falsehood chang 
 king philip by heaven ladi shall cause
 to curs fair proceed day 
 have i pawn majesti 
 constanc you beguil counterfeit
 resembl majesti touch tri 
 prove valueless forsworn forsworn 
 you came arm spill mine enemi blood 
 but arm strengthen 
 the grappl vigour rough frown war
 is cold amiti paint peac 
 and oppress hath made leagu 
 arm arm heaven perjur king 
 a widow cri be husband heaven 
 let hour ungodli day
 wear day peac ere sunset 
 set arm discord twixt perjur king 
 hear o hear 
 austria ladi constanc peac 
 constanc war war peac peac war 
 o lymog o austria thou dost shame
 that bloodi spoil thou slave thou wretch thou coward 
 thou littl valiant great villaini 
 thou ever strong upon stronger side 
 thou fortun champion dost never fight
 but humor ladyship by
 to teach thee safeti thou art perjur 
 and sooth st great what fool art thou 
 a ramp fool brag stamp swear
 upon parti thou cold blood slave 
 hast thou spoke like thunder side 
 been sworn soldier bid depend
 upon thi star thi fortun thi strength 
 and dost thou fall foe 
 thou wear lion hide doff shame 
 and hang calf skin recreant limb 
 austria o man speak word 
 bastard and hang calf skin recreant limb 
 austria thou dar st say villain thi life 
 bastard and hang calf skin recreant limb 
 king john we like thou dost forget thyself 

 enter pandulph

 king philip here come holi legat pope 
 pandulph hail anoint deputi heaven 
 to thee king john holi errand 
 i pandulph fair milan cardin 
 and pope innoc legat 
 do name religi demand
 whi thou church holi mother 
 so wil dost spurn forc perforce
 keep stephen langton chosen archbishop
 of canterburi holi see 
 thi foresaid holi father name 
 pope innoc i demand thee 
 king john what earthli name interrogatories
 can task free breath sacr king 
 thou canst cardin devis name
 so slight unworthi ridicul 
 to charg answer pope 
 tell tale mouth england
 add thu much italian priest
 shall tith toll dominion 
 but heaven suprem head 
 so him great supremaci 
 where reign alon uphold 
 without th assist mortal hand 
 so tell pope rever set apart
 to usurp author 
 king philip brother england blasphem 
 king john though king christendom
 are led grossli meddl priest 
 dread curs money may buy 
 and merit vile gold dross dust 
 purchas corrupt pardon man 
 who sale sell pardon 
 though rest grossli led 
 thi juggl witchcraft revenu cherish 
 yet i alon alon oppose
 against pope count friend foe 
 pandulph then law power i have
 thou shalt stand cur excommun 
 and bless shall doth revolt
 from allegi heret 
 and meritori shall hand call 
 canon worshipp saint 
 that take away secret course
 thi hate life 
 constanc o law let be
 that i room rome curs awhil 
 good father cardin cri thou amen 
 to keen curs without wrong
 there tongu hath power curs right 
 pandulph there law warrant ladi curs 
 constanc and mine law right 
 let law law bar wrong 
 law can not give child kingdom 
 for hold kingdom hold law 
 therefor sinc law perfect wrong 
 how law forbid tongu curs 
 pandulph philip franc peril curs 
 let go hand arch heret 
 and rais power franc upon head 
 unless submit rome 
 elinor look st thou pale franc do let go thi hand 
 constanc look devil lest franc repent
 and disjoin hand hell lose soul 
 austria king philip listen cardin 
 bastard and hang calf skin recreant limb 
 austria well ruffian i must pocket wrong 
 becaus 
 bastard your breech best may carri 
 king john philip say st thou cardin 
 constanc what say cardin 
 lewi bethink father difference
 is purchas heavi curs rome
 or light loss england friend 
 forgo easier 
 blanch that curs rome 
 constanc o lewi stand fast the devil tempt thee here
 in like new untrim bride 
 blanch the ladi constanc speak faith 
 but need 
 constanc o thou grant need 
 which live death faith 
 that need must need infer principl 
 that faith would live death need 
 o tread need faith mount 
 keep need faith trodden 
 king john the king mov answer 
 constanc o remov answer well 
 austria do king philip hang doubt 
 bastard hang noth calf skin sweet lout 
 king philip i perplex know say 
 pandulph what canst thou say perplex thee 
 if thou stand excommun cur 
 king philip good reverend father make person 
 and tell would bestow 
 thi royal hand mine newli knit 
 and conjunct inward souls
 marri leagu coupl link together
 with religi strength sacr vow 
 the latest breath gave sound words
 wa deep sworn faith peac amiti true love 
 between kingdom royal selv 
 and even truce new 
 no longer well could wash hand 
 to clap royal bargain peac 
 heaven know besmear overstain d
 with slaughter pencil reveng paint
 the fear differ incens king 
 and shall hand late purg blood 
 so newli join love strong 
 unyok seizur kind regreet 
 play fast loos faith jest heaven 
 make unconst children 
 as snatch palm palm 
 unswear faith sworn marriag bed
 of smile peac march bloodi host 
 and make riot gentl brow
 of true sincer o holi sir 
 my reverend father let 
 out grace devis ordain impos 
 some gentl order shall blest
 to pleasur continu friend 
 pandulph all form formless order orderless 
 save opposit england love 
 therefor arm champion church 
 or let church mother breath curs 
 a mother curs revolt son 
 franc thou mayst hold serpent tongu 
 a chafe lion mortal paw 
 a fast tiger safer tooth 
 than keep peac hand thou dost hold 
 king philip i may disjoin hand faith 
 pandulph so mak st thou faith enemi faith 
 and like civil war set st oath oath 
 thi tongu thi tongu o let thi vow
 first made heaven first heaven perform 
 that champion church 
 what sinc thou swor st sworn thyself
 and may perform thyself 
 for thou hast sworn amiss
 is amiss truli done 
 and done tend ill 
 the truth done 
 the better act purpos mistook
 is mistak though indirect 
 yet indirect therebi grow direct 
 and falsehood cure fire cool fire
 within scorch vein one new burn 
 it religion doth make vow kept 
 but thou hast sworn religion
 by thou swear st thing thou swear st 
 and mak st oath sureti thi truth
 against oath truth thou art unsure
 to swear swear forsworn 
 els mockeri swear 
 but thou dost swear forsworn 
 and forsworn keep thou dost swear 
 therefor thi later vow thi first
 is thyself rebellion thyself 
 and better conquest never canst thou make
 than arm thi constant thi nobler parts
 against giddi loos suggest 
 upon better part pray rs come 
 if thou vouchsaf but know
 the peril curs fight thee
 so heavi thou shalt shake 
 but despair die black weight 
 austria rebellion flat rebellion 
 bastard will 
 will calf skin stop mouth thine 
 lewi father arm 
 blanch upon thi wed day 
 against blood thou hast marri 
 what shall feast kept slaughter men 
 shall bray trumpet loud churlish drum 
 clamour hell measur pomp 
 o husband hear ay alack new
 is husband mouth even name 
 which till time tongu ne er pronounc 
 upon knee i beg go arms
 against mine uncl 
 constanc o upon knee 
 made hard kneel i pray thee 
 thou virtuou dauphin alter doom
 forethought heaven 
 blanch now shall i see thi love what motiv may
 be stronger thee name wife 
 constanc that upholdeth thee uphold 
 hi honour o thine honour lewi thine honour 
 lewi i muse majesti doth seem cold 
 when profound respect pull 
 pandulph i denounc curs upon head 
 king philip thou shalt need england i fall thee 
 constanc o fair return banish majesti 
 elinor o foul revolt french inconst 
 king john franc thou shalt rue hour within hour 
 bastard old time clock setter bald sexton time 
 is well franc shall rue 
 blanch the sun ercast blood fair day adieu 
 which side i must go withal 
 i armi hath hand 
 and rage i hold 
 they whirl asund dismemb 
 husband i can not pray thou mayst win 
 uncl i need must pray thou mayst lose 
 father i may wish fortun thine 
 grandam i wish thi wish thrive 
 whoever win side shall i lose 
 assur loss match play 
 lewi ladi thi fortun lie 
 blanch there fortun live life die 
 king john cousin go draw puissanc togeth 
 exit bastard
 franc i burn inflam wrath 
 a rage whose heat hath condition
 that noth allay noth blood 
 the blood dearest valu blood franc 
 king philip thi rage shall burn thee thou shalt turn
 to ash ere blood shall quench fire 
 look thyself thou art jeopardi 
 king john no threat to arm let hie 
 exeunt severally

scen 2 

franc plain near angiers

alarum excurs enter bastard austria s head

 bastard now life day grow wondrou hot 
 some airi devil hover sky
 and pour mischief austria head lie 
 while philip breath 

 enter king john arthur hubert

 king john hubert keep boy philip make 
 my mother assail tent 
 and ta en i fear 
 bastard my lord i rescu 
 her high safeti fear 
 but lieg littl pains
 will bring labour happi end exeunt

scen 3 

franc plain near angiers

alarum excurs retreat enter king john elinor arthur the
bastard hubert lords

 king john to elinor so shall grace shall stay
 behind 
 so strongli guard to arthur cousin look sad 
 thi grandam love thee thi uncl will
 as dear thee thi father 
 arthur o make mother die grief 
 king john to bastard cousin away england haste
 
 and ere come see thou shake bags
 of hoard abbot imprison angels
 set liberti fat rib peace
 must hungri fed upon 
 use commiss utmost forc 
 bastard bell book candl shall drive back 
 when gold silver beck come 
 i leav high grandam i pray 
 if ever i rememb holi 
 for fair safeti so i kiss hand 
 elinor farewel gentl cousin 
 king john coz farewel 
 exit bastard
 elinor come hither littl kinsman hark word 
 king john come hither hubert o gentl hubert 
 we owe thee much within wall flesh
 there soul count thee creditor 
 and advantag mean pay thi love 
 and good friend thi voluntari oath
 live bosom dearli cherish 
 give thi hand i thing say 
 but i fit better time 
 by heaven hubert i almost asham d
 to say good respect i thee 
 hubert i much bounden majesti 
 king john good friend thou hast caus say yet 
 but thou shalt creep time ne er slow 
 yet shall come thee good 
 i thing say let go 
 the sun heaven proud day 
 attend pleasur world 
 is wanton full gawds
 to give audienc if midnight bell
 did iron tongu brazen mouth
 sound drowsi race night 
 if churchyard stand 
 and thou possess thousand wrong 
 or surli spirit melancholi 
 had bak thi blood made heavi thick 
 which els run tickl vein 
 make idiot laughter keep men eyes
 and strain cheek idl merriment 
 a passion hate purpos 
 or thou couldst see without eye 
 hear without thine car make reply
 without tongu use conceit alon 
 without eye ear harm sound word 
 then despit brood watch day 
 i would thi bosom pour thought 
 but ah i yet i love thee well 
 and troth i think thou lov st well 
 hubert so well bid undertak 
 though death adjunct act 
 by heaven i would 
 king john do i know thou wouldst 
 good hubert hubert hubert throw thine eye
 on yon young boy i tell thee friend 
 he serpent way 
 and whereso er foot mine doth tread 
 he lie dost thou understand 
 thou art keeper 
 hubert and i keep so
 that shall offend majesti 
 king john death 
 hubert my lord 
 king john a grave 
 hubert he shall live 
 king john enough 
 i could merri hubert i love thee 
 well i say i intend thee 
 rememb madam fare well 
 i send power er majesti 
 elinor my bless go thee 
 king john to arthur for england cousin go 
 hubert shall man attend you
 with true duti on toward calai ho exeunt

scen 4 

franc the french king camp

ent king philip lewi pandulph attendants

 king philip so roar tempest flood
 a whole armado convict sail
 is scatter disjoin fellowship 
 pandulph courag comfort all shall yet go well 
 king philip what go well run ill 
 are beaten is angier lost 
 arthur ta en prison diver dear friend slain 
 and bloodi england england gone 
 o erbear interrupt spite franc 
 lewi hath hath fortifi 
 so hot speed advic dispo 
 such temper order fierc caus 
 doth want exampl hath read heard
 of kindr action like 
 king philip well could i bear england prais 
 so could find pattern shame 

 enter constance

 look come grave unto soul 
 hold th etern spirit 
 in vile prison afflict breath 
 i prithe ladi go away 
 constanc lo see issu peac 
 king philip patienc good ladi comfort gentl constanc 
 constanc no i defi counsel redress 
 but end counsel true redress 
 death death o amiabl love death 
 thou odorifer stench sound rotten 
 aris forth couch last night 
 thou hate terror prosper 
 and i kiss thi detest bone 
 and put eyebal thi vaulti brow 
 and ring finger thi household worm 
 and stop gap breath fulsom dust 
 and carrion monster like thyself 
 come grin i think thou smil st 
 and buss thee thi wife miseri love 
 o come 
 king philip o fair afflict peac 
 constanc no i breath cri 
 o tongu thunder mouth 
 then passion would i shake world 
 and rous sleep fell anatomy
 which can not hear ladi feebl voic 
 which scorn modern invoc 
 pandulph ladi utter mad sorrow 
 constanc thou art holi beli 
 i mad hair i tear mine 
 my name constanc i geffrey wife 
 young arthur son lost 
 i mad i would heaven i 
 for ti like i forget 
 o i could grief i forget 
 preach philosophi make mad 
 and thou shalt canoniz cardin 
 for mad sensibl grief 
 my reason part produc reason
 how i may deliv woe 
 and teach kill hang 
 if i mad i forget son 
 or madli think babe clout 
 i mad well well i feel
 the differ plagu calam 
 king philip bind tress o love i note
 in fair multitud hair 
 where chanc silver drop hath fall n 
 even drop ten thousand wiri friends
 do glue sociabl grief 
 like true insepar faith love 
 stick togeth calam 
 constanc to england 
 king philip bind hair 
 constanc ye i wherefor i 
 i tore bond cri aloud
 o hand could redeem son 
 as given hair liberti 
 but i envi liberti 
 and commit bond 
 becaus poor child prison 
 and father cardin i heard say
 that shall see know friend heaven 
 if true i shall see boy 
 for sinc birth cain first male child 
 to yesterday suspir 
 there graciou creatur born 
 but canker sorrow eat bud
 and chase nativ beauti cheek 
 and look hollow ghost 
 as dim meagr agu fit 
 and die rise 
 when i shall meet court heaven
 i shall know therefor never never
 must i behold pretti arthur 
 pandulph you hold heinou respect grief 
 constanc he talk never son 
 king philip you fond grief child 
 constanc grief fill room absent child 
 lie bed walk 
 put pretti look repeat word 
 rememb graciou part 
 stuff vacant garment form 
 then i reason fond grief 
 fare well loss i 
 i could give better comfort 
 i keep form upon head 
 tear hair 
 when disord wit 
 o lord boy arthur fair son 
 my life joy food ail world 
 my widow comfort sorrow cure exit
 king philip i fear outrag i follow exit
 lewi there noth world make joy 
 life tediou twice told tale
 vex dull ear drowsi man 
 and bitter shame hath spoil sweet world tast 
 that yield nought shame bitter 
 pandulph befor cure strong diseas 
 even instant repair health 
 the fit strongest evil take leave
 on departur show evil 
 what lost lose day 
 lewi all day glori joy happi 
 pandulph if certainli 
 no fortun mean men good 
 she look upon threat ning eye 
 ti strang think much king john hath lost
 in account clearli 
 are griev arthur prison 
 lewi as heartili glad hath 
 pandulph your mind youth blood 
 now hear speak prophet spirit 
 for even breath i mean speak
 shall blow dust straw littl rub 
 out path shall directli lead
 thi foot england throne and therefor mark 
 john hath seiz arthur can not be
 that while warm life play infant vein 
 the misplac john entertain hour 
 one minut nay one quiet breath rest 
 a sceptr snatch unruli hand
 must boister maintain gain 
 and stand upon slipp ry place
 make nice vile hold stay 
 that john may stand arthur need must fall 
 so can not 
 lewi but shall i gain young arthur fall 
 pandulph you right ladi blanch wife 
 may make claim arthur 
 lewi and lose life arthur 
 pandulph how green fresh old world 
 john lay plot time conspir 
 for steep safeti true blood
 shall find bloodi safeti untru 
 thi act evilli born shall cool hearts
 of peopl freez zeal 
 that none small advantag shall step forth
 to check reign cherish 
 no natur exhal sky 
 no scope natur distemp day 
 no common wind custom event 
 but pluck away natur cause
 and call meteor prodigi sign 
 abort presag tongu heaven 
 plainli denounc vengeanc upon john 
 lewi may touch young arthur life 
 but hold safe prison 
 pandulph o sir shall hear approach 
 if young arthur gone alreadi 
 even news die hearts
 of peopl shall revolt 
 and kiss lip unacquaint chang 
 and pick strong matter revolt wrath
 out bloodi finger end john 
 methink i see hurli foot 
 and o better matter breed you
 than i nam the bastard faulconbridge
 is england ransack church 
 offend chariti dozen french
 were arm would can
 to train ten thousand english side 
 or littl snow tumbl 
 anon becom mountain o nobl dauphin 
 go king ti wonderful
 what may wrought discont 
 now soul top offenc 
 for england go i whet king 
 lewi strong reason make strong action let us go 
 if say ay king say exeunt

act iv scene 1 

england a castle

ent hubert executioners

 hubert heat iron hot look thou stand
 within arra when i strike foot
 upon bosom ground rush forth
 and bind boy shall find me
 fast chair be heed henc watch 
 execution i hope warrant bear deed 
 hubert uncleanli scrupl fear look 
 exeunt executioners
 young lad come forth i say 

 enter arthur

 arthur good morrow hubert 
 hubert good morrow littl princ 
 arthur as littl princ great tide
 to princ may you sad 
 hubert inde i merrier 
 arthur merci 
 methink bodi sad i 
 yet i rememb i franc 
 young gentlemen would sad night 
 onli wanton by christendom 
 so i prison kept sheep 
 i merri day long 
 and i would i doubt
 my uncl practis harm 
 he afraid i 
 is fault i geffrey son 
 no inde ist i would heaven
 i son would love hubert 
 hubert asid if i talk innoc prate
 he awak merci lie dead 
 therefor i sudden dispatch 
 arthur are sick hubert you look pale day 
 in sooth i would littl sick 
 that i might sit night watch 
 i warrant i love 
 hubert asid hi word take possess bosom 
 read young arthur show paper 
 asid how foolish rheum 
 turn dispit tortur door 
 i must brief lest resolut drop
 out mine eye tender womanish tear 
 can read is fair writ 
 arthur too fairli hubert foul effect 
 must hot iron burn mine eye 
 hubert young boy i must 
 arthur and 
 hubert and i 
 arthur have heart when head ach 
 i knit handkerchief brow 
 the best i princess wrought 
 and i never ask 
 and hand midnight held head 
 and like watch minut hour 
 still anon cheer heavi time 
 say what lack where lie grief 
 or what good love may i perform 
 mani poor man son would lyen still 
 and ne er spoke love word 
 but sick servic princ 
 nay may think love crafti love 
 and call cun do 
 if heaven plea must use ill 
 whi must will put mine eye 
 these eye never never shall
 so much frown 
 hubert i sworn 
 and hot iron must i burn 
 arthur ah none iron age would 
 the iron though heat red hot 
 approach near eye would drink tear 
 and quench fieri indignation
 even matter mine innoc 
 nay consum away rust
 but contain fire harm mine eye 
 are stubborn hard hammer iron 
 an angel come me
 and told hubert put mine eye 
 i would believ tongu hubert 
 hubert stamp come forth 

 re enter execution with cord iron etc 

 do i bid 
 arthur o save hubert save my eye out
 even fierc look bloodi men 
 hubert give iron i say bind 
 arthur ala need boist rou rough 
 i struggl i stand stone still 
 for heaven sake hubert let bound 
 nay hear hubert drive men away 
 and i sit quiet lamb 
 i stir winc speak word 
 nor look upon iron angrili 
 thrust men away i forgiv 
 whatev torment put 
 hubert go stand within let alon 
 execution i best plea deed 
 exeunt executioners
 arthur ala i chid away friend 
 he hath stern look gentl heart 
 let come back compass may
 give life 
 hubert come boy prepar 
 arthur is remedi 
 hubert none lose eye 
 arthur o heaven mote 
 a grain dust gnat wander hair 
 ani annoy preciou sens 
 then feel small thing boister 
 your vile intent must need seem horribl 
 hubert is promis go hold tongu 
 arthur hubert utter brace tongues
 must need want plead pair eye 
 let hold tongu let hubert 
 or hubert cut tongu 
 so i may keep mine eye o spare mine eye 
 though use still look 
 lo troth instrument cold
 and would harm 
 hubert i heat boy 
 arthur no good sooth fire dead grief 
 be creat comfort us d
 in undeserv extrem see els 
 there malic burn coal 
 the breath heaven hath blown spirit 
 and strew repent ash head 
 hubert but breath i reviv boy 
 arthur an make blush
 and glow shame proceed hubert 
 nay perchanc sparkl eye 
 and like dog compel fight 
 snatch master doth tarr 
 all thing use wrong
 deni offic lack
 that merci fierc fire iron extend 
 creatur note merci lack use 
 hubert well see live i touch thine eye
 for treasur thine uncl owe 
 yet i sworn i purpos boy 
 with iron burn 
 arthur o look like hubert all while
 you disgui 
 hubert peac adieu 
 your uncl must know dead 
 i fill dog spi fals report 
 and pretti child sleep doubtless secure
 that hubert wealth world 
 will offend thee 
 arthur o heaven i thank hubert 
 hubert silenc go close 
 much danger i undergo thee exeunt

scen 2 

england king john s palace

ent king john pembrok salisburi lords

 king john here sit crown 
 and look upon i hope cheer eye 
 pembrok thi high plea 
 wa superflu crown 
 and high royalti ne er pluck 
 the faith men ne er stain revolt 
 fresh expect troubl land
 with long chang better state 
 salisburi therefor possess doubl pomp 
 to guard titl rich 
 to gild refin gold paint lili 
 to throw perfum violet 
 to smooth ice add anoth hue
 unto rainbow taper light
 to seek beauteou eye heaven garnish 
 is wast ridicul excess 
 pembrok but royal pleasur must done 
 thi act ancient tale new told
 and last repeat troublesom 
 be urg time unseason 
 salisburi in antiqu well note face
 of plain old form much disfigur 
 and like shift wind unto sail
 it make cours thought fetch 
 startl fright consider 
 make sound opinion sick truth suspect 
 for put new fashion robe 
 pembrok when workmen strive better well 
 they confound skill covet 
 and oftentim excus fault
 doth make fault wors th excus 
 as patch set upon littl breach
 discredit hide fault
 than fault patch 
 salisburi to effect new crown 
 we breath counsel plea highness
 to overbear well plea 
 sinc everi part would
 doth make stand high 
 king john some reason doubl coronation
 i possess think strong 
 and strong lesser fear 
 i shall indu meantim ask
 what would reform well 
 and well shall perceiv willingly
 i hear grant request 
 pembrok then i one tongu 
 to sound purpos heart 
 both chief 
 your safeti them
 bend best studi heartili request
 th enfranchis arthur whose restraint
 doth move murmur lip discontent
 to break danger argument 
 if rest right hold 
 whi fear say attend
 the step wrong move mew up
 your tender kinsman choke days
 with barbar ignor deni youth
 the rich advantag good exercis 
 that time enemi may this
 to grace occas let suit
 that bid us ask liberti 
 which good ask
 than whereupon weal depend 
 count weal liberti 
 king john let i commit youth
 to direct 

 enter hubert

 asid hubert news 
 pembrok thi man bloodi deed 
 he show warrant friend mine 
 the imag wick heinou fault
 live eye close aspect his
 doth show mood much troubl breast 
 and i fear believ ti done
 what fear charg 
 salisburi the colour king doth come go
 between purpos conscienc 
 like herald twixt two dread battl set 
 hi passion ripe need must break 
 pembrok and break i fear issu thence
 the foul corrupt sweet child death 
 king john we can not hold mortal strong hand 
 good lord although give live 
 the suit demand gone dead 
 he tell us arthur decea night 
 salisburi inde fear sick past cure 
 pembrok inde heard near death 
 befor child felt sick 
 thi must answer either henc 
 king john whi bend solemn brow 
 think i bear shear destini 
 have i command puls life 
 salisburi it appar foul play ti shame
 that great grossli offer 
 so thrive game farewel 
 pembrok stay yet lord salisburi i go thee
 and find th inherit poor child 
 hi littl kingdom forc grave 
 that blood ow breadth isle
 three foot doth hold bad world 
 thi must thu born break out
 to sorrow ere long i doubt exeunt lords
 king john they burn indign i repent 
 there sure foundat set blood 
 no certain life achiev other death 

 enter messenger

 a fear eye thou hast blood
 that i seen inhabit cheek 
 so foul sky clear without storm 
 pour thi weather goe franc 
 messeng from franc england never pow r
 for foreign preparation
 wa levi bodi land 
 the copi speed learn 
 for told prepar 
 the tide come arriv 
 king john o hath intellig drunk 
 where hath slept where mother care 
 that armi could drawn franc 
 and hear 
 messeng my lieg ear
 is stopp dust first april died
 your nobl mother i hear lord 
 the ladi constanc frenzi died
 three day rumour tongue
 i idli heard true fals i know 
 king john withhold thi speed dread occas 
 o make leagu till i plea d
 my discont peer what mother dead 
 how wildli walk estat franc 
 under whose conduct came pow rs france
 that thou truth giv st land 
 messeng under dauphin 
 king john thou hast made giddy
 with tide 

 enter bastard peter of pomfret

 now what say world
 to proceed do seek stuff
 my head ill news full 
 bastard but afear hear worst 
 then let worst unheard fall head 
 king john bear cousin i amaz d
 under tide i breath again
 aloft flood give audience
 to tongu speak 
 bastard how i sped among clergymen
 the sum i collect shall express 
 but i travel hither land 
 i find peopl strang fantasi 
 possess rumour full idl dream 
 not know fear full fear 
 and prophet i brought me
 from forth street pomfret i found
 with mani hundr tread heel 
 to sung rude harsh sound rhyme 
 that ere next ascens day noon 
 your high deliv crown 
 king john thou idl dreamer wherefor didst thou 
 peter foreknow truth fall 
 king john hubert away imprison 
 and day noon whereon says
 i shall yield crown let hang 
 deliv safeti return 
 for i must use thee 
 exit hubert peter
 o gentl cousin 
 hear st thou news abroad arriv 
 bastard the french lord men mouth full 
 besid i met lord bigot lord salisburi 
 with eye red new enkindl fire 
 and other go seek grave
 of arthur say kill night
 on suggest 
 king john gentl kinsman go
 and thrust thyself compani 
 i way love 
 bring 
 bastard i will seek 
 king john nay make hast better foot 
 o let subject enemies
 when advers foreign affright towns
 with dread pomp stout invas 
 be mercuri set feather thi heel 
 and fli like thought 
 bastard the spirit time shall teach speed 
 king john spoke like spright nobl gentleman 
 exit bastard
 go perhap shall need
 some messeng betwixt peer 
 and thou 
 messeng with heart lieg exit
 king john my mother dead 

 re enter hubert

 hubert my lord say five moon seen night 
 four fix fifth whirl about
 the four wondrou motion 
 king john five moon 
 hubert old men beldam streets
 do prophesi upon danger 
 young arthur death common mouth 
 and talk shake head 
 and whisper one anoth ear 
 and speak doth gripe hearer wrist 
 whilst hear make fear action
 with wrinkl brow nod roll eye 
 i saw smith stand hammer thu 
 the whilst iron anvil cool 
 with open mouth swallow tailor news 
 who shear measur hand 
 stand slipper nimbl haste
 had fals thrust upon contrari feet 
 told mani thousand warlik french
 that embattail rank kent 
 anoth lean unwash artificer
 cut tale talk arthur death 
 king john whi seek st thou possess fear 
 whi urgest thou oft young arthur death 
 thi hand hath murd red i mighti cause
 to wish dead thou hadst none kill 
 hubert no lord whi provok 
 king john it curs king attended
 by slave take humour warrant
 to break within bloodi hous life 
 and wink authority
 to understand law know meaning
 of danger majesti perchanc frowns
 more upon humour advi respect 
 hubert here hand seal i 
 king john o last account twixt heaven earth
 is made shall hand seal
 wit us damnat 
 how oft sight mean ill deeds
 make deed ill done hadst thou 
 a fellow hand natur mark 
 quot sign deed shame 
 thi murder come mind 
 but take note thi abhorr aspect 
 find thee fit bloodi villaini 
 apt liabl employ danger 
 i faintli broke thee arthur death 
 and thou endear king 
 made conscienc destroy princ 
 hubert my lord 
 king john hadst thou shook thi head made paus 
 when i spake darkli i purpos 
 or turn eye doubt upon face 
 as bid tell tale express word 
 deep shame struck dumb made break 
 and thi fear might wrought fear 
 but thou didst understand sign 
 and didst sign parley sin 
 yea without stop didst let thi heart consent 
 and consequ thi rude hand act
 the deed tongu held vile name 
 out sight never see 
 my nobl leav state brave 
 even gate rank foreign pow rs 
 nay bodi fleshli land 
 thi kingdom confin blood breath 
 hostil civil tumult reigns
 between conscienc cousin death 
 hubert arm enemi 
 i make peac soul 
 young arthur aliv thi hand mine
 is yet maiden innoc hand 
 not paint crimson spot blood 
 within bosom never ent red yet
 the dread motion murder thought
 and slander natur form 
 which howsoev rude exteriorli 
 is yet cover fairer mind
 than butcher innoc child 
 king john doth arthur live o hast thee peer 
 throw report incens rage
 and make tame obedi 
 forgiv comment passion made
 upon thi featur rage blind 
 and foul imaginari eye blood
 present thee hideou thou art 
 o answer closet bring
 the angri lord expedi hast 
 i conjur thee slowli run fast exeunt

scen 3 

england befor castle

ent arthur walls

 arthur the wall high yet i leap 
 good ground piti hurt 
 there none know 
 thi ship boy semblanc hath disgui quit 
 i afraid yet i ventur 
 if i get break limb 
 i find thousand shift get away 
 as good die go die stay leap 
 o uncl spirit stone 
 heaven take soul england keep bone 
 die 

 enter pembrok salisburi bigot

 salisburi lord i meet saint edmundsburi 
 it safeti must embrace
 thi gentl offer peril time 
 pembrok who brought letter cardin 
 salisburi the count melun nobl lord franc 
 whose privat dauphin love
 is much gener line import 
 bigot to morrow morn let us meet 
 salisburi or rather set forward twill be
 two long day journey lord ere meet 

 enter bastard

 bastard onc day well met distemp lord 
 the king request presenc straight 
 salisburi the king hath dispossess us 
 we line thin bestain cloak
 with pure honour attend foot
 that leav print blood er walk 
 return tell we know worst 
 bastard whate er think good word i think best 
 salisburi our grief manner reason 
 bastard but littl reason grief 
 therefor twere reason manner 
 pembrok sir sir impati hath privileg 
 bastard ti true hurt master man els 
 salisburi thi prison what lie 
 pembrok o death made proud pure princ beauti 
 the earth hole hide deed 
 salisburi murder hate hath done 
 doth lay open urg reveng 
 bigot or doom beauti grave 
 found preciou princ grave 
 salisburi sir richard think have beheld 
 or read heard could think 
 or almost think although see 
 that see could thought without object 
 form anoth thi top 
 the height crest crest unto crest 
 of murder arm bloodiest shame 
 the wildest savageri vilest stroke 
 that ever wall ey wrath stare rage
 present tear soft remors 
 pembrok all murder past stand excu 
 and sole unmatch 
 shall give holi puriti 
 to yet unbegotten sin time 
 and prove deadli bloodsh jest 
 exampl heinou spectacl 
 bastard it damn bloodi work 
 the graceless action heavi hand 
 if work hand 
 salisburi if work hand 
 we kind light would ensu 
 it shame work hubert hand 
 the practic purpos king 
 from whose obedi i forbid soul
 kneel ruin sweet life 
 and breath breathless excellence
 the incens vow holi vow 
 never tast pleasur world 
 never infect delight 
 nor convers eas idl 
 till i set glori hand
 by give worship reveng 
 pembrok bigot our soul religi confirm thi word 

 enter hubert

 hubert lord i hot hast seek 
 arthur doth live king hath sent 
 salisburi o bold blush death 
 avaunt thou hate villain get thee gone 
 hubert i villain 
 salisburi must i rob law draw sword 
 bastard your sword bright sir put 
 salisburi not till i sheath murder skin 
 hubert stand back lord salisburi stand back i say 
 by heaven i think sword sharp 
 i would lord forget 
 nor tempt danger true defenc 
 lest i mark rage forget
 your worth great nobil 
 bigot out dunghil dar st thou brave nobleman 
 hubert not life yet i dare defend
 my innoc life emperor 
 salisburi thou art murder 
 hubert do prove 
 yet i none whose tongu soe er speak fals 
 not truli speak speak truli lie 
 pembrok cut piec 
 bastard keep peac i say 
 salisburi stand i shall gall faulconbridg 
 bastard thou wert better gall devil salisburi 
 if thou frown stir thi foot 
 or teach thi hasti spleen shame 
 i strike thee dead put thi sword betim 
 or i maul toast iron
 that shall think devil come hell 
 bigot what wilt thou renown faulconbridg 
 second villain murder 
 hubert lord bigot i none 
 bigot who kill princ 
 hubert ti hour sinc i left well 
 i honour i lov weep
 my date life sweet life loss 
 salisburi trust cun water eye 
 for villaini without rheum 
 and long trade make seem
 like river remors innoc 
 away whose soul abhor
 th uncleanli savour slaughter hous 
 for i stifl smell sin 
 bigot away toward buri dauphin 
 pembrok there tell king may inquir us 
 exeunt lords
 bastard here good world knew fair work 
 beyond infinit boundless reach
 of merci thou didst deed death 
 art thou damn hubert 
 hubert do hear sir 
 bastard ha i tell thee 
 thou rt damn black nay noth black 
 thou art deep damn princ lucif 
 there yet ugli fiend hell
 as thou shalt thou didst kill child 
 hubert upon soul 
 bastard if thou didst consent
 to cruel act despair 
 and thou want st cord smallest thread
 that ever spider twist womb
 will serv strangl thee rush beam
 to hang thee wouldst thou drown thyself 
 put littl water spoon
 and shall ocean 
 enough stifl villain up
 i suspect thee grievous 
 hubert if i act consent sin thought 
 be guilti steal sweet breath
 which embound beauteou clay 
 let hell want pain enough tortur 
 i left well 
 bastard go bear thine arm 
 i amaz methink lose way
 among thorn danger world 
 how easi dost thou take england 
 from forth morsel dead royalty
 the life right truth realm
 is fled heaven england left
 to tug scambl part th teeth
 the unow interest proud swell state 
 now bare pick bone majesty
 doth dog war bristl angri crest
 and snarleth gentl eye peac 
 now power home discont home
 meet one line vast confus wait 
 as doth raven sick fall n beast 
 the immin decay wrest pomp 
 now happi whose cloak cinctur can
 hold tempest bear away child 
 and follow speed i king 
 a thousand busi brief hand 
 and heaven doth frown upon land exeunt

act v scene 1 england king john s palace

ent king john pandulph attendants

 king john thu i yield hand
 the circl glori 
 pandulph give back crown take again
 from hand hold pope 
 your sovereign great author 
 king john now keep holi word go meet french 
 and holi use power
 to stop march fore inflam 
 our discont counti revolt 
 our peopl quarrel obedi 
 swear allegi love soul
 to stranger blood foreign royalti 
 thi inund mistemp red humour
 rest qualifi 
 then paus present time sick
 that present med cine must minist red
 or overthrow incur ensu 
 pandulph it breath blew tempest 
 upon stubborn usag pope 
 but sinc gentl convertit 
 my tongu shall hush storm war
 and make fair weather blust ring land 
 on ascens day rememb well 
 upon oath servic pope 
 go i make french lay arm exit
 king john is ascens day did prophet
 say ascens day noon
 my crown i give even i 
 i suppos constraint 
 but heaven thank voluntari 

 enter bastard

 bastard all kent hath yield noth hold out
 but dover castl london hath receiv 
 like kind host dauphin power 
 your nobl hear gone
 to offer servic enemi 
 and wild amaz hurri down
 the littl number doubt friend 
 king john would lord return again
 after heard young arthur aliv 
 bastard they found dead cast street 
 an empti casket jewel life
 by damn hand rob ta en away 
 king john that villain hubert told live 
 bastard so soul aught knew 
 but wherefor droop whi look sad 
 be great act thought 
 let world see fear sad distrust
 govern motion kingli eye 
 be stir time fire fire 
 threaten threat ner outfac brow
 of brag horror shall inferior eye 
 that borrow behaviour great 
 grow great exampl put on
 the dauntless spirit resolut 
 away glister like god war
 when intendeth becom field 
 show bold aspir confid 
 what shall seek lion den 
 and fright make trembl 
 o let said forag run
 to meet displeasur farther doors
 and grappl ere come nigh 
 king john the legat pope hath 
 and i made happi peac 
 and hath promi dismiss powers
 led dauphin 
 bastard o inglori leagu 
 shall upon foot land 
 send fair play order make compromis 
 insinu parley base truce 
 to arm invas shall beardless boy 
 a cock red silken wanton brave fields
 and flesh spirit warlik soil 
 mock air colour idli spread 
 and find check let us lieg arm 
 perchanc cardin can not make peac 
 or let least said
 they saw purpos defenc 
 king john have thou order present time 
 bastard away good courag 
 yet i know
 our parti may well meet prouder foe exeunt

scen 2 england the dauphin s camp saint edmundsbury

ent arm lewi salisburi melun pembrok bigot soldiers

 lewi my lord melun let copi out
 and keep safe remembr 
 return preced lord 
 that fair order written 
 both perus er note 
 may know wherefor took sacrament 
 and keep faith firm inviol 
 salisburi upon side never shall broken 
 and nobl dauphin albeit swear
 a voluntari zeal unurg faith
 to proceed yet believ princ 
 i glad sore time
 should seek plaster contemn revolt 
 and heal inveter canker one wound
 by make mani o griev soul
 that i must draw metal side
 to widow maker o there
 where honour rescu defence
 cri upon name salisburi 
 but infect time
 that health physic right 
 we can not deal hand
 of stern injustic confus wrong 
 and piti o griev friend 
 that son children isl 
 were born see sad hour 
 wherein step stranger march
 upon gentl bosom fill up
 her enemi rank i must withdraw weep
 upon spot enforc caus 
 to grace gentri land remote
 and follow unacquaint colour 
 what o nation thou couldst remov 
 that neptun arm clippeth thee 
 would bear thee knowledg thyself
 and grappl thee unto pagan shore 
 where two christian armi might combine
 the blood malic vein leagu 
 and spend unneighbourli 
 lewi a nobl temper dost thou show 
 and great affect wrestl thi bosom
 doth make earthquak nobil 
 o nobl combat hast thou fought
 between compuls brave respect 
 let wipe honour dew
 that silverli doth progress thi cheek 
 my heart hath melt ladi tear 
 be ordinari inund 
 but effus manli drop 
 thi show r blown tempest soul 
 startl mine eye make amaz d
 than i seen vaulti top heaven
 figur quit er burn meteor 
 lift thi brow renown salisburi 
 and great heart heav away storm 
 commend water babi eyes
 that never saw giant world enrag 
 nor met fortun feast 
 full warm blood mirth gossip 
 come come thou shalt thrust thi hand deep
 into purs rich prosperity
 as lewi so nobl shall 
 that knit sinew strength mine 

 enter pandulph

 and even methink angel spake 
 look holi legat come apac 
 to give us warrant hand heaven
 and action set name right
 with holi breath 
 pandulph hail nobl princ franc 
 the next king john hath reconcil d
 himself rome spirit come 
 that stood holi church 
 the great metropoli see rome 
 therefor thi threat ning colour wind up
 and tame savag spirit wild war 
 that like lion foster hand 
 it may lie gentli foot peace
 and harm show 
 lewi your grace shall pardon i back 
 i high born properti 
 to secondari control 
 or use serv man instrument
 to sovereign state throughout world 
 your breath first kindl dead coal wars
 between chasti kingdom myself
 and brought matter feed fire 
 and ti far huge blown out
 with weak wind enkindl 
 you taught know face right 
 acquaint interest land 
 yea thrust enterpris heart 
 and come ye tell john hath made
 hi peac rome what peac 
 i honour marriag bed 
 after young arthur claim land mine 
 and half conquer must i back
 becaus john hath made peac rome 
 am i rome slave what penni hath rome born 
 what men provid munit sent 
 to underprop action is i
 that undergo charg who els i 
 and claim liabl 
 sweat busi maintain war 
 have i heard island shout out
 vive le roi i bank town 
 have i best card game
 to easi match play crown 
 and shall i give er yield set 
 no soul never shall said 
 pandulph you look outsid work 
 lewi outsid insid i return
 till attempt much glorified
 as ampl hope promised
 befor i drew gallant head war 
 and cull fieri spirit world
 to outlook conquest renown
 even jaw danger death 
 trumpet sound 
 what lusti trumpet thu doth summon us 

 enter bastard attended

 bastard accord fair play world 
 let audienc i sent speak 
 my holi lord milan king
 i come learn dealt 
 and answer i know scope
 and warrant limit unto tongu 
 pandulph the dauphin wil opposit 
 and tempor entreati 
 he flatli say lay arm 
 bastard by blood ever furi breath 
 the youth say well now hear english king 
 for thu royalti doth speak 
 he prepar reason 
 thi apish unmannerli approach 
 thi har masqu unadvis revel
 thi unhair sauci boyish troop 
 the king doth smile well prepar d
 to whip dwarfish war pigmi arm 
 from circl territori 
 that hand strength even door 
 to cudgel make take hatch 
 to dive like bucket conceal well 
 to crouch litter stabl plank 
 to lie like pawn lock chest trunk 
 to hug swine seek sweet safeti out
 in vault prison thrill shake
 even cri nation crow 
 think voic arm englishman 
 shall victori hand feebl here
 that chamber gave chastis 
 no know gallant monarch arms
 and like eagl er aeri tow rs
 to sous annoy come near nest 
 and degener ingrat revolt 
 you bloodi nero rip womb
 of dear mother england blush shame 
 for ladi pale visag maid 
 like amazon come trip drum 
 their thimbl arm gauntlet chang 
 their needl lanc gentl hearts
 to fierc bloodi inclin 
 lewi there end thi brave turn thi face peac 
 we grant thou canst outscold us fare thee well 
 we hold time preciou spent
 with brabbler 
 pandulph give leav speak 
 bastard no i speak 
 lewi we attend neither 
 strike drum let tongu war 
 plead interest 
 bastard inde drum beaten cri 
 and shall beaten do start
 and echo clamour thi drum 
 and even hand drum readi brac d
 that shall reverber loud thine 
 sound anoth anoth shall 
 as loud thine rattl welkin ear
 and mock deep mouth thunder hand 
 not trust halt legat 
 whom hath us rather sport need 
 is warlik john forehead sits
 a bare ribb death whose offic day
 to feast upon whole thousand french 
 lewi strike drum find danger 
 bastard and thou shalt find dauphin doubt 
 exeunt

scen 3 

england the field battle

alarum enter king john hubert

 king john how goe day us o tell hubert 
 hubert badli i fear how fare majesti 
 king john thi fever hath troubl long
 lie heavi o heart sick 

 enter messenger

 messeng my lord valiant kinsman faulconbridg 
 desir majesti leav field
 and send word way go 
 king john tell toward swinstead abbey 
 messeng be good comfort great supply
 that expect dauphin here
 are wreck three night ago goodwin sand 
 thi news brought richard even 
 the french fight coldli retir 
 king john ay tyrant fever burn up
 and let welcom good news 
 set toward swinstead litter straight 
 weak possesseth i faint exeunt

scen 4 

england anoth part battlefield

ent salisburi pembrok bigot

 salisburi i think king stor friend 
 pembrok up put spirit french 
 if miscarri miscarri 
 salisburi that misbegotten devil faulconbridg 
 in spite spite alon uphold day 
 pembrok they say king john sore sick hath left field 

 enter melun wounded

 melun lead revolt england 
 salisburi when happi name 
 pembrok it count melun 
 salisburi wound death 
 melun fli nobl english bought sold 
 unthread rude eye rebellion 
 and welcom home discard faith 
 seek king john fall feet 
 for french lord loud day 
 he mean recompens pain take
 by cut head thu hath sworn 
 and i mani moe 
 upon altar saint edmundsburi 
 even altar swore you
 dear amiti everlast love 
 salisburi may possibl may true 
 melun have i hideou death within view 
 retain quantiti life 
 which bleed away even form wax
 resolveth figur gainst fire 
 what world make deceiv 
 sinc i must lose use deceit 
 whi i fals sinc true
 that i must die live henc truth 
 i say lewi day 
 he forsworn e er eye yours
 behold anoth day break east 
 but even night whose black contagi breath
 alreadi smoke burn crest
 of old feebl day weari sun 
 even ill night breath shall expir 
 pay fine rate treachery
 even treacher fine live 
 if lewi assist win day 
 commend one hubert king 
 the love respect besid 
 for grandsir englishman 
 awak conscienc confess 
 in lieu whereof i pray bear hence
 from forth nois rumour field 
 where i may think remnant thoughts
 in peac part bodi soul
 with contempl devout desir 
 salisburi we believ thee beshrew soul
 but i love favour form
 of fair occas which
 we untread step damn flight 
 and like bate retir flood 
 leav rank irregular cours 
 stoop low within bound erlook 
 and calmli run obedience
 even ocean great king john 
 my arm shall give thee help bear thee henc 
 for i see cruel pang death
 right thine eye away friend new flight 
 and happi new intend old right 
 exeunt lead melun

scen 5 

england the french camp

ent lewi train

 lewi the sun heaven methought loath set 
 but stay made western welkin blush 
 when english measur backward ground
 in faint retir o brave came 
 when volley needless shot 
 after bloodi toil bid good night 
 and wound tott ring colour clearli 
 last field almost lord 

 enter messenger

 messeng where princ dauphin 
 lewi here news 
 messeng the count melun slain english lords
 by persuas fall n 
 and suppli wish long 
 are cast away sunk goodwin sand 
 lewi ah foul shrewd news beshrew thi heart 
 i think sad night
 as hath made who said
 king john fli hour two before
 the stumbl night part weari pow rs 
 messeng whoever spoke true lord 
 lewi keep good quarter good care night 
 the day shall soon i
 to tri fair adventur morrow exeunt

scen 6 

an open place wear swinstead abbey

ent bastard hubert severally

 hubert who speak ho speak quickli i shoot 
 bastard a friend what art thou 
 hubert of part england 
 bastard whither dost thou go 
 hubert what thee whi may i demand
 of thine affair well thou mine 
 bastard hubert i think 
 hubert thou hast perfect thought 
 i upon hazard well believe
 thou art friend know st tongu well 
 who art thou 
 bastard who thou wilt and thou pleas 
 thou mayst befriend much think
 i come one way plantagenet 
 hubert unkind remembr thou eyeless night
 have done shame brave soldier pardon me
 that accent break thi tongue
 should scape true acquaint mine ear 
 bastard come come san compliment news abroad 
 hubert whi walk i black brow night
 to find 
 bastard brief news 
 hubert o sweet sir news fit night 
 black fear comfortless horribl 
 bastard show wound ill news 
 i woman i swoon 
 hubert the king i fear poison monk 
 i left almost speechless broke out
 to acquaint evil might
 the better arm sudden time
 than leisur known 
 bastard how take tast 
 hubert a monk i tell resolv villain 
 whose bowel suddenli burst the king
 yet speak peradventur may recov 
 bastard who didst thou leav tend majesti 
 hubert whi know the lord come back 
 and brought princ henri compani 
 at whose request king hath pardon 
 and majesti 
 bastard withhold thine indign mighti heaven 
 and tempt us bear power 
 i tell thee hubert half power night 
 pass flat taken tide 
 these lincoln wash devour 
 myself well mount hardli escap 
 away conduct king 
 i doubt dead ere i come exeunt

scen 7 

the orchard swinstead abbey

ent princ henri salisburi bigot

 princ henri it late life blood
 is touch corrupt pure brain 
 which suppos soul frail dwell hous 
 doth idl comment makes
 foretel end mortal 

 enter pembroke

 pembrok hi high yet doth speak hold belief
 that brought open air 
 it would allay burn quality
 of fell poison assaileth 
 princ henri let brought orchard 
 doth still rage exit bigot
 pembrok he patient
 than left even sung 
 princ henri o vaniti sick fierc extremes
 in continu feel 
 death prey upon outward part 
 leav invis sieg now
 against mind prick wounds
 with mani legion strang fantasi 
 which throng press last hold 
 confound ti strang death sing 
 i cygnet pale faint swan
 who chant dole hymn death 
 and organ pipe frailti sings
 hi soul bodi last rest 
 salisburi be good comfort princ born
 to set form upon indigest
 which hath left shapeless rude 

 re enter bigot attend bring in
 king john chair

 king john ay marri soul hath elbow room 
 it would window door 
 there hot summer bosom
 that bowel crumbl dust 
 i scribbl form drawn pen
 upon parchment fire
 do i shrink 
 princ henri how fare majesti 
 king john poison ill fare dead forsook cast 
 and none bid winter come
 to thrust ici finger maw 
 nor let kingdom river take course
 through burn bosom entreat north
 to make bleak wind kiss parch lips
 and comfort cold i ask much 
 i beg cold comfort strait
 and ingrat deni 
 princ henri o virtu tear 
 that might reliev 
 king john the salt hot 
 within hell poison
 is fiend confin tyrannize
 on unrepriev condemn blood 

 enter bastard

 bastard o i scald violent motion
 and spleen speed see majesti 
 king john o cousin thou art come set mine eye 
 the tackl heart crack burnt 
 and shroud wherewith life sail
 are turn one thread one littl hair 
 my heart hath one poor string stay 
 which hold till thi news utter 
 and thou seest clod
 and modul confound royalti 
 bastard the dauphin prepar hitherward 
 where god he know shall answer 
 for night best part pow r 
 as i upon advantag remov 
 were wash unwarily
 devour unexpect flood the king die 
 salisburi you breath dead news dead ear 
 my lieg lord but king thu 
 princ henri even must i run even stop 
 what sureti world hope stay 
 when king clay 
 bastard art thou gone i stay behind
 to offic thee reveng 
 and soul shall wait thee heaven 
 as earth hath thi servant still 
 now star move right sphere 
 where pow rs show mend faith 
 and instantli return again
 to push destruct perpetu shame
 out weak door faint land 
 straight let us seek straight shall sought 
 the dauphin rage heel 
 salisburi it seem know much 
 the cardin pandulph within rest 
 who half hour sinc came dauphin 
 and bring offer peace
 as honour respect may take 
 with purpos present leav war 
 bastard he rather sees
 ourselv well sinew defenc 
 salisburi nay ti manner done alreadi 
 for mani carriag hath dispatch d
 to sea side put caus quarrel
 to dispos cardin 
 with lord 
 if think meet afternoon post
 to consumm busi happili 
 bastard let and nobl princ 
 with princ may best spar 
 shall wait upon father funer 
 princ henri at worcest must bodi interr 
 for 
 bastard thither shall 
 and happili may sweet self put on
 the lineal state glori land 
 to submiss knee
 i bequeath faith services
 and true subject everlastingli 
 salisburi and like tender love make 
 to rest without spot evermor 
 princ henri i kind soul would give thank 
 and know tear 
 bastard o let us pay time need woe 
 sinc hath beforehand grief 
 thi england never never shall 
 lie proud foot conqueror 
 but first help wound 
 now princ come home 
 come three corner world arm 
 and shall shock nought shall make us rue 
 if england rest true exeunt




th tragedi of juliu caesar

scene iv anoth part field 
scene v anoth part field

act i

scen i rome a street 

 enter flaviu marullu throng citizen 

flaviu 
henc home idl creatur get home 
i holiday what know 
be mechan ought walk
upon labour day without sign
of profess speak trade art thou 

carpent 
whi sir carpent 

marullu 
where thi leather apron thi rule 
what dost thou thi best apparel 
you sir trade 

cobbler 
truli sir respect fine workman i would say a
cobbl 

marullu 
but trade art thou answer directli 

cobbler 
a trade sir i hope i may use safe conscienc is
inde sir mender bad sole 

marullu 
what trade thou knave thou naughti knave trade 

cobbler 
nay i beseech sir yet sir i
can mend 

marullu 
what mean st thou mend thou sauci fellow 

cobbler 
whi sir cobbl 

flaviu 
thou art cobbler art thou 

cobbler 
truli sir i live awl i meddl no
tradesman matter women matter withal i inde sir 
a surgeon old shoe great danger i recov 
a proper men ever trod upon neat leather gone upon my
handiwork 

flaviu 
but wherefor art thi shop today 
whi dost thou lead men street 

cobbler 
truli sir wear shoe get work but
inde sir make holiday see caesar rejoic his
triumph 

marullu 
wherefor rejoic what conquest bring home 
what tributari follow rome 
to grace captiv bond chariot wheel 
you block stone wors senseless thing 
o hard heart cruel men rome 
knew pompey mani time oft
hav climb wall battlement 
to tower window yea chimney top 
your infant arm sat
th livelong day patient expect 
to see great pompey pass street rome 
and saw chariot appear 
have made univers shout 
that tiber trembl underneath banks
to hear replic sounds
mad concav shore 
and put best attir 
and cull holiday 
and strew flower way 
that come triumph pompey blood 
be gone 
run hous fall upon knee 
pray god intermit plague
that need must light ingratitud 

flaviu 
go go good countrymen fault
assembl poor men sort 
draw tiber bank weep tears
into channel till lowest stream
do kiss exalt shore 

 _exeunt citizen _ 

see whether basest metal mov 
they vanish tongu tie guilti 
go way toward capitol 
thi way i disrob imag 
if find deck ceremoni 

marullu 
may 
you know feast luperc 

flaviu 
it matter let images
b hung caesar trophi i about
and drive away vulgar street 
so perceiv thick 
these grow feather pluck caesar wing
wil make fli ordinari pitch 
who els would soar view men 
and keep us servil fear 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the a public place 

 enter process music caesar antoni cours 
 calphurnia portia deciu cicero brutu cassiu casca great
 crowd follow among soothsay 

caesar 
calphurnia 

casca 
peac ho caesar speak 

 _music ceas _ 

caesar 
calphurnia 

calphurnia 
here lord 

caesar 
stand directli antoniu way 
when doth run cours antoniu 

antoni 
caesar lord 

caesar 
forget speed antoniu 
to touch calphurnia elder say 
the barren touch holi chase 
shake steril curs 

antoni 
i shall rememb 
when caesar say do perform 

caesar 
set leav ceremoni 

 _music _ 

soothsay 
caesar 

caesar 
ha who call 

casca 
bid everi nois still peac yet 

 _music ceas _ 

caesar 
who press call 
i hear tongu shriller music 
cri caesar speak caesar turn hear 

soothsay 
bewar ide march 

caesar 
what man 

brutu 
a soothsay bid bewar ide march 

caesar 
set let see face 

cassiu 
fellow come throng look upon caesar 

caesar 
what say st thou speak 

soothsay 
bewar ide march 

caesar 
he dreamer let us leav pass 

 _sennet exeunt brutu cassiu _ 

cassiu 
will go see order cours 

brutu 
not i 

cassiu 
i pray 

brutu 
i gamesom i lack part
of quick spirit antoni 
let hinder cassiu desir 
i leav 

cassiu 
brutu i observ late 
i eye gentleness
and show love i wont 
you bear stubborn strang hand
ov friend love 

brutu 
cassiu 
be deceiv i veil look 
i turn troubl countenance
mer upon vex i am
of late passion differ 
concept proper 
which give soil perhap behavior 
but let therefor good friend grieved
 among number cassiu one 
nor constru neglect 
than poor brutu war 
forget show love men 

cassiu 
then brutu i much mistook passion 
bi mean whereof breast mine hath buried
thought great valu worthi cogit 
tell good brutu see face 

brutu 
no cassiu eye see itself
but reflect thing 

cassiu 
 ti 
and much lament brutu 
that mirror turn
your hidden worthi eye 
that might see shadow i heard
wher mani best respect rome 
 except immort caesar speak brutu 
and groan underneath age yoke 
have wish nobl brutu eye 

brutu 
into danger would lead cassiu 
that would seek myself
for 

cassiu 
therefor good brutu prepar hear 
and sinc know can not see yourself
so well reflect i glass 
will modestli discov yourself
that yet know 
and jealou gentl brutu 
were i common laugher use
to stale ordinari oath love
to everi new protest know
that i fawn men hug hard 
and scandal know
that i profess banquet 
to rout hold danger 

 _flourish shout _ 

brutu 
what mean shout i fear people
choos caesar king 

cassiu 
ay fear 
then must i think would 

brutu 
i would cassiu yet i love well 
but wherefor hold long 
what would impart 
if aught toward gener good 
set honour one eye death 
and i look indiffer 
for let god speed i love
th name honour i fear death 

cassiu 
i know virtu brutu 
a well i know outward favour 
well honour subject stori 
i can not tell men
think life singl self 
i lief live be
in awe thing i 
i born free caesar 
we fed well both
endur winter cold well 
for upon raw gusti day 
the troubl tiber chafe shore 
caesar said dar st thou cassiu now
leap angri flood 
and swim yonder point upon word 
accoutr i i plung 
and bade follow inde 
the torrent roar buffet it
with lusti sinew throw aside
and stem heart controversi 
but ere could arriv point propo 
caesar cri help cassiu i sink 
i aenea great ancestor 
did flame troy upon shoulder
th old anchis bear wave tiber
did i tire caesar and man
i becom god cassiu is
a wretch creatur must bend bodi 
if caesar carelessli nod 
he fever spain 
and fit i mark
how shake ti true god shake 
hi coward lip colour fli 
and eye whose bend doth awe world
did lose lustr i hear groan 
ay tongu bade romans
mark write speech book 
ala cri give drink titiniu 
a sick girl ye god doth amaz 
a man feebl temper should
so get start majest world 
and bear palm alon 

 _shout flourish _ 

brutu 
anoth gener shout 
i believ applaus are
for new honour heap caesar 

cassiu 
whi man doth bestrid narrow world
lik colossu petti men
walk huge leg peep about
to find dishonour grave 
men time master fate 
the fault dear brutu star 
but underl 
 brutu caesar caesar 
whi name sound 
write togeth fair name 
sound doth becom mouth well 
weigh heavi conjur em 
 brutu start spirit soon caesar 
now name god 
upon meat doth caesar feed 
that grown great age thou art sham 
rome thou hast lost breed nobl blood 
when went age sinc great flood 
but fam one man 
when could say till talk rome 
that wide wall encompass one man 
now rome inde room enough 
when one man 
o i heard father say 
there brutu would brook d
th etern devil keep state rome 
a easili king 

brutu 
that love i noth jealou 
what would work i aim 
how i thought time 
i shall recount hereaft for present 
i would love i might entreat 
be mov what said 
i consid say
i patienc hear find time
both meet hear answer high thing 
till nobl friend chew upon

than reput son rome
und hard condit time
i like lay upon us

hav struck thu much show fire brutu 

 enter caesar train

antoniu 

antoni 
caesar

yond cassiu lean hungri look

antoni

he nobl roman well given 

caesar 
would fatter but i fear 
yet name liabl fear 
i know man i avoid
so soon spare cassiu he read much 
he great observ looks
quit deed men he love play 
a thou dost antoni hear music 
seldom smile smile sort
a mock scorn spirit
that could mov smile anyth 
such men never heart ease
whil behold greater 
and therefor danger 
i rather tell thee fear d
than i fear alway i caesar 
come right hand ear deaf 
and tell truli thou think st

it think would fain had

 _exit brutu _

from dispo therefor ti meet
that nobl mind keep ever like

 _exit _ 

scene iii the a street 

 thunder lightn enter opposit side casca his
 sword drawn cicero 

cicero 
good even casca brought caesar home 
whi breathless stare 

casca 
are move sway earth
shak like thing unfirm o cicero 
i seen tempest scold winds
hav riv knotti oak i seen
th ambiti ocean swell rage foam 
to exalt threaten cloud 
but never till tonight never till 
did i go tempest drop fire 
either civil strife heaven 
or els world sauci god 
incens send destruct 

cicero 
whi saw anyth wonder 

casca 
a common slave know well sight 
held left hand flame burn
lik twenti torch join yet hand 
not sensibl fire remain unscorch 
besid i ha sinc put sword 
against capitol i met lion 
who glare upon went surli 
without annoy and drawn
upon heap hundr ghastli women 
transform fear swore saw
men fire walk street 
and yesterday bird night sit 
even noonday upon marketplac 
hoot shriek when prodigies
do conjointli meet let men say 
 these reason natur 
for i believ portent things
unto climat point upon 

cicero 
inde strang dispos time 
but men may constru thing fashion 
clean purpos thing 
come caesar capitol tomorrow 

casca 
he doth bid antonius
send word would tomorrow

i walk

 _exit cicero _ 

 enter cassiu 

cassiu 
who 

casca 
a roman

casca voic 

casca 
your ear good cassiu night 

cassiu 
a pleas night honest men 

casca 
who ever knew heaven menac 

cassiu 
those known earth full fault 
for part i walk street 
submit unto peril night 
and thu unbrac casca see 
have bar bosom thunder stone 
and cross blue lightn seem open
th breast heaven i present myself
even aim flash 

casca 
but wherefor much tempt heaven 
it part men fear trembl 
when mighti god token send
such dread herald astonish us 

cassiu 
you dull casca spark life
that roman want 
or els use you look pale gaze 
and put fear cast wonder 
to see strang impati heaven 
but would consid true cause
whi fire glide ghost 
whi bird beast qualiti kind 
whi old men fool children calcul 
whi thing chang ordin 
their natur pre form faculti 
to monstrou qualiti shall find
that heaven hath infu spirit 
to make instrument fear warning
unto monstrou state 
now could i casca name thee man
most like dread night 
that thunder lighten open grave roar 
a doth lion capitol 
a man mightier thyself 
in person action yet prodigi grown 
and fear strang erupt 

casca 
 ti caesar mean cassiu 

cassiu 
let roman now
hav thew limb like ancestor 
but woe father mind dead 
and govern mother spirit 
our yoke suffer show us womanish 

casca 
inde say senat tomorrow
mean establish caesar king 
and shall wear crown sea land 
in everi place save itali 

cassiu 
i know i wear dagger 
cassiu bondag deliv cassiu 
therein ye god make weak strong 
therein ye god tyrant defeat 
nor stoni tower wall beaten brass 
nor airless dungeon strong link iron 
can retent strength spirit 
but life weari worldli bar 
never lack power dismiss 
if i know know world besid 
that part tyranni i bear
i shake pleasur 

 _thunder still _ 

casca 
so i 
so everi bondman hand bears
th power cancel captiv 

cassiu 
and caesar tyrant 
poor man i know would wolf 
but see roman sheep 
he lion roman hind 
those hast make mighti fire
begin weak straw what trash rome 
what rubbish offal serves
for base matter illuminate
so vile thing caesar but o grief 
where hast thou led i perhap speak this
befor will bondman i know
mi answer must made i arm 
and danger indiffer 

casca 
you speak casca man
that fleer tell tale hold hand 
be factiou redress grief 
and i set foot mine far
a goe farthest 

cassiu 
there bargain made 
now know casca i mov already
som certain noblest mind romans
to undergo enterprise
of honour danger consequ 
and i know stay me
in pompey porch fear night 
there stir walk street 
and complexion element
in favour like work hand 
most bloodi fieri terribl

that may danger

remors power speak truth caesar

more reason but ti common proof 
that lowli young ambit ladder 
whereto climber upward turn face

bi ascend so caesar may

wil bear colour thing

which hatch would kind grow mischiev 
and kill shell

_brutu thou sleep st awak see thyself

 enter cassiu casca deciu cinna metellu cimber treboniu

 _they whisper _ 

deciu 
here lie east doth day break 

casca 
no 

cinna 
o pardon sir doth yon grey lines
that fret cloud messeng day 

casca 
you shall confess deceiv 
here i point sword sun aris 
which great way grow south 
weigh youth season year 
some two month henc higher toward north
h first present fire high east
stand capitol directli 

brutu 
give hand one one 

cassiu 
and let us swear resolut 

brutu 
no oath if face men 
the suffer soul time abus 
if motiv weak break betim 
and everi man henc idl bed 
so let high sight tyranni rang 
till man drop lotteri but 
a i sure bear fire enough
to kindl coward steel valour
th melt spirit women countrymen 
what need spur cause
to prick us redress bond
than secret roman spoke word 
and palter oath
than honesti honesti engag 
that shall fall 
swear priest coward men cautel 
old feebl carrion suffer souls
that welcom wrong unto bad caus swear
such creatur men doubt stain
th even virtu enterpris 
nor th insuppress mettl spirit 
to think caus performance
did need oath everi drop blood
that everi roman bear nobli bear 
i guilti sever bastardi 
if break smallest particle
of promis hath pass 

cassiu

i think stand strong us 

casca 
let us leav 

cinna 
no mean 

metellu 
o let us silver hairs
wil purchas us good opinion 
and buy men voic commend deed 
it shall said judgment rul hand 
our youth wild shall whit appear 
but buri graviti 

brutu 
o name let us break 
for never follow anything
that men begin 

cassiu 
then leav 

casca 
inde fit 

deciu 
shall man els touch caesar 

cassiu 
deciu well urg i think meet 
mark antoni well belov caesar 
should outliv caesar shall find him
a shrewd contriv know mean 
if improv may well stretch far
a annoy us prevent 
let antoni caesar fall togeth 

brutu 
our cours seem bloodi caiu cassiu 
to cut head hack limb 
like wrath death envi afterward 
for antoni limb caesar 
let us sacrific butcher caiu 
we stand spirit caesar 
and spirit men blood 
o could come caesar spirit 
and dismemb caesar but ala 
caesar must bleed and gentl friend 
let kill boldli wrath 
let carv dish fit god 
not hew carcass fit hound 
and let heart subtl master 
stir servant act rage 
and seem chide em thi shall mark
our purpos necessari enviou 
which appear common eye 
we shall call purger murder 
and mark antoni think 
for caesar arm
when caesar head 

cassiu 
yet i fear 
for ingraft love bear caesar 

brutu 
ala good cassiu think 
if love caesar do
i take thought die caesar 
and much given
to sport wild much compani 

treboniu 
there fear let die 
for live laugh hereaft 

 _clock strike _ 

brutu 
peac count clock 

cassiu 
the clock hath stricken three 

treboniu 
 ti time part 

cassiu 
but doubt yet
wheth caesar come forth today 
for superstiti grown late 
quit main opinion held once
of fantasi dream ceremoni 
it may appar prodigi 
the unaccustom terror night 
and persuas augur 
may hold capitol today 

deciu 
never fear resolv 
i ersway love hear
that unicorn may betray tree 
and bear glass eleph hole 
lion toil men flatter 
but i tell hate flatter 
he say flatter 
let work 
for i give humour true bent 
and i bring capitol 

cassiu 
nay us fetch 

brutu 
bi eighth hour uttermost 

cinna 
be uttermost fail 

metellu

who rate speak well pompey 
i wonder none thought 

brutu 
now good metellu go along 
he love well i given reason 
send hither i fashion 

cassiu 
the morn come upon we leav brutu 
and friend dispers remember
what said show true roman 

brutu 
good gentlemen look fresh merrili 
let look put purpos 
but bear roman actor 
with untir spirit formal constanc 
and good morrow everyon 

 _exeunt brutu _ 

boy luciu fast asleep it matter 
enjoy honey heavi dew slumber 
thou hast figur fantasi 
which busi care draw brain men 
therefor thou sleep st sound 

 enter portia 

portia 
brutu lord 

brutu 
portia mean wherefor rise 
it health thu commit
your weak condit raw cold morn 

portia 
nor neither y ungent brutu 
stole bed yesternight supper 
you suddenli aros walk 
muse sigh arm across 
and i ask matter 
you star upon ungentl look 
i urg scratch head 
and impati stamp foot 
yet i insist yet answer 
but angri waftur hand
gav sign leav so i 
fear strengthen impatience
which seem much enkindl withal
hop effect humour 
which sometim hath hour everi man 
it let eat talk sleep 
and could work much upon shape
a hath much prevail condit 
i know brutu dear lord 
make acquaint caus grief 

brutu 
i well health 

portia 
brutu wise health 
he would embrac mean come 

brutu 
whi i good portia go bed 

portia 
i brutu sick physical
to walk unbrac suck humours
of dank morn what brutu sick 
and steal wholesom bed
to dare vile contagion night 
and tempt rheumi unpurg air
to add unto sick no brutu 
you sick offenc within mind 
which right virtu place 
i ought know upon knee 
i charm commend beauti 
bi vow love great vow
which incorpor make us one 
that unfold self half 
whi heavi men tonight
hav resort been
som six seven hide faces
even dark 

brutu 
kneel gentl portia 

portia 
i need gentl brutu 
within bond marriag tell brutu 
i except i know secrets
that appertain am i self
but sort limit 
to keep meal comfort bed 
and talk sometim dwell i suburbs
of good pleasur if 
portia brutu harlot wife 

brutu 
you true honour wife 
a dear ruddi drops
that visit sad heart 

portia 
if true i know secret 
i grant i woman withal
a woman lord brutu took wife 
i grant i woman withal
a woman well reput cato daughter 
think i stronger sex 
be father husband 
tell counsel i disclos em 
i made strong proof constanc 
give voluntari wound
her thigh i bear patience
and husband secret 

brutu 
o ye god 
render worthi nobl wife 

 _knock _ 

hark hark one knock portia go awhil 
and thi bosom shall partake
th secret heart 
all engag i constru thee 
all characteri sad brow 
leav hast 

 _exit portia _ 

 enter luciu ligariu 

luciu knock 

luciu 
here sick man would speak 

brutu

boy stand asid caiu ligariu 

ligariu

to wear kerchief would sick

ani exploit worthi name honour

had health ear hear

and i strive thing imposs 
yea get better what

brutu

to must done

that brutu lead

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii a room caesar palac 

 thunder lightn enter caesar nightgown 

caesar 
nor heaven earth peac tonight 
thrice hath calphurnia sleep cri 
 help ho they murder caesar who within 

 enter servant 

servant 
mi lord 

caesar 
go bid priest present sacrific 
and bring opinion success 

servant 
i lord 

 _exit _ 

 enter calphurnia 

calphurnia 
what mean caesar think walk forth 
you shall stir hous today 

caesar 
caesar shall forth the thing threaten me
n er look back shall see
th face caesar vanish 

calphurnia 
caesar i never stood ceremoni 
yet fright there one within 
besid thing heard seen 
recount horrid sight seen watch 
a lioness hath whelp street 
and grave yawn yield dead 
fierc fieri warrior fight upon clouds
in rank squadron right form war 
which drizzl blood upon capitol 
the nois battl hurtl air 
hors neigh die men groan 
and ghost shriek squeal street 
o caesar thing beyond use 
and i fear 

caesar 
what avoided
whos end purpo mighti god 
yet caesar shall go forth predictions
ar world gener caesar 

calphurnia 
when beggar die comet seen 
the heaven blaze forth death princ 

caesar 
coward die mani time death 
the valiant never tast death 
of wonder i yet heard 
it seem strang men fear 
see death necessari end 
will come come 

 enter servant 

what say augur

pluck entrail offer forth 
they could find heart within beast 

caesar 
the god shame cowardic 
caesar beast without heart
if stay home today fear 
no caesar shall danger know full well
that caesar danger

that keep hous

caesar 
i must prevent thee cimber 
these couch lowli courtesies
might fire blood ordinari men 
and turn pre ordin first decree
into law children be fond 
to think caesar bear rebel blood
that thaw true quality
with melteth fool i mean sweet word 
low crook curtsi base spaniel fawn 
thi brother decre banish 
if thou dost bend pray fawn 
i spurn thee like cur way 
know caesar dost wrong without cause
wil satisfi
