to sound sweetli great caesar ear
for repeal banish brother

what brutu

caesar 
i could well mov i 
if i could pray move prayer would move 
but i constant northern star 
of whose true fix rest quality
ther fellow firmament 
the sky paint unnumb spark 
they fire everi one doth shine 
but one doth hold place 
so world ti furnish well men 
and men flesh blood apprehens 
yet number i know one
that unassail hold rank 
unshak motion i 
let littl show even 
that i constant cimber banish 
and constant remain keep

antoni

are thi conquest glori triumph spoil 
shrunk littl measur fare thee well

who els must let blood els rank 
if i hour fit
a caesar death hour instrument
of half worth sword made rich
with nobl blood world

now whilst purpl hand reek smoke 
fulfil pleasur live thousand year 
i shall find apt die 
no place pleas mean death 
a caesar cut 
the choic master spirit age

a hand present act
you see yet see hands
and bleed busi done

and piti gener wrong rome

hath done deed caesar for part 
to sword leaden point mark antoni

of brother temper receiv in
with kind love good thought rever

in dispos new digniti

next caiu cassiu i take hand 
now deciu brutu metellu 
your cinna valiant casca 
though last least love good treboniu 
gentlemen ala shall i say 
mi credit stand slipperi ground 
that one two bad way must conceit 
either coward flatter 
that i love thee caesar o ti true 
if thi spirit look upon us 
shall griev thee dearer thi death 
to see thi antoni make peac 
shake bloodi finger thi foe 
most nobl presenc thi cors 
had i mani eye thou hast wound 
weep fast stream forth thi blood 
it would becom better close
in term friendship thine enemi

here didst thou fall thi hunter stand 
sign thi spoil crimson thi leth 
o world thou wast forest hart 
and inde o world heart thee

dost thou lie

 _exeunt antoni _ 

antoni 
o pardon thou bleed piec earth 
that i meek gentl butcher 
thou art ruin noblest man
that ever live tide time 
woe hand shed costli blood 
over thi wound i prophesi 
which like dumb mouth ope rubi lips
to beg voic utter tongu 
a curs shall light upon limb men 
domest furi fierc civil strife
shal cumber part itali 
blood destruct shall use 
and dread object familiar 
that mother shall smile behold
their infant quarter hand war 
all piti chok custom fell deed 
and caesar spirit rang reveng 
with ate side come hot hell 
shall confin monarch voice
cri havoc let slip dog war 
that foul deed shall smell earth
with carrion men groan burial

assembl dear friend caesar i say brutu love

 _exit lepidu _ 

antoni 
thi slight unmerit man 
meet sent errand is fit 
the three fold world divid stand
on three share 

octaviu 
so thought 
and took voic prick die
in black sentenc proscript 

antoni 
octaviu i seen day 
and though lay honour man 
to eas diver sland rou load 
he shall bear ass bear gold 
to groan sweat busi 
either led driven point way 
and brought treasur 
then take load turn 
like empti ass shake ear 
and graze common 

octaviu 
you may 
but tri valiant soldier 

antoni 
so hors octaviu that
i appoint store provend 
it creatur i teach fight 
to wind stop run directli 
hi corpor motion govern spirit 
and tast lepidu 
he must taught train bid go forth 
a barren spirit fellow one feeds
on object art imit 
which use stal men 
begin fashion do talk him
but properti and octaviu 
listen great thing brutu cassius
ar levi power must straight make head 
therefor let allianc combin 
our best friend made mean stretch 
and let us present go sit council 
how covert matter may best disclo 
and open peril surest answer 

octaviu 
let us stake 
and bay mani enemi 
and smile heart i fear 
million mischief

when waspish

that pass idl wind

bi heaven i rather coin heart

a huge high olympu

reveng alon cassiu

hate one love brav brother 
check like bondman fault observ 
set note book learn conn rote 
to cast teeth o i could weep
mi spirit mine eye there dagger 
and nake breast within heart
dear plutu mine richer gold

than ever thou lovedst cassiu

and straight cold

thi

the peopl twixt philippi ground
do stand forc affect

bi shall make fuller number 
come refresh new ad encourag 
from advantag shall cut off
if philippi face 
these peopl back

or lose ventur

there say

 _luciu play sing till fall asleep _ 

thi sleepi tune o murd rou slumber 
layest thou thi leaden mace upon boy 
that play thee music gentl knave good night 
i thee much wrong wake thee 
if thou dost nod thou break st thi instrument 
i take thee good boy good night 
let see let see leaf turn down
wher i left read here i think 

 enter ghost caesar

act v

scene i the plain philippi 

 enter octaviu antoni armi 

octaviu 
now antoni hope answer 
you said enemi would come 
but keep hill upper region 
it prove battl hand 
they mean warn us philippi 
answer demand 

antoni 
tut i bosom i know
wherefor they could content
to visit place come down
with fear braveri think face
to fasten thought courag 
but ti 

 enter messeng 

messeng 
prepar gener

their bloodi sign battl hung 
and someth done immedi

upon left hand even field

 _march _ 

drum enter brutu cassiu armi luciliu titiniu messala
and other 

brutu 
they stand would parley 

cassiu 
stand fast titiniu must talk 

octaviu 
mark antoni shall give sign battl 

antoni 
no caesar answer charg 
make forth gener would word 

octaviu 
stir signal 

brutu 
word blow countrymen 

octaviu 
not love word better 

brutu 
good word better bad stroke octaviu 

antoni 
in bad stroke brutu give good word 
wit hole made caesar heart 
cri long live hail caesar 

cassiu 
antoni 
the postur blow yet unknown 
but word rob hybla bee 
and leav honeyless 

antoni 
not stingless 

brutu 
o ye soundless 
for stol n buzz antoni 
and wise threat sting 

antoni 
villain vile daggers
hack one anoth side caesar 
you show teeth like ape fawn like hound 
and bow like bondmen kiss caesar feet 
whilst damn casca like cur behind
struck caesar neck o flatter 

cassiu 
flatter now brutu thank 
thi tongu offend today 
if cassiu might rul 

octaviu 
come come caus if argu make us sweat 
the proof turn redder drop 
look i draw sword conspir 
when think sword goe 
never till caesar three thirti wounds
b well aveng till anoth caesar
hav ad slaughter sword traitor 

brutu 
caesar thou canst die traitor hand 
unless thou bring st thee 

octaviu 
so i hope 
i born die brutu sword 

brutu 
o thou wert noblest thi strain 
young man thou couldst die honour 

cassiu 
a peevish school boy worthless honour 
join masker revel 

antoni 
old cassiu still 

octaviu 
come antoni away 
defianc traitor hurl teeth 
if dare fight today come field 
if stomach 

 _exeunt octaviu antoni armi _ 

cassiu

the storm hazard

luciliu 
mi lord 

 _brutu luciliu talk apart _ 

cassiu 
messala 

messala 
what say gener 

cassiu 
messala 
thi birth day day
wa cassiu born give thi hand messala 
be thou wit will
a pompey i compel set
upon one battl liberti 
you know i held epicuru strong 
and opinion now i chang mind 
and partli credit thing presag 
come sardi former ensign
two mighti eagl fell perch 
gorg feed soldier hand 
who philippi consort us 
thi morn fled away gone 
and stead raven crow kites
fli er head downward look us 
a sickli prey shadow seem
a canopi fatal which
our armi lie readi give ghost 

messala 
believ 

cassiu 
i believ partli 
for i fresh spirit resolv d
to meet peril constantli 

brutu 
even luciliu 

cassiu 
now nobl brutu 
the god today stand friendli may 
lover peac lead day age 
but sinc affair men rest still incertain 
let reason worst may befal 
if lose battl this
th last time shall speak togeth 
what determin 

brutu 
even rule philosophy
bi i blame cato death
which give i know 
but i find cowardli vile 
for fear might fall prevent
th time life arm patience
to stay provid high powers
that govern us 

cassiu 
then lose battl 
you content led triumph
thorough street rome 

brutu 
no cassiu think thou nobl roman 
that ever brutu go bound rome 
he bear great mind but day
must end work ide march begun 
and whether shall meet i know 
therefor everlast farewel take 
for ever ever farewel cassiu 
if meet shall smile 
if part well made 

cassiu 
for ever ever farewel brutu 
if meet smile inde 
if ti true part well made 

brutu 
whi lead o man might know
th end day busi ere come 
but sufficeth day end 
and end known come ho away 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the the field battl 

 alarum enter brutu messala 

brutu 
ride ride messala ride give bills
unto legion side 

 _loud alarum _ 

let set i perceive
but cold demeanor octaviu wing 
and sudden push give overthrow 
ride ride messala let come 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iii anoth part field 

 alarum enter cassiu titiniu 

cassiu 
o look titiniu look villain fli 
myself mine turn enemi 
thi ensign mine turn back 
i slew coward take 

titiniu

who advantag octaviu 
took eagerli soldier fell spoil 
whilst antoni enclo 

 enter pindaru 

pindaru 
fli lord fli 
mark antoni tent lord 
fli therefor nobl cassiu fli far 

cassiu 
thi hill far enough look look titiniu 
are tent i perceiv fire 

titiniu 
they lord 

cassiu 
titiniu thou lovest 
mount thou hors hide thi spur 
till brought thee yonder troops
and i may rest assur d
whether yond troop friend enemi 

titiniu 
i even thought 

 _exit _ 

cassiu 
go pindaru get higher hill 
mi sight ever thick regard titiniu 
and tell thou notest field 

 _pindaru goe _ 

thi day i breath first time come round 
and i begin shall i end 
mi life run compass sirrah news 

pindaru 
 _abov _ o lord 

cassiu 
what news 

pindaru 
 _abov _ titiniu enclos round about
with horsemen make spur 
yet spur now almost 
now titiniu now light o light 
he ta en 

 _shout _ 

and hark shout joy 

cassiu 
come behold 
o coward i live long 
to see best friend ta en face 

 _pindaru descend _ 

come hither sirrah 
in parthia i take thee prison 
and i swore thee save thi life 
that whatsoev i bid thee 
thou shouldst attempt come keep thine oath 
now freeman good sword 
that ran caesar bowel search bosom 
stand answer here take thou hilt 
and face cover ti 
guid thou sword caesar thou art reveng 
even sword kill thee 

 _di _ 

pindaru

 _exit messala _ 

whi didst thou send forth brave cassiu 
did i meet thi friend and they
put brow wreath victori 
and bid give thee didst thou hear shout 
ala thou hast misconstru everyth 
but hold thee take garland thi brow 
thi brutu bid give thee i
wil bid brutu come apac 
and see i regard caiu cassiu 
bi leav god thi roman part 
come cassiu sword find titiniu heart

 _exeunt gloucest edmund _ 

lear 
meantim shall express darker purpos 
give map know divided
in three kingdom ti fast intent
to shake care busi age 
confer younger strength we
unburden crawl toward death our son cornwal 
and less love son albani 
we hour constant publish
our daughter sever dower futur strife
may prevent the princ franc burgundi 
great rival youngest daughter love 
long court made amor sojourn 
and answer tell daughter 
sinc divest us rule 
interest territori care state 
which shall say doth love us 
that largest bounti may extend
wher natur doth merit challeng goneril 
our eldest born speak first 

goneril 
sir i love word wield matter 
dearer eyesight space liberti 
beyond valu rich rare 
no less life grace health beauti honour 
a much child e er lov father found 
a love make breath poor speech unabl 
beyond manner much i love 

cordelia 
 _asid _ what shall cordelia speak love silent

in dear high love 

cordelia

and yet sinc i sure love s
more ponder tongu

h father heart call franc who stir

 _give crown _ 

kent 
royal lear 
whom i ever honour king 
lov father master follow 
a great patron thought prayer 

lear 
the bow bent drawn make shaft 

kent 
let fall rather though fork invade
th region heart kent unmannerly
when lear mad what wouldst thou old man 
think st thou duti shall dread speak 
when power flatteri bow to plain honour bound
when majesti fall folli revers thi state 
and thi best consider check
thi hideou rash answer life judgement 
thi youngest daughter love thee least 
nor empti heart whose low sounds
reverb hollow 

lear 
kent thi life 

kent

to wage thine enemi ne er fear lose 
thi safeti motiv

out sight

th true blank thine eye

kent

thou swear st thi god vain

 _lay hand sword _ 

albani cornwal 
dear sir forbear 

kent 
kill thi physician fee bestow
upon foul diseas revok thi gift 
or whilst i vent clamour throat 
i tell thee thou dost evil 

lear 
hear recreant thine allegi hear 
sinc thou hast sought make us break vow 
which durst never yet strain pride
to come betwixt sentenc power 
which natur place bear 
our potenc made good take thi reward 
five day allot thee provis 
to shield thee disast world 
and sixth turn thi hate back
upon kingdom next day follow 
thi banish trunk found dominion 
the moment thi death away by jupit 
thi shall revok 

kent 
fare thee well king sith thu thou wilt appear 
freedom live henc banish

that justli think st hast rightli said

approv

thu kent o princ bid adieu

fal taint believ her
must faith reason without miracle
should never plant

that hath depriv grace favour

a still solicit eye tongue

hath lost like

scene ii a hall earl gloucest castl 

 enter edmund letter 

edmund 
thou natur art goddess thi law
mi servic bound wherefor i
stand plagu custom permit
th curios nation depriv 
for i twelv fourteen moonshines
lag brother whi bastard wherefor base 
when dimens well compact 
mi mind gener shape true
a honest madam issu whi brand us
with base with base bastardi base base 
who lusti stealth natur take
mor composit fierc quality
than doth within dull stale tire bed
go creat whole tribe fops
got tween asleep wake well 
legitim edgar i must land 
our father love bastard edmund
a legitim fine word legitim 
well legitim letter speed 
and invent thrive edmund base
shal top legitim i grow i prosper 
now god stand bastard 

 enter gloucest 

gloucest

ev live belov brother edgar 
hum conspiraci sleep till i wake enjoy half his

to breed when came who brought

gloucest

th wisdom natur reason thu thu yet natur finds
itself scourg sequent effect love cool friendship falls
off brother divid citi mutini countri discord in

thi villain edmund shall lose thee noth care and

strang 

 _exit _ 

edmund 
thi excel fopperi world sick in
fortun often surfeit behaviour make guilti our
disast sun moon star villain on
necess fool heavenli compuls knave thiev treachers
bi spheric predomin drunkard liar adulter an

lay goatish disposit charg star my father

und ursa major follow i rough lecher fut i
should i maidenliest star firmament

good mean toward i told i seen heard

 by mean

full suddenli fled

he conceal death

mi charact i turn all

wer pregnant potenti spurs

who prai blunt doth affect
a sauci rough constrain garb
quit natur can not flatter 
an honest mind plain must speak truth 
an take plain

harbour craft corrupt ends
than twenti silli duck observants
that stretch duti nice

under th allow great aspect 
whose influenc like wreath radiant fire
on flicker phoebu front

to strike upon misconstruct

and put upon deal man

for attempt self subdu 
and fleshment dread exploit

kent 
good king must approv common saw 
thou heaven benedict com st
to warm sun 
approach thou beacon globe 
that thi comfort beam i may
perus letter noth almost see miracles
but miseri i know ti cordelia 
who hath fortun inform d
of obscur cours and shall find time
from enorm state seek give
loss remedi all weari erwatch

 enter edgar

act iii

into scatter kingdom alreadi

 _exeunt lear kent _ 

fool 
thi brave night cool courtezan i speak propheci ere i
go 
 when priest word matter

thi propheci merlin shall make i live time

love s labour s lost

dramati persona 

 ferdinand king navarre
 berown lord attend king
 longavil 
 dumain 
 boyet lord attend princess france
 marcad 
 don adriano de armado fantast spaniard
 sir nathaniel curate
 holofern schoolmaster
 dull constable
 costard clown
 moth page armado
 a forester

 the princess of france
 rosalin ladi attend princess
 maria 
 katharin ladi attend princess
 jaquenetta countri wench

 lord attend etc 

scene navarre

act i scene i navarr the king park

ent king berown longavil dumain

 king let fame hunt live 
 live regist red upon brazen tomb 
 and grace us disgrac death 
 when spite cormor devour time 
 th endeavour present breath may buy
 that honour shall bate scyth keen edg 
 and make us heir etern 
 therefor brave conqueror are
 that war affections
 and huge armi world desir 
 our late edict shall strongli stand forc 
 navarr shall wonder world 
 our court shall littl academ 
 still contempl live art 
 you three berown dumain longavil 
 have sworn three year term live me
 my fellow scholar keep statutes
 that record schedul 
 your oath pass subscrib name 
 that hand may strike honour down
 that violat smallest branch herein 
 if arm sworn 
 subscrib deep oath keep 
 longavil i resolv ti three year fast 
 the mind shall banquet though bodi pine 
 fat paunch lean pate dainti bits
 make rich rib bankrupt quit wit 
 dumain my love lord dumain mortifi 
 the grosser manner world delights
 he throw upon gross world baser slave 
 to love wealth pomp i pine die 
 with live philosophi 
 berown i say protest 
 so much dear lieg i alreadi sworn 
 that live studi three year 
 but strict observ 
 as see woman term 
 which i hope well enrol 
 and one day week touch food 
 and one meal everi day besid 
 the i hope enrol 
 and sleep three hour night
 and seen wink day 
 when i wont think harm night 
 and make dark night half day 
 which i hope well enrol 
 o barren task hard keep 
 not see ladi studi fast sleep 
 king your oath pass pass away 
 berown let say lieg pleas 
 i swore studi grace 
 and stay court three year space 
 longavil you swore berown rest 
 berown by yea nay sir i swore jest 
 what end studi let know 
 king whi know els know 
 berown thing hid barr mean common sens 
 king ay studi god like recompens 
 berown come i swear studi 
 to know thing i forbid know 
 as thu studi i well may dine 
 when i feast expressli forbid 
 or studi meet mistress fine 
 when mistress common sens hid 
 or sworn hard keep oath 
 studi break break troth 
 if studi gain thu 
 studi know yet doth know 
 swear i ne er say 
 king these stop hinder studi quit 
 and train intellect vain delight 
 berown whi delight vain vain
 which pain purcha doth inherit pain 
 as pain pore upon book
 to seek light truth truth while
 doth fals blind eyesight look 
 light seek light doth light light beguil 
 so ere find light dark lie 
 your light grow dark lose eye 
 studi pleas eye inde 
 by fix upon fairer eye 
 who dazzl eye shall heed 
 and give light blind 
 studi like heaven gloriou sun 
 that deep search sauci look 
 small continu plodder ever 
 save base author other book 
 these earthli godfath heaven lights
 that give name everi fix star
 have profit shine nights
 than walk wot 
 too much know know nought fame 
 and everi godfath give name 
 king how well read reason read 
 dumain proceed well stop good proceed 
 longavil he weed corn still let grow weed 
 berown the spring near green gees breed 
 dumain how follow 
 berown fit place time 
 dumain in reason noth 
 berown someth rhyme 
 longavil berown like enviou sneap frost
 that bite first born infant spring 
 berown well say i proud summer boast
 befor bird caus sing 
 whi i joy abort birth 
 at christma i desir rose
 than wish snow may new fangl show 
 but like thing season grow 
 so studi late 
 climb er hous unlock littl gate 
 king well sit go home berown adieu 
 berown no good lord i sworn stay 
 and though i barbar spoke more
 than angel knowledg say 
 yet confid i keep i swore 
 and bide penanc three year day 
 give paper let read 
 and strictest decre i write name 
 king how well yield rescu thee shame 
 berown read item that woman shall come within mile of
 court hath proclaim 
 longavil four day ago 
 berown let see penalti read pain lose her
 tongu who devi penalti 
 longavil marri i 
 berown sweet lord 
 longavil to fright henc dread penalti 
 berown a danger law gentil 
 read item if man seen talk woman within
 term three year shall endur public shame the
 rest court possibl devis 
 thi articl lieg must break 
 for well know come embassy
 the french king daughter speak 
 a mild grace complet majesti 
 about surrend aquitaine
 to decrepit sick bedrid father 
 therefor articl made vain 
 or vainli come th admir princess hither 
 king what say lord whi quit forgot 
 berown so studi evermor shot 
 while doth studi would 
 it doth forget thing 
 and hath thing hunteth 
 ti town fire lost 
 king we must forc dispens decre 
 she must lie mere necess 
 berown necess make us forsworn
 three thousand time within three year space 
 for everi man affect born 
 not might mast red special grace 
 if i break faith word shall speak 
 i forsworn mere necess 
 so law larg i write name subscrib 
 and break least degree
 stand attaind etern shame 
 suggest 
 but i believ although i seem loath 
 i last last keep oath 
 but quick recreat grant 
 king ay our court know haunted
 with refin travel spain 
 a man world new fashion plant 
 that hath mint phrase brain 
 one music vain tongue
 doth ravish like enchant harmoni 
 a man complement right wrong
 have chose umpir mutini 
 thi child fanci armado hight 
 for interim studi shall relat 
 in high born word worth mani knight
 from tawni spain lost world debat 
 how delight lord i know i

 and i use minstrelsi 
 berown armado illustri wight 
 a man fire new word fashion knight 
 longavil costard swain shall sport 
 and studi three year short

act ii scene ii the park

ent princess of franc three attend ladi 
rosalin maria katharin boyet two lords

 boyet now madam summon dearest spirit 
 consid king father send 
 to send embassi 
 yourself held preciou world esteem 
 to parley sole inheritor
 of perfect man may owe 
 matchless navarr plea less weight
 than aquitain dowri queen 
 be prodig dear grace
 as natur make grace dear 
 when starv gener world beside
 and prodig gave 
 princess of franc good lord boyet beauti though mean 
 need paint flourish prais 
 beauti bought judgment eye 
 not utt red base sale chapmen tongu 
 i less proud hear tell worth
 than much will count wise
 in spend wit prais mine 
 but task tasker good boyet 
 you ignor tell fame
 doth nois abroad navarr hath made vow 
 till pain studi shall outwear three year 
 no woman may approach silent court 
 therefor seemeth need cours 
 befor enter forbidden gate 
 to know pleasur behalf 
 bold worthi singl you
 as best move fair solicitor 
 tell daughter king franc 
 on seriou busi crave quick dispatch 
 importun person confer grace 
 hast signifi much attend 
 like humbl visag suitor high 
 boyet proud employ willingli i go 
 princess of franc all pride will pride 
 exit boyet
 who votari love lord 
 that vow fellow virtuou duke 
 first lord lord longavil one 
 princess of franc know man 
 maria i know madam marriag feast 
 between lord perigort beauteou heir
 of jaqu falconbridg solemnized
 in normandi saw i longavil 
 a man sovereign part peerless esteem 
 well fit art gloriou arm 
 noth becom ill would well 
 the soil fair virtu gloss 
 if virtu gloss stain soil 
 is sharp wit match blunt 
 whose edg hath power cut whose still wills
 it none spare come within power 
 princess of franc some merri mock lord belik 
 maria they say humour know 
 princess of franc such short liv wit wither grow 
 who rest 
 katharin the young dumain well accomplish youth 
 of virtu love virtu love 
 most power harm least know ill 
 for hath wit make ill shape good 
 and shape win grace though wit 
 i saw duke alencon 
 and much littl good i saw
 is report great worthi 
 rosalin anoth student time
 wa i heard truth 
 berown call merrier man 
 within limit becom mirth 
 i never spent hour talk withal 
 hi eye beget occas wit 
 for everi object one doth catch
 the turn mirth move jest 
 which fair tongu conceit expositor 
 deliv apt graciou words
 that age ear play truant tale 
 and younger hear quit ravish 
 so sweet volubl discours

 that everi one hath garnished
 with bedeck ornament prais 
 first lord here come boyet 

 re enter boyet

 princess of franc now admitt lord

 and competitor oath

 to let enter unpeopl hous

 attendants

 els

 katharin did i danc brabant 
 berown i know

 berown you must quick

 berown your wit hot speed fast twill tire

 katharin the hour fool ask

 katharin fair fall face cover 
 berown and send mani lover 
 katharin amen none 
 berown nay i gone 
 king madam father doth intimate
 the payment hundr thousand crown 
 be one half entir sum
 disburs father war 
 but say neither 
 receiv sum yet remain unpaid
 a hundr thousand sureti 
 one part aquitain bound us 
 although valu money worth 
 if king father restore
 but one half unsatisfi 
 we give right aquitain 
 and hold fair friendship majesti 
 but seem littl purposeth 
 for doth demand repaid
 a hundr thousand crown demand 
 on payment hundr thousand crown 
 to titl live aquitain 
 which much rather depart withal 
 and money father lent 
 than aquitain geld 
 dear princess request far
 from reason yield fair self make
 a yield gainst reason breast 
 and go well satisfi franc 
 princess of franc you king father much wrong 
 and wrong reput name 
 in unseem confess receipt
 of hath faith paid 
 king i protest i never heard 
 and prove i repay back
 or yield aquitain

 for sum special officers
 of charl father

 where specialti bound

 make tender thi true worthi

act iii scene i the park

ent armado moth

 armado warbl child make passion sens hear 
 moth sing concolinel 
 armado sweet air go tender year take key give
 enlarg swain bring festin hither i must
 employ letter love 
 moth master win love french brawl 
 armado how meanest thou brawl french 
 moth no complet master jig tune tongu s
 end canari feet humour turn your
 eyelid sigh note sing note sometim the
 throat swallow love sing love sometime
 nose snuff love smell love 
 hat penthous like er shop eye with
 arm cross thin belli doublet like rabbit a
 spit hand pocket like man old
 paint keep long one tune snip away 
 these complement humour betray nice
 wench would betray without make men
 note note affect 
 armado how hast thou purchas experi 
 moth by penni observ 
 armado but o o 
 moth the hobbi hors forgot 
 armado call st thou love hobbi hors 
 moth no master hobbi hors colt love
 perhap hackney but forgot love 
 armado almost i 
 moth neglig student learn heart 
 armado by heart heart boy 
 moth and heart master three i prove

 moth a man i live without upon the
 instant by heart love heart can not come by
 heart love heart love with
 heart love heart you
 can not enjoy 
 armado i three 
 moth and three time much yet noth

 moth a messag well sympathiz hors ambassador an
 ass

 moth marri sir must send ass upon hors is
 slow gait but i go

 moth as swift lead sir

 is lead metal heavi dull slow 
 moth minim honest master rather master 
 armado i say lead slow 
 moth you swift sir say 
 is lead slow fir gun

 armado a acut juven volabl free grace 
 by thi favour sweet welkin i must sigh thi face 
 most rude melancholi valour give thee place 
 my herald return 

 re enter moth costard

 enter berowne

 berown my good knave costard exceedingli well met

 remuner

 berown whi three farth worth silk

 as thou wilt win favour good knave

 costard when would done sir 
 berown thi afternoon

scen ii the park

from shoot within enter holofern sir nathaniel dull

 nathaniel veri rever sport truli done testimoni of
 good conscienc

 buck first head

 dull twa haud credo twa pricket

 via way explic facer

 book

 duller part

 enter king paper

 king ay 
 berown shot heaven proce sweet cupid thou hast thump d
 thi bird bolt left pap in faith secret 
 king read 
 so sweet kiss golden sun give not
 to fresh morn drop upon rose 
 as thi eye beam fresh ray smote
 the night dew cheek flow 
 nor shine silver moon one half bright
 through transpar bosom deep

 thou shin st everi tear i weep 
 no drop coach doth carri thee 
 so ridest thou triumph woe 
 do behold tear swell 
 and thi glori grief show 
 but love thyself thou wilt keep
 my tear glass still make weep 
 o queen queen far dost thou excel
 no thought think tongu mortal tell

 sweet leav shade folli who come 
 step asid

 what longavil read listen car

 where sever worthi make one digniti

 lend flourish gentl tongu

 might shake fifti look eye

 if learn eye look

 king o paradox black badg hell

 king but are love

 our love law faith torn

 longavil o author proceed 
 some trick quillet cheat devil 
 dumain some salv perjuri 
 berown ti need 
 have affect men arm 
 consid first swear unto 
 to fast studi see woman 
 flat treason gainst kingli state youth 
 say fast your stomach young 
 and abstin engend maladi 
 and vow studi lord 
 in forsworn book 
 can still dream pore thereon look 
 for would lord 
 have found ground studi excellence
 without beauti woman face 
 from women eye doctrin i deriv 
 they ground book academ 
 from whenc doth spring true promethean fire 
 whi univers plod poison up
 the nimbl spirit arteri 
 as motion long action tires
 the sinewi vigour travel 
 now look woman face 
 you forsworn use eye 
 and studi causer vow 
 for author world
 teach beauti woman eye

 and learn likewis 
 then see ladi eye 
 with 
 do likewis see learn 
 o made vow studi lord 
 and vow forsworn book 
 for would lieg 
 in leaden contempl found out
 such fieri number prompt eyes
 of beauti tutor enrich 
 other slow art entir keep brain 
 and therefor find barren practis 
 scarc show harvest heavi toil 
 but love first learn ladi eye 
 live alon immur brain

 cours swift thought everi power 
 and give everi power doubl power 
 abov function offic 
 it add preciou see eye 
 a lover eye gaze eagl blind 
 a lover ear hear lowest sound 
 when suspici head theft stopp 
 love feel soft sensible
 than tender horn cockl snail 
 love tongu prove dainti bacchu gross tast 
 for valour love hercul 
 still climb tree hesperid 
 subtl sphinx sweet musical
 as bright apollo lute strung hair 
 and love speak voic gods
 make heaven drowsi harmoni 
 never durst poet touch pen write
 until ink temp red love sigh 
 o line would ravish savag ear 
 and plant tyrant mild humil 
 from women eye doctrin i deriv 
 they sparkl still right promethean fire 
 they book art academ 
 that show contain nourish world 
 els none aught prove excel 
 then fool women forswear 
 or keep sworn prove fool 
 for wisdom sake word men love 
 or love sake word love men 
 or men sake author women 
 or women sake men men

 or els lose keep oath

 for chariti fulfil law 
 and sever love chariti

 shall resolv woo girl franc

 some entertain tent 
 berown first park let us conduct thither 
 then homeward everi man attach hand
 of fair mistress in afternoon
 we strang pastim solac 
 such short time shape 
 for revel danc mask merri hour 
 forerun fair love strew way flower 
 king away away no time shall omitted

 berown allon allon sow cockl reap corn 
 and justic alway whirl equal measur 
 light wench may prove plagu men forsworn 
 if copper buy better treasur exeunt

act v scene i the park

ent holofern sir nathaniel dull

 holofern sati quod sufficit 
 nathaniel i prais god sir your reason dinner have
 sharp sententi pleasant without scurril witty
 without affect audaci without impud learn without
 opinion strang without heresi i convers quondam
 day companion king intitul nomin 
 call don adriano de armado 
 holofern novi hominem tanquam te hi humour lofti his
 discours peremptori tongu file eye ambiti his
 gait majest gener behaviour vain ridicul and
 thrason he pick spruce affect odd 
 peregrin i may call 
 nathaniel a singular choic epithet 
 draw tabl book 
 holofern he draweth thread verbos finer than
 stapl argument i abhor fanat phantasim 
 insoci point devis companion racker of
 orthographi speak dout fine say doubt 
 det pronounc debt e b e 
 he clepeth calf cauf half hauf neighbour vocatur
 nebour neigh abbrevi ne thi abhomin he
 would call abbomin it insinuateth insani ne
 intelligi domin make frantic lunat 
 nathaniel lau deo bone intelligo 
 holofern bone bone bene priscian little
 scratch twill serv 

 enter armado moth costard

 for fair endeavour entreat 
 out new sad soul vouchsafe
 in rich wisdom excus hide
 the liber opposit spirit 
 if boldli born ourselves
 in convers breath gentleness
 wa guilti farewel worthi lord 
 a heavi heart bear nimbl tongu 
 excus come short thanks
 for great suit easili obtain 
 king the extrem part time extrem forms
 all caus purpos speed 
 and often loos decides
 that long process could arbitr 
 and though mourn brow progeny
 forbid smile courtesi love
 the holi suit fain would convinc 
 yet sinc love argument first foot 
 let cloud sorrow justl it
 from purpo sinc wail friend lost
 is much wholesom profitable
 as rejoic friend newli found 
 princess of franc i understand grief doubl 
 berown honest plain word best pierc ear grief 
 and badg understand king 
 for fair sake neglect time 
 play foul play oath beauti ladi 
 hath much deform us fashion humours
 even oppos end intent 
 and us hath seem ridicul 
 as love full unbefit strain 
 all wanton child skip vain 
 form eye therefor like eye 
 full strang shape habit form 
 vari subject eye doth roll
 to everi vari object glanc 
 which parti coat presenc loos love
 put us heavenli eyes
 have misbecom oath graviti 
 those heavenli eye look faults
 suggest us make therefor ladi 
 our love error love makes
 is likewis we prove fals 
 by fals ever true
 to make us fair ladi 
 and even falsehood sin 
 thu purifi turn grace

 and maiden council rate them
 at courtship pleasant jest courtesi

 have therefor met loves
 in fashion like merriment

 to make world without end bargain

scene ii a camp near forr 

 alarum within enter king duncan malcolm donalbain lennox with
 attend meet bleed captain 

duncan 
what bloodi man he report 
a seemeth plight revolt
th newest state 

malcolm 
thi sergeant
who like good hardi soldier fought
 gainst captiv hail brave friend 
say king knowledg broil
a thou didst leav 

soldier 
doubt stood 
a two spent swimmer cling together
and choke art the merciless macdonwald
 worthi rebel that
th multipli villaini nature
do swarm upon western isles
of kern gallowglass suppli 
and fortun damn quarrel smile 
show like rebel whore but weak 
for brave macbeth well deserv name 
disdain fortun brandish steel 
which smok bloodi execut 
like valour minion carv passag 
till fac slave 
which ne er shook hand bade farewel 
till unseam nave chop 
and fix head upon battlement 

duncan 
o valiant cousin worthi gentleman 

soldier 
a whenc sun gin reflection
shipwrack storm dire thunder break 
so spring whenc comfort seem come
discomfort swell mark king scotland mark 
no sooner justic valour arm 
compel skip kern trust heel 
but norweyan lord survey vantag 
with furbish arm new suppli men 
began fresh assault 

duncan 
dismay this
our captain macbeth banquo 

soldier 
ye 
a sparrow eagl hare lion 
if i say sooth i must report were
a cannon overcharg doubl crack 
so they
doubl redoubl stroke upon foe 
except meant bath reek wound 
or memor anoth golgotha 
i can not tell 
but i faint gash cri help 

duncan 
so well thi word becom thee thi wound 
they smack honour go get surgeon

confront self comparison 
point point rebelli arm gainst arm 
curb lavish spirit conclud 
the victori fell us

sweno norway king crave composit

til disburs saint colm inch

that

th sound fair i th name truth

which outwardli ye show my nobl partner
y greet present grace great prediction
of nobl royal hope 
that seem rapt withal to speak 
if look seed time 
and say grain grow 
speak neither beg fear
your favour hate

hail

but cawdor the thane cawdor live 
a prosper gentleman king
stand within prospect belief

y owe strang intellig why
upon blast heath stop way
with prophet greet speak i charg

in deepest consequ 
cousin word i pray

a happi prologu swell act
of imperi theme i thank gentlemen

cannot ill can not good if ill 
whi hath given earnest success 
commenc truth i thane cawdor 
if good i yield suggestion
whos horrid imag doth unfix hair 
and make seat heart knock rib 
against use natur present fears
ar less horribl imagin 
mi thought whose murder yet fantast 
shake singl state man
that function smother surmis 
and noth

without stir

time hour run roughest day

with thing forgotten kind gentlemen pains

our free heart

 enter macbeth banquo ross angu 

o worthiest cousin 
the sin ingratitud even now
wa heavi thou art far 
that swiftest wing recompens slow
to overtak thee would thou hadst less deserv 
that proport thank payment
might mine i left say 
more thi due pay 

macbeth 
the servic loyalti i owe 
in pay your high part
i receiv duti duties
ar throne state children servant 
which everything
saf toward love honour 

duncan 
welcom hither 
i begun plant thee labour
to make thee full grow nobl banquo 
that hast less deserv must known
no less done let infold thee
and hold thee heart 

banquo 
there i grow 
the harvest 

duncan 
mi plenteou joy 
wanton ful seek hide themselves
in drop sorrow son kinsmen thane 
and whose place nearest know 
we establish estat upon
our eldest malcolm name hereafter
th princ cumberland honour must
not unaccompani invest 
but sign nobl like star shall shine
on deserv from henc inver 
and bind us 

macbeth 
the rest labour us 
i harbing make joyful
th hear wife approach 
so humbl take leav 

duncan 
mi worthi cawdor 

macbeth 
 _asid _ the princ cumberland that step
on i must fall els erleap 
for way lie star hide fire 
let light see black deep desir 
the eye wink hand yet let 
which eye fear done see

scene v inver a room macbeth castl 

 enter ladi macbeth read letter 

ladi macbeth 
 they met day success i learn the
perfect st report mortal knowledg when i
burn desir question made air 
into vanish while i stood rapt wonder came
miss king hail thane cawdor which
titl weird sister salut refer the
com time hail king shalt thi i thought
good deliv thee dearest partner great thou
might st lose due rejoic ignor what
great promi thee lay thi heart farewel 

glami thou art cawdor shalt be
what thou art promi yet i fear thi natur 
it full th milk human kindness
to catch nearest way thou wouldst great 
art without ambit without
th ill attend what thou wouldst highli 
that wouldst thou holili wouldst play fals 
and yet wouldst wrongli win thou dst great glami 
that cri thu thou must thou 
and rather thou dost fear 
than wishest undon hie thee hither 
that i may pour spirit thine ear 
and chastis valour tongue
al imped thee golden round 
which fate metaphys aid doth seem
to thee crown withal

 _exit messeng _ 

the raven hoarse
that croak fatal entranc duncan
und battlement come spirits
that tend mortal thought unsex 
and fill crown toe top full
of direst cruelti make thick blood 
stop th access passag remors 
that compuncti visit nature
shak fell purpos keep peac between
th effect come woman breast 
and take milk gall murd ring minist 
wherev sightless substances
y wait natur mischief come thick night 
and pall thee dunnest smoke hell
that keen knife see wound make 
nor heaven peep blanket dark
to cri hold hold 

 enter macbeth

thi ignor present i feel now
th futur instant

mi dearest love 
duncan come tonight

and goe henc 

macbeth 
tomorrow purpos 

ladi macbeth 
o never
shal sun morrow see 
your face thane book men
may read strang matter to beguil time 
look like time bear welcom eye 
your hand tongu look like innoc flower 
but serpent he coming
must provid shall put
thi night great busi dispatch 
which shall night day come
g sole sovereign sway masterdom 

macbeth 
we speak

to alter favour ever fear 
leav rest

scene vii the a lobbi castl 

 hautboy torch enter pass sewer divers
 servant dish servic then enter macbeth 

macbeth 
if done ti done twere well
it done quickli if th assassination
could trammel consequ catch
with surceas success blow
might end 
but upon bank shoal time 
we jump life come but cases
w still judgement teach
bloodi instruct taught return
to plagu th inventor thi even hand justice
commend th ingredi poison chalice
to lip he doubl trust 
first i kinsman subject 
strong deed host 
who murder shut door 
not bear knife besid duncan
hath born faculti meek hath been
so clear great offic virtues
wil plead like angel trumpet tongu against
th deep damnat take 
and piti like nake new born babe 
stride blast heaven cherubin hor d
upon sightless courier air 
shall blow horrid deed everi eye 
that tear shall drown wind i spur
to prick side intent only
vault ambit erleap itself
and fall th 

 enter ladi macbeth 

how news 

ladi macbeth 
he almost supp whi left chamber 

macbeth 
hath ask 

ladi macbeth 
know 

macbeth 
we proceed busi 
he hath honour late i bought
golden opinion sort peopl 
which would worn newest gloss 
not cast asid soon 

ladi macbeth 
wa hope drunk
wherein dress hath slept sinc 
and wake look green pale
at freeli from time

i dagger i see 
the handl toward hand come let clutch thee 
i thee yet i see thee still 
art thou fatal vision sensible
to feel sight art thou but
a dagger mind fals creation 
proceed heat oppress brain 
i see thee yet form palpable
a i draw 
thou marshal st way i go 
and instrument i use 
mine eye made fool sens 
or els worth rest i see thee still 
and thi blade dudgeon gout blood 
which there thing 
it bloodi busi informs
thu mine eye now er one half world
natur seem dead wick dream abuse
th curtain sleep witchcraft celebrates
pal hecat ring wither murder

with tarquin ravish stride toward design
mov like ghost thou sure firm set earth

thi stone prate whereabout 
and take present horror time 
which suit while i threat live 
word heat deed cold breath give

scene vi forr a room palac

lennox 
mi former speech hit thought 
which interpret farther i say 
thing strang born the graciou duncan
wa piti macbeth marri dead 
and right valiant banquo walk late 
whom may say pleas fleanc kill 
for fleanc fled men must walk late 
who can not want thought monstrous
it malcolm donalbain
to kill graciou father damn fact 
how griev macbeth straight 
in piou rage two delinqu tear
that slave drink thrall sleep 
wa nobli done ay wise 
for twould anger heart aliv 
to hear men deni so i say 
he born thing well i think 
that duncan son key
 as pleas heaven shall find
what twere kill father fleanc 
but peac broad word caus fail d
hi presenc tyrant feast i hear 
macduff live disgrac sir tell
wher bestow 

lord 
the son duncan 
from tyrant hold due birth 
live english court receiv d
of piou edward grace
that malevol fortun nothing
tak high respect thither macduff
i gone pray holi king upon aid
to wake northumberland warlik siward
that help him above
to ratifi work may again
g tabl meat sleep night 
free feast banquet bloodi knive 
do faith homag receiv free honour 
all pine and report
hath exasper king he
prepar attempt war

sent macduff 

lord

that clog answer

may soon return suffer country
und hand accur

scene iii england befor king palac 

 enter malcolm macduff 

malcolm 
let us seek desol shade there
weep sad bosom empti 

macduff 
let us rather
hold fast mortal sword like good men 
bestrid fall n birthdom each new morn
new widow howl new orphan cri new sorrows
strik heaven face resounds
a felt scotland yell out
lik syllabl dolour 

malcolm 
what i believ i wail 
what know believ i redress 
a i shall find time friend i 
what spoke may perchanc 
thi tyrant whose sole name blister tongu 
wa thought honest love well 
he hath touch yet i young something
y may deserv wisdom
to offer weak poor innoc lamb
to appeas angri god 

macduff 
i treacher 

malcolm 
but macbeth 
a good virtuou natur may recoil
in imperi charg but i shall crave pardon 
that thought can not transpos 
angel bright still though brightest fell 
though thing foul would wear brow grace 
yet grace must still look 

macduff 
i lost hope 

malcolm 
perchanc even i find doubt 
whi raw left wife child 
those preciou motiv strong knot love 
without leav take i pray 
let jealousi dishonour 
but mine safeti you may rightli 
whatev i shall think 

macduff 
bleed bleed poor countri 
great tyranni lay thou thi basi sure 
for good dare check thee wear thou thi wrong 
the titl affeer fare thee well lord 
i would villain thou think st
for whole space tyrant grasp
and rich east boot 

malcolm 
be offend 
i speak absolut fear 
i think countri sink beneath yoke 
it weep bleed new day gash
i ad wound i think withal 
there would hand uplift right 
and graciou england i offer
of goodli thousand 
when i shall tread upon tyrant head 
or wear sword yet poor country
shal vice 
more suffer sundri way ever 
bi shall succeed 

macduff 
what 

malcolm 
it i mean i know
al particular vice grafted
that shall open black macbeth
wil seem pure snow poor state
esteem lamb compar d
with confineless harm 

macduff 
not legions
of horrid hell come devil damn d
in evil top macbeth 

malcolm 
i grant bloodi 
luxuri avarici fals deceit 
sudden malici smack everi sin
that name bottom none 
in voluptu wive daughter 
your matron maid could fill up
th cistern lust desire
al contin impedi would erbear 
that oppos better macbeth
than one reign 

macduff 
boundless intemperance
in natur tyranni hath been
th untim empti happi throne 
and fall mani king but fear yet
to take upon may
convey pleasur spaciou plenti 
and yet seem cold time may hoodwink 
we will dame enough can not be
that vultur devour many
a great dedic 
find inclin 

malcolm 
with grows
in ill compo affect such
a staunchless avaric i king 
i cut nobl land 
desir jewel hous 
and would sauce
to make hunger i forge
quarrel unjust good loyal 
destroy wealth 

macduff 
thi avarice
stick deeper grow pernici root
than summer seem lust hath been
th sword slain king yet fear 
scotland hath foison fill 
of mere all portabl 
with grace weigh 

malcolm 
but i none king becom grace 
a justic veriti temp ranc stabl 
bounti persever merci lowli 
devot patienc courag fortitud 
i relish abound
in divis sever crime 
act mani way nay i power i should
pour sweet milk concord hell 
uproar univers peac confound
al uniti earth 

macduff 
o scotland scotland 

malcolm 
if one fit govern speak 
i i spoken 

macduff 
fit govern 
no live o nation miser 
with untitl tyrant bloodi scepter 
when shalt thou see thi wholesom day 
sinc truest issu thi throne
bi interdict stand accu 
and blasphem breed thi royal father
wa saint king the queen bore thee 
oft ner upon knee feet 
di everi day live fare thee well 
these evil thou repeat st upon thyself
hav banish scotland o breast 
thi hope end 

malcolm 
macduff nobl passion 
child integr hath soul
wip black scrupl reconcil thoughts
to thi good truth honour devilish macbeth
bi mani train hath sought win me
into power modest wisdom pluck me
from credul hast god above
d thee even now
i put thi direct and
unspeak mine detract abjure
th taint blame i laid upon 
for stranger natur i yet
unknown woman never forsworn 
scarc covet mine 
at time broke faith would betray
th devil fellow delight
no less truth life first fals speaking
wa upon what i truli 
i thine poor countri command 
whither inde thi approach 
old siward ten thousand warlik men 
alreadi point set forth 
now togeth chanc goodness
b like warrant quarrel whi silent 

macduff 
such welcom unwelcom thing once
 ti hard reconcil

th great assay art touch

they present amend

seyton i sick heart

scen vienna

act i scene i the duke s palace

ent duke escalu lord attendants

 duke escalu 
 escalu my lord 
 duke of govern properti unfold
 would seem affect speech discours 
 sinc i put know science
 exce list advice
 my strength give remains
 but suffici worth abl 
 and let work the natur peopl 
 our citi institut terms
 for common justic pregnant in
 as art practic hath enrich any
 that rememb there commiss 
 from would warp call hither 
 i say bid come us angelo exit attendant
 what figur us think bear 
 for must know special soul
 elect absenc suppli 
 lent terror dress love 
 and given deput organs
 of power what think 
 escalu if vienna worth
 to undergo ampl grace honour 
 it lord angelo 

 enter angelo

 duke look come 
 angelo alway obedi grace 
 i come know pleasur 
 duke angelo 
 there kind charact thi life
 that th observ doth thi history
 fulli unfold thyself thi belongings
 are thine proper waste
 thyself upon thi virtu thee 
 heaven doth us torch 
 not light virtues
 did go forth us twere alike
 as spirit fine touch d
 but fine issu natur never lends
 the smallest scrupl excellence
 but like thrifti goddess determines
 herself glori creditor 
 both thank use but i bend speech
 to one part advertis 
 hold therefor angelo 
 in remov thou full ourself 
 mortal merci vienna
 live thi tongu heart old escalu 
 though first question thi secondari 
 take thi commiss 
 angelo now good lord 
 let test made metal 
 befor nobl great figure
 be stamp upon 
 duke no evas 
 we leaven prepar choice
 proceed therefor take honour 
 our hast henc quick condition
 that prefer leav unquest d
 matter need valu we shall write 
 as time concern shall importun 
 how goe us look know
 what doth befal so fare well 
 to th hope execut i leav you
 of commiss 
 angelo yet give leav lord 
 that may bring someth way 
 duke my hast may admit 
 nor need mine honour do
 with scrupl scope mine 
 so enforc qualifi laws
 as soul seem good give hand 
 i privili away i love peopl 
 but like stage eye 
 though well i relish well
 their loud applaus ave vehement 
 nor i think man safe discretion
 that affect onc fare well 
 angelo the heaven give safeti purpos 
 escalu lead forth bring back happi 
 duke i thank fare well exit
 escalu i shall desir sir give leave
 to free speech concern me
 to look bottom place 
 a pow r i strength nature
 i yet instruct 
 angelo ti let us withdraw togeth 
 and may soon satisfact have
 touch point 
 escalu i wait upon honour exeunt

 enter provost claudio juliet offic 
 lucio following

 bear prison i commit

 make us pay offenc weight
 the word heaven 
 on yet still ti

 claudio from much liberti lucio liberti

 so everi scope immoder use
 turn restraint our natur pursu 
 like rat ravin proper bane

 certain creditor yet say truth i lief
 fopperi freedom moral imprison 
 what thi offenc claudio

 lucio what murder

 lucio lecheri 
 claudio call 
 provost away sir must go 
 claudio one word good friend lucio word 
 lucio a hundr good is lecheri look d
 
 claudio thu stand upon true contract
 i got possess julietta bed 
 you know ladi fast wife 
 save denunci lack
 of outward order came 
 onli propag dow r
 remain coffer friend 
 from thought meet hide love
 till time made us but chances
 the stealth mutual entertain 
 with charact gross writ juliet 
 lucio with child perhap 
 claudio unhappili even 
 and new deputi duke 
 whether fault glimps new 
 or whether bodi public be
 a hors whereon governor doth ride 
 who newli seat may know
 he command let straight feel spur 
 whether tyranni place 
 or emin fill 
 i stagger but new governor
 awak enrol penalties
 which like unscour armour hung th wall
 so long nineteen zodiac gone round
 and none worn name 
 now put drowsi neglect act
 freshli ti sure name 
 lucio i warrant thi head stand tickl thy
 shoulder milkmaid love may sigh 
 send duke appeal 
 claudio i done found 
 i prithe lucio kind servic 
 thi day sister cloister enter 
 and receiv approb

 to strict deputi bid assay

 there prone speechless dialect
 such move men besid hath prosper art
 when play reason discours 
 and well persuad

 els would stand grievou imposit the

scen iii a monastery

ent duke friar thomas

 duke no holi father throw away thought 
 believ dribbl dart love
 can pierc complet bosom whi i desir thee
 to give secret harbour hath purpose
 more grave wrinkl aim ends
 of burn youth 
 friar may grace speak 
 duke my holi sir none better know you
 how i ever lov life remov 
 and held idl price haunt assemblies
 where youth cost witless braveri keep 
 i deliv lord angelo 
 a man strictur firm abstin 
 my absolut power place vienna 
 and suppos travel poland 
 for i strew common ear 
 and receiv now piou sir 
 you demand i 
 friar gladli lord 
 duke we strict statut bite law 
 the need bit curb headstrong steed 
 which fourteen year let slip 
 even like ergrown lion cave 
 that goe prey now fond father 
 have bound threat ning twig birch 
 onli stick children sight
 for terror use time rod
 becom mock fear decre 
 dead inflict dead 
 and liberti pluck justic nose 
 the babi beat nurs quit athwart
 goe decorum 
 friar it rest grace
 to unloos tie justic plea 
 and dread would seem d
 than lord angelo 
 duke i fear dread 
 sith twa fault give peopl scope 
 twould tyranni strike gall them
 for i bid bid done 
 when evil deed permiss pass
 and punish therefor inde father 
 i angelo impo offic 
 who may th ambush name strike home 
 and yet natur never fight
 to slander and behold sway 
 i twere brother order 
 visit princ peopl therefor i prithe 
 suppli habit instruct me
 how i may formal person bear me
 like true friar moe reason action
 at leisur shall i render 
 onli one lord angelo precis 
 stand guard envi scarc confesses
 that blood flow appetite
 is bread stone henc shall see 
 if power chang purpos seemer exeunt

scen iv a nunnery

ent isabella francisca

 isabella and nun farther privileg 
 francisca are larg enough 
 isabella ye truli i speak desir

 upon sisterhood votarist saint clare 
 lucio within ho peac place 
 isabella who call 
 francisca it man voic gentl isabella 
 turn key know busi 
 you may i may yet unsworn 
 when vow must speak men
 but presenc prioress 
 then speak must show face 
 or show face must speak 
 he call i pray answer exit francisca
 isabella peac prosper who call 

 enter lucio

 lucio hail virgin cheek roses
 proclaim less can stead me
 as bring sight isabella 
 a novic place fair sister
 to unhappi brother claudio 
 isabella whi unhappi brother let ask
 the rather i must make know
 i isabella sister 
 lucio gentl fair brother kindli greet 
 not weari prison 
 isabella woe for 
 lucio for might judg 
 he receiv punish thank 
 he hath got friend child 
 isabella sir make stori 
 lucio it true 
 i would though ti familiar sin
 with maid seem lapw jest 
 tongu far heart play virgin 
 i hold thing enski saint 
 by renounc immort spirit 
 and talk sincer 
 as saint 
 isabella you blasphem good mock 
 lucio do believ few truth ti thu 
 your brother lover embrac 
 as feed grow full blossom time
 that seed bare fallow brings
 to teem foison even plenteou womb
 expresseth full tilth husbandri 
 isabella some one child my cousin juliet 
 lucio is cousin 
 isabella adoptedli school maid chang names
 by vain though apt affect 
 lucio she 
 isabella o let marri 
 lucio thi point 
 the duke strang gone henc 
 bore mani gentlemen one 
 in hand hope action learn 
 by know nerv state 
 hi give infinit distance
 from true meant design upon place 
 and full line author 
 govern lord angelo man whose blood
 is snow broth one never feels
 the wanton sting motion sens 
 but doth rebat blunt natur edge
 with profit mind studi fast 
 he give fear use liberti 
 which long run hideou law 
 as mice lion hath pick act
 under whose heavi sens brother life
 fall forfeit arrest 
 and follow close rigour statute
 to make exampl all hope gone 
 unless grace fair prayer
 to soften angelo and pith business
 twixt poor brother 
 isabella doth seek life 
 lucio ha censur him
 alreadi i hear provost hath
 a warrant execut 
 isabella ala poor abil me
 to good 
 lucio assay pow r 
 isabella my power ala i doubt 
 lucio our doubt traitor 
 and make us lose good oft might win
 by fear attempt go lord angelo 
 and let learn know maiden sue 
 men give like god weep kneel 
 all petit freeli theirs
 as would owe 
 isabella i see i 
 lucio but speedili 
 isabella i straight 
 no longer stay give mother
 notic affair i humbl thank 
 commend brother soon night
 i send certain word success 
 lucio i take leav 
 isabella good sir adieu exeunt

act ii scene i a hall angelo s house

ent angelo escalu justic provost offic other
attendants

 angelo we must make scarecrow law 
 set fear bird prey 
 and let keep one shape till custom make it
 their perch terror 
 escalu ay yet
 let us keen rather cut little
 than fall bruis death ala gentleman 
 whom i would save nobl father 
 let honour know 
 whom i believ strait virtu 
 that work affect 
 had time coher place place wish 
 or resolut act blood
 could attain th effect purpose
 whether sometim life
 err point censur 
 and pull law upon 
 angelo ti one thing tempt escalu 
 anoth thing fall i deny
 the juri pass prison life 
 may sworn twelv thief two
 guiltier tri what open made justic 
 that justic seiz what know laws
 that thiev pass thiev ti pregnant 
 the jewel find stoop take 
 becaus see see
 we tread upon never think 
 you may extenu offence
 for i fault rather tell 
 when i censur offend 
 let mine judgment pattern death 
 and noth come partial sir must die 
 escalu be wisdom 
 angelo where provost 
 provost here like honour 
 angelo see claudio
 be execut nine morrow morn 
 bring confessor let prepar 
 for utmost pilgrimag exit provost
 escalu asid well heaven forgiv forgiv us 
 some rise sin virtu fall 
 some run break ice answer none 
 and condemn fault alon 

 enter elbow offic froth pompey

 elbow come bring away good peopl a
 commonw noth use abus common hous 
 i know law bring away 
 angelo how sir what name matter 
 elbow if pleas honour i poor duke constabl 
 name elbow i lean upon justic sir bring
 good honour two notori benefactor 
 angelo benefactor well benefactor are not
 malefactor 
 elbow if pleas honour i know well but
 precis villain i sure void all
 profan world good christian ought 
 escalu thi come well wise offic 
 angelo go qualiti elbow name why
 dost thou speak elbow

 pleas honour hear

 for i would plead i must

 at war twixt

 i beseech let fault 
 and brother

 whi everi fault condemn ere done 
 mine cipher function 
 to fine fault whose fine stand record 
 and let go actor

 i brother heaven keep honour 
 lucio to isabella give er entreat

 you could tame tongu desir 
 to i say

 if heart touch remorse
 as mine

 and prison 
 lucio to isabella ay touch vein 
 angelo your brother forfeit law 
 and wast word 
 isabella ala ala 
 whi soul forfeit 
 and he might vantag best took
 found remedi how would be
 if he top judgment should
 but judg o think 
 and merci breath within lip 
 like man new made 
 angelo be content fair maid 
 it law i condemn brother 
 were kinsman brother son 
 it thu he must die morrow 
 isabella to morrow o sudden spare spare 
 he prepar death even kitchens
 we kill fowl season shall serv heaven
 with less respect minister
 to gross selv good good lord bethink 
 who hath die offenc 
 there mani commit 
 lucio asid ay well said 
 angelo the law hath dead though hath slept 
 those mani dar evil
 if first th edict infringe
 had answer deed now ti awak 
 take note done like prophet 
 look glass show futur evil 
 either remiss new conceiv 
 and progress hatch born 
 are success degre 
 but live end 
 isabella yet show piti 
 angelo i show i show justic 
 for i piti i know 
 which dismiss offenc would gall 
 and right answer one foul wrong 
 live act anoth be satisfi 
 your brother die morrow content 
 isabella so must first give sentenc 
 and suffer o excellent
 to giant strength but tyrannous
 to use like giant 
 lucio to isabella that well said 
 isabella could great men thunder
 as jove jove would never quiet 
 for everi pelt petti officer
 would use heaven thunder 
 noth thunder merci heaven 
 thou rather thi sharp sulphur bolt 
 split unwedg gnarl oak
 than soft myrtl but man proud man 
 dress littl brief author 
 most ignor assur 
 hi glassi essenc like angri ape 
 play fantast trick high heaven
 as make angel weep speen 
 would laugh mortal 
 lucio to isabella o wench he relent 
 he come i perceiv 
 provost asid pray heaven win 
 isabella we can not weigh brother ourself 
 great men may jest saint ti wit 
 but less foul profan 
 lucio to isabella thou rt th right girl 
 isabella that captain choler word
 which soldier flat blasphemi 
 lucio to isabella art avi more 
 angelo whi put say upon 
 isabella becaus author though err like other 
 hath yet kind medicin itself
 that skin vice th top go bosom 
 knock ask heart doth know
 that like brother fault if confess
 a natur guilti 
 let sound thought upon tongue
 against brother life 
 angelo asid she speak tis
 such sens sens breed fare well 
 isabella gentl lord turn back 
 angelo i bethink come morrow 
 isabella hark i bribe good lord turn back 
 angelo how bribe 
 isabella ay gift heaven shall share 
 lucio to isabella you marr els 
 isabella not fond sicl test gold 
 or stone whose rate either rich poor
 as fanci valu true prayers
 that shall heaven enter there
 ere sun rise prayer preserv soul 
 from fast maid whose mind dedicate
 to noth tempor 
 angelo well come morrow 
 lucio to isabella go ti well away 
 isabella heaven keep honour safe 
 angelo asid amen i
 am way go temptation
 where prayer cross

 shall i attend lordship 
 angelo at time fore noon 
 isabella save honour exeunt angelo
 angelo from thee even thi virtu 
 what is fault mine 
 the tempter tempt sin 
 ha 
 not doth tempt i
 that lie violet sun 
 do carrion flow r 
 corrupt virtuou season can be
 that modesti may betray sense
 than woman light have wast ground enough 
 shall desir raze sanctuari 
 and pitch evil o fie fie fie 
 what dost thou art thou angelo 
 dost thou desir foulli things
 that make good o let brother live 
 thiev robberi authority
 when judg steal what i love 
 that i desir hear speak 
 and feast upon eye what i dream 
 o cun enemi catch saint 
 with saint dost bait thi hook most dangerous
 is temptat doth goad us on
 to sin love virtu never could strumpet

 subdu quit ever till 
 when men fond i smil wond red exit

scen iii a prison

ent sever duke disguis friar provost

 duke hail provost i think

 to accordingli 
 provost i would need 

 enter juliet

 look come one gentlewoman mine 
 who fall flaw youth 
 hath blister report she child 
 and got sentenc young man
 more fit anoth offence
 than die 
 duke when must die 
 provost as i think morrow 
 to juliet i provid stay awhile
 and shall conduct 
 duke repent fair one sin carri 
 juliet i bear shame patient 
 duke i teach shall arraign conscienc 
 and tri penit sound
 or hollowli put 
 juliet i gladli learn 
 duke love man wrong 
 juliet ye i love woman wrong 
 duke so seem offenc act
 wa mutual commit 
 juliet mutual 
 duke then sin heavier kind 
 juliet i confess repent father 
 duke ti meet daughter lest repent
 as sin hath brought shame 
 which sorrow alway toward heaven 
 show would spare heaven love 
 but stand fear 
 juliet i repent evil 
 and take shame joy 
 duke there rest 
 your partner i hear must die morrow 
 and i go instruct 
 grace go benedicit exit
 juliet must die morrow o injuri law 
 that respit life whose comfort
 is still die horror 
 provost ti piti exeunt

scen iv angelo s house

ent angelo

 angelo when i would pray think i think pray
 to sever subject heaven hath empti word 
 whilst invent hear tongu 
 anchor isabel heaven mouth 
 as i chew name 
 and heart strong swell evil
 of concept the state whereon i studied
 is like good thing often read 
 grown sere tediou yea graviti 
 wherein let man hear i take pride 
 could i boot chang idl plume
 which air beat vain o place o form 
 how often dost thou thi case thi habit 
 wrench awe fool tie wiser souls
 to thi fals seem blood thou art blood 
 let write good angel devil horn 
 ti devil crest 

 enter servant

 how 
 servant one isabel sister desir access 
 angelo teach way exit servant o heaven 
 whi blood thu muster heart 
 make unabl itself
 and dispossess parts
 of necessari fit 
 so play foolish throng one swoon 
 come help stop air
 by reviv even so
 the gener subject well wish king
 quit part obsequi fondness
 crowd presenc untaught love
 must need appear offenc 

 enter isabella

 how fair maid 
 isabella i come know pleasur 
 angelo that might know would much better pleas me
 than demand ti your brother can not live 
 isabella even heaven keep honour 
 angelo yet may live awhil may 
 as long i yet must die 
 isabella under sentenc 
 angelo yea 
 isabella when i beseech repriev 
 longer shorter may fitted
 that soul sicken 
 angelo ha fie filthi vice it good
 to pardon hath natur stol n
 a man alreadi made remit
 their sauci sweet coin heaven image
 in stamp forbid ti easy
 fals take away life true made
 as put metal restrain means
 to make fals one 
 isabella ti set heaven earth 
 angelo say then i shall pose quickli 
 which rather law
 now took brother life redeem 
 give bodi sweet uncleanness
 as hath stain 
 isabella sir believ 
 i rather give bodi soul 
 angelo i talk soul compel sins
 stand number accompt 
 isabella how say 
 angelo nay i warrant i speak
 against thing i say answer 
 i voic record law 
 pronounc sentenc brother life 
 might chariti sin
 to save brother life 
 isabella pleas 
 i take peril soul
 it sin chariti 
 angelo plea peril soul 
 were equal pois sin chariti 
 isabella that i beg life sin 
 heaven let bear you grant suit 
 if sin i make morn prayer
 to ad fault mine 
 and noth answer 
 angelo nay hear 
 your sens pursu mine either ignorant
 or seem craftili good 
 isabella let ignor noth good
 but gracious know i better 
 angelo thu wisdom wish appear bright
 when doth tax black masks
 proclaim enshield beauti ten time louder
 than beauti could display but mark 
 to receiv plain i speak gross 
 your brother die 
 isabella so 
 angelo and offenc appear 
 account law upon pain 
 isabella true 
 angelo admit way save life 
 as i subscrib 
 but loss question sister 
 find desir person
 whose credit judg great place 
 could fetch brother manacles
 of bind law were
 no earthli mean save either
 you must lay treasur body
 to suppos els let suffer 
 what would 
 isabella as much poor brother 
 that i term death 
 th impress keen whip i wear rubi 
 and strip death bed
 that long sick ere i yield
 my bodi shame 
 angelo then must brother die 
 isabella and twere cheaper way 
 better brother die once
 than sister redeem 
 should die ever 
 angelo were cruel sentence
 that slander 
 isabella ignomini ransom free pardon
 are two hous law mercy
 is noth kin foul redempt 
 angelo you seem late make law tyrant 
 and rather prov slide brother
 a merriment vice 
 isabella o pardon lord it oft fall 
 to would speak mean 
 i someth excus thing i hate
 for advantag i dearli love 
 angelo we frail 
 isabella els let brother die 
 if fedari he
 owe succeed thi weak 
 angelo nay women frail 
 isabella ay glass view 
 which easi broke make form 
 women help heaven men creation mar
 in profit nay call us ten time frail 
 for soft complexion 
 and credul fals print 
 angelo i think well 
 and testimoni sex 
 sinc i suppos made stronger
 than fault may shake frame let bold 
 i arrest word be 
 that woman none 
 if one well express d
 by extern warrant show now
 by put destin liveri 
 isabella i tongu one gentl lord 
 let intreat speak former languag 
 angelo plainli conceiv i love 
 isabella my brother love juliet 
 and tell shall die 
 angelo he shall isabel give love 
 isabella i know virtu hath licens 
 which seem littl fouler 
 to pluck other 
 angelo believ mine honour 
 my word express purpos 
 isabella ha littl honour much believ 
 and pernici purpos seem seem 
 i proclaim thee angelo look 
 sign present pardon brother
 or outstretch throat i tell world aloud
 what man thou art 
 angelo who believ thee isabel 
 my unsoil name th auster life 
 my vouch place th state 
 will accus overweigh
 that shall stifl report 
 and smell calumni i begun 
 and i give sensual race rein 
 fit thi consent sharp appetit 
 lay niceti prolixi blushes
 that banish sue redeem thi brother
 by yield thi bodi 
 or els must die death 
 but thi unkind shall death draw out
 to ling ring suffer answer morrow 
 or affect guid 
 i prove tyrant as 
 say fals erweigh true exit
 isabella to i complain did i tell 
 who would believ o peril mouths
 that bear one self tongue
 either condemn approof 
 bid law make curtsi 
 hook right wrong th appetit 
 to follow draw i brother 
 though hath fall n promptur blood 
 yet hath mind honour
 that twenti head tender down
 on twenti bloodi block yield up
 befor sister bodi stoop
 to abhorr pollut 
 then isabel live chast brother die 
 more brother chastiti 
 i tell yet angelo request 
 and fit mind death soul rest exit

act iii scene i the prison

ent duke disguis claudio provost

 duke so hope pardon lord angelo 
 claudio the miser medicine
 but hope 
 i hope eve prepar die 
 duke be absolut death either death life
 shall therebi sweeter reason thu life 
 if i lose thee i lose thing
 that none fool would keep a breath thou art 
 servil skyey influenc 
 that dost habit thou keep st
 hourli afflict mere thou art death fool 
 for thou labour st thi flight shun
 and yet run st toward still thou art nobl 
 for th accommod thou bear st
 are nur base thou rt mean valiant 
 for thou dost fear soft tender fork
 of poor worm thi best rest sleep 
 and thou oft provok st yet grossli fear st
 thi death thou art thyself 
 for thou exist mani thousand grains
 that issu dust happi thou art 
 for thou hast still thou striv st get 
 and thou hast forget st thou art certain 
 for thi complexion shift strang effect 
 after moon if thou art rich thou rt poor 
 for like ass whose back ingot bow 
 thou bear st thi heavi rich journey 
 and death unload thee friend hast thou none 
 for thine bowel call thee sire 
 the mere effus thi proper loin 
 do curs gout serpigo rheum 
 for end thee sooner thou hast youth age 
 but dinner sleep 
 dream thi bless youth
 becom age doth beg alms
 of palsi eld thou art old rich 
 thou hast neither heat affect limb beauti 
 to make thi rich pleasant what yet this
 that bear name life yet life
 lie hid moe thousand death yet death fear 
 that make odd even 
 claudio i humbl thank 
 to sue live i find i seek die 
 and seek death find life let come 
 isabella within what ho peac grace good compani 
 provost who come wish deserv welcom 
 duke dear sir ere long i visit 
 claudio most holi sir i thank 

 enter isabella

 isabella my busi word two claudio 
 provost and welcom look signior sister 
 duke provost word 
 provost as mani pleas 
 duke bring hear speak i may conceal 
 exeunt duke provost
 claudio now sister comfort 
 isabella whi 
 as comfort good good inde 
 lord angelo affair heaven 
 intend swift ambassador 
 where shall everlast leiger 
 therefor best appoint make speed 
 to morrow set 
 claudio is remedi 
 isabella none remedi save head 
 to cleav heart twain 
 claudio but 
 isabella ye brother may live 
 there devilish merci judg 
 if implor free life 
 but fetter till death 
 claudio perpetu duranc 
 isabella ay perpetu duranc restraint 
 though world vastid 
 to determin scope 
 claudio but natur 
 isabella in one consent 
 would bark honour trunk bear 
 and leav nake 
 claudio let know point 
 isabella o i fear thee claudio i quak 
 lest thou fever life shouldst entertain 
 and six seven winter respect
 than perpetu honour dar st thou die 
 the sens death apprehens 
 and poor beetl tread upon
 in corpor suffer find pang great
 as giant die 
 claudio whi give shame 
 think i resolut fetch
 from flow ry tender if i must die 
 i encount dark bride
 and hug mine arm 
 isabella there spake brother father grave
 did utter forth voic ye thou must die 
 thou art nobl conserv life
 in base applianc thi outward saint deputi 
 whose settl visag deliber word
 nip youth th head folli doth enew
 as falcon doth fowl yet devil 
 hi filth within cast would appear
 a pond deep hell 
 claudio the precis angelo 
 isabella o ti cun liveri hell
 the damn st bodi invest cover
 in precis guard dost thou think claudio 
 if i would yield virginity
 thou mightst freed 
 claudio o heaven can not 
 isabella ye would give thee rank offenc 
 so offend still thi night time
 that i i abhor name 
 or els thou diest morrow 
 claudio thou shalt 
 isabella o life 
 i throw deliverance
 as frankli pin 
 claudio thank dear isabel 
 isabella be readi claudio death morrow 
 claudio ye ha affect him
 that thu make bite law th nose
 when would forc sure sin 
 or deadli seven least 
 isabella which least 
 claudio if damnabl wise 
 whi would momentari trick
 be perdur fin o isabel 
 isabella what say brother 
 claudio death fear thing 
 isabella and shame life hate 
 claudio ay die go know 
 to lie cold obstruct rot 
 thi sensibl warm motion become
 a knead clod delight spirit
 to bath fieri flood reside
 in thrill region thick rib ice 
 to imprison viewless wind 
 and blown restless violenc round about
 the pendent world wors worst
 of lawless incertain thought
 imagin howl ti horribl 
 the weariest loath worldli life
 that age ach penuri imprison 
 can lay natur paradise
 to fear death 
 isabella ala ala 
 claudio sweet sister let live 
 what sin save brother life 
 natur dispens deed far
 that becom virtu 
 isabella o beast 
 o faithless coward o dishonest wretch 
 wilt thou made man vice 
 is kind incest take life
 from thine sister shame what i think 
 heaven shield mother play father fair 
 for warp slip wilderness
 ne er issu blood take defianc 
 die perish might bend down
 repriev thee thi fate proceed 
 i pray thousand prayer thi death 
 no word save thee 
 claudio nay hear isabel 
 isabella o fie fie fie 
 thi sin accident trade 
 merci thee would prove bawd 
 ti best thou diest quickli 
 claudio o hear isabella 

 re enter duke

 duke vouchsaf word young sister one word 
 isabella what 
 duke might dispens leisur i would have
 speech satisfact i would requir is
 likewis benefit 
 isabella i superflu leisur stay must stolen out
 affair i attend awhil 
 walk apart 
 duke son i overheard hath pass your
 sister angelo never purpos corrupt hath
 made assay virtu practis judgment the
 disposit natur she truth honour 
 hath made graciou denial glad to

 resolut hope fallibl morrow must die

 i sue rid

 re enter provost

 provost what father 
 duke that come gone leav while
 maid mind promis habit loss shall touch
 compani 
 provost in good time exit provost
 duke the hand hath made fair hath made good the
 good cheap beauti make beauti brief good 
 grace soul complexion shall keep body
 ever fair the assault angelo hath made 
 fortun hath convey understand frailty
 hath exampl fall i wonder angelo how
 content substitut save brother 
 isabella i go resolv i rather brother
 die law son unlaw born but o how
 much good duke deceiv angelo if ever return and
 i speak i open lip vain discov his
 govern 
 duke that shall much amiss yet matter stand 
 avoid accus made trial 
 therefor fasten ear advis love i in
 good remedi present i make believe
 may upright poor wrong ladi merited
 benefit redeem brother angri law stain to
 graciou person much pleas absent duke if
 peradventur shall ever return hear this
 busi 
 isabella let hear speak farther i spirit do
 anyth appear foul truth spirit 
 duke virtu bold good never fear have not
 heard speak mariana sister frederick great
 soldier miscarri sea 
 isabella i heard ladi good word went her
 name 
 duke she angelo marri affianc by
 oath nuptial appoint time the
 contract limit solemn brother frederick was
 wreck sea perish vessel dowri his
 sister but mark heavili befel poor gentlewoman 
 lost nobl renown brother love toward
 ever kind natur portion sinew of

scen iv angelo s house

ent angelo escalus

 escalu everi letter hath writ hath disvouch 
 angelo in uneven distract manner hi action show much
 like mad pray heaven wisdom taint and why
 meet gate redeliv author

 ent ring crave redress injustic should
 exhibit petit street

 complaint deliv us devic hereaft which
 shall power stand us

 betim th morn i call hous 
 give notic men sort suit
 as meet

 angelo good night exit escalus
 thi deed unshap quit make unpregnant
 and dull proceed a deflow red maid 
 and emin bodi enforc d
 the law but tender shame
 will proclaim maiden loss 
 how might tongu yet reason dare 
 for author bear credent bulk
 that particular scandal touch
 but confound breather he liv 
 save riotou youth danger sens

 noth goe right would would exit

scen v field without town

ent duke habit friar peter

 duke these letter fit time deliv give letter 
 the provost know purpos plot

 to valentinu rowland crassu

ent isabella mariana

 i would say truth accus
