 he speak advers side 
 i think strang ti physic
 that bitter sweet end

 enter friar peter

 isabella o peac friar come

 where may vantag duke

 the gener gravest citizens
 have hent gate near upon

act v scene i the citi gate

ent sever door duke varriu lord angelo escalu lucio 
provost offic citizens

 duke my worthi cousin fairli met 
 our old faith friend glad see 
 angelo escalu happi return royal grace 
 duke mani hearti thank 
 we made inquiri hear
 such good justic soul
 can not yield forth public thank 
 forerun requit 
 angelo you make bond still greater 
 duke o desert speak loud i wrong it
 to lock ward covert bosom 
 when deserv charact brass 
 a fort resid gainst tooth time
 and razur oblivion give hand 
 and let subject see make know
 that outward courtesi would fain proclaim
 favour keep within come escalu 
 you must walk us hand 
 and good support 

 enter friar peter isabella

 peter now time speak loud kneel 
 isabella justic o royal duke vail regard
 upon wrong i would fain said maid 
 o worthi princ dishonour eye
 by throw object
 till heard true complaint 
 and given justic justic justic justic 
 duke relat wrong in by be brief 
 here lord angelo shall give justic 
 reveal 
 isabella o worthi duke 
 you bid seek redempt devil 
 hear i must speak
 must either punish believ 
 or wring redress hear o hear 
 angelo my lord wit i fear firm 
 she hath suitor brother 
 cut cours justic 
 isabella by cours justic 
 angelo and speak bitterli strang 
 isabella most strang yet truli i speak 
 that angelo forsworn strang 
 that angelo murder strang 
 that angelo adulter thief 
 an hypocrit virgin violat 
 is strang strang 
 duke nay ten time strang 
 isabella it truer angelo
 than true strang 
 nay ten time true truth truth
 to th end reck ning 
 duke away poor soul 
 she speak th infirm sens 
 isabella o princ i conjur thee thou believ st
 there anoth comfort world 
 that thou neglect opinion
 that i touch mad make impossible
 that seem unlik ti impossible
 but one wick st caitiff ground 
 may seem shi grave absolut 
 as angelo even may angelo 
 in dress charact titl form 
 be arch villain believ royal princ 
 if less noth 
 had i name bad 
 duke by mine honesti 
 if mad i believ 
 her mad hath oddest frame sens 
 such depend thing thing 
 as e er i heard mad 
 isabella o graciou duke 
 harp banish reason
 for inequ let reason serve
 to make truth appear seem hid 
 and hide fals seem true 
 duke mani mad
 have sure lack reason what would say 
 isabella i sister one claudio 
 condemn upon act fornication
 to lose head condemn angelo 
 i probat sisterhood 
 wa sent brother one lucio
 as messeng 
 lucio that i like grace 
 i came claudio desir her
 to tri graciou fortun lord angelo
 for poor brother pardon 
 isabella that inde 
 duke you bid speak 
 lucio no good lord 
 nor wish hold peac 
 duke i wish 
 pray take note have
 a busi pray heaven then
 be perfect 
 lucio i warrant honour 
 duke the warrant take heed 
 isabella thi gentleman told somewhat tale 
 lucio right 
 duke it may right wrong
 to speak time proce 
 isabella i went
 to pernici caitiff deputi 
 duke that somewhat madli spoken 
 isabella pardon 
 the phrase matter 
 duke mend the matter proceed 
 isabella in brief set needless process 
 how i persuad i pray kneel 
 how refel i repli 
 for much length vile conclusion
 i begin grief shame utter 
 he would gift chast body
 to concupisc intemper lust 
 releas brother much debat 
 my sisterli remors confut mine honour 
 and i yield but next morn betim 
 hi purpos surfeit send warrant
 for poor brother head 
 duke thi like 
 isabella o like true 
 duke by heaven fond wretch thou know st thou speak st 
 or els thou art suborn honour
 in hate practic first integrity
 stand without blemish next import reason
 that vehem pursue
 fault proper if offend 
 he would weigh thi brother 
 and cut some one hath set 
 confess truth say whose advice
 thou cam st complain 
 isabella and 
 then o bless minist 
 keep patienc ripen time 
 unfold evil wrapt up
 in counten heaven shield grace woe 
 as i thu wrong henc unbeliev go 
 duke i know fain gone an offic 
 to prison shall thu permit
 a blast scandal breath fall
 on near us thi need must practic 
 who knew intent come hither 
 isabella one i would friar lodowick 
 duke a ghostli father belik who know lodowick 
 lucio my lord i know ti meddl friar 
 i like man lay lord 
 for certain word spake grace
 in retir i swing soundli 
 duke word thi good friar belik 
 and set wretch woman here
 against substitut let friar found 
 lucio but yesternight lord friar 
 i saw prison sauci friar 
 a scurvi fellow 
 peter bless royal grace 
 i stood lord i heard
 your royal ear abu first hath woman
 most wrong accu substitut 
 who free touch soil her
 as one ungot 
 duke we believ less 
 know friar lodowick speak 
 peter i know man divin holi 
 not scurvi temporari meddler 
 as report gentleman 
 and trust man never yet
 did vouch misreport grace 
 lucio my lord villain believ 
 peter well time may come clear 
 but instant sick lord 
 of strang fever upon mere request 
 be come knowledg complaint
 intend gainst lord angelo came i hither
 to speak mouth doth know
 is true fals oath
 and probat make full clear 
 whensoev convent first woman 
 to justifi worthi nobleman 
 so vulgarli person accu

 till confess

 do smile lord angelo

 than strang 
 duke come hither isabel 
 your friar princ as i then
 advertis holi busi 
 not chang heart habit i still
 attorney servic

 that i vassal employ pain d
 your unknown sovereignti

 and dear maid free us

 and may marvel i obscur

 make rash remonstr hidden pow r
 than let lost o kind maid

 which i think slower foot came 
 that brain purpos but peac 
 that life better life past fear death 
 than live fear make comfort 
 so happi brother 
 isabella i lord 

 re enter angelo mariana friar peter provost

 duke for new marri man approach 
 whose salt imagin yet hath wrong d
 your well defend honour must pardon
 for mariana sake adjudg brother 
 be crimin doubl violation
 of sacr chastiti promis breach 
 thereon depend brother life 
 the merci law cri out
 most audibl even proper tongu 
 an angelo claudio death death 
 hast still pay hast leisur answer leisur 
 like doth quit like measur still measur 
 then angelo thi fault thu manifest 
 which though thou wouldst deni deni thee vantag 
 we condemn thee block
 where claudio stoop death like hast 
 away 
 mariana o graciou lord 
 i hope mock husband 
 duke it husband mock husband 
 consent safeguard honour 
 i thought marriag fit els imput 
 for knew might reproach life 
 and choke good come for possess 
 although confisc 
 we instat widow withal
 to buy better husband 
 mariana o dear lord 
 i crave better man 
 duke never crave definit 
 mariana gentl lieg kneel 
 duke you lose labour 
 away death to lucio now sir 
 mariana o good lord sweet isabel take part 
 lend knee life come
 i lend life servic 
 duke against sens importun 
 should kneel merci fact 
 her brother ghost pave bed would break 
 and take henc horror 
 mariana isabel 
 sweet isabel yet kneel 
 hold hand say noth i speak 
 they say best men mould fault 
 and becom much better
 for littl bad may husband 
 o isabel lend knee 
 duke he die claudio death 
 isabella kneel most bounteou sir 
 look pleas man condemn 
 as brother liv i partli think
 a due sincer govern deeds
 till look sinc 
 let die my brother justic 
 in thing die 
 for angelo 
 hi act ertak bad intent 
 and must buri intent
 that perish way thought subject 
 intent mere thought 
 mariana mere lord 
 duke your suit unprofit stand i say 
 i bethought anoth fault 
 provost came claudio beheaded
 at unusu hour 
 provost it command 
 duke had special warrant deed 
 provost no good lord privat messag 
 duke for i discharg offic 
 give key 
 provost pardon nobl lord 
 i thought fault knew 
 yet repent advic 
 for testimoni whereof one prison 
 that privat order els die 
 i reserv aliv 
 duke what 
 provost hi name barnardin 
 duke i would thou hadst done claudio 
 go fetch hither let look upon exit provost
 escalu i sorri one learn wise
 as lord angelo still appear 
 should slip grossli heat blood
 and lack temper judgment afterward

 and deep stick penit heart
 that i crave death willingli merci 
 ti deserv i entreat 

 re enter provost barnardin claudio muffl 
 juliet

 duke which barnardin 
 provost thi lord 
 duke there friar told man 
 sirrah thou art said stubborn soul 
 that apprehend world 
 and squar st thi life accord thou rt condemn 
 but earthli fault i quit 
 and pray thee take merci provide
 for better time come friar advis 
 i leav hand what muffl fellow 
 provost thi anoth prison i sav 
 who die claudio lost head 
 as like almost claudio unmuffl claudio 
 duke to isabella if like brother sake
 is pardon love sake 
 give hand say mine 
 he brother but fitter time 
 by lord angelo perceiv safe 
 methink i see quick ning eye 
 well angelo evil quit well 
 look love wife worth worth 
 i find apt remiss 
 and yet one place i can not pardon 
 to lucio you sirrah knew fool coward 
 one luxuri ass madman 
 wherein i deserv you
 that extol thu 
 lucio faith lord i spoke accord trick

 pleas i might whipt 
 duke whipt first sir hang 
 proclaim provost round citi 
 if woman wrong lewd fellow 
 as i heard swear one
 whom begot child let appear 
 and shall marri the nuptial finish 
 let whipt hang

 high said even i made duke good lord not
 recompens make cuckold

th merchant of venice



contents

act i
scen i venic a street 
scene ii belmont a room portia hous 
scene iii venic a public place 


act ii
scen i belmont a room portia hous 
scene ii venic a street 
scene iii the a room shylock hous 
scene iv the a street 
scene v the befor shylock hous 
scene vi the

scene viii venic a street 
scene ix belmont a room portia hous

scen i venic a street 
scene ii belmont a room portia hous 
scene iii venic a street 
scene iv belmont a room portia hous 
scene v the a garden

scen i venic a court justic 
scene ii the a street 


act v
scene i belmont the avenu portia hous 



dramati person

th duke of venice
th princ of morocco suitor portia
th princ of arragon suitor portia
antonio merchant venice
bassanio friend suitor portia
gratiano friend antonio bassanio
solanio friend antonio bassanio
salarino friend antonio bassanio
lorenzo love jessica
shylock rich jew
tub jew friend
launcelet gobbo clown servant shylock
old gobbo father launcelet
leonardo servant bassanio
balthazar servant portia
stephano servant portia
salerio messeng venice

portia rich heiress
nerissa wait woman
jessica daughter shylock

magnifico venic offic court justic gaoler 
servant attendants

scen partli venic partli belmont seat portia on
th continent


act i

scen i venic a street 

 enter antonio salarino solanio 

antonio 
in sooth i know i sad 
it weari say weari 
but i caught found came 
what stuff ti made whereof born 
i learn 
and want wit sad make 
that i much ado know 

salarino 
your mind toss ocean 
there argosi portli sail
lik signior rich burgher flood 
or pageant sea 
do overp petti traffickers
that curtsi rever 
a fli woven wing 

solanio 
believ sir i ventur forth 
the better part affect would
b hope abroad i still
pluck grass know sit wind 
peer map port pier road 
and everi object might make fear
misfortun ventur doubt
would make sad 

salarino 
mi wind cool broth
would blow agu i thought
what harm wind great might sea 
i see sandi hour glass run
but i think shallow flat 
and see wealthi andrew dock sand 
vail high top lower ribs
to kiss burial should i go church
and see holi edific stone
and bethink straight danger rock 
which touch gentl vessel side 
would scatter spice stream 
enrob roar water silk 
and word even worth 
and worth noth shall i thought
to think shall i lack thought
that thing bechanc would make sad 
but tell i know antonio
i sad think upon merchandis 

antonio 
believ i thank fortun 
mi ventur one bottom trust 
nor one place whole estate
upon fortun present year 
therefor merchandis make sad 

salarino 
whi love 

antonio 
fie fie 

salarino 
not love neither then let us say sad
becaus merri twere easy
for laugh leap say merry
becaus sad now two head janu 
natur hath fram strang fellow time 
some evermor peep eye 
and laugh like parrot bagpip 
and vinegar aspect
that show teeth way smile
though nestor swear jest laughabl 

 enter bassanio lorenzo gratiano 

solanio 
here come bassanio nobl kinsman 
gratiano lorenzo fare ye well 
we leav better compani 

salarino 
i would stay till i made merri 
if worthier friend prevent 

antonio 
your worth dear regard 
i take busi call 
and embrac th occas depart 

salarino 
good morrow good lord 

bassanio 
good signior shall laugh say 
you grow exceed strang must 

salarino 
we make leisur attend 

 _exeunt salarino solanio _ 

lorenzo 
mi lord bassanio sinc found antonio 
we two leav dinner time
i pray mind must meet 

bassanio 
i fail 

gratiano 
you look well signior antonio 
you much respect upon world 
they lose buy much care 
believ marvel chang 

antonio 
i hold world world gratiano 
a stage everi man must play part 
and mine sad one 

gratiano 
let play fool 
with mirth laughter let old wrinkl come 
and let liver rather heat wine
than heart cool mortifi groan 
whi man whose blood warm within
sit like grandsir cut alabast 
sleep wake and creep jaundice
bi peevish i tell thee antonio 
 i love thee ti love speak 
there sort men whose visages
do cream mantl like stand pond 
and wil still entertain 
with purpos dress opinion
of wisdom graviti profound conceit 
a say i sir oracl 
and i ope lip let dog bark 
o antonio i know these
that therefor reput wise
for say noth i sure 
if speak would almost damn ears
which hear would call brother fool 
i tell thee anoth time 
but fish melancholi bait
for fool gudgeon opinion 
come good lorenzo fare ye well 
i end exhort dinner 

lorenzo 
well leav till dinner time 
i must one dumb wise men 
for gratiano never let speak 

gratiano 
well keep compani two year moe 
thou shalt know sound thine tongu 

antonio 
fare well i grow talker gear 

gratiano 
thank faith silenc commendable
in neat tongu dri maid vendibl 

 _exeunt gratiano lorenzo _ 

antonio 
i anyth 

bassanio 
gratiano speak infinit deal noth man all
venic hi reason two grain wheat hid two bushel of
chaff shall seek day ere find them
they worth search 

antonio 
well tell ladi same
to swore secret pilgrimag 
that today promi tell 

bassanio 
 ti unknown antonio 
how much i disabl mine estate
bi someth show swell port
than faint mean would grant continu 
nor i make moan abridg d
from nobl rate chief care
i come fairli great debts
wherein time someth prodig 
hath left gag to antonio 
i owe money love 
and love i warranty
to unburden plot purposes
how get clear debt i owe 

antonio 
i pray good bassanio let know 
and stand still 
within eye honour assur d
mi purs person extremest means
li unlock occas 

bassanio 
in school day i lost one shaft 
i shot fellow self flight
th self way advis watch
to find forth adventur both
i oft found i urg childhood proof
becaus follow pure innoc 
i owe much like wil youth 
that i owe lost but please
to shoot anoth arrow self way
which shoot first i doubt 
a i watch aim find 
or bring latter hazard back 
and thank rest debtor first 

antonio 
you know well herein spend time
to wind love circumst 
and doubt wrong
in make question uttermost
than made wast i 
then say i do
that knowledg may done 
and i prest unto therefor speak 

bassanio 
in belmont ladi richli left 
and fair fairer word 
of wondrou virtu sometim eyes
i receiv fair speechless messag 
her name portia noth undervalu d
to cato daughter brutu portia 
nor wide world ignor worth 
for four wind blow everi coast
renown suitor sunni locks
hang templ like golden fleec 
which make seat belmont colcho strond 
and mani jason come quest 
o antonio i means
to hold rival place one 
i mind presag thrift
that i questionless fortun 

antonio 
thou know st fortun sea 
neither i money commodity
to rais present sum therefor go forth
tri credit venic 
that shall rack even uttermost 
to furnish thee belmont fair portia 
go present inquir i 
where money i question make
to trust sake 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii belmont a room portia hous 

 enter portia wait woman nerissa 

portia 
bi troth nerissa littl bodi aweari great world 

nerissa 
you would sweet madam miseri abundance
a good fortun and yet aught i see sick
that surfeit much starv noth it no
mean happi therefor seat mean superflu come
soon white hair compet live longer 

portia 
good sentenc well pronounc 

nerissa 
they would better well follow 

portia 
if easi know good chapel been
church poor men cottag princ palac it good divine
that follow instruct i easier teach twenti were
good done one twenti follow mine own
teach the brain may devis law blood hot temper
leap er cold decre hare mad youth skip
o er mesh good counsel crippl but reason not
in fashion choos husband o word choos i may
neith choos i would refus i dislik of
a live daughter curb dead father is hard 
nerissa i can not choos one refus none 

nerissa 
your father ever virtuou holi men death good
inspir therefor lott ry hath devis three
chest gold silver lead whereof choos meaning
choos doubt never chosen rightli one who
you shall rightli love but warmth affection
toward princ suitor alreadi come 

portia 
i pray thee name thou namest i describe
them accord descript level affect 

nerissa 
first neapolitan princ 

portia 
ay colt inde doth noth talk hors 
and make great appropri good part can
sho i much afeard ladi mother play fals with
a smith 

nerissa 
then counti palatin 

portia 
he doth noth frown say and 
choos he hear merri tale smile i fear prove the
weep philosoph grow old full unmannerly
sad youth i rather marri death head a
bon mouth either god defend these
two 

nerissa 
how say french lord monsieur le bon 

portia 
god made therefor let pass man in truth i know it
i sin mocker hath hors better the
neapolitan better bad habit frown count palatin 
he everi man man if throstl sing fall straight
a cap ring he fenc shadow if i marri i
should marri twenti husband if would despis i would forgive
him love mad i shall never requit 

nerissa 
what say falconbridg young baron england 

portia 
you know i say noth understand i he
hath neither latin french italian come the
court swear i poor pennyworth english he a
prop man pictur ala convers dumb show how
oddli suit i think bought doublet itali round
hos franc bonnet germani behaviour everywher 

nerissa 
what think scottish lord neighbour 

portia 
that hath neighbourli chariti borrow box the
ear englishman swore would pay was
abl i think frenchman becam sureti seal for
anoth 

nerissa 
how like young german duke saxoni nephew 

portia 
veri vile morn sober vile the
afternoon drunk best littl wors than
a man worst littl better beast and the
worst fall ever fell i hope i shall make shift go without 

nerissa 
if offer choos choos right casket should
refus perform father refus accept
him 

portia 
therefor fear worst i pray thee set deep glass of
rhenish wine contrari casket devil within and
that temptat without i know choos i anyth 
nerissa ere i marri spong 

nerissa

act ii

scen i belmont a room portia hous 

 flourish cornet enter princ morocco tawni moor in
 white three four follow accordingli portia nerissa
 train 

princ of morocco 
mislik complexion 
the shadow liveri burnish sun 
to i neighbour near bred 
bring fairest creatur northward born 
where phbu fire scarc thaw icicl 
and let us make incis love
to prove whose blood reddest mine 
i tell thee ladi aspect mine
hath fear valiant love i swear
th best regard virgin clime
hav lov i would chang hue 
except steal thought gentl queen 

portia 
in term choic i sole led
bi nice direct maiden eye 
besid lott ry destiny
bar right voluntari choos 
but father scant me
and hedg wit yield myself
hi wife win mean i told 
yourself renown princ stood fair
a comer i look yet
for affect 

princ of morocco 
even i thank 
therefor i pray lead caskets
to tri fortun by scimitar
that slew sophi persian princ 
that three field sultan solyman 
i would erstar sternest eye look 
outbrav heart dare earth 
pluck young suck cub bear 
yea mock lion roar prey 
to win thee ladi but ala 
if hercul licha play dice
which better man greater throw
may turn fortun weaker hand 
so alcid beaten rage 
and may i blind fortun lead 
miss one unworthi may attain 
and die griev 

portia 
you must take chanc 
and either attempt choos 
or swear choos choos wrong
nev speak ladi afterward
in way marriag therefor advi 

princ of morocco 
nor come bring unto chanc 

portia 
first forward templ after dinner
your hazard shall made 

princ of morocco 
good fortun 
to make blest curs st among men

scene vii belmont a room portia hous 

 flourish cornet enter portia princ morocco both
 train 

portia 
go draw asid curtain discover
th sever casket nobl princ 
now make choic 

princ of morocco 
the first gold inscript bear 
 who chooseth shall gain mani men desir 
the second silver promis carri 
 who chooseth shall get much deserv 
thi third dull lead warn blunt 
 who chooseth must give hazard hath 
how shall i know i choos right 

portia 
the one contain pictur princ 
if choos i withal 

princ of morocco 
some god direct judgment let see 
i survey inscript back 
what say leaden casket 
 who chooseth must give hazard hath 
must give for lead hazard lead 
thi casket threaten men hazard all
do hope fair advantag 
a golden mind stoop show dross 
i give hazard aught lead 
what say silver virgin hue 
 who chooseth shall get much deserv 
a much deserv paus morocco 
and weigh thi valu even hand 
if thou st rate thi estimation
th dost deserv enough yet enough
may extend far ladi 
and yet afeard deserving
wer weak disabl 
a much i deserv whi ladi 
i birth deserv fortun 
in grace qualiti breed 
but love i deserv 
what i stray farther chose 
let see say grav gold 
 who chooseth shall gain mani men desir 
whi ladi world desir 
from four corner earth come
to kiss shrine mortal breath saint 
the hyrcanian desert vasti wilds
of wide arabia throughfar now
for princ come view fair portia 
the wateri kingdom whose ambiti head
spet face heaven bar
to stop foreign spirit come
a er brook see fair portia 
one three contain heavenli pictur 
i like lead contain twere damnation
to think base thought it gross
to rib cerecloth obscur grave 
or shall i think silver immur d
be ten time undervalu tri gold 
o sin thought never rich gem
wa set wors gold they england
a coin bear figur angel
stamp gold insculp upon 
but angel golden bed
li within deliv key 
here i choos thrive i i may 

portia 
there take princ form lie 
then i 

 _he unlock golden casket _ 

princ of morocco 
o hell 
a carrion death within whose empti eye
ther written scroll i read write 

 _all glister gold 
 often heard told

 but outsid behold 
 gild tomb worm infold 
 had wise bold

what say golden chest ha let see 
 who chooseth shall gain mani men desir 
what mani men desir mani may meant
bi fool multitud choos show 
not learn fond eye doth teach 
which pri th interior like martlet
build weather outward wall 
even forc road casualti 
i choos mani men desir 
becaus i jump common spirits
and rank barbar multitud 
whi thee thou silver treasur hous 
tell titl thou dost bear

and well said shall go about
to cozen fortun honourable
without stamp merit let none presume
to wear undeserv digniti 
o estat degre offices
wer deriv corruptli clear honour
wer purcha merit wearer 
how mani cover stand bare 
how mani command command 
how much low peasantri would gleaned
from true seed honour and much honour
pick chaff ruin time 
to new varnish well choic 
 who chooseth shall get much deserv 
i assum desert give key 
and instantli unlock fortun

 _the fire seven time tri

scene ii belmont a room portia hous 

 enter bassanio portia gratiano nerissa train 

portia 
i pray tarri paus day two
befor hazard choos wrong
i lose compani therefor forbear 
there someth tell love 
i would lose know yourself
h counsel qualiti 
but lest understand well 
and yet maiden hath tongu thought 
i would detain month two
befor ventur i could teach you
how choos right i forsworn 
so i never so may miss 
but make wish sin 
that i forsworn beshrew eye 
they erlook divid 
one half half 
mine i would say mine 
and o naughti times
put bar owner right 
and though prove 
let fortun go hell i 
i speak long ti peis time 
to ech draw length 
to stay elect

let choos 
for i i live upon rack 

portia

what treason mingl love 

bassanio

which make fear th enjoy love 
there may well amiti life
 tween snow fire treason love

wher men enforc speak anyth

promis life i confess truth 

portia 
well confess live 

bassanio 
 confess love 
had sum confess 
o happi torment torturer
doth teach answer deliver 
but let fortun casket 

portia 
away i lock one 
if love find 
nerissa rest stand aloof 
let music sound doth make choic 
then lose make swan like end 
fade music that comparison
may stand proper eye shall stream
and wat ry death bed he may win 
and music then music is
even flourish true subject bow
to new crown monarch such is
a dulcet sound break day
that creep dream bridegroom ear
and summon marriag now goe 
with less presenc much love
than young alcid redeem
th virgin tribut paid howl troy
to sea monster i stand sacrific 
the rest aloof dardanian wive 
with blear visag come forth view
th issu th exploit go hercul 
live thou i live with much much dismay
i view fight thou mak st fray

 _tell fanci bred 
 or heart head 
 how begot nourish 
 repli repli 
 it engend red eye

 _ding dong bell _

bassanio 
so may outward show least 
the world still deceiv ornament 
in law plea taint corrupt
but season graciou voic 
obscur show evil in religion 
what damn error sober brow
wil bless approv text 
hide gross fair ornament 
there vice simpl assumes
som mark virtu outward part 
how mani coward whose heart false
a stair sand wear yet upon chins
th beard hercul frown mar 
who inward search liver white milk 
and assum valour excrement
to render redoubt look beauti 
and shall see ti purcha weight 
which therein work miracl natur 
make lightest wear 
so crisp snaki golden locks
which make wanton gambol wind
upon suppos fair often known
to dowri second head 
the skull bred sepulchr 
thu ornament guil shore
to danger sea beauteou scarf
veil indian beauti word 
the seem truth cun time put on
to entrap wisest therefor thou gaudi gold 
hard food mida i none thee 
nor none thee thou pale common drudge
 tween man man thou thou meagr lead 
which rather threaten st dost promis aught 
thi palen move eloqu 
and choos i joy consequ 

portia 
 _asid _ how passion fleet air 
a doubt thought rash embrac despair 
and shudd ring fear green ey jealousi 
o love moder allay thi ecstasi 
in measur rain thi joy scant excess 
i feel much thi bless make less 
for fear i surfeit 

bassanio 
what find i _open leaden casket_ 
fair portia counterfeit what demi god
hath come near creation move eye 
or whether ride ball mine 
seem motion here sever lip 
part sugar breath sweet bar
should sunder sweet friend here hairs
th painter play spider hath woven
a golden mesh entrap heart men
fast gnat cobweb but eye 
how could see have made one 
methink power steal his
and leav unfurnish yet look far
th substanc prais doth wrong shadow
in underpr far shadow
doth limp behind substanc here scroll 
the contin summari fortun 

 _you choos view
 chanc fair choos true

 turn ladi 
 and claim love kiss _

a gentl scroll fair ladi leav _kiss her_ 
i come note give receiv 
like one two contend prize
that think hath done well peopl eye 
hear applaus univers shout 
giddi spirit still gaze doubt
wheth peal prais 
so thrice fair ladi stand i even 
a doubt whether i see true 
until confirm sign ratifi 

portia 
you see lord bassanio i stand 
such i though alone
i would ambiti wish
to wish much better yet you
i would trebl twenti time 
a thousand time fair ten thousand times
mor rich 
that stand high account 
i might virtu beauti live friend 
exce account but full sum me
i sum someth term gross 
i unlesson girl unschool unpracti 
happi yet old
but may learn happier 
she bred dull learn 
happiest gentl spirit
commit direct 
a lord governor king 
myself mine yours
i convert but i lord
of fair mansion master servant 
queen er even 
thi hous servant myself
ar lord i give ring 
which part lose give away 
let presag ruin love 
and vantag exclaim 

bassanio 
madam bereft word 
onli blood speak vein 
and confus powers
a orat fairli spoke
bi belov princ doth appear
among buzz pleas multitud 
where everi someth blent togeth 
turn wild noth save joy
express express but ring
part finger part life henc 
o bold say bassanio dead

that stood seen wish prosper 
to cri good joy good joy lord ladi

th bargain faith i beseech you
even time i may marri

you lov i lov intermission
no pertain lord

and mine matter fall 
for woo i sweat

i got promis fair one here
to love provid fortune
achiev mistress

what old venetian friend salerio

 _bassanio open letter _ 

gratiano

your hand salerio what news venic 
how doth royal merchant good antonio 
i know glad success 
we jason fleec 

salerio 
i would fleec hath lost 

portia 
there shrewd content yond paper
that steal colour bassanio cheek 
some dear friend dead els noth world
could turn much constitution
of constant man what wors wors 
with leav bassanio i half 
and i must freeli half anything
that paper bring 

bassanio 
o sweet portia 
here unpleas st words
that ever blot paper gentl ladi 
when i first impart love 
i freeli told wealth i had
ran vein i gentleman 
and i told true and yet dear ladi 
rate noth shall see
how much i braggart when i told you
mi state noth i told you
that i wors noth indeed
i engag dear friend 
engag friend mere enemi 
to feed mean here letter ladi 
the paper bodi friend 
and everi word gape wound
issu life blood but true salerio 
hath ventur fail what one hit 
from tripoli mexico england 
from lisbon barbari india 
and one vessel scape dread touch
of merchant mar rock 

salerio 
not one lord 
besid appear had
th present money discharg jew 
he would take never i know
a creatur bear shape man
so keen greedi confound man 
he pli duke morn night 
and doth impeach freedom state
if deni justic twenti merchant 
the duke magnificoes
of greatest port persuad 
but none drive enviou plea
of forfeitur justic bond 

jessica 
when i i heard swear
to tubal chu countrymen 
that would rather antonio flesh
than twenti time valu sum
that owe and i know lord 
if law author power deni 
it go hard poor antonio 

portia 
i dear friend thu troubl 

bassanio 
the dearest friend kindest man 
the best condit unweari spirit
in courtesi one whom
th ancient roman honour appears
than draw breath itali 

portia 
what sum owe jew 

bassanio 
for three thousand ducat 

portia 
what 
pay six thousand defac bond 
doubl six thousand trebl 
befor friend description
shal lose hair bassanio fault 
first go church call wife 
and away venic friend 
for never shall lie portia side
with unquiet soul you shall gold
to pay petti debt twenti time 
when paid bring true friend along 
mi maid nerissa meantim 
will live maid widow come away 
for shall henc upon wed day 
bid friend welcom show merri cheer 
sinc dear bought i love dear 
but let hear letter friend 

bassanio

lett _

salarino 
it impenetr cur
that ever kept men 

antonio 
let alon 
i follow bootless prayer 
he seek life reason well i know 
i oft deliv forfeitures
mani time made moan 
therefor hate

i sure duke
wil never grant forfeitur hold 

antonio

for commod stranger have
with us venic deni

sinc trade profit city
consisteth nation therefor go 
these grief loss bate me
that i shall hardli spare pound flesh
tomorrow bloodi creditor 
well gaoler pray god bassanio come
to see pay debt i care 

 _exeunt _ 

scene iv belmont a room portia hous 

 enter portia nerissa lorenzo jessica balthazar 

lorenzo 
madam although i speak presenc 
you nobl true conceit
of godlik amiti appear strongly
in bear thu absenc lord 
but knew show honour 
how true gentleman send relief 
how dear lover lord husband 
i know would prouder work
than customari bounti enforc 

portia 
i never repent good 
nor shall companions
that convers wast time togeth 
whose soul bear equal yoke love 
there must need like proportion
of lineament manner spirit 
which make think antonio 
be bosom lover lord 
must need like lord if 
how littl cost i bestowed
in purchas semblanc soul
from state hellish cruelti 
thi come near prais 
therefor hear thing 
lorenzo i commit hands
th husbandri manag house
until lord return for mine part 
i toward heaven breath secret vow
to live prayer contempl 
onli attend nerissa 
until husband lord return 
there monasteri two mile 
and abid i desir you
not deni imposit 
the love necessity
now lay upon 

lorenzo 
madam heart
i shall obey fair command 

portia 
mi peopl alreadi know mind 
and acknowledg jessica
in place lord bassanio 
so fare well till shall meet 

lorenzo 
fair thought happi hour attend 

jessica

portia 
i thank wish well plea d
to wish back fare well jessica 

 _exeunt jessica lorenzo _ 

now balthazar 
a i ever found thee honest true 
so let find thee still take letter 
and use thou th endeavour man
in speed padua see thou render this
into cousin hand doctor bellario 
and look note garment doth give thee 
bring i pray thee imagin speed
unto traject common ferry
which trade venic wast time word 
but get thee gone i shall thee 

balthazar 
madam i go conveni speed 

 _exit _ 

portia 
come nerissa i work hand
that yet know see husbands
befor think us 

nerissa 
shall see us 

portia 
they shall nerissa habit
that shall think accomplished
with lack i hold thee wager 
when accout like young men 
i prove prettier fellow two 
and wear dagger braver grace 
and speak chang man boy
with reed voic turn two minc steps
into manli stride speak frays
lik fine brag youth tell quaint lies
how honour ladi sought love 
which i deni fell sick die 
i could withal then i repent 
and wish i kill 
and twenti puni lie i tell 
that men shall swear i discontinu school
about twelvemonth i within mind
a thousand raw trick brag jack 
which i practis 

nerissa 
whi shall turn men 

portia 
fie question 
if thou wert near lewd interpret 
but come i tell thee whole device
when i coach stay us
at park gate therefor hast away 
for must measur twenti mile today 

 _exeunt _

 enter launcelet jessica

than honest woman inde i took

thi wit instant i pray thee understand plain man plain

 _exit _ 

lorenzo 
o dear discret word suit 
the fool hath plant memory
an armi good word i know
a mani fool stand better place 
garnish like tricksi word
defi matter how cheer st thou jessica 
and good sweet say thi opinion 
how dost thou like lord bassanio wife 

jessica 
past express it meet
th lord bassanio live upright life 
for bless ladi 
he find joy heaven earth 
and earth merit 
in reason never come heaven 
whi two god play heavenli match 
and wager lay two earthli women 
and portia one must someth else
pawn poor rude world
hath fellow 

lorenzo 
even husband
hast thou wife

nay ask opinion 

lorenzo 
i anon first let us go dinner 

jessica

then howsom er thou speak st mong things
i shall digest

 _exeunt _ 


act iv

scen i venic a court justic 

 enter duke magnifico antonio bassanio gratiano salerio

duke 
what antonio 

antonio 
readi pleas grace 

duke

a stoni adversari inhuman wretch 
uncap piti void empty
from dram merci 

antonio 
i heard
your grace hath ta en great pain qualify
hi rigor cours sinc stand obdur 
and law mean carri me
out envi reach i oppose
mi patienc furi arm d
to suffer quiet spirit
th tyranni rage

 enter shylock 

duke 
make room let stand face 
shylock world think i think 
that thou leadest fashion thi malice
to last hour act ti thought 
thou lt show thi merci remors strange
than thi strang appar cruelti 
and thou exact penalti 
which pound poor merchant flesh 
thou wilt loos forfeitur 
but touch human gentl love 
forgiv moieti princip 
glanc eye piti losses
that late huddl back 
enow press royal merchant 
and pluck commiser state
from brassi bosom rough heart flint 
from stubborn turk tartar never train d
to offic tender courtesi 
we expect gentl answer jew 

shylock 
i possess grace i purpos 
and holi sabbath i sworn
to due forfeit bond 
if deni let danger light
upon charter citi freedom 
you ask i rather choos have
a weight carrion flesh receive
thre thousand ducat i answer 
but say humour is answer 
what hous troubl rat 
and i plea give ten thousand ducats
to ban what answer yet 
some men love gape pig 
some mad behold cat 
and other bagpip sing nose 
cannot contain urin affection
mistress passion sway mood
of like loath now answer 
a firm reason render d
whi can not abid gape pig 
whi harmless necessari cat 
whi woollen bagpip force
must yield inevit shame
a offend offend 
so i give reason i 
more lodg hate certain loathing
i bear antonio i follow thus
a lose suit are answer 

bassanio 
thi answer thou unfeel man 
to excus current thi cruelti 

shylock 
i bound pleas thee answer 

bassanio 
do men kill thing love 

shylock 
hate man thing would kill 

bassanio 
everi offenc hate first 

shylock 
what wouldst thou serpent sting thee twice 

antonio 
i pray think question jew 
you may well go stand upon beach
and bid main flood bate usual height 
you may well use question wolf 
whi hath made ewe bleat lamb 
you may well forbid mountain pines
to wag high top make noise
when fretten gust heaven 
you may well anyth hard
a seek soften harder 
hi jewish heart therefor i beseech 
make moe offer use farther mean 
but brief plain conveni 
let judgment jew 

bassanio 
for thi three thousand ducat six 

shylock 
if everi ducat six thousand ducats
wer six part everi part ducat 
i would draw i would bond 

duke 
how shalt thou hope merci rend ring none 

shylock 
what judgment shall i dread wrong 
you among mani purcha slave 
which like ass dog mule 
you use abject slavish part 
becaus bought shall i say you
 let free marri heir 
whi sweat burden let beds
b made soft let palates
b season viand you answer
 the slave so i answer 
the pound flesh i demand him
i dearli bought ti mine i 
if deni fie upon law 
there forc decre venic 
i stand judgment answer shall i 

duke 
upon power i may dismiss court 
unless bellario learn doctor 
whom i sent determin 
come today 

salarino 
mi lord stay without
a messeng letter doctor 
new come padua 

duke 
bring us letter call messeng 

bassanio 
good cheer antonio what man courag yet 
the jew shall flesh blood bone 
ere thou shalt lose one drop blood 

antonio

meetest death weakest kind fruit
drop earliest ground let 
you can not better employ bassanio 
than live still write mine epitaph

act v

scene i belmont the avenu portia hous 

 enter lorenzo jessica 

lorenzo 
the moon shine bright in night 
when sweet wind gentli kiss tree 
and make nois night 
troilu methink mount trojan wall 
and sigh soul toward grecian tents
wher cressid lay night 

jessica 
in night
did thisbi fear ertrip dew 
and saw lion shadow ere 
and ran dismay away 

lorenzo 
in night
stood dido willow hand
upon wild sea bank waft love
to come carthag 

jessica 
in night
medea gather enchant herbs
that renew old son 

lorenzo 
in night
did jessica steal wealthi jew 
and unthrift love run venice
a far belmont 

jessica 
in night
did young lorenzo swear love well 
steal soul mani vow faith 
and ne er true one 

lorenzo 
in night
did pretti jessica like littl shrew 
slander love forgav

i would night bodi come 
but hark i hear foot man

and yet matter go

 _exit stephano _ 

how sweet moonlight sleep upon bank 
here sit let sound music
creep ear soft still night
becom touch sweet harmoni 
sit jessica look floor heaven
i thick inlaid paten bright gold 
there smallest orb thou behold st
but motion like angel sing 
still quir young eye cherubin 
such harmoni immort soul 
but whilst muddi vestur decay
doth grossli close can not hear 

 enter musician 

come ho wake diana hymn 
with sweetest touch pierc mistress ear 
and draw home music 

 _music _ 

jessica 
i never merri i hear sweet music 

lorenzo 
the reason spirit attent 
for note wild wanton herd
or race youth unhandl colt 
fetch mad bound bellow neigh loud 
which hot condit blood 
if hear perchanc trumpet sound 
or air music touch ear 
you shall perceiv make mutual stand 
their savag eye turn modest gaze
bi sweet power music therefor poet
did feign orpheu drew tree stone flood 
sinc naught stockish hard full rage 
but music time doth chang natur 
the man hath music 
nor mov concord sweet sound 
i fit treason stratagem spoil 
the motion spirit dull night 
and affect dark erebu 
let man trust mark music 

 enter portia nerissa 

portia 
that light see burn hall 
how far littl candl throw beam 
so shine good deed naughti world 

nerissa 
when moon shone see candl 

portia 
so doth greater glori dim less 
a substitut shine brightli king
until king state
empti doth inland brook
into main water music hark 

nerissa 
it music madam hous 

portia 
noth good i see without respect 
methink sound much sweeter day 

nerissa 
silenc bestow virtu madam 

portia 
the crow doth sing sweetli lark
when neither attend i think
th nightingal sing day
when everi goos cackl would thought
no better musician wren 
how mani thing season season are
to right prais true perfect 
peac how moon sleep endymion 
and would awak

lorenzo 
that voic 
or i much deceiv portia 

portia 
he know blind man know cuckoo 
bi bad voic

which speed hope better word 
are return

to signifi come

no note absent henc

 _to nerissa_ by yonder moon i swear wrong

would gelt part 
sinc take love much heart

about hoop gold paltri ring
that give whose posi was
for world like cutler poetry
upon knife love leav 

nerissa 
what talk posi valu 
you swore i give 
that would wear till hour death 
and lie grave 
though yet vehement oath 
you respect kept

the clerk ne er wear hair face

he live man

ay woman live man

i could heart deni

to part slightli wife first gift 
a thing stuck oath upon finger 
and rivet faith unto flesh

nev part stand 
i dare sworn would leav it
nor pluck finger wealth
that world master now faith gratiano 
you give wife unkind caus grief 
an twere i mad

 _asid _ whi i best cut left hand

gratiano

unto judg begg indeed
deserv and boy clerk 
that took pain write begg mine 
and neither man master would take aught
but two ring

what ring gave lord 
not i hope receiv 

bassanio

i would deni see finger
hath ring upon gone 

portia 
even void fals heart truth 
bi heaven i ne er come bed
until i see ring 

nerissa 
nor i yours
til i see mine 

bassanio 
sweet portia 
if know i gave ring 
if know i gave ring 
and would conceiv i gave ring 
and unwillingli i left ring 
when nought would accept ring 
you would abat strength displeasur 

portia 
if known virtu ring 
or half worthi gave ring 
or honour contain ring 
you would part ring 
what man much unreason 
if plea defend it
with term zeal want modesty
to urg thing held ceremoni 
nerissa teach believ 
i die woman ring 

bassanio 
no honour madam soul 
no woman civil doctor 
which refus three thousand ducat 
and begg ring i deni 
and suffer go displea away 
even held life
of dear friend what i say sweet ladi 
i enforc send 
i beset shame courtesi 
mi honour would let ingratitude
so much besmear pardon good ladi 
for bless candl night 
had i think would begg d
the ring give worthi doctor 

portia 
let doctor e er come near hous 
sinc hath got jewel i love 
and swear keep 
i becom liber 
i deni anyth i 
no bodi husband bed 
know i shall i well sure 
lie night home watch like argu 
if i left alon 
now mine honour yet mine 
i doctor mine bedfellow 

nerissa 
and i clerk therefor well advi d
how leav mine protect 

gratiano 
well let take 
for i i mar young clerk pen 

antonio 
i th unhappi subject quarrel 

portia

bassanio 
portia forgiv enforc wrong 
and hear mani friends
i swear thee even thine fair eye 
wherein i see 

portia 
mark 
in eye doubli see 
in eye one swear doubl self 
and oath credit 

bassanio 
nay hear 
pardon fault soul i swear
i never break oath thee 

antonio 
i lend bodi wealth 
which husband ring
had quit miscarri i dare bound 
mi soul upon forfeit lord
wil never break faith advisedli 

portia 
then shall sureti give 
and bid keep better 

antonio 
here lord bassanio swear keep ring 

bassanio 
bi heaven i gave doctor 

portia 
i pardon bassanio 
for ring doctor lay 

nerissa 
and pardon gentl gratiano 
for scrub boy doctor clerk 
in lieu last night lie 

gratiano 
whi like mend highways
in summer way fair enough 
what cuckold ere deserv 

portia 
speak grossli you amaz 
here letter read leisur 
it come padua bellario 
there shall find portia doctor 
nerissa clerk lorenzo here
shal wit i set forth soon 
and even return i yet
ent hous antonio welcom 
and i better news store you
than expect unseal letter soon 
there shall find three argosies
ar richli come harbour suddenli 
you shall know strang accident
i chanc letter 

antonio 
i dumb 

bassanio 
were doctor i knew 

gratiano 
were clerk make cuckold 

nerissa 
ay clerk never mean 
unless live man 

bassanio 
sweet doctor shall bedfellow 
when i absent lie wife 

antonio 
sweet ladi given life live 
for i read certain ships
ar safe come road 

portia 
how lorenzo 
mi clerk hath good comfort 

nerissa 
ay i give without fee 
there i give jessica 
from rich jew special deed gift 
after death die possess 

lorenzo 
fair ladi drop manna way
of starv peopl 

portia 
it almost morn 
and yet i sure satisfied
of event full let us go 
and charg us upon inter gatori 
and answer thing faith 

gratiano 
let the first inter gatory
that nerissa shall sworn 
whether till next night rather stay 
or go bed two hour day 
but day come i wish dark
til i couch doctor clerk 
well i live i fear thing
so sore keep safe nerissa ring 

 _exeunt _ 



the merri wive of windsor

scen 4 

befor page s house

ent fenton ann page

 fenton i see i can not get thi father love 
 therefor turn sweet nan 
 ann ala 
 fenton whi thou must thyself 
 he doth object i great birth 
 and state gall expens 
 i seek heal wealth 
 besid bar lay 
 my riot past wild societi 
 and tell ti thing impossible
 i love thee properti 
 ann may tell true 
 fenton no heaven speed time come 
 albeit i confess thi father wealth
 wa first motiv i woo thee ann 
 yet woo thee i found thee value
 than stamp gold sum seal bag 
 and ti rich thyself
 that i aim 
 ann gentl master fenton 
 yet seek father love still seek sir 
 if opportun humblest suit
 can not attain hark hither 
 they convers apart 

 enter shallow slender mistress quickly

 shallow break talk mistress quickli kinsman
 shall speak 
 slender i make shaft bolt slid ti but
 ventur

 i afeard

 o world vile ill favour faults

 word

anoth part park

 respect make beast man man beast you were

 near god drew complexion goos a fault done first in

a midsumm night s dream

act i

scen i athen a room palac theseus

 enter theseu hippolyta philostr attend 

theseu 
now fair hippolyta nuptial hour
draw apac four happi day bring in
anoth moon oh methink slow
thi old moon wane she linger desir 
like step dame dowag 
long wither young man revenu 

hippolyta 
four day quickli steep night 
four night quickli dream away time 
and moon like silver bow
new bent heaven shall behold night
of solemn 

theseu 
go philostr 
stir athenian youth merriment 
awak pert nimbl spirit mirth 
turn melancholi forth funer 
the pale companion pomp 

 _exit philostr _ 

hippolyta i woo thee sword 
and thi love thee injuri 
but i wed thee anoth key 
with pomp triumph revel 

 enter egeu hermia lysand demetriu 

egeu 
happi theseu renownd duke 

theseu 
thank good egeu what news thee 

egeu 
full vexat come i complaint
against child daughter hermia 
stand forth demetriu my nobl lord 
thi man hath consent marri 
stand forth lysand and graciou duke 
thi man hath bewitch bosom child 
thou thou lysand thou hast given rhyme 
and interchang love token child 
thou hast moonlight window sung 
with feign voic vers feign love 
and stol n impress fantasy
with bracelet thi hair ring gaud conceit 
knack trifl nosegay sweetmeat messengers
of strong prevail unharden youth 
with cun hast thou filch daughter heart 
turn obedi due 
to stubborn harsh and graciou duke 
be grace
cons marri demetriu 
i beg ancient privileg athen 
a mine i may dispos 
which shall either gentleman
or death accord law
immedi provid case 

theseu 
what say hermia be advi fair maid 
to father god 
one compo beauti yea one
to form wax
bi imprint within power
to leav figur disfigur 
demetriu worthi gentleman 

hermia 
so lysand 

theseu 
in 
but kind want father voic 
the must held worthier 

hermia 
i would father look eye 

theseu 
rather eye must judgment look 

hermia 
i entreat grace pardon 
i know power i made bold 
nor may concern modesty
in presenc plead thought 
but i beseech grace i may know
th worst may befal case 
if i refus wed demetriu 

theseu 
either die death abjure
for ever societi men 
therefor fair hermia question desir 
know youth examin well blood 
whether yield father choic 
you endur liveri nun 
for aye shadi cloister mew 
to live barren sister life 
chant faint hymn cold fruitless moon 
thrice blessd master blood
to undergo maiden pilgrimag 
but earthlier happi rose distil d
than wither virgin thorn 
grow live die singl blessed 

hermia 
so i grow live die lord 
ere i yield virgin patent up
unto lordship whose unwishd yoke
mi soul consent give sovereignti 

theseu 
take time paus next new moon
th seal day betwixt love me
for everlast bond fellowship 
upon day either prepar die
for disobedi father 
or els wed demetriu would 
or diana altar protest
for aye auster singl life 

demetriu 
relent sweet hermia lysand yield
thi crazd titl certain right 

lysand 
you father love demetriu 
let hermia do marri 

egeu 
scorn lysand true hath love 
and mine love shall render 
and mine right her
i estat unto demetriu 

lysand 
i lord well deriv 
a well possess love 
mi fortun everi way fairli rank 
if vantag demetriu 
and boast 
i belov beauteou hermia 
whi i prosecut right 
demetriu i avouch head 
made love nedar daughter helena 
and soul sweet ladi dote 
devoutli dote dote idolatri 
upon spot inconst man 

theseu 
i must confess i heard much 
and demetriu thought spoke thereof 
but full self affair 
mi mind lose but demetriu come 
and come egeu shall go 
i privat school 
for fair hermia look arm yourself
to fit fanci father 
or els law athen yield up
 which mean may extenu 
to death vow singl life 
come hippolyta what cheer love 
demetriu egeu go along 
i must employ business
against nuptial confer you
of someth nearli concern 

egeu 
with duti desir follow 

 _exeunt lysand hermia _ 

lysand 
how love whi cheek pale 
how chanc rose fade fast 

hermia 
belik want rain i could well
beteem tempest eye 

lysand 
ay for aught i could ever read 
could ever hear tale histori 
the cours true love never run smooth 
but either differ blood 

hermia 
o cross too high enthral low 

lysand 
or els misgraffd respect year 

hermia 
o spite too old engag young 

lysand 
or els stood upon choic friend 

hermia 
o hell choos love anoth eye 

lysand 
or sympathi choic 
war death sick lay sieg 
make momentani sound 
swift shadow short dream 
brief lightn colli night
that spleen unfold heaven earth 
and ere man hath power say behold 
the jaw dark devour 
so quick bright thing come confus 

hermia 
if true lover ever cross 
it stand edict destini 
then let us teach trial patienc 
becaus customari cross 
a due love thought dream sigh 
wish tear poor fanci follow 

lysand 
a good persuas therefor hear hermia 
i widow aunt dowager
of great revenu hath child 
from athen hous remot seven leagu 
and respect son 
there gentl hermia may i marri thee 
and place sharp athenian law
cannot pursu us if thou lovest 
steal forth thi father hous tomorrow night 
and wood leagu without town
 where i meet thee helena
to observ morn may 
there i stay thee 

hermia 
mi good lysand 
i swear thee cupid strongest bow 
bi best arrow golden head 
bi simplic venu dove 
bi knitteth soul prosper love 
and fire burn carthag queen
when fals trojan sail seen 
bi vow ever men broke
 in number ever women spoke 
in place thou hast appoint 
tomorrow truli i meet thee 

lysand 
keep promis love look come helena 

 enter helena 

hermia 
god speed fair helena whither away 

helena 
call fair that fair unsay 
demetriu love fair o happi fair 
your eye lode star tongu sweet air
mor tuneabl lark shepherd ear 
when wheat green hawthorn bud appear 
sick catch o favour 
your would i catch fair hermia ere i go 
mi ear catch voic eye eye 
mi tongu catch tongu sweet melodi 
were world mine demetriu bate 
the rest i give translat 
o teach look art
you sway motion demetriu heart 

hermia 
i frown upon yet love still 

helena 
o frown would teach smile skill 

hermia 
i give curs yet give love 

helena 
o prayer could affect move 

hermia 
the i hate follow 

helena 
the i love hateth 

hermia 
hi folli helena fault mine 

helena 
none beauti would fault mine 

hermia 
take comfort shall see face 
lysand fli place 
befor time i lysand see 
seem athen paradis 
o grace love dwell 
that hath turn heaven hell 

lysand 
helen mind unfold 
tomorrow night phoeb doth behold
h silver visag wateri glass 
deck liquid pearl blade grass
 a time lover flight doth still conceal 
through athen gate devi steal 

hermia 
and wood often i
upon faint primros bed wont lie 
empti bosom counsel sweet 
there lysand shall meet 
and thenc athen turn away eye 
to seek new friend stranger compani 
farewel sweet playfellow pray thou us 
and good luck grant thee thi demetriu 
keep word lysand we must starv sight
from lover food till morrow deep midnight 

lysand 
i hermia 

 _exit hermia _ 

helena adieu 
a demetriu dote 

 _exit lysand _ 

helena 
how happi er 
through athen i thought fair 
but demetriu think 
he know know 
and err dote hermia eye 
so i admir qualiti 
thing base vile hold quantiti 
love transpos form digniti 
love look eye mind 
and therefor wing cupid paint blind 
nor hath love mind judgment tast 
wing eye figur unheedi hast 
and therefor love said child 
becaus choic oft beguil 
a waggish boy game forswear 
so boy love perjur everywher 
for ere demetriu look hermia eyn 
he hail oath mine 
and hail heat hermia felt 
so dissolv shower oath melt 
i go tell fair hermia flight 
then wood tomorrow night
pursu intelligence
if i thank dear expens 
but herein mean i enrich pain 
to sight thither back 

 _exit helena _ 


scene ii the same a room cottage

 enter quinc snug bottom flute snout starvel 

quinc 
i compani 

bottom 
you best call gener man man accord the
scrip 

quinc 
here scroll everi man name thought fit through
al athen play interlud duke duchess on
hi wed day night 

bottom 
first good peter quinc say play treat read the
nam actor grow point 

quinc 
marri play _the lament comedi cruel death of
pyramu thisbe_ 

bottom 
a good piec work i assur merri now good peter
quinc call forth actor scroll master spread
yourselv 

quinc 
answer i call nick bottom weaver 

bottom 
readi name part i proceed 

quinc 
you nick bottom set pyramu 

bottom 
what pyramu lover tyrant 

quinc 
a lover kill gallantli love 

bottom 
that ask tear true perform if i let
th audienc look eye i move storm i condol in
som measur to rest yet chief humour tyrant i could
play ercl rare part tear cat make split 

 the rage rocks
 and shiver shocks
 shall break locks
 of prison gate 
 and phibbu car
 shall shine far 
 and make mar
 the foolish fate 

thi lofti now name rest player thi ercl vein 
a tyrant vein lover condol 

quinc 
franci flute bellow mender 

flute 
here peter quinc 

quinc 
flute must take thisb 

flute 
what thisb a wander knight 

quinc 
it ladi pyramu must love 

flute 
nay faith let play woman i beard come 

quinc 
that one you shall play mask may speak small
a 

bottom 
and i may hide face let play thisb i speak a
monstr littl voic thisn thisn ah pyramu lover dear 
thi thisb dear ladi dear 

quinc 
no must play pyramu flute thisb 

bottom 
well proceed 

quinc 
robin starvel tailor 

starvel 
here peter quinc 

quinc 
robin starvel must play thisb mother 
tom snout tinker 

snout
her peter quinc 

quinc 
you pyramu father thisb father 
snug joiner lion part and i hope play
fit 

snug
hav lion part written pray give i
am slow studi 

quinc 
you may extempor noth roar 

bottom 
let play lion i roar i man heart
good hear i roar i make duke say let him
roar let roar 

quinc 
if terribl would fright duchess the
ladi would shriek enough hang us 

all
that would hang us everi mother son 

bottom 
i grant friend fright ladi their
wit would discret hang us but i will
aggrav voic i roar gentli sucking
dov i roar twere nightingal 

quinc 
you play part pyramu pyramu sweet face man a
prop man one shall see summer day lovely
gentleman like man therefor must need play pyramu 

bottom 
well i undertak what beard i best play 

quinc 
whi 

bottom 
i discharg either straw colour beard your
orang tawni beard purpl grain beard your
french crown colour beard perfect yellow 

quinc 
some french crown hair play
bar face but master part i entreat 
request desir con tomorrow night meet me
in palac wood mile without town moonlight will
w rehears meet citi shall dogg with
compani devic known in meantim i draw bill of
properti play want i pray fail 

bottom 
we meet may rehears obscen and
courag take pain perfect adieu 

quinc 
at duke oak meet

 _exeunt _ 


act ii

scen i a wood near athens

 enter fairi one door puck anoth 

puck 
how spirit whither wander 

fairy
 over hill dale 
 thorough bush thorough brier 
 over park pale 
 thorough flood thorough fire 
 i wander everywher 
 swifter moon sphere 
 and i serv fairi queen 
 to dew orb upon green 
 the cowslip tall pension 
 in gold coat spot see 
 those rubi fairi favour 
 in freckl live savour 
i must go seek dew drop 
and hang pearl everi cowslip ear 
farewel thou lob spirit i gone 
our queen elv come anon 

puck 
the king doth keep revel tonight 
take heed queen come within sight 
for oberon pass fell wrath 
becaus attend hath
a love boy stol n indian king 
she never sweet changel 
and jealou oberon would child
knight train trace forest wild 
but perforc withhold lovd boy 
crown flower make joy 
and never meet grove green 
bi fountain clear spangl starlight sheen 
but squar elv fear
creep acorn cup hide 

fairy
eith i mistak shape make quit 
or els shrewd knavish sprite
cal robin goodfellow are he
that fright maiden villageri 
skim milk sometim labour quern 
and bootless make breathless housewif churn 
and sometim make drink bear barm 
mislead night wander laugh harm 
those hobgoblin call sweet puck 
you work shall good luck 
are 

puck 
thou speak st aright 
i merri wander night 
i jest oberon make smile 
when i fat bean fed hors beguil 
neigh like filli foal 
and sometim lurk i gossip bowl
in like roast crab 
and drink lip i bob 
and wither dewlap pour ale 
the wisest aunt tell saddest tale 
sometim three foot stool mistaketh 
then slip i bum toppl 
and tailor cri fall cough 
and whole quir hold hip loffe
and waxen mirth neez swear
a merrier hour never wast 
but room fairi here come oberon 

fairy
and mistress would gone 

 enter oberon one door train titania anoth with
 

oberon 
ill met moonlight proud titania 

titania 
what jealou oberon fairi skip henc 
i forsworn bed compani 

oberon 
tarri rash wanton i thi lord 

titania 
then i must thi ladi i know
when thou hast stol n away fairyland 
and shape corin sat day
play pipe corn vers love
to amor phillida whi art thou 
come farthest steep india 
but forsooth bounc amazon 
your buskin mistress warrior love 
to theseu must wed come
to give bed joy prosper 

oberon 
how canst thou thu shame titania 
glanc credit hippolyta 
know i know thi love theseu 
didst thou lead glimmer night
from perigenia ravish 
and make fair aegl break faith 
with ariadn antiopa 

titania 
these forgeri jealousi 
and never sinc middl summer spring 
met hill dale forest mead 
bi pavd fountain rushi brook 
or beachd margent sea 
to danc ringlet whistl wind 
but thi brawl thou hast disturb sport 
therefor wind pipe us vain 
a reveng suck sea
contagi fog fall land 
hath everi pelt river made proud
that overborn contin 
the ox hath therefor stretch yoke vain 
the ploughman lost sweat green corn
hath rot ere youth attain beard 
the fold stand empti drownd field 
and crow fat murrion flock 
the nine men morri fill mud 
and quaint maze wanton green 
for lack tread undistinguish 
the human mortal want winter 
no night hymn carol blest 
therefor moon gover flood 
pale anger wash air 
that rheumat diseas abound 
and thorough distemperatur see
th season alter hoari head frosts
fal fresh lap crimson rose 
and old hiem thin ici crown
an odor chaplet sweet summer buds
i mockeri set the spring summer 
the child autumn angri winter change
their wont liveri maze world 
bi increas know 
and progeni evil comes
from debat dissens 
we parent origin 

oberon 
do amend it lie 
whi titania cross oberon 
i beg littl changel boy
to henchman 

titania 
set heart rest 
the fairyland buy child 
hi mother vot ress order 
and spicd indian air night 
full often hath gossip side 
and sat neptun yellow sand 
mark th embarkd trader flood 
when laugh see sail conceiv 
and grow big belli wanton wind 
which pretti swim gait
follow womb rich young squir 
would imit sail upon land 
to fetch trifl return 
a voyag rich merchandis 
but mortal boy die 
and sake i rear boy 
and sake i part 

oberon 
how long within wood intend stay 

titania 
perchanc till theseu wed day 
if patient danc round 
and see moonlight revel go us 
if shun i spare haunt 

oberon 
give boy i go thee 

titania 
not thi fairi kingdom fairi away 
we shall chide downright i longer stay 

 _exit titania train _ 

oberon 
well go thi way thou shalt grove
til i torment thee injuri 
mi gentl puck come hither thou rememb rest
sinc i sat upon promontori 
and heard mermaid dolphin back
utt dulcet harmoni breath
that rude sea grew civil song
and certain star shot madli spheres
to hear sea maid music 

puck 
i rememb 

oberon 
that time i saw thou couldst 
fli cold moon earth 
cupid arm certain aim took
at fair vestal thrond west 
and loo love shaft smartli bow
a pierc hundr thousand heart 
but i might see young cupid fieri shaft
quench chast beam wateri moon 
and imperi votress pass 
in maiden medit fanci free 
yet mark i bolt cupid fell 
it fell upon littl western flower 
befor milk white purpl love wound 
and maiden call love idl 
fetch flower herb i show thee 
the juic sleep eyelid laid
wil make man woman madli dote
upon next live creatur see 
fetch herb thou again
er leviathan swim leagu 

puck 
i put girdl round earth
in forti minut 

 _exit puck _ 

oberon 
have juic 
i watch titania asleep 
and drop liquor eye 
the next thing wake look upon
 be lion bear wolf bull 
on meddl monkey busi ape 
she shall pursu soul love 
and ere i take charm sight
 as i take anoth herb 
i make render page 
but come i invis 
and i overhear confer 

 enter demetriu helena follow 

demetriu 
i love thee therefor pursu 
where lysand fair hermia 
the one i slay slayeth 
thou told st stol n wood 
and i wode within wood
becaus i can not meet hermia 
henc get thee gone follow

you draw hard heart adam 
but yet draw iron heart
i true steel leav power draw 
and i shall power follow 

demetriu 
do i entic do i speak fair 
or rather i plainest truth
tel i i can not love 

helena 
and even i love 
i spaniel demetriu 
the beat i fawn

neglect lose give leav

what worser place i beg love

than usd use dog

for i sick i look thee

and i sick i look

to leav citi commit yourself

and ill counsel desert place 
with rich worth virgin

it night i see face

for respect world 
then said i alone
when world look

 enter lysand hermia

so one heart make

then side bed room deni 
for lie hermia i lie

now much beshrew manner pride

li human modesti 
such separ may well said
becom virtuou bachelor maid 
so far distant good night sweet friend 
thi love ne er alter till thi sweet life end

 enter puck 

puck

but athenian found i none 
on whose eye i might approve
thi flower forc stir love 
night silenc who 
weed athen doth wear 
thi master said 
despisd athenian maid 
and maiden sleep sound 
on dank dirti ground

near lack love kill courtesi

al power charm doth owe

sleep seat thi eyelid 
so awak i gone 
for i must oberon

 _exit demetriu _ 

helena 
o i breath fond chase 
the prayer lesser grace 
happi hermia whereso er lie 
for hath blessd attract eye 
how came eye bright not salt tear 
if eye often wash 
no i ugli bear 
for beast meet run away fear 
therefor marvel though demetrius
do monster fli presenc thu 
what wick dissembl glass mine
mad compar hermia spheri eyn 
but lysand ground 
dead asleep i see blood wound 
lysand live good sir awak 

lysand 
 _wake _ and run fire i thi sweet sake 
transpar helena natur show art 
that thi bosom make see thi heart 
where demetriu o fit word
i vile name perish sword 

helena 
do say lysand say 
what though love hermia lord though 
yet hermia still love then content 

lysand 
content hermia no i repent
th tediou minut i spent 
not hermia helena i love 
who chang raven dove 
the man reason sway 
and reason say worthier maid 
thing grow ripe season 
so i young till ripe reason 
and touch point human skill 
reason becom marshal 
and lead eye i erlook
lov stori written love richest book 

helena 
wherefor i keen mockeri born 
when hand i deserv scorn 
i enough enough young man 
that i never never can
deserv sweet look demetriu eye 
but must flout insuffici 
good troth wrong good sooth 
in disdain manner woo 
but fare well perforc i must confess 
i thought lord true gentl 
o ladi one man refu 
should anoth therefor abu 

 _exit _ 

lysand 
she see hermia hermia sleep thou 
and never mayst thou come lysand near 
for surfeit sweetest things
th deepest loath stomach bring 
or heresi men leave
ar hate deceiv 
so thou surfeit heresi 
of hate 
and power address love might
to honour helen knight

what hear gone no sound word 
alack speak hear

no then i well perceiv nigh 
either death i find immedi

scene ii anoth part wood

 enter oberon 

oberon

then next came eye 
which must dote extrem 

 enter puck 

here come messeng how mad spirit 
what night rule haunt grove 

puck 
mi mistress monster love 
near close consecr bower 
while dull sleep hour 
a crew patch rude mechan 
that work bread upon athenian stall 
were met togeth rehears play
intend great theseu nuptial day 
the shallowest thick skin barren sort
who pyramu present sport 
forsook scene enter brake 
when i advantag take 
an ass nole i fix head 
anon thisb must answerd 
and forth mimic come when spi 
a wild gees creep fowler eye 
or russet pate chough mani sort 
rise caw gun report 
sever madli sweep sky 
so sight away fellow fli 
and stamp er er one fall 
he murder cri help athen call 
their sens thu weak lost fear thu strong 
made senseless thing begin wrong 
for brier thorn apparel snatch 
some sleev hat yielder thing catch 
i led distract fear 
and left sweet pyramu translat 
when moment came pass 
titania wak straightway lov ass

that wak forc must ey 

 enter demetriu hermia 

oberon 
stand close thi athenian 

puck 
thi woman man

lay breath bitter bitter foe

be er shoe blood plung deep 
and kill 
the sun true unto day
a would stol n away
from sleep hermia i believ soon
thi whole earth may bor moon
may centr creep displease
h brother noontid th antipod 
it can not thou hast murder 
so murder look dead grim

pierc heart stern cruelti 
yet murder look bright clear 
a yonder venu glimmer sphere

what lysand where 
ah good demetriu wilt thou give

henceforth never number among men 
o tell true tell true even sake 
durst thou look upon awak 
and hast thou kill sleep o brave touch 
could worm adder much 
an adder doubler tongue
than thine thou serpent never adder stung

i guilti lysand blood 
nor dead aught i tell

see whether dead

demetriu 
there follow fierc vein 
here therefor i remain

for debt bankrupt sleep doth sorrow owe 
which slight measur pay 
if tender i make stay

 enter lysand helena

 _wake _ o helen goddess nymph perfect divin

thi lip kiss cherri tempt grow 
that pure congeald white high tauru snow 
fann eastern wind turn crow
when thou hold st thi hand o let kiss
thi princess pure white seal bliss 

helena 
o spite o hell i see bent
to set merriment 
if civil knew courtesi 
you would thu much injuri 
can hate i know 
but must join soul mock 
if men men show 
you would use gentl ladi 
to vow swear superprais part 
when i sure hate heart 
you rival love hermia 
and rival mock helena 
a trim exploit manli enterpris 
to conjur tear poor maid eyes
with deris none nobl sort
would offend virgin extort
a poor soul patienc make sport

for love hermia know i know 
and good heart

and helena bequeath 
whom i love till death

never mocker wast idl breath

mi heart guest wise sojourn

 enter hermia 

hermia 
dark night eye function take 
the ear quick apprehens make 
wherein doth impair see sens 
it pay hear doubl recompens

mine ear i thank brought thi sound 
but unkindli didst thou leav 

lysand

hermia 
what love could press lysand side 

lysand 
lysand love would let bide 
fair helena engild night
than yon fieri oe eye light 
whi seek st thou could make thee know
th hate i bare thee made leav thee 

hermia 
you speak think can not 

helena 
lo one confederaci 
now i perceiv conjoin three
to fashion fals sport spite 
injuri hermia ungrat maid 
have conspir contriv 
to bait foul deris 
i counsel two shar 
the sister vow hour spent 
when chid hasti foot time
for part us o forgot 
all school day friendship childhood innoc 
we hermia like two artifici god 
have needl creat one flower 
both one sampler sit one cushion 
both warbl one song one key 
a hand side voic mind 
had incorpor so grew togeth 
like doubl cherri seem part 
but yet union partit 
two love berri mould one stem 
so two seem bodi one heart 
two first like coat heraldri 
due one crownd one crest 
and rent ancient love asund 
to join men scorn poor friend 
it friendli ti maidenli 
our sex well i may chide 
though i alon feel injuri 

hermia 
i amazd passion word 
i scorn seem scorn 

helena 
have set lysand scorn 
to follow prais eye face 
and made love demetriu 
who even spurn foot 
to call goddess nymph divin rare 
preciou celesti wherefor speak this
to hate and wherefor doth lysander
deni love rich within soul 
and tender forsooth affect 
but set consent 
what though i grace 
so hung upon love fortun 
but miser love unlov 
thi piti rather despis 

hermia 
i understand mean 

helena 
ay persev counterfeit sad look 
make mouth upon i turn back 
wink hold sweet jest 
thi sport well carri shall chronicl 
if piti grace manner 
you would make argument 
but fare ye well ti partli fault 
which death absenc soon shall remedi 

lysand 
stay gentl helena hear excus 
mi love life soul fair helena 

helena 
o excel

sweet scorn

thi threat strength weak prayer

although i hate i harm 

hermia

hate wherefor o news love 
am i hermia are lysand 
i fair i erewhil

that i hate thee love helena

have modesti maiden shame

impati answer gentl tongu 
fie fie counterfeit puppet

and grown high esteem
becaus i dwarfish low 
how low i thou paint maypol speak 
how low i i yet low
but nail reach unto thine eye

that i match

bi athenian garment

oberon

hie therefor robin overcast night 
the starri welkin cover thou anon
with droop fog black acheron 
and lead testi rival astray
a one come within anoth way 
like lysand sometim frame thi tongu 
then stir demetriu bitter wrong 
and sometim rail thou like demetriu 
and look thou lead thu 
till er brow death counterfeit sleep
with leaden leg batti wing doth creep 
then crush herb lysand eye 
whose liquor hath virtuou properti 
to take thenc error might
and make eyebal roll wont sight 
when next wake derision
shal seem dream fruitless vision 
and back athen shall lover wend 
with leagu whose date till death shall never end 
while i affair thee employ 
i queen beg indian boy 
and i charmd eye release
from monster view thing shall peac 

puck 
mi fairi lord must done hast 
for night swift dragon cut cloud full fast 
and yonder shine aurora harbing 
at whose approach ghost wander there
troop home churchyard damnd spirit 
that cross way flood burial 
alreadi wormi bed gone 
for fear lest day look shame upon 
they wil exil light 
and must aye consort black brow night 

oberon 
but spirit anoth sort 
i morn love oft made sport 
and like forest grove may tread
even till eastern gate fieri red 
open neptun fair blessd beam 
turn yellow gold salt green stream 
but notwithstand hast make delay 
we may effect busi yet ere day

act v

scene i athen an apart palac theseus

 enter theseu hippolyta philostr lord attend 

hippolyta 
 ti strang theseu lover speak 

theseu 
more strang true i never may believe
thes antiqu fabl fairi toy 
lover madmen seeth brain 
such shape fantasi apprehend
mor cool reason ever comprehend 
the lunat lover poet
ar imagin compact 
one see devil vast hell hold 
that madman lover frantic 
see helen beauti brow egypt 
the poet eye fine frenzi roll 
doth glanc heaven earth earth heaven 
and imagin bodi forth
th form thing unknown poet pen
turn shape give airi nothing
a local habit name 
such trick hath strong imagin 
that would apprehend joy 
it comprehend bringer joy 
or night imagin fear 
how easi bush suppos bear 

hippolyta 
but stori night told 
and mind transfigur togeth 
more witnesseth fanci imag 
and grow someth great constanc 
but howsoev strang admir

to wear away long age three hours

to eas anguish tortur hour 
call philostr

that old devic play d
when i thebe came last conqueror

of learn late decea beggari 
that satir keen critic 
not sort nuptial ceremoni 
 a tediou brief scene young pyramus
and love thisb tragic mirth 
merri tragic tediou brief 
that hot ice wondrou strang snow 
how shall find concord discord 

philostr 
a play lord ten word long 
which brief i known play 
but ten word lord long 
which make tediou for play
ther one word apt one player fit 
and tragic nobl lord

made mine eye water merri tears
th passion loud laughter never shed

with play nuptial

to servic

go bring take place ladi

tak might merit

to greet premedit welcom

and conclus dumbl broke

and modesti fear duty

in least speak capac

prologue
gentl perchanc wonder show 
but wonder till truth make thing plain 
thi man pyramu would know 
thi beauteou ladi thisb certain

wal vile wall lover sunder

to whisper let man wonder 
thi man lanthern dog bush thorn

to meet ninu tomb woo

 now i fled 
 my soul sky 
 tongu lose thi light 
 moon take thi flight 
 now die die die die die 

 _di exit moonshin _ 

demetriu 
no die ace one 

lysand 
less ace man dead noth 

theseu 
with help surgeon might yet recov prove ass

how chanc moonshin gone thisb come back find her
lov 


theseu 
she find starlight 

 enter thisb 

here come passion end play

methink use long one pyramu i hope she
wil brief

a mote turn balanc pyramu thisb the
bett man god warrant us woman god bless us

she hath spi alreadi sweet eye

and thu mean _videlicet_ 

thisb 
 asleep love 
 what dead dove 
 o pyramu aris 
 speak speak quit dumb 
 dead dead a tomb
 must cover thi sweet eye 
 these lili lip 
 thi cherri nose 
 these yellow cowslip cheek 
 are gone gone 
 lover make moan 
 hi eye green leek 
 o sister three 
 come come 
 with hand pale milk 
 lay gore 
 sinc shore
 with shear thread silk 
 tongu word 
 come trusti sword 
 come blade breast imbru
