 derbi it want nomin 
 bishop of eli to morrow i judg happi day 
 buckingham who know lord protector mind
 herein 
 who inward nobl duke 
 bishop of eli your grace think soonest know
 mind 
 buckingham we know face heart 
 he know mine i 
 or i lord mine 
 lord hast near love 
 hast i thank grace i know love well 
 but purpos coronation
 i sound deliv d
 hi graciou pleasur way therein 
 but honour lord may name time 
 and duke behalf i give voic 
 which i presum take gentl part 

 enter gloucester

 bishop of eli in happi time come duke 
 gloucest my nobl lord cousin good morrow 
 i long sleeper i trust
 my absenc doth neglect great design
 which presenc might conclud 
 buckingham had come upon cue lord 
 william lord hast pronounc part 
 i mean voic crown king 
 gloucest than lord hast man might be
 bolder 
 hi lordship know well love well 
 my lord eli i last holborn
 i saw good strawberri garden 
 i beseech send 
 bishop eli marri lord heart 
 exit
 gloucest cousin buckingham word 
 take asid 
 catesbi hath sound hast busi 
 and find testi gentleman hot
 that lose head ere give consent
 hi master child worship term 
 shall lose royalti england throne 
 buckingham withdraw awhil i go 
 exeunt gloucest buckingham
 derbi we yet set day triumph 
 to morrow judgment sudden 
 for i well provided
 as els i would day prolong 

 re enter bishop of ely

 bishop of eli where lord duke gloucest 
 i sent strawberri 
 hast hi grace look cheer smooth this
 morn 
 there conceit like well
 when bid good morrow spirit 
 i think never man christendom
 can lesser hide love hate 
 for face straight shall know heart 
 derbi what heart perceiv face
 by livelihood show day 
 hast marri man offend 
 for shown look 

 re enter gloucest buckingham

 gloucest i pray tell deserve
 that conspir death devilish plots
 of damn witchcraft prevail d
 upon bodi hellish charm 
 hast the tender love i bear grace lord 
 make forward princ presence
 to doom th offend whoso er 
 i say lord deserv death 
 gloucest then eye wit evil 
 look i bewitch behold mine arm
 is like blast sapl wither 
 and edward wife monstrou witch 
 consort harlot strumpet shore 
 that witchcraft thu mark 
 hast if done deed nobl lord 
 gloucest if thou protector damn strumpet 
 talk st thou if thou art traitor 
 off head now saint paul i swear
 i dine i see 
 lovel ratcliff look done 
 the rest love rise follow 
 exeunt hast lovel ratcliff
 hast woe woe england whit 
 for i fond might prevent 
 stanley dream boar raze helm 
 and i scorn disdain fli 
 three time day foot cloth hors stumbl 
 and start look upon tower 
 as loath bear slaughter hous 
 o i need priest spake 
 i repent i told pursuiv 
 as triumph mine enemies
 to day pomfret bloodili butcher 
 and i secur grace favour 
 o margaret margaret thi heavi curse
 is light poor hast wretch head 
 ratcliff come come dispatch duke would at
 dinner 
 make short shrift long see head 
 hast o momentari grace mortal men 
 which hunt grace god 
 who build hope air good looks
 live like drunken sailor mast 
 readi everi nod tumbl down
 into fatal bowel deep 
 lovel come come dispatch ti bootless exclaim 
 hast o bloodi richard miser england 
 i prophesi fearful st time thee
 that ever wretch age hath look upon 
 come lead block bear head 
 they smile shortli shall dead exeunt

scen 5 

london the tower walls

ent gloucest buckingham rotten armour marvellous
il favoured

 gloucest come cousin canst thou quak change
 thi colour 
 murder thi breath middl word 
 and begin stop 
 as thou distraught mad terror 
 buckingham tut i counterfeit deep tragedian 
 speak look back pri everi side 
 trembl start wag straw 
 intend deep suspicion ghastli looks
 are servic like enforc smile 
 and readi offices
 at time grace stratagem 
 but catesbi gone 
 gloucest he see bring mayor along 

 enter lord mayor catesby

 buckingham lord mayor 
 gloucest look drawbridg 
 buckingham hark drum 
 gloucest catesbi erlook wall 
 buckingham lord mayor reason sent 
 gloucest look back defend thee enemi 
 buckingham god innoc defend guard us 

 enter lovel ratcliff hast head

 gloucest be patient friend ratcliff lovel 
 lovel here head ignobl traitor 
 the danger unsuspect hast 
 gloucest so dear i lov man i must weep 
 i took plainest harmless creature
 that breath upon earth christian 
 made book wherein soul recorded
 the histori secret thought 
 so smooth daub vice show virtue
 that appar open guilt omit 
 i mean convers shore wife 
 he liv attaind suspect 
 buckingham well well covert st shelt red
 traitor
 that ever liv 
 would imagin almost believ 
 were great preservation
 we live tell subtl traitor
 thi day plot council hous 
 to murder good lord gloucest 
 mayor had done 
 gloucest what think turk infidel 
 or would form law 
 proce thu rashli villain death
 but extrem peril case 
 the peac england person safeti 
 enforc us execut 
 mayor now fair befal he deserv death 
 and good grace well proceeded
 to warn fals traitor like attempt 
 i never look better hands
 after fell mistress shore 
 buckingham yet determin die
 until lordship came see end 
 which love hast friend 
 someth mean prevent 
 becaus lord i would heard
 the traitor speak timor confess
 the manner purpos treason 
 that might well signifi same
 unto citizen hapli may
 misconst us wail death 
 mayor but good lord grace word shall serve
 as well i seen heard speak 
 and doubt right nobl princ 
 but i acquaint duteou citizens
 with proceed caus 
 gloucest and end wish lordship 
 t avoid censur carp world 
 buckingham which sinc come late intent 
 yet wit hear intend 
 and good lord mayor bid farewel 
 exit lord mayor
 gloucest go cousin buckingham 
 the mayor toward guildhal hie post 
 there meet st advantag time 
 infer bastardi edward children 
 tell edward put death citizen
 onli say would make son
 heir crown mean inde hous 
 which sign thereof term 
 moreov urg hate luxury
 and bestial appetit chang lust 
 which stretch unto servant daughter wive 
 even rage eye savag heart
 without control lust make prey 
 nay need thu far come near person 
 tell mother went child
 of insati edward nobl york
 my princ father war france
 and true comput time 
 found issu begot 
 which well appear lineament 
 be noth like nobl duke father 
 yet touch sparingli twere far 
 becaus lord know mother live 
 buckingham doubt lord i play orator
 as golden fee i plead
 were lord adieu 
 gloucest if thrive well bring baynard s
 castl 
 where shall find well accompanied
 with reverend father well learn bishop 
 buckingham i go toward three four clock
 look news guildhal afford exit
 gloucest go lovel speed doctor shaw 
 to catesbi go thou friar penker bid both
 meet within hour baynard castl 
 exeunt gloucester
 now i go take privi order
 to draw brat clarenc sight 
 and give order manner person
 have time recours unto princ exit

scen 6 

london a street

ent scrivener

 scriven here indict good lord hast 
 which set hand fairli engross d
 that may day read er paul 
 and mark well sequel hang togeth 
 eleven hour i spent write 
 for yesternight catesbi sent 
 the preced full long 
 and yet within five hour hast liv 
 untaint unexamin free liberti 
 here good world who gros
 that can not see palpabl devic 
 yet bold say see 
 bad world come nought 
 when ill deal must seen thought exit

scen 7 

london baynard castle

ent gloucest buckingham sever doors

 gloucest how what say citizen 
 buckingham now holi mother lord 
 the citizen mum say word 
 gloucest touch bastardi edward s
 children 
 buckingham i contract ladi luci 
 and contract deputi franc 
 th insati greedi desir 
 and enforc citi wive 
 hi tyranni trifl bastardi 
 as got father franc 
 and resembl like duke 
 withal i infer lineament 
 be right idea father 
 both form nobl mind 
 laid open victori scotland 
 your disciplin war wisdom peac 
 your bounti virtu fair humil 
 inde left noth fit purpose
 untouch slightli handl discours 
 and mine oratori drew toward end
 i bid love countri good
 cri god save richard england royal king 
 gloucest and 
 buckingham no god help spake word 
 but like dumb statu breath stone 
 star look deadli pale 
 which i saw i reprehend 
 and ask mayor meant wilful silenc 
 hi answer peopl used
 to spoke record 
 then urg tell tale 
 thu saith duke thu hath duke inferr 
 but noth spoke warrant 
 when done follow mine own
 at lower end hall hurl cap 
 and ten voic cri god save king richard 
 and thu i took vantag 
 thank gentl citizen friend quoth i
 thi gener applaus cheer shout
 argu wisdom love richard 
 and even brake came away 
 gloucest what tongueless block would
 speak 
 will mayor brethren come 
 buckingham the mayor hand intend fear 
 be spoke mighti suit 
 and look get prayer book hand 
 and stand two churchmen good lord 
 for ground i make holi descant 
 and easili request 
 play maid part still answer nay take 
 gloucest i go plead well them
 as i say nay thee 
 no doubt bring happi issu 
 buckingham go go lead lord mayor
 knock exit gloucester

 enter lord mayor aldermen citizens

 welcom lord i danc attend 
 i think duke spoke withal 

 enter catesby

 now catesbi say lord request 
 catesbi he doth entreat grace nobl lord 
 to visit morrow next day 
 he within two right reverend father 
 divin bent medit 
 and worldli suit would mov 
 to draw holi exercis 
 buckingham return good catesbi graciou duke 
 tell mayor aldermen 
 in deep design matter great moment 
 no less import gener good 
 are come confer grace 
 catesbi i signifi much unto straight exit
 buckingham ah ha lord princ edward 
 he loll lewd love bed 
 but knee medit 
 not dalli brace courtezan 
 but medit two deep divin 
 not sleep engross idl bodi 
 but pray enrich watch soul 
 happi england would virtuou prince
 take grace sovereignti thereof 
 but sure i fear shall win 
 mayor marri god defend grace say us nay 
 buckingham i fear here catesbi come 

 re enter catesby

 now catesbi say grace 
 catesbi my lord 
 he wonder end assembled
 such troop citizen come 
 hi grace warn thereof 
 he fear lord mean good 
 buckingham sorri i nobl cousin should
 suspect i mean good 
 by heaven come perfect love 
 and return tell grace 
 exit catesby
 when holi devout religi men
 are bead ti much draw thenc 
 so sweet zealou contempl 

 enter gloucest aloft two bishop 
 catesbi returns

 mayor see grace stand tween two clergymen 
 buckingham two prop virtu christian princ 
 to stay fall vaniti 
 and see book prayer hand 
 true ornament know holi man 
 famou plantagenet graciou princ 
 lend favour ear request 
 and pardon us interruption
 of thi devot right christian zeal 
 gloucest my lord need apolog 
 i beseech grace pardon 
 who earnest servic god 
 deferr visit friend 
 but leav grace pleasur 
 buckingham even i hope pleaseth god 
 and good men ungovern isl 
 gloucest i suspect i done offence
 that seem disgraci citi eye 
 and come reprehend ignor 
 buckingham you lord would might please
 grace 
 on entreati amend fault 
 gloucest els wherefor breath i christian land 
 buckingham know fault resign
 the suprem seat throne majest 
 the scept red offic ancestor 
 your state fortun due birth 
 the lineal glori royal hous 
 to corrupt blemish stock 
 while mild sleepi thought 
 which waken countri good 
 the nobl isl doth want proper limb 
 her face defac scar infami 
 her royal stock graft ignobl plant 
 and almost red swallow gulf
 of dark forget deep oblivion 
 which recur heartili solicit
 your graciou self take charge
 and kingli govern land 
 not protector steward substitut 
 or lowli factor anoth gain 
 but success blood blood 
 your right birth emperi 
 for consort citizen 
 your worship love friend 
 and vehement instig 
 in caus come i move grace 
 gloucest i can not tell depart silence
 or bitterli speak reproof
 best fitteth degre condit 
 if answer might hapli think
 tongu tie ambit repli yielded
 to bear golden yoke sovereignti 
 which fondli would impos 
 if reprov suit 
 so season faith love 
 then side i check friend 
 therefor speak avoid first 
 and speak incur last 
 definit thu i answer 
 your love deserv thank desert
 unmerit shun high request 
 first obstacl cut away 
 and path even crown 
 as ripe revenu due birth 
 yet much poverti spirit 
 so mighti mani defect 
 that i would rather hide great 
 be bark brook mighti sea 
 than great covet hid 
 and vapour glori smother 
 but god thank need 
 and much i need help need 
 the royal tree hath left us royal fruit
 which mellow steal hour time 
 will well becom seat majesty
 and make doubt us happi reign 
 on i lay would lay 
 the right fortun happi star 
 which god defend i wring 
 buckingham my lord argu conscienc your
 grace 
 but respect thereof nice trivial 
 all circumst well consid 
 you say edward brother son 
 so say edward wife 
 for first contract ladi luci 
 your mother live wit vow 
 and afterward substitut betroth d
 to bona sister king franc 
 these put poor petition 
 a care craz mother mani son 
 a beauti wane distress widow 
 even afternoon best day 
 made prize purchas wanton eye 
 seduc pitch height degree
 to base declens loath bigami 
 by unlaw bed got
 thi edward manner call princ 
 more bitterli could i expostul 
 save rever aliv 
 i give spare limit tongu 
 then good lord take royal self
 thi proffer benefit digniti 
 if bless us land withal 
 yet draw forth nobl ancestry
 from corrupt abus times
 unto lineal true deriv cours 
 mayor do good lord citizen entreat 
 buckingham refus mighti lord proffer love 
 catesbi o make joy grant law suit 
 gloucest ala would heap care 
 i unfit state majesti 
 i beseech take amiss 
 i can not i yield 
 buckingham if refus love zeal 
 loath depos child brother son 
 as well know tender heart
 and gentl kind effemin remors 
 which note kindred
 and egal inde estat 
 yet know whe er accept suit 
 your brother son shall never reign king 
 but plant throne
 to disgrac downfal hous 
 and resolut leav 
 come citizen zound i entreat 
 gloucest o swear lord buckingham 
 exeunt buckingham mayor citizens
 catesbi call sweet princ accept suit 
 if deni land rue 
 gloucest will enforc world care 
 call i made stone 
 but penetr kind entreati 
 albeit conscienc soul 

 re enter buckingham rest

 cousin buckingham sage grave men 
 sinc buckl fortun back 
 to bear burden whe er i 
 i must patienc endur load 
 but black scandal foul fac reproach
 attend sequel imposit 
 your mere enforc shall acquitt me
 from impur blot stain thereof 
 for god doth know may partli see 
 how far i desir 
 mayor god bless grace we see say 
 gloucest in say shall say truth 
 buckingham then i salut royal titl 
 long live king richard england worthi king 
 all amen 
 buckingham to morrow may pleas crown 
 gloucest even pleas 
 buckingham to morrow attend grace 
 and joy take leav 
 gloucest to bishop come let us holy
 work 
 farewel cousin farewel gentl friend exeunt

act iv scene 1 

london befor tower

ent queen elizabeth duchess york marqui dorset one
door 
ann duchess gloucest lead ladi margaret plantagenet 
clarenc young daughter anoth door

 duchess who meet us my niec plantagenet 
 led hand kind aunt gloucest 
 now life wand ring tower 
 on pure heart love greet tender princ 
 daughter well met 
 ann god give grace both
 a happi joy time day 
 queen elizabeth as much good sister whither
 away 
 ann no farther tower i guess 
 upon like devot 
 to gratul gentl princ 
 queen elizabeth kind sister thank enter
 togeth 

 enter brakenbury

 and good time lieuten come 
 master lieuten pray leav 
 how doth princ young son york 
 brakenburi right well dear madam by patienc 
 i may suffer visit 
 the king hath strictli charg contrari 
 queen elizabeth the king who 
 brakenburi i mean lord protector 
 queen elizabeth the lord protect kingly
 titl 
 hath set bound love 
 i mother shall bar 
 duchess i father mother i see 
 ann their aunt i law love mother 
 then bring sight i bear thi blame 
 and take thi offic thee peril 
 brakenburi no madam i may leav 
 i bound oath therefor pardon exit

 enter stanley

 stanley let meet ladi one hour henc 
 and i salut grace york mother
 and reverend looker two fair queen 
 to ann come madam must straight to
 westminst 
 there crown richard royal queen 
 queen elizabeth ah cut lace asunder
 that pent heart may scope beat 
 or els i swoon dead kill news 
 ann despit tide o unpleas news 
 dorset be good cheer mother fare grace 
 queen elizabeth o dorset speak get thee
 gone 
 death destruct dog thee thi heel 
 thi mother name omin children 
 if thou wilt outstrip death go cross sea 
 and live richmond reach hell 
 go hie thee hie thee slaughter hous 
 lest thou increas number dead 
 and make die thrall margaret curs 
 nor mother wife england count queen 
 stanley full wise care counsel madam 
 take swift advantag hour 
 you shall letter son
 in behalf meet way 
 be ta en tardi unwis delay 
 duchess o ill dispers wind miseri 
 o accurs womb bed death 
 a cockatric hast thou hatch world 
 whose unavoid eye murder 
 stanley come madam come i hast sent 
 ann and i unwilling go 
 o would god inclus verge
 of golden metal must round brow
 were red hot steel sear brain 
 anoint let deadli venom 
 and die ere men say god save queen 
 queen elizabeth go go poor soul i envi thi glori 
 to feed humour wish thyself harm 
 ann no when husband now
 came i follow henri cors 
 when scarc blood well wash hands
 which issu angel husband 
 and dear saint i weep follow 
 o i say i look richard face 
 thi wish be thou quoth i accur d
 for make young old widow 
 and thou wed st let sorrow haunt thi bed 
 and thi wife mad 
 more miser life thee
 than thou hast made dear lord death 
 lo ere i repeat curs 
 within small time woman heart
 grossli grew captiv honey words
 and prov subject mine soul curs 
 which hitherto hath held eye rest 
 for never yet one hour bed
 did i enjoy golden dew sleep 
 but timor dream still awak 
 besid hate father warwick 
 and doubt shortli rid 
 queen elizabeth poor heart adieu i piti thi complain 
 ann no soul i mourn 
 dorset farewel thou woeful welcom glori 
 ann adieu poor soul tak st thi leav 
 duchess to dorset go thou richmond good
 fortun guid thee 
 to ann go thou richard good angel tend
 thee to queen elizabeth go thou sanctuari good
 thought possess thee 
 i grave peac rest lie 
 eighti odd year sorrow i seen 
 and hour joy wreck week teen 
 queen elizabeth stay yet look back unto the
 tower 
 piti ancient stone tender babes
 whom envi hath immur within wall 
 rough cradl littl pretti one 
 rude rag nurs old sullen playfellow
 for tender princ use babi well 
 so foolish sorrow bid stone farewel exeunt

scen 2 

london the palace

sound sennet enter richard pomp king buckingham catesbi 
ratcliff lovel page others

 king richard stand apart cousin buckingham 
 buckingham my graciou sovereign 
 king richard give thi hand 
 here ascendeth throne sound 
 thu high thi advice
 and thi assist king richard seat 
 but shall wear glori day 
 or shall last rejoic 
 buckingham still live ever let last 
 king richard ah buckingham i play touch 
 to tri thou current gold inde 
 young edward live think i would speak 
 buckingham say love lord 
 king richard whi buckingham i say i would king 
 buckingham whi thrice renown lord 
 king richard ha i king ti edward live 
 buckingham true nobl princ 
 king richard o bitter consequ 
 that edward still live true nobl princ 
 cousin thou wast wont dull 
 shall i plain i wish bastard dead 
 and i would suddenli perform 
 what say st thou speak suddenli brief 
 buckingham your grace may pleasur 
 king richard tut tut thou art ice thi kind freez 
 say i thi consent shall die 
 buckingham give littl breath paus 
 dear lord 
 befor i posit speak 
 i resolv herein present exit
 catesbi asid anoth the king angri see he
 gnaw lip 
 king richard i convers iron wit fools
 descend throne 
 and unrespect boy none me
 that look consider eye 
 high reach buckingham grow circumspect 
 boy 
 page my lord 
 king richard know st thou corrupting
 gold
 will tempt unto close exploit death 
 page i know discont gentleman
 whose humbl mean match haughti spirit 
 gold good twenti orat 
 and doubt tempt anyth 
 king richard what name 
 page hi name lord tyrrel 
 king richard i partli know man go call hither 
 boy exit page
 the deep revolv witti buckingham
 no shall neighbour counsel 
 hath long held untir 
 and stop breath well 

 enter stanley

 how lord stanley what news 
 stanley know love lord 
 the marqui dorset i hear fled
 to richmond part abid stand apart 
 king richard come hither catesbi rumour abroad
 that ann wife grievou sick 
 i take order keep close 
 inquir mean poor gentleman 
 whom i marri straight clarenc daughter 
 the boy foolish i fear 
 look thou dream st i say give out
 that ann queen sick like die 
 about stand much upon
 to stop hope whose growth may damag 
 exit catesby
 i must marri brother daughter 
 or els kingdom stand brittl glass 
 murder brother marri 
 uncertain way gain but i in
 so far blood sin pluck sin 
 tear fall piti dwell eye 

 re enter page tyrrel

 is thi name tyrrel 
 tyrrel jame tyrrel obedi subject 
 king richard art thou inde 
 tyrrel prove graciou lord 
 king richard dar st thou resolv kill friend mine 
 tyrrel pleas 
 but i rather kill two enemi 
 king richard whi thou hast two deep enemi 
 foe rest sweet sleep disturb 
 are i would thee deal upon 
 tyrrel i mean bastard tower 
 tyrrel let open mean come 
 and soon i rid fear 
 king richard thou sing st sweet music hark come
 hither tyrrel 
 go token rise lend thine ear whisper 
 there say done 
 and i love thee prefer thee 
 tyrrel i dispatch straight exit

 re enter buckingham

 buckingham my lord i consid mind
 the late request sound 
 king richard well let rest dorset fled to
 richmond 
 buckingham i hear news lord 
 king richard stanley wife son well look
 unto 
 buckingham my lord i claim gift due promis 
 for honour faith pawn 
 th earldom hereford movables
 which promis i shall possess 
 king richard stanley look wife convey
 letter richmond shall answer 
 buckingham what say high request 
 king richard i rememb henri sixth
 did prophesi richmond king 
 when richmond littl peevish boy 
 a king perhap 
 buckingham my lord 
 king richard how chanc prophet could that
 time
 have told i i kill 
 buckingham my lord promis earldom 
 king richard richmond when last i exet 
 the mayor courtesi show castle
 and call rugemount name i start 
 becaus bard ireland told once
 i live long i saw richmond 
 buckingham my lord 
 king richard ay clock 
 buckingham i thu bold put grace mind
 of promi 
 king richard well clock 
 buckingham upon stroke ten 
 king richard well let strike 
 buckingham whi let strike 
 king richard becaus like jack thou keep st the
 stroke
 betwixt thi beg medit 
 i give vein day 
 buckingham may pleas resolv suit 
 king richard thou troublest i vein 
 exeunt buckingham
 buckingham and thu repay deep service
 with contempt made i king 
 o let think hast gone
 to brecknock fear head exit

scen 3 

london the palace

ent tyrrel

 tyrrel the tyrann bloodi act done 
 the arch deed piteou massacre
 that ever yet land guilti 
 dighton forrest i suborn
 to piec ruthless butcheri 
 albeit flesh villain bloodi dog 
 melt tender mild compass 
 wept like two children death sad stori 
 o thu quoth dighton lay gentl babe 
 thu thu quoth forrest girdl one another
 within alabast innoc arm 
 their lip four red rose stalk 
 and summer beauti kiss 
 a book prayer pillow lay 
 which quoth forrest almost chang mind 
 but o devil villain stopp 
 when dighton thu told we smothered
 the replenish sweet work nature
 that prime creation e er frame 
 henc gone conscienc remorse
 they could speak i left 
 to bear tide bloodi king 

 enter king richard

 and come all health sovereign lord 
 king richard kind tyrrel i happi thi news 
 tyrrel if done thing gave charge
 beget happi happi 
 for done 
 king richard but didst thou see dead 
 tyrrel i lord 
 king richard and buri gentl tyrrel 
 tyrrel the chaplain tower hath buri 
 but say truth i know 
 king richard come tyrrel soon supper 
 when thou shalt tell process death 
 meantim think i may thee good
 and inheritor thi desir 
 farewel till 
 tyrrel i humbl take leav exit
 king richard the son clarenc i pent close 
 hi daughter meanli i match marriag 
 the son edward sleep abraham bosom 
 and ann wife hath bid world good night 
 now i know britain richmond aims
 at young elizabeth brother daughter 
 and knot look proudli crown 
 to go i jolli thrive wooer 

 enter ratcliff

 ratcliff my lord 
 king richard good bad news thou com st so
 bluntli 
 ratcliff bad news lord morton fled richmond 
 and buckingham back hardi welshmen 
 is field still power increaseth 
 king richard eli richmond troubl near
 than buckingham rash levi strength 
 come i learn fear commenting
 is leaden servitor dull delay 
 delay lead impot snail pac beggari 
 then fieri expedit wing 
 jove mercuri herald king 
 go muster men my counsel shield 
 we must brief traitor brave field exeunt

scen 4 

london befor palace

ent old queen margaret

 queen margaret so prosper begin mellow
 and drop rotten mouth death 
 here confin slili i lurk d
 to watch wane mine enemi 
 a dire induct i wit 
 and franc hope consequence
 will prove bitter black tragic 
 withdraw thee wretch margaret who come 
 retir 

 enter queen elizabeth duchess of york

 queen elizabeth ah poor princ ah tender
 babe 
 my unblown flower new appear sweet 
 if yet gentl soul fli air
 and fix doom perpetu 
 hover airi wings
 and hear mother lament 
 queen margaret hover say right right
 hath dimm infant morn age night 
 duchess so mani miseri craz voice
 that woe weari tongu still mute 
 edward plantagenet art thou dead 
 queen margaret plantagenet doth quit plantagenet 
 edward edward pay die debt 
 queen elizabeth wilt thou o god fli gentle
 lambs
 and throw entrail wolf 
 when didst thou sleep deed done 
 queen margaret when holi harri die sweet
 son 
 duchess dead life blind sight poor mortal live ghost 
 woe scene world shame grave due life usurp 
 brief abstract record tediou day 
 rest thi unrest england law earth sit 
 unlaw made drunk innoc blood 
 queen elizabeth ah thou wouldst soon afford a
 grave
 as thou canst yield melancholi seat 
 then would i hide bone rest 
 ah hath caus mourn 
 sit 
 queen margaret come forward if ancient sorrow be
 reverend 
 give mine benefit seniori 
 and let grief frown upper hand 
 if sorrow admit societi sit 
 tell er woe view mine 
 i edward till richard kill 
 i husband till richard kill 
 thou hadst edward till richard kill 
 thou hadst richard till richard kill 
 duchess i richard thou didst kill 
 i rutland thou holp st kill 
 queen margaret thou hadst clarenc richard
 kill 
 from forth kennel thi womb hath crept
 a hell hound doth hunt us death 
 that dog teeth eyes
 to worri lamb lap gentl blood 
 that foul defac god handiwork 
 that excel grand tyrant earth
 that reign gall eye weep soul 
 thi womb let loos chase us grave 
 o upright true dispos god 
 how i thank thee carnal cur
 prey issu mother body
 and make pew fellow other moan 
 duchess o harri wife triumph woe 
 god wit i wept thine 
 queen margaret bear i hungri reveng 
 and i cloy behold 
 thi edward dead kill edward 
 the edward dead quit edward 
 young york boot they
 match high perfect loss 
 thi clarenc dead stabb edward 
 and behold frantic play 
 th adulter hast river vaughan grey 
 untim smother duski grave 
 richard yet live hell black intelligenc 
 onli reserv factor buy souls
 and send thither but hand hand 
 ensu piteou unpiti end 
 earth gape hell burn fiend roar saint pray 
 to suddenli convey henc 
 cancel bond life dear god i pray 
 that i may live say the dog dead 
 queen elizabeth o thou didst prophesi time would
 come
 that i wish thee help curse
 that bottl spider foul bunch back toad 
 queen margaret i call thee vain flourish my
 fortun 
 i call thee poor shadow paint queen 
 the present i 
 the flatter index dire pageant 
 one heav high hurl 
 a mother mock two fair babe 
 a dream thou wast garish flag
 to aim everi danger shot 
 a sign digniti breath bubbl 
 a queen jest fill scene 
 where thi husband where thi brother 
 where thi two son wherein dost thou joy 
 who sue kneel say god save queen 
 where bend peer flatter thee 
 where throng troop follow thee 
 declin see thou art 
 for happi wife distress widow 
 for joy mother one wail name 
 for one su one humbl sue 
 for queen caitiff crown care 
 for scorn scorn 
 for fear fear one 
 for command obey none 
 thu hath cours justic whirl about
 and left thee prey time 
 have thought thou wast
 to tortur thee thou art 
 thou didst usurp place dost thou not
 usurp proport sorrow 
 now thi proud neck bear half burden yoke 
 from even i slip weari head
 and leav burden thee 
 farewel york wife queen sad mischanc 
 these english woe shall make smile franc 
 queen elizabeth o thou well skill curs stay awhile
 and teach curs mine enemi 
 queen margaret forbear sleep night fast the
 day 
 compar dead happi live woe 
 think thi babe sweeter 
 and slew fouler 
 bett ring thi loss make bad causer wors 
 revolv teach thee curs 
 queen elizabeth my word dull o quicken them
 thine 
 queen margaret thi woe make sharp and
 pierc like mine exit
 duchess whi calam fun word 
 queen elizabeth windi attorney client woe 
 airi succeed intest joy 
 poor breath orat miseri 
 let scope though impart
 help noth els yet case heart 
 duchess if tongu tie go 
 and breath bitter word let smother
 my damn son thi two sweet son smother 
 the trumpet sound copiou exclaim 

 enter king richard train march with
 drum trumpets

 king richard who intercept expedit 
 duchess o might intercept thee 
 by strangl thee accurs womb 
 from slaughter wretch thou hast done 
 queen elizabeth hidest thou forehead golden
 crown
 where brand right right 
 the slaughter princ ow crown 
 and dire death poor son brother 
 tell thou villain slave children 
 duchess thou toad thou toad thi brother
 clarenc 
 and littl ned plantagenet son 
 queen elizabeth where gentl river vaughan 
 grey 
 duchess where kind hast 
 king richard a flourish trumpet strike alarum drum 
 let heaven hear tell tale women
 rail lord anoint strike i say 
 flourish alarum 
 either patient entreat fair 
 or clamor report war
 thu i drown exclam 
 duchess art thou son 
 king richard ay i thank god father 
 duchess then patient hear impati 
 king richard madam i touch condition
 that can not brook accent reproof 
 duchess o let speak 
 king richard do i hear 
 duchess i mild gentl word 
 king richard and brief good mother i hast 
 duchess art thou hasti i stay thee 
 god know torment agoni 
 king richard and came i last comfort 
 duchess no holi rood thou know st well
 thou cam st earth make earth hell 
 a grievou burden thi birth 
 tetchi wayward thi infanc 
 thi school day fright desp rate wild furiou 
 thi prime manhood dare bold ventur 
 thi age confirm proud subtl sli bloodi 
 more mild yet harm kind hatr 
 what comfort hour canst thou name
 that ever grac thi compani 
 king richard faith none humphrey hour call d
 grace
 to breakfast forth compani 
 if i disgraci eye 
 let march offend madam 
 strike drum 
 duchess i prithe hear speak 
 king richard you speak bitterli 
 duchess hear word 
 for i shall never speak thee 
 king richard so 
 duchess either thou wilt die god ordinance
 ere war thou turn conqueror 
 or i grief extrem age shall perish
 and never behold thi face 
 therefor take thee grievou curs 
 which day battl tire thee more
 than complet armour thou wear st 
 my prayer advers parti fight 
 and littl soul edward children
 whisper spirit thine enemies
 and promis success victori 
 bloodi thou art bloodi thi end 
 shame serv thi life doth thi death attend exit
 queen elizabeth though far caus yet much less
 spirit curse
 abid i say amen 
 king richard stay madam i must talk word 
 queen elizabeth i moe son royal blood
 for thee slaughter for daughter richard 
 they shall pray nun weep queen 
 and therefor level hit live 
 king richard you daughter call elizabeth 
 virtuou fair royal graciou 
 queen elizabeth and must die o let her
 live 
 and i corrupt manner stain beauti 
 slander fals edward bed 
 throw veil infami 
 so may live unscarr bleed slaughter 
 i confess edward daughter 
 king richard wrong birth royal
 princess 
 queen elizabeth to save life i say 
 king richard her life safest birth 
 queen elizabeth and safeti die her
 brother 
 king richard lo birth good star opposit 
 queen elizabeth no live ill friend were
 contrari 
 king richard all unavoid doom destini 
 queen elizabeth true avoid grace make destini 
 my babe destin fairer death 
 if grace bless thee fairer life 
 king richard you speak i slain cousin 
 queen elizabeth cousin inde uncle
 cozen d
 of comfort kingdom kindr freedom life 
 whose hand soever lanc tender heart 
 thi head indirectli gave direct 
 no doubt murd rou knife dull blunt
 till whet thi stone hard heart
 to revel entrail lamb 
 but stiff use grief make wild grief tame 
 my tongu thi ear name boys
 till nail anchor thine eye 
 and i desp rate bay death 
 like poor bark sail tackl reft 
 rush piec thi rocki bosom 
 king richard madam thrive i enterprise
 and danger success bloodi war 
 as i intend good yours
 than ever harm 
 queen elizabeth what good cover face of
 heaven 
 to discov good 
 king richard advanc children gentle
 ladi 
 queen elizabeth up scaffold lose their
 head 
 king richard unto digniti height fortun 
 the high imperi type earth glori 
 queen elizabeth flatter sorrow report 
 tell state digniti honour 
 canst thou demis child mine 
 king richard even i ay all
 will i withal endow child thine 
 so leth thi angri soul
 thou drown sad remembr wrongs
 which thou supposest i done thee 
 queen elizabeth be brief lest process thy
 kindness
 last longer tell thi kind date 
 king richard then know soul i love thy
 daughter 
 queen elizabeth my daughter mother think her
 soul 
 king richard what think 
 queen elizabeth that thou dost love daughter from
 thi soul 
 so thi soul love didst thou love brother 
 and heart love i thank thee 
 king richard be hasti confound mean 
 i mean soul i love thi daughter
 and intend make queen england 
 queen elizabeth well dost thou mean shall be
 king 
 king richard even make queen who else
 
 queen elizabeth what thou 
 king richard even how think 
 queen elizabeth how canst thou woo 
 king richard that would i learn 
 as one best acquaint humour 
 queen elizabeth and wilt thou learn 
 king richard madam heart 
 queen elizabeth send man slew her
 brother 
 a pair bleed heart thereon engrave
 edward york then hapli weep 
 therefor present sometim margaret
 did thi father steep rutland blood 
 a handkerchief say drain
 the purpl sap sweet brother bodi 
 and bid wipe weep eye withal 
 if induc move love 
 send letter thi nobl deed 
 tell thou mad st away uncl clarenc 
 her uncl river ay sake
 mad st quick convey good aunt ann 
 king richard you mock madam way
 to win daughter 
 queen elizabeth there way 
 unless thou couldst put shape
 and richard hath done 
 king richard say i love 
 queen elizabeth nay inde can not choos but
 hate thee 
 have bought love bloodi spoil 
 king richard look done can not amend 
 men shall deal unadvisedli sometim 
 which hour give leisur repent 
 if i take kingdom son 
 to make amend i give daughter 
 if i kill issu womb 
 to quicken increas i beget
 mine issu blood upon daughter 
 a grandam name littl less love
 than doat titl mother 
 they children one step 
 even metal blood 
 of one pain save night groans
 endur bid like sorrow 
 your children vexat youth 
 but mine shall comfort age 
 the loss son king 
 and loss daughter made queen 
 i can not make amend i would 
 therefor accept kind i 
 dorset son fear soul
 lead discont step foreign soil 
 thi fair allianc quickli shall home
 to high promot great digniti 
 the king call beauteou daughter wife 
 familiarli shall call thi dorset brother 
 again shall mother king 
 and ruin distress times
 repair doubl rich content 
 what mani goodli day see 
 the liquid drop tear shed
 shall come transform orient pearl 
 advantag loan interest
 of ten time doubl gain happi 
 go mother thi daughter go 
 make bold bash year experi 
 prepar ear hear wooer tale 
 put tender heart th aspir flame
 of golden sovereignti acquaint princes
 with sweet silent hour marriag joy 
 and arm mine hath chastised
 the petti rebel dull brain buckingham 
 bound triumphant garland i come 
 and lead thi daughter conqueror bed 
 to i retail conquest 
 and shall sole victoress caesar caesar 
 queen elizabeth what i best say her father s
 brother
 would lord or shall i say uncl 
 or slew brother uncl 
 under titl shall i woo thee
 that god law honour love
 can make seem pleas tender year 
 king richard infer fair england peac allianc 
 queen elizabeth which shall purchas with
 still last war 
 king richard tell king may command 
 entreat 
 queen elizabeth that hand king s
 king forbid 
 king richard say shall high mighti queen 
 queen elizabeth to wail titl mother doth 
 king richard say i love everlastingli 
 queen elizabeth but long shall titl ever last 
 king richard sweetli forc unto fair life end 
 queen elizabeth but long fairli shall sweet life
 last 
 king richard as long heaven natur lengthen 
 queen elizabeth as long hell richard like 
 king richard say i sovereign subject low 
 queen elizabeth but subject loath such
 sovereignti 
 king richard be eloqu behalf 
 queen elizabeth an honest tale speed best plainly
 told 
 king richard then plainli tell love tale 
 queen elizabeth plain honest harsh style 
 king richard your reason shallow quick 
 queen elizabeth o reason deep and
 dead 
 too deep dead poor infant grave 
 king richard harp string madam past 
 queen elizabeth harp still shall i till heartstrings
 break 
 king richard now georg garter my
 crown 
 queen elizabeth profan dishonour third
 usurp 
 king richard i swear 
 queen elizabeth by noth oath 
 thi georg profan hath lost lordli honour 
 thi garter blemish pawn knightli virtu 
 thi crown usurp disgrac kingli glori 
 if someth thou wouldst swear believ 
 swear someth thou hast wrong 
 king richard then self 
 queen elizabeth thi self self misu 
 king richard now world 
 queen elizabeth ti full thi foul wrong 
 king richard my father death 
 queen elizabeth thi life hath dishonour 
 king richard whi god 
 queen elizabeth god wrong 
 if thou didst fear break oath him 
 the uniti king husband made
 thou hadst broken brother die 
 if thou hadst fear break oath him 
 th imperi metal circl thi head 
 had grac tender templ child 
 and princ breath 
 which two tender bedfellow dust 
 thi broken faith hath made prey worm 
 what canst thou swear 
 king richard the time come 
 queen elizabeth that thou hast wrong time
 erpast 
 for i mani tear wash
 hereaft time time past wrong thee 
 the children live whose father thou hast slaughter 
 ungovern youth wail age 
 the parent live whose children thou hast butche 
 old barren plant wail age 
 swear time come thou hast
 misu ere us time ill us erpast 
 king richard as i intend prosper repent 
 so thrive i danger affairs
 of hostil arm myself confound 
 heaven fortun bar happi hour 
 day yield thi light night thi rest 
 be opposit planet good luck
 to proceed dear heart love 
 immacul devot holi thought 
 i tender thi beauteou princ daughter 
 in consist happi thine 
 without follow thee 
 herself land mani christian soul 
 death desol ruin decay 
 it can not avoid 
 it avoid 
 therefor dear mother i must call 
 be attorney love 
 plead i i 
 not desert i deserv 
 urg necess state time 
 and peevish fond great design 
 queen elizabeth shall i tempt devil thu 
 king richard ay devil tempt good 
 queen elizabeth shall i forget 
 king richard ay self remembr wrong
 
 queen elizabeth yet thou didst kill children 
 king richard but daughter womb i buri 
 where nest spiceri breed
 selv recomfortur 
 queen elizabeth shall i go win daughter thi 
 king richard and happi mother deed 
 queen elizabeth i go write shortli 
 and shall understand mind 
 king richard bear true love kiss farewel 
 kiss exit queen elizabeth
 relent fool shallow chang woman 

 enter ratcliff catesbi following

 how news 
 ratcliff most mighti sovereign western coast
 rideth puissant navi shores
 throng mani doubt hollow heart friend 
 unarm unresolv beat back 
 ti thought richmond admir 
 and hull expect aid
 of buckingham welcom ashor 
 king richard some light foot friend post duke of
 norfolk 
 ratcliff thyself catesbi 
 catesbi here good lord 
 king richard catesbi fli duke 
 catesbi i lord conveni hast 
 king richard ratcliff come hither post salisburi 
 when thou com st thither to catesbi dull 
 unmindful villain 
 whi stay st thou go st duke 
 catesbi first mighti lieg tell high pleasur 
 what grace i shall deliv 
 king richard o true good catesbi bid levi straight
 the greatest strength power make
 and meet suddenli salisburi 
 catesbi i go exit
 ratcliff what may pleas shall i salisburi

 go

 king richard my mind chang 

 enter lord stanley

 stanley news 
 stanley none good lieg pleas with
 hear 
 nor none bad well may report 
 king richard hoyday riddl neither good bad 
 what need st thou run mani mile 
 when thou mayest tell thi tale nearest way 
 onc news 
 stanley richmond sea 
 king richard there let sink sea 
 white liver runag doth 
 stanley i know mighti sovereign guess 
 king richard well guess 
 stanley stirr dorset buckingham morton 
 he make england claim crown 
 king richard is chair empti is sword unsway 
 is king dead empir unpossess 
 what heir york aliv 
 and england king great york heir 
 then tell make upon sea 
 stanley unless lieg i can not guess 
 king richard unless come lieg 
 you can not guess wherefor welshman come 
 thou wilt revolt fli i fear 
 stanley no good lord therefor mistrust 
 king richard where thi power beat back 
 where thi tenant thi follow 
 are upon western shore 
 safe conduct rebel ship 
 stanley no good lord friend north 
 king richard cold friend what the
 north 
 when serv sovereign west 
 stanley they command mighti king 
 pleaseth majesti give leav 
 i muster friend meet grace
 where time majesti shall pleas 
 king richard ay ay thou wouldst gone join with
 richmond 
 but i trust thee 
 stanley most mighti sovereign 
 you caus hold friendship doubt 
 i never never fals 
 king richard go muster men but leav behind
 your son georg stanley look heart firm 
 or els head assur frail 
 stanley so deal i prove true exit

 enter messenger

 messeng my graciou sovereign devonshir 
 as i friend well advertis 
 sir edward courtney haughti prelat 
 bishop exet elder brother 
 with mani moe confeder arm 

 enter anoth messenger

 second messeng in kent lieg guilford in
 arm 
 and everi hour competitors
 flock rebel power grow strong 

 enter anoth messenger

 third messeng my lord armi great buckingham 
 king richard out owl noth song of
 death he strike 
 there take thou till thou bring better news 
 third messeng the news i tell majesty
 is sudden flood fall waters
 buckingham armi disper scatter 
 and wand red away alon 
 no man know whither 
 king richard i cri thee merci 
 there purs cure blow thine 
 hath well advis friend proclaim d
 reward bring traitor 
 third messeng such proclam hath made 
 lord 

 enter anoth messenger

 fourth messeng sir thoma lovel lord marquis
 dorset 
 ti said lieg yorkshir arm 
 but good comfort bring i high 
 the britain navi disper tempest 
 richmond dorsetshir sent boat
 unto shore ask banks
 if assist yea 
 who answer came buckingham
 upon parti he mistrust 
 hoi sail made cours britain 
 king richard march march sinc in
 arm 
 if fight foreign enemi 
 yet beat rebel home 

 re enter catesby

 catesbi my lieg duke buckingham taken 
 that best news that earl richmond
 is mighti power land milford
 is colder tide yet must told 
 king richard away toward salisburi while reason
 here
 a royal battl might lost 
 some one take order buckingham brought
 to salisburi rest march 
 flourish exeunt

scen 5 

lord derbi s house

ent stanley sir christoph urswick

 stanley sir christoph tell richmond 
 that sti deadli boar
 my son georg stanley frank hold 
 if i revolt goe young georg head 
 the fear hold present aid 
 so get thee gone commend thi lord 
 withal say queen hath heartili consented
 he espous elizabeth daughter 
 but tell princ richmond 
 christoph at pembrok ha rford west wale

 and rice ap thoma valiant crew

 my letter resolv mind

act v scene 1 

salisburi an open place

ent sheriff guard buckingham led execution

 buckingham will king richard let speak with
 
 sheriff no good lord therefor patient 
 buckingham hast edward children grey and
 river 
 holi king henri thi fair son edward 
 vaughan miscarried
 by underhand corrupt foul injustic 
 if moodi discont souls
 do cloud behold present hour 
 even reveng mock destruct 
 thi all soul day fellow 
 sheriff it lord 
 buckingham whi all soul day bodi s
 doomsday 
 thi day king edward time
 i wish might fall i found
 fals children wife alli 
 thi day wherein i wish fall
 by fals faith i trust 
 thi all soul day fear soul
 is determin respit wrong 
 that high all seer i dalli with
 hath turn feign prayer head
 and given earnest i begg jest 
 thu doth he forc sword wick men
 to turn point master bosom 
 thu margaret curs fall heavi neck 
 when quoth shall split thi heart sorrow 
 rememb margaret prophetess 
 come lead offic block shame 
 wrong hath wrong blame due blame exeunt

scen 2 

camp near tamworth

ent richmond oxford sir jame blunt sir walter herbert and
oth drum colours

 richmond fellow arm love friend 
 brui underneath yoke tyranni 
 thu far bowel land
 have march without impedi 
 and receiv father stanley
 line fair comfort encourag 
 the wretch bloodi usurp boar 
 that spoil summer field fruit vine 
 swill warm blood like wash make trough
 in embowel bosom foul swine
 is even centr isl 
 near town leicest learn 
 from tamworth thither one day march 
 in god name cheerli courag friend 
 to reap harvest perpetu peace
 by one bloodi trial sharp war 
 oxford everi man conscienc thousand men 
 to fight guilti homicid 
 herbert i doubt friend turn us 
 blunt he hath friend friend fear 
 which dearest need fli 
 richmond all vantag then god name march 
 true hope swift fli swallow wing 
 king make god meaner creatur king exeunt

scen 3 

bosworth field

ent king richard arm norfolk ratcliff earl surreys
and others

 king richard here pitch tent even bosworth
 field 
 my lord surrey look sad 
 surrey my heart ten time lighter look 
 king richard my lord norfolk 
 norfolk here graciou lieg 
 king richard norfolk must knock ha must we
 
 norfolk we must give take love lord 
 king richard up with tent here i lie night 
 soldier begin set king s tent 
 but morrow well one 
 who hath descri number traitor 
 norfolk six seven thousand utmost power 
 king richard whi battalia trebl account 
 besid king name tower strength 
 which upon advers faction want 
 up tent come nobl gentlemen 
 let us survey vantag ground 
 call men sound direct 
 let lack disciplin make delay 
 for lord morrow busi day exeunt

 enter side field 
 richmond sir william brandon oxford dorset 
 other some pitch richmond s tent

 richmond the weari sun hath made golden set 
 and bright tract fieri car
 give token goodli day morrow 
 sir william brandon shall bear standard 
 give ink paper tent 
 i draw form model battl 
 limit leader sever charg 
 and part proport small power 
 my lord oxford sir william brandon 
 and sir walter herbert stay 
 the earl pembrok keep regiment 
 good captain blunt bear good night 
 and second hour morning
 desir earl see tent 
 yet one thing good captain 
 where lord stanley quarter know 
 blunt unless i mista en colour much 
 which well i assur i done 
 hi regiment lie half mile least
 south mighti power king 
 richmond if without peril possibl 
 sweet blunt make good mean speak him
 and give need note 
 blunt upon life lord i undertak 
 and god give quiet rest night 
 richmond good night good captain blunt come 
 gentlemen 
 let us consult upon morrow busi 
 in tent dew raw cold 
 they withdraw tent 

 enter tent king richard norfolk 
 ratcliff catesby

 king richard what clock 
 catesbi it supper time lord 
 it nine clock 
 king richard i sup night 
 give ink paper 
 what beaver easier 
 and armour laid tent 
 catesbi it lieg thing readi 
 king richard good norfolk hie thee thi charg 
 use care watch choos trusti sentinel 
 norfolk i go lord 
 king richard stir lark morrow gentl norfolk 
 norfolk i warrant lord exit
 king richard catesbi 
 catesbi my lord 
 king richard send pursuiv arms
 to stanley regiment bid bring power
 befor sunris lest son georg fall
 into blind cave etern night exit catesby
 fill bowl wine give watch 
 saddl white surrey field morrow 
 look stave sound heavi 
 ratcliff 
 ratcliff my lord 
 king richard saw st thou melancholi lord
 northumberland 
 ratcliff thoma earl surrey 
 much cock shut time troop troop
 went armi cheer soldier 
 king richard so i satisfi give bowl wine 
 i alacr spirit
 nor cheer mind i wont 
 set is ink paper readi 
 ratcliff it lord 
 king richard bid guard watch leav 
 ratcliff mid night come tent
 and help arm leav i say 
 exit ratcliff richard sleeps

 enter derbi richmond tent 
 lord attending

 derbi fortun victori sit thi helm 
 richmond all comfort dark night afford
 be thi person nobl father law 
 tell fare love mother 
 derbi i attorney bless thee thi mother 
 who pray continu richmond good 
 so much the silent hour steal 
 and flaki dark break within east 
 in brief season bid us 
 prepar thi battl earli morn 
 and put thi fortun arbitrement
 of bloodi stroke mortal stare war 
 i i may i would i can not 
 with best advantag deceiv time
 and aid thee doubt shock arm 
 but thi side i may forward 
 lest seen thi brother tender georg 
 be execut father sight 
 farewel leisur fear time
 cut ceremoni vow love
 and ampl interchang sweet discourse
 which long sund red friend dwell upon 
 god give us leisur rite love 
 onc adieu valiant speed well 
 richmond good lord conduct regiment 
 i strive troubl thought take nap 
 lest leaden slumber peis morrow
 when i mount wing victori 
 onc good night kind lord gentlemen 
 exeunt richmond
 o thou whose captain i account 
 look forc graciou eye 
 put hand thi bruis iron wrath 
 that may crush heavi fall
 the usurp helmet adversari 
 make us thi minist chastis 
 that may prais thee victori 
 to thee i commend watch soul
 ere i let fall window mine eye 
 sleep wake o defend still sleep 

 enter ghost of young princ edward 
 son henri the sixth

 ghost to richard let sit heavi thi soul
 morrow 
 think thou stabb dst prime youth
 at tewksburi despair therefor die 
 to richmond be cheer richmond wronged
 souls
 of butcher princ fight thi behalf 
 king henri issu richmond comfort thee 

 enter ghost henri the sixth

 ghost to richard when i mortal anointed
 body
 by thee punch full deadli hole 
 think tower despair die 
 harri sixth bid thee despair die 
 to richmond virtuou holi thou conqueror 
 harri prophesi thou shouldst king 
 doth comfort thee thi sleep live flourish 

 enter ghost clarence

 ghost to richard let sit heavi thi soul
 morrow i wash death fulsom wine 
 poor clarenc thi guil betray death 
 to morrow battl think 
 and fall thi edgeless sword despair die 
 to richmond thou offspr hous lancast 
 the wrong heir york pray thee 
 good angel guard thi battl live flourish 

 enter ghost river grey vaughan

 ghost of river to richard let sit heavi thy
 soul morrow 
 river die pomfret despair die 
 ghost of grey to richard think upon grey let
 thi soul despair 
 ghost of vaughan to richard think upon vaughan 
 guilti fear
 let fall thi lanc despair die 
 all to richmond awak think wrong in
 richard bosom
 will conquer awak win day 

 enter ghost hastings

 ghost to richard bloodi guilti guiltili awak 
 and bloodi battl end thi day 
 think lord hast despair die 
 to richmond quiet untroubl soul awak awak 
 arm fight conquer fair england sake 

 enter ghost two young princes

 ghost to richard dream thi cousin smother in
 tower 
 let us lead within thi bosom richard 
 and weigh thee ruin shame death 
 thi nephew soul bid thee despair die 
 to richmond sleep richmond sleep peac and
 wake joy 
 good angel guard thee boar annoy 
 live beget happi race king 
 edward unhappi son bid thee flourish 

 enter ghost ladi ann wife

 ghost to richard richard thi wife wretched
 ann thi wife
 that never slept quiet hour thee
 now fill thi sleep perturb 
 to morrow battl think 
 and fall thi edgeless sword despair die 
 to richmond thou quiet soul sleep thou quiet sleep 
 dream success happi victori 
 thi adversari wife doth pray thee 

 enter ghost buckingham

 ghost to richard the first i help thee
 crown 
 the last i felt thi tyranni 
 o battl think buckingham 
 and die terror thi guilti 
 dream dream bloodi deed death 
 faint despair despair yield thi breath 
 to richmond i die hope ere i could lend thee aid 
 but cheer thi heart thou dismay 
 god good angel fight richmond side 
 and richard fall height pride 
 the ghost vanish richard start dream 
 king richard give anoth hors bind wound 
 have merci jesu soft i dream 
 o coward conscienc dost thou afflict 
 the light burn blue it dead midnight 
 cold fear drop stand trembl flesh 
 what i fear myself there none els 
 richard love richard i i 
 is murder no ye i 
 then fli what great reason 
 lest i reveng what upon 
 alack i love wherefor for good
 that i done unto 
 o ala i rather hate myself
 for hate deed commit 
 i villain yet i lie i 
 fool thyself speak well fool flatter 
 my conscienc hath thousand sever tongu 
 and everi tongu bring sever tale 
 and everi tale condemn villain 
 perjuri perjuri high st degre 
 murder stern murder dir st degre 
 all sever sin us degre 
 throng bar cri guilti guilti 
 i shall despair there creatur love 
 and i die soul piti 
 and wherefor sinc i myself
 find piti 
 methought soul i murder d
 came tent everi one threat
 to morrow vengeanc head richard 

 enter ratcliff

 ratcliff my lord 
 king richard zound 
 ratcliff ratcliff lord ti i the earli villag cock
 hath twice done salut morn 
 your friend buckl armour 
 king richard o ratcliff i dream fear dream 
 what think st thou friend prove true 
 ratcliff no doubt lord 
 king richard o ratcliff i fear i fear 
 ratcliff nay good lord afraid shadow 
 king richard by apostl paul shadow night
 have stuck terror soul richard
 than substanc ten thousand soldiers
 arm proof led shallow richmond 
 ti yet near day come go 
 under tent i play eav dropper 
 to see mean shrink exeunt

 enter lord richmond sit tent

 lord good morrow richmond 
 richmond cri merci lord watch gentlemen 
 that ta en tardi sluggard 
 lord how slept lord 
 richmond the sweetest sleep fairest bode dreams
 that ever ent red drowsi head
 have i sinc departur lord 
 methought soul whose bodi richard murder d
 came tent cri victori 
 i promis soul jocund
 in remembr fair dream 
 how far morn lord 
 lord upon stroke four 
 richmond whi ti time arm give direct 

 hi orat soldiers

 more i said love countrymen 
 the leisur enforc time
 forbid dwell upon yet rememb 
 god good caus fight upon side 
 the prayer holi saint wrong soul 
 like high rear bulwark stand face 
 richard except fight against
 had rather us win follow 
 for follow truli gentlemen 
 a bloodi tyrant homicid 
 one rai blood one blood establish 
 one made mean come hath 
 and slaughter mean help 
 a base foul stone made preciou foil
 of england chair fals set 
 one hath ever god enemi 
 then fight god enemi 
 god justic ward soldier 
 if sweat put tyrant 
 you sleep peac tyrant slain 
 if fight countri foe 
 your countri foe shall pay pain hire 
 if fight safeguard wive 
 your wive shall welcom home conqueror 
 if free children sword 
 your children children quit age 
 then name god right 
 advanc standard draw will sword 
 for ransom bold attempt
 shall cold corps earth cold face 
 but i thrive gain attempt
 the least shall share part thereof 
 sound drum trumpet boldli cheer 
 god saint georg richmond victori exeunt

 re enter king richard ratcliff attend 
 forces

 king richard what said northumberland touching
 richmond 
 ratcliff that never train arm 
 king richard he said truth said surrey
 
 ratcliff he smil said the better purpos 
 king he right inde 
 clock strike 
 tell clock give calendar 
 who saw sun day 
 ratcliff not i lord 
 king richard then disdain shine book
 he brav east hour ago 
 a black day somebodi 
 ratcliff 
 ratcliff my lord 
 king richard the sun seen day 
 the sky doth frown lour upon armi 
 i would dewi tear ground 
 not shine day whi me
 more richmond for selfsam heaven
 that frown look sadli upon 

 enter norfolk

 norfolk arm arm lord foe vaunt field 
 king richard come bustl bustl caparison hors 
 call lord stanley bid bring power 
 i lead forth soldier plain 
 and thu battl shall order 
 my foreward shall drawn length 
 consist equal hors foot 
 our archer shall place midst 
 john duke norfolk thoma earl surrey 
 shall lead foot hors 
 they thu direct follow
 in main battl whose puissanc either side
 shall well wing chiefest hors 
 thi saint georg boot what think st thou 
 norfolk 
 norfolk a good direct warlik sovereign 
 thi found i tent morn 
 he sheweth paper 
 king richard read 
 jockey norfolk bold 
 for dickon thi master bought sold 
 a thing devis enemi 
 go gentlemen everi man unto charg 
 let babbl dream affright soul 
 conscienc word coward use 
 devi first keep strong awe 
 our strong arm conscienc sword law 
 march join brave let us pell mell 
 if heaven hand hand hell 

 hi orat army

 what shall i say i inferr 
 rememb cope withal 
 a sort vagabond rascal runaway 
 a scum britain base lackey peasant 
 whom er cloy countri vomit forth
 to desper adventur assur destruct 
 you sleep safe bring unrest 
 you land bless beauteou wive 
 they would restrain one distain 
 and doth lead paltri fellow 
 long kept britain mother cost 
 a milk sop one never life
 felt much cold shoe snow 
 let whip straggler er sea 
 lash henc ween rag franc 
 these famish beggar weari live 
 who dream fond exploit 
 for want mean poor rat hang 
 if conquer let men conquer us 
 and bastard britain fathers
 have land beaten bobb thump 
 and record left heir shame 
 shall enjoy land lie wive 
 ravish daughter drum afar hark i hear their
 drum 
 fight gentlemen england fight bold yeomen 
 draw archer draw arrow head 
 spur proud hors hard ride blood 
 amaz welkin broken stave 

 enter messenger

 what say lord stanley will bring power 
 messeng my lord doth deni come 
 king richard off son georg head 
 norfolk my lord enemi pass marsh 
 after battl let georg stanley die 
 king richard a thousand heart great within my
 bosom 
 advanc standard set upon foe 
 our ancient word courag fair saint georg 
 inspir us spleen fieri dragon 
 upon victori sit helm exeunt

scen 4 

anoth part field

alarum excurs enter norfolk forc catesby

 catesbi rescu lord norfolk rescu rescu 
 the king enact wonder man 
 dare opposit everi danger 
 hi hors slain foot fight 
 seek richmond throat death 
 rescu fair lord els day lost 

 alarum enter king richard

 king richard a hors hors kingdom hors 
 catesbi withdraw lord i help hors 
 king richard slave i set life upon cast
 and i will stand hazard die 
 i think six richmond field 
 five i slain day instead 
 a hors hors kingdom hors exeunt

scen 5 

anoth part field

alarum enter richard richmond fight richard slain 
retreat flourish enter richmond derbi bear crown with
oth lords

 richmond god arm prai victori friend 
 the day bloodi dog dead 
 derbi courag richmond well hast thou acquit thee 
 lo long usurp royalty
 from dead templ bloodi wretch
 have i pluck grace thi brow withal 
 wear enjoy make much 
 richmond great god heaven say amen 
 but tell young georg stanley live 
 derbi he lord safe leicest town 
 whither pleas may withdraw us 
 richmond what men name slain either side 
 derbi john duke norfolk walter lord ferrer 
 sir robert brakenburi sir william brandon 
 richmond inter bodi becom birth 
 proclaim pardon soldier fled
 that submiss return us 
 and ta en sacrament 
 we unit white rose red 
 smile heaven upon fair conjunct 
 that long frown upon emniti 
 what traitor hear say amen 
 england hath long mad scarr 
 the brother blindli shed brother blood 
 the father rashli slaughter son 
 the son compel butcher sire 
 all divid york lancast 
 divid dire divis 
 o let richmond elizabeth 
 the true succeed royal hous 
 by god fair ordin conjoin togeth 
 and let heir god thi 
 enrich time come smooth fac peac 
 with smile plenti fair prosper day 
 abat edg traitor graciou lord 
 that would reduc bloodi day again
 and make poor england weep stream blood 
 let live tast land increase
 that would treason wound fair land peac 
 now civil wound stopp peac live 
 that may long live god say amen exeunt
