 _exeunt _ 



act v

scene i mantua a street 

 enter romeo 

romeo 
if i may trust flatter eye sleep 
mi dream presag joy news hand 
mi bosom lord sit lightli throne 
and day unaccustom spirit
lift ground cheer thought 
i dreamt ladi came found dead 
strang dream give dead man leav think 
and breath life kiss lip 
that i reviv emperor 
ah sweet love possess 
when love shadow rich joy 

 enter balthasar 

new verona how balthasar 
dost thou bring letter friar 
how doth ladi is father well 
how fare juliet that i ask 
for noth ill well 

balthasar 
then well noth ill 
her bodi sleep capel monument 
and immort part angel live 
i saw laid low kindr vault 
and present took post tell 
o pardon bring ill news 
sinc leav offic sir 

romeo 
i even then i defi star 
thou know st lodg get ink paper 
and hire post hors i henc tonight 

balthasar 
i beseech sir patienc 
your look pale wild import
som misadventur 

romeo 
tush thou art deceiv 
leav thing i bid thee 
hast thou letter friar 

balthasar 
no good lord 

romeo 
no matter get thee gone 
and hire hors i thee straight 

 _exit balthasar _ 

well juliet i lie thee tonight 
let see mean o mischief thou art swift
to enter thought desper men 
i rememb apothecari 
and hereabout dwell late i noted
in tatter weed overwhelm brow 
cull simpl meagr look 
sharp miseri worn bone 
and needi shop tortois hung 
an allig stuff skins
of ill shape fish shelves
a beggarli account empti box 
green earthen pot bladder musti seed 
remnant packthread old cake roses
wer thinli scatter make show 
note penuri i said 
and man need poison 
whose sale present death mantua 
here live caitiff wretch would sell 
o thought forerun need 
and needi man must sell 
a i rememb hous 
be holiday beggar shop shut 
what ho apothecari 

 enter apothecari 

apothecari 
who call loud 

romeo 
come hither man i see thou art poor 
hold forti ducat let have
a dram poison soon speed gear
a dispers vein 
that life weari taker may fall dead 
and trunk may discharg breath
a violent hasti powder fir d
doth hurri fatal cannon womb 

apothecari 
such mortal drug i mantua law
i death utter 

romeo 
art thou bare full wretched 
and fear st die famin thi cheek 
need oppress starveth thine eye 
contempt beggari hang upon thi back 
the world thi friend world law 
the world afford law make thee rich 
then poor break take 

apothecari 
mi poverti consent 

romeo 
i pay thi poverti thi 

apothecari 
put liquid thing will
and drink strength
of twenti men would despatch straight 

romeo 
there thi gold wors poison men soul 
do murder loathsom world
than poor compound thou mayst sell 
i sell thee poison thou hast sold none 
farewel buy food get thyself flesh 
come cordial poison go me
to juliet grave must i use thee 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii friar lawrenc cell 

 enter friar john 

friar john 
holi franciscan friar brother ho 

 enter friar lawrenc 

friar lawrenc 
thi voic friar john 
welcom mantua what say romeo 
or mind writ give letter 

friar john 
go find barefoot brother 
one order associ 
here citi visit sick 
and find searcher town 
suspect house
wher infecti pestil reign 
seal door would let us forth 
so speed mantua stay 

friar lawrenc 
who bare letter romeo 

friar john 
i could send 
nor get messeng bring thee 
so fear infect 

friar lawrenc 
unhappi fortun by brotherhood 
the letter nice full charg 
of dear import neglect it
may much danger friar john go henc 
get iron crow bring straight
unto cell 

friar john 
brother i go bring thee 

 _exit _ 

friar lawrenc 
now must i monument alon 
within three hour fair juliet wake 
she beshrew much romeo
hath notic accid 
but i write mantua 
and keep cell till romeo come 
poor live cors clo dead man tomb 

 _exit _ 

scene iii a churchyard monument belong capulet 

 enter pari page bear flower torch 

pari 
give thi torch boy henc stand aloof 
yet put i would seen 
under yond yew tree lay thee along 
hold thi ear close hollow ground 
so shall foot upon churchyard tread 
be loos unfirm dig grave 
but thou shalt hear whistl 
a signal thou hear st someth approach 
give flower do i bid thee go 

page 
 _asid _ i almost afraid stand alone
her churchyard yet i adventur 

 _retir _ 

pari 
sweet flower flower thi bridal bed i strew 
o woe thi canopi dust stone 
which sweet water nightli i dew 
or want tear distil moan 
the obsequi i thee keep 
nightli shall strew thi grave weep 

 _the page whistl _ 

the boy give warn someth doth approach 
what curs foot wander way tonight 
to cross obsequi true love rite 
what torch muffl night awhil 

 _retir _ 

 enter romeo balthasar torch mattock c 

romeo 
give mattock wrench iron 
hold take letter earli morning
se thou deliv lord father 
give light upon thi life i charg thee 
whate er thou hear st seest stand aloof
and interrupt cours 
whi i descend bed death
i partli behold ladi face 
but chiefli take thenc dead finger
a preciou ring ring i must use
in dear employ therefor henc gone 
but thou jealou dost return pry
in i shall intend 
bi heaven i tear thee joint joint 
and strew hungri churchyard thi limb 
the time intent savag wild 
more fierc inexor far
than empti tiger roar sea 

balthasar 
i gone sir troubl 

romeo 
so shalt thou show friendship take thou 
live prosper farewel good fellow 

balthasar 
for i hide hereabout 
hi look i fear intent i doubt 

 _retires_ 

romeo 
thou detest maw thou womb death 
gorg dearest morsel earth 
thu i enforc thi rotten jaw open 

 _break open door monument _ 

and despit i cram thee food 

pari 
thi banish haughti montague
that murder love cousin grief 
it suppos fair creatur die 
and come villan shame
to dead bodi i apprehend 

 _advanc _ 

stop thi unhallow toil vile montagu 
can vengeanc pursu death 
condemn villain i apprehend thee 
obey go thou must die 

romeo 
i must inde therefor came i hither 
good gentl youth tempt desper man 
fli henc leav think upon gone 
let affright thee i beseech thee youth 
put anoth sin upon head
bi urg furi o gone 
bi heaven i love thee better 
for i come hither arm 
stay gone live hereaft say 
a madman merci bid thee run away 

pari 
i defi thi conjur 
and apprehend thee felon 

romeo 
wilt thou provok then thee boy 

 _they fight _ 

page 
o lord fight i go call watch 

 _exit _ 

pari 
o i slain _fall _ if thou merci 
open tomb lay juliet 

 _di _ 

romeo 
in faith i let perus face 
mercutio kinsman nobl counti pari 
what said man betoss soul
did attend rode i think
h told pari marri juliet 
said or i dream 
or i mad hear talk juliet 
to think o give thi hand 
one writ sour misfortun book 
i buri thee triumphant grave 
a grave o lantern slaught red youth 
for lie juliet beauti makes
thi vault feast presenc full light 
death lie thou dead man interr 

 _lay pari monument _ 

how oft men point death
hav merri which keeper call
a lightn death o may i
cal lightn o love wife 
death hath suck honey thi breath 
hath power yet upon thi beauti 
thou art conquer beauti ensign yet
i crimson thi lip thi cheek 
and death pale flag advanc 
tybalt liest thou thi bloodi sheet 
o favour i thee
than hand cut thi youth twain
to sunder thine enemi 
forgiv cousin ah dear juliet 
whi art thou yet fair shall i believe
that unsubstanti death amor 
and lean abhor monster keeps
the dark paramour 
for fear i still stay thee 
and never palac dim night
depart here i remain
with worm thi chambermaid o here
wil i set everlast rest 
and shake yoke inauspici stars
from world weari flesh eye look last 
arm take last embrac and lip o you
th door breath seal righteou kiss
a dateless bargain engross death 
come bitter conduct come unsavouri guid 
thou desper pilot run on
th dash rock thi sea sick weari bark 
here love _drink _ o true apothecari 
thi drug quick thu kiss i die 

 _di _ 

 enter end churchyard friar lawrenc a
 lantern crow spade 

friar lawrenc 
saint franci speed how oft tonight
hav old feet stumbl grave who 
who consort late dead 

balthasar 
here one friend one know well 

friar lawrenc 
bliss upon tell good friend 
what torch yond vainli lend light
to grub eyeless skull as i discern 
it burneth capel monument 

balthasar 
it doth holi sir master 
one love 

friar lawrenc 
who 

balthasar 
romeo 

friar lawrenc 
how long hath 

balthasar 
full half hour 

friar lawrenc 
go vault 

balthasar 
i dare sir 
mi master know i gone henc 
and fear menac death
if i stay look intent 

friar lawrenc 
stay i go alon fear come upon 
o much i fear ill unlucki thing 

balthasar 
a i sleep yew tree 
i dreamt master anoth fought 
and master slew 

friar lawrenc 
romeo _advanc _ 
alack alack blood stains
th stoni entranc sepulchr 
what mean masterless gori swords
to lie discolour place peac 

 _enter monument _ 

romeo o pale who els what pari 
and steep blood ah unkind hour
i guilti lament chanc 
the ladi stir 

 _juliet wake stir _ 

juliet 
o comfort friar lord 
i rememb well i 
and i where romeo 

 _nois within _ 

friar lawrenc 
i hear nois ladi come nest
of death contagion unnatur sleep 
a greater power contradict
hath thwart intent come come away 
thi husband thi bosom lie dead 
and pari come i dispos thee
among sisterhood holi nun 
stay question watch come 
come go good juliet i dare longer stay 

juliet 
go get thee henc i away 

 _exit friar lawrenc _ 

what a cup clo true love hand 
poison i see hath timeless end 
o churl drink left friendli drop
to help i kiss thi lip 
hapli poison yet doth hang 
to make die restor 

 _kiss _ 

thi lip warm 

first watch 
 _within _ lead boy which way 

juliet 
yea nois then i brief o happi dagger 

 _snatch romeo dagger _ 

thi thi sheath _stab herself_ there rest let die 

 _fall romeo bodi die _ 

 enter watch page pari 

page 
thi place there torch doth burn 

first watch 
the ground bloodi search churchyard 
go whoe er find attach 

 _exeunt watch _ 

piti sight here lie counti slain 
and juliet bleed warm newli dead 
who hath lain two day buri 
go tell princ run capulet 
rais montagu other search 

 _exeunt other watch _ 

we see ground whereon woe lie 
but true ground piteou woes
w can not without circumst descri 

 re enter watch balthasar 

second watch 
here romeo man we found churchyard 

first watch 
hold safeti till princ come hither 

 re enter other watch friar lawrenc 

third watch here friar trembl sigh weep 
we took mattock spade him
a come churchyard side 

first watch 
a great suspicion stay friar 

 enter princ attend 

princ 
what misadventur earli 
that call person morn rest 

 enter capulet ladi capulet other 

capulet 
what shriek abroad 

ladi capulet 
o peopl street cri romeo 
some juliet pari run
with open outcri toward monument 

princ 
what fear startl ear 

first watch 
sovereign lie counti pari slain 
and romeo dead juliet dead 
warm new kill 

princ 
search seek know foul murder come 

first watch 
here friar slaughter romeo man 
with instrument upon fit open
thes dead men tomb 

capulet 
o heaven o wife look daughter bleed 
thi dagger hath mista en lo house
i empti back montagu 
and mi sheath daughter bosom 

ladi capulet 
o thi sight death bell
that warn old age sepulchr 

 enter montagu other 

princ 
come montagu thou art earli 
to see thi son heir earli 

montagu 
ala lieg wife dead tonight 
grief son exil hath stopp breath 
what woe conspir mine age 

princ 
look thou shalt see 

montagu 
o thou untaught what manner 
to press thi father grave 

princ 
seal mouth outrag 
till clear ambigu 
and know spring head true descent 
and i gener woe 
and lead even death meantim forbear 
and let mischanc slave patienc 
bring forth parti suspicion 

friar lawrenc 
i greatest abl least 
yet suspect time place
doth make dire murder 
and i stand impeach purge
myself condemn excu 

princ 
then say thou dost know 

friar lawrenc 
i brief short date breath
i long tediou tale 
romeo dead husband juliet 
and dead romeo faith wife 
i marri stol n marriag day
wa tybalt doomsday whose untim death
banish new made bridegroom citi 
for tybalt juliet pin 
you remov sieg grief 
betroth would marri perforce
to counti pari then come 
and wild look bid devis means
to rid second marriag 
or cell would kill 
then gave i tutor art 
a sleep potion took effect
a i intend wrought her
th form death meantim i writ romeo
that hither come dire night
to help take borrow grave 
be time potion forc ceas 
but bore letter friar john 
wa stay accid yesternight
return letter back then alone
at prefix hour waking
cam i take kindr vault 
mean keep close cell
til i conveni could send romeo 
but i came minut ere time
of awak untim lay
th nobl pari true romeo dead 
she wake i entreat come forth
and bear work heaven patienc 
but nois scare tomb 
and desper would go 
but seem violenc 
all i know marriage
h nurs privi and ought this
miscarri fault let old life
b sacrif hour time 
unto rigour severest law 

princ 
we still known thee holi man 
where romeo man what say 

balthasar 
i brought master news juliet death 
and post came mantua
to place monument 
thi letter earli bid give father 
and threaten death go vault 
if i depart left 

princ 
give letter i look 
where counti page rai watch 
sirrah made master place 

page 
he came flower strew ladi grave 
and bid stand aloof i 
anon come one light ope tomb 
and master drew 
and i ran away call watch 

princ 
thi letter doth make good friar word 
their cours love tide death 
and write buy poison
of poor pothecari therewithal
cam vault die lie juliet 
where enemi capulet montagu 
see scourg laid upon hate 
that heaven find mean kill joy love 
and i wink discord 
have lost brace kinsmen all punish 

capulet 
o brother montagu give thi hand 
thi daughter jointur more
can i demand 

montagu 
but i give thee 
for i rais statu pure gold 
that while verona name known 
there shall figur rate set
a true faith juliet 

capulet 
a rich shall romeo ladi lie 
poor sacrific enmiti 

princ 
a gloom peac morn bring 
the sun sorrow show head 
go henc talk sad thing 
some shall pardon punish 
for never stori woe
than juliet romeo 

 _exeunt _ 



the tame of the shrew

induction

scen i befor alehous heath 

enter hostess sly

sli 
i pheez faith 

hostess

sli 
i baggag sli rogu look chronicl we
cam richard conqueror therefor _pauca pallabris_ let the
world slide sessa 

hostess 
you pay glass burst 

sli 
no denier go saint jeronimi go thi cold bed warm
the

 _exit_ 

sli 
third fourth fifth borough i answer law i not
budg inch boy let come kindli 

 _li ground fall asleep _ 

horn wind enter lord hunt huntsmen servant 

lord 
huntsman i charg thee tender well hound 
brach merriman poor cur emboss 
and coupl clowder deep mouth brach 
saw st thou boy silver made good
at hedg corner coldest fault 
i would lose dog twenti pound 

first huntsman 
whi bellman good lord 
he cri upon merest loss 
and twice today pick dullest scent 
trust i take better dog 

lord 
thou art fool echo fleet 
i would esteem worth dozen 
but sup well look unto 
tomorrow i intend hunt 

first huntsman 
i lord 

lord 
 _see sly_ what one dead drunk 
see doth breath 

second huntsman 
he breath lord were warm ale 
thi bed cold sleep soundli 

lord 
o monstrou beast like swine lie 
grim death foul loathsom thine imag 
sir i practis drunken man 
what think convey bed 
wrapp sweet cloth ring put upon finger 
a delici banquet bed 
and brave attend near wake 
would beggar forget 

first huntsman 
believ lord i think can not choos 

second huntsman 
it would seem strang unto wak 

lord 
even flatter dream worthless fanci 
then take manag well jest 
carri gentli fairest chamber 
and hang round wanton pictur 
balm foul head warm distil water 
and burn sweet wood make lodg sweet 
procur music readi wake 
to make dulcet heavenli sound 
and chanc speak readi straight 
and low submiss reverence
say what honour command 
let one attend silver basin
ful rose water bestrew flower 
anoth bear ewer third diaper 
and say will pleas lordship cool hand 
someon readi costli suit 
and ask apparel wear 
anoth tell hound hors 
and ladi mourn diseas 
persuad hath lunat 
and say say dream 
for noth mighti lord 
thi kindli gentl sir 
it pastim pass excel 
if husband modesti 

first huntsman 
mi lord i warrant play part 
a shall think true dilig 
he less say 

lord 
take gentli bed 
and one offic wake 

 sli _i bourn a trumpet sound _ 

sirrah go see trumpet ti sound 

 _exit_ servant 

belik nobl gentleman mean 
travel journey repos 


re enter servant 

how 

servant 
an pleas honour players
that offer servic lordship 

lord 
bid come near 


enter player 

now fellow welcom 

player 
we thank honour 

lord 
do intend stay tonight 

player 
so pleas lordship accept duti 

lord 
with heart thi fellow i remember
sinc play farmer eldest son 
 twa woo gentlewoman well 
i forgot name sure part
wa aptli fit natur perform 

player 
i think twa soto honour mean 

lord 
 ti true thou didst excel 
well come happi time 
the rather i sport hand
wherein cun assist much 
there lord hear play tonight 
but i doubt modesti 
lest eye odd behaviour 
for yet honour never heard play 
you break merri passion
and offend i tell sir 
if smile grow impati 

player 
fear lord contain 
were veriest antick world 

lord 
go sirrah take butteri 
and give friendli welcom everyon 
let want noth hous afford 

 _exit one player _ 

sirrah go barthol mew page 
and see dress suit like ladi 
that done conduct drunkard chamber 
and call madam obeis 
tell win love 
he bear honour action 
such hath observ nobl ladies
unto lord accomplish 
such duti drunkard let 
with soft low tongu lowli courtesi 
and say what honour command 
wherein ladi humbl wife
may show duti make known love 
and kind embrac tempt kiss 
and declin head bosom 
bid shed tear overjoy d
to see nobl lord restor health 
who seven year hath esteem him
no better poor loathsom beggar 
and boy woman gift
to rain shower command tear 
an onion well shift 
which napkin close convey 
shall despit enforc wateri eye 
see dispatch hast thou canst 
anon i give thee instruct 

 _exit servant _ 

i know boy well usurp grace 
voic gait action gentlewoman 
i long hear call drunkard husband 
and men stay laughter
when homag simpl peasant 
i counsel hapli presence
may well abat merri spleen 
which otherwis would grow extrem 

 _exeunt _ 




scene ii a bedchamb lord s hous 

sli discov rich nightgown attend with
apparel basin ewer appurten lord dress like a
serv 

sli 
for god sake pot small ale 

first servant 
will pleas lordship drink cup sack 

second servant 
will pleas honour tast conserv 

third servant 
what raiment honour wear today 

sli 
i christophero sli call honour lordship i ne er drank
sack life give conserv give conserv of
beef ne er ask raiment i wear i doublets
than back stock leg shoe feet 
nay sometim feet shoe shoe toe look
through leather 

lord 
heaven ceas idl humour honour 
o mighti man descent 
of possess high esteem 
should infus foul spirit 

sli 
what would make mad am i christoph sli old sli son of
burton heath birth pedlar educ cardmak by
transmut bear herd present profess tinker ask
marian hacket fat ale wife wincot know she
say i fourteen penc score sheer ale score for
th lyingest knave christendom what i bestraught here 

third servant 
o make ladi mourn 

second servant 
o make servant droop 

lord 
henc come kindr shun hous 
a beaten henc strang lunaci 
o nobl lord bethink thee thi birth 
call home thi ancient thought banish 
and banish henc abject lowli dream 
look thi servant attend thee 
each offic readi thi beck 
wilt thou music hark apollo play 

 _music _ 

and twenti cage nightingal sing 
or wilt thou sleep we thee couch
soft sweeter lust bed
on purpos trimm semirami 
say thou wilt walk bestrew ground 
or wilt thou ride thi hors shall trapp 
their har stud gold pearl 
dost thou love hawk thou hast hawk soar
abov morn lark wilt thou hunt 
thi hound shall make welkin answer them
and fetch shrill echo hollow earth 

first servant 
say thou wilt cours thi greyhound swift
a breath stag ay fleeter roe 

second servant 
dost thou love pictur we fetch thee straight
adoni paint run brook 
and cytherea sedg hid 
which seem move wanton breath
even wave sedg play wind 

lord 
we show thee io maid
and beguil surpri 
a live paint deed done 

third servant 
or daphn roam thorni wood 
scratch leg one shall swear bleeds
and sight shall sad apollo weep 
so workmanli blood tear drawn 

lord 
thou art lord noth lord 
thou hast ladi far beautiful
than woman wane age 

first servant 
and till tear hath shed thee
lik enviou flood er run love face 
she fairest creatur world 
and yet inferior none 

sli 
am i lord i ladi 
or i dream or i dream till 
i sleep i see i hear i speak 
i smell sweet savour i feel soft thing 
upon life i lord inde 
and tinker christophero sli 
well bring ladi hither sight 
and pot smallest ale 

second servant 
will pleas mighti wash hand 

 _servant present ewer basin napkin _ 

o joy see wit restor 
o knew 
these fifteen year dream 
or wak wak slept 

sli 
these fifteen year fay goodli nap 
but i never speak time 

first servant 
o ye lord idl word 
for though lay goodli chamber 
yet would say ye beaten door 
and rail upon hostess hous 
and say would present leet 
becaus brought stone jug seal quart 
sometim would call cice hacket 

sli 
ay woman maid hous 

third servant 
whi sir know hous maid 
nor men reckon 
a stephen sli old john nap greec 
and peter turph henri pimpernel 
and twenti name men 
which never man ever saw 

sli 
now lord thank good amend 

all 
amen 


enter page ladi attend 

sli 
i thank thee thou shalt lose 

page 
how fare nobl lord 

sli 
marri i fare well cheer enough 
where wife 

page 
here nobl lord thi 

sli 
are wife call husband 
mi men call lord i goodman 

page 
mi husband lord lord husband 
i wife obedi 

sli 
i know well what must i call 

lord 
madam 

sli 
alic madam joan madam 

lord 
madam noth els lord call ladi 

sli 
madam wife say i dream d
and slept fifteen year 

page 
ay time seem thirti unto 
be time abandon bed 

sli 
 ti much servant leav alon 
madam undress come bed 

page 
thrice nobl lord let entreat you
to pardon yet night two 
or sun set 
for physician expressli charg 
in peril incur former maladi 
that i yet absent bed 
i hope reason stand excus 

sli 
ay stand i may hardli tarri long i would loath
to fall dream i therefor tarri despit the
flesh blood 

enter messeng 

messeng 
your honour player hear amend 
are come play pleasant comedi 
for doctor hold meet 
see much sad hath congeal blood 
and melancholi nurs frenzi 
therefor thought good hear play 
and frame mind mirth merriment 
which bar thousand harm lengthen life 

sli 
marri i let play is commonti christma gambold
or tumbl trick 

page 
no good lord pleas stuff 

sli 
what household stuff 

page 
it kind histori 

sli 
well see come madam wife sit side let world
slip shall ne er younger 




act i

scen i padua a public place 

flourish enter lucentio tranio 

lucentio 
tranio sinc great desir i had
to see fair padua nurseri art 
i arriv fruit lombardi 
the pleasant garden great itali 
and father love leav arm d
with good thi good compani 
mi trusti servant well approv 
here let us breath hapli institute
a cours learn ingeni studi 
pisa renown grave citizen 
gave father first 
a merchant great traffic world 
vincentio come bentivolii 
vincentio son brought florenc 
it shall becom serv hope conceiv 
to deck fortun virtuou deed 
and therefor tranio time i studi 
virtu part philosophy
wil i appli treat happiness
bi virtu special achiev 
tell thi mind i pisa left
and padua come leaves
a shallow plash plung deep 
and satieti seek quench thirst 

tranio 
_mi perdonato_ gentl master mine 
i affect 
glad thu continu resolve
to suck sweet sweet philosophi 
onli good master admire
thi virtu moral disciplin 
let stoic stock i pray 
or devot aristotl checks
a ovid outcast quit abjur 
balk logic acquaint 
and practis rhetor common talk 
music poesi use quicken 
the mathemat metaphys 
fall find stomach serv 
no profit grow pleasur ta en 
in brief sir studi affect 

lucentio 
gramerci tranio well dost thou advis 
if biondello thou wert come ashor 
we could put us readi 
and take lodg fit entertain
such friend time padua shall beget 
but stay awhil compani 

tranio 
master show welcom us town 

 _lucentio tranio stand asid _ 

enter baptista katherina bianca gremio hortensio 

baptista 
gentlemen importun farther 
for i firmli resolv know 
that bestow youngest daughter
befor i husband elder 
if either love katherina 
becaus i know well love well 
leav shall court pleasur 

gremio 
to cart rather rough 
there hortensio wife 

katherina 
 _to baptista_ i pray sir will
to make stale amongst mate 

hortensio 
mate maid how mean no mate 
unless gentler milder mould 

katherina 
i faith sir shall never need fear 
i wi half way heart 
but doubt care be

act ii

and i pray think

you knew father well

then tell i get daughter love 
what dowri shall i wife

and possess twenti thousand crown

that coven may kept either hand

that love 

petruchio 
whi noth i tell father 
i peremptori proud mind 
and two rage fire meet togeth 
they consum thing feed furi 
though littl fire grow great littl wind 
yet extrem gust blow fire 
so i yield 
for i rough woo like babe 

baptista 
well mayst thou woo happi thi speed 
but thou arm unhappi word 

petruchio 
ay proof mountain wind 
that shake though blow perpetu 


re enter hortensio head broke

how friend whi dost thou look pale 

hortensio

baptista 
what daughter prove good musician 

hortensio 
i think sooner prove soldier 
iron may hold never lute 

baptista 
whi thou canst break lute 

hortensio 
whi hath broke lute 
i tell mistook fret 
and bow hand teach finger 
when impati devilish spirit 
 fret call quoth i fume 
and word struck head 
and instrument pate made way 
and i stood amaz 
a pillori look lute 
while call rascal fiddler 
and twangl jack twenti vile term 
a studi misus 

petruchio 
now world lusti wench 
i love ten time e er i 
o i long chat 

baptista 
 _to hortensio_ well go discomfit 
proce practic younger daughter 
she apt learn thank good turn 
signior petruchio go us

petruchio 
i pray 

 _exeunt baptista gremio tranio hortensio _ 

i attend 
and woo spirit come 
say rail i tell plain
sh sing sweetli nightingal 
say frown i say look clear
a morn rose newli wash dew 
say mute speak word 
then i commend volubl 
and say uttereth pierc eloqu 
if bid pack i give thank 
a though bid stay week 
if deni wed i crave day
when i shall ask bann marri 
but come petruchio speak 


enter katherina 

good morrow kate name i hear 

katherina 
well heard someth hard hear 
they call katherin talk 

petruchio 
you lie faith call plain kate 
and bonni kate sometim kate curst 
but kate prettiest kate christendom 
kate kate hall super dainti kate 
for dainti kate therefor kate 
take kate consol 
hear thi mild prai everi town 
thi virtu spoke thi beauti sound 
yet deepli thee belong 
myself mov woo thee wife 

katherina

remov henc i knew first 
you moveabl 

petruchio 
whi moveabl 

katherina

katherina 
ass made bear 

petruchio 
women made bear 

katherina 
no jade bear mean

ala good kate i burden thee 
for know thee young light 

katherina 
too light swain catch 
and yet heavi weight 

petruchio 
should buz 

katherina 
well ta en like buzzard 

petruchio 
o slow wing turtl shall buzzard take thee 

katherina 
ay turtl take buzzard 

petruchio 
come come wasp faith angri 

katherina

petruchio 
mi remedi pluck 

katherina 
ay fool could find lie 

petruchio 
who know wasp wear sting 
in tail

in tongu 

petruchio 
whose tongu

your talk tale farewel 

petruchio

good kate i gentleman

that i tri 

 _strike _ 

petruchio

katherina

if strike gentleman 
and gentleman arm 

petruchio 
a herald kate o put thi book 

katherina 
what crest coxcomb 

petruchio 
a combless cock kate hen 

katherina 
no cock mine crow like craven 

petruchio 
nay come kate come must look sour 

katherina 
it fashion i see crab 

petruchio 
whi crab therefor look sour 

katherina 
there 

petruchio 
then show 

katherina 
had i glass i would 

petruchio 
what mean face 

katherina 
well aim young one 

petruchio 
now saint georg i young 

katherina 
yet wither 

petruchio 
 ti care 

katherina 
i care 

petruchio 
nay hear kate sooth scape 

katherina 
i chafe i tarri let go 

petruchio 
no whit i find pass gentl 
 twa told rough coy sullen 
and i find report liar 
for thou art pleasant gamesom pass courteou 
but slow speech yet sweet spring time flower 
thou canst frown thou canst look askanc 
nor bite lip angri wench 
nor hast thou pleasur cross talk 
but thou mild entertain st thi wooer 
with gentl confer soft affabl 
whi world report kate doth limp 
o sland rou world kate like hazel twig
i straight slender brown hue
a hazel nut sweeter kernel 
o let see thee walk thou dost halt 

katherina 
go fool thou keep st command 

petruchio 
did ever dian becom grove
a kate chamber princ gait 
o thou dian let kate 
and let kate chast dian sport 

katherina 
where studi goodli speech 

petruchio 
it extempor mother wit 

katherina 
a witti mother witless els son 

petruchio 
am i wise 

katherina 
ye keep warm 

petruchio 
marri i mean sweet katherin thi bed 
and therefor set chat asid 
thu plain term father hath consented
that shall wife dowri greed 
and nill i marri 
now kate i husband turn 
for light wherebi i see thi beauti 
thi beauti doth make like thee well 
thou must marri man 
for i born tame kate 
and bring wild kate kate
conform household kate 


re enter baptista gremio tranio 

here come father never make denial 
i must katherin wife 

baptista 
now signior petruchio speed daughter 

petruchio 
how well sir well 
it imposs i speed amiss 

baptista 
whi daughter katherin dump 

katherina 
call daughter now i promis you
you show tender fatherli regard
to wish wed one half lunat 
a mad cap ruffian swear jack 
that think oath face matter 

petruchio 
father ti thu world
that talk talk amiss 
if curst polici 
for froward modest dove 
she hot temper morn 
for patienc prove second grissel 
and roman lucrec chastiti 
and conclud greed well together
that upon sunday wed day 

katherina 
i see thee hang sunday first 

gremio 
hark petruchio say see thee hang first 

tranio 
i speed nay good night part 

petruchio 
be patient gentlemen i choos 
if i plea 
 ti bargain twixt us twain alon 
that shall still curst compani 
i tell ti incred believe
how much love o kindest kate
sh hung neck kiss kiss
sh vie fast protest oath oath 
that twink love 
o novic ti world see 
how tame men women alon 
a meacock wretch make curstest shrew 
give thi hand kate i unto venic 
to buy apparel gainst wed day 
provid feast father bid guest 
i sure katherin shall fine 

baptista 
i know say give hand 
god send joy petruchio ti match 

gremio tranio 
amen say wit 

petruchio 
father wife gentlemen adieu 
i venic sunday come apac 
we ring thing fine array 
and kiss kate marri sunday 

 _exeunt petruchio katherina sever _ 

gremio 
wa ever match clapp suddenli 

baptista 
faith gentlemen i play merchant part 
and ventur madli desper mart 

tranio 
 twa commod lay fret 
 twill bring gain perish sea 

baptista 
the gain i seek quiet match 

gremio 
no doubt hath got quiet catch 
but baptista younger daughter 
now day long look 
i neighbour suitor first 

tranio 
and i one love bianca more
than word wit thought guess 

gremio 
youngl thou canst love dear i 

tranio 
greybeard thi love doth freez 

gremio 
but thine doth fri 
skipper stand back ti age nourisheth 

tranio 
but youth ladi eye flourisheth 

baptista 
content gentlemen i compound strife 
 ti deed must win prize both
that assur daughter greatest dower
shal bianca love 
say signior gremio assur 

gremio 
first know hous within city
i richli furnish plate gold 
basin ewer lave dainti hand 
mi hang tyrian tapestri 
in ivori coffer i stuff crown 
in cypress chest arra counterpoint 
costli apparel tent canopi 
fine linen turkey cushion boss pearl 
valanc venic gold needlework 
pewter brass thing belong
to hous housekeep farm
i hundr milch kine pail 
six score fat oxen stand stall 
and thing answer portion 
myself struck year i must confess 
and i die tomorrow 
if whilst i live mine 

tranio 
that came well sir list 
i father heir son 
if i may daughter wife 
i leav hous three four good
within rich pisa wall anyone
old signior gremio padua 
besid two thousand ducat year
of fruit land shall jointur 
what i pinch signior gremio 

gremio 
two thousand ducat year land 
mi land amount much 
that shall besid argosy
that lie marseil road 
what i chok argosi 

tranio 
gremio ti known father hath less
than three great argosi besid two galliass 
and twelv tight galley i assur 
and twice much whate er thou offer st next 

gremio 
nay i offer i 
and i 
if like shall mine 

tranio 
whi maid mine world 
bi firm promis gremio vie 

baptista 
i must confess offer best 
and let father make assur 
she els must pardon 
if die dower 

tranio 
that cavil old i young 

gremio 
and may young men die well old 

baptista 
well gentlemen 
i thu resolv on sunday next know 
mi daughter katherin marri 
now sunday follow shall bianca
b bride make assur 
if signior gremio 
and i take leav thank 

gremio 
adieu good neighbour 

 _exit baptista _ 

now i fear thee 
sirrah young gamest father fool
to give thee wane age
set foot thi tabl tut toy 
an old italian fox kind boy 

 _exit _ 

tranio 
a vengeanc crafti wither hide 
yet i fac card ten 
 ti head master good 
i see reason suppo lucentio
must get father call suppo vincentio 
and wonder father commonly
do get children case wooing
a child shall get sire i fail cun 

 _exit _ 




act iii

scen i padua a room baptista s hous 

enter lucentio hortensio bianca 

lucentio 
fiddler forbear grow forward sir 
have soon forgot entertainment
h sister katherin welcom withal 

hortensio 
but wrangl pedant is
th patro heavenli harmoni 
then give leav prerog 
and music spent hour 
your lectur shall leisur much 

lucentio 
preposter ass never read far
to know caus music ordain 
wa refresh mind man
aft studi usual pain 
then give leav read philosophi 
and i paus serv harmoni 

hortensio 
sirrah i bear brave thine 

bianca 
whi gentlemen doubl wrong 
to strive resteth choic 
i breech scholar school 
i tie hour point time 
but learn lesson i pleas 
and cut strife sit 
take instrument play while 
hi lectur done ere tun 

hortensio 
you leav lectur i tune 

 _retir _ 

lucentio 
that never tune instrument 

bianca 
where left last 

lucentio 
here madam 
_hic ibat simoi hic est sigeia tellu 
hic steterat priami regia celsa seni _

bianca 
constru 

lucentio 
_hic ibat_ i told _simois_ i lucentio _hic est_ 
son unto vincentio pisa _sigeia tellus_ disguis thu get your
lov _hic steterat_ lucentio come woo _priami_ 
i man tranio _regia_ bear port _celsa senis_ we
might beguil old pantaloon 

hortensio _return _ 
madam instrument tune 

bianca 
let hear 

 hortensio _play _ 

o fie trebl jar 

lucentio 
spit hole man tune 

bianca 
now let see i constru _hic ibat simois_ i know 
_hic est sigeia tellus_ i trust _hic steterat priami_ take
he hear us _regia_ presum _celsa senis_ despair 

hortensio 
madam ti tune 

lucentio 
all base 

hortensio 
the base right ti base knave jar 
 _aside_ how fieri forward pedant 
now life knave doth court love 
pedascul i watch better yet 

bianca 
in time i may believ yet i mistrust 

lucentio 
mistrust sure acides
wa ajax call grandfath 

bianca 
i must believ master els i promis 
i argu still upon doubt 
but let rest now licio 
good master take unkindli pray 
that i thu pleasant 

hortensio 
 _to lucentio_ you may go walk give leav 
mi lesson make music three part 

lucentio 
are formal sir well i must wait 
 _aside_ and watch withal i deceiv 
our fine musician groweth amor 

hortensio 
madam touch instrument 
to learn order finger 
i must begin rudiment art 
to teach gamut briefer sort 
more pleasant pithi effectu 
than hath taught trade 
and write fairli drawn 

bianca 
whi i past gamut long ago 

hortensio 
yet read gamut hortensio 

bianca 
 _gamut_ i ground accord 
 _a re_ plead hortensio passion 
 _b mi_ bianca take thi lord 
 _c fa ut_ love affect 
 _d sol re_ one clef two note i
 _e la mi_ show piti i die 
call gamut tut i like 
old fashion pleas best i nice 
to chang true rule odd invent 


enter servant 

servant 
mistress father pray leav book 
and help dress sister chamber 
you know tomorrow wed day 

bianca 
farewel sweet master i must gone 

 _exeunt bianca servant _ 

lucentio 
faith mistress i caus stay 

 _exit _ 

hortensio 
but i caus pri pedant 
methink look though love 
yet thi thought bianca humble
to cast thi wand ring eye everi stale 
seiz thee list i find thee rang 
hortensio quit thee chang 

 _exit _ 




scene ii the befor baptista s hous 

enter baptista gremio tranio katherina bianca lucentio and
attend 

baptista _to tranio_ 
signior lucentio point day
that katherin petruchio marri 
and yet hear son law 
what said what mockeri be
to want bridegroom priest attends
to speak ceremoni rite marriag 
what say lucentio shame 

katherina 
no shame mine i must forsooth forc d
to give hand oppo heart 
unto mad brain rudesbi full spleen 
who woo hast mean wed leisur 
i told i frantic fool 
hide bitter jest blunt behaviour 
and note merri man 
he woo thousand point day marriag 
make friend invit proclaim bann 
yet never mean wed hath woo 
now must world point poor katherin 
and say lo mad petruchio wife 
if would pleas come marri 

tranio 
patienc good katherin baptista 
upon life petruchio mean well 
whatev fortun stay word 
though blunt i know pass wise 
though merri yet withal honest 

katherina 
would katherin never seen though 

 _exit weep follow bianca other _ 

baptista 
go girl i can not blame thee weep 
for injuri would vex saint 
much shrew thi impati humour 


enter biondello 

master master new old news news never heard 

baptista 
i new old how may 

biondello 
whi news hear petruchio come 

baptista 
i come 

biondello 
whi sir 

baptista 
what 

biondello 
he come 

baptista 
when 

biondello 
when stand i see 

tranio 
but say thine old news 

biondello 
whi petruchio come new hat old jerkin pair old
breech thrice turn pair boot candl case 
one buckl anoth lace old rusti sword ta en town
armouri broken hilt chapeless two broken point his
hors hip old mothi saddl stirrup kindr 
besid possess glander like mose chine 
troubl lampass infect fashion full of
windgal sped spavin ray yellow past cure the
fiv stark spoil stagger begnawn bot swayed
in back shoulder shotten near leg a
half check bit head stall sheep leather being
restrain keep stumbl hath often burst now
repair knot one girth six time piec woman crupper
of velur hath two letter name fairli set in
stud piec pack thread 

baptista 
who come 

biondello 
o sir lackey world caparison like hors with
a linen stock one leg kersey boot hose gartered
with red blue list old hat humour forti fancies
prick feather monster monster apparel and
not like christian footboy gentleman lackey 

tranio 
 ti odd humour prick fashion 
yet oftentim lie goe mean apparel 

baptista 
i glad come howso er come 

biondello 
whi sir come 

baptista 
didst thou say come 

biondello 
who petruchio came 

baptista 
ay petruchio came 

biondello 
no sir i say hors come back 

baptista 
whi one 

biondello 
 nay saint jami 
 i hold penni 
 a hors man
 is one 
 and yet mani 


enter petruchio grumio 

petruchio 
come gallant who home 

baptista 
you welcom sir 

petruchio 
and yet i come well 

baptista 
and yet halt 

tranio 
not well apparel i wish 

petruchio 
were better i rush thu 
but kate where love bride 
how father gentl methink frown 
and wherefor gaze goodli compani 
a saw wondrou monument 
some comet unusu prodigi 

baptista 
whi sir know wed day 
first sad fear would come 
now sadder come unprovid 
fie doff habit shame estat 
an eye sore solemn festiv 

tranio 
and tell us occas import
hath long detain wife 
and sent hither unlik 

petruchio 
tediou tell harsh hear 
sufficeth i come keep word 
though part enforc digress 
which leisur i excuse
a shall well satisfi withal 
but kate i stay long 
the morn wear ti time church 

tranio 
see bride unrever robe 
go chamber put cloth mine 

petruchio 
not i believ thu i visit 

baptista 
but thu i trust marri 

petruchio 
good sooth even thu therefor ha done word 
to marri unto cloth 
could i repair wear me
a i chang poor accoutr 
 twere well kate better 
but fool i chat you
when i bid good morrow bride 
and seal titl love kiss 

 _exeunt petruchio grumio biondello _ 

tranio 
he hath mean mad attir 
we persuad possibl 
to put better ere go church 

baptista 
i see event 

 _exeunt baptista gremio attend _ 

tranio 
but sir love concerneth us add
her father like bring pass 
a i impart worship 
i get man whate er be
it skill much fit turn 
and shall vincentio pisa 
and make assur padua 
of greater sum i promis 
so shall quietli enjoy hope 
and marri sweet bianca consent 

lucentio 
were fellow schoolmaster
doth watch bianca step narrowli 
 twere good methink steal marriag 
which perform let world say 
i keep mine despit world 

tranio 
that degre mean look 
and watch vantag busi 
we reach greybeard gremio 
the narrow pri father minola 
the quaint musician amor licio 
all master sake lucentio 


re enter gremio 

signior gremio came church 

gremio 
a willingli e er i came school 

tranio 
and bride bridegroom come home 

gremio 
a bridegroom say ti groom inde 
a grumbl groom girl shall find 

tranio 
curster whi ti imposs 

gremio 
whi devil devil fiend 

tranio 
whi devil devil devil dam 

gremio 
tut lamb dove fool 
i tell sir lucentio priest
should ask katherin wife 
 ay gog woun quoth swore loud
that amaz priest let fall book 
and stoop take 
the mad brain bridegroom took cuff
that fell priest book book priest 
 now take quoth list 

tranio 
what said wench rose 

gremio 
trembl shook stamp swore
a vicar meant cozen 
but mani ceremoni done 
he call wine a health quoth if
h abroad carous mates
aft storm quaff muscadel 
and threw sop sexton face 
have reason
but beard grew thin hungerly
and seem ask sop drink 
thi done took bride neck 
and kiss lip clamor smack
that part church echo 
and i see came thenc shame 
and i know rout come 
such mad marriag never 
hark hark i hear minstrel play 

 _music play _ 

enter petrucio katherina bianca baptista hortensio grumio and
train 

petruchio 
gentlemen friend i thank pain 
i know think dine today 
and prepar great store wed cheer
but hast doth call henc 
and therefor i mean take leav 

baptista 
i possibl away tonight 

petruchio 
i must away today night come 
make wonder knew busi 
you would entreat rather go stay 
and honest compani i thank 
that beheld give away myself
to patient sweet virtuou wife 
dine father drink health 
for i must henc farewel 

tranio 
let us entreat stay till dinner 

petruchio 
it may 

gremio 
let entreat 

petruchio 
it can not 

katherina 
let entreat 

petruchio 
i content 

katherina 
are content stay 

petruchio 
i content shall entreat stay 
but yet stay entreat 

katherina 
now love stay 

petruchio 
grumio hors 

grumio 
ay sir readi oat eaten hors 

katherina 
nay 
do thou canst i go today 
no tomorrow till i pleas 
the door open sir lie way 
you may jog while boot green 
for i gone till i pleas 
 ti like prove jolli surli groom
that take first roundli 

petruchio 
o kate content thee prithe angri 

katherina 
i angri hast thou 
father quiet shall stay leisur 

gremio 
ay marri sir begin work 

katherina 
gentlemen forward bridal dinner 
i see woman may made fool 
if spirit resist 

petruchio 
they shall go forward kate thi command 
obey bride attend 
go feast revel domin 
carous full measur maidenhead 
be mad merri go hang 
but bonni kate must 
nay look big stamp stare fret 
i master mine 
she good chattel hous 
mi household stuff field barn 
mi hors ox ass anyth 
and stand touch whoever dare 
i bring mine action proudest he
that stop way padua grumio 
draw forth thi weapon beset thiev 
rescu thi mistress thou man 
fear sweet wench shall touch thee kate 
i buckler thee million 

 _exeunt petrucio katherina grumio _ 

baptista 
nay let go coupl quiet one 

gremio 
went quickli i die laugh 

tranio 
of mad match never like 

lucentio 
mistress opinion sister 

bianca 
that mad madli mate 

gremio 
i warrant petruchio kate 

baptista 
neighbour friend though bride bridegroom wants
for suppli place tabl 
you know want junket feast 
lucentio shall suppli bridegroom place 
and let bianca take sister room 

tranio 
shall sweet bianca practis bride 

baptista 
she shall lucentio come gentlemen let go 

 _exeunt _ 




act iv

scen i a hall petruchio s countri hous 

enter grumio 

grumio 
fie fie tire jade mad master foul way was
ev man beaten wa ever man ray wa ever man weari i am
sent make fire come warm 
now i littl pot soon hot lip might freez to
mi teeth tongu roof mouth heart belli ere
i come fire thaw but i blow fire shall
warm consid weather taller man i will
tak cold holla ho curti 

enter curti 

curti 
who call coldli 

grumio 
a piec ice thou doubt thou mayst slide shoulder to
mi heel greater run head neck a fire good
curti 

curti 
i master wife come grumio 

grumio 
o ay curti ay therefor fire fire cast water 

curti 
i hot shrew report 

grumio 
she good curti frost thou knowest winter tames
man woman beast hath tame old master new
mistress fellow curti 

curti 
away three inch fool i beast 

grumio 
am i three inch whi thi horn foot long i the
least but wilt thou make fire shall i complain thee our
mistress whose hand hand thou shalt soon feel to
thi cold comfort slow thi hot offic 

curti 
i prithe good grumio tell goe world 

grumio 
a cold world curti everi offic thine therefor fire do
thi duti thi duti master mistress almost
frozen death 

curti 
there fire readi therefor good grumio news 

grumio 
whi jack boy ho boy much news wilt thou 

curti 
come full coni catch 

grumio 
whi therefor fire i caught extrem cold where cook 
i supper readi hous trim rush strew cobweb swept the
servingmen new fustian white stock every
offic wed garment be jack fair within jills
fair without carpet laid everyth order 

curti 
all readi therefor i pray thee news 

grumio 
first know hors tire master mistress fallen 

curti 
how 

grumio 
out saddl dirt therebi hang tale 

curti 
let ha good grumio 

grumio 
lend thine ear 

curti 
here 

grumio 
 _strike _ there 

curti 
thi ti feel tale hear tale 

grumio 
and therefor ti call sensibl tale cuff to
knock ear beseech listen now i begin _imprimis_ we
cam foul hill master ride behind mistress 

curti 
both one hors 

grumio 
what thee 

curti 
whi hors 

grumio 
tell thou tale hadst thou cross thou shouldst have
heard hors fell hors thou shouldst have
heard miri place bemoil left with
th hors upon beat hors stumbl she
wad dirt pluck swore she
pray never pray i cri hors ran away 
how bridl burst i lost crupper mani thing of
worthi memori shall die oblivion thou return
unexperienc thi grave 

curti 
bi reckon shrew 

grumio 
ay thou proudest shall find comes
hom but talk i call forth nathaniel joseph nichola 
philip walter sugarsop rest let head sleekly
comb blue coat brush garter indifferent
knit let curtsi left leg presum touch a
hair master hors tail till kiss hand are all
readi 

curti 
they 

grumio 
call forth 

curti 
do hear ho you must meet master counten mistress 

grumio 
whi hath face 

curti 
who know 

grumio 
thou seem call compani counten 

curti 
i call forth credit 

grumio 
whi come borrow noth 


enter four five servant 

nathaniel 
welcom home grumio 

philip 
how grumio 

joseph 
what grumio 

nichola 
fellow grumio 

nathaniel 
how old lad 

grumio 
welcom fellow thu much for
greet now spruce companion readi thing neat 

nathaniel 
all thing readi how near master 

grumio 
e en hand alight therefor 
cock passion silenc i hear master 


enter petrucio katherina 

petruchio 
where knave what man door
to hold stirrup take hors 
where nathaniel gregori philip 

all servant 
here sir sir 

petruchio 
here sir sir sir sir 
you logger head unpolish groom 
what attend regard duti 
where foolish knave i sent 

grumio 
here sir foolish i 

petruchio 
you peasant swain whoreson malt hors drudg 
did i bid thee meet park 
and bring along rascal knave thee 

grumio 
nathaniel coat sir fulli made 
and gabriel pump unpink heel 
there link colour peter hat 
and walter dagger come sheath 
there none fine adam ralph gregori 
the rest rag old beggarli 
yet come meet 

petruchio 
go rascal go fetch supper 

 _exeunt servant _ 

where life late i led 
 where sit kate welcom 
food food food food 


re enter servant supper 

whi i say nay good sweet kate merri 
off boot rogu villain 
 it friar order grey 
 as forth walk way 
out rogu pluck foot awri 

 _strike _ 

take mend pluck 
be merri kate some water ho 
where spaniel troilu sirrah get hence
and bid cousin ferdinand come hither 

 _exit servant _ 

one kate must kiss acquaint 
where slipper shall i water 
come kate wash welcom heartili 

 _servant let ewer fall petruchio strike _ 

you whoreson villain let fall 

katherina 
patienc i pray twa fault unwil 

petruchio 
a whoreson beetl head flap ear knave 
come kate sit i know stomach 
will give thank sweet kate els shall i 
what mutton 

first servant 
ay 

petruchio 
who brought 

peter 
i 

petruchio 
 ti burnt meat 
what dog where rascal cook 
how durst villain bring dresser 
and serv thu love 

 _throw meat etc _ 

there take trencher cup 
you heedless jolthead unmann slave 
what grumbl i straight 

katherina 
i pray husband disquiet 
the meat well content 

petruchio 
i tell thee kate twa burnt dri away 
and i expressli forbid touch 
for engend choler planteth anger 
and better twere us fast 
sinc choler 
than feed roast flesh 
be patient tomorrow shall mend 
and night fast compani 
come i bring thee thi bridal chamber 

 _exeunt petruchio katherina curti _ 

nathaniel 
peter didst ever see like 

peter 
he kill humour 


re enter curti 

grumio 
where 

curti 
in chamber make sermon contin 
and rail swear rate poor soul 
know way stand look speak 
and sit one new risen dream 
away away come hither 

 _exeunt _ 

re enter petruchio 

petruchio 
thu i politicli begun reign 
and ti hope end success 
mi falcon sharp pass empti 
and till stoop must full gorg 
for never look upon lure 
anoth way i man haggard 
to make come know keeper call 
that watch watch kites
that bate beat obedi 
she eat meat today none shall eat 
last night slept tonight shall 
a meat undeserv fault
i find make bed 
and i fling pillow bolster 
thi way coverlet anoth way sheet 
ay amid hurli i intend
that done reverend care 
and conclus shall watch night 
and chanc nod i rail brawl 
and clamour keep still awak 
thi way kill wife kind 
and thu i curb mad headstrong humour 
he know better tame shrew 
now let speak ti chariti show 

 _exit _ 




scene ii padua befor baptista s hous 

enter tranio hortensio 

tranio 
i possibl friend licio mistress bianca
doth fanci lucentio 
i tell sir bear fair hand 

hortensio 
sir satisfi i said 
stand mark manner teach 

 _they stand asid _ 

enter bianca lucentio 

lucentio 
now mistress profit read 

bianca 
what master read first resolv 

lucentio 
i read i profess _the art love_ 

bianca 
and may prove sir master art 

lucentio 
while sweet dear prove mistress heart 

 _they retir _ 

hortensio 
quick proceed marri now tell i pray 
you durst swear mistress bianca
lov none world well lucentio 

tranio 
o despit love unconst womankind 
i tell thee licio wonder 

hortensio 
mistak i licio 
nor musician i seem 
but one scorn live disguise
for one leav gentleman
and make god cullion 
know sir i call hortensio 

tranio 
signior hortensio i often heard
of entir affect bianca 
and sinc mine eye wit light 
i content 
forswear bianca love ever 

hortensio 
see kiss court signior lucentio 
here hand i firmli vow
nev woo forswear 
a one unworthi former favours
that i fondli flatter withal 

tranio 
and i take like unfeign oath 
never marri though would entreat 
fie see beastli doth court 

hortensio 
would world quit forsworn 
for i may sure keep mine oath 
i marri wealthi widow
er three day pass hath long lov me
a i lov proud disdain haggard 
and farewel signior lucentio 
kind women beauteou look 
shall win love i take leav 
in resolut i swore 

 _exit hortensio lucentio bianca advanc _ 

tranio 
mistress bianca bless grace
a longeth lover bless case 
nay i ta en nap gentl love 
and forsworn hortensio 

bianca 
tranio jest forsworn 

tranio 
mistress 

lucentio 
then rid licio 

tranio 
i faith lusti widow 
that shall woo wed day 

bianca 
god give joy 

tranio 
ay tame 

bianca 
he say tranio 

tranio 
faith gone unto tame school 

bianca 
the tame school what place 

tranio 
ay mistress petruchio master 
that teacheth trick eleven twenti long 
to tame shrew charm chatter tongu 


enter biondello run 

biondello 
o master master i watch long
that i dog weari last i spied
an ancient angel come hill
wil serv turn 

tranio 
what biondello 

biondello 
master mercatant pedant 
i know formal apparel 
in gait counten sure like father 

lucentio 
and tranio 

tranio 
if credul trust tale 
i make glad seem vincentio 
and give assur baptista minola 
a right vincentio 
take love let alon 

 _exeunt lucentio bianca _ 

enter pedant 

pedant 
god save sir 

tranio 
and sir welcom 
travel far farthest 

pedant 
sir farthest week two 
but farther far rome 
and tripoli god lend life 

tranio 
what countryman i pray 

pedant 
of mantua 

tranio 
of mantua sir marri god forbid 
and come padua careless life 

pedant 
mi life sir how i pray goe hard 

tranio 
 ti death anyon mantua
to come padua know caus 
your ship stay venic duke 
for privat quarrel twixt duke 
hath publish proclaim openli 
 ti marvel newli come
y might heard els proclaim 

pedant 
ala sir wors 
for i bill money exchange
from florenc must deliv 

tranio 
well sir courtesi 
thi i i advis 
first tell ever pisa 

pedant 
ay sir pisa i often 
pisa renown grave citizen 

tranio 
among know one vincentio 

pedant 
i know i heard 
a merchant incompar wealth 

tranio 
he father sir sooth say 
in counten somewhat doth resembl 

biondello 
 _asid _ as much appl doth oyster one 

tranio 
to save life extrem 
thi favour i sake 
and think worst fortunes
that like sir vincentio 
hi name credit shall undertak 
and hous shall friendli lodg 
look take upon 
you understand sir shall stay
til done busi citi 
if courtesi sir accept 

pedant 
o sir i reput ever
th patron life liberti 

tranio 
then go make matter good 
thi way i let understand 
mi father look everi day
to pass assur dower marriage
 twixt one baptista daughter 
in circumst i instruct 
go cloth becom 

 _exeunt _ 




scene iii a room petruchio s hous 

enter katherina grumio 

grumio 
no forsooth i dare life 

katherina 
the wrong spite appear 
what marri famish 
beggar come unto father door
upon entreati present alm 
if elsewher meet chariti 
but i never knew entreat 
nor never need i entreat 
am starv meat giddi lack sleep 
with oath kept wake brawl fed 
and spite want 
he name perfect love 
a say i sleep eat
 twere deadli sick els present death 
i prithe go get repast 
i care wholesom food 

grumio 
what say neat foot 

katherina 
 ti pass good i prithe let 

grumio 
i fear choler meat 
how say fat tripe fine broil 

katherina 
i like well good grumio fetch 

grumio 
i can not tell i fear ti choler 
what say piec beef mustard 

katherina 
a dish i love feed upon 

grumio 
ay mustard hot littl 

katherina 
whi beef let mustard rest 

grumio 
nay i shall mustard 
or els get beef grumio 

katherina 
then one anyth thou wilt 

grumio 
whi mustard without beef 

katherina 
go get thee gone thou fals delud slave 

 _beat _ 

that feed st name meat 
sorrow thee pack you
that triumph thu upon miseri 
go get thee gone i say 


enter petruchio dish meat hortensio 

petruchio 
how fare kate what sweet amort 

hortensio 
mistress cheer 

katherina 
faith cold 

petruchio 
pluck thi spirit look cheer upon 
here love thou seest dilig i 
to dress thi meat bring thee 

 _set dish tabl _ 

i sure sweet kate kind merit thank 
what word nay thou lov st 
and pain sort proof 
here take away dish 

katherina 
i pray let stand 

petruchio 
the poorest servic repaid thank 
and shall mine touch meat 

katherina 
i thank sir 

hortensio 
signior petruchio fie blame 
come mistress kate i bear compani 

petruchio 
 _asid _ eat hortensio thou lovest 
much good unto thi gentl heart 
kate eat apac honey love 
will return unto thi father house
and revel brave best 
with silken coat cap golden ring 
with ruff cuff farthingal thing 
with scarf fan doubl chang braveri 
with amber bracelet bead knaveri 
what hast thou din the tailor stay thi leisur 
to deck thi bodi ruffl treasur 


enter tailor 

come tailor let us see ornament 
lay forth gown 


enter haberdash 

what news sir 

haberdash 
here cap worship bespeak 

petruchio 
whi mould porring 
a velvet dish fie fie ti lewd filthi 
whi ti cockl walnut shell 
a knack toy trick babi cap 
away come let bigger 

katherina 
i bigger doth fit time 
and gentlewomen wear cap 

petruchio 
when gentl shall one 
and till 

hortensio 
 _aside_ that hast 

katherina 
whi sir i trust i may leav speak 
and speak i i child babe 
your better endur say mind 
and can not best stop ear 
mi tongu tell anger heart 
or els heart conceal break 
and rather shall i free
even uttermost i pleas word 

petruchio 
whi thou say st true paltri cap 
a custard coffin baubl silken pie 
i love thee well thou lik st 

katherina 
love love i like cap 
and i i none 

 _exit haberdash _ 

petruchio 
thi gown whi ay come tailor let us see 
o merci god masqu stuff 
what a sleev ti like demi cannon 
what carv like appl tart 
here snip nip cut slish slash 
like censer barber shop 
whi devil name tailor call st thou 

hortensio 
 _aside_ i see like neither cap gown 

tailor 
you bid make orderli well 
accord fashion time 

petruchio 
marri rememb 
i bid mar time 
go hop everi kennel home 
for shall hop without custom sir 
i none henc make best 

katherina 
i never saw better fashion gown 
more quaint pleas commend 
belik mean make puppet 

petruchio 
whi true mean make puppet thee 

tailor 
she say worship mean make puppet 

petruchio 
o monstrou arrog thou liest thou thread 
thou thimbl 
thou yard three quarter half yard quarter nail 
thou flea thou nit thou winter cricket thou 
brav mine hous skein thread 
away thou rag thou quantiti thou remnant 
or i shall mete thee thi yard
a thou shalt think prate whilst thou liv st 
i tell thee i thou hast marr gown 

tailor 
your worship deceiv gown made
just master direct 
grumio gave order done 

grumio 
i gave order i gave stuff 

tailor 
but desir made 

grumio 
marri sir needl thread 

tailor 
but request cut 

grumio 
thou hast face mani thing 

tailor 
i 

grumio 
face thou hast brave mani men brave i neither be
fac brav i say unto thee i bid thi master cut gown 
but i bid cut piec ergo thou liest 

tailor 
whi note fashion testifi 

petruchio 
read 

grumio 
the note lie throat say i said 

tailor 
 imprimi loos bodi gown 

grumio 
master ever i said loos bodi gown sew skirt it
and beat death bottom brown thread i said gown 

petruchio 
proce 

tailor 
 with small compass cape 

grumio 
i confess cape 

tailor 
 with trunk sleev 

grumio 
i confess two sleev 

tailor 
 the sleev curious cut 

petruchio 
ay villaini 

grumio 
error bill sir error bill i command sleeves
should cut sew i prove upon thee 
though thi littl finger arm thimbl 

tailor 
thi true i say i thee place thou shouldst
know 

grumio 
i thee straight take thou bill give thi mete yard and
spar 

hortensio 
god merci grumio then shall odd 

petruchio 
well sir brief gown 

grumio 
you right sir ti mistress 

petruchio 
go take unto thi master use 

grumio 
villain thi life take mistress gown thi master s
use 

petruchio 
whi sir conceit 

grumio 
o sir conceit deeper think 
take mistress gown master use 
o fie fie fie 

petruchio 
 _aside_ hortensio say thou wilt see tailor paid 
 _to tailor _ go take henc gone say 

hortensio 
 _asid tailor _ tailor i pay thee thi gown tomorrow 
take unkind hasti word 
away i say commend thi master 

 _exit tailor _ 

petruchio 
well come kate unto father s
even honest mean habili 
our purs shall proud garment poor
for ti mind make bodi rich 
and sun break darkest cloud 
so honour peereth meanest habit 
what jay preciou lark
becaus feather beauti 
or adder better eel
becaus paint skin content eye 
o good kate neither art thou worse
for poor furnitur mean array 
if thou account st shame lay 
and therefor frolic henc forthwith 
to feast sport us thi father hous 
go call men let us straight 
and bring hors unto long lane end 
there mount thither walk foot 
let see i think ti seven clock 
and well may come dinner time 

katherina 
i dare assur sir ti almost two 
and twill supper time ere come 

petruchio 
it shall seven ere i go hors 
look i speak think 
you still cross sir let alon 
i go today ere i 
it shall clock i say 

hortensio 
whi gallant command sun 

 _exeunt _ 




scene iv padua befor baptista s hous 

enter tranio pedant dress like vincentio

tranio 
sir hous pleas i call 

pedant 
ay els i deceiv 
signior baptista may rememb 
near twenti year ago genoa 
where lodger pegasu 

tranio 
 ti well hold case 
with auster longeth father 

pedant 
i warrant but sir come boy 
 twere good school 


enter biondello 

tranio 
fear sirrah biondello 
now duti throughli i advis 
imagin twere right vincentio 

biondello 
tut fear 

tranio 
but hast thou done thi errand baptista 

biondello 
i told father venic 
and look day padua 

tranio 
th art tall fellow hold thee drink 
here come baptista set counten sir 


enter baptista lucentio 

signior baptista happili met 
 _to pedant_ sir gentleman i told 
i pray stand good father 
give bianca patrimoni 

pedant 
soft son 
sir leav come padua
to gather debt son lucentio
mad acquaint weighti cause
of love daughter 
and good report i hear 
and love beareth daughter 
and stay long 
i content good father care 
to match pleas like
no wors i upon agreement
m shall find readi willing
with one consent bestow 
for curiou i can not 
signior baptista i hear well 

baptista 
sir pardon i say 
your plain short pleas well 
right true son lucentio here
doth love daughter loveth 
or dissembl deepli affect 
and therefor say 
that like father deal 
and pass daughter suffici dower 
the match made done 
your son shall daughter consent 

tranio 
i thank sir where know best
w affi assur ta en
a shall either part agreement stand 

baptista 
not hous lucentio know
pitch ear i mani servant 
besid old gremio hearken still 
and happili might interrupt 

tranio 
then lodg like 
there doth father lie night
w pass busi privat well 
send daughter servant 
mi boy shall fetch scriven present 
the worst slender warning
y like thin slender pittanc 

baptista 
it like well cambio hie home 
and bid bianca make readi straight 
and tell hath happen 
lucentio father arriv padua 
and like lucentio wife 

lucentio 
i pray god may heart 

tranio 
dalli god get thee gone 
signior baptista shall i lead way 
welcom one mess like cheer 
come sir better pisa 

baptista 
i follow 

 _exeunt tranio pedant baptista _ 

biondello 
cambio 

lucentio 
what say st thou biondello 

biondello 
you saw master wink laugh upon 

lucentio 
biondello

mor sign token

deceit son

th church take priest clerk suffici honest
wit 
if look i say 
but bid bianca farewel ever day 

 _go _ 

lucentio

biondello 
i can not tarri i knew wench marri afternoon went to
th garden parsley stuff rabbit may sir so
adieu sir my master hath appoint go saint luke bid
th priest readi come come appendix

lucentio 
i may content 
she plea wherefor i doubt 
hap hap may i roundli go

scene v a public road 

enter petruchio katherina hortensio servant 

petruchio 
come god name toward father 
good lord bright goodli shine moon 

katherina 
the moon the sun moonlight 

petruchio 
i say moon shine bright 

katherina 
i know sun shine bright 

petruchio 
now mother son 
it shall moon star i list 
or ere i journey father hous 
go fetch hors back 
evermor cross cross noth cross 

hortensio 
say say shall never go 

katherina 
forward i pray sinc come far 
and moon sun pleas 
and pleas call rush candl 
henceforth i vow shall 

petruchio 
i say moon 

katherina 
i know moon 

petruchio 
nay lie bless sun 

katherina 
then god bless bless sun 
but sun say 
and moon chang even mind 
what nam even 
and shall katherin 

hortensio 
petruchio go thi way field 

petruchio 
well forward forward thu bowl run 
and unluckili bia 
but soft compani come 


enter vincentio travel dress 

 _to vincentio_ good morrow gentl mistress away 
tell sweet kate tell truli 
hast thou beheld fresher gentlewoman 
such war white red within cheek 
what star spangl heaven beauty
a two eye becom heavenli face 
fair love maid good day thee 
sweet kate embrac beauti sake 

hortensio 
a make man mad make woman 

katherina 
young bud virgin fair fresh sweet 
whither away thi abod 
happi parent fair child 
happier man favour stars
allot thee love bedfellow 

petruchio 
whi kate i hope thou art mad 
thi man old wrinkl fade wither 
and maiden thou sayst 

katherina 
pardon old father mistak eye 
that bedazzl sun
that everyth i look seemeth green 
now i perceiv thou art reverend father 
pardon i pray thee mad mistak 

petruchio 
do good old grandsir withal make known
which way thou travellest along us 
we shall joy thi compani 

vincentio 
fair sir merri mistress 
that strang encount much amaz 
mi name call vincentio dwell pisa 
and bound i padua visit
a son mine long i seen 

petruchio 
what name 

vincentio 
lucentio gentl sir 

petruchio 
happili met happier thi son 
and law well reverend age 
i may entitl thee love father 
the sister wife gentlewoman 
thi son hath marri wonder 
nor griev good esteem 
her dowri wealthi worthi birth 
besid qualifi may beseem
th spous nobl gentleman 
let embrac old vincentio 
and wander see thi honest son 
who thi arriv full joyou 

vincentio 
but true els pleasur 
like pleasant travel break jest
upon compani overtak 

hortensio 
i assur thee father 

petruchio 
come go along see truth hereof 
for first merriment hath made thee jealou 

 _exeunt hortensio _ 

hortensio 
well petruchio put heart 
have widow froward 
then hast thou taught hortensio untoward 

 _exit _ 




act v

scene i padua befor lucentio s hous 

enter one side biondello lucentio bianca gremio walk on
oth side 

biondello 
softli swiftli sir priest readi 

lucentio 
i fli biondello may chanc need thee home therefore
leav us 

biondello 
nay faith i see church back come back my
mast soon i 

 _exeunt lucentio bianca biondello _ 

gremio 
i marvel cambio come 


enter petruchio katherina vincentio attend 

petruchio 
sir door lucentio hous 
mi father bear toward market place 
thither must i i leav sir 

vincentio 
you shall choos drink go 
i think i shall command welcom 
and likelihood cheer toward 

 _knock _ 

gremio 
they busi within best knock louder 


enter pedant window 

pedant 
what knock would beat gate 

vincentio 
i signior lucentio within sir 

pedant 
he within sir spoken withal

what man bring hundr pound two make merri withal

keep hundr pound shall need none long i
liv

hi father come pisa door speak with
him

window

art thou father

 _to vincentio_ whi gentleman flat knaveri to
tak upon anoth man name

lay hand villain i believ mean cozen somebodi this
citi counten 

re enter biondello 

biondello 
i seen church togeth god send em good ship 
but mine old master vincentio now undon and
brought noth 

vincentio 
 _see biondello _ come hither crack hemp

in life

what notori villain didst thou never see thi master father 
vincentio

out window

i inde 

 _he beat biondello _

 _exit window _

 _they retir _ 

re enter pedant baptista tranio servant 

tranio 
sir offer beat servant

what i sir nay sir o immort god o fine
villain a silken doublet velvet hose scarlet cloak a

husband home son servant spend univers

how matter

what man lunat 

tranio 
sir seem sober ancient gentleman habit words
show madman whi sir cern i wear pearl and
gold i thank good father i abl maintain

thi father o villain sailmak bergamo

you mistak sir mistak sir pray think his
nam

hi name as i knew name i brought ever since
h three year old name tranio 

pedant

heir land signior vincentio

y duke name o son son tell thou villain 
where son lucentio

call forth offic 


enter one offic 

carri mad knave gaol father baptista i charg see
that forthcom

i dare swear right vincentio

swear thou darest

tranio 
then thou wert best say i lucentio 

gremio 
ye i know thee signior lucentio

away dotard gaol 

vincentio 
thu stranger may hale abu o monstrou villain 

re enter biondello lucentio bianca 

biondello

ar undon 

lucentio 
 _kneel _ pardon sweet father 

vincentio 
live sweetest son 

 _biondello tranio pedant run _ 

bianca 
 _kneel _ pardon dear father 

baptista 
how hast thou offend 
where lucentio 

lucentio 
here lucentio 
right son right vincentio 
that marriag made thi daughter mine 
while counterfeit suppos blear thine eyn

here pack wit deceiv us 

vincentio 
where damn villain tranio 
that fac brav matter

whi tell cambio

love wrought miracl bianca love
mad exchang state tranio 
while bear counten town 
and happili i arriv last
unto wish bliss 
what tranio enforc 
then pardon sweet father sake 

vincentio 
i slit villain nose would sent gaol

 _to lucentio _ but hear sir have marri daughter
without ask good

reveng villaini 

 _exit _

 _exit _ 

lucentio

 _exeunt lucentio bianca _ 

gremio 
mi cake dough i among rest 
out hope share feast 

 _exit _ 

petruchio katherina advanc 

katherina 
husband let follow see end ado 

petruchio 
first kiss kate

what midst street

what art thou asham

no sir god forbid asham kiss 

petruchio 
whi let home come sirrah let away 

katherina

petruchio 
i well come sweet kate 
better never never late 

 _exeunt _ 




scene ii a room lucentio s hous 

enter baptista vincentio gremio pedant lucentio bianca 
petruchio katherina hortensio widow tranio biondello grumio
and other attend 

lucentio 
at last though long jar note agre 
and time rage war done 
to smile scape peril overblown 
mi fair bianca bid father welcom 
while i self kind welcom thine 
brother petruchio sister katherina 
and thou hortensio thi love widow 
feast best welcom hous 
mi banquet close stomach 
after great good cheer pray sit 
for sit chat well eat 

 _they sit tabl _ 

petruchio 
noth sit sit eat eat 

baptista 
padua afford kind son petruchio 

petruchio 
padua afford noth kind 

hortensio 
for sake i would word true 

petruchio 
now life hortensio fear widow 

widow 
then never trust i afeard 

petruchio 
you sensibl yet miss sens 
i mean hortensio afeard 

widow 
he giddi think world turn round 

petruchio 
roundli repli 

katherina 
mistress mean 

widow 
thu i conceiv 

petruchio 
conceiv how like hortensio 

hortensio 
mi widow say thu conceiv tale 

petruchio 
veri well mend kiss good widow 

katherina 
 he giddi think world turn round 
i pray tell meant 

widow 
your husband troubl shrew 
measur husband sorrow woe 
and know mean 

katherina 
a mean mean 

widow 
right i mean 

katherina 
and i mean inde respect 

petruchio 
to kate 

hortensio 
to widow 

petruchio 
a hundr mark kate put 

hortensio 
that offic 

petruchio 
spoke like offic ha thee lad 

 _drink hortensio _ 

baptista 
how like gremio quick wit folk 

gremio 
believ sir butt togeth well 

bianca 
head butt an hasti wit body
would say head butt head horn 

vincentio 
ay mistress bride hath awaken 

bianca 
ay fright therefor i sleep 

petruchio 
nay shall sinc begun 
have bitter jest two 

bianca 
am i bird i mean shift bush 
and pursu draw bow 
you welcom 

 _exeunt bianca katherina widow _ 

petruchio 
she hath prevent here signior tranio 
thi bird aim though hit 
therefor health shot miss 

tranio 
o sir lucentio slipp like greyhound 
which run catch master 

petruchio 
a good swift simil someth currish 

tranio 
 ti well sir hunt 
 ti thought deer hold bay 

baptista 
o ho petruchio tranio hit 

lucentio 
i thank thee gird good tranio 

hortensio 
confess confess hath hit 

petruchio 
a littl gall i confess 
and jest glanc away 
 ti ten one maim two outright 

baptista 
now good sad son petruchio 
i think thou hast veriest shrew 

petruchio 
well i say therefor assur 
let one send unto wife 
and whose wife obedi 
to come first doth send 
shall win wager propos 

hortensio 
content what wager 

lucentio 
twenti crown 

petruchio 
twenti crown 
i ventur much hawk hound 
but twenti time much upon wife 

lucentio 
a hundr 

hortensio 
content 

petruchio 
a match ti done 

hortensio 
who shall begin 

lucentio 
that i 
go biondello bid mistress come 

biondello 
i go 

 _exit _ 

baptista 
son i half bianca come 

lucentio 
i halv i bear 


re enter biondello 

how news 

biondello 
sir mistress send word
that busi can not come 

petruchio 
how she busi can not come 
i answer 

gremio 
ay kind one 
pray god sir wife send wors 

petruchio 
i hope better 

hortensio
