to come forthwith 

 _exit biondello _ 

petruchio 
o ho entreat 
nay must need come 

hortensio 
i afraid sir 
do entreat 


re enter biondello 

now wife 

biondello 
she say goodli jest hand 
she come bid come 

petruchio 
wors wors come o vile 
intoler endur 
sirrah grumio go mistress 
say i command come 

 _exit grumio _ 

hortensio 
i know answer 

petruchio 
what 

hortensio 
she 

petruchio 
the fouler fortun mine end 


re enter katherina 

baptista 
now holidam come katherina 

katherina 
what sir send 

petruchio 
where sister hortensio wife 

katherina 
they sit confer parlour fire 

petruchio 
go fetch hither deni come 
swing soundli forth unto husband 
away i say bring hither straight 

 _exit katherina _ 

lucentio 
here wonder talk wonder 

hortensio 
and i wonder bode 

petruchio 
marri peac bode love quiet life 
an aw rule right supremaci 
and short sweet happi 

baptista 
now fair befal thee good petruchio 
the wager thou hast i add
unto loss twenti thousand crown 
anoth dowri anoth daughter 
for chang never 

petruchio 
nay i win wager better yet 
and show sign obedi 
her new built virtu obedi 
see come bring froward wives
a prison womanli persuas 


re enter katherina bianca widow 

katherin cap becom 
off baubl throw underfoot 

 _katherina pull cap throw _ 

widow 
lord let never caus sigh
til i brought silli pass 

bianca 
fie foolish duti call 

lucentio 
i would duti foolish 
the wisdom duti fair bianca 
hath cost hundr crown sinc supper time 

bianca 
the fool lay duti 

petruchio 
katherin i charg thee tell headstrong women
what duti owe lord husband 

widow 
come come mock tell 

petruchio 
come i say first begin 

widow 
she shall 

petruchio 
i say shall first begin 

katherina 
fie fie unknit threaten unkind brow 
and dart scorn glanc eyes
to wound thi lord thi king thi governor 
it blot thi beauti frost bite mead 
confound thi fame whirlwind shake fair bud 
and sens meet amiabl 
a woman mov like fountain troubl 
muddi ill seem thick bereft beauti 
and none dri thirsty
wil deign sip touch one drop 
thi husband thi lord thi life thi keeper 
thi head thi sovereign one care thee 
and thi mainten commit body
to pain labour sea land 
to watch night storm day cold 
whilst thou liest warm home secur safe 
and crave tribut thi hands
but love fair look true obedi 
too littl payment great debt 
such duti subject owe princ 
even woman oweth husband 
and froward peevish sullen sour 
and obedi honest 
what foul contend rebel
and graceless traitor love lord 
i asham women simple
to offer war kneel peac 
or seek rule supremaci sway 
when bound serv love obey 
whi bodi soft weak smooth 
unapt toil troubl world 
but soft condit hearts
should well agre extern part 
come come froward unabl worm 
mi mind hath big one 
mi heart great reason hapli 
to bandi word word frown frown 
but i see lanc straw 
our strength weak weak past compar 
that seem inde least 
then vail stomach boot 
and place hand husband foot 
in token duti pleas 
mi hand readi may eas 

petruchio 
whi wench come kiss kate 

lucentio 
well go thi way old lad thou shalt ha 

vincentio 
 ti good hear children toward 

lucentio 
but harsh hear women froward 

petruchio 
come kate bed 
we three marri two sped 
 twa i wager 
 _to lucentio _ though hit white 
and winner god give good night 

 _exeunt petrucio katherina _ 

hortensio 
now go thi way thou hast tam curst shrew 

lucentio 
 ti wonder leav tam

act i

scen i on ship sea tempestu nois thunder lightning
heard 

 enter shipmast boatswain sever 

master 
boatswain 

boatswain 
here master cheer 

master 
good speak marin fall yare run ourselves
aground bestir bestir 

 _exit _ 

 enter marin 

boatswain 
heigh heart cheerli cheerli heart yare yare take the
topsail tend th master whistl blow till thou burst thi wind 
if room enough 

 enter alonso sebastian antonio ferdinand gonzalo other 

alonso 
good boatswain care where master 
play men 

boatswain 
i pray keep 

antonio 
where master boson 

boatswain 
do hear you mar labour keep cabin do
assist storm 

gonzalo 
nay good patient 

boatswain 
when sea henc what care roarer name king 
to cabin silenc troubl us 

gonzalo 
good yet rememb thou hast aboard 

boatswain 
none i love you counsellor can
command element silenc work peac present 
we hand rope use author can not give
thank live long make readi cabin
for mischanc hour hap cheerli good heart out
of way i say 

 _exit _ 

gonzalo 
i great comfort fellow methink hath drowning
mark upon hi complexion perfect gallow stand fast good
fat hang make rope destini cabl our
own doth littl advantag if born hang case is
miser 

 _exeunt _ 

 re enter boatswain 

boatswain 
down topmast yare lower lower bring tri wi th 
maincours 

 _a cri within _ 

 a plagu upon howl they louder weather our
 offic 

 enter sebastian antonio gonzalo 

yet what shall give er drown have a
mind sink 

sebastian 
a pox throat bawl blasphem incharit dog 

boatswain 
work 

antonio 
hang cur hang whoreson insol noisemak we less afraid
to drown thou art 

gonzalo 
i warrant drown though ship stronger a
nutshel leaki unstanch wench 

boatswain 
lay hold hold set two cours sea lay her
off 

 enter marin wet 

marin 
all lost prayer prayer lost 

 _exeunt _ 

boatswain 
what must mouth cold 

gonzalo 
the king princ prayer let assist 
for case 

sebastian 
i patienc 

antonio 
we mere cheat live drunkard 
thi wide chapp rascal would thou might st lie drowning
th wash ten tide 

gonzalo 
he hang yet 
though everi drop water swear 
and gape wid st glut 

_a confus nois within _ merci us 
 we split split farewel wife children 
 farewel brother we split split split 

antonio 
let sink wi th king 

 _exit _ 

sebastian 
let take leav 

 _exit _ 

gonzalo 
now would i give thousand furlong sea acr barren
ground long heath brown furz anyth the will done but
i would fain die dri death 

 _exit _ 

scene ii the island befor cell prospero 

 enter prospero miranda 

miranda 
if art dearest father have
put wild water roar allay 
the sky seem would pour stink pitch 
but sea mount th welkin cheek 
dash fire o i suffered
with i saw suffer a brave vessel 
who doubt nobl creatur 
dash piec o cri knock
against heart poor soul perish 
had i god power i would
hav sunk sea within earth ere
it good ship swallow and
th fraught soul within 

prospero 
be collect 
no amaz tell piteou heart
ther harm done 

miranda 
o woe day 

prospero 
no harm 
i done noth care thee 
of thee dear one thee daughter who
art ignor thou art nought knowing
of whenc i i better
than prospero master full poor cell 
and thi greater father 

miranda 
more know
did never meddl thought 

prospero 
 ti time
i inform thee farther lend thi hand 
and pluck magic garment so 

 _lay mantl _ 

lie art wipe thou thine eye comfort 
the dire spectacl wrack touch d
the virtu compass thee 
i provis mine art
so safe order soul 
no much perdit hair
betid creatur vessel
which thou heard st cri thou saw st sink sit 
for thou must know farther 

miranda 
you often
begun tell i stopp 
and left bootless inquisit 
conclud stay yet 

prospero 
the hour come 
the minut bid thee ope thine ear 
obey attent canst thou remember
a time came unto cell 
i think thou canst thou wast not
out three year old 

miranda 
certainli sir i 

prospero 
bi by hous person 
of anyth imag tell that
hath kept thi remembr 

miranda 
 ti far 
and rather like dream assurance
that remembr warrant had i not
four five women tend 

prospero 
thou hadst miranda but it
that live thi mind what seest thou else
in dark backward abysm time 
if thou rememb rest aught ere thou cam st 
how thou cam st thou mayst 

miranda 
but i 

prospero 
twelv year sinc miranda twelv year sinc 
thi father duke milan and
a princ power 

miranda 
sir father 

prospero 
thi mother piec virtu and
sh said thou wast daughter and thi father
wa duke milan heir
and princess wors issu 

miranda 
o heaven 
what foul play came thenc 
or bless 

prospero 
both girl 
bi foul play thou say st heav thenc 
but blessedli holp hither 

miranda 
o heart bleeds
to think th teen i turn 
which remembr pleas farther 

prospero 
mi brother thi uncl call antonio 
i pray thee mark brother should
b perfidi next thyself
of world i lov put
th manag state time
through signori first 
and prospero prime duke reputed
in digniti liber art 
without parallel studi 
the govern i cast upon brother 
and state grew stranger transported
and rapt secret studi thi fals uncl 
dost thou attend 

miranda 
sir heed 

prospero 
be perfect grant suit 
how deni advanc who
to trash top new created
th creatur mine i say chang em 
or els new form em key
of offic offic set heart th state
to tune plea ear was
th ivi hid princ trunk 
and suck verdur thou attend st 

miranda 
o good sir i 

prospero 
i pray thee mark 
i thu neglect worldli end dedicated
to close better mind
with retir 
o er priz popular rate fals brother
awak evil natur trust 
like good parent beget him
a falsehood contrari great
a trust inde limit 
a confid san bound he thu lord 
not revenu yield 
but power might els exact like one
who truth tell 
made sinner memori 
to credit lie believe
h inde duke substitut 
and execut th outward face royalti 
with prerog henc ambit grow 
dost thou hear 

miranda 
your tale sir would cure deaf 

prospero 
to screen part play d
and play need be
absolut milan me poor man library
wa dukedom larg enough tempor royalties
h think incap confeder 
so dri sway wi th king naples
to give annual tribut homag 
subject coronet crown bend
th dukedom yet unbow ala poor milan 
to ignobl stoop 

miranda 
o heaven 

prospero 
mark condit event tell me
if might brother 

miranda 
i sin
to think nobli grandmoth 
good womb born bad son 

prospero 
now condit 
thi king napl enemy
to inveter hearken brother suit 
which lieu th premises
of homag i know much tribut 
should present extirp mine
out dukedom confer fair milan 
with honour brother whereon 
a treacher armi levi one midnight
f th purpos antonio open
th gate milan th dead dark 
the minist th purpos hurri thence
m thi cri self 

miranda 
alack piti 
i rememb ring i cri 
will cri er hint
that wring mine eye 

prospero 
hear littl 
and i bring thee present business
which upon us without story
wer impertin 

miranda 
wherefor not
that hour destroy us 

prospero 
well demand wench 
mi tale provok question dear durst 
so dear love peopl bore set
a mark bloodi busi but
with colour fairer paint foul end 
in hurri us aboard bark 
bore us leagu sea prepared
a rotten carcass butt rigg 
nor tackl sail mast rats
instinct quit there hoist us 
to cri th sea roar us sigh
to th wind whose piti sigh back 
did us love wrong 

miranda 
alack trouble
wa i 

prospero 
o cherubin
th wast preserv thou didst smile 
infus fortitud heaven 
when i deck sea drop full salt 
under burden groan rai me
an undergo stomach bear up
against ensu 

miranda 
how came ashor 

prospero 
bi provid divin 
some food fresh water that
a nobl neapolitan gonzalo 
out chariti appointed
mast design give us with
rich garment linen stuff necessari 
which sinc stead much gentl 
know i lov book furnish me
from mine librari volum that
i prize dukedom 

miranda 
would i might
but ever see man 

prospero 
now i aris 
sit still hear last sea sorrow 
here island arriv here
hav i thi schoolmast made thee profit
than princ time
for vainer hour tutor care 

miranda 
heaven thank and i pray sir 
for still ti beat mind reason
for rais sea storm 

prospero 
know thu far forth 
bi accid strang bounti fortun 
now dear ladi hath mine enemies
brought shore prescience
i find zenith doth depend upon
a auspici star whose influence
if i court omit fortunes
wil ever droop here ceas question 
thou art inclin sleep ti good dul 
and give way i know thou canst choos 

 _miranda sleep _ 

come away servant come i readi 
approach ariel come 

 enter ariel 

ariel 
all hail great master grave sir hail i come
to answer thi best pleasur fli 
to swim dive fire ride
on curl cloud thi strong bid task
ariel qualiti 

prospero 
hast thou spirit 
perform point tempest i bade thee 

ariel 
to everi articl 
i board king ship beak 
now waist deck everi cabin 
i flam amaz sometim i divid 
and burn mani place topmast 
the yard boresprit would i flame distinctli 
then meet join jove lightn precursors
o th dread thunder clap momentary
and sight outrun fire cracks
of sulphur roar mighti neptune
seem besieg make bold wave trembl 
yea dread trident shake 

prospero 
mi brave spirit 
who firm constant coil
would infect reason 

ariel 
not soul
but felt fever mad play d
some trick desper all mariners
plung foam brine quit vessel 
then afir king son ferdinand 
with hair stare like reed hair 
wa first man leapt cri hell empti 
and devil 

prospero 
whi spirit 
but nigh shore 

ariel 
close master 

prospero 
but ariel safe 

ariel 
not hair perish 
on sustain garment blemish 
but fresher thou bad st 
in troop i disper bout isl 
the king son i land 
whom i left cool air sighs
in odd angl isl sit 
hi arm sad knot 

prospero 
of king ship
th marin say thou hast dispo 
and rest th fleet 

ariel 
safe harbour
i king ship deep nook once
th call dst midnight fetch dew
from still vex bermooth hid 
the marin hatch stow 
who charm join suff red labour 
i left asleep rest th fleet 
which i disper met 
and upon mediterranean flote
bound sadli home napl 
suppos saw king ship wrack 
and great person perish 

prospero 
ariel thi charge
exactli perform work 
what time th day 

ariel 
past mid season 

prospero 
at least two glass the time twixt six now
must us spent precious 

ariel 
i toil sinc thou dost give pain 
let rememb thee thou hast promi 
which yet perform 

prospero 
how moodi 
what thou canst demand 

ariel 
mi liberti 

prospero 
befor time no 

ariel 
i prithe 
rememb i done thee worthi servic 
told thee lie made mistak serv d
without grudg grumbl thou didst promise
to bate full year 

prospero 
dost thou forget
from torment i free thee 

ariel 
no 

prospero 
thou dost think st much tread ooze
of salt deep 
to run upon sharp wind north 
to busi vein th earth
when bak frost 

ariel 
i sir 

prospero 
thou liest malign thing hast thou forgot
th foul witch sycorax age envy
wa grown hoop hast thou forgot 

ariel 
no sir 

prospero 
thou hast where born speak tell 

ariel 
sir argier 

prospero 
o i must
onc month recount thou hast 
which thou forget st thi damn witch sycorax 
for mischief manifold sorceri terrible
to enter human hear argier 
thou know st banish one thing did
they would take life is true 

ariel 
ay sir 

prospero 
thi blue ey hag hither brought child 
and left th sailor thou slave 
a thou report st thyself wast servant 
and thou wast spirit delicate
to act earthi abhorr command 
refus grand hest confin thee 
bi help potent minist 
and unmitig rage 
into cloven pine within rift
imprison thou didst pain remain
a dozen year within space die 
and left thee thou didst vent thi groans
a fast mill wheel strike then island 
save son litter 
a freckl whelp hag born honour with
a human shape 

ariel 
ye caliban son 

prospero 
dull thing i say caliban 
whom i keep servic thou best know st
what torment i find thee thi groans
did make wolv howl penetr breasts
of ever angri bear torment
to lay upon damn sycorax
could undo mine art 
when i arriv heard thee made gape
th pine let thee 

ariel 
i thank thee master 

prospero 
if thou murmur st i rend oak
and peg thee knotti entrail till
thou hast howl away twelv winter 

ariel 
pardon master 
i correspond command 
and sprite gentli 

prospero 
do two days
i discharg thee 

ariel 
that nobl master 
what shall i say what shall i 

prospero 
go make thyself like nymph th sea be subject
to sight thine mine invisible
to everi eyebal els go take shape 
and hither come go henc dilig 

 _exit ariel _ 

awak dear heart awak thou hast slept well 
awak 

miranda 
 _wake _ the strang stori put
heavi 

prospero 
shake come 
we visit caliban slave never
yield us kind answer 

miranda 
 ti villain sir 
i love look 

prospero 
but ti 
we can not miss make fire 
fetch wood serv offices
that profit us what ho slave caliban 
thou earth thou speak 

caliban 
 _within _ there wood enough within 

prospero 
come forth i say busi thee 
come thou tortois 

 re enter ariel like water nymph 

fine apparit my quaint ariel 
hark thine ear 

ariel 
mi lord shall done 

 _exit _ 

prospero 
thou poison slave got devil himself
upon thi wick dam come forth 

 enter caliban 

caliban 
a wick dew e er mother brush d
with raven feather unwholesom fen
drop a south west blow ye 
and blister er 

prospero 
for sure tonight thou shalt cramp 
side stitch shall pen thi breath urchins
shal forth vast night may work
al exercis thee thou shalt pinch d
a thick honeycomb pinch stinging
than bee made 

caliban 
i must eat dinner 
thi island mine sycorax mother 
which thou tak st when thou cam st first 
thou strok st made much wouldst give me
wat berri teach how
to name bigger light less 
that burn day night i lov thee 
and show thee qualiti th isl 
the fresh spring brine pit barren place fertil 
cur i all charms
of sycorax toad beetl bat light 
for i subject 
which first mine king sti me
in hard rock while keep me
th rest th island 

prospero 
thou lie slave 
whom stripe may move kind i us thee 
filth thou art human care lodg thee
in mine cell till thou didst seek violate
th honour child 

caliban 
oh ho oh ho would done 
thou didst prevent i peopl else
thi isl caliban 

prospero 
abhor slave 
which print good wilt take 
be capabl ill i piti thee 
took pain make thee speak taught thee hour
on thing thou didst savag 
know thine mean wouldst gabbl like
a thing brutish i endow thi purposes
with word made known but thi vile race 
though thou didst learn good natures
could abid therefor wast thou
deservedli confin rock 
who hadst deserv prison 

caliban 
you taught languag profit t
i i know curs the red plagu rid 
for learn languag 

prospero 
hag seed henc 
fetch us fuel quick thou rt best 
to answer busi shrug st thou malic 
if thou neglect st dost unwillingly
what i command i rack thee old cramp 
fill thi bone ach make thee roar 
that beast shall trembl thi din 

caliban 
no pray thee 
 _asid _ i must obey hi art power 
it would control dam god setebo 
and make vassal 

prospero 
so slave henc 

 _exit caliban _ 

 re enter ariel play sing ferdinand follow 

ariel s song 


_come unto yellow sand 
 and take hand

those pearl eye

but doth suffer sea change

lord look believ sir 
it carri brave form but ti spirit 

prospero

a thi gallant thou seest
wa wrack someth stain d
with grief beauti canker thou mightst call him

and stray find em

i ever saw nobl

a soul prompt spirit fine spirit i free thee
within two day

if maid

they chang eye delic ariel 
i set thee free _to ferdinand _ a word good sir 
i fear done wrong word

i third man e er i saw first
that e er i sigh piti move father
to inclin way

th queen napl

from lord

h came aliv land

w say befit hour

scene ii anoth part island 

 enter caliban burden wood a nois thunder heard 

caliban 
all infect sun suck up
from bog fen flat prosper fall make him
bi inch meal diseas hi spirit hear 
and yet i need must curs but pinch 
fright urchin show pitch mire 
nor lead like firebrand dark
out way unless bid em but
for everi trifl set upon 
sometim like ape mow chatter 
and bite like hedgehog which
li tumbl barefoot way mount
their prick footfal sometim i
al wound adder cloven tongues
do hiss mad 

 enter trinculo 

lo lo 
here come spirit torment me
for bring wood slowli i fall flat 
perchanc mind 

trinculo 
here neither bush shrub bear weather and
anoth storm brew i hear sing th wind yond black
cloud yond huge one look like foul bombard would shed his
liquor if thunder i know hide
mi head yond cloud can not choos fall pail what have
w man fish dead aliv a fish smell like fish 
a ancient fish like smell kind newest
poor john a strang fish were i england i and
had fish paint holiday fool would give a
piec silver would monster make man strang beast
ther make man when give doit reliev lame
beggar lay ten see dead indian legg like man 
and fin like arm warm troth i let loos my
opinion hold longer fish island hath
lat suffer thunderbolt _thunder _ ala storm come
again my best way creep gaberdin other
shelt hereabout miseri acquaint man strang bed fellow i
wil shroud till dreg storm past 

 enter stephano sing bottl hand 

stephano 
_i shall sea sea 
here shall i die ashor _

thi scurvi tune sing man funer 
well comfort 

 _drink _ 

_the master swabber boatswain i 
 the gunner mate 
lov mall meg marian margeri 
 but none us car kate 
 for tongu tang 
 would cri sailor go hang 
she lov savour tar pitch 
yet tailor might scratch er itch 
 then sea boy let go hang _

thi scurvi tune comfort 

 _drink _

do torment o

now four leg hath said as proper man ever
w four leg can not make give ground shall said so
again stephano breath nostril

the spirit torment o

tak agu where devil learn languag i will
giv relief if i recov and
keep tame get napl present any
emperor ever trod neat leather 

caliban

of bottl never drunk wine afor go near to
remov fit if i recov keep tame i not
tak much he shall pay hath that
soundli

tel friend open chap

act iii

scen i befor prospero cell 

 enter ferdinand bear log 

ferdinand 
there sport pain labour
delight set kind baseness
ar nobli undergon poor matters
point rich end thi mean task
would heavi odiou but
th mistress i serv quicken dead 
and make labour pleasur o is
ten time gentl father crab 
and compo harsh i must remove
som thousand log pile 
upon sore injunct sweet mistress
weep see work say baseness
had never like executor i forget 
but sweet thought even refresh labour 
most busi least i 

 enter miranda prospero behind 

miranda 
ala pray 
work hard i would lightn had
burnt log enjoin pile 
pray set rest when burn 
 twill weep weari my father
i hard studi pray rest 
he safe three hour 

ferdinand 
o dear mistress 
the sun set i shall discharge
what i must strive 

miranda 
if sit 
i bear log pray give 
i carri pile 

ferdinand 
no preciou creatur 
i rather crack sinew break back 
than dishonour undergo 
while i sit lazi 

miranda 
it would becom me
a well i it
with much eas good 
and 

prospero 
 _asid _ poor worm thou art infect 
thi visit show 

miranda 
you look wearili 

ferdinand 
no nobl mistress ti fresh morn me
when night i beseech 
chiefli i might set prayer 
what name 

miranda 
miranda o father 
i broke hest say 

ferdinand 
admir miranda 
inde top admir worth
what dearest world full mani lady
i ey best regard mani time
th harmoni tongu hath bondage
brought dilig ear sever virtues
hav i lik sever women never any
with full soul defect her
did quarrel noblest grace ow 
and put foil o 
so perfect peerless created
of everi creatur best 

miranda 
i know
on sex woman face rememb 
save glass mine i seen
mor i may call men good friend 
and dear father featur abroad 
i skilless modesti 
the jewel dower i would wish
ani companion world 
nor imagin form shape 
besid like but i prattle
someth wildli father precepts
i therein forget 

ferdinand 
i condit 
a princ miranda i think king 
i would would endure
thi wooden slaveri suffer
th flesh fli blow mouth hear soul speak 
the instant i saw did
mi heart fli servic resid 
to make slave sake
am i patient log man 

miranda 
do love 

ferdinand

and crown i profess kind event

what best bode mischief i

to weep i glad

of two rare affect heaven rain grace
on breed em

and seek hide

and prompt plain holi innoc

whether

scene iii anoth part island 

 enter alonso sebastian antonio gonzalo adrian francisco c

no longer flatter drown d
whom thu stray find sea mocks

that hath instrument lower world
and never surfeit sea

 _see alonso sebastian c draw sword _ 

you fool i fellows
ar minist fate elements
of sword temper may well
wound loud wind bemock stabs
kil still close water diminish
on dowl plume my fellow ministers
ar like invulner if could hurt 
your sword massi strength 
and uplift but rememb 
for busi three
from milan supplant good prospero 
expo unto sea hath requit 
him innoc child foul deed
th power delay forget have
incen sea shore yea creatur 
against peac thee thi son alonso 
they bereft pronounc me
l ring perdit wors death
can shall step step attend
y way whose wrath guard 
which desol isl els falls
upon head noth heart sorrow 
and clear life ensu 

 _he vanish thunder soft music enter shape 
 danc mock mow carri tabl _ 

prospero 
 _asid _ brave figur harpi hast thou
perform ariel grace devour 
of instruct hast thou noth bated
in thou hadst say good life
and observ strang meaner ministers
their sever kind done my high charm work 
and mine enemi knit up
in distract power 
and fit i leav i visit
young ferdinand suppos drown 
and mine lov darl

in strang stare

act iv

scen i befor prospero cell 

 enter prospero ferdinand miranda 

prospero 
if i auster punish 
your compens make amend i
hav given third mine life 
or i live again
i tender thi hand thi vexations
wer trial thi love thou
hast strang stood test afor heaven 
i ratifi rich gift o ferdinand 
do smile i boast 
for thou shalt find outstrip prais 
and make halt behind 

ferdinand 
i believ it
against oracl 

prospero 
then gift thine acquisition
worthili purcha take daughter but
if thou dost break virgin knot before
al sanctimoni ceremoni may
with full holi rite minist 
no sweet aspers shall heaven let fall
to make contract grow barren hate 
sour ey disdain discord shall bestrew
th union bed weed loathly
that shall hate therefor take heed 
a hymen lamp shall light 

ferdinand

for quiet day fair issu long life 
with love ti murkiest den 
the opportun place strong st suggestion
our worser geniu shall never melt
min honour lust take away
th edg day celebr 
when i shall think phoebu steed founder 
or night kept chain

fairli spoke 
sit talk thine 
what ariel industri servant ariel

and expect

 _soft music _ 

 a masqu enter iri 

iri 
cere bounteou ladi thi rich leas
of wheat rye barley vetch oat pea 
thi turfi mountain live nibbl sheep 
and flat mead thatch stover keep 
thi bank pion twill brim 
which spongi april thi hest betrim 
to make cold nymph chast crown thi broom grove 
whose shadow dismiss bachelor love 
be lass lorn thi pole clipt vineyard 
and thi sea marg steril rocki hard 
where thou thyself dost air queen th sky 
whose wat ry arch messeng i 
bid thee leav sovereign grace 
here grass plot place 
to come sport peacock fli amain 
approach rich cere entertain 

 enter cere 

cere 
hail mani colour messeng ne er
dost disobey wife jupit 
who thi saffron wing upon flowers
diffusest honey drop refresh shower 
and end thi blue bow dost crown
mi boski acr unshrubb 
rich scarf proud earth hath thi queen
summon hither short grass green 

iri 
a contract true love celebr 
and donat freeli estate
on blest lover 

cere 
tell heavenli bow 
if venu son thou dost know 
do attend queen sinc plot
th mean duski di daughter got 
her blind boy scandal company
i forsworn 

iri 
of society
b afraid i met deity
cut cloud toward papho son
dov drawn here thought done
som wanton charm upon man maid 
whose vow bed right shall paid
til hymen torch light vain 
mar hot minion return 
her waspish head son broke arrow 
swear shoot play sparrow 
and boy right 

cere 
highest queen state 
great juno come i know gait 

 enter juno

to bless twain may prosper 
and honour issu

there someth els hush mute

iri

a contract true love be late 

 enter certain nymph 

you sun burn sicklemen august weari

and fresh nymph encount everi one
in countri foot

i almost come _to spirit _ well done avoid no
mor

thi strang father passion
that work strongli

saw i touch anger distemp 

prospero 
you look son mov sort 
a dismay cheer sir 
our revel end these actor 
a i foretold spirit and
ar melt air thin air 
and like baseless fabric vision 
the cloud capp tower gorgeou palac 
the solemn templ great globe 
yea inherit shall dissolv 
and like insubstanti pageant fade 
leav rack behind we stuff
a dream made littl life
i round sleep sir i vex 
bear weak old brain troubl 
be disturb infirm 
if plea retir cell
and repos turn two i walk 
to still beat mind

 _exeunt _

spirit 
we must prepar meet caliban

i thought told thee i fear d
lest i might anger thee 

prospero 
say didst thou leav varlet 

ariel 
i told sir red hot drink 
so full valour smote air
for breath face beat ground
for kiss feet yet alway bending
toward project then i beat tabor 
at like unback colt prick ear 
advanc eyelid lift noses
a smelt music i charm ear 
that calf like low follow through
tooth brier sharp furz prick goss thorn 
which enter frail shin last i left them
i th filthi mantl pool beyond cell 
there danc th chin foul lake
o erstunk feet 

prospero 
thi well done bird 
thi shape invis retain thou still 
the trumperi hous go bring hither
for stale catch thiev 

ariel 
i go i go

prospero 
a devil born devil whose nature
nurtur never stick pain 
human taken lost quit lost 
and age bodi uglier grow 
so mind canker i plagu 
even roar

act v

scene i befor cell prospero 

 enter prospero magic robe ariel 

prospero 
now project gather head 
mi charm crack spirit obey time
go upright carriag how day 

ariel 
on sixth hour time lord 
you said work ceas 

prospero 
i say 
when first i rai tempest say spirit 
how fare king follow 

ariel 
confin together
in fashion gave charg 
just left prison sir 
in line grove weather fend cell 
they can not budg till releas the king 
hi brother abid three distract 
and remaind mourn 
brim sorrow dismay chiefly
him term sir good old lord gonzalo 
hi tear run beard like winter drops
from eav reed charm strongli work em 
that beheld affections
would becom tender 

prospero 
dost thou think spirit 

ariel 
mine would sir i human 

prospero 
and mine shall 
hast thou art air touch feeling
of afflict shall 
one kind relish sharply
pass kindlier mov thou art 
though high wrong i struck th quick 
yet nobler reason gainst fury
do i take part rarer action is
in virtu vengeanc penit 
the sole drift purpos doth extend
not frown go releas ariel 
mi charm i break sens i restor 
and shall 

ariel 
i fetch sir 

 _exit _ 

prospero 
ye elv hill brook stand lake and
grov 
and ye sand printless foot
do chase eb neptun fli him
when come back demi puppet that
bi moonshin green sour ringlet make 
whereof ewe bite whose pastime
i make midnight mushroom rejoice
to hear solemn curfew whose aid 
weak master though ye i bedimm d
the noontid sun call forth mutin wind 
and twixt green sea azur vault
set roar war dread rattl thunder
hav i given fire rift jove stout oak
with bolt strong ba promontory
hav i made shake spur pluck up
th pine cedar grave command
hav wak sleeper op let em forth
bi potent art but rough magic
i abjur i requir d
some heavenli music even i 
to work mine end upon sens that
thi airi charm i break staff 
buri certain fathom earth 
and deeper ever plummet sound
i drown book 

 _solem music _ 

 re enter ariel alonso frantic gestur attend by
 gonzalo sebastian antonio like manner attend adrian and
 francisco enter circl prospero made and
 stand charm prospero observ speak 

a solemn air best comforter
to unsettl fanci cure thi brain 
now useless boil within thi skull there stand 
for spell stopp 
holi gonzalo honour man 
mine eye e en sociabl show thine 
fall fellowli drop the charm dissolv apac 
and morn steal upon night 
melt dark rise senses
begin chase ignor fume mantle
their clearer reason o good gonzalo 
mi true preserv loyal sir
to thou follow st i pay thi graces
hom word deed most cruelly
didst thou alonso use daughter 
thi brother further act 
thou art pinch sebastian flesh blood 
you brother mine entertain ambit 
expel remors natur sebastian 
whose inward pinch therefor strong 
would kill king i forgiv thee 
unnatur though thou art their understanding
begin swell approach tide
wil shortli fill reason shores
that lie foul muddi not one them
that yet look would know ariel 
fetch hat rapier cell 

 _exit ariel _ 

i discas present
a i sometim milan quickli spirit 
thou shalt ere long free 

 ariel enter sing help attir prospero 

ariel
_wher bee suck suck i 
in cowslip bell i lie 
there i couch owl cri 
on bat back i fly
aft summer merrili 
merrili merrili shall i live now
und blossom hang bough _

prospero 
whi dainti ariel i shall miss thee 
but yet thou shalt freedom 
to king ship invis thou art 
there shalt thou find marin asleep
und hatch master boatswain
b awak enforc place 
and present i prithe 

ariel 
i drink air return
or ere puls twice beat 

 _exit _ 

gonzalo 
all torment troubl wonder amazement
inhabit some heavenli power guid us
out fear countri 

prospero 
behold sir king 
the wrong duke milan prospero 
for assur live prince
do speak thee i embrac thi bodi 
and thee thi compani i bid
a hearti welcom 

alonso 
whe er thou st 
or enchant trifl abus 
a late i i know thi pulse
beat flesh blood sinc i saw thee 
th afflict mind amend 
i fear mad held must crave 
an strang stori 
thi dukedom i resign entreat
th pardon wrong but prospero
b live 

prospero 
first nobl friend 
let embrac thine age whose honour cannot
b measur confin 

gonzalo 
whether be
or i swear 

prospero 
you yet taste
som subtleti isl let you
believ thing certain welcom friend 
 _asid sebastian antonio _ but brace lord i
so mind 
i could pluck high frown upon 
and justifi traitor time
i tell tale 

sebastian 
 _asid _ the devil speak 

prospero 
no 
for wick sir call brother
would even infect mouth i forgive
thi rankest fault require
mi dukedom thee perforc i know
thou must restor 

alonso 
if thou beest prospero 
give us particular thi preserv 
how thou hast met us three hour since
wer wrack upon shore i lost 
how sharp point remembr 
mi dear son ferdinand 

prospero 
i woe sir 

alonso 
irrepar loss patience
say past cure 

prospero 
i rather think
you sought help whose soft grace 
for like loss i sovereign aid 
and rest content 

alonso 
you like loss 

prospero 
a great late supportable
to make dear loss i mean much weaker
than may call comfort i
hav lost daughter 

alonso 
a daughter 
o heaven live napl 
the king queen that i wish
myself mud oozi bed
wher son lie when lose daughter 

prospero 
in last tempest i perceiv lords
at encount much admire
that devour reason scarc think
their eye offic truth words
ar natur breath howso er have
been justl sens know certain
that i prospero duke
which thrust forth milan strangely
upon shore wrack landed
to lord no yet 
for ti chronicl day day 
not relat breakfast nor
befit first meet welcom sir 
thi cell court i attend 
and subject none abroad pray look 
mi dukedom sinc given 
i requit good thing 
at least bring forth wonder content ye
a much dukedom 

here prospero discov ferdinand miranda play chess 

miranda 
sweet lord play fals 

ferdinand 
no dearest love 
i would world 

miranda 
ye score kingdom wrangl 
and i would call fair play 

alonso 
if prove
a vision island one dear son
shal i twice lose 

sebastian 
a high miracl 

ferdinand 
though sea threaten merci 
i cur without caus 

 _kneel alonso _ 

alonso 
now blessings
of glad father compass thee 
aris say thou cam st 

miranda 
o wonder 
how mani goodli creatur 
how beauteou mankind o brave new world
that peopl 

prospero 
 ti new thee 

alonso 
what maid thou wast play 
your eld st acquaint can not three hour 
i goddess hath sever us 
and brought us thu togeth 

ferdinand 
sir mortal 
but immort provid mine 
i chose i could ask father
for advic thought i one she
i daughter famou duke milan 
of often i heard renown 
but never saw i have
receiv second life second father
thi ladi make 

alonso 
i 
but o oddli sound i
must ask child forgiv 

prospero 
there sir stop 
let us burden remembr with
a heavi gone 

gonzalo 
i inli wept 
or spoke ere look god 
and coupl drop bless crown 
for chalk forth way
which brought us hither 

alonso 
i say amen gonzalo 

gonzalo 
wa milan thrust milan issue
should becom king napl o rejoice
beyond common joy set down
with gold last pillar one voyage
did claribel husband find tuni 
and ferdinand brother found wife
wher lost prospero dukedom
in poor isl us 
when man 

alonso 
 _to ferdinand miranda _ give hand 
let grief sorrow still embrac heart
that doth wish joy 

gonzalo 
be amen 

 re enter ariel master boatswain amazedli follow 

o look sir look sir here us 
i prophesi gallow land 
thi fellow could drown now blasphemi 
that swear st grace erboard oath shore 
hast thou mouth land what news 

boatswain 
the best news safe found
our king compani the next ship 
which three glass sinc gave split 
i tight yare brave rigg when
w first put sea 

ariel 
 _asid prospero _ sir service
hav i done sinc i went 

prospero 
 _asid ariel _ my tricksi spirit 

alonso 
these natur event strengthen
from strang stranger say came hither 

boatswain 
if i think sir i well awak 
i strive tell we dead sleep 
and know clapp hatch 
where even strang sever noises
of roar shriek howl jingl chain 
and mo divers sound horribl 
we awak straightway liberti 
where trim freshli beheld
our royal good gallant ship master
cap ring eye on trice pleas 
even dream divid 
and brought mope hither 

ariel 
 _asid prospero _ wa well done 

prospero 
 _asid ariel _ brave dilig thou shalt free 

alonso 
thi strang maze e er men trod 
and busi nature
wa ever conduct oracle
must rectifi knowledg 

prospero 
sir lieg 
do infest mind beat on
th strang busi at pick leisur 
which shall shortli singl i resolv 
which shall seem probabl every
thes happen accid till cheerful
and think thing well _asid ariel _ come hither spirit 
set caliban companion free 
unti spell 

 _exit ariel _ 

 how fare graciou sir 
there yet miss company
som odd lad rememb 

 re enter ariel drive caliban stephano trinculo their
 stolen apparel 

stephano 
everi man shift rest let man take care 
for fortun coragio bulli monster coragio 

trinculo 
if true spi i wear head goodli sight 

caliban 
o setebo brave spirit inde 
how fine master i afraid
h chastis 

sebastian 
ha ha 
what thing lord antonio 
will money buy 

antonio 
veri like one them
i plain fish doubt market 

prospero 
mark badg men lord 
then say true thi mi shapen knave 
hi mother witch one strong
that could control moon make flow ebb 
and deal command without power 
these three robb demi devil 
for bastard one plot them
to take life two fellow you
must know thing dark i
acknowledg mine 

caliban 
i shall pinch death 

alonso 
i stephano drunken butler 

sebastian 
he drunk wine 

alonso 
and trinculo reel ripe they
find grand liquor hath gild em 
how cam st thou pickl 

trinculo 
i pickl sinc i saw last i fear will
nev bone i shall fear fli blow 

sebastian 
whi stephano 

stephano 
o touch i stephano cramp 

prospero 
you king isl sirrah 

stephano 
i sore one 

alonso 
thi strang thing e er i look 

 _point caliban _ 

prospero 
he disproport manners
a shape go sirrah cell 
take companion as look
to pardon trim handsom 

caliban 
ay i i wise hereaft 
and seek grace what thrice doubl ass
wa i take drunkard god 
and worship dull fool 

prospero 
go away 

alonso 
henc bestow luggag found 

sebastian 
or stole rather 

 _exeunt caliban stephano trinculo _ 

prospero 
sir i invit high train
to poor cell shall take rest
for one night part i waste
with discours i doubt shall make it
go quick away stori life
and particular accid gone by
sinc i came isl morn
i bring ship napl 
where i hope see nuptial
of dear belov solemn 
and thenc retir milan where
everi third thought shall grave 

alonso 
i long
to hear stori life must
tak ear strang 

prospero 
i deliv 
and promis calm sea auspici gale 
and sail expediti shall catch
your royal fleet far _asid ariel _ my ariel 
chick 
that thi charg elements
b free fare thou well pleas draw near 

 _exeunt _ 

epilogue

prospero 
now charm erthrown 
and strength i mine 
which faint now ti true 
i must confin 
or sent napl let 
sinc i dukedom got 
and pardon deceiv dwell
in bare island spell 
but releas bands
with help good hand 
gentl breath sails
must fill els project fail 
which pleas now i want
spirit enforc art enchant 
and end despair 
unless i reliev prayer 
which pierc assaults
merci free fault 
 as crime would pardon 
 let indulg set free 

 _exit _ 





the life of timon of athens

dramati personae

 timon athens

 lucius
 lucullus
 sempronius
 flatter lords

 servilius
 timon servants

 attendants

scen athen neighbour woods

act i scene i athen timon s house

ent poet painter jewel merchant mercer sever doors

 poet good day sir 
 painter i glad well 
 poet i seen long goe world 
 painter it wear sir grow 
 poet ay well known 
 but particular rariti what strang 
 which manifold record match see 
 magic bounti spirit thi power
 hath conjur attend i know merchant 
 painter i know th jewel 
 merchant o ti worthi lord 
 jewel nay fix 
 merchant a incompar man breath 
 to untir continu good 
 he pass 
 jewel i jewel 
 merchant o pray let see for lord timon sir 
 jewel if touch estim but 
 poet when recompens prai vile 
 it stain glori happi verse
 which aptli sing good 
 merchant look jewel ti good form 
 jewel and rich here water look ye 
 painter you rapt sir work dedication
 to great lord 
 poet a thing slipp idli 
 our poesi gum oozes
 from whenc ti nourish the fire th flint
 show till struck gentl flame
 provok like current flies
 each bound chafe what 
 painter a pictur sir when come book forth 
 poet upon heel present sir 
 let see piec 
 painter ti good piec 
 poet so ti come well excel 
 painter indiffer 
 poet admir how grace
 speak stand what mental power
 thi eye shoot forth how big imagination
 move lip to th dumb gesture
 one might interpret 
 painter it pretti mock life 
 here touch good 
 poet i say it
 it tutor natur artifici strife
 live touch liveli life 

 enter certain senat pass over

 painter how lord follow 
 poet the senat athen happi man 
 painter look moe 
 poet you see confluenc great flood visitor 
 i rough work shap man
 whom beneath world doth embrac hug
 with amplest entertain my free drift
 halt particularli move itself
 in wide sea tax no level malice
 infect one comma cours i hold 
 but fli eagl flight bold forth 
 leav tract behind 
 painter how shall i understand 
 poet i unbolt 
 you see condit mind 
 as well glib slipp ry creatur as
 of grave auster qualiti tender down
 their servic lord timon hi larg fortun 
 upon good graciou natur hang 
 subdu properti love tendance
 all sort heart yea glass fac flatterer
 to apemantu thing love better
 than abhor even drop down
 the knee return peace
 most rich timon nod 
 painter i saw speak togeth 
 poet sir i upon high pleasant hill
 feign fortun thron the base th mount
 is rank desert kind natures
 that labour bosom sphere
 to propag state amongst all
 whose eye sovereign ladi fix d
 one i person lord timon frame 
 whom fortun ivori hand waft 
 whose present grace present slave servants
 translat rival 
 painter ti conceiv scope 
 thi throne fortun hill methink 
 with one man beckon rest 
 bow head steepi mount
 to climb happi would well express d
 in condit 
 poet nay sir hear 
 all fellow late 
 some better valu moment
 follow stride lobbi fill tendanc 
 rain sacrifici whisper ear 
 make sacr even stirrup him
 drink free air 
 painter ay marri 
 poet when fortun shift chang mood
 spurn late belov depend 
 which labour mountain top
 even knee hand let slip 
 not one accompani declin foot 
 painter ti common 
 a thousand moral paint i show
 that shall demonstr quick blow fortun s
 more pregnantli word yet well
 to show lord timon mean eye seen
 the foot head 

 trumpet sound enter timon address himself
 courteous everi suitor messeng from
 ventidiu talk luciliu other
 servant following

 timon imprison say 
 messeng ay good lord five talent debt 
 hi mean short creditor strait 
 your honour letter desires
 to shut fail 
 period comfort 
 timon nobl ventidiu well 
 i feather shake of
 my friend must need i know him
 a gentleman well deserv help 
 which shall i pay debt free 
 messeng your lordship ever bind 
 timon commend i send ransom 
 and enfranchi bid come 
 ti enough help feebl 
 but support fare well 
 messeng all happi honour exit

 enter old athenian

 old athenian lord timon hear speak 
 timon freeli good father 
 old athenian thou hast servant nam luciliu 
 timon i 
 old athenian most nobl timon call man thee 
 timon attend luciliu 
 luciliu here lordship servic 
 old athenian thi fellow lord timon thi creatur 
 by night frequent hous i man
 that first inclin thrift 
 and estat deserv heir rai d
 than one hold trencher 
 timon well 
 old athenian one daughter i kin els 
 on i may confer i got 
 the maid fair th youngest bride 
 and i bred dearest cost
 in qualiti best thi man thine
 attempt love i prithe nobl lord 
 join forbid resort 
 myself spoke vain 
 timon the man honest 
 old athenian therefor timon 
 hi honesti reward 
 it must bear daughter 
 timon doe love 
 old athenian she young apt 
 our preced passion instruct us
 what leviti youth 
 timon love maid 
 luciliu ay good lord accept 
 old athenian if marriag consent miss 
 i call god wit i choose
 mine heir forth beggar world 
 and dispossess 
 timon how shall endow 
 if mate equal husband 
 old athenian three talent present futur 
 timon thi gentleman mine hath serv long 
 to build fortun i strain littl 
 for ti bond men give thi daughter 
 what bestow i counterpois 
 and make weigh 
 old athenian most nobl lord 
 pawn honour 
 timon my hand thee mine honour promis 
 luciliu humbl i thank lordship never may
 that state fortun fall keeping
 which owe 
 exeunt luciliu old athenian
 poet present poem vouchsaf labour long live your
 lordship 
 timon i thank shall hear anon 
 go away what friend 
 painter a piec paint i beseech
 your lordship accept 
 timon paint welcom 
 the paint almost natur man 
 for sinc dishonour traffic man natur 
 he outsid pencil figur are
 even give i like work 
 and shall find i like wait attendance
 till hear 
 painter the god preserv ye 
 timon well fare gentleman give hand 
 we must need dine togeth sir jewel
 hath suffer prais 
 jewel what lord disprais 
 timon a mere satieti commend 
 if i pay ti extol 
 it would unclew quit 
 jewel my lord ti rated
 as sell would give well know
 thing like valu differ owner 
 are prize master believ dear lord 
 you mend jewel wear 
 timon well mock 

 enter apemantus

 merchant no good lord speak common tongu 
 which men speak 
 timon look come chid 
 jewel we bear lordship 
 merchant he spare none 
 timon good morrow thee gentl apemantu 
 apemantu till i gentl stay thou thi good morrow 
 when thou art timon dog knave honest 
 timon whi dost thou call knave thou know st 
 apemantu are athenian 
 timon ye 
 apemantu then i repent 
 jewel you know apemantu 
 apemantu thou know st i i call thee thi name 
 timon thou art proud apemantu 
 apemantu of noth much i like timon 
 timon whither art go 
 apemantu to knock honest athenian brain 
 timon that deed thou die 
 apemantu right noth death th law 
 timon how lik st thou pictur apemantu 
 apemantu the best innoc 
 timon wrought well paint 
 apemantu he wrought better made painter yet s
 filthi piec work 
 painter y dog 
 apemantu thi mother gener i dog 
 timon wilt dine apemantu 
 apemantu no i eat lord 
 timon an thou shouldst thou dst anger ladi 
 apemantu o eat lord come great belli 
 timon that lascivi apprehens 
 apemantu so thou apprehend st take thi labour 
 timon how dost thou like jewel apemantu 
 apemantu not well plain deal cost man
 doit 
 timon what dost thou think ti worth 
 apemantu not worth think how poet 
 poet how philosoph 
 apemantu thou liest 
 poet art one 
 apemantu ye 
 poet then i lie 
 apemantu art poet 
 poet ye 
 apemantu then thou liest look thi last work thou hast
 feign worthi fellow 
 poet that feign 
 apemantu ye worthi thee pay thee thy
 labour he love flatter worthi th flatter 
 heaven i lord 
 timon what wouldst apemantu 
 apemantu e en apemantu hate lord heart 
 timon what thyself 
 apemantu ay 
 timon wherefor 
 apemantu that i angri wit lord art thou a
 merchant 
 merchant ay apemantu 
 apemantu traffic confound thee god 
 merchant if traffic god 
 apemantu traffic thi god thi god confound thee 

 trumpet sound enter messenger

 timon what trumpet 
 messeng ti alcibiad twenti hors 
 all companionship 
 timon pray entertain give guid us 
 exeunt attendants
 you must need dine go hence
 till i thank when dinner done
 show piec i joy sight 

 enter alcibiad rest

 most welcom sir they salut 
 apemantu so 
 ach contract starv suppl joint 
 that small love amongst sweet knave 
 and courtesi the strain man bred out
 into baboon monkey 
 alcibiad sir sav long i feed
 most hungerli sight 
 timon right welcom sir 
 ere depart share bounteou time
 in differ pleasur pray let us 
 exeunt apemantus

 enter two lords

 first lord what time day apemantu 
 apemantu time honest 
 first lord that time serv still 
 apemantu the accurs thou still omit st 
 second lord thou art go lord timon feast 
 apemantu ay see meat fill knave wine heat fool 
 second lord fare thee well fare thee well 
 apemantu thou art fool bid farewel twice 
 second lord whi apemantu 
 apemantu shouldst kept one thyself i mean give
 thee none 
 first lord hang thyself 
 apemantu no i noth thi bid make thi requests
 thi friend 
 second lord away unpeac dog i spurn thee henc 
 apemantu i fli like dog heel th ass exit
 first lord he opposit human come shall in
 and tast lord timon bounti he outgoes
 the heart kind 
 second lord he pour plutu god gold 
 is steward meed repays
 sevenfold gift him
 but breed giver return exceeding
 all use quittanc 
 first lord the noblest mind carries
 that ever govern man 
 second lord long may live fortun shall 
 first lord i keep compani exeunt

scen ii a room state timon s house

hautboy play loud music a great banquet serv 
flaviu other attend enter lord timon state 
the athenian lord ventidiu timon redeem prison 
then come drop apemantu discontentedli like himself

 ventidiu most honour timon 
 it hath plea god rememb father age 
 and call long peac 
 he gone happi left rich 
 then grate virtu i bound
 to free heart i return talent 
 doubl thank servic whose help
 i deriv liberti 
 timon o mean 
 honest ventidiu you mistak love 
 i gave freeli ever none
 can truli say give receiv 
 if better play game must dare
 to imit fault rich fair 
 ventidiu a nobl spirit 
 timon nay lord ceremoni devi first
 to set gloss faint deed hollow welcom 
 recant good sorri ere ti shown 
 but true friendship need none 
 pray sit welcom ye fortunes
 than fortun they sit 
 first lord my lord alway confess 
 apemantu ho ho confess hang 
 timon o apemantu welcom 
 apemantu no 
 you shall make welcom 
 i come thee thrust door 
 timon fie th art churl ye got humour there
 doe becom man ti much blame 
 they say lord ira furor brevi est yond man ever
 angri go let tabl neither
 affect compani fit inde 
 apemantu let stay thine apperil timon 
 i come observ i give thee warn 
 timon i take heed thee th art athenian therefore
 welcom i would power prithe let meat make
 thee silent 
 apemantu i scorn thi meat would choke i ne er
 flatter thee o god number men eat timon he
 see em it griev see mani dip meat one
 man blood mad cheer 
 i wonder men dare trust men 
 methink invit without knive 
 good meat safer live 
 there much exampl fellow sit next 
 part bread pledg breath divided
 draught readiest man kill t prove if
 i huge man i fear drink meal 
 lest spi windpip danger note 
 great men drink har throat 
 timon my lord heart let health go round 
 second lord let flow way good lord 
 apemantu flow way a brave fellow he keep tide well 
 those health make thee thi state look ill timon 
 here weak sinner honest water which
 ne er left man th mire 
 thi food equal odd 
 feast proud give thank god 

 apemantu grace

 immort god i crave pelf 
 i pray man 
 grant i may never prove fond
 to trust man oath bond 
 or harlot weep 
 or dog seem sleep 
 or keeper freedom 
 or friend i need em 
 amen so fall 
 rich men sin i eat root eat drink 

 much good dich thi good heart apemantu 
 timon captain alcibiad heart field 
 alcibiad my heart ever servic lord 
 timon you rather breakfast enemi dinner of
 friend 
 alcibiad so bleed new lord meat
 like em i could wish best friend feast 
 apemantu would flatter thine enemi that
 thou mightst kill em bid em 
 first lord might happi lord you
 would use heart wherebi might express part of
 zeal think ever perfect 
 timon o doubt good friend god have
 provid i shall much help how been
 friend els whi charit titl from
 thousand chiefli belong heart i told
 modesti speak own
 behalf thu far i confirm o god think i what
 need friend ne er need em 
 they needless creatur live ne er
 use em would resembl sweet instrument hung
 case keep sound whi i have
 often wish poorer i might come nearer we
 born benefit better proper call
 rich friend o precious
 comfort ti mani like brother command one
 anoth fortun o joy e en made away ere born 
 mine eye can not hold water methink to forget their
 fault i drink 
 apemantu thou weep st make drink timon 
 second lord joy like concept eye 
 and instant like babe sprung 
 apemantu ho ho i laugh think babe bastard 
 third lord i promis lord mov much 
 apemantu much sound tucket 
 timon what mean trump 

 enter servant

 how 
 servant pleas lord certain ladi most
 desir admitt

 servant there come forerunn lord bears
 offic signifi pleasur

 enter cupid
 cupid hail thee worthi timon all
 that bounti tast the five best senses
 acknowledg thee patron come freely
 to gratul thi plenteou bosom th ear 
 tast touch smell plea thi tabl rise 
 they come feast thine eye 
 timon they welcom let em kind admitt 
 music make welcom exit cupid
 first lord you see lord ampl belov 

 music re enter cupid witb masqu ladi amazon 
 lute hand danc playing

 apemantu hoy day sweep vaniti come way 
 they danc they mad women 
 like mad glori life 
 as pomp show littl oil root 
 we make fool disport 
 and spend flatteri drink men
 upon whose age void again
 with poison spite envi 
 who live deprav deprav 
 who die bear one spurn graves
 of friend gift 
 i fear danc now
 would one day stamp upon t done 
 men shut door set sun 

 the lord rise tabl much ador of
 timon show love singl an
 amazon danc men witb women lofty
 strain two hautboy cease

 timon you done pleasur much grace fair ladi 
 set fair fashion entertain 
 which half beauti kind 
 you ad worth unto lustr 
 and entertain mine devic 
 i thank 
 first ladi my lord take us even best 
 apemantu faith worst filthi would hold
 take i doubt 
 timon ladi idl banquet attend 
 pleas dispos 
 all ladi most thank lord 
 exeunt cupid ladies
 timon flaviu 
 flaviu my lord 
 timon the littl casket bring hither 
 flaviu ye lord asid more jewel yet 
 there cross humour 
 els i tell well faith i 
 when spent cross could 
 ti piti bounti eye behind 
 that man might ne er wretch mind exit
 first lord where men 
 servant here lord readi 
 second lord our hors 

 re enter flaviu casket

 timon o friend

 kind lord

 servant my lord certain nobl senat newly
 alight come visit

 free love hath present four milk white hors trapp d

 enter third servant

 how what news 
 third servant pleas lord honour gentleman lord
 lucullu entreat compani morrow hunt and
 sent honour two brace greyhound 
 timon i hunt let receiv 
 not without fair reward exit servant
 flaviu asid what come 
 he command us provid give great gift 
 and empti coffer 
 nor know purs yield 
 to show beggar heart 
 be power make wish good 
 hi promis fli beyond state
 that speak debt owes
 for ev ry word he kind now
 pay interest land put book 
 well would i gentli put office
 befor i forc 
 happier friend feed
 than e en enemi exceed 
 i bleed inwardli lord exit
 timon you much wrong 
 you bate much merit 
 here lord trifl love 
 second lord with common thank i receiv 
 third lord o soul bounti 
 timon and i rememb lord gave good word other
 day bay courser i rode ti lik 
 third lord o i beseech pardon lord 
 timon you may take word lord i know man
 can justli prais affect 
 i weigh friend affect mine 
 i tell true i call 
 all lord o none welcom 
 timon i take sever visitations
 so kind heart ti enough give 
 methink i could deal kingdom friends
 and ne er weari alcibiad 
 thou art soldier therefor seldom rich 
 it come chariti thee thi living
 is mongst dead land thou hast
 lie pitch field 
 alcibiad ay defil land lord 
 first lord we virtuous bound 
 timon and i 
 second lord so infinit endear 
 timon all light light 
 first lord the best happi honour fortun keep with
 lord timon 
 timon readi friend 
 exeunt apemantu timon
 apemantu what coil 
 serv beck jut bum 
 i doubt whether leg worth sums
 that given em friendship full dreg 
 methink fals heart never sound leg 
 thu honest fool lay wealth curtsi 
 timon now apemantu thou wert sullen
 i would good thee 
 apemantu no i noth i brib there
 would none left rail upon thee thou wouldst sin
 faster thou giv st long timon i fear thou wilt give
 away thyself paper shortli what need feast pomp 
 vain glori 
 timon nay begin rail societi i sworn to
 give regard farewel come better music 
 exit
 apemantu so thou wilt hear thou shalt i ll
 lock thi heaven thee 
 o men ear be
 to counsel deaf flatteri exit

act ii scene i a senat s house

ent a senat paper hand

 senat and late five thousand to varro isidore
 he owe nine thousand besid former sum 
 which make five twenti still motion
 of rage wast it can not hold 
 if i want gold steal beggar dog
 and give timon dog coin gold 
 if i would sell hors buy twenti moe
 better give hors timon 
 ask noth give foal straight 
 and abl hors no porter gate 
 but rather one smile still invites
 all pass it can not hold reason
 can sound state safeti caphi ho 
 caphi i say 

 enter caphis

 caphi here sir pleasur 
 senat get cloak hast lord timon 
 importun money cea d
 with slight denial silenc when
 commend master cap
 play right hand thu tell him
 my use cri i must serv turn
 out mine day time past 
 and relianc fract dates
 have smit credit i love honour 
 but must break back heal finger 
 immedi need relief
 must toss turn word 
 but find suppli immedi get gone 
 put importun aspect 
 a visag demand i fear 
 when everi feather stick wing 
 lord timon left nake gull 
 which flash phoenix get gone 
 caphi i go sir 
 senat take bond along 
 and date compt 
 caphi i sir 
 senat go exeunt

scen ii befor timon s house

ent flaviu timon s steward mani bill hand

 flaviu no care stop so senseless expense
 that neither know maintain it
 nor ceas flow riot take account

 of continu never mind
 wa unwis kind 
 what shall done he hear till feel 
 i must round now come hunt 
 fie fie fie fie

 my alcibiad with what

 thief

 all servant ay fool

 master approach sadli go away merri enter my
 mistress hous merrili go away sadli the reason 
 varro s servant i could render one

 fool a fool good cloth someth like thee ti a
 spirit sometim appear like lord sometim like lawyer

 thirteen spirit walk

 fool i alway follow lover elder brother woman 
 sometim philosoph 
 exeunt apemantu fool
 flaviu pray walk near i speak anon 
 exeunt servants
 timon you make marvel wherefor ere time
 had fulli laid state 
 that i might rate expense
 as i leav mean 
 flaviu you would hear me
 at mani leisur i propo 
 timon go 
 perchanc singl vantag took
 when indisposit put back 
 and unapt made minister
 thu excus 
 flaviu o good lord 
 at mani time i brought account 
 laid would throw off
 and say found mine honesti 
 when trifl present bid me
 return much i shook head wept 
 yea gainst th author manner pray you
 to hold hand close i endure
 not seldom slight check i have
 prompt ebb estate
 and great flow debt my lov lord 
 though hear late yet time 
 the greatest lack half
 to pay present debt 
 timon let land sold 
 flaviu ti engag forfeit gone 
 and remain hardli stop mouth
 of present due the futur come apac 
 what shall defend interim and length
 how goe reck ning 
 timon to lacedaemon land extend

 were give breath 
 how quickli gone 
 timon you tell true

 call th exactest auditors
 and set proof so god bless 
 when offic oppress d
 with riotou feeder vault wept
 with drunken spilth wine everi room
 hath blaz light bray minstrelsi 
 i retir wast cock
 and set mine eye flow 
 timon prithe

 how mani prodig bit slave peasants
 thi night englut who lord timon 
 what heart head sword forc mean lord timon

 ah mean gone buy prais

 these fli couch

 to think i shall lack friend secur thi heart 
 if i would broach vessel love

 men men fortun could i frankli use

 within flaminiu serviliu

 may catch wrench would well ti piti

 with certain half cap cold move nod 
 they froze silenc

 prithe man look cheerli these old fellows
 have ingratitud hereditari

 ti lack kindli warmth kind 
 and natur grow toward earth 
 is fashion journey dull heavi 
 go ventidiu prithe sad 
 thou art true honest ingeni i speak

 buri father whose death stepp d

 honour complet freeheart gentleman athen thi very

 behalf i come entreat honour suppli having

 servant pleas lordship wine

 flaminiu your lordship speak pleasur 
 lucullu i observ thee alway towardli prompt spirit

 canst use time well time use thee well good part in
 thee to servant get gone sirrah exit servant draw
 nearer honest flaminiu thi lord bounti gentleman but
 thou art wise thou know st well enough although thou com st
 time lend money especi upon bare
 friendship without secur here three solidar thee 
 good boy wink say thou saw st fare thee well 
 flaminiu is possibl world much differ 
 and aliv liv fli damn base 
 to worship thee throw money back 
 lucullu ha now i see thou art fool fit thi master

 flaminiu may add number may scald thee

 thou diseas friend 
 ha friendship faint milki heart
 it turn less two night o god 
 i feel master passion thi slave
 unto honour lord meat 
 whi thrive turn nutriment
 when turn poison

 and sick death let part nature
 which lord paid power
 to expel sick prolong hour exit

 honour gentleman

 done past estat shrink

 one men lord lucullu borrow many
 talent nay urg extrem show necessity
 belong yet deni

 occas mani talent

 talent

 true said timon shrunk inde

 piece

 that dip dish for know

 and kept credit purs

 ha paid men wage he ne er drinks

 and yet o see monstrous man
 when look ungrat shape

 what charit men afford beggar 
 third stranger religion groan 
 first stranger for mine part

 nor came bounti me
 to mark friend yet i protest

 and honour carriag

scen iii semproniu house

ent semproniu servant timon s

 semproniu must need troubl hum bove other 
 he might tri lord luciu lucullu 
 and ventidiu wealthi 
 whom redeem prison all these
 owe estat unto 
 servant my lord 
 they touch found base metal for
 they deni 
 semproniu how have deni 
 ha ventidiu lucullu deni 
 and send three humh 
 it show littl love judgment 
 must i last refug hi friend like physician 
 thrice give must i take th cure upon 
 ha much disgrac i angri 
 that might known place i see sens 
 but occas might woo first 
 for conscienc i first man
 that e er receiv gift 
 and think backwardli now
 that i requit last no 
 so may prove argument laughter
 to th rest i mongst lord thought fool 
 i rather worth thrice sum
 had sent first mind sake 
 i courag good but return 
 and faint repli answer join 
 who bate mine honour shall know coin exit
 servant excel your lordship goodli villain the devil
 knew made man polit cross himself
 i can not think end villaini man
 set clear how fairli lord strive appear foul 
 take virtuou copi wick like hot
 ardent zeal would set whole realm fire 
 of natur polit love 
 thi lord best hope fled 
 save god now friend dead 
 door ne er acquaint wards
 mani bounteou year must employ d
 now guard sure master 
 and liber cours allow 
 who can not keep wealth must keep hous exit

scen v the senat house

ent three senat one door alcibiad meet with
attendants

 first senat my lord voic fault bloodi 
 ti necessari die 
 noth embolden sin much merci 
 second senat most true law shall bruis 
 alcibiad honour health compass senat 
 first senat now captain 
 alcibiad i humbl suitor virtu 
 for piti virtu law 
 and none tyrant use cruelli 
 it pleas time fortun lie heavy
 upon friend mine hot blood
 hath stepp law past depth
 to without heed plung 
 he man set fate asid 
 of come virtu 
 nor soil fact cowardic 
 an honour buy fault 
 but nobl furi fair spirit 
 see reput touch death 
 he oppos foe 
 and sober unnot passion
 he behov anger ere twa spent 
 as prov argument 
 first senat you undergo strict paradox 
 strive make ugli deed look fair 
 your word took pain labour d
 to bring manslaught form set
 quarrel upon head valour inde 
 is valour misbegot came world
 when sect faction newli born 
 he truli valiant wise suffer
 the worst man breath 
 and make wrong outsid 
 to wear like raiment carelessli 
 and ne er prefer injuri heart 
 to bring danger 
 if wrong evil enforc us kill 
 what folli ti hazard life ill 
 alcibiad my lord 
 first senat you can not make gross sin look clear 
 to reveng valour bear 
 alcibiad my lord favour pardon me
 if i speak like captain 
 whi fond men expos battl 
 and endur threat sleep upon 
 and let foe quietli cut throat 
 without repugn if be
 such valour bear make we
 abroad whi women valiant 
 that stay home bear carri 
 and ass captain lion fellow
 loaden iron wiser judg 
 if wisdom suffer o lord 
 as great piti good 
 who can not condemn rash cold blood 
 to kill i grant sin extremest gust 
 but defenc merci ti 
 to anger impieti 
 but man angri 
 weigh crime 
 second senat you breath vain 
 alcibiad in vain hi servic done
 at lacedaemon byzantium
 were suffici briber life 
 first senat what 
 alcibiad whi i say lord done fair servic 
 and slain fight mani enemi 
 how full valour bear himself
 in last conflict made plenteou wound 
 second senat he made much plenti em 
 he sworn rioter sin often
 drown take valour prison 
 if foe enough
 to overcom in beastli fury
 he known commit outrages
 and cherish faction ti inferr us
 hi day foul drink danger 
 first senat he die 
 alcibiad hard fate he might die war 
 my lord part 
 though right arm might purchas time 
 and debt none yet move 
 take desert join em 
 and i know reverend age love
 secur i pawn victori all
 my honour upon good return 
 if crime owe law life 
 whi let war receiv valiant gore 
 for law strict war noth 
 first senat we law die urg more
 on height displeasur friend brother 
 he forfeit blood spill anoth 
 alcibiad must it must my lord 
 i beseech know 
 second senat how 
 alcibiad call remembr 
 third senat what 
 alcibiad i can not think age forgot 
 it could els i prove base
 to sue deni common grace 
 my wound ach 
 first senat do dare anger 
 ti word spaciou effect 
 we banish thee ever 
 alcibiad banish 
 banish dotag banish usury
 that make senat ugli 
 first senat if two day shine athen contain thee 
 attend weightier judgment and swell spirit 
 he shall execut present exeunt senators
 alcibiad now god keep old enough may live
 onli bone none may look 
 i wors mad i kept back foe 
 while told money let out
 their coin upon larg interest i myself
 rich larg hurt all 
 is balsam usur senate
 pour captain wound banish 
 it come ill i hate banish 
 it caus worthi spleen furi 
 that i may strike athen i cheer up
 my discont troop lay heart 
 ti honour land odd 
 soldier brook littl wrong god exit

 timon each man stool spur would lip
 mistress diet shall place alik make not
 citi feast let meat cool ere agre upon
 first place sit sit the god requir thank 

 you great benefactor sprinkl societi thank for
 gift make prai reserv still give 
 lest deiti despis lend man enough one
 need lend anoth god head borrow men 
 men would forsak god make meat belov the
 man give let assembl twenti without score of
 villain if sit twelv women tabl let dozen of
 the rest foe o god senators
 athen togeth common lag peopl amiss in
 god make suitabl destruct for present
 friend noth noth bless and
 noth welcom 

 uncov dog lap the dish uncov and
 seen full warm water 
 some speak what lordship mean 
 some other i know 
 timon may better feast never behold 
 you knot mouth friend smoke lukewarm water
 is perfect thi timon last 
 who stuck spangl flatteri 
 wash sprinkl faces
 throw water face 
 your reek villaini live loath long 
 most smile smooth detest parasit 
 courteou destroy affabl wolv meek bear 
 you fool fortun trencher friend time fli 
 cap knee slave vapour minut lack 
 of man beast infinit malady
 crust quit er what dost thou go 
 soft take thi physic first thou thou 
 stay i lend thee money borrow none throw the
 dish drive 
 what motion henceforth feast
 whereat villain welcom guest 
 burn hous sink athen henceforth hate be
 of timon man human exit

act iv scene i without wall athens

ent timon

 timon let look back upon thee o thou wall
 that girdl wolv dive earth
 and fenc athen matron turn incontin 
 obedi fail children slave fool 
 pluck grave wrinkl senat bench
 and minist stead to gener filths
 convert th instant green virgin 
 do parent eye bankrupt hold fast 
 rather render back knives
 and cut truster throat bound servant steal 
 larg hand robber grave master 
 and pill law maid thi master bed 
 thi mistress th brothel son sixteen 
 pluck lin crutch thi old limp sire 
 with beat brain pieti fear 
 religion god peac justic truth 
 domest awe night rest neighbourhood 
 instruct manner mysteri trade 
 degre observ custom law 
 declin confound contraries
 and let confus live plagu incid men 
 your potent infecti fever heap
 on athen ripe stroke thou cold sciatica 
 crippl senat limb may halt
 as lame manner lust liberti 
 creep mind marrow youth 
 that gainst stream virtu may strive
 and drown riot itch blain 
 sow th athenian bosom crop
 be gener leprosi breath infect breath 
 that societi friendship may
 be mere poison noth i bear thee
 but naked thou detest town 
 take thou multipli ban 
 timon wood shall find
 th unkindest beast kinder mankind 
 the god confound hear good god 
 the athenian within wall 
 and grant timon grow hate may grow
 to whole race mankind high low 
 amen exit

scen ii athen timon house

ent flaviu two three servants

 first servant hear master steward master 
 are undon cast noth remain 
 flaviu alack fellow i say 
 let record righteou god 
 i poor 
 first servant such hous broke 
 so nobl master fall n all gone not
 one friend take fortun arm
 and go along 
 second servant as turn backs
 from companion thrown grave 
 so familiar buri fortunes
 slink away leav fals vow 
 like empti purs pick poor self 
 a dedic beggar air 
 with diseas shunn poverti 
 walk like contempt alon more fellow 

 enter servants

 flaviu all broken implement ruin hous 
 third servant yet heart wear timon liveri 
 that see i face we fellow still 
 serv alik sorrow leak bark 
 and poor mate stand die deck 
 hear surg threat we must part
 into sea air 
 flaviu good fellow 
 the latest wealth i share amongst 
 wherev shall meet timon sake 
 let yet fellow let shake head say 
 as twere knell unto master fortun 
 we seen better day let take 
 give money 
 nay put hand not one word 
 thu part rich sorrow part poor 
 embrac part sever way 
 o fierc wretched glori bring us 
 who would wish wealth exempt 
 sinc rich point miseri contempt 
 who would mock glori live
 but dream friendship 
 to pomp state compound 
 but paint like varnish friend 
 poor honest lord brought low heart 
 undon good strang unusu blood 
 when man worst sin much good 
 who dare half kind 
 for bounti make god still mar men 
 my dearest lord blest accurst 
 rich wretch thi great fortunes
 are made thi chief afflict ala kind lord 
 he flung rage ingrat seat
 of monstrou friend to
 suppli life command 
 i follow enquir 
 i ever serv mind best 
 whilst i gold i steward still exit

scen iii the wood near sea shore befor timon s cave

ent timon woods

 timon o bless breed sun draw earth
 rotten humid thi sister orb
 infect air twinn brother one womb 
 whose procreat resid birth 
 scarc divid touch sever fortun 
 the greater scorn lesser not natur 
 to sore lay sieg bear great fortune
 but contempt natur 
 rais beggar deni lord 
 the senat shall bear contempt hereditari 
 the beggar nativ honour 
 it pastur lard rother side 
 the want make lean who dare dare 
 in puriti manhood stand upright 
 and say thi man flatter if one 
 so everi grise fortune
 is smooth the learn pate
 duck golden fool all obliqu 
 there noth level curs natures
 but direct villaini therefor abhorr d
 all feast societi throng men 
 hi semblabl yea timon disdain 
 destruct fang mankind earth yield root 
 dig 
 who seek better thee sauc palate
 with thi oper poison what 
 gold yellow glitter preciou gold no god 
 i idl votarist root clear heaven 
 thu much make black white foul fair 
 wrong right base nobl old young coward valiant 
 ha god what god whi this
 will lug priest servant side 
 pluck stout men pillow head 
 thi yellow slave
 will knit break religion bless th accur 
 make hoar leprosi ador place thieves
 and give titl knee approb 
 with senat bench thi it
 that make wappen widow wed 
 she spital hous ulcer sores
 would cast gorg embalm spices
 to th april day come damn earth 
 thou common whore mankind put odds
 among rout nation i make thee
 do thi right natur march afar 
 ha drum th art quick 
 but yet i buri thee thou go strong thief 
 when gouti keeper thee can not stand 
 nay stay thou earnest keep gold 

 enter alcibiad drum fife warlike
 manner phrynia timandra

 alcibiad what art thou speak 
 timon a beast thou art the canker gnaw thi heart
 for show eye man 
 alcibiad what thi name is man hate thee
 that art thyself man 
 timon i misanthropo hate mankind 
 for thi part i wish thou wert dog 
 that i might love thee someth 
 alcibiad i know thee well 
 but thi fortun unlearn strang 
 timon i know thee i know thee
 i desir know follow thi drum 
 with man blood paint ground gule gule 
 religi canon civil law cruel 
 then war thi fell whore thine
 hath destruct thi sword
 for cherubin look 
 phrynia thi lip rot 
 timon i kiss thee rot returns
 to thine lip 
 alcibiad how came nobl timon chang 
 timon as moon want light give 
 but renew i could like moon 
 there sun borrow 
 alcibiad nobl timon 
 what friendship may i thee 
 timon none to
 maintain opinion 
 alcibiad what timon 
 timon promis friendship perform none if thou wilt not
 promis god plagu thee thou art man if thou dost
 perform confound thee thou art man 
 alcibiad i heard sort thi miseri 
 timon thou saw st i prosper 
 alcibiad i see bless time 
 timon as thine held brace harlot 
 timandra is th athenian minion world
 voic regard 
 timon art thou timandra 
 timandra ye 
 timon be whore still love thee use thee 
 give diseas leav thee lust 
 make use thi salt hour season slaves
 for tub bath bring rose cheek youth
 to tub fast diet

 are drown lost calam 
 i littl gold late brave timon

 in penuri band i heard griev

 forget thi great deed neighbour state 
 but thi sword fortun trod upon 
 timon i prithe beat thi drum get thee gone 
 alcibiad i thi friend piti thee dear timon 
 timon how dost thou piti thou dost troubl 
 i rather alon

 here gold thee 
 timon keep i can not eat

 timon war st thou gainst athen

 timon the god confound thi conquest 
 and thee thou hast conquer 
 alcibiad whi timon 
 timon that kill villains
 thou wast born conquer countri 
 put thi gold go here gold go 
 be planetari plagu jove
 will er high vic citi hang poison
 in sick air let thi sword skip one 
 piti honour age white beard 
 he usur strike counterfeit matron 
 it habit honest 
 herself bawd let virgin cheek
 make soft thi trenchant sword milk paps
 that window bar bore men eyes
 are within leaf piti writ
