 whose dimpl smile fool exhaust merci 
 think bastard oracle
 hath doubt pronounc thi throat shall cut 
 and minc san remors swear abject 
 put armour thine ear thine eye 
 whose proof yell mother maid babe 
 nor sight priest holi vestment bleed 
 shall pierc jot there gold pay thi soldier 
 make larg confus thi furi spent 
 confound thyself speak gone 
 alcibiad hast thou gold yet i take gold thou givest 
 not thi counsel 
 timon dost thou dost thou heaven curs upon thee 
 phrynia and timandra give us gold good timon 
 hast thou 
 timon enough make whore forswear trade 
 and make whore bawd hold slut 
 your apron mountant oathabl 
 although i know swear terribl swear 
 into strong shudder heavenli agu 
 th immort god hear spare oath 
 i trust condit be whore still 
 and whose piou breath seek convert 
 be strong whore allur burn 
 let close fire predomin smoke 
 and turncoat yet may pain six months
 be quit contrari and thatch poor thin roofs
 with burden dead hang 
 no matter wear betray whore still

 a pox wrinkl

 believ anyth gold

 that may never fals titl plead

 and ditch grave

 timon ye thou spok st well

 drum beat exeunt timon
 timon that natur sick man unkind 
 should yet hungri common mother thou dig 
 whose womb unmeasur infinit breast
 teem feed whose self mettl

 enter apemantus

 more man plagu plagu 
 apemantu i direct hither men report
 thou dost affect manner dost use 
 timon ti thou dost keep dog 
 whom i would imit consumpt catch thee

 a poor unmanli melancholi sprung
 from chang fortun whi spade place 
 thi slave like habit look care 
 thi flatter yet wear silk drink wine lie soft 
 hug disea perfum forgot
 that ever timon shame woods
 by put cun carper 
 be thou flatter seek thrive
 by undon thee hing thi knee 
 and let breath thou lt observe
 blow thi cap prais viciou strain 
 and call excel thou wast told thu 
 thou gav st thine ear like tapster bade welcom 
 to knave approach ti just
 that thou turn rascal hadst thou wealth again
 rascal do assum like 
 timon were i like thee i throw away 
 apemantu thou hast cast away thyself like thyself 
 a madman long fool what think st
 that bleak air thi boister chamberlain 
 will put thi shirt warm will moist tree 
 that outliv eagl page thi heels

 to cure thi ernight surfeit call creatures
 whose nake natur live spite
 of wreak heaven whose bare unhous trunk

 dost pleas thyself 
 apemantu ay 
 timon what knave 
 apemantu if thou didst put sour cold habit on

 outliv incertain pomp crown 
 the one fill still never complet 
 the high wish best state contentless 
 hath distract wretch 
 wors worst content

 timon not breath miser

 with favour never clasp bred dog

 to may passiv drug it
 freeli command thou wouldst plung thyself
 in gener riot melt thi youth
 in differ bed lust never learn d
 the ici precept respect followed
 the sug red game thee but 
 who world confectionari 
 the mouth tongu eye heart men
 at duti i could frame employ 
 that numberless upon stuck leaves
 do oak one winter brush
 fell bough left open bare

 that never knew better burden

 hath made thee hard whi shouldst thou hate men

 to beggar compound thee

 melancholi

 banditti where

 banditti save thee timon 
 timon now thiev 
 banditti soldier thiev 
 timon both women son

 timon your greatest want want much meat 
 whi want behold earth hath root 
 within mile break forth hundr spring 
 the oak bear mast briar scarlet hip 
 the bounteou housewif natur bush
 lay full mess want whi want 
 first bandit we can not live grass berri water 
 as beast bird fish 
 timon nor beast bird fish 
 you must eat men yet thank i must con
 that thiev profess work not
 in holier shape boundless theft
 in limit profess rascal thiev 
 here gold go suck subtl blood th grape
 till high fever seeth blood froth 
 and scape hang trust physician 
 hi antidot poison slays
 moe rob take wealth live togeth 
 do villaini sinc protest 
 like workmen i exampl thieveri 
 the sun thief great attraction
 rob vast sea moon arrant thief 
 and pale fire snatch sun 
 the sea thief whose liquid surg resolves
 the moon salt tear earth thief 
 that feed breed compostur stol n
 from gen ral excrement thing thief

 ha uncheck theft love away

 amen

 enter flaviu timon

 flaviu o god 
 is yond despi ruinou man lord 
 full decay fail o monument
 and wonder good deed evilli bestow 
 what alter honour
 ha desp rate want made 
 what viler thing upon earth friend 
 who bring noblest mind basest end 
 how rare meet time guis 
 when man wish love enemi 
 grant i may ever love rather woo
 those would mischief 
 ha caught eye i present
 my honest grief unto lord
 still serv life my dearest master 
 timon away what art thou

 then thou grant st th art man i forgot thee 
 flaviu an honest poor servant 
 timon then i know thee 
 i never honest man i 
 all i kept knave serv meat villain

 nev r poor steward wear truer grief
 for undon lord mine eye

 becaus thou art woman disclaim st
 flinti mankind whose eye never give
 but thorough lust laughter piti sleep 
 strang time weep laugh weep

 t accept grief whilst poor wealth lasts
 to entertain steward still 
 timon had i steward
 so true comfort 
 it almost turn danger natur mild 
 let behold thi face sure man
 wa born woman 
 forgiv gener exceptless rash

 upon first lord neck but tell true

 expect return twenti one 
 flaviu no worthi master whose breast

 that i show heaven know mere love

 for benefit point

 to requit make rich

 and comfort master

 on special digniti vacant lie
 for thi best use wear

 toward thee forget gener gross 
 which public bodi doth seldom
 play recant feel itself
 a lack timon aid hath sens withal
 of fail restrain aid timon 
 and send forth us make sorrow render

 than offenc weigh dram 
 ay even heap sum love wealth

 first senat therefor pleas thee return us 
 and athen thine take
 the captainship thou shalt met thank 
 allow absolut power thi good name
 live author so soon shall drive back
 of alcibiad th approach wild 
 who like boar savag doth root up
 hi countri peac 
 second senat and shake threat ning sword
 against wall athen 
 first senat therefor timon 
 timon well sir i therefor i sir thu 
 if alcibiad kill countrymen 
 let alcibiad know timon 
 that timon care but sack fair athen 
 and take goodli age men th beard 
 give holi virgin stain
 of contumeli beastli mad brain war 
 then let know tell timon speak it
 in piti age youth 
 i can not choos tell i care 
 and let take worst knive care 
 while throat answer for 
 there whittl th unruli camp
 but i prize love before
 the reverend st throat athen so i leav you
 to protect prosper god 
 as thiev keeper 
 flaviu stay vain 
 timon whi i write epitaph 
 it seen morrow my long sickness
 of health live begin mend 
 and noth bring thing go live still 
 be alcibiad plagu 
 and last long enough 
 first senat we speak vain 
 timon but yet i love countri not
 one rejoic common wreck 
 as common bruit doth put 
 first senat that well spoke 
 timon commend love countrymen 
 first senat these word becom lip pass through
 
 second senat and enter ear like great triumphers
 in applaud gate 
 timon commend 
 and tell eas grief 
 their fear hostil stroke ach loss 
 their pang love incid throes
 that natur fragil vessel doth sustain
 in life uncertain voyag i kind 
 i teach prevent wild alcibiad wrath 
 first senat i like well return 
 timon i tree grow close 
 that mine use invit cut 
 and shortli must i fell tell friend 
 tell athen sequenc degree
 from high low throughout whoso please
 to stop afflict let take hast 
 come hither ere tree hath felt axe 
 and hang i pray greet 
 flaviu troubl thu still shall find 
 timon come say athens
 timon hath made everlast mansion
 upon beach verg salt flood 
 who day emboss froth
 the turbul surg shall cover thither come 
 and let graveston oracl 
 lip let sour word go languag end 
 what amiss plagu infect mend 
 grave men work death gain 
 sun hide thi beam timon hath done reign 
 exit timon cave
 first senat hi discont unremovably
 coupl natur 
 second senat our hope dead let us return
 and strain mean left unto us
 in dear peril 
 first senat it requir swift foot exeunt

scen ii befor wall athens

ent two senat messenger

 first senat thou hast pain discov files
 as full thi report 
 messeng i spoke least 
 besid expedit promises
 present approach 
 second senat we stand much hazard bring timon 
 messeng i met courier one mine ancient friend 
 whom though gener part oppo 
 yet old love particular forc 
 and made us speak like friend thi man riding
 from alcibiad timon cave
 with letter entreati imported
 hi fellowship th caus citi 
 in part sake mov 

 enter senat timon

 first senat here come brother 
 third senat no talk timon noth expect 
 the enemi drum heard fear scouring
 doth choke air dust in prepar 
 our fall i fear foe snare exeunt

scen iii the timon cave rude tomb seen

ent soldier wood seek timon

 soldier by descript place 
 who speak ho no answer what 
 timon dead hath outstretch span 
 some beast rear live man 
 dead sure grave what tomb
 i can not read charact i take wax 
 our captain hath everi figur skill 
 an ag interpret though young day 
 befor proud athen set 
 whose fall mark ambit exit

scen iv befor wall athens

trumpet sound enter alcibiad power athens

 alcibiad sound coward lascivi town
 our terribl approach 

 sound parley the senat appear upon walls

 till gone fill time
 with licenti measur make wills
 the scope justic till such
 as slept within shadow power 
 have wander traver arm breath d
 our suffer vainli now time flush 
 when crouch marrow bearer strong 
 cri no now breathless wrong
 shall sit pant great chair eas 
 and pursi insol shall break wind
 with fear horrid flight 
 first senat nobl young 
 when thi first grief mere conceit 
 ere thou hadst power caus fear 
 we sent thee give thi rage balm 
 to wipe ingratitud loves
 abov quantiti 
 second senat so woo
 transform timon citi love
 by humbl messag promi mean 
 we unkind deserve
 the common stroke war 
 first senat these wall ours
 were erect hand whom
 you receiv grief such
 that great tow rs trophi school fall
 for privat fault 
 second senat nor living
 who motiv first went 
 shame want cun excess
 hath broke heart march nobl lord 
 into citi thi banner spread 
 by decim tith death 
 if thi reveng hunger food
 which natur loath take thou destin tenth 
 and hazard spot die
 let die spot 
 first senat all offend 
 for squar take 
 on reveng crime like land 
 are inherit then dear countryman 
 bring thi rank leav without thi rage 
 spare thi athenian cradl kin
 which bluster thi wrath must fall
 with offend like shepherd
 approach fold cull th infect forth 
 but kill togeth 
 second senat what thou wilt 
 thou rather shalt enforc thi smile
 than hew thi sword 
 first senat set thi foot
 against rampir gate shall ope 
 so thou wilt send thi gentl heart before
 to say thou enter friendli 
 second senat throw thi glove 
 or token thine honour els 
 that thou wilt use war thi redress
 and confus thi powers
 shall make harbour town till we
 have seal thi full desir 
 alcibiad then glove 
 descend open uncharg port 
 those enemi timon mine 
 whom shall set reproof 
 fall and aton fears
 with nobl mean man
 shall pass quarter offend stream
 of regular justic citi bound 
 but shall render public laws
 at heaviest answer 
 both ti nobli spoken 
 alcibiad descend keep word 
 the senat descend open gate 

 enter soldier messenger

 soldier my nobl gener timon dead 
 entomb upon hem th sea 
 and grave stone insculptur which
 with wax i brought away whose soft impression
 interpret poor ignor 

 alcibiad read epitaph

 here lie wretch cors wretch soul bereft 
 seek name a plagu consum wick caitiff left 
 here lie i timon aliv live men hate 
 pass curs thi fill pass stay thy
 gait 
 these well express thee thi latter spirit 
 though thou abhorr dst us human grief 
 scorn dst brain flow droplet which
 from niggard natur fall yet rich conceit
 taught thee make vast neptun weep aye
 on thi low grave fault forgiven dead
 is nobl timon whose memory
 hereaft bring citi 
 and i use oliv sword 
 make war breed peac make peac stint war make each
 prescrib leech 
 let drum strike exeunt




th tragedi of titu andronicus

dramati personae

 saturninu son late emperor rome afterward emperor
 bassianu brother saturninus
 titu andronicu nobl roman
 marcu andronicu tribun peopl brother titus

 son titu andronicu 
 lucius
 quintus
 martius
 mutius

 young luciu boy son lucius
 publiu son marcu andronicus

 kinsmen titu 
 sempronius
 caius
 valentine

 aemiliu nobl roman

 son tamora 
 alarbus
 demetrius
 chiron

 aaron moor belov tamora
 a captain
 a messenger
 a clown

 tamora queen goths
 lavinia daughter titu andronicus
 a nurs black child

 roman goth senat tribun offic soldier and
 attendants

 scene rome neighbourhood

act 1 scene i rome befor capitol

flourish enter tribun senat aloft enter below
saturninu follow one door bassianu his
follow drum trumpets

 saturninu nobl patrician patron right 
 defend justic caus arm 
 and countrymen love follow 
 plead success titl sword 
 i first born son last
 that ware imperi diadem rome 
 then let father honour live 
 nor wrong mine age indign 
 bassianu roman friend follow favour right 
 if ever bassianu caesar son 
 were graciou eye royal rome 
 keep passag capitol 
 and suffer dishonour approach
 the imperi seat virtu consecr 
 to justic contin nobil 
 but let desert pure elect shine 
 and roman fight freedom choic 

 enter marcu andronicu aloft crown

 marcu princ strive faction friends
 ambiti rule emperi 
 know peopl rome stand
 a special parti common voice
 in elect roman empery
 chosen andronicu surnam pius
 for mani good great desert rome 
 a nobler man braver warrior 
 live day within citi wall 
 he senat accit home 
 from weari war barbar goth 
 that son terror foe 
 hath yok nation strong train arm 
 ten year spent sinc first undertook
 thi caus rome chastis arms
 our enemi pride five time hath return d
 bleed rome bear valiant sons
 in coffin field day
 to monument andronici
 done sacrific expiat 
 and slain noblest prison goth 
 and last laden honour spoil 
 return good andronicu rome 
 renown titu flourish arm 
 let us entreat honour name
 whom worthili would succeed 
 and capitol senat right 
 whom pretend honour ador 
 that withdraw abat strength 
 dismiss follow suitor 
 plead desert peac humbl 
 saturninu how fair tribun speak calm thought 
 bassianu marcu andronicu i affy
 in thi upright integr 
 and i love honour thee thine 
 thi nobl brother titu son 
 and thought humbl 
 graciou lavinia rome rich ornament 
 that i dismiss love friend 
 and fortun peopl favour
 commit caus balanc weigh 
 exeunt soldier bassianus
 saturninu friend thu forward right 
 i thank dismiss 
 and love favour country
 commit person caus 
 exeunt soldier saturninus
 rome graciou unto me
 as i confid kind thee 
 open gate let 
 bassianu tribun poor competitor 
 flourish they go senat hous 

 enter captain

 captain roman make way the good andronicu 
 patron virtu rome best champion 
 success battl fight 
 with honour fortun return d
 from circumscrib sword
 and brought yoke enemi rome 

 sound drum trumpet enter martiu mutiu 
 two titu son two men bear coffin covered
 black luciu quintu two son titus
 andronicu tamora queen goth three
 son alarbu demetriu chiron aaron moor and
 other mani then set coffin titus
 speaks

 titu hail rome victori thi mourn weed 
 lo bark hath discharg fraught
 return preciou lade bay
 from whenc first weigh anchorag 
 cometh andronicu bound laurel bough 
 to salut countri tear 
 tear true joy return rome 
 thou great defend capitol 
 stand graciou rite intend 
 roman five twenti valiant son 
 half number king priam 
 behold poor remain aliv dead 
 these surviv let rome reward love 
 these i bring unto latest home 
 with burial amongst ancestor 
 here goth given leav sheath sword 
 titu unkind careless thine 
 whi suffer st thou thi son unburi yet 
 to hover dread shore styx 
 make way lay brethren 
 they open tomb 
 there greet silenc dead wont 
 and sleep peac slain countri war 
 o sacr receptacl joy 
 sweet cell virtu nobil 
 how mani son hast thou mine store
 that thou wilt never render 
 luciu give us proudest prison goth 
 that may hew limb pile
 ad mane fratrum sacrific flesh
 befor earthi prison bone 
 that shadow unappea 
 nor disturb prodigi earth 
 titu i give noblest surviv 
 the eldest son distress queen 
 tamora stay roman brethen graciou conqueror 
 victori titu rue tear i shed 
 a mother tear passion son 
 and thi son ever dear thee 
 o think son dear 
 sufficeth brought rome
 to beautifi thi triumph return
 captiv thee thi roman yoke 
 but must son slaughter streets
 for valiant do countri caus 
 o fight king commonweal
 were pieti thine 
 andronicu stain thi tomb blood 
 wilt thou draw near natur god 
 draw near merci 
 sweet merci nobil true badg 
 thrice nobl titu spare first born son 
 titu patient madam pardon 
 these brethren goth beheld
 aliv dead brethren slain
 religi ask sacrific 
 to son mark die must
 t appeas groan shadow gone 
 luciu away make fire straight 
 and sword upon pile wood 
 let hew limb till clean consum 
 exeunt titu son alarbus
 tamora o cruel irreligi pieti 
 chiron wa never scythia half barbar 
 demetriu oppos scythia ambiti rome 
 alarbu goe rest survive
 to trembl titu threat ning look 
 then madam stand resolv hope withal
 the self god arm queen troy
 with opportun sharp revenge
 upon thracian tyrant tent
 may favour tamora queen goth 
 when goth goth tamora queen 
 to quit bloodi wrong upon foe 

 re enter luciu quintu martiu and
 mutiu son andronicu sword bloody

 luciu see lord father perform d
 our roman rite alarbu limb lopp 
 and entrail feed sacrif fire 
 whose smoke like incens doth perfum sky 
 remaineth nought inter brethren 
 and loud larum welcom rome 
 titu let let andronicus
 make latest farewel soul 
 sound trumpet lay coffin tomb 
 in peac honour rest son 
 rome readiest champion repos rest 
 secur worldli chanc mishap 
 here lurk treason envi swell 
 here grow damn drug storm 
 no nois silenc etern sleep 
 in peac honour rest son 

 enter lavinia

 lavinia in peac honour live lord titu long 
 my nobl lord father live fame 
 lo tomb tributari tears
 i render brethren obsequi 
 and thi feet i kneel tear joy
 shed earth thi return rome 
 o bless thi victori hand 
 whose fortun rome best citizen applaud 
 titu kind rome hast thu lovingli reserv d
 the cordial mine age glad heart 
 lavinia live outliv thi father day 
 and fame etern date virtu prais 

 enter marcu andronicu tribun 
 enter saturninu bassianu attendants

 marcu long live lord titu belov brother 
 graciou triumpher eye rome 
 titu thank gentl tribun nobl brother marcu 
 marcu and welcom nephew success war 
 you surviv sleep fame 
 fair lord fortun alik all
 that countri servic drew sword 
 but safer triumph funer pomp
 that hath aspir solon happiness
 and triumph chanc honour bed 
 titu andronicu peopl rome 
 whose friend justic thou hast ever 
 send thee tribun trust 
 thi par iament white spotless hue 
 and name thee elect empire
 with late deceas emperor son 
 be candidatu put 
 and help set head headless rome 
 titu a better head gloriou bodi fits
 than shake age feebl 
 what i robe troubl 
 be chosen proclam day 
 to morrow yield rule resign life 
 and set abroad new busi 
 rome i thi soldier forti year 
 and led countri strength success 
 and buri one twenti valiant son 
 knight field slain man arm 
 in right servic nobl countri 
 give staff honour mine age 
 but sceptr control world 
 upright held lord held last 
 marcu titu thou shalt obtain ask emperi 
 saturninu proud ambiti tribun canst thou tell 
 titu patienc princ saturninu 
 saturninu roman right 
 patrician draw sword sheath not
 till saturninu rome emperor 
 andronicu would thou shipp hell
 rather rob peopl heart 
 luciu proud saturnin interrupt good
 that nobl mind titu mean thee 
 titu content thee princ i restor thee
 the peopl heart wean 
 bassianu andronicu i flatter thee 
 but honour thee till i die 
 my faction thou strengthen thi friend 
 i thank thank men
 of nobl mind honour meed 
 titu peopl rome peopl tribun 
 i ask voic suffrag 
 will ye bestow friendli andronicu 
 tribun to gratifi good andronicu 
 and gratul safe return rome 
 the peopl accept admit 
 titu tribun i thank suit i make 
 that creat emperor eldest son 
 lord saturnin whose virtu i hope 
 reflect rome titan ray earth 
 and ripen justic commonw 
 then elect advic 
 crown say long live emperor 
 marcu with voic applaus everi sort 
 patrician plebeian create
 lord saturninu rome great emperor 
 and say long live emperor saturnin 
 a long flourish till come 
 saturninu titu andronicu thi favour done
 to us elect day
 i give thee thank part thi desert 
 and deed requit thi gentl 
 and onset titu advance
 thi name honour famili 
 lavinia i make emperess 
 rome royal mistress mistress heart 
 and sacr pantheon espous 
 tell andronicu doth motion pleas thee 
 titu it doth worthi lord match
 i hold highli honour grace 
 and sight rome saturnin 
 king command commonw 
 the wide world emperor i consecrate
 my sword chariot prison 
 present well worthi rome imperi lord 
 receiv tribut i owe 
 mine honour ensign humbl thi feet 
 saturninu thank nobl titu father life 
 how proud i thee thi gifts
 rome shall record i forget
 the least unspeak desert 
 roman forget fealti 
 titu to tamora now madam prison emperor 
 to honour state
 will use nobli follow 
 saturninu asid a goodli ladi trust hue
 that i would choos i choos anew 
 clear fair queen cloudi counten 
 though chanc war hath wrought chang cheer 
 thou com st made scorn rome 
 princ shall thi usag everi way 
 rest word let discontent
 daunt hope madam comfort you
 can make greater queen goth 
 lavinia displea 
 lavinia not i lord sith true nobility
 warrant word princ courtesi 
 saturninu thank sweet lavinia roman let us go 
 ransomless set prison free 
 proclaim honour lord trump drum 
 flourish 
 bassianu lord titu leav maid mine 
 seiz lavinia 
 titu how sir are earnest lord 
 bassianu ay nobl titu resolv withal
 to reason right 
 marcu suum cuiqu roman justic 
 thi princ justic seizeth 
 luciu and shall luciu live 
 titu traitor avaunt where emperor guard 
 treason lord lavinia surpri 
 saturninu surpri by 
 bassianu by justli may
 bear betroth world away 
 exeunt bassianu marcu lavinia
 mutiu brother help convey henc away 
 and sword i keep door safe 
 exeunt luciu quintu martius
 titu follow lord i soon bring back 
 mutiu my lord pass 
 titu what villain boy 
 bar st way rome 
 mutiu help luciu help 
 titu kill dure fray exeunt saturninu 
 tamora demetriu chiron aaron

 re enter lucius

 luciu my lord unjust 
 in wrong quarrel slain son 
 titu nor thou son mine 
 my son would never dishonour 

 re enter aloft emperor
 tamora two son aaron moor

 traitor restor lavinia emperor 
 luciu dead wife 
 that anoth law promi love exit
 saturninu no titu emperor need 
 nor thee thi stock 
 i trust leisur mock 
 thee never thi traitor haughti son 
 confeder thu dishonour 
 wa none els rome make stale
 but saturnin full well andronicu 
 agre deed proud brag thine
 that saidst i begg empir thi hand 
 titu o monstrou what reproach word 
 saturninu but go thi way go give chang piece
 to flourish sword 
 a valiant son law thou shalt enjoy 
 one fit bandi thi lawless son 
 to ruffl commonwealth rome 
 titu these word razor wound heart 
 saturninu and therefor love tamora queen goth 
 that like state phoeb mongst nymph 
 dost overshin gallant st dame rome 
 if thou plea sudden choic 
 behold i choos thee tamora bride
 and creat thee emperess rome 
 speak queen goth dost thou applaud choic 
 and i swear roman god 
 sith priest holi water near 
 and taper burn bright everything
 in readi hymenaeu stand 
 i salut street rome 
 or climb palac till forth place
 i lead espou bride along 
 tamora and sight heaven rome i swear 
 if saturnin advanc queen goth 
 she handmaid desir 
 a love nurs mother youth 
 saturninu ascend fair queen pantheon lord accompany
 your nobl emperor love bride 
 sent heaven princ saturnin 
 whose wisdom hath fortun conquer 
 there shall consumm spousal rite 
 exeunt titus
 titu i bid wait upon bride 
 titu wert thou wont walk alon 
 dishonour thu challeng wrong 

 re enter marcu 
 titu son luciu quintu martius

 marcu o titu see o see thou hast done 
 in bad quarrel slain virtuou son 
 titu no foolish tribun son mine 
 nor thou confeder deed
 that hath dishonour famili 
 unworthi brother unworthi son 
 luciu but let us give burial becom 
 give mutiu burial bretheren 
 titu traitor away he rest tomb 
 thi monument five hundr year hath stood 
 which i sumptuous edifi 
 here none soldier rome servitors
 repos fame none base slain brawl 
 buri come 
 marcu my lord impieti 
 my nephew mutiu deed plead 
 he must buri bretheren 
 quintu martiu and shall accompani 
 titu and shall what villain spake word 
 quintu he would vouch place 
 titu what would buri despit 
 marcu no nobl titu entreat thee
 to pardon mutiu buri 
 titu marcu even thou hast struck upon crest 
 and boy mine honour thou hast wound 
 my foe i reput everi one 
 so troubl get gone 
 martiu he let us withdraw 
 quintu not i till mutiu bone buri 
 the brother son kneel 
 marcu brother name doth natur plead 
 quintu father name doth natur speak 
 titu speak thou rest speed 
 marcu renown titu half soul 
 luciu dear father soul substanc us 
 marcu suffer thi brother marcu inter
 hi nobl nephew virtu nest 
 that die honour lavinia caus 
 thou art roman barbar 
 the greek upon advic buri ajax 
 that slew wise laert son
 did gracious plead funer 
 let young mutiu thi joy 
 be barr entranc 
 titu rise marcu rise 
 the dismal st day e er i saw 
 to dishonour son rome 
 well buri buri next 
 they put mutiu tomb 
 luciu there lie thi bone sweet mutiu thi friend 
 till trophi adorn thi tomb 
 all kneel no man shed tear nobl mutiu 
 he live fame die virtu caus 
 marcu my lord step dreari dump 
 how come subtl queen goths
 is sudden thu advanc rome 
 titu i know marcu i know 
 whether devic heaven tell 
 is behold man
 that brought high good turn far 
 marcu ye nobli remuner 

 flourish re enter emperor tamora
 two son moor one door 
 door bassianu lavinia others

 saturninu so bassianu play prize 
 god give joy sir gallant bride 
 bassianu and lord i say 
 nor wish less i take leav 
 saturninu traitor rome law power 
 thou thi faction shall repent rape 
 bassianu rape call lord seiz 
 my true betroth love wife 
 but let law rome determin 
 meanwhil i possess mine 
 saturninu ti good sir you short us 
 but live sharp 
 bassianu my lord i done best i may 
 answer i must shall life 
 onli thu much i give grace know 
 by duti i owe rome 
 thi nobl gentleman lord titu 
 is opinion honour wrong 
 that rescu lavinia 
 with hand slay youngest son 
 in zeal highli mov wrath
 to control frankli gave 
 receiv favour saturnin 
 that hath express deeds
 a father friend thee rome 
 titu princ bassianu leav plead deed 
 ti thou dishonour 
 rome righteou heaven judge
 how i lov honour saturnin 
 tamora my worthi lord ever tamora
 were graciou princ eye thine 
 then hear speak indiffer 
 and suit sweet pardon past 
 saturninu what madam dishonour openli 
 and base put without reveng 
 tamora not lord god rome forfend
 i author dishonour 
 but mine honour dare i undertake
 for good lord titu innoc 
 whose furi dissembl speak grief 
 then suit look gracious 
 lose nobl friend vain suppos 
 nor sour look afflict gentl heart 
 asid saturninu my lord rul 
 last 
 dissembl grief discont 
 you newli plant throne 
 lest peopl patrician 
 upon survey take titu part 
 and supplant ingratitud 
 which rome reput heinou sin 
 yield entreat let alon 
 i find day massacr 
 and raze faction famili 
 the cruel father traitor son 
 to i su dear son life 
 and make know ti let queen
 kneel street beg grace vain 
 come come sweet emperor come andronicu 
 take good old man cheer heart
 that die tempest thi angri frown 
 saturninu rise titu rise empress hath prevail 
 titu i thank majesti lord 
 these word look infus new life 
 tamora titu i incorpor rome 
 a roman adopt happili 
 and must advis emperor good 
 thi day quarrel die andronicu 
 and let mine honour good lord 
 that i reconcil friend 
 for princ bassianu i pass d
 my word promis emperor
 that mild tractabl 
 and fear lord lavinia 
 by advic humbl knee 
 you shall ask pardon majesti 
 luciu we vow heaven highness
 that mildli might 
 tend ring sister honour 
 marcu that mine honour i protest 
 saturninu away talk troubl us 
 tamora nay nay sweet emperor must friend 
 the tribun nephew kneel grace 
 i deni sweet heart look back 
 saturninu marcu thi sake thi brother 
 and love tamora entreat 
 i remit young men heinou fault 
 stand 
 lavinia though left like churl 
 i found friend sure death i swore
 i would part bachelor priest 
 come emperor court feast two bride 
 you guest lavinia friend 
 thi day shall love day tamora 
 titu to morrow pleas majesty
 to hunt panther hart 
 with horn hound give grace bonjour 
 saturninu be titu gramerci 
 exeunt sound trumpets

act ii scene i rome befor palace

ent aaron

 aaron now climbeth tamora olympu top 
 safe fortun shot sit aloft 
 secur thunder crack lightn flash 
 advanc pale envi threat ning reach 
 as golden sun salut morn 
 and gilt ocean beam 
 gallop zodiac glisten coach
 and overlook highest peer hill 
 so tamora 
 upon wit doth earthli honour wait 
 and virtu stoop trembl frown 
 then aaron arm thi heart fit thi thoughts
 to mount aloft thi imperi mistress 
 and mount pitch thou triumph long 
 hast prison held fett red amor chain 
 and faster bound aaron charm eyes
 than prometheu tie caucasu 
 away slavish weed servil thought 
 i bright shine pearl gold 
 to wait upon new made emperess 
 to wait said i to wanton queen 
 thi goddess semirami nymph 
 thi siren charm rome saturnin 
 and see shipwreck commonw 
 hullo storm 

 enter chiron demetriu braving

 demetriu chiron thi year want wit thi wit want edge
 and manner intrud i grac 
 and may aught thou knowest affect 
 chiron demetriu thou dost ween 
 and bear brave 
 ti differ year two
 make less graciou thee fortun 
 i abl fit thou
 to serv deserv mistress grace 
 and sword upon thee shall approv 
 and plead passion lavinia love 
 aaron asid club club these lover keep the
 peac 
 demetriu whi boy although mother unadvi 
 gave danc rapier side 
 are desper grown threat friend 
 go lath glu within sheath
 till know better handl 
 chiron meanwhil sir littl skill i 
 full well shalt thou perceiv much i dare 
 demetriu ay boy grow ye brave they draw 
 aaron come forward whi lord 
 so near emperor palac dare ye draw
 and maintain quarrel openli 
 full well i wot ground grudg 
 i would million gold
 the caus known concern 
 nor would nobl mother much more
 be dishonour court rome 
 for shame put 
 demetriu not i till i sheath d
 my rapier bosom withal
 thrust reproach speech throat
 that hath breath dishonour 
 chiron for i prepar full resolv 
 foul spoken coward thund rest thi tongu 
 and thi weapon noth dar st perform 
 aaron away i say 
 now god warlik goth ador 
 thi pretti brabbl undo us 
 whi lord think dangerous
 it jet upon princ right 
 what lavinia becom loos 
 or bassianu degener 
 that love quarrel may broach d
 without control justic reveng 
 young lord bewar empress know
 thi discord ground music would pleas 
 chiron i care i knew world 
 i love lavinia world 
 demetriu youngl learn thou make meaner choic 
 lavina thine elder brother hope 
 aaron whi ye mad know ye rome
 how furiou impati 
 and can not brook competitor love 
 i tell lord plot deaths
 by devic 
 chiron aaron thousand deaths
 would i propos achiev i love 
 aaron to achiev 
 demetriu whi mak st thou strang 
 she woman therefor may woo 
 she woman therefor may 
 she lavinia therefor must lov 
 what man water glideth mill
 than wot miller easi is
 of cut loaf steal shive know 
 though bassianu emperor brother 
 better worn vulcan badg 
 aaron asid ay good saturninu may 
 demetriu then despair know court it
 with word fair look liber 
 what hast thou full often struck doe 
 and born cleanli keeper nose 
 aaron whi seem certain snatch so
 would serv turn 
 chiron ay turn serv 
 demetriu aaron thou hast hit 
 aaron would hit 
 then tir ado 
 whi hark ye hark ye fools
 to squar would offend 
 that speed 
 chiron faith 
 demetriu nor i one 
 aaron for shame friend join jar 
 ti polici stratagem must do
 that affect must resolve
 that can not would achiev 
 you must perforc accomplish may 
 take lucrec chaste
 than lavinia bassianu love 
 a speedier cours ling ring languishment
 must pursu i found path 
 my lord solemn hunt hand 
 there love roman ladi troop 
 the forest walk wide spaciou 
 and mani unfrequ plot are
 fit kind rape villaini 
 singl thither dainti doe 
 and strike home forc word 
 thi way stand hope 
 come come empress sacr wit
 to villaini vengeanc consecr 
 will acquaint intend 
 and shall file engin advice
 that suffer squar 
 but wish height advanc 
 the emperor court like hous fame 
 the palac full tongu eye ear 
 the wood ruthless dread deaf dull 
 there speak strike brave boy take turn 
 there serv lust shadow heaven eye 
 and revel lavinia treasuri 
 chiron thi counsel lad smell cowardic 
 demetriu sit fa aut nefa till i find stream
 to cool heat charm calm fit 
 per styga per mane vehor exeunt

scen ii a forest near rome

ent titu andronicu three son luciu quintu martiu 
make nois hound horn marcus

 titu the hunt morn bright grey 
 the field fragrant wood green 
 uncoupl let us make bay 
 and wake emperor love bride 
 and rous princ ring hunter peal 
 that court may echo nois 
 son let charg 
 to attend emperor person care 
 i troubl sleep night 
 but dawn day new comfort hath inspir 

 here cri hound wind horn peal 
 then enter saturninu tamora bassianu lavinia 
 chiron demetriu attendants
 mani good morrow majesti 
 madam mani good 
 i promis grace hunter peal 
 saturninu and rung lustili lord 
 somewhat earli new marri ladi 
 bassianu lavinia say 
 lavinia i say 
 i broad awak two hour 
 saturninu come hors chariot let us 
 and sport to tamora madam shall ye see
 our roman hunt 
 marcu i dog lord 
 will rous proudest panther chase 
 and climb highest promontori top 
 titu and i hors follow game
 make way run like swallow er plain 
 demetriu chiron hunt hors hound 
 but hope pluck dainti doe ground exeunt

scen iii a lone part forest

ent aaron alon bag gold

 aaron he wit would think i none 
 to buri much gold tree
 and never inherit 
 let think abjectly
 know gold must coin stratagem 
 which cunningli effect beget
 a excel piec villaini 
 and repos sweet gold unrest
 hide gold 
 that alm empress chest 

 enter tamora alon moor

 tamora my love aaron wherefor look st thou sad
 when everyth make gleeful boast 
 the bird chant melodi everi bush 
 the snake lie roll cheer sun 
 the green leav quiver cool wind
 and make chequer shadow ground 
 under sweet shade aaron let us sit 
 and babbl echo mock hound 
 repli shrilli well tun horn 
 as doubl hunt heard 
 let us sit mark yellow nois 
 and conflict suppo d
 the wand ring princ dido enjoy 
 when happi storm surpri 
 and curtain counsel keep cave 
 we may wreath arm 
 our pastim done possess golden slumber 
 while hound horn sweet melodi birds
 be unto us nurs song
 of lullabi bring babe asleep 
 aaron madam though venu govern desir 
 saturn domin mine 
 what signifi deadli stand eye 
 my silenc cloudi melancholi 
 my fleec woolli hair uncurls
 even adder doth unroll
 to fatal execut 
 no madam vener sign 
 vengeanc heart death hand 
 blood reveng hammer head 
 hark tamora empress soul 
 which never hope heaven rest thee 
 thi day doom bassianu 
 hi philomel must lose tongu day 
 thi son make pillag chastiti 
 and wash hand bassianu blood 
 seest thou letter take i pray thee 
 and give king fatal plot scroll 
 now question espi 
 here come parcel hope booti 
 which dread yet live destruct 

 enter bassianu lavinia

 tamora ah sweet moor sweeter life 
 aaron no great empress bassianu come 
 be cross i go fetch thi sons
 to back thi quarrel whatso er exit
 bassianu who rome royal emperess 
 unfurnish well beseem troop 
 or dian habit like 
 who hath abandon holi groves
 to see gener hunt forest 
 tamora sauci control privat step 
 had i pow r say dian 
 thi templ plant presently
 with horn actaeon hounds
 should drive upon thi new transform limb 
 unmannerli intrud thou art 
 lavinia under patienc gentl emperess 
 ti thought goodli gift horn 
 and doubt moor you
 are singl forth tri thi experi 
 jove shield husband hound day 
 ti piti take stag 
 bassianu believ queen swarth cimmerian
 doth make honour bodi hue 
 spot detest abomin 
 whi sequest red train 
 dismount snow white goodli steed 
 and wand red hither obscur plot 
 accompani barbar moor 
 if foul desir conduct 
 lavinia and intercept sport 
 great reason nobl lord rated
 for sauci i pray let us henc 
 and let joy raven colour love 
 thi valley fit purpos pass well 
 bassianu the king brother shall notic 
 lavinia ay slip made note long 
 good king mightili abus 
 tamora whi i patienc endur 

 enter chiron demetrius

 demetriu how dear sovereign graciou mother 
 whi doth high look pale wan 
 tamora have i reason think look pale 
 these two tice hither place 
 a barren detest vale see 
 the tree though summer yet forlorn lean 
 overcom moss bale mistleto 
 here never shine sun noth breed 
 unless nightli owl fatal raven 
 and show abhor pit 
 they told dead time night 
 a thousand fiend thousand hiss snake 
 ten thousand swell toad mani urchin 
 would make fear confus cries
 as mortal bodi hear it
 should straight fall mad els die suddenli 
 no sooner told hellish tale
 but straight told would bind here
 unto bodi dismal yew 
 and leav miser death 
 and call foul adulteress 
 lascivi goth bitterest terms
 that ever ear hear effect 
 and wondrou fortun come 
 thi vengeanc execut 
 reveng love mother life 
 or ye henceforth call children 
 demetriu thi wit i thi son 
 stab bassianu 
 chiron and struck home show strength 
 also stab 
 lavinia ay come semirami nay barbar tamora 
 for name fit thi natur thi 
 tamora give poniard shall know boy 
 your mother hand shall right mother wrong 
 demetriu stay madam belong 
 first thrash corn burn straw 
 thi minion stood upon chastiti 
 upon nuptial vow loyalti 
 and paint hope brave mighti 
 and shall carri unto grave 
 chiron an i would i eunuch 
 drag henc husband secret hole 
 and make dead trunk pillow lust 
 tamora but ye honey desir 
 let wasp outliv us sting 
 chiron i warrant madam make sure 
 come mistress perforc enjoy
 that nice preserv honesti 
 lavinia o tamora thou bearest woman face 
 tamora i hear speak away 
 lavinia sweet lord entreat hear word 
 demetriu listen fair madam let glory
 to see tear heart them
 as unrel flint drop rain 
 lavinia when tiger young one teach dam 
 o learn wrath taught thee 
 the milk thou suck dst turn marbl 
 even thi teat thou hadst thi tyranni 
 yet everi mother breed son alik 
 to chiron do thou entreat show woman piti 
 chiron what wouldst thou prove bastard 
 lavinia ti true raven doth hatch lark 
 yet i heard o could i find 
 the lion mov piti endure
 to princ paw par away 
 some say raven foster forlorn children 
 the whilst bird famish nest 
 o though thi hard heart say 
 noth kind someth piti 
 tamora i know mean away 
 lavinia o let teach thee for father sake 
 that gave thee life well might slain thee 
 be obdur open thi deaf ear 
 tamora hadst thou person ne er offend 
 even sake i pitiless 
 rememb boy i pour forth tear vain
 to save brother sacrific 
 but fierc andronicu would relent 
 therefor away use 
 the wors better lov 
 lavinia o tamora call gentl queen 
 and thine hand kill place 
 for ti life i begg long 
 poor i slain bassianu die 
 tamora what beg st thou fond woman let go 
 lavinia ti present death i beg one thing 
 that womanhood deni tongu tell 
 o keep wors kill lust 
 and tumbl loathsom pit 
 where never man eye may behold bodi 
 do charit murder 
 tamora so i rob sweet son fee 
 no let satisfi lust thee 
 demetriu away thou hast stay us long 
 lavinia no grace womanhood ah beastli creatur 
 the blot enemi gener name 
 confus fall 
 chiron nay i stop mouth bring thou husband 
 thi hole aaron bid us hide 

 demetriu throw body
 bassianu pit exeunt
 demetriu chiron drag lavinia

 tamora farewel son see make sure 
 ne er let heart know merri cheer indeed
 till andronici made away 
 now i henc seek love moor 
 and let spleen son trull deflow exit

 re enter aaron two
 titu son quintu martius

 aaron come lord better foot 
 straight i bring loathsom pit
 where i espi panther fast asleep 
 quintu my sight dull whate er bode 
 martiu and mine i promis shame 
 well could i leav sport sleep awhil 
 fall pit 
 quintu what art thou fallen what subtl hole 
 whose mouth cover rude grow brier 
 upon whose leav drop new shed blood
 as fresh morn dew distil flower 
 a fatal place seem 
 speak brother hast thou hurt thee fall 
 martiu o brother dismal st object hurt
 that ever eye sight made heart lament 
 aaron asid now i fetch king find 
 that therebi may like guess
 how made away brother exit
 martiu whi dost comfort help out
 from unhallow blood stain hole 
 quintu i surpris uncouth fear 
 a chill sweat er run trembl joint 
 my heart suspect mine eye see 
 martiu to prove thou hast true divin heart 
 aaron thou look den 
 and see fear sight blood death 
 quintu aaron gone compassion heart
 will permit mine eye behold
 the thing whereat trembl surmis 
 o tell ne er till now
 wa i child fear i know 
 martiu lord bassianu lie beray blood 
 all heap like slaughter lamb 
 in detest dark blood drink pit 
 quintu if dark dost thou know ti 
 martiu upon bloodi finger doth wear
 a preciou ring lighten hole 
 which like taper monument 
 doth shine upon dead man earthi cheek 
 and show rag entrail pit 
 so pale shine moon pyramus
 when night lay bath maiden blood 
 o brother help thi faint hand 
 if fear hath made thee faint hath 
 out fell devour receptacl 
 as hate cocytu misti mouth 
 quintu reach thi hand i may help thee 
 or want strength thee much good 
 i may pluck swallow womb
 of deep pit poor bassianu grave 
 i strength pluck thee brink 
 martiu nor i strength climb without thi help 
 quintu thi hand i loos 
 till thou art aloft i 
 thou canst come i come thee fall 

 enter emperor aaron moor

 saturninu along i see hole 
 and leapt 
 say art thou late didst descend
 into gape hollow earth 
 martiu the unhappi son old andronicu 
 brought hither unlucki hour 
 to find thi brother bassianu dead 
 saturninu my brother dead i know thou dost jest 
 he ladi lodge
 upon north side pleasant chase 
 ti hour sinc i left 
 martiu we know left aliv 
 but ala found dead 

 re enter tamora with
 attend titu andronicu lucius

 tamora where lord king 
 saturninu here tamora though griev kill grief 
 tamora where thi brother bassianu 
 saturninu now bottom dost thou search wound 
 poor bassianu lie murder 
 tamora then late i bring fatal writ 
 the complot timeless tragedi 
 and wonder greatli man face fold
 in pleas smile murder tyranni 
 she giveth saturnin letter 
 saturninu read an miss meet handsom 
 sweet huntsman bassianu ti mean 
 do thou much dig grave 
 thou know st mean look thi reward
 among nettl elder tree
 which overshad mouth pit
 where decre buri bassianu 
 do purchas us thi last friend 
 o tamora ever heard like 
 thi pit elder tree 
 look sir find huntsman out
 that murder bassianu 
 aaron my graciou lord bag gold 
 saturninu to titu two thi whelp fell cur bloody
 kind 
 have bereft brother life 
 sir drag pit unto prison 
 there let bide devi d
 some never heard tortur pain 
 tamora what pit o wondrou thing 
 how easili murder discov 
 titu high emperor upon feebl knee
 i beg boon tear lightli shed 
 that fell fault accurs son 
 accurs fault prov 
 saturninu if prov you see appar 
 who found letter tamora 
 tamora andronicu take 
 titu i lord yet let bail 
 for father reverend tomb i vow
 they shall readi high will
 to answer suspicion live 
 saturninu thou shalt bail see thou follow 
 some bring murder bodi murder 
 let speak word guilt plain 
 for soul wors end death 
 that end upon execut 
 tamora andronicu i entreat king 
 fear thi son shall well enough 
 titu come luciu come stay talk exeunt

scen iv anoth part forest

ent empress son demetriu chiron lavinia hands
cut tongu cut ravish d

 demetriu so go tell thi tongu speak 
 who twa cut thi tongu ravish thee 
 chiron write thi mind bewray thi mean 
 an thi stump let thee play scribe 
 demetriu see sign token scrowl 
 chiron go home call sweet water wash thi hand 
 demetriu she hath tongu call hand wash 
 and let leav silent walk 
 chiron an twere caus i go hang 
 demetriu if thou hadst hand help thee knit cord 
 exeunt demetriu chiron

 wind horn enter marcu hunting

 marcu who niec fli away fast 
 cousin word husband 
 if i dream would wealth would wake 
 if i wake planet strike 
 that i may slumber etern sleep 
 speak gentl niec what stern ungentl hands
 hath lopp hew made thi bodi bare
 of two branch sweet ornaments
 whose circl shadow king sought sleep 
 and might gain great happiness
 as half thi love whi dost speak 
 ala crimson river warm blood 
 like bubbl fountain stirr wind 
 doth rise fall thi rose lip 
 come go thi honey breath 
 but sure tereu hath deflow thee 
 and lest thou shouldst detect cut thi tongu 
 ah thou turn st away thi face shame 
 and notwithstand loss blood 
 as conduit three issu spout 
 yet thi cheek look red titan face
 blush encount red cloud 
 shall i speak thee shall i say ti 
 o i knew thi heart knew beast 
 that i might rail eas mind 
 sorrow conceal like oven stopp 
 doth burn heart cinder 
 fair philomel lost tongu 
 and tediou sampler sew mind 
 but love niec mean cut thee 
 a craftier tereu cousin hast thou met 
 and hath cut pretti finger off
 that could better sew philomel 
 o monster seen lili hands
 trembl like aspen leav upon lute
 and make silken string delight kiss 
 he would touch life 
 or heard heavenli harmony
 which sweet tongu hath made 
 he would dropp knife fell asleep 
 as cerberu thracian poet feet 
 come let us go make thi father blind 
 for sight blind father eye 
 one hour storm drown fragrant mead 
 what whole month tear thi father eye 
 do draw back mourn thee 
 o could mourn case thi miseri exeunt

act iii scene i rome a street

ent judg tribun senat titu two son martius
and quintu bound pass stage place execut and
titu go pleading

 titu hear grave father nobl tribun stay 
 for piti mine age whose youth spent
 in danger war whilst secur slept 
 for blood rome great quarrel shed 
 for frosti night i watch 
 and bitter tear see
 fill age wrinkl cheek 
 be piti condemn son 
 whose soul corrupt ti thought 
 for two twenti son i never wept 
 becaus die honour lofti bed 
 andronicu lieth judges
 pass prison exeunt 
 for tribun dust i write
 my heart deep languor soul sad tear 
 let tear stanch earth dri appetit 
 my son sweet blood make shame blush 
 o earth i befriend thee rain
 that shall distil two ancient urn 
 than youth april shall show rs 
 in summer drought i drop upon thee still 
 in winter warm tear i melt snow
 and keep etern spring time thi face 
 so thou refus drink dear son blood 

 enter luciu weapon drawn

 o reverend tribun o gentl age men 
 unbind son revers doom death 
 and let say never wept 
 my tear prevail orat 
 luciu o nobl father lament vain 
 the tribun hear man 
 and recount sorrow stone 
 titu ah luciu thi brother let plead 
 grave tribun i entreat 
 luciu my graciou lord tribun hear speak 
 titu whi ti matter man hear 
 they would mark mark 
 they would piti yet plead i must 
 and bootless unto 
 therefor i tell sorrow stone 
 who though can not answer distress 
 yet sort better tribun 
 for intercept tale 
 when i weep humbl feet
 receiv tear seem weep 
 and attir grave weed 
 rome could afford tribun like 
 a stone soft wax tribun hard stone 
 a stone silent offendeth 
 and tribun tongu doom men death 
 rise 
 but wherefor stand st thou thi weapon drawn 
 luciu to rescu two brother death 
 for attempt judg pronounc d
 my everlast doom banish 
 titu o happi man befriend thee 
 whi foolish luciu dost thou perceive
 that rome wilder tiger 
 tiger must prey rome afford prey
 but mine happi art thou then
 from devour banish 
 but come brother marcu 

 enter marcu lavinia

 marcu titu prepar thi age eye weep 
 or thi nobl heart break 
 i bring consum sorrow thine age 
 titu will consum let see 
 marcu thi thi daughter 
 titu whi marcu 
 luciu ay object kill 
 titu faint heart boy aris look upon 
 speak lavinia accurs hand
 hath made thee handless thi father sight 
 what fool hath ad water sea 
 or brought fagot bright burn troy 
 my grief height thou cam st 
 and like nilu disdaineth bound 
 give sword i chop hand 
 for fought rome vain 
 and nur woe feed life 
 in bootless prayer held 
 and serv effectless use 
 now servic i requir them
 is one help cut 
 ti well lavinia thou hast hand 
 for hand rome servic vain 
 luciu speak gentl sister hath martyr thee 
 marcu o delight engin thoughts
 that blabb pleas eloquence
 is torn forth pretti hollow cage 
 where like sweet melodi bird sung
 sweet vari note enchant everi ear 
 luciu o say thou hath done deed 
 marcu o thu i found stray park 
 seek hide doth deer
 that hath receiv unrecur wound 
 titu it dear wound her
 hath hurt kill dead 
 for i stand one upon rock 
 environ wilder sea 
 who mark wax tide grow wave wave 
 expect ever enviou surge
 will brinish bowel swallow 
 thi way death wretch son gone 
 here stand son banish man 
 and brother weep woe 
 but give soul greatest spurn
 is dear lavinia dearer soul 
 had i seen thi pictur plight 
 it would mad shall i do
 now i behold thi live bodi 
 thou hast hand wipe away thi tear 
 nor tongu tell hath martyr thee 
 thi husband dead death
 thi brother condemn dead 
 look marcu ah son luciu look 
 when i name brother fresh tears
 stood cheek doth honey dew
 upon gath red lili almost wither 
 marcu perchanc weep kill husband 
 perchanc know innoc 
 titu if kill thi husband joy 
 becaus law hath ta en reveng 
 no would foul deed 
 wit sorrow sister make 
 gentl lavinia let kiss thi lip 
 or make sign i may thee eas 
 shall thi good uncl thi brother lucius
 and thou i sit round fountain 
 look downward behold cheeks
 how stain like meadow yet dry
 with miri slime left flood 
 and fountain shall gaze long 
 till fresh tast taken clear 
 and made brine pit bitter tear 
 or shall cut away hand like thine 
 or shall bite tongu dumb shows
 pass remaind hate day 
 what shall let us tongues
 plot devic misery
 to make us wonder time come 
 luciu sweet father ceas tear grief
 see wretch sister sob weep 
 marcu patienc dear niec good titu dri thine eye 
 titu ah marcu marcu brother well i wot
 thi napkin can not drink tear mine 
 for thou poor man hast drown thine 
 luciu ah lavinia i wipe thi cheek 
 titu mark marcu mark i understand sign 
 had tongu speak would say
 that brother i said thee 
 hi napkin true tear bewet 
 can servic sorrow cheek 
 o sympathi woe this
 as far help limbo bliss 

 enter aaron moor

 aaron titu andronicu lord emperor
 send thee word thou love thi son 
 let marcu luciu thyself old titu 
 or one chop hand
 and send king same
 will send thee hither thi son aliv 
 and shall ransom fault 
 titu o graciou emperor o gentl aaron 
 did ever raven sing like lark
 that give sweet tide sun upris 
 with heart i send emperor hand 
 good aaron wilt thou help chop 
 luciu stay father nobl hand thine 
 that hath thrown mani enemi 
 shall sent my hand serv turn 
 my youth better spare blood 
 and therefor mine shall save brother live 
 marcu which hand hath defend rome
 and rear aloft bloodi battl axe 
 write destruct enemi castl 
 o none high desert 
 my hand hath idl let serve
 to ransom two nephew death 
 then i kept worthi end 
 aaron nay come agre whose hand shall go along 
 for fear die pardon come 
 marcu my hand shall go 
 luciu by heaven shall go 
 titu sir strive red herb these
 are meet pluck therefor mine 
 luciu sweet father i shall thought thi son 
 let redeem brother death 
 marcu and father sake mother care 
 now let show brother love thee 
 titu agre i spare hand 
 luciu then i go fetch axe 
 marcu but i use axe 
 exeunt luciu marcus
 titu come hither aaron i deceiv 
 lend thi hand i give thee mine 
 aaron asid if call deceit i honest 
 and never whilst i live deceiv men 
 but i deceiv anoth sort 
 and say ere half hour pass 
 he cut titu hand 

 re enter luciu marcus

 titu now stay strife what shall dispatch 
 good aaron give majesti hand 
 tell hand ward him
 from thousand danger bid buri 
 more hath merit let 
 as son say i account them
 as jewel purcha easi price 
 and yet dear i bought mine 
 aaron i go andronicu thi hand
 look thi son thee 
 asid their head i mean o villainy
 doth fat thought 
 let fool good fair men call grace 
 aaron soul black like face exit
 titu o i lift one hand heaven 
 and bow feebl ruin earth 
 if power piti wretch tear 
 to i call to lavinia what would st thou kneel 
 do dear heart heaven shall hear prayer 
 or sigh breath welkin dim
 and stain sun fog sometim clouds
 when hug melt bosom 
 marcu o brother speak possibl 
 and break deep extrem 
 titu is sorrow deep bottom 
 then passion bottomless 
 marcu but yet let reason govern thi lament 
 titu if reason miseri 
 then limit could i bind woe 
 when heaven doth weep doth earth erflow 
 if wind rage doth sea wax mad 
 threat ning welkin big swol n face 
 and wilt thou reason coil 
 i sea hark sigh blow 
 she weep welkin i earth 
 then must sea move sigh 
 then must earth continu tears
 becom delug overflow drown 
 for bowel can not hide woe 
 but like drunkard must i vomit 
 then give leav loser leave
 to eas stomach bitter tongu 

 enter messeng two head hand

 messeng worthi andronicu ill art thou repaid
 for good hand thou sent st emperor 
 here head thi two nobl son 
 and thi hand scorn thee sent back 
 thi grief sport thi resolut mock 
 that woe think upon thi woe 
 more remembr father death exit
 marcu now let hot aetna cool sicili 
 and heart ever burn hell 
 these miseri may born 
 to weep weep doth eas deal 
 but sorrow flout doubl death 
 luciu ah sight make deep wound 
 and yet detest life shrink thereat 
 that ever death let life bear name 
 where life hath interest breath 
 lavinia kiss titu 
 marcu ala poor heart kiss comfortless
 as frozen water starv snake 
 titu when fear slumber end 
 marcu now farewel flatt ry die andronicu 
 thou dost slumber see thi two son head 
 thi warlik hand thi mangl daughter 
 thi banish son dear sight
 struck pale bloodless thi brother i 
 even like stoni imag cold numb 
 ah i control thi grief 
 rent thi silver hair thi hand
 gnaw thi teeth dismal sight
 the close wretch eye 
 now time storm art thou still 
 titu ha ha ha 
 marcu whi dost thou laugh it fit hour 
 titu whi i anoth tear shed 
 besid sorrow enemi 
 and would usurp upon wat ry eyes
 and make blind tributari tear 
 then way shall i find reveng cave 
 for two head seem speak 
 and threat i shall never come bliss
 till mischief return again
 even throat commit 
 come let see task i 
 you heavi peopl circl 
 that i may turn one you
 and swear unto soul right wrong 
 the vow made come brother take head 
 and hand i bear 
 and lavinia thou shalt employ 
 bear thou hand sweet wench thi teeth 
 as thee boy go get thee sight 
 thou art exil thou must stay 
 hie goth rais armi 
 and ye love i think 
 let kiss part much 
 exeunt lucius
 luciu farewel andronicu nobl father 
 the woeful st man ever liv rome 
 farewel proud rome till luciu come 
 he leav pledg dearer life 
 farewel lavinia nobl sister 
 o would thou wert thou tofor hast 
 but luciu lavinia lives
 but oblivion hate grief 
 if luciu live requit wrongs
 and make proud saturnin emperess
 beg gate like tarquin queen 
 now i goth rais pow r
 to reveng rome saturnin exit

scen ii rome titu house

a banquet 

enter titu marcu lavinia boy young lucius

 titu so sit look eat more
 than preserv much strength us
 as reveng bitter woe 
 marcu unknit sorrow wreathen knot 
 thi niec i poor creatur want hand 
 and can not passion tenfold grief
 with fold arm thi poor right hand mine
 is left tyrann upon breast 
 who heart mad miseri 
 beat hollow prison flesh 
 then thu i thump 
 to lavinia thou map woe thu dost talk sign 
 when thi poor heart beat outrag beat 
 thou canst strike thu make still 
 wound sigh girl kill groan 
 or get littl knife thi teeth
 and thi heart make thou hole 
 that tear thi poor eye let fall
 may run sink soak 
 drown lament fool sea salt tear 
 marcu fie brother fie teach thu lay
 such violent hand upon tender life 
 titu how ha sorrow made thee dote alreadi 
 whi marcu man mad i 
 what violent hand lay life 
 ah wherefor dost thou urg name hand 
 to bid aenea tell tale twice er
 how troy burnt made miser 
 o handl theme talk hand 
 lest rememb still none 
 fie fie franticli i squar talk 
 as forget hand 
 if marcu name word hand 
 come let fall gentl girl eat 
 here drink hark marcu say 
 i interpret martyr sign 
 she say drink drink tear 
 brew sorrow mesh upon cheek 
 speechless complain i learn thi thought 
 in thi dumb action i perfect
 as beg hermit holi prayer 
 thou shalt sigh hold thi stump heaven 
 nor wink nod kneel make sign 
 but i wrest alphabet 
 and still practic learn know thi mean 
 boy good grandsir leav bitter deep lament 
 make aunt merri pleas tale 
 marcu ala tender boy passion mov 
 doth weep see grandsir heavi 
 titu peac tender sapl thou art made tear 
 and tear quickli melt thi life away 
 marcu strike dish knife 
 what dost thou strike marcu thi knife 
 marcu at i kill lord fli 
 titu out thee murder thou kill st heart 
 mine eye cloy view tyranni 
 a deed death done innocent
 becom titu brother get thee gone 
 i see thou art compani 
 marcu ala lord i kill fli 
 titu but how fli father mother 
 how would hang slender gild wings
 and buzz lament do air 
 poor harmless fli 
 that pretti buzz melody
 came make us merri and thou hast kill 
 marcu pardon sir black ill favour fli 
 like empress moor therefor i kill 
 titu o o o 
 then pardon reprehend thee 
 for thou hast done charit deed 
 give thi knife i insult 
 flatter moor
 come hither purpos poison 
 there thyself tamora 
 ah sirrah 
 yet i think brought low
 but us kill fly
 that come like coal black moor 
 marcu ala poor man grief wrought 
 he take fals shadow true substanc 
 titu come take away lavinia go 
 i thi closet go read thee
 sad stori chanc time old 
 come boy go thi sight young 
 and thou shalt read mine begin dazzl exeunt

act iv scene i rome titu garden

ent young luciu lavinia run boy flies
from book arm 

enter titu marcus

 boy help grandsir help aunt lavinia
 follow everywher i know 
 good uncl marcu see swift come 
 ala sweet aunt i know mean 
 marcu stand luciu fear thine aunt 
 titu she love thee boy well thee harm 
 boy ay father rome 
 marcu what mean niec lavinia sign 
 titu fear luciu somewhat doth mean 
 see luciu see much make thee 
 somewhith would thee go 
 ah boy cornelia never care
 read son hath read thee
 sweet poetri tulli orat 
 marcu canst thou guess wherefor pli thee thu 
 boy my lord i know i i guess 
 unless fit frenzi possess 
 for i heard grandsir say full oft
 extrem grief would make men mad 
 and i read hecuba troy
 ran mad sorrow that made fear 
 although lord i know nobl aunt
 love dear e er mother 
 and would furi fright youth 
 which made throw book fli 
 causeless perhap but pardon sweet aunt 
 and madam uncl marcu go 
 i willingli attend ladyship 
 marcu luciu i lavinia turn her
 stump book luciu let fall 
 titu how lavinia marcu mean 
 some book desir see 
 which girl open boy 
 but thou art deeper read better skill 
 come take choic librari 
 and beguil thi sorrow till heavens
 reveal damn contriv deed 
 whi lift arm sequenc thu 
 marcu i think mean one
 confeder fact ay 
 or els heaven heav reveng 
 titu luciu book tosseth 
 boy grandsir ti ovid metamorphos 
 my mother gave 
 marcu for love gone 
 perhap cull among rest 
 titu soft so busili turn leav help 
 what would find lavinia shall i read 
 thi tragic tale philomel
 and treat tereu treason rape 
 and rape i fear root thi annoy 
 marcu see brother see note quot leav 
 titu lavinia wert thou thu surpri sweet girl 
 ravish wrong philomela 
 forc ruthless vast gloomi wood 
 see see 
 ay place hunt 
 o never never hunt 
 pattern poet describ 
 by natur made murder rape 
 marcu o natur build foul den 
 unless god delight tragedi 
 titu give sign sweet girl none friend 
 what roman lord durst deed 
 or slunk saturnin tarquin erst 
 that left camp sin lucrec bed 
 marcu sit sweet niec brother sit 
 apollo palla jove mercuri 
 inspir i may treason find 
 my lord look look lavinia 
 he write name his
 staff guid feet mouth 
 thi sandi plot plain guid thou canst 
 thi i writ name
 without help hand 
 cur heart forc us shift 
 write thou good niec display last
 what god discov reveng 
 heaven guid thi pen print thi sorrow plain 
 that may know traitor truth 
 she take staff mouth
 guid stump write 
 o ye read lord hath writ 
 titu stuprum chiron demetriu 
 marcu what lust son tamora
 perform heinou bloodi deed 
 titu magni domin poli 
 tam lentu audi scelera tam lentu vide 
 marcu o calm thee gentl lord although i know
 there enough written upon earth
 to stir mutini mildest thought 
 and arm mind infant exclaim 
 my lord kneel lavinia kneel 
 and kneel sweet boy roman hector hope 
 and swear woeful fere
 and father chast dishonour dame 
 lord juniu brutu sware lucrec rape 
 that prosecut good advic 
 mortal reveng upon traitor goth 
 and see blood die reproach 
 titu ti sure enough knew 
 but hunt bear whelp bewar 
 the dam wake wind ye 
 she lion deepli still leagu 
 and lull whilst playeth back 
 and sleep list 
 you young huntsman marcu let alon 
 and come i go get leaf brass 
 and gad steel write word 
 and lay the angri northern wind
 will blow sand like sibyl leav abroad 
 and lesson boy say 
 boy i say lord i man
 their mother bedchamb safe
 for base bondmen yoke rome 
 marcu ay boy thi father hath full oft
 for ungrat countri done like 
 boy and uncl i i live 
 titu come go mine armouri 
 luciu i fit thee withal boy
 shall carri empress sons
 present i intend send 
 come come thou lt messag wilt thou 
 boy ay dagger bosom grandsir 
 titu no boy i teach thee anoth cours 
 lavinia come marcu look hous 
 luciu i go brave court 
 ay marri sir wait 
 exeunt titu lavinia young lucius
 marcu o heaven hear good man groan
 and relent compass 
 marcu attend ecstasi 
 that hath scar sorrow heart
 than foemen mark upon batt red shield 
 but yet reveng 
 reveng heaven old andronicu exit

scen ii rome the palace

ent aaron demetriu chiron one door door 
young luciu anoth bundl weapon vers writ upon
them

 chiron demetriu son luciu 
 he hath messag deliv us 
 aaron ay mad messag mad grandfath 
 boy my lord humbl i may 
 i greet honour andronicu 
 asid and pray roman god confound 
 demetriu gramerci love luciu what news 
 boy asid that deciph news 
 for villain mark rape may pleas 
 my grandsir well advi hath sent me
 the goodliest weapon armoury
 to gratifi honour youth 
 the hope rome bid say 
 and i gift present
 your lordship whenev need 
 you may arm appoint well 
 and i leav asid like bloodi villain 
 exeunt young luciu attendant
 demetriu what a scroll written round 
 let see 
 read integ vita scelerisqu puru 
 non eget mauri iaculi nec arcu 
 chiron o ti vers horac i know well 
 i read grammar long ago 
 aaron ay vers horac right 
 asid now thing ass 
 here sound jest the old man hath found guilt 
 and send weapon wrapp lines
 that wound beyond feel quick 
 but witti empress well afoot 
 she would applaud andronicu conceit 
 but let rest unrest awhil 
 and young lord happi star
 led us rome stranger 
 captiv advanc height 
 it good palac gate
 to brave tribun brother hear 
 demetriu but good see great lord
 base insinu send us gift 
 aaron had reason lord demetriu 
 did use daughter friendli 
 demetriu i would thousand roman dames
 at bay turn serv lust 
 chiron a charit wish full love 
 aaron here lack mother say amen 
 chiron and would twenti thousand 
 demetriu come let us go pray gods
 for belov mother pain 
 aaron asid pray devil god given us 
 trumpet sound 
 demetriu whi emperor trumpet flourish thu 
 chiron belik joy emperor hath son 
 demetriu soft come 

 enter nurs blackamoor child

 nurs good morrow lord 
 o tell see aaron moor 
 aaron well less ne er whit 
 here aaron aaron 
 nurs o gentl aaron undon 
 now help woe betid thee evermor 
 aaron whi caterwaul dost thou keep 
 what dost thou wrap fumbl thi arm 
 nurs o i would hide heaven eye 
 our empress shame state rome disgrac 
 she deliv lord deliv 
 aaron to 
 nurs i mean brought bed 
 aaron well god give good rest what hath sent 
 nurs a devil 
 aaron whi devil dam 
 a joy issu 
 nurs a joyless dismal black sorrow issu 
 here babe loathsom toad
 amongst fair fac breeder clime 
 the empress send thee thi stamp thi seal 
 and bid thee christen thi dagger point 
 aaron zound ye whore is black base hue 
 sweet blows beauteou blossom sure 
 demetriu villain hast thou done 
 aaron that thou canst undo 
 chiron thou hast undon mother 
 aaron villain i done thi mother 
 demetriu and therein hellish dog thou hast undon 
 woe chanc damn loath choic 
 accur offspr foul fiend 
 chiron it shall live 
 aaron it shall die 
 nurs aaron must mother will 
 aaron what must nurs then let man i
 do execut flesh blood 
 demetriu i broach tadpol rapier point 
 nurs give sword shall soon dispatch 
 aaron sooner sword shall plough thi bowel 
 take child nurs draw 
 stay murder villain kill brother 
 now burn taper sky
 that shone brightli boy got 
 he die upon scimitar sharp point
 that touch first born son heir 
 i tell youngl enceladu 
 with threat ning band typhon brood 
 nor great alcid god war 
 shall seiz prey father hand 
 what ye sanguin shallow heart boy 
 ye white lim wall ye alehous paint sign 
 coal black better anoth hue
 in scorn bear anoth hue 
 for water ocean
 can never turn swan black leg white 
 although lave hourli flood 
 tell empress i age
 to keep mine excus 
 demetriu wilt thou betray thi nobl mistress thu 
 aaron my mistress mistress self 
 the vigour pictur youth 
 thi world i prefer 
 thi maugr world i keep safe 
 or shall smoke rome 
 demetriu by mother ever sham 
 chiron rome despis foul escap 
 nurs the emperor rage doom death 
 chiron i blush think upon ignomi 
 aaron whi privileg beauti bear 
 fie treacher hue betray blushing
 the close enact counsel thi heart 
 here young lad fram anoth leer 
 look black slave smile upon father 
 as say old lad i thine 
 he brother lord sensibl fed
 of self blood first gave life 
 and womb imprison were
 he enfranchis come light 
 nay brother surer side 
 although seal stamp face 
 nurs aaron shall i say unto empress 
 demetriu advis thee aaron done 
 and subscrib thi advic 
 save thou child may safe 
 aaron then sit let us consult 
 my son i wind 
 keep talk pleasur safeti 
 they sit 
 demetriu how mani women saw child 
 aaron whi brave lord when join league
 i lamb brave moor 
 the chafe boar mountain lioness 
 the ocean swell aaron storm 
 but say mani saw child 
 nurs cornelia midwif 
 and one els deliv empress 
 aaron the emperess midwif 
 two may keep counsel third away 
 go empress tell i said he kill 
 week week 
 so cri pig prepar spit 
 demetriu what mean st thou aaron wherefor didst thou 
 aaron o lord sir ti deed polici 
 shall live betray guilt 
 a long tongu babbl gossip no lord 
 and known full intent 
 not far one muliteu countryman 
 hi wife yesternight brought bed 
 hi child like fair 
 go pack give mother gold 
 and tell circumst 
 and child shall advanc 
 and receiv emperor heir
 and substitut place mine 
 to calm tempest whirl court 
 and let emperor dandl 
 hark ye lord you see i given physic 
 point nurs 
 and must need bestow funer 
 the field near gallant groom 
 thi done see take longer day 
 but send midwif present 
 the midwif nurs well made away 
 then let ladi tattl pleas 
 chiron aaron i see thou wilt trust air
 with secret 
 demetriu for care tamora 
 herself highli bound thee 

 exeunt demetriu chiron bear dead nurse

 aaron now goth swift swallow fli 
 there dispos treasur mine arm 
 and secretli greet empress friend 
 come thick lipp slave i bear henc 
 for put us shift 
 i make feed berri root 
 and feed curd whey suck goat 
 and cabin cave bring up
 to warrior command camp 
 exit child

scen iii rome a public place

ent titu bear arrow letter end him
marcu young luciu gentlemen publiu semproniu and
caiu bows

 titu come marcu come kinsmen way 
 sir boy let see archeri 
 look ye draw home enough ti straight 
 terra astrea reliquit 
 be rememb red marcu gone fled 
 sir take tool you cousin shall
 go sound ocean cast net 
 happili may catch sea 
 yet littl justic land 
 no publiu semproniu must 
 ti must dig mattock spade 
 and pierc inmost centr earth 
 then come pluto region 
 i pray deliv petit 
 tell justic aid 
 and come old andronicu 
 shaken sorrow ungrat rome 
 ah rome well well i made thee miserable
 what time i threw peopl suffrages
 on thu doth tyrann er 
 go get gone pray care 
 and leav man war unsearch 
 thi wick emperor may shipp henc 
 and kinsmen may go pipe justic 
 marcu o publiu heavi case 
 to see thi nobl uncl thu distract 
 publiu therefor lord highli us concerns
 by day night attend care 
 and feed humour kindli may
 till time beget care remedi 
 marcu kinsmen sorrow past remedi 
 join goth reveng war
 take wreak rome ingratitud 
 and vengeanc traitor saturnin 
 titu publiu how master 
 what met 
 publiu no good lord pluto send word 
 if reveng hell shall 
 marri justic employ 
 he think jove heaven somewher els 
 so perforc must need stay time 
 titu he doth wrong feed delay 
 i dive burn lake below
 and pull acheron heel 
 marcu shrub cedar 
 no big bon men fram cyclop size 
 but metal marcu steel back 
 yet wrung wrong back bear 
 and sith justic earth hell 
 we solicit heaven move gods
 to send justic wreak wrong 
 come gear you good archer marcu 
 he give arrow 
 ad jovem ad apollinem 
 ad martem 
 here boy to palla to mercuri 
 to saturn caiu saturnin 
 you good shoot wind 
 to boy marcu loos i bid 
 of word i written effect 
 there god left unsolicit 
 marcu kinsmen shoot shaft court 
 we afflict emperor pride 
 titu now master draw they shoot o well said luciu 
 good boy virgo lap give palla 
 marcu my lord i aim mile beyond moon 
 your letter jupit 
 titu ha ha 
 publiu publiu hast thou done 
 see see thou hast shot one tauru horn 
 marcu thi sport lord publiu shot 
 the bull gall gave ari knock
 that fell ram horn court 
 and find empress villain 
 she laugh told moor choose
 but give master present 
 titu whi goe god give lordship joy 

 enter clown basket two pigeon it

 new news heaven marcu post come 
 sirrah tide have letter 
 shall i justic what say jupit 
 clown ho gibbet maker he say hath taken down
 man must hang till next week 
 titu but say jupit i ask thee 
 clown ala sir i know jupit i never drank all
 life 
 titu whi villain art thou carrier 
 clown ay pigeon sir noth els 
 titu whi didst thou come heaven 
 clown from heaven ala sir i never came god forbid i
 bold press heaven young day whi i am
 go pigeon tribun pleb take matter
 brawl betwixt uncl one emper men 
 marcu whi sir fit serv your
 orat let deliv pigeon emperor 
 titu tell deliv orat emperor a
 grace 
 clown nay truli sir i could never say grace life 
 titu sirrah come hither make ado 
 but give pigeon emperor 
 by thou shalt justic hand 
 hold hold meanwhil money thi charg 
 give pen ink sirrah grace deliv a
 supplic 
 clown ay sir 
 titu then supplic and come to
 first approach must kneel kiss foot 
 deliv pigeon look reward i ll
 hand sir see brave 
 clown i warrant sir let alon 
 titu sirrah hast thou knife come let see 
 here marcu fold orat 
 for thou hast made like humbl suppliant 
 and thou hast given emperor 
 knock door tell say 
 clown god sir i 
 titu come marcu let us go publiu follow exeunt

scen iv rome befor palace

ent emperor empress two son demetriu and
chiron lord other the emperor bring arrow hand
that titu shot him

 saturninu whi lord wrong wa ever seen
 an emperor rome thu overborn 
 troubl confront thu extent
 of egal justic us contempt 
 my lord know know might god 
 howev disturb peace
 buzz peopl ear nought hath pass d
 but even law wil sons
 of old andronicu and if
 hi sorrow overwhelm wit 
 shall thu afflict wreak 
 hi fit frenzi bitter 
 and write heaven redress 
 see to jove to mercuri 
 thi to apollo to god war 
 sweet scroll fli street rome 
 what libel senat 
 and blazon unjustic everi 
 a goodli humour lord 
 as would say rome justic 
 but i live feign ecstasies
 shall shelter outrag 
 but shall know justic lives
 in saturninu health sleep 
 he awak furi shall
 cut proud st conspir live 
 tamora my graciou lord love saturnin 
 lord life command thought 
 calm thee bear fault titu age 
 th effect sorrow valiant sons
 whose loss hath pierc deep scarr heart 
 and rather comfort distress plight
 than prosecut meanest best
 for contempt asid whi thu shall become
 high wit tamora gloze 
 but titu i touch thee quick 
 thi life blood aaron wise 
 then safe anchor port 

 enter clown

 how good fellow wouldst thou speak us 
 clown ye forsooth mistriship emperi 
 tamora empress i yonder sit emperor 
 clown ti god saint stephen give godden i have
 brought letter coupl pigeon 
 saturninu read letter 
 saturninu go take away hang present 
 clown how much money must i 
 tamora come sirrah must hang 
 clown hang r ladi i brought neck fair
 end exit guard 
 saturninu despit intoler wrong 
 shall i endur monstrou villaini 
 i know whenc devic proce 
 may born traitor sons
 that die law murder brother
 have mean butcher wrong 
 go drag villain hither hair 
 nor age honour shall shape privileg 
 for proud mock i thi slaughterman 
 sli frantic wretch holp st make great 
 in hope thyself govern rome 

 enter nuntiu aemilius

 what news thee aemiliu 
 aemiliu arm lord rome never caus 
 the goth gather head power
 of high resolv men bent spoil 
 they hither march amain conduct
 of luciu son old andronicu 
 who threat cours reveng do
 as much ever coriolanu 
 saturninu is warlik luciu gener goth 
 these tide nip i hang head
 as flower frost grass beat storm 
 ay begin sorrow approach 
 ti common peopl love much 
 myself hath often heard say 
 when i walk like privat man 
 that luciu banish wrong 
 and wish luciu emperor 
 tamora whi fear is citi strong 
 saturninu ay citizen favour luciu 
 and revolt succour 
 tamora king thi thought imperi like thi name 
 is sun dimm gnat fli 
 the eagl suffer littl bird sing 
 and care mean therebi 
 know shadow wings
 he pleasur stint melodi 
 even mayest thou giddi men rome 
 then cheer thi spirit know thou emperor 
 i enchant old andronicus
 with word sweet yet danger 
 than bait fish honey stalk sheep 
 when one wound bait 
 the rot delici feed 
 saturninu but entreat son us 
 tamora if tamora entreat 
 for i smooth fill age ears
 with golden promis heart
 almost impregn old ear deaf 
 yet ear heart obey tongu 
 to aemiliu go thou ambassador 
 say emperor request parley
 of warlik luciu appoint meeting
 even father hous old andronicu 
 saturninu aemiliu messag honour 
 and stand hostag safeti 
 bid demand pledg pleas best 
 aemiliu your bid shall i effectu exit
 tamora now i old andronicu 
 and temper art i 
 to pluck proud luciu warlik goth 
 and sweet emperor blith 
 and buri thi fear devic 
 saturninu then go successantli plead 
 exeunt

act v scene i plain near rome

ent luciu armi goth drum colours

 luciu approv warrior faith friend 
 i receiv letter great rome
 which signifi hate bear emperor
 and desir sight 
 therefor great lord titl wit 
 imperi impati wrong 
 and wherein rome hath done scath 
 let make trebl satisfact 
 first goth brave slip sprung great andronicu 
 whose name terror comfort 
 whose high exploit honour deeds
 ingrat rome requit foul contempt 
 be bold us follow thou lead st 
 like sting bee hottest summer day 
 led master flow red field 
 and aveng curs tamora 
 all the goth and saith say 
 luciu i humbl thank i thank 
 but come led lusti goth 

 enter goth lead aaron child arms

 second goth renown luciu troop i stray d
 to gaze upon ruinou monasteri 
 and i earnestli fix mine eye
 upon wast build suddenly
 i heard child cri underneath wall 
 i made unto nois soon i heard
 the cri babe control discours 
 peac tawni slave half half thi dam 
 did thi hue bewray whose brat thou art 
 had natur lent thee thi mother look 
 villain thou mightst emperor 
 but bull cow milk white 
 they never beget coal black calf
