 peac villain peac even thu rate babe 
 for i must bear thee trusti goth 
 who know thou art empress babe 
 will hold thee dearli thi mother sake 
 with weapon drawn i rush upon 
 surpri suddenli brought hither
 to use think need man 
 luciu o worthi goth incarn devil
 that robb andronicu good hand 
 thi pearl plea empress eye 
 and base fruit burn lust 
 say wall ey slave whither wouldst thou convey
 thi grow imag thi fiend like face 
 whi dost speak what deaf not word 
 a halter soldier hang tree 
 and side fruit bastardi 
 aaron touch boy royal blood 
 luciu too like sire ever good 
 first hang child may see sprawl 
 a sight vex father soul withal 
 get ladder 
 a ladder brought aaron made climb 
 aaron luciu save child 
 and bear emperess 
 if thou i show thee wondrou things
 that highli may advantag thee hear 
 if thou wilt befal may befal 
 i speak vengeanc rot 
 luciu say pleas thou speak st 
 thi child shall live i see nourish 
 aaron an pleas thee whi assur thee luciu 
 twill vex thi soul hear i shall speak 
 for i must talk murder rape massacr 
 act black night abomin deed 
 complot mischief treason villaini 
 ruth hear yet piteous perform 
 and shall buri death 
 unless thou swear child shall live 
 luciu tell thi mind i say thi child shall live 
 aaron swear shall i begin 
 luciu who i swear thou believest god 
 that grant canst thou believ oath 
 aaron what i inde i 
 yet i know thou art religious
 and hast thing within thee call conscienc 
 with twenti popish trick ceremonies
 which i seen thee care observ 
 therefor i urg thi oath for i know
 an idiot hold baubl god 
 and keep oath god swear 
 to i urg therefor thou shalt vow
 by god god soe er be
 that thou adorest hast rever 
 to save boy nourish bring 
 or els i discov nought thee 
 luciu even god i swear thee i 
 aaron first know thou i begot empress 
 luciu o insati luxuri woman 
 aaron tut luciu deed charity
 to thou shalt hear anon 
 twa two son murder bassianu 
 they cut thi sister tongu ravish 
 and cut hand trimm thou sawest 
 luciu o detest villain call st thou trim 
 aaron whi wash cut trimm twas
 trim sport 
 luciu o barbar beastli villain like thyself 
 aaron inde i tutor instruct 
 that cod spirit mother 
 as sure card ever set 
 that bloodi mind i think learn 
 as true dog ever fought head 
 well let deed wit worth 
 i train thi brethren guil hole
 where dead corps bassianu lay 
 i wrote letter thi father found 
 and hid gold within letter mention 
 confeder queen two son 
 and done thou hast caus rue 
 wherein i stroke mischief 
 i play cheater thi father hand 
 and i drew apart
 and almost broke heart extrem laughter 
 i pri crevic wall 
 when hand two son head 
 beheld tear laugh heartily
 that mine eye raini like 
 and i told empress sport 
 she swoon almost pleas tale 
 and tide gave twenti kiss 
 goth what canst thou say never blush 
 aaron ay like black dog say 
 luciu art thou sorri heinou deed 
 aaron ay i done thousand 
 even i curs day yet i think 
 few come within compass curs 
 wherein i notori ill 
 as kill man els devis death 
 ravish maid plot way 
 accus innoc forswear 
 set deadli enmiti two friend 
 make poor men cattl break neck 
 set fire barn hay stack night 
 and bid owner quench tear 
 oft i digg dead men grave 
 and set upright dear friend door
 even sorrow almost forgot 
 and skin bark tree 
 have knife carv roman letters
 let sorrow die though i dead 
 tut i done thousand dread things
 as willingli one would kill fli 
 and noth griev heartili indeed
 but i can not ten thousand 
 luciu bring devil must die
 so sweet death hang present 
 aaron if devil would i devil 
 to live burn everlast fire 
 so i might compani hell
 but torment bitter tongu 
 luciu sir stop mouth let speak 

 enter aemilius

 goth my lord messeng rome
 desir admit presenc 
 luciu let come near 
 welcom aemiliu what news rome 
 aemiliu lord luciu princ goth 
 the roman emperor greet 
 and understand arm 
 he crave parley father hous 
 will demand hostag 
 and shall immedi deliv 
 first goth what say gener 
 luciu aemiliu let emperor give pledges
 unto father uncl marcu 
 and come march away exeunt

scen ii rome befor titu house

ent tamora two son demetriu chiron disguised

 tamora thu strang sad habili 
 i encount andronicu 
 and say i reveng sent below
 to join right heinou wrong 
 knock studi say keeps
 to rumin strang plot dire reveng 
 tell reveng come join 
 and work confus enemi 

 they knock titu open studi door above

 titu who doth molest contempl 
 is trick make ope door 
 that sad decre may fli away
 and studi effect 
 you deceiv i mean do
 see bloodi line i set 
 and written shall execut 
 tamora titu i come talk thee 
 titu no word how i grace talk 
 want hand give accord 
 thou hast odd therefor 
 tamora if thou didst know thou wouldst talk 
 titu i mad i know thee well enough 
 wit wretch stump wit crimson line 
 wit trench made grief care 
 wit tire day heavi night 
 wit sorrow i know thee well
 for proud empress mighti tamora 
 is thi come hand 
 tamora know thou sad man i tamora 
 she thi enemi i thi friend 
 i reveng sent th infern kingdom
 to eas gnaw vultur thi mind
 by work wreak vengeanc thi foe 
 come welcom world light 
 confer murder death 
 there hollow cave lurk place 
 no vast obscur misti vale 
 where bloodi murder detest rape
 can couch fear i find 
 and ear tell dread name 
 reveng make foul offend quak 
 titu art thou reveng art thou sent me
 to torment mine enemi 
 tamora i therefor come welcom 
 titu do servic ere i come thee 
 lo thi side rape murder stand 
 now give suranc thou art reveng 
 stab tear thi chariot wheel 
 and i come thi waggoner
 and whirl along thee globe 
 provid thee two proper palfrey black jet 
 to hale thi veng waggon swift away 
 and find murder guilti cave 
 and thi car loaden head 
 i dismount thi waggon wheel
 trot like servil footman day long 
 even hyperion rise east
 until downfal sea 
 and day day i heavi task 
 so thou destroy rapin murder 
 tamora these minist come 
 titu are thi minist what call 
 tamora rape murder therefor call so
 caus take vengeanc kind men 
 titu good lord like empress son 
 and empress but worldli men
 have miser mad mistak eye 
 o sweet reveng i come thee 
 and one arm embrac content thee 
 i embrac thee 
 tamora thi close fit lunaci 
 whate er i forg feed brain sick humour 
 do uphold maintain speech 
 for firmli take reveng 
 and credul mad thought 
 i make send luciu son 
 and whilst i banquet hold sure 
 i find cun practic hand
 to scatter dispers giddi goth 
 or least make enemi 
 see come i must pli theme 

 enter titu below

 titu long i forlorn thee 
 welcom dread furi woeful hous 
 rapin murder welcom 
 how like empress son 
 well fit moor 
 could hell afford devil 
 for well i wot empress never wags
 but compani moor 
 and would repres queen aright 
 it conveni devil 
 but welcom what shall 
 tamora what wouldst thou us andronicu 
 demetriu show murder i deal 
 chiron show villain hath done rape 
 and i sent reveng 
 tamora show thousand hath done thee wrong 
 and i reveng 
 titu look round wick street rome 
 and thou find st man like thyself 
 good murder stab murder 
 go thou thi hap
 to find anoth like thee 
 good rapin stab ravish 
 go thou emperor court
 there queen attend moor 
 well shalt thou know thine proport 
 for doth resembl thee 
 i pray thee violent death 
 they violent mine 
 tamora well hast thou lesson us shall 
 but would pleas thee good andronicu 
 to send luciu thi thrice valiant son 
 who lead toward rome band warlik goth 
 and bid come banquet thi hous 
 when even thi solemn feast 
 i bring empress son 
 the emperor thi foe 
 and thi merci shall stoop kneel 
 and shalt thou eas thi angri heart 
 what say andronicu devic 
 titu marcu brother ti sad titu call 

 enter marcus

 go gentl marcu thi nephew luciu 
 thou shalt inquir among goth 
 bid repair bring him
 some chiefest princ goth 
 bid encamp soldier 
 tell emperor empress too
 feast hous shall feast 
 thi thou love let 
 as regard age father life 
 marcu thi i soon return exit
 tamora now i henc thi busi 
 and take minist along 
 titu nay nay let rape murder stay 
 or els i call brother back 
 and cleav reveng luciu 
 tamora asid son what say boy will abide
 
 while i go tell lord emperor
 how i govern determin jest 
 yield humour smooth speak fair 
 and tarri till i turn 
 titu asid i knew though suppo mad 
 and er reach devic 
 a pair curs hell hound dam 
 demetriu madam depart pleasur leav us 
 tamora farewel andronicu reveng goes
 to lay complot betray thi foe 
 titu i know thou dost sweet reveng farewel 
 exit tamora
 chiron tell us old man shall employ 
 titu tut i work enough 
 publiu come hither caiu valentin 

 enter publiu caiu valentine

 publiu what 
 titu know two 
 publiu the empress son i take chiron demetriu 
 titu fie publiu fie thou art much deceiv 
 the one murder rape name 
 and therefor bind gentl publiu 
 caiu valentin lay hand 
 oft heard wish hour 
 and i find therefor bind sure 
 and stop mouth begin cri exit
 they lay hold chiron demetriu 
 chiron villain forbear empress son 
 publiu and therefor command 
 stop close mouth let speak word 
 is sure bound look bind fast 

 re enter titu andronicus
 knife lavinia basin

 titu come come lavinia look thi foe bound 
 sir stop mouth let speak 
 but let hear fear word i utter 
 o villain chiron demetriu 
 here stand spring stain mud 
 thi goodli summer winter mix 
 you kill husband vile fault
 two brother condemn death 
 my hand cut made merri jest 
 both sweet hand tongu dear
 than hand tongu spotless chastiti 
 inhuman traitor constrain forc 
 what would say i let speak 
 villain shame could beg grace 
 hark wretch i mean martyr 
 thi one hand yet left cut throat 
 while lavinia tween stump doth hold
 the basin receiv guilti blood 
 you know mother mean feast 
 and call reveng think mad 
 hark villain i grind bone dust 
 and blood i make past 
 and past coffin i rear 
 and make two pasti shame head 
 and bid strumpet unhallow dam 
 like earth swallow increas 
 thi feast i bid 
 and banquet shall surfeit 
 for wors philomel us daughter 
 and wors progn i reveng 
 and prepar throat lavinia come 
 receiv blood dead 
 let go grind bone powder small 
 and hate liquor temper 
 and past let vile head bak 
 come come everi one officious
 to make banquet i wish may prove
 more stern bloodi centaur feast 
 he cut throat 
 so 
 now bring i play cook 
 and see readi mother come 
 exeunt bear dead bodies

scen iii the court titu house

ent luciu marcu goth aaron prison child
in arm attendant

 luciu uncl marcu sinc ti father mind
 that i repair rome i content 
 first goth and thine befal fortun 
 luciu good uncl take barbar moor 
 thi raven tiger accurs devil 
 let receiv sust nanc fetter 
 till brought unto empress face
 for testimoni foul proceed 
 and see ambush friend strong 
 i fear emperor mean good us 
 aaron some devil whisper curs ear 
 and prompt tongu may utter forth
 the venom malic swell heart 
 luciu away inhuman dog unhallow slave 
 sir help uncl convey 
 exeunt goth aaron flourish within
 the trumpet show emperor hand 

 sound trumpet enter saturninu and
 tamora aemiliu tribun senat others

 saturninu what hath firmament sun one 
 luciu what boot thee thyself sun 
 marcu rome emperor nephew break parl 
 these quarrel must quietli debat 
 the feast readi care titus
 hath ordain honour end 
 for peac love leagu good rome 
 pleas therefor draw nigh take place 
 saturninu marcu 
 a tabl brought the compani sit 

 trumpet sound enter titus
 like cook place dish lavinia
 veil face also young luciu others

 titu welcom lord welcom dread queen 
 welcom ye warlik goth welcom luciu 
 and welcom although cheer poor 
 twill fill stomach pleas eat 
 saturninu whi art thou thu attir andronicu 
 titu becaus i would sure well
 to entertain high empress 
 tamora we behold good andronicu 
 titu an high knew heart 
 my lord emperor resolv 
 wa well done rash virginius
 to slay daughter right hand 
 becaus enforc stain deflow 
 saturninu it andronicu 
 titu your reason mighti lord 
 saturninu becaus girl surviv shame 
 and presenc still renew sorrow 
 titu a reason mighti strong effectu 
 a pattern preced live warrant
 for wretch perform like 
 die die lavinia thi shame thee he kill 
 and thi shame thi father sorrow die 
 saturninu what hast thou done unnatur unkind 
 titu kill tear made blind 
 i woeful virginiu 
 and thousand time caus he
 to outrag done 
 saturninu what ravish tell deed 
 titu will pleas eat will pleas high feed 
 tamora whi hast thou slain thine daughter thu 
 titu not i twa chiron demetriu 
 they ravish cut away tongu 
 and twa wrong 
 saturninu go fetch hither us present 
 titu whi bake pie 
 whereof mother daintili hath fed 
 eat flesh hath bred 
 ti true ti true wit knife sharp point 
 he stab empress 
 saturninu die frantic wretch accurs deed 
 he stab titu 
 luciu can son eye behold father bleed 
 there meed meed death deadli deed 
 he stab saturninu a great tumult luciu 
 marcu friend go balconi 
 marcu you sad fac men peopl son rome 
 by uproar sever flight fowl
 scatter wind high tempestu gust 
 o let teach knit again
 thi scatter corn one mutual sheaf 
 these broken limb one bodi 
 lest rome bane unto 
 and mighti kingdom curtsi 
 like forlorn desper castaway 
 do shame execut 
 but frosti sign chap age 
 grave wit true experi 
 can not induc attend word 
 to luciu speak rome dear friend erst ancestor 
 when solemn tongu discourse
 to love sick dido sad attend ear
 the stori bale burn night 
 when subtl greek surpri king priam troy 
 tell us sinon hath bewitch ear 
 or hath brought fatal engin in
 that give troy rome civil wound 
 my heart compact flint steel 
 nor i utter bitter grief 
 but flood tear drown oratory
 and break utt ranc even time
 when move ye attend 
 and forc commiser 
 here rome young captain let tell tale 
 while i stand weep hear speak 
 luciu then graciou auditori known you
 that chiron damn demetrius
 were murd red emperor brother 
 and ravish sister 
 for fell fault brother behead 
 our father tear despi base cozen d
 of true hand fought rome quarrel out
 and sent enemi unto grave 
 lastli unkindli banish 
 the gate shut turn weep 
 to beg relief among rome enemi 
 who drown enmiti true tear 
 and op arm embrac friend 
 i turn forth known 
 that preserv welfar blood
 and bosom took enemi point 
 sheath steel advent rou bodi 
 ala know i vaunter i 
 my scar wit dumb although 
 that report full truth 
 but soft methink i digress much 
 cite worthless prais o pardon 
 for friend men prais 
 marcu now turn speak behold child 
 point child attend arm 
 of tamora deliv 
 the issu irreligi moor 
 chief architect plotter woe 
 the villain aliv titu hous 
 damn wit true 
 now judg caus titu revenge
 these wrong unspeak past patienc 
 or live man could bear 
 now heard truth say roman 
 have done aught amiss show us wherein 
 and place behold us plead 
 the poor remaind andronici
 will hand hand headlong hurl 
 and rag stone beat forth soul 
 and make mutual closur hous 
 speak roman speak say shall 
 lo hand hand luciu i fall 
 aemiliu come come thou reverend man rome 
 and bring emperor gentli thi hand 
 luciu emperor well i know
 the common voic cri shall 
 all luciu hail rome royal emperor 
 marcu go go old titu sorrow hous 
 and hither hale misbeliev moor
 to adjudg dire slaught ring death 
 as punish wick life exeunt some
 attend luciu marcu other descend
 all luciu hail rome graciou governor 
 luciu thank gentl roman may i govern so
 to heal rome harm wipe away woe 
 but gentl peopl give aim awhil 
 for natur put heavi task 
 stand aloof uncl draw near
 to shed obsequi tear upon trunk 
 o take warm kiss thi pale cold lip kiss titu 
 these sorrow drop upon thi blood stain face 
 the last true duti thi nobl son 
 marcu tear tear love kiss kiss
 thi brother marcu tender thi lip 
 o sum i pay
 countless infinit yet would i pay 
 luciu come hither boy come come come learn us
 to melt shower thi grandsir lov thee well 
 mani time danc thee knee 
 sung thee asleep love breast thi pillow 
 mani stori hath told thee 
 and bid thee bear pretti tale mind
 and talk dead gone 
 marcu how mani thousand time hath poor lip 
 when live warm thine 
 o sweet boy give latest kiss 
 bid farewel commit grave 
 do kind take leav 
 boy o grandsir grandsir ev n heart
 would i dead live 
 o lord i can not speak weep 
 my tear choke i ope mouth 

 re enter attend aaron

 a roman you sad andronici done woe 
 give sentenc execr wretch
 that hath breeder dire event 
 luciu set breast deep earth famish 
 there let stand rave cri food 
 if one reliev piti 
 for offenc die thi doom 
 some stay see fast ned earth 
 aaron ah wrath mute furi dumb 
 i babi i base prayers
 i repent evil i done 
 ten thousand wors ever yet i did
 would i perform i might 
 if one good deed life i 
 i repent soul 
 luciu some love friend convey emperor henc 
 and give burial father grave 
 my father lavinia shall forthwith
 be close household monument 
 as raven tiger tamora 
 no funer rite man mourn weed 
 no mourn bell shall ring burial 
 but throw forth beast bird prey 
 her life beastli devoid piti 
 and dead let bird take piti exeunt

prologue

in troy lie scene from isl greece
th princ orgul high blood chaf 
have port athen sent ships
fraught minist instruments
of cruel war sixti nine wore
their crownet regal athenian bay
put forth toward phrygia vow made
to ransack troy within whose strong immures
th ravish helen menelau queen 
with wanton pari sleep quarrel 
to tenedo come 
and deep draw bark disgorge
their war like fraughtag now dardan plains
th fresh yet unbruis greek pitch
their brave pavilion priam six gate citi 
dardan tymbria ilia cheta troien 
and antenorid massi staples
and correspons fulfil bolt 
stir son troy 
now expect tickl skittish spirits
on one side trojan greek 
set hazard and hither i come
a prologu arm confidence
of author pen actor voic suited
in like condit argument 
to tell fair behold play
leap er vaunt firstl broil 
begin middl start thenc away 
to may digest play 
like find fault pleasur 
now good bad ti chanc war 



act i

scen i troy befor priam s palac 

 enter troilu arm pandaru 

troilu 
call varlet i unarm 
whi i war without wall troy
that find cruel battl within 
each trojan master heart 
let field troilu ala hath none 

pandaru 
will gear ne er mend 

troilu 
the greek strong skil strength 
fierc skill fierc valiant 
but i weaker woman tear 
tamer sleep fonder ignor 
less valiant virgin night 
and skilless unpracti infanc 

pandaru 
well i told enough part i meddl nor
mak farther he cake wheat must tarry
th grind 

troilu 
have i tarri 

pandaru 
ay grind must tarri bolt 

troilu 
have i tarri 

pandaru 
ay bolt must tarri leaven 

troilu 
still i tarri 

pandaru 
ay leaven yet word hereaft the
knead make cake heat oven the
bak nay must stay cool may chanc burn your
lip 

troilu 
patienc goddess e er 
doth lesser blench suff ranc i 
at priam royal tabl i sit 
and fair cressid come thought 
so traitor come thenc 

pandaru 
well look yesternight fairer ever i saw look any
woman els 

troilu 
i tell thee heart 
a wedg sigh would rive twain 
lest hector father perceiv 
i sun doth light storm 
buri sigh wrinkl smile 
but sorrow couch seem gladness
i like mirth fate turn sudden sad 

pandaru 
an hair somewhat darker helen well go there
wer comparison women but part my
kinswoman i would term prais i would
somebodi heard talk yesterday i i dispraise
your sister cassandra wit 

troilu 
o pandaru i tell thee pandaru 
when i tell thee hope lie drown 
repli mani fathom deep
they lie indrench i tell thee i mad
in cressid love thou answer st she fair 
pour st open ulcer heart
her eye hair cheek gait voic 
handlest thi discours o hand 
in whose comparison white ink
writ reproach whose soft seizure
th cygnet harsh spirit sense
hard palm ploughman thi thou tell st 
a true thou tell st i say i love 
but say thu instead oil balm 
thou lay st everi gash love hath given me
th knife made 

pandaru 
i speak truth 

troilu 
thou dost speak much 

pandaru 
faith i meddl let fair tis
th better mend hand 

troilu 
good pandaru how pandaru 

pandaru 
i labour travail ill thought ill
thought gone small thank my
labour 

troilu 
what art thou angri pandaru what 

pandaru 
becaus kin therefor fair helen and she
wer kin would fair friday helen on
sunday but care i i care blackamoor ti all
on 

troilu 
say i fair 

pandaru 
i care whether she fool stay behind her
fath let greek i tell next time i see
her for part i meddl make matter 

troilu 
pandaru 

pandaru 
not i 

troilu 
sweet pandaru 

pandaru 
pray speak i leav i found and
ther end 

 _exit pandaru an alarum _ 

troilu 
peac ungraci clamour peac rude sound 
fool side helen must need fair 
when blood daili paint thu 
i can not fight upon argument 
it starv subject sword 
but pandaru o god plagu 
i can not come cressid pandar 
and tetchi woo woo
a stubborn chast suit 
tell apollo thi daphn love 
what cressid pandar 
her bed india lie pearl 
between ilium resides
let call wild wander flood 
ourself merchant sail pandar
our doubt hope convoy bark 

 alarum enter aenea 

aenea 
how princ troilu wherefor afield 

troilu 
becaus thi woman answer sort 
for womanish thenc 
what news aenea field today 

aenea 
that pari return home hurt 

troilu 
bi aenea 

aenea 
troilu menelau 

troilu 
let pari bleed ti scar scorn 
pari gor menelau horn 

 _alarum _ 

aenea 
hark good sport town today 

troilu 
better home would i might may 
but sport abroad are bound thither 

aenea 
in swift hast 

troilu 
come go togeth 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii troy a street 

 enter cressida man alexand 

cressida 
who went 

alexand 
queen hecuba helen 

cressida 
and whither go 

alexand 
up eastern tower 
whose height command subject vale 
to see battl hector whose patience
i virtu fix today mov 
he chid andromach struck armour 
and like husbandri war 
befor sun rose har light 
and field goe everi flower
did prophet weep foresaw
in hector wrath 

cressida 
what caus anger 

alexand 
the nois goe among greeks
a lord trojan blood nephew hector 
they call ajax 

cressida 
good 

alexand 
they say man _per se_
and stand alon 

cressida 
so men unless drunk sick leg 

alexand 
thi man ladi hath robb mani beast particular addit 
he valiant lion churlish bear slow the
eleph man natur hath crowd humour valour
i crush folli folli sauc discret there no
man hath virtu hath glimps man attaint
but carri stain melancholi without caus and
merri hair hath joint everyth but
everyth joint gouti briareu mani hand and
no use purblind argu eye sight 

cressida 
but man make smile make hector angri 

alexand 
they say yesterday cop hector battl struck 
the disdain shame whereof hath ever sinc kept hector fast and
wak 

 enter pandaru 

cressida 
who come 

alexand 
madam uncl pandaru 

cressida 
hector gallant man 

alexand 
a may world ladi 

pandaru 
what what 

cressida 
good morrow uncl pandaru 

pandaru 
good morrow cousin cressid what talk good morrow 
alexand how cousin when ilium 

cressida 
thi morn uncl 

pandaru 
what talk i came wa hector arm gone ere you
cam ilium helen 

cressida 
hector gone helen 

pandaru 
e en hector stir earli 

cressida 
that talk anger 

pandaru 
wa angri 

cressida 
so say 

pandaru 
true i know caus lay today i can
tel and troilu come far behind let
them take heed troilu i tell 

cressida 
what angri 

pandaru 
who troilu troilu better man two 

cressida 
o jupit comparison 

pandaru 
what troilu hector do know man see 

cressida 
ay i ever saw knew 

pandaru 
well i say troilu troilu 

cressida 
then say i say i sure hector 

pandaru 
no hector troilu degre 

cressida 
 ti 

pandaru 
himself ala poor troilu i would 

cressida 
so 

pandaru 
condit i gone barefoot india 

cressida 
he hector 

pandaru 
himself would well gods
ar time must friend end well troilu well i would my
heart bodi no hector better man troilu 

cressida 
excus 

pandaru 
he elder 

cressida 
pardon pardon 

pandaru 
th come shall tell anoth tale when
th come hector shall wit year 

cressida 
he shall need 

andaru 
nor qualiti 

cressida 
no matter 

pandaru 
nor beauti 

cressida 
 twould becom better 

pandaru 
you judgement niec helen swore th day that
troilu brown favour ti i must confess brown
neith 

cressida 
no brown 

pandaru 
faith say truth brown brown 

cressida 
to say truth true true 

pandaru 
she prai complexion pari 

cressida 
whi pari hath colour enough 

pandaru 
so 

cressida 
then troilu much if prai his
complexion higher colour enough other
high flame prais good complexion i lief
helen golden tongu commend troilu copper nose 

pandaru 
i swear i think helen love better pari 

cressida 
then merri greek inde 

pandaru 
nay i sure she came th day the
compass window know past three four hair on
hi chin 

cressida 
inde tapster arithmet may soon bring particular therein to
a total 

pandaru 
whi young yet within three pound lift much
a brother hector 

cressida 
i young man old lifter 

pandaru 
but prove helen love came put her
whit hand cloven chin 

cressida 
juno merci how came cloven 

pandaru 
whi know ti dimpl i think smile becom better
than man phrygia 

cressida 
o smile valiantli 

pandaru 
doe 

cressida 
o ye twere cloud autumn 

pandaru 
whi go but prove helen love troilu 

cressida 
troilu stand proof prove 

pandaru 
troilu whi esteem i esteem addl egg 

cressida 
if love addl egg well love idl head would
eat chicken th shell 

pandaru 
i can not choos laugh think tickl chin inde 
she marvel white hand i must need confess 

cressida 
without rack 

pandaru 
and take upon spi white hair chin 

cressida 
ala poor chin mani wart richer 

pandaru 
but laugh queen hecuba laugh eye ran
o er 

cressida 
with millston 

pandaru 
and cassandra laugh 

cressida 
but temper fire pot eye did her
ey run er 

pandaru 
and hector laugh 

cressida 
at laugh 

pandaru 
marri white hair helen spi troilu chin 

cressida 
and green hair i laugh 

pandaru 
they laugh much hair pretti answer 

cressida 
what answer 

pandaru 
quoth here two fifti hair chin one them
i white 

cressida 
thi question 

pandaru 
that true make question two fifti hair quoth he
 one white that white hair father rest his
son jupit quoth hair pari husband 
 the fork one quoth pluck give but there
wa laugh helen blush pari chaf all
th rest laugh pass 

cressida 
so let great go 

pandaru 
well cousin i told thing yesterday think 

cressida 
so i 

pandaru 
i sworn ti true weep twere man born in
april 

cressida 
and i spring tear twere nettl may 

 _sound retreat _ 

pandaru 
hark come field shall stand see
them pass toward ilium good niec sweet niec cressida 

cressida 
at pleasur 

pandaru 
here excel place may see brave 
i tell name pass mark troilus
abov rest

cressida

that belov know naught know 
men prize thing ungain

lov got sweet desir sue

 _exit_ 

scene iii the grecian camp befor agamemnon s tent 

 sennet enter agamemnon nestor ulyss diomed menelau and
 other 

agamemnon 
princ 
what grief hath set jaundi er cheek 
the ampl proposit hope makes
in design begun earth below
fail promi larg check disasters
grow vein action highest rear 
a knot conflux meet sap 
infect sound pine divert grain
tort errant cours growth 
nor princ matter new us
that come short suppos far
that seven year sieg yet troy wall stand 
sith everi action hath gone 
whereof record trial draw
bia thwart answer aim 
and unbodi figur thought
that gave surmis shape whi princ 
do cheek abash behold works
and call shame inde naught else
but protract trial great jove
to find persist constanc men 
the fine metal found
in fortun love for bold coward 
the wise fool artist unread 
the hard soft seem affin kin 
but wind tempest frown
distinct broad power fan 
puf winnow light away 
and hath mass matter itself
li rich virtu unmingl 

nestor 
with due observ thi godlik seat 
great agamemnon nestor shall apply
thi latest word in reproof chance
li true proof men the sea smooth 
how mani shallow baubl boat dare sail
upon patient breast make way
with nobler bulk 
but let ruffian borea enrage
th gentl theti anon behold
th strong ribb bark liquid mountain cut 
bound two moist elements
lik perseu hors where sauci boat 
whose weak untimb side even now
co rival great either harbour fled
or made toast neptun even so
doth valour show valour worth divide
in storm fortun ray brightness
th herd hath annoy breeze
than tiger split wind
mak flexibl knee knot oak 
and fli fled shade thing courag 
a rou rage rage doth sympathis 
and accent tun self key
retort chide fortun 

ulyss 
agamemnon 
thou great command nerv bone greec 
heart number soul spirit
in temper mind all
should shut hear ulyss speak 
besid th applaus approbation
th _to agamemnon_ mighti thi place sway 
 _to nestor_ and thou reverend thi stretch life 
i give speech such
a agamemnon hand greece
should hold high brass again
a vener nestor hatch silver 
should bond air strong axl tree
on heaven ride knit greekish ears
to experienc tongu yet let pleas 
thou great wise hear ulyss speak 

agamemnon 
speak princ ithaca less expect
that matter needless importless burden 
divid thi lip confid 
when rank thersit ope mastic jaw 
we shall hear music wit oracl 

ulyss 
troy yet upon basi 
and great hector sword lack master 
but instanc 
the specialti rule hath neglect 
and look mani grecian tent stand
hollow upon plain mani hollow faction 
when gener like hive 
to forag shall repair 
what honey expect degre vizard 
th unworthiest show fairli mask 
the heaven planet centr 
observ degre prioriti place 
insistur cours proport season form 
offic custom line order 
and therefor gloriou planet sol
in nobl emin enthron spher d
amidst whose med cinabl eye
correct influenc evil planet 
and post like command king 
san check good bad but planets
in evil mixtur disord wander 
what plagu portent mutini 
what rage sea shake earth 
commot wind fright chang horror 
divert crack rend deracin 
the uniti marri calm states
quit fixtur o degre shak 
which ladder high design 
the enterpris sick how could commun 
degre school brotherhood citi 
peac commerc divid shore 
the primogen due birth 
prerog age crown sceptr laurel 
but degre stand authent place 
take degre away untun string 
and hark discord follow each thing melts
in mere oppugn bound waters
should lift bosom higher shore 
and make sop solid globe 
strength lord imbecil 
and rude son strike father dead 
forc right rather right wrong 
between whose endless jar justic resid 
should lose name justic 
then everyth includ power 
power appetit 
and appetit univers wolf 
so doubli second power 
must make perforc univers prey 
and last eat great agamemnon 
thi chao degre suffoc 
follow choke 
and neglect degre is
that pace goe backward purpose
it hath climb the gener disdain d
bi one step next 
that next beneath everi step 
exampl first pace sick
of superior grow enviou fever
of pale bloodless emul 
and ti fever keep troy foot 
not sinew to end tale length 
troy weak stand strength 

nestor 
most wise hath ulyss discov d
the fever whereof power sick 

agamemnon 
the natur sick found ulyss 
what remedi 

ulyss 
the great achil opinion crowns
th sinew forehand host 
have ear full airi fame 
grow dainti worth tent
li mock design patroclus
upon lazi bed livelong day
break scurril jest 
and ridicul awkward action 
which slander imit call 
he pageant us sometim great agamemnon 
thi topless deput put 
and like strut player whose conceit
li hamstr doth think rich
to hear wooden dialogu sound
 twixt stretch foot scaffoldag 
such piti er wrest seeming
h act thi great speaks
 ti like chime mend term unsquar 
which tongu roar typhon dropp 
would seem hyperbol at fusti stuff
th larg achil press bed loll 
from deep chest laugh loud applaus 
cri excel ti agamemnon right 
now play nestor hem stroke thi beard 
a drest orat 
that done near extremest ends
of parallel like vulcan wife 
yet god achil still cri excel 
 ti nestor right now play patroclu 
arm answer night alarm 
and forsooth faint defect age
must scene mirth cough spit
and palsi fumbl gorget 
shake rivet and sport
sir valour die cri o enough patroclu 
or give rib steel i shall split all
in pleasur spleen and fashion
al abil gift natur shape 
sever gener grace exact 
achiev plot order prevent 
excit field speech truce 
success loss serves
a stuff two make paradox 

nestor 
and imit twain 
who ulyss say opinion crowns
with imperi voic mani infect 
ajax grown self bear head
in rein full proud place
a broad achil keep tent like 
make factiou feast rail state war
bold oracl set thersit 
a slave whose gall coin slander like mint 
to match us comparison dirt 
to weaken discredit exposur 
how rank soever round danger 

ulyss 
they tax polici call cowardic 
count wisdom member war 
forestal prescienc esteem act
but hand the still mental parts
that contriv mani hand shall strike
when fit call know measure
of observ toil enemi weight 
whi hath finger digniti 
they call bed work mapp ry closet war 
so ram batter wall 
for great swing rude pois 
they place hand made engin 
or fine souls
bi reason guid execut 

nestor 
let grant achil horse
mak mani theti son

which high mighti agamemnon 

agamemnon

ar ceremoni courtier 

aenea

good arm strong joint true sword jove accord 
noth full heart but peac aenea

if prai bring prais forth

that breath fame blow prais sole pure transcend

and speak

it agamemnon sleep hour 
that thou shalt know trojan awak 
he tell thee

send thi brass voic lazi tent 
and everi greek mettl let know
what troy mean fairli shall spoke aloud 

 _sound trumpet_ 

we great agamemnon troy
a princ call hector priam father 
who dull long continu truce
i resti grown bade take trumpet
and purpos speak king princ lord 
if one among fair st greece
that hold honour higher eas 
that feed prais fear peril 
that know valour know fear 
that love mistress confession
with truant vow lip love 
and dare avow beauti worth
in arm challeng 
hector view trojan greek 
shall make good best 
he hath ladi wiser fairer truer 
than ever greek coupl arm 
and tomorrow trumpet call
mid way tent wall troy
to rous grecian true love 
if come hector shall honour 
if none say troy retir 
the grecian dame sunburnt worth
th splinter lanc even much 

agamemnon 
thi shall told lover lord aenea 
if none soul kind 
we left home but soldier 
and may soldier mere recreant prove
that mean hath love 
if one hath mean 
that one meet hector none els i 

nestor 
tell nestor one man
when hector grandsir suck he old 
but grecian host
a nobl man hath one spark fire
to answer love tell me
i hide silver beard gold beaver 
and vambrac put wither brawn 
and meet tell lady
wa fairer grandam chaste
a may world hi youth flood 
i prove troth three drop blood 

aenea 
now heaven forfend scarciti youth 

ulyss 
amen 

agamemnon 
fair lord aenea let touch hand 
to pavilion shall i lead sir 
achil shall word intent 
so shall lord greec tent tent 
yourself shall feast us go 
and find welcom nobl foe 

 _exeunt ulyss nestor_ 

ulyss 
nestor 

nestor

ulyss 
i young concept brain 
be time bring shape 

nestor 
what 

ulyss 
thi ti 
blunt wedg rive hard knot the seed pride
that hath matur blown up
in rank achil must cropp d
or shed breed nurseri like evil
to overbulk us 

nestor 
well 

ulyss 
thi challeng gallant hector send 
howev spread gener name 
relat purpos achil 

nestor 
true the purpos perspicu even substance
whos gross littl charact sum 
and public make strain
but achil brain barren
a bank libya though apollo know 
 ti dri enough great speed judgement 
ay celer find hector purpose
point 

ulyss 
and wake answer think 

nestor 
whi ti meet who may els oppose
that hector bring honour 
if achil though sport combat 
yet trial much opinion dwells
for trojan tast dear st repute
with fin st palat trust ulyss 
our imput shall oddli poi d
in vile action success 
although particular shall give scantling
of good bad unto gener 
and index although small pricks
to subsequ volum seen
th babi figur giant mass
of thing come larg it suppo d
he meet hector issu choic 
and choic mutual act soul 
make merit elect doth boil 
a twere forth us man distil d
out virtu miscarri 
what heart receiv henc conquer part 
to steel strong opinion 
which entertain limb instrument 
in less work sword bows
direct limb 

ulyss 
give pardon speech therefor ti meet
achil meet hector let us like merchant 
first show foul ware think perchanc sell 
if lustr better shall exceed
bi show wors first do consent
that ever hector achil meet 
for honour shame this
ar dogg two strang follow 

nestor 
i see old eye what 

ulyss 
what glori achil share hector 
were proud share 
but alreadi insol 
and better parch afric sun
than pride salt scorn eye 
should scape hector fair if foil 
whi main opinion crush
in taint best man no make lott ry 
and devic let blockish ajax draw
th sort fight hector among ourselves
g allow better man 
for physic great myrmidon 
who broil loud applaus make fall
hi crest prouder blue iri bend 
if dull brainless ajax come safe 
we dress voic fail 
yet go opinion still
that better men but hit miss 
our project life shape sens assum 
ajax employ pluck achil plume 

nestor 
now ulyss i begin relish thi advic 
and i give tast thereof forthwith
to agamemnon go straight 
two cur shall tame pride alone
must tarr mastiff twere bone 

 _exeunt_

patroclu 
a good riddanc

 _exeunt_ 

scene ii troy priam s palac 

 enter priam hector troilu pari helenu 

priam 
after mani hour live speech spent 
thu say nestor greek 
 deliv helen damag els 
a honour loss time travail expens 
wound friend els dear consum d
in hot digest cormor war 
shall struck hector say 

hector 
though man lesser fear greek i 
a far toucheth particular 
yet dread priam 
there ladi softer bowel 
more spongi suck sens fear 
more readi cri who know follow 
than hector the wound peac sureti 
sureti secur modest doubt call d
the beacon wise tent searches
to th bottom worst let helen go 
sinc first sword drawn question 
everi tith soul mongst mani thousand dismes
hath dear helen i mean 
if lost mani tenth ours
to guard thing worth us 
had name valu one ten 
what merit reason denies
th yield 

troilu 
fie fie brother 
weigh worth honour king 
so great dread father scale
of common ounc will counter sum
th past proport infinit 
and buckl waist fathomless
with span inch diminutive
a fear reason fie godli shame 

helenu 
no marvel though bite sharp reason 
you empti should father
bear great sway affair reason 
becaus speech hath none tell 

troilu 
you dream slumber brother priest 
you fur glove reason here reason 
you know enemi intend harm 
you know sword employ peril 
and reason fli object harm 
who marvel helenu beholds
a grecian sword set
th wing reason heels
and fli like chidden mercuri jove 
or like star disorb nay talk reason 
let shut gate sleep manhood honour
should hare heart would fat thoughts
with cramm reason reason respect
mak liver pale lustihood deject 

hector 
brother worth doth cost keep 

troilu 
what aught ti valu 

hector 
but valu dwell particular 
it hold estim dignity
a well wherein ti preciou itself
a prizer ti mad idolatry
to make servic greater god 
and dote attributive
to infecti affect 
without imag th affect merit 

troilu 
i take today wife election
i led conduct 
mi enkindl mine eye ear 
two trade pilot twixt danger shores
of judgement may i avoid 
although distast elect 
the wife i chose there evasion
to blench stand firm honour 
we turn back silk upon merchant
when soil remaind viands
w throw unrespect siev 
becaus full it thought meet
pari vengeanc greek 
your breath full consent belli sail 
the sea wind old wrangler took truce 
and servic he touch port desir 
and old aunt greek held captive
h brought grecian queen whose youth freshness
wrinkl apollo make stale morn 
whi keep the grecian keep aunt 
i worth keep whi pearl
whos price hath launch thousand ship 
and turn crown king merchant 
if avouch twa wisdom pari went 
a must need cri go go 
if confess brought home worthi prize 
a must need clapp hand 
and cri inestim now
th issu proper wisdom rate 
and deed never fortun 
beggar estim priz d
richer sea land o theft base 
that stol n fear keep 
but thiev unworthi thing stol n
that countri disgrace
w fear warrant nativ place 

cassandra 
 _within_ cri trojan cri 

priam 
what nois shriek 

troilu 
 ti mad sister i know voic 

cassandra 
 _within_ cri trojan 

hector 
it cassandra 

 enter cassandra rave 

cassandra 
cri trojan cri lend ten thousand eye 
and i fill prophet tear 

hector 
peac sister peac 

cassandra 
virgin boy mid age wrinkl eld 
soft infanc noth canst cri 
add clamour let us pay betimes
a moieti mass moan come 
cri trojan cri practis eye tear 
troy must goodli ilion stand 
our firebrand brother pari burn us 
cri trojan cri a helen woe 
cri cri troy burn els let helen go 

 _exit_ 

hector 
now youth troilu high strains
of divin sister work
som touch remors or blood
so madli hot discours reason 
nor fear bad success bad caus 
can qualifi 

troilu 
whi brother hector 
we may think just act
such event doth form 
nor deject courag minds
becaus cassandra mad her brain sick raptures
cannot distast good quarrel
which hath sever honour engag d
to make graciou for privat part 
i touch priam son 
and jove forbid done amongst us
such thing might offend weakest spleen
to fight maintain 

pari 
els might world convinc levity
a well undertak counsel 
but i attest god full consent
gav wing propens cut off
al fear attend dire project 
for ala singl arm 
what propugn one man valour
to stand push enmiti those
thi quarrel would excit yet i protest 
were i alon pass difficulti 
and ampl power i 
pari ne er retract hath done 
nor faint pursuit 

priam 
pari speak
lik one besot sweet delight 
you honey still gall 
so valiant prais 

pari 
sir i propos mere myself
th pleasur beauti bring 
but i would soil fair rape
wip honour keep 
what treason ransack queen 
disgrac great worth shame 
now deliv possess up
on term base compuls can 
that degener strain this
should set foot gener bosom 
there meanest spirit party
without heart dare sword draw
when helen defend none noble
whos life ill bestow death unfam 
where helen subject then i say 
well may fight know well
th world larg space can not parallel 

hector 
pari troilu said well 
and caus question hand
hav gloz superfici much
unlik young men aristotl thought
unfit hear moral philosophi 
the reason alleg conduce
to hot passion distemp red blood
than make free determination
 twixt right wrong pleasur revenge
hav ear deaf adder voice
of true decis natur craves
al due rend red owner now 
what nearer debt humanity
than wife husband if law
of natur corrupt affect 
and great mind partial indulgence
to benumb will resist 
there law well order nation
to curb rage appetit are
most disobedi refractori 
if helen wife sparta king 
a known moral laws
of natur nation speak aloud
to back return thu persist
in wrong extenu wrong 
but make much heavi hector opinion
i way truth yet ne ertheless 
mi sprite brethren i propend you
in resolut keep helen still 
for ti caus hath mean dependence
upon joint sever digniti 

troilu 
whi touch life design 
were glori affected
than perform heav spleen 
i would wish drop trojan blood
spent defenc but worthi hector 
she theme honour renown 
a spur valiant magnanim deed 
whose present courag may beat foe 
and fame time come canon us 
for i presum brave hector would lose
so rich advantag promi glory
a smile upon forehead action
for wide world revenu 

hector 
i 
you valiant offspr great priamu 
i roist challeng sent amongst
th dull factiou nobl greeks
wil strike amaz drowsi spirit 
i adverti great gener slept 
whilst emul armi crept 
thi i presum wake

scene iii the greek camp 

 flourish enter agamemnon ulyss diomed nestor ajax menelaus

calcha 
now princ servic i done 
th advantag time prompt aloud
to call recompens appear mind
that sight i bear thing come 
i abandon troy left possess 
incurr traitor name expo myself
from certain possess conveniences
to doubt fortun sequest ring all
that time acquaint custom condit 
made tame familiar natur 
and servic become
a new world strang unacquaint 
i beseech way tast 
to give littl benefit
out mani regist red promis 
which say live come behalf

desir cressid right great exchang 
whom troy hath still deni antenor 
i know wrest affairs
that negoti must slack
want manag almost
g us princ blood son priam 
in chang let sent great princ 
and shall buy daughter presence
shal quit strike servic i done
in accept pain

and bring us cressid hither calcha shall have
what request us good diom

withal bring word hector tomorrow
b answer challeng ajax readi

which i proud bear

achil 
what mean fellow know achil 

patroclu 
they pass strang they us bend 
to send smile achil 
to come humbl us creep
to holi altar 

achil 
what i poor late 
 ti certain great fall n fortun 
must fall men what declin 
he shall soon read eye others
a feel fall men like butterfli 
show meali wing summer 
and man simpli man
hath honour honour honours
that without place rich favour 
prize accid oft merit 
which fall slipperi stander 
the love lean slipperi 
doth one pluck anoth together
di fall but ti 
fortun i friend i enjoy
at ampl point i possess
sav men look methink find out
someth worth rich beholding
a often given here ulyss 
i interrupt read 
how ulyss 

ulyss 
now great theti son 

achil 
what read 

ulyss 
a strang fellow here
writ man dearli ever part 
how much without 
cannot make boast hath 
nor feel owe reflect 
a virtu shine upon others
heat retort heat again
to first giver 

achil 
thi strang ulyss 
the beauti born face
th bearer know commend itself
to other eye doth eye 
that pure spirit sens behold 
not go eye eye opposed
salut form 
for specul turn itself
til hath travel mirror there
wher may see thi strang 

ulyss 
i strain posit 
it familiar author drift 
who circumst expressli proves
that man lord anyth 
though much consist 
till commun part other 
nor doth know aught
til behold form applause
wher th extend like arch reverb rate
th voic like gate steel
front sun receiv render back
hi figur heat i much rapt 
and apprehend immediately
th unknown ajax heaven man 
a hors know 
natur thing are
most abject regard dear use 
what thing dear esteem
and poor worth now shall see tomorrow 
an act chanc doth throw upon 
ajax renown o heaven men 
while men leav 
how men creep skittish fortun hall 
while other play idiot eye 
how one man eat anoth pride 
while pride fast wanton 
to see grecian lord even already
they clap lubber ajax shoulder 
a foot brave hector breast 
and great troy shriek 

achil 
i believ pass me
a miser beggar neither gave me
good word look what deed forgot 

ulyss 
time hath lord wallet back 
wherein put alm oblivion 
a great siz monster ingratitud 
those scrap good deed past devour d
a fast made forgot soon
a done persever dear lord 
keep honour bright to done hang
quit fashion like rusti mail
in monument mock ry take instant way 
for honour travel strait narrow 
where one goe abreast keep path 
for emul hath thousand sons
that one one pursu give way 
or hedg asid direct forthright 
like ent red tide rush by
and leav hindmost 
or like gallant hors fall n first rank 
lie pavement abject rear 
o er run trampl then present 
though less past must ertop 
for time like fashion host 
that slightli shake part guest th hand 
and arm stretch would fli 
grasp comer the welcom ever smile 
and farewel goe sigh o let virtu seek
remuner thing 
for beauti wit 
high birth vigour bone desert servic 
love friendship chariti subject all
to enviou calumni time 
one touch natur make whole world kin 
that one consent prais new born gaud 
though made mould thing past 
and give dust littl gilt
mor laud gilt er dust 
the present eye prais present object 
then marvel thou great complet man 
that greek begin worship ajax 
sinc thing motion sooner catch eye
than stir the cri went thee 
and still might yet may 
if thou wouldst entomb thyself alive
and case thi reput thi tent 
whose gloriou deed field late
mad emul mission mongst god 
and drave great mar faction 

achil 
of privacy
i strong reason 

ulyss 
but gainst privacy
th reason potent heroic 
 ti known achil love
with one priam daughter 

achil 
ha known 

ulyss 
i wonder 
the provid watch state
know almost everi grain plutu gold 
find bottom th uncomprehens deep 
keep place thought almost like god 
do thought unveil dumb cradl 
there mysteri relation
durst never meddl soul state 
which hath oper divine
than breath pen give expressur 
all commerc troy
a perfectli lord 
and better would fit achil much
to throw hector polyxena 
but must griev young pyrrhu home 
when fame shall island sound trump 
and greekish girl shall trip sing
 great hector sister achil win 
but great ajax brave beat 
farewel lord i lover speak 
the fool slide er ice break

our blood calm long health 
but content occas meet 
bi jove i play hunter thi life
with forc pursuit polici

with face backward in human gentl

no man aliv love sort
th thing mean kill excel

with everi joint wound tomorrow

pari

myself menelau

both alik 
he merit well doth seek 
not make scrupl soilur 
with hell pain world charg 
and well keep defend 
not palat tast dishonour 
with costli loss wealth friend 
he like pule cuckold would drink up
th lee dreg flat tame piec

ar plea breed inheritor 
both merit poi weigh less 
but heavier whore

diomed

for everi fals drop bawdi veins
a grecian life hath sunk everi scruple
of contamin carrion weight
a trojan hath slain sinc could speak 
she hath given mani good word breath
a greek trojan suff red death 

pari

disprais thing desir buy 
but silenc hold virtu well 
we commend intend sell 
here lie way

al time paus rude beguil lips

our lock embrasur strangl dear vows
even birth labour breath

did buy must poorli sell ourselves
with rude breviti discharg one 
injuri time robber haste

no remedi

when shall see

for part us

mi sequent protest thou true 
and i see thee

a infinit immin but i true

flow swell er art exercis

ala kind godli jealousi

make afear

ther lurk still dumb discours devil
that tempt cunningli but tempt

i plain true reach

which antenor deliv

a thou unworthi call servant

though great bulk achil thi guard 
i cut thi throat

to speaker free i hence

sh shall priz but say be 
i speak spirit honour no

thi brave shall oft make thee hide thi head

to selv bend need talk

 _exit with_ cressida 

nestor 
a woman quick sens

all

 enter hector arm aenea troilu pari deiphobu other

aenea

in extrem great little
valour pride excel hector 
the one almost infinit 
the blank noth weigh well 
and look like pride courtesi 
thi ajax half made hector blood 
in love whereof half hector stay home 
half heart half hand half hector come seek
thi blend knight half trojan half greek

a maiden battl o i perceiv 

 re enter diomed

ulyss 
the youngest son priam true knight 
not yet matur yet matchless firm word 
speak deed deedless tongu 
not soon provok provok soon calm 
hi heart hand open free 
for give think show 
yet give till judgement guid bounti 
nor dignifi impur thought breath 
manli hector danger 
for hector blaze wrath subscribes
to tender object heat action
i vindic jealou love 
they call troilu erect
a second hope fairli built hector 
thu say aenea one know youth
even inch privat soul 
did great ilion thu translat

not let declin declin 
that i said stander by

if beauti soul 
if soul guid vow vow sanctimoni 
if sanctimoni god delight 
if rule uniti 
thi o mad discours 
that caus set 
bi fold author reason revolt
without perdit loss assum reason
without revolt cressid 
within soul doth conduc fight
of strang natur thing inseparate
divid wider sky earth 
and yet spaciou breadth division
admit orific point subtle
a ariachn broken woof enter 
instanc o instanc strong pluto gate 
cressid mine tie bond heaven 
instanc o instanc strong heaven 
the bond heaven slipp dissolv loo 
and anoth knot five finger tie 
the fraction faith ort love 
the fragment scrap bit greasi relics
of er eaten faith given diom

with passion doth express

in charact red mar heart
inflam venu never young man fancy
with etern fix soul 
hark greek much i cressid love 
so much weight hate i diom 
that sleev mine bear helm 
were casqu compo vulcan skill
mi sword bite not dread spout
which shipmen hurricano call 
constr mass almighti sun 
shall dizzi clamour neptun ear
in descent shall prompt sword
fal diom

scene iv the plain troy grecian camp

thersit

opinion

go go servant take thou troilu hors 
present fair steed ladi cressid 
fellow commend servic beauti 
tell i chasti amor trojan 
and knight proof 

servant 
i go lord 

 _exit_ 

 enter agamemnon 

agamemnon 
renew renew the fierc polydamas
hath beat menon bastard margarelon
hath doreu prison 
and stand colossu wise wave beam 
upon pash cors kings
epistrophu cediu polixen slain 
amphimacu thoa deadli hurt 
patroclu ta en slain palamedes
sor hurt brui the dread sagittary
app number hast diom 
to reinforc perish 

 enter nestor 

nestor 
go bear patroclu bodi achil 
and bid snail pac ajax arm shame 
there thousand hector field 
now fight galath hors 
and lack work anon afoot 
and fli die like scale sculls
befor belch whale yonder 
and strawi greek ripe edg 
fall like mower swath 
here everywher leav take 
dexter obey appetite
that much
that proof call imposs 

 enter ulyss 

ulyss 
o courag courag courag princ great achilles
i arm weep curs vow vengeanc 
patroclu wound rou drowsi blood 
togeth mangl myrmidon 
that noseless handless hack chipp come 
cri hector ajax hath lost friend
and foam mouth arm 
roar troilu hath done today
mad fantast execut 
engag redeem himself
with careless forc forceless care
a lust spite cun 
bade win 

 enter ajax 

ajax 
troilu thou coward troilu 

 _exit_ 

diomed 
ay 

nestor 
so draw togeth 

 _exit_ 

 enter achil 

achil 
where hector 
come come thou boy queller show thi face 
know meet achil angri 
hector hector i none hector 

 _exeunt_ 

scene vi anoth part plain 

 enter ajax 

ajax 
troilu thou coward troilu show thi head 

 enter diomed 

diomed

er correct troilu i say what troilu 

 enter troilu 

troilu

and pay thi life thou owest hors

ha art thou

troilu 
come cog greek 

 _exeunt fighting_ 

 enter hector

yea troilu o well fought youngest brother 

 enter achil 

achil 
now i see thee ha thee hector 

hector 
paus thou wilt 

achil

be happi arm use 
mi rest neglig befriend thee 
but thou anon shalt hear 
till go seek thi fortun 

 _exit_ 

hector 
fare thee well 
i would much fresher man 
had i expect thee 

 re enter troilu 

how brother 

troilu 
ajax hath ta en aenea shall 
no flame yonder gloriou heaven 
he shall carri i ta en 
or bring fate hear i say 
i reck though thou end life today

 enter one armour 

hector 
stand stand thou greek thou art goodli mark 
no wilt thou i like thi armour well 
i frush unlock rivet all
but i master wilt thou beast abid 
whi fli i hunt thee thi hide 

 _exeunt_ 

scene vii anoth part plain 

 enter achil myrmidon 

achil

mark i say attend i wheel 
strike stroke keep breath 
and i bloodi hector found 
empal weapon round 
in fellest manner execut arm 
follow sir proceed eye 
it decre hector great must die

ha game ware horn ho

 enter margarelon

i bastard i love bastard i bastard begot bastard

 _exit_ 

scene viii anoth part plain 

 enter hector 

hector 
most putrifi core fair without 
thi goodli armour thu hath cost thi life 
now day work done i take breath 
rest sword thou hast thi fill blood death 

 _disarms_ 

 enter achil myrmidon 

achil 
look hector sun begin set 
how ugli night come breath heel 
even vail dark ning sun 
to close day hector life done 

hector 
i unarm forego vantag greek 

achil 
strike fellow strike man i seek 

 _hector falls_ 

so ilion fall thou next now troy sink 
here lie thi heart thi sinew thi bone 
on myrmidon cri amain
 achil hath mighti hector slain 

 _a retreat sounded_ 

hark retir upon grecian part 

myrmidon 
the trojan trumpet sound like lord 

achil 
the dragon wing night erspread earth
and stickler like armi separ 
mi half supp sword frankli would fed 
plea dainti bait thu goe bed 

 _sheath sword_ 

come tie bodi hors tail 
along field i trojan trail

 _exeunt_ 

scene x anoth part plain 

 enter aenea pari antenor deiphobu 

aenea 
stand ho yet master field 
never go home starv night 

 enter troilu 

troilu 
hector slain 

all 
hector the god forbid 

troilu 
he dead murder hors tail 
in beastli sort dragg shame field 
frown heaven effect rage speed 
sit god upon throne smile troy 
i say let brief plagu merci 
and linger sure destruct 

aenea 
mi lord discomfort host 

troilu 
you understand tell 
i speak flight fear death 
but dare immin god men
address danger hector gone 
who shall tell priam hecuba 
let screech owl aye call d
go troy say hector dead 
there word priam turn stone 
make well niob maid wive 
cold statu youth word 
scare troy but march away 
hector dead say 
stay yet you vile abomin tent 
thu proudli pight upon phrygian plain 
let titan rise earli dare 
i and thou great siz coward 
no space earth shall sunder two hate 
i haunt thee like wick conscienc still 
that mouldeth goblin swift frenzi thought 
strike free march troy with comfort go 
hope reveng shall hide inward woe 

 enter pandaru 

pandaru 
but hear hear 

troilu 
henc broker lackey ignomini shame
pursu thi life live aye thi name 

 _exeunt but_ pandaru 

pandaru 
a goodli medicin ach bone o world world thu poor
ag despi o traitor bawd earnestli set work 
and ill requit whi endeavour lov the
perform loath what vers what instanc let me
se 

 full merrili humbl bee doth sing
 till hath lost honey sting 
 and subdu arm trail 
 sweet honey sweet note togeth fail 

good trader flesh set paint cloth 
a mani pandar hall 
your eye half weep pandar fall 
or can not weep yet give groan 
though yet ach bone 
brethren sister hold door trade 
some two month henc shall made 
it fear 
some gall goos winchest would hiss 
till i sweat seek eas 
and time bequeath diseas 

 _exit_ 



twelfth night or what you will

act i 

scene i an apart duke palac 

 enter orsino duke illyria curio lord musicians
 attend 

duke 
if music food love play 
give excess surfeit 
the appetit may sicken die 
that strain die fall 
o came er ear like sweet sound
that breath upon bank violet 
steal give odour enough 
 ti sweet 
o spirit love quick fresh art thou 
that notwithstand thi capacity
receiveth sea nought enter 
of valid pitch soever 
but fall abat low price
even minut so full shape fanci 
that alon high fantast 

curio 
will go hunt lord 

duke 
what curio 

curio 
the hart 

duke 
whi i noblest i 
o mine eye see olivia first 
methought purg air pestil 
that instant i turn hart 
and desir like fell cruel hound 
e er sinc pursu how news 

 enter valentin 

valentin 
so pleas lord i might admit 
but handmaid return answer 
the element till seven year heat 
shall behold face ampl view 
but like cloistress veil walk 
and water day chamber round
with eye offend brine season
a brother dead love would keep fresh
and last sad remembr 

duke 
o hath heart fine frame
to pay debt love brother 
how love rich golden shaft
hath kill flock affect else
that live liver brain heart 
these sovereign throne suppli fill d
her sweet perfect one self king 
away sweet bed flower 
love thought lie rich canopi bower 

 _exeunt _ 

scene ii the sea coast 

 enter viola captain sailor 

viola 
what countri friend 

captain 
thi illyria ladi 

viola 
and i illyria 
mi brother elysium 
perchanc drown what think sailor 

captain 
it perchanc sav 

viola 
o poor brother perchanc may 

captain 
true madam comfort chanc 
assur ship split 
when poor number sav 
hung drive boat i saw brother 
most provid peril bind 
 courag hope teach practic 
to strong mast liv upon sea 
where like arion dolphin back 
i saw hold acquaint waves
so long i could see 

viola 
for say gold 
mine escap unfoldeth hope 
whereto thi speech serv author 
the like know st thou countri 

captain 
ay madam well i bred born
not three hour travel place 

viola 
who govern 

captain 
a nobl duke natur name 

viola 
what name 

captain 
orsino 

viola 
orsino i heard father name 
he bachelor 

captain 
and late 
for month ago i went henc 
and twa fresh murmur know 
what great one less prattl 
that seek love fair olivia 

viola 
what 

captain 
a virtuou maid daughter count
that die twelvemonth sinc leav her
in protect son brother 
who shortli also die whose dear love
they say hath abjur company
and sight men 

viola 
o i serv ladi 
and might deliv world 
till i made mine occas mellow 
what estat 

captain 
that hard compass 
becaus admit kind suit 
no duke 

viola 
there fair behaviour thee captain 
and though natur beauteou wall
doth oft close pollut yet thee
i believ thou hast mind suits
with thi fair outward charact 
i pray thee i pay thee bounteous 
conceal i aid
for disguis hapli shall become
th form intent i serv duke 
thou shalt present eunuch 
it may worth thi pain i sing 
and speak mani sort music 
that allow worth servic 
what els may hap time i commit 
onli shape thou thi silenc wit 

captain 
be eunuch mute i 
when tongu blab let mine eye see 

viola 
i thank thee lead

 enter sir tobi maria

them hang strap

and prodig

good gift natur

th gust hath quarrel ti thought among prudent he
would quickli gift grave

who

 _exit maria _ 

sir tobi 
o knight thou lack st cup canari when i see thee put
down 

sir andrew 
never life i think unless see canari put 
methink sometim i wit christian ordinary
man i great eater beef i believ harm
to wit 

sir tobi 
no question 

sir andrew 
and i thought i forswear i ride home tomorrow sir tobi

th tongu i fenc danc bear bait o i
but follow art

whi would mend hair 

sir tobi

sir andrew

sir tobi 
excel hang like flax distaff i hope see a
houswif take thee leg spin 

sir andrew 
faith i home tomorrow sir tobi niec seen if
sh four one none count hard
bi woo 

sir tobi 
she none count match degre neither in
est year wit i heard swear tut life
in man

i stay month longer i fellow strangest mind the
world i delight masqu revel sometim altogeth 

sir tobi 
art thou good kick shaws knight

a man illyria whatsoev degre my
bett yet i compar old man 

sir tobi 
what thi excel galliard knight

faith i cut caper 

sir tobi 
and i cut mutton 

sir andrew

illyria 

sir tobi 
wherefor thing hid wherefor gift curtain
befor em are like take dust like mistress mall pictur 
whi dost thou go church galliard come home a
coranto my walk jig i would much make
wat sink pace what dost thou mean is world hide
virtu i think excel constitut thi leg it
wa form star galliard

stock shall set revel

scene iv a room duke palac 

 enter valentin viola man attir

duke

thou know st less i unclasp d
to thee book even secret soul 
therefor good youth address thi gait unto 
be deni access stand door 
and tell thi fix foot shall grow
til thou audienc 

viola 
sure nobl lord 
if abandon sorrow
a spoke never admit 

duke 
be clamor leap civil bound 
rather make unprofit return 

viola 
say i speak lord 

duke 
o unfold passion love 
surpris discours dear faith 
it shall becom thee well act woe 
she attend better thi youth 
than nuncio grave aspect 

viola 
i think lord 

duke 
dear lad believ 
for shall yet beli thi happi year 
that say thou art man diana lip
i smooth rubiou thi small pipe
i maiden organ shrill sound 
and sembl woman part 
i know thi constel right apt
for affair some four five attend 
all i best
when least compani prosper well 
and thou shalt live freeli thi lord 
to call fortun thine 

viola 
i best
to woo ladi _asid _ yet bar strife 
whoe er i woo would wife

th dri fool drink fool dri bid dishonest man

th botcher mend anyth mend patch virtue
that transgress patch sin sin amend but
patch virtu if simpl syllog serv if

again take away

 enter maria

 enter viola 

viola 
the honour ladi hous 

olivia

most radiant exquisit unmatch beauti i pray tell if
thi ladi hous i never saw i would loath to
cast away speech besid excel well pen i
hav taken great pain con good beauti let sustain no
scorn i comptibl even least sinist usag 

olivia 
whenc came sir 

viola

mi part good gentl one give modest assur lady
of hous i may proceed speech 

olivia 
are comedian 

viola 
no profound heart yet fang malic i swear i
am i play are ladi hous 

olivia 
if i usurp i

most certain usurp yours
to bestow reserv but commiss i
wil speech prais show heart of
mi messag

olivia

wer sauci gate allow approach rather wonder at
you hear if mad gone reason be
brief ti time moon make one skip a
dialogu 

maria

act ii 

scene i the sea coast

your love lay

the 
 the fortun unhappi _

daylight champian discov thi open i be

off gross acquaint i point devic man i not
now fool let imagin jade everi reason excites
to ladi love she commend yellow stock of
lat prais leg cross garter she
manifest love kind injunct drive me
to habit like i thank star i happi i be
strang stout yellow stock cross garter even the
swift put jove star prais here yet a
postscript _read _ _thou canst choos know i if
thou entertain st love let appear thi smile thi smiles
becom thee well therefor presenc still smile dear sweet 
i prithe _ jove i thank thee i smile i everyth that

act iii 

scene i olivia garden 

 enter viola clown tabor 

viola

hous hous doth stand church 

viola

him church stand thi tabor thi tabor stand the
church

to good wit how quickli wrong side may turn outward 

viola

them wanton

fals i loath prove reason

mak invis

 enter sebastian antonio

scene iii olivia garden 

 enter sebastian 

sebastian 
thi air gloriou sun 
thi pearl gave i feel see 
and though ti wonder enwrap thu 
yet ti mad where antonio 
i could find eleph 
yet i found credit 
that rang town seek 
hi counsel might golden servic 
for though soul disput well sense
that may error mad 
yet doth accid flood fortune
so far exceed instanc discours 
that i readi distrust mine eyes
and wrangl reason persuad me
to trust i mad 
or els ladi mad yet twere 
she could sway hous command follow 
take give back affair dispatch 
with smooth discreet stabl bearing
a i perceiv there someth t
that deceiv but ladi come 

 enter olivia priest 

olivia 
blame hast mine if mean well 
now go holi man
into chantri him
and underneath consecr roof 
plight full assur faith 
that jealou doubt soul
may live peac he shall conceal it
whil will shall come note 
what time celebr keep
accord birth what say 

sebastian 
i follow good man go 
and sworn truth ever true 

olivia 
then lead way good father heaven shine 
that may fairli note act mine

 enter antonio offic 

viola 
here come man sir rescu 

duke 
that face i rememb well 
yet i saw last besmear d
a black vulcan smoke war 
a baubl vessel captain 
for shallow draught bulk unpriz 
with scath grappl make
with nobl bottom fleet 
that envi tongu loss
cri fame honour what matter 

first offic 
orsino antonio
that took _phoenix_ fraught candi 
and _tiger_ board
when young nephew titu lost leg 
here street desper shame state 
in privat brabbl apprehend 

viola 
he kind sir drew side 
but conclus put strang speech upon 
i know twa distract 

duke 
notabl pirat thou salt water thief 
what foolish bold brought thee merci 
whom thou term bloodi dear 
hast made thine enemi 

antonio 
orsino nobl sir 
be pleas i shake name give 
antonio never yet thief pirat 
though i confess base ground enough 
orsino enemi a witchcraft drew hither 
that ingrat boy side
from rude sea enrag foami mouth
did i redeem wreck past hope 
hi life i gave thereto add
mi love without retent restraint 
all dedic for sake
did i expos pure love 
into danger advers town 
drew defend beset 
where apprehend fals cunning
 not mean partak danger 
taught face acquaint 
and grew twenti year remov thing
whil one would wink deni mine purs 
which i recommend use
not half hour 

viola 
how 

duke 
when came town 

antonio 
today lord three month 
no int rim minut vacanc 
both day night keep compani 

 enter olivia attend

that e er devot tender what shall i

duke 
whi i i heart 
like egyptian thief point death 
kill i love savag jealousy
that sometim savour nobli but hear 
sinc non regard cast faith 
and i partli know instrument
that screw true place favour 
live marbl breast tyrant still 
but minion i know love 
and heaven i swear i tender dearli 
him i tear cruel eye
wher sit crown master spite 
come boy thought ripe mischief 
i sacrific lamb i love 
to spite raven heart within dove 

viola

to rest thousand death would die

mor i love eye life 
more more e er i shall love wife 
if i feign wit above
punish life taint love

 enter priest 

o welcom father

her unfold though late intended
to keep dark occas now
rev ti ripe thou dost know
hath newli pass youth 

priest 
a contract etern bond love 
confirm mutual joinder hand 
attest holi close lip 
strengthen interchang ring 
and ceremoni compact
s function testimoni 
sinc watch hath told toward grave 
i travel two hour 

duke

when time hath sow grizzl thi case 
or els thi craft quickli grow
that thine trip shall thine overthrow 
farewel take direct thi feet
wher thou i henceforth may never meet 

viola 
mi lord i protest 

olivia

hold littl faith though thou much fear

 enter sebastian 

sebastian

but brother blood

i perceiv hath offend 
pardon sweet one even vows
w made late ago

a natur perspect

an appl cleft two twin
than two creatur which sebastian

most wonder

nor deiti nature
of everywher i sister 
whom blind wave surg devour 
of chariti kin 
what countryman what name what parentag

you come fright us

which womb i particip

and say thrice welcom drown viola

had number thirteen year

that i viola confirm

i preserv serv nobl count

hath ladi lord

mi lord pleas thing thought

 enter fabian malvolio

how malvolio 

malvolio 
madam done wrong 
notori wrong 

olivia 
have i malvolio no 

malvolio 
ladi pray perus letter 
you must deni hand 
write hand phrase 
or say ti seal invent 
you say none well grant 
and tell modesti honour 
whi given clear light favour 
bade come smile cross garter 
to put yellow stock frown
upon sir tobi lighter peopl 
and act obedi hope 
whi suffer imprison 
kept dark hous visit priest 
and made notori geck gull
that e er invent play tell 

olivia 
ala malvolio write 
though i confess much like charact 
but question ti maria hand 
and i bethink she
first told thou wast mad cam st smile 
and form presuppo d
upon thee letter prithe content 
thi practic hath shrewdli pass upon thee 
but know ground author 
thou shalt plaintiff judge
of thine caus 

fabian 
good madam hear speak 
and let quarrel brawl come 
taint condit present hour 
which i wonder in hope shall 
most freeli i confess toby
set devic malvolio 
upon stubborn uncourt parts
w conceiv maria writ
th letter sir tobi great import 
in recompens whereof hath marri 
how sport malic follow d
may rather pluck laughter reveng 
if injuri justli weigh d
that side pass 

olivia 
ala poor fool baffl thee 

clown 
whi born great achiev great have
great thrown upon i one sir interlud one sir
topa sir one by lord fool i mad but
do rememb madam laugh barren rascal and you
smil gag and thu whirligig time bring his
reveng 

malvolio 
i reveng whole pack

of dear soul meantim sweet sister 
we part henc cesario come 
for shall man 
but habit seen 
orsino mistress fanci queen
