 clown sing 

_ when i littl tini boy 
 with hey ho wind rain 
 a foolish thing toy 
 for rain raineth everi day _

_ but i came man estat 
 with hey ho wind rain 
 gainst knave thiev men shut gate 
 for rain raineth everi day _

_ but i came ala wive 
 with hey ho wind rain 
 by swagger could i never thrive 
 for rain raineth everi day _

_ but i came unto bed 
 with hey ho wind rain 
 with toss pot still drunken head 
 for rain raineth everi day _

_ a great ago world begun 
 with hey ho wind rain 
 but one play done 
 and strive pleas everi day _

 _exit _ 




the two gentlemen of verona

dramati personae

 duke of milan father silvia
 valentin one two gentlemen
 proteu 
 antonio father proteus
 thurio foolish rival valentine
 eglamour agent silvia escape
 speed clownish servant valentine
 launc like proteus
 panthino servant antonio
 host julia lodg milan
 outlaw valentine

 julia ladi verona belov proteus
 silvia duke daughter belov valentine
 lucetta wait woman julia

 servant musicians

scen verona milan frontier mantua

act i scene i verona an open place

ent valentin proteus

 valentin ceas persuad love proteu 
 home keep youth ever home wit 
 were affect chain thi tender days
 to sweet glanc thi honour love 
 i rather would entreat thi company
 to see wonder world abroad 
 than live dulli sluggardiz home 
 wear thi youth shapeless idl 
 but sinc thou lov st love still thrive therein 
 even i would i love begin 
 proteu wilt thou gone sweet valentin adieu 
 think thi proteu thou hapli seest
 some rare noteworthi object thi travel 
 wish partak thi happiness
 when thou dost meet good hap thi danger 
 if ever danger environ thee 
 commend thi grievanc holi prayer 
 for i thi headsman valentin 
 valentin and love book pray success 
 proteu upon book i love i pray thee 
 valentin that shallow stori deep love 
 how young leander cross hellespont 
 proteu that deep stori deeper love 
 for shoe love 
 valentin ti true boot love 
 and yet never swum hellespont 
 proteu over boot nay give boot 
 valentin no i boot thee 
 proteu what 
 valentin to love scorn bought groan 
 coy look heart sore sigh one fade moment mirth
 with twenti watch weari tediou night 
 if hapli perhap hapless gain 
 if lost grievou labour 
 howev folli bought wit 
 or els wit folli vanquish 
 proteu so circumst call fool 
 valentin so circumst i fear prove 
 proteu ti love cavil i love 
 valentin love master master 
 and yoke fool 
 methink chronicl wise 
 proteu yet writer say sweetest bud
 the eat canker dwell eat love
 inhabit finest wit 
 valentin and writer say forward bud
 is eaten canker ere blow 
 even love young tender wit
 is turn folli blast bud 
 lose verdur even prime 
 and fair effect futur hope 
 but wherefor wast i time counsel the
 that art votari fond desir 
 onc adieu my father road
 expect come see shipp 
 proteu and thither i bring thee valentin 
 valentin sweet proteu let us take leav 
 to milan let hear thee letters
 of thi success love news else
 betideth absenc thi friend 
 and i likewis visit thee mine 
 proteu all happi bechanc thee milan 
 valentin as much home farewel 
 exit valentine
 proteu he honour hunt i love 
 he leav friend dignifi 
 i leav friend love 
 thou julia thou hast metamorphi 
 made neglect studi lose time 
 war good counsel set world nought 
 made wit muse weak heart sick thought 

 enter speed

 speed sir proteu save saw master 
 proteu but part henc embark milan 
 speed twenti one shipp alreadi 
 and i play sheep lose 
 proteu inde sheep doth often stray 
 an shepherd awhil away 
 speed you conclud master shepherd and
 i sheep 
 proteu i 
 speed whi horn horn whether i wake sleep 
 proteu a silli answer fit well sheep 
 speed thi prove still sheep 
 proteu true thi master shepherd 
 speed nay i deni circumst 
 proteu it shall go hard i prove anoth 
 speed the shepherd seek sheep sheep the
 shepherd i seek master master seek 
 therefor i sheep 
 proteu the sheep fodder follow shepherd shepherd for
 food follow sheep thou wage followest thi master 
 thi master wage follow thee therefor thou art a
 sheep 
 speed such anoth proof make cri baa 
 proteu but dost thou hear gav st thou letter julia 
 speed ay sir i lost mutton gave letter lac d
 mutton lac mutton gave lost mutton nothing
 labour 
 proteu here small pastur store mutton 
 speed if ground overcharg best stick 
 proteu nay astray twere best pound 
 speed nay sir less pound shall serv carri your
 letter 
 proteu you mistak i mean pound pinfold 
 speed from pound pin fold 
 ti threefold littl carri letter lover 
 proteu but said 
 speed nod ay 
 proteu nod ay whi noddi 
 speed you mistook sir i say nod ask she
 nod i say ay 
 proteu and set togeth noddi 
 speed now taken pain set togeth take for
 pain 
 proteu no shall bear letter 
 speed well i perceiv i must fain bear 
 proteu whi sir bear 
 speed marri sir letter orderli noth the
 word noddi pain 
 proteu beshrew quick wit 
 speed and yet can not overtak slow purs 
 proteu come come open matter brief said 
 speed open purs money matter may both
 deliv 
 proteu well sir pain what said 
 speed truli sir i think hardli win 
 proteu whi couldst thou perceiv much 
 speed sir i could perceiv noth so
 much ducat deliv letter hard to
 brought mind i fear prove hard in
 tell mind give token stone as
 hard steel 
 proteu what said noth 
 speed no much take thi pain to testify
 bounti i thank testern requital
 whereof henceforth carri letter sir 
 i commend master 
 proteu go go gone save ship wreck 
 which can not perish thee aboard 
 be destin drier death shore exit speed
 i must go send better messeng 
 i fear julia would deign line 
 receiv worthless post exit

scen ii verona the garden of julia s house

ent julia lucetta

 julia but say lucetta alon 
 wouldst thou counsel fall love 
 lucetta ay madam stumbl unheed 
 julia of fair resort gentlemen
 that everi day parl encount 
 in thi opinion worthiest love 
 lucetta pleas repeat name i show mind
 accord shallow simpl skill 
 julia what think st thou fair sir eglamour 
 lucetta as knight well spoken neat fine 
 but i never mine 
 julia what think st thou rich mercatio 
 lucetta well wealth 
 julia what think st thou gentl proteu 
 lucetta lord lord see folli reign us 
 julia how mean passion name 
 lucetta pardon dear madam ti pass shame
 that i unworthi bodi i 
 should censur thu love gentlemen 
 julia whi proteu rest 
 lucetta then thu mani good i think best 
 julia your reason 
 lucetta i woman reason 
 i think i think 
 julia and wouldst thou cast love 
 lucetta ay thought love cast away 
 julia whi rest hath never mov 
 lucetta yet rest i think best love ye 
 julia hi littl speak show love small 
 lucetta fire closest kept burn 
 julia they love show love 
 lucetta o love least let men know love 
 julia i would i knew mind 
 lucetta perus paper madam 
 julia to julia say 
 lucetta that content show 
 julia say say gave thee 
 lucetta sir valentin page sent i think proteu 
 he would given i way 
 did name receiv pardon fault i pray 
 julia now modesti goodli broker 
 dare presum harbour wanton line 
 to whisper conspir youth 
 now trust ti offic great worth 
 and offic fit place 
 there take paper see return 
 or els return sight 
 lucetta to plead love deserv fee hate 
 julia will ye gone 
 lucetta that may rumin exit
 julia and yet i would i erlook letter 
 it shame call back 
 and pray fault i chid 
 what fool know i maid
 and would forc letter view 
 sinc maid modesti say no that
 which would proffer constru ay 
 fie fie wayward foolish love 
 that like testi babe scratch nurs 
 and present humbl kiss rod 
 how churlishli i chid lucetta henc 
 when willingli i would 
 how angerli i taught brow frown 
 when inward joy enforc heart smile 
 my penanc call lucetta back
 and ask remiss folli past 
 what ho lucetta 

 re enter lucetta

 lucetta what would ladyship 
 julia is near dinner time 
 lucetta i would 
 that might kill stomach meat
 and upon maid 
 julia what took gingerli 
 lucetta noth 
 julia whi didst thou stoop 
 lucetta to take paper i let fall 
 julia and paper noth 
 lucetta noth concern 
 julia then let lie concern 
 lucetta madam lie concern 
 unless fals interpret 
 julia some love hath writ rhyme 
 lucetta that i might sing madam tune 
 give note ladyship set 
 julia as littl toy may possibl 
 best sing tune light love 
 lucetta it heavi light tune 
 julia heavi belik hath burden 
 lucetta ay melodi would sing 
 julia and 
 lucetta i can not reach high 
 julia let see song lucetta withhold letter 
 how minion 
 lucetta keep tune still sing 
 and yet methink i like tune 
 julia you 
 lucetta no madam ti sharp 
 julia you minion sauci 
 lucetta nay flat
 and mar concord harsh descant 
 there wanteth mean fill song 
 julia the mean drown unruli bass 
 lucetta inde i bid base proteu 
 julia thi babbl shall henceforth troubl 
 here coil protest tear letter 
 go get gone let paper lie 
 you would fing ring anger 
 lucetta she make strang would best plea d
 to ang red anoth letter exit
 julia nay would i ang red 
 o hate hand tear love word 
 injuri wasp feed sweet honey
 and kill bee yield sting 
 i kiss sever paper amend 
 look writ kind julia unkind julia 
 as reveng thi ingratitud 
 i throw thi name bruis stone 
 trampl contemptu thi disdain 
 and writ love wound proteu 
 poor wound name bosom bed 
 shall lodg thee till thi wound throughli heal 
 and thu i search sovereign kiss 
 but twice thrice proteu written 
 be calm good wind blow word away
 till i found letter letter 
 except mine name whirlwind bear
 unto rag fear hang rock 
 and throw thenc rage sea 
 lo one line name twice writ 
 poor forlorn proteu passion proteu 
 to sweet julia that i tear away 
 and yet i sith prettily
 he coupl complain name 
 thu i fold one upon anoth 
 now kiss embrac contend 

 re enter lucetta

 lucetta madam 
 dinner readi father stay 
 julia well let us go 
 lucetta what shall paper lie like tell tale 
 julia if respect best take 
 lucetta nay i taken lay 
 yet shall lie catch cold 
 julia i see month mind 
 lucetta ay madam may say sight see 
 i see thing although judg i wink 
 julia come come pleas go exeunt

scen iii verona antonio s house

ent antonio panthino

 antonio tell panthino sad talk that
 wherewith brother held cloister 
 panthino twa nephew proteu son 
 antonio whi 
 panthino he wond red lordship
 would suffer spend youth home 
 while men slender reput 
 put forth son seek prefer 
 some war tri fortun 
 some discov island far away 
 some studiou univers 
 for exercis 
 he said proteu son meet 
 and request importun you
 to let spend time home 
 which would great impeach age 
 in known travel youth 
 antonio nor need st thou much importun that
 whereon month i hammer 
 i consid well loss time 
 and can not perfect man 
 not tri tutor world 
 experi industri achiev 
 and perfect swift cours time 
 then tell whither i best send 
 panthino i think lordship ignorant
 how companion youth valentin 
 attend emperor royal court 
 antonio i know well 
 panthino twere good i think lordship sent thither 
 there shall practis tilt tournament 
 hear sweet discours convers noblemen 
 and eye everi exercise
 worthi youth nobl birth 
 antonio i like thi counsel well hast thou advi 
 and thou mayst perceiv well i like 
 the execut shall make known 
 even speediest expedition
 i dispatch emperor court 
 panthino to morrow may pleas don alphonso
 with gentlemen good esteem
 are journey salut emperor 
 and commend servic 
 antonio good compani shall proteu go 

 enter proteus

 and good time break 
 proteu sweet love sweet line sweet life 
 here hand agent heart 
 here oath love honour pawn 
 o father would applaud love 
 to seal happi consent 
 o heavenli julia 
 antonio how what letter read 
 proteu may pleas lordship ti word two
 of commend sent valentin 
 deliv friend came 
 antonio lend letter let see news 
 proteu there news lord writes
 how happili live well belov d
 and daili grace emperor 
 wish partner fortun 
 antonio and stand affect wish 
 proteu as one reli lordship 
 and depend friendli wish 
 antonio my someth sort wish 
 muse i thu suddenli proceed 
 for i i end 
 i resolv thou shalt spend time
 with valentinu emperor court 
 what mainten friend receiv 
 like exhibit thou shalt 
 to morrow readi go 
 excus i peremptori 
 proteu my lord i can not soon provid 
 pleas deliber day two 
 antonio look thou want st shall sent thee 
 no stay morrow thou must go 
 come panthino shall employ d
 to hasten expedit 
 exeunt antonio panthino
 proteu thu i shunn fire fear burn 
 and drench sea i drown 
 i fear show father julia letter 
 lest take except love 
 and vantag mine excuse
 hath except love 
 o spring love resembleth
 the uncertain glori april day 
 which show beauti sun 
 and cloud take away 

 re enter panthino

 panthino sir proteu father call 
 he hast therefor i pray go 
 proteu whi heart accord thereto 
 and yet thousand time answer no exeunt

 peac come

 valentin to

 for often writ modesti

scen ii verona julia s house

ent proteu julia

 proteu have patienc gentl julia

 proteu when possibl i i return 
 julia if turn return sooner 
 keep remembr thi julia sake 
 give ring 
 proteu whi make exchang here take 
 julia and seal bargain holi kiss 
 proteu here hand true constanc 
 and hour erslip day
 wherein i sigh julia thi sake 
 the next ensu hour foul mischance
 torment love forget 
 my father stay come answer 
 the tide nay thi tide tear 
 that tide stay longer i 
 julia farewel exit julia
 what gone without word 
 ay true love can not speak 
 for truth hath better deed word grace

 panthino sir proteu stay 
 proteu go i come i come

scen iii verona a street

ent launc lead dog

 launc nay twill hour ere i done weep the
 kind launc fault i receiv my
 proport like prodigi son go sir proteu to
 imperi court i think crab dog sourest natur dog
 live mother weep father wail sister cri 
 maid howl cat wring hand hous a
 great perplex yet cruel heart cur shed one tear 
 he stone pebbl stone piti than
 dog a jew would wept seen part my
 grandam eye look wept blind part 
 nay i show manner thi shoe father this
 left shoe father left shoe mother nay that
 can not neither ye hath worser
 sole thi shoe hole mother father 
 a vengeanc there ti now sir staff sister 
 look white lili small wand this
 hat nan maid i dog dog i am

 father father bless now shoe speak a
 word weep i kiss father well weep now
 come i mother o could speak like wood woman 
 well i kiss ti mother breath and
 now come i sister mark moan make now dog

 dust tear

 enter duke

 silvia no gentlemen here come father 
 duke now daughter silvia hard beset 
 sir valentin father good health 
 what say letter friends
 of much good news 
 valentin my lord i thankful
 to happi messeng thenc 
 duke know ye don antonio countryman 
 valentin ay good lord i know gentleman
 to worth worthi estim 
 and without desert well reput 
 duke hath son 
 valentin ay good lord son well deserves
 the honour regard father 
 duke you know well 
 valentin i knew infancy
 we conver spent hour togeth 
 and though idl truant 
 omit sweet benefit time
 to cloth mine age angel like perfect 
 yet hath sir proteu name 
 made use fair advantag day 
 hi year young experi old 
 hi head unmellow judgment ripe 
 and word far behind worth
 come prais i bestow 
 he complet featur mind 
 with good grace grace gentleman 
 duke beshrew sir make good 
 he worthi empress love
 as meet emperor counsellor 
 well sir gentleman come me
 with commend great potent 
 and mean spend time awhil 
 i think ti unwelcom news 
 valentin should i wish thing 
 duke welcom accord worth 
 silvia i speak sir thurio 
 for valentin i need cite 
 i send hither present exit duke
 valentin thi gentleman i told ladyship
 had come along mistresss
 did hold eye lock crystal look

 upon pawn fealti

 how could see way seek

 enter proteus

 silvia have done done come gentleman

 confirm welcom special favour

 if oft wish hear

 to fellow servant ladyship

 proteu not sweet ladi mean servant
 to look worthi mistress

 re enter thurio

 thurio madam lord father would speak 
 silvia i wait upon pleasur come sir thurio 
 go onc new servant welcom 
 i leav confer home affair 
 when done look hear 
 proteu we attend upon ladyship 
 exeunt silvia thurio
 valentin now tell whenc came 
 proteu your friend well much commend 
 valentin and 
 proteu i left health 
 valentin how ladi thrive love 
 proteu my tale love wont weari 
 i know joy love discours 
 valentin ay proteu life alter 
 i done penanc contemn love 
 whose high imperi thought punish me
 with bitter fast penitenti groan 
 with nightli tear daili heart sore sigh 
 for reveng contempt love 
 love hath cha sleep enthral eyes
 and made watcher mine heart sorrow 
 o gentl proteu love mighti lord 
 and hath humbl i confess
 there woe correct 
 nor servic joy earth 
 now discours except love 
 now i break fast dine sup sleep 
 upon nake name love 
 proteu enough i read fortun eye 
 wa idol worship 
 valentin even heavenli saint 
 proteu no earthli paragon 
 valentin call divin 
 proteu i flatter 
 valentin o flatter love delight prais 
 proteu when i sick gave bitter pill 
 and i must minist like 
 valentin then speak truth divin 
 yet let princip 
 sovereign creatur earth 
 proteu except mistress 
 valentin sweet except 
 except thou wilt except love 
 proteu have i reason prefer mine 
 valentin and i help thee prefer 
 she shall dignifi high honour 
 to bear ladi train lest base earth
 should vestur chanc steal kiss
 and great favour grow proud 
 disdain root summer swell flow r
 and make rough winter everlastingli 
 proteu whi valentin braggard 
 valentin pardon proteu i nothing
 to whose worth make worthi noth 
 she alon 
 proteu then let alon 
 valentin not world whi man mine 
 and i rich jewel
 as twenti sea sand pearl 
 the water nectar rock pure gold 
 forgiv i dream thee 
 becaus thou seest dote upon love 
 my foolish rival father likes
 onli possess huge 
 is gone along i must 
 for love thou know st full jealousi 
 proteu but love 
 valentin ay betroth nay marriag hour 
 with cun manner flight 
 determin i must climb window 
 the ladder made cord means
 plot greed happi 
 good proteu go chamber 
 in affair aid thi counsel 
 proteu go i shall enquir forth 
 i must unto road disembark
 some necessari i need must use 
 and i present attend 
 valentin will make hast 
 proteu i exit valentine
 even one heat anoth heat expels
 or one nail strength drive anoth 
 so remembr former love
 is newer object quit forgotten 
 is mind valentinu prais 
 her true perfect fals transgress 
 that make reasonless reason thu 
 she fair julia i love 
 that i love love thaw 
 which like waxen imag gainst fire
 bear impress thing 
 methink zeal valentin cold 
 and i love i wont 
 o i love ladi much 
 and reason i love littl 
 how shall i dote advice
 that thu without advic begin love 
 ti pictur i yet beheld 
 and hath dazzl reason light 
 but i look perfect 
 there reason i shall blind 
 if i check er love i 
 if compass i use skill exit

scen vi milan the duke palace

ent proteus

 proteu to leav julia shall i forsworn 
 to love fair silvia shall i forsworn 
 to wrong friend i shall much forsworn 
 and ev n pow r gave first oath
 provok threefold perjuri 
 love bade swear love bid forswear 
 o sweet suggest love thou hast sinn 
 teach thi tempt subject excus 
 at first i ador twinkl star 
 but i worship celesti sun 
 unheed vow may heed broken 
 and want wit want resolv will
 to learn wit exchang bad better 
 fie fie unreverend tongu call bad
 whose sovereignti oft thou hast preferr d
 with twenti thousand soul confirm oath 
 i can not leav love yet i 
 but i leav love i love 
 julia i lose valentin i lose 
 if i keep i need must lose 
 if i lose thu find i loss 
 for valentin julia silvia 
 i dearer friend 
 for love still preciou 
 and silvia wit heaven made fair 
 show julia swarthi ethiop 
 i forget julia aliv 
 rememb ring love dead 
 and valentin i hold enemi 
 aim silvia sweeter friend 
 i can not prove constant myself
 without treacheri us valentin 
 thi night meaneth cord ladder
 to climb celesti silvia chamber window 
 myself counsel competitor 
 now present i give father notice
 of disguis pretend flight 
 who enrag banish valentin 
 for thurio intend shall wed daughter 
 but valentin gone i quickli cross
 by sli trick blunt thurio dull proceed 
 love lend wing make purpos swift 
 as thou hast lent wit plot drift exit

scen vii verona julia s house

ent julia lucetta

 julia counsel lucetta gentl girl assist 
 and ev n kind love i conjur thee 
 who art tabl wherein thoughts
 are visibl charact engrav 
 to lesson tell good mean
 how honour i may undertake
 a journey love proteu 
 lucetta ala way wearisom long 
 julia a true devot pilgrim weary
 to measur kingdom feebl step 
 much less shall hath love wing fli 
 and flight made one dear 
 of divin perfect sir proteu 
 lucetta better forbear till proteu make return 
 julia o know st thou look soul food 
 piti dearth i pine in
 by long food long time 
 didst thou know inli touch love 
 thou wouldst soon go kindl fire snow
 as seek quench fire love word 
 lucetta i seek quench love hot fire 
 but qualifi fire extrem rage 
 lest burn bound reason 
 julia the thou dam st burn 
 the current gentl murmur glide 
 thou know st stopp impati doth rage 
 but fair cours hinder 
 he make sweet music th enamel stone 
 give gentl kiss everi sedge
 he overtaketh pilgrimag 
 and mani wind nook stray 
 with will sport wild ocean 
 then let go hinder cours 
 i patient gentl stream 
 and make pastim weari step 
 till last step brought love 
 and i rest much turmoil 
 a bless soul doth elysium 
 lucetta but habit go along 
 julia not like woman i would prevent
 the loos encount lascivi men 
 gentl lucetta fit weeds
 as may beseem well reput page 
 lucetta whi ladyship must cut hair 
 julia no girl i knit silken strings
 with twenti odd conceit true love knot 
 to fantast may becom youth
 of greater time i shall show 
 lucetta what fashion madam shall i make breech 
 julia that fit well tell good lord 
 what compass wear farthingal 
 whi ev n fashion thou best like lucetta 
 lucetta you must need codpiec madam 
 julia out lucetta ill favour 
 lucetta a round hose madam worth pin 
 unless codpiec stick pin 
 julia lucetta thou lov st let have
 what thou think st meet mannerli 
 but tell wench world reput me
 for undertak unstaid journey 
 i fear make scandaliz 
 lucetta if think stay home go 
 julia nay i 
 lucetta then never dream infami go 
 if proteu like journey come 
 no matter displea gone 
 i fear scarc plea withal 
 julia that least lucetta fear 
 a thousand oath ocean tear 
 and instanc infinit love 
 warrant welcom proteu 
 lucetta all servant deceit men 
 julia base men use base effect 
 but truer star govern proteu birth 
 hi word bond oath oracl 
 hi love sincer thought immacul 
 hi tear pure messeng sent heart 
 hi heart far fraud heaven earth 
 lucetta pray heav n prove come 
 julia now thou lov st wrong
 to bear hard opinion truth 
 onli deserv love love 
 and present go chamber 
 to take note i stand need of
 to furnish upon long journey 
 all mine i leav thi dispos 
 my good land reput 
 onli lieu thereof dispatch henc 
 come answer present 
 i impati tarrianc exeunt

act iii scene i milan the duke s palace

ent duke thurio proteus

 duke sir thurio give us leav i pray awhil 
 we secret confer exit thurio
 now tell proteu 
 proteu my graciou lord i would discover
 the law friendship bid conceal 
 but i call mind graciou favours
 done undeserv i 
 my duti prick utter that
 which els worldli good draw 
 know worthi princ sir valentin friend 
 thi night intend steal away daughter 
 myself one made privi plot 
 i know determin bestow her
 on thurio gentl daughter hate 
 and thu stol n away 
 it would much vexat age 
 thu duti sake i rather chose
 to cross friend intend drift
 than conceal heap head
 a pack sorrow would press 
 be unprev timeless grave 
 duke proteu i thank thee thine honest care 
 which requit command i live 
 thi love often seen 
 hapli judg fast asleep 
 and oftentim purpo forbid
 sir valentin compani court 
 but fear lest jealou aim might err
 and unworthili disgrac man 
 a rash i ever yet shunn 
 i gave gentl look therebi find
 that thyself hast disclo 
 and thou mayst perceiv fear 
 know tender youth soon suggest 
 i nightli lodg upper tow r 
 the key whereof ever kept 
 and thenc can not convey away 
 proteu know nobl lord devi mean
 how chamber window ascend
 and cord ladder fetch 
 for youth lover gone 
 and way come present 
 where pleas may intercept 
 but good lord cunningly
 that discoveri aim 
 for love hate unto friend 
 hath made publish pretenc 
 duke upon mine honour shall never know
 that i light thee 
 proteu adieu lord sir valentin come exit

 enter valentine

 duke sir valentin whither away fast 
 valentin pleas grace messenger
 that stay bear letter friend 
 and i go deliv 
 duke be much import 
 valentin the tenour doth signify
 my health happi court 
 duke nay matter stay awhil 
 i break thee affairs
 that touch near wherein thou must secret 
 ti unknown thee i sought
 to match friend sir thurio daughter 
 valentin i know well lord sure match
 were rich honour besid gentleman
 is full virtu bounti worth qualities
 beseem wife fair daughter 
 can not grace win fanci 
 duke no trust peevish sullen froward 
 proud disobedi stubborn lack duti 
 neither regard child
 nor fear i father 
 and may i say thee pride 
 upon advic hath drawn love 
 and i thought remnant mine age
 should cherish childlik duti 
 i full resolv take wife
 and turn take 
 then let beauti wed dow r 
 for possess esteem 
 valentin what would grace 
 duke there ladi verona 
 whom i affect nice coy 
 and nought esteem age eloqu 
 now therefor would i thee tutor 
 for long agon i forgot court 
 besid fashion time chang 
 how way i may bestow myself
 to regard sun bright eye 
 valentin win gift respect word 
 dumb jewel often silent kind
 more quick word move woman mind 
 duke but scorn present i sent 
 valentin a woman sometim scorn best content 
 send anoth never give er 
 for scorn first make love 
 if frown ti hate 
 but rather beget love 
 if chide ti gone 
 for fool mad left alon 
 take repuls whatev doth say 
 for get gone doth mean away 
 flatter prais commend extol grace 
 though ne er black say angel face 
 that man hath tongu i say man 
 if tongu can not win woman 
 duke but i mean promi friends
 unto youth gentleman worth 
 and kept sever resort men 
 that man hath access day 
 valentin whi i would resort night 
 duke ay door lock key kept safe 
 that man hath recours night 
 valentin what let one may enter window 
 duke her chamber aloft far ground 
 and built shelv one can not climb it
 without appar hazard life 
 valentin whi ladder quaintli made cord 
 to cast pair anchor hook 
 would serv scale anoth hero tow r 
 so bold leander would adventur 
 duke now thou art gentleman blood 
 advis i may ladder 
 valentin when would use pray sir tell 
 duke thi night love like child 
 that long everyth come 
 valentin by seven clock i get ladder 
 duke but hark thee i go alon 
 how shall i best convey ladder thither 
 valentin it light lord may bear it
 under cloak length 
 duke a cloak long thine serv turn 
 valentin ay good lord 
 duke then let see thi cloak 
 i get one anoth length 
 valentin whi cloak serv turn lord 
 duke how shall i fashion wear cloak 
 i pray thee let feel thi cloak upon 
 what letter what to silvia 
 and engin fit proceed 
 i bold break seal read 
 my thought harbour silvia nightli 
 and slave send fli 
 o could master come go lightli 
 himself would lodg senseless lie 
 my herald thought thi pure bosom rest 
 while i king thither importun 
 do curs grace grace hath blest 
 becaus want servant fortun 
 i curs sent 
 that harbour lord 
 what 
 silvia night i enfranchis thee 
 ti ladder purpos 
 whi phaethon thou art merop son 
 wilt thou aspir guid heavenli car 
 and thi dare folli burn world 
 wilt thou reach star shine thee 
 go base intrud ween slave 
 bestow thi fawn smile equal mate 
 and think patienc thi desert 
 is privileg thi departur henc 
 thank favours
 which much i bestow thee 
 but thou linger territories
 longer swiftest expedition
 will give thee time leav royal court 
 by heaven wrath shall far exceed love
 i ever bore daughter thyself 
 be gone i hear thi vain excus 
 but thou lov st thi life make speed henc exit
 valentin and death rather live torment 
 to die banish 
 and silvia banish her
 is self self deadli banish 
 what light light silvia seen 
 what joy joy silvia 
 unless think 
 and feed upon shadow perfect 
 except i silvia night 
 there music nightingal 
 unless i look silvia day 
 there day look upon 
 she essenc i leav be
 if i fair influence
 foster illumin cherish kept aliv 
 i fli death fli deadli doom 
 tarri i i attend death 
 but fli i henc i fli away life 

 enter proteu launce

 proteu run boy run run seek 
 launc so ho ho 
 proteu what seest thou 
 launc him go find hair head ti a
 valentin 
 proteu valentin 
 valentin no 
 proteu who spirit 
 valentin neither 
 proteu what 
 valentin noth 
 launc can noth speak master shall i strike 
 proteu who wouldst thou strike 
 launc noth 
 proteu villain forbear 
 launc whi sir i strike noth i pray 
 proteu sirrah i say forbear friend valentin word 
 valentin my ear stopp can not hear good news 
 so much bad alreadi hath possess 
 proteu then dumb silenc i buri mine 
 for harsh untun bad 
 valentin is silvia dead 
 proteu no valentin 
 valentin no valentin inde sacr silvia 
 hath forsworn 
 proteu no valentin 
 valentin no valentin silvia forsworn 
 what news 
 launc sir proclam vanish 
 proteu that thou art banish o news 
 from henc silvia thi friend 
 valentin o i fed upon woe alreadi 
 and excess make surfeit 
 doth silvia know i banish 
 proteu ay ay hath offer doom 
 which unrev stand effectu forc 
 a sea melt pearl call tear 
 those father churlish feet tender 
 with upon knee humbl self 
 wring hand whose white becam them
 as wax pale woe 
 but neither bend knee pure hand held 
 sad sigh deep groan silver shed tear 
 could penetr uncompassion sire 
 but valentin ta en must die 
 besid intercess chaf 
 when thi repeal suppliant 
 that close prison command 
 with mani bitter threat bide 
 valentin no unless next word thou speak st
 have malign power upon life 
 if i pray thee breath mine ear 
 as end anthem endless dolour 
 proteu ceas lament thou canst help 
 and studi help thou lament st 
 time nurs breeder good 
 here thou stay thou canst see thi love 
 besid thi stay abridg thi life 
 hope lover staff walk henc 
 and manag despair thought 
 thi letter may though thou art henc 
 which writ shall deliv d
 even milk white bosom thi love 
 the time serv expostul 
 come i convey thee citi gate 
 and ere i part thee confer large
 of may concern thi love affair 
 as thou lov st silvia though thyself 
 regard thi danger along 
 valentin i pray thee launc thou seest boy 
 bid make hast meet northgat 
 proteu go sirrah find come valentin 
 valentin o dear silvia hapless valentin 
 exeunt valentin proteus
 launc i fool look yet i wit think
 master kind knave one but
 one knave he live know love yet i am
 love team hors shall pluck nor
 ti i love yet ti woman woman i not
 tell yet ti milkmaid yet ti maid for
 hath gossip yet ti maid master s
 maid serv wage she hath qualiti a
 water spaniel much bare christian here the
 cate log pull paper condit inprimi she
 fetch carri whi hors nay horse
 can not fetch carri therefor better a

 clean hand 

 enter speed

 speed how signior launc what news mastership 
 launc with master ship whi sea 
 speed well old vice still mistak word what news 
 paper 
 launc the black st news ever thou heard st 
 speed whi man black 
 launc whi black ink 
 speed let read 
 launc fie thee jolt head thou canst read 
 speed thou liest i 
 launc i tri thee tell who begot thee 
 speed marri son grandfath 
 launc o illiter loiter it son thi grandmoth 
 thi prove thou canst read 
 speed come fool come tri thi paper 
 launc hand paper there saint nichola thy
 speed 
 speed read inprimi she milk 
 launc ay 
 speed item she brew good ale 
 launc and thereof come proverb bless heart you
 brew good ale 
 speed item she sew 
 launc that much say can 
 speed item she knit 
 launc what need man care stock wench can
 knit stock

 launc a special virtu need wash and
 scour 
 speed item she spin 
 launc then may i set world wheel spin for
 live 
 speed item she hath mani nameless virtu 
 launc that much say bastard virtu indeed
 know father therefor name 
 speed here follow vice 
 launc close heel virtu

 breath 
 launc well fault may mend breakfast 
 read 
 speed item she hath sweet mouth 
 launc that make amend sour breath 
 speed item she doth talk sleep 
 launc it matter sleep talk 
 speed item she slow word 
 launc o villain set among vice to slow
 word woman virtu i pray thee and
 place chief virtu 
 speed item she proud 
 launc out eve legaci can not ta en
 
 speed item she hath teeth 
 launc i care neither i love crust 
 speed item she curst 
 launc well best hath teeth bite 
 speed item she often prais liquor 
 launc if liquor good shall i 
 good thing prais 
 speed item she liber 
 launc of tongu can not writ slow
 purs shall i keep shut now of
 anoth thing may can not i help well proceed 
 speed item she hath hair wit faults
 hair wealth fault 
 launc stop i mine mine 
 twice thrice last articl rehears 
 speed item she hath hair wit 
 launc more hair wit it may i prove cover of
 salt hide salt therefor salt 
 hair cover wit wit the
 greater hide less what next 
 speed and fault hair 
 launc that monstrou o 
 speed and wealth fault

 match noth imposs 
 speed what

 northgat

 launc for thee ay art thou he hath stay better man

 go scarc serv turn

 exit

 slave thrust secret i to

scen ii milan the duke s palace

ent duke thurio

 duke sir thurio fear love you
 now valentin banish sight 
 thurio sinc exil hath despi 
 forsworn compani rail 
 that i desper obtain 
 duke thi weak impress love figure
 trench ice hour heat
 dissolv water doth lose form 
 a littl time melt frozen thought 
 and worthless valentin shall forgot 

 enter proteus

 how sir proteu is countryman 
 accord proclam gone 
 proteu gone good lord 
 duke my daughter take go grievous 
 proteu a littl time lord kill grief 
 duke so i believ thurio think 
 proteu good conceit i hold thee 
 for thou hast shown sign good desert 
 make better confer thee 
 proteu longer i prove loyal grace
 let live look upon grace 
 duke thou know st willingli i would effect
 the match sir thurio daughter 
 proteu i lord 
 duke and also i think thou art ignorant
 how oppos 
 proteu she lord valentin 
 duke ay pervers persev 
 what might make girl forget
 the love valentin love sir thurio 
 proteu the best way slander valentine
 with falsehood cowardic poor descent 
 three thing women highli hold hate 
 duke ay think spoke hate 
 proteu ay enemi deliv 
 therefor must circumst spoken
 by one esteemeth friend 
 duke then must undertak slander 
 proteu and lord i shall loath 
 ti ill offic gentleman 
 especi friend 
 duke where good word can not advantag 
 your slander never endamag 
 therefor offic indiffer 
 be entreat friend 
 proteu you prevail lord i it
 by aught i speak disprais 
 she shall long continu love 
 but say weed love valentin 
 it follow love sir thurio 
 thurio therefor unwind love 
 lest ravel good none 
 you must provid bottom 
 which must done prais much
 as worth disprais sir valentin 
 duke and proteu dare trust kind 
 becaus know valentin report 
 you alreadi love firm votary
 and can not soon revolt chang mind 
 upon warrant shall access
 where silvia may confer larg 
 for lumpish heavi melancholi 
 and friend sake glad 
 where may temper persuasion
 to hate young valentin love friend 
 proteu as much i i effect 
 but sir thurio sharp enough 
 you must lay lime tangl desires
 by wail sonnet whose compos rhymes
 should full fraught servic vow 
 duke ay 
 much forc heaven bred poesi 
 proteu say upon altar beauty
 you sacrific tear sigh heart 
 write till ink dri tears
 moist frame feel line
 that may discov integr 
 for orpheu lute strung poet sinew 
 whose golden touch could soften steel stone 
 make tiger tame huge leviathans
 forsak unsound deep danc sand 
 after dire lament elegi 
 visit night ladi chamber window
 with sweet consort instruments
 tune deplor dump night dead silence
 will well becom sweet complain grievanc 
 thi els noth inherit 
 duke thi disciplin show thou hast love 
 thurio and thi advic night i put practic 
 therefor sweet proteu direct giver 
 let us citi presently
 to sort gentlemen well skill music 
 i sonnet serv turn
 to give onset thi good advic 
 duke about gentlemen 
 proteu we wait upon grace till supper 
 and afterward determin proceed 
 duke even i pardon exeunt

act iv scene i the frontier mantua a forest

ent certain outlaws

 first outlaw fellow stand fast i see passeng 
 second outlaw if ten shrink em 

 enter valentin speed

 third outlaw stand sir throw us ye 
 if make sit rifl 
 speed sir undon villains
 that travel fear much 
 valentin my friend 
 first outlaw that sir enemi 
 second outlaw peac hear 
 third outlaw ay beard proper man 
 valentin then know i littl wealth lose 
 a man i cross advers 
 my rich poor habili 
 of disfurnish 
 you take sum substanc i 
 second outlaw whither travel 
 valentin to verona 
 first outlaw whenc came 
 valentin from milan 
 third outlaw have long sojourn 
 valentin some sixteen month longer might stay 
 if crook fortun thwart 
 first outlaw what banish thenc 
 valentin i 
 second outlaw for offenc 
 valentin for torment rehears 
 i kill man whose death i much repent 
 but yet i slew man fight 
 without fals vantag base treacheri 
 first outlaw whi ne er repent done 
 but banish small fault 
 valentin i held glad doom 
 second outlaw have tongu 
 valentin my youth travel therein made happi 
 or els i often miser 
 third outlaw by bare scalp robin hood fat friar 
 thi fellow king wild faction 
 first outlaw we sir word 
 speed master one honour kind thieveri 
 valentin peac villain 
 second outlaw tell us anyth take 
 valentin noth fortun 
 third outlaw know us gentlemen 
 such furi ungovern youth
 thrust compani aw men 
 myself verona banished
 for practis steal away ladi 
 an heir near alli unto duke 
 second outlaw and i mantua gentleman
 who mood i stabb unto heart 
 first outlaw and i like petti crime 
 but purpos cite faults
 that may hold excu lawless live 
 and partli see beautified
 with goodli shape report
 a linguist man perfection
 as qualiti much want 
 second outlaw inde banish man 
 therefor rest parley 
 are content gener 
 to make virtu necess 
 and live wilder 
 third outlaw what say st thou wilt thou consort 
 say ay captain us 
 we thee homag rul thee 
 love thee command king 
 first outlaw but thou scorn courtesi thou diest 
 second outlaw thou shalt live brag offer 
 valentin i take offer live 
 provid outrages
 on silli women poor passeng 
 third outlaw no detest vile base practic 
 come go us bring thee crew 
 and show thee treasur got 
 which rest thi dispos exeunt

scen ii milan outsid duke s palac silvia s window

ent proteus

 proteu alreadi i fals valentin 
 and i must unjust thurio 
 under colour commend him
 i access love prefer 
 but silvia fair true holi 
 to corrupt worthless gift 
 when i protest true loyalti 
 she twit falsehood friend 
 when beauti i commend vow 
 she bid think i forsworn
 in break faith julia i lov 
 and notwithstand sudden quip 
 the least whereof would quell lover hope 
 yet spaniel like spurn love
 the grow fawneth still 

 enter thurio musicians

 but come thurio now must window 
 and give even music ear

 will creep servic can not go

 host now young guest methink allycholli i pray

 julia that music

 upon dull earth dwell

 proteu madam good ev n ladyship

 who spake

 you would quickli learn know voic 
 silvia sir proteu i take

 silvia what 
 proteu that i may compass 
 silvia you wish even 
 that present hie home bed 
 thou subtl perjur fals disloy man

 even time i spend talk thee

scen iii under silvia s window

ent eglamour

 eglamour thi hour madam silvia
 entreat call know mind 
 there great matter employ 
 madam madam 

 enter silvia window

 silvia who call 
 eglamour your servant friend 
 one attend ladyship command 
 silvia sir eglamour thousand time good morrow 
 eglamour as mani worthi ladi 
 accord ladyship impos 
 i thu earli come know service
 it pleasur command 
 silvia o eglamour thou art gentleman 
 think i flatter i swear i 
 valiant wise remors well accomplish 
 thou art ignor dear good will
 i bear unto banish valentin 
 nor father would enforc marry
 vain thurio soul abhor 
 thyself hast lov i heard thee say
 no grief ever come near thi heart
 as thi ladi thi true love die 
 upon whose grave thou vow dst pure chastiti 
 sir eglamour i would valentin 
 to mantua i hear make abod 
 and way danger pass 
 i desir thi worthi compani 
 upon whose faith honour i repos 
 urg father anger eglamour 
 but think upon grief ladi grief 
 and justic fli hence
 to keep unholi match 
 which heaven fortun still reward plagu 
 i desir thee even heart
 as full sorrow sea sand 
 to bear compani go 
 if hide i said thee 
 that i may ventur depart alon 
 eglamour madam i piti much grievanc 
 which sinc i know virtuous plac 
 i give consent go along 
 reck littl betideth me
 as much i wish good befortun 
 when go 
 silvia thi even come 
 eglamour where shall i meet 
 silvia at friar patrick cell 
 where i intend holi confess 
 eglamour i fail ladyship good morrow gentl ladi

scen iv under silvia s window

ent launc dog

 launc when man servant shall play cur look 
 goe hard one i brought puppi one i sav from
 drown three four blind brother sister went
 i taught even one would say precis thu i
 would teach dog i sent deliv present to
 mistress silvia master i came sooner the
 dine chamber step trencher steal her
 capon leg o ti foul thing cur can not keep in
 compani i would one say one take upon
 dog inde dog thing if i
 wit take fault upon i
 think verili hang sure i live had
 suffer you shall judg he thrust the
 compani three four gentleman like dog duke tabl 
 bless mark piss the
 chamber smelt out dog say one what cur 
 say anoth whip say third hang say the
 duke i acquaint smell knew was
 crab goe fellow whip dog friend quoth
 i mean whip dog ay marri i quoth you him
 wrong quoth i twa i thing wot he makes
 ado whip chamber how mani masters
 would servant nay i sworn i sat the
 stock pud hath stol n otherwis execut i
 stood pillori gees hath kill otherwis had
 suffer thou think st nay i rememb the
 trick serv i took leav madam silvia did i
 bid thee still mark i when didst thou see heave
 leg make water gentlewoman farthingal didst
 thou ever see trick 

 enter proteu julia boy clothes

 proteu sebastian thi name i like thee well 
 and employ thee servic present 
 julia in pleas i i 
 proteu i hope thou wilt to launc how whoreson
 peasant 
 where two day loiter 
 launc marri sir i carri mistress silvia dog bade 
 proteu and say littl jewel 
 launc marri say dog cur tell currish
 thank good enough present 
 proteu but receiv dog 
 launc no inde i brought back
 
 proteu what didst thou offer 
 launc ay sir squirrel stol n the
 hangman boy market place i offer mine
 dog big ten therefor gift
 greater 
 proteu go get thee henc find dog 
 or ne er return sight 
 away i say stayest thou vex exit launce
 a slave still end turn shame 
 sebastian i entertain thee
 partli i need youth
 that discret busi 
 for ti trust yond foolish lout 
 but chiefli thi face thi behaviour 
 which auguri deceiv 
 wit good bring fortun truth 
 therefor know thou i entertain thee 
 go present take ring thee 
 deliv madam silvia 
 she lov well deliv 
 julia it seem lov leav token 
 she dead belik 
 proteu not i think live 
 julia ala 
 proteu whi dost thou cri ala 
 julia i can not choose
 but piti 
 proteu wherefor shouldst thou piti 
 julia becaus methink lov well
 as love ladi silvia 
 she dream forgot love 
 you dote care love 
 ti piti love contrari 
 and think make cri ala 
 proteu well give ring therewithal
 thi letter that chamber tell lady
 i claim promis heavenli pictur 
 your messag done hie home unto chamber 
 where thou shalt find sad solitari exit proteus
 julia how mani women would messag 
 ala poor proteu thou hast entertain d
 a fox shepherd thi lamb 
 ala poor fool i piti him
 that heart despiseth 
 becaus love despiseth 
 becaus i love i must piti 
 thi ring i gave part 
 to bind rememb good 
 and i unhappi messeng 
 to plead i would obtain 
 to carri i would refu 
 to prais faith i would disprai 
 i master true confirm love 
 but can not true servant master
 unless i prove fals traitor 
 yet i woo yet coldly
 as heaven know i would speed 

 enter silvia attended

 gentlewoman good day i pray mean
 to bring speak madam silvia 
 silvia what would i 
 julia if i entreat patience
 to hear speak messag i sent 
 silvia from 
 julia from master sir proteu madam 
 silvia o send pictur 
 julia ay madam 
 silvia ursula bring pictur 
 go give master tell 
 one julia chang thought forget 
 would better fit chamber shadow 
 julia madam pleas perus letter 
 pardon madam i unadvi d
 deliv paper i 
 thi letter ladyship 
 silvia i pray thee let look 
 julia it may good madam pardon 
 silvia there hold 
 i look upon master line 
 i know stuff protest 
 and full new found oath wul break
 as easili i tear paper 
 julia madam send ladyship ring 
 silvia the shame send 
 for i heard say thousand times
 hi julia gave departur 
 though fals finger profan ring 
 mine shall julia much wrong 
 julia she thank 
 silvia what say st thou 
 julia i thank madam tender 
 poor gentlewoman master wrong much 
 silvia dost thou know 
 julia almost well i know 
 to think upon woe i protest
 that i wept hundr sever time 
 silvia belik think proteu hath forsook 
 julia i think doth caus sorrow 
 silvia is pass fair 
 julia she hath fairer madam 
 when think master lov well 
 she judgment fair 
 but sinc neglect look glass
 and threw sun expel mask away 
 the air hath starv rose cheeks
 and pinch lili tinctur face 
 that becom black i 
 silvia how tall 
 julia about statur pentecost 
 when pageant delight play 
 our youth got play woman part 
 and i trimm madam julia gown 
 which serv fit men judgment 
 as garment made 
 therefor i know height 
 and time i made weep good 
 for i play lament part 
 madam twa ariadn passioning
 for theseu perjuri unjust flight 
 which i live act tears
 that poor mistress move therewith 
 wept bitterli would i might dead
 if i thought felt sorrow 
 silvia she behold thee gentl youth 
 ala poor ladi desol left 
 i weep think upon thi word 
 here youth purs i give thee this
 for thi sweet mistress sake thou lov st 
 farewel exit silvia attendants
 julia and shall thank e er know 
 a virtuou gentlewoman mild beauti 
 i hope master suit cold 
 sinc respect mistress love much 
 ala love trifl 
 here pictur let see i think 
 if i tire face mine
 were full love 
 and yet painter flatter littl 
 unless i flatter much 
 her hair auburn mine perfect yellow 
 if differ love 
 i get colour periwig 
 her eye grey glass mine 
 ay forehead low mine high 
 what respect her
 but i make respect 
 if fond love blind god 
 come shadow come take shadow 
 for ti thi rival o thou senseless form 
 thou shalt worshipp kiss lov ador 
 and sens idolatry
 my substanc statu thi stead 
 i use thee kindli thi mistress sake 
 that us els jove i vow 
 i scratch unse eye 
 to make master love thee exit

act v scene i milan an abbey

ent eglamour

 and hour
 that silvia friar patrick cell meet 
 she fail lover break hours
 unless come time

scen ii milan the duke s palace

ent thurio proteu julia sebastian

 thurio sir proteu say silvia suit 
 proteu o sir i find milder 
 and yet take except person 
 thurio what leg long 
 proteu no littl 
 thurio i wear boot make somewhat rounder 
 julia asid but love spurr loath 
 thurio what say face 
 proteu she say fair one 
 thurio nay wanton lie face black 
 proteu but pearl fair old say 
 black men pearl beauteou ladi eye 
 julia asid ti true pearl put ladi eye 
 for i rather wink look

 proteu ill talk war 
 thurio but well i discours love peac 
 julia asid but better inde hold peac

 proteu o sir make doubt

 proteu that well deriv

 enter duke

 duke how sir proteu thurio 
 which saw sir eglamour late

 proteu nor i 
 duke saw daughter 
 proteu neither 
 duke whi 
 she fled unto peasant valentin 
 and eglamour compani 
 ti true friar lawrenc met both
 as penanc wander forest 
 him knew well guess 
 but mask sure 
 besid intend confession
 at patrick cell even 
 these likelihood confirm flight henc 
 therefor i pray stand discours 
 but mount present meet me
 upon rise mountain foot
 that lead toward mantua whither fled 
 dispatch sweet gentlemen follow exit
 thurio whi peevish girl
 that fli fortun follow 
 i reveng eglamour
 than love reckless silvia exit
 proteu and i follow silvia love
 than hate eglamour goe exit
 julia and i follow cross love
 than hate silvia gone love exit

scen iii the frontier mantua the forest

ent outlaw silva

 first outlaw come come 
 be patient must bring captain 
 silvia a thousand mischanc one
 have learn brook patient 
 second outlaw come bring away 
 first outlaw where gentleman

 but moys valeriu follow 
 go thou west end wood 
 there captain follow fled 
 the thicket beset can not scape 
 first outlaw come i must bring captain cave 
 fear bear honour mind 
 and use woman lawlessli

scen iv anoth part forest

ent valentine

 valentin how use doth breed habit man 
 thi shadowi desert unfrequ wood 
 i better brook flourish peopl town 
 here i sit alon unseen 
 and nightingal complain notes
 tune distress record woe 
 o thou dost inhabit breast 
 leav mansion long tenantless 
 lest grow ruinou build fall
 and leav memori 
 repair thi presenc silvia 
 thou gentl nymph cherish thi forlorn swain 
 what hallo stir day 
 these mate make will law 
 have unhappi passeng chase 
 they love well yet i much do
 to keep uncivil outrag 
 withdraw thee valentin who come 
 step asid 

 enter proteu silvia julia sebastian

 proteu madam servic i done 
 though respect aught servant doth 
 to hazard life rescu him
 that would forc honour love 
 vouchsaf meed one fair look 
 a smaller boon i can not beg 
 and less i sure can not give 
 valentin asid how like dream i see hear 
 love lend patienc forbear awhil 
 silvia o miser unhappi i 
 proteu unhappi madam ere i came 
 but come i made happi 
 silvia by thi approach thou mak st unhappi 
 julia asid and approacheth presenc 
 silvia had i seiz hungri lion 
 i would breakfast beast
 rather fals proteu rescu 
 o heaven judg i love valentin 
 whose life tender soul 
 and full much can not 
 i detest fals perjur proteu 
 therefor gone solicit 
 proteu what danger action stood next death 
 would i undergo one calm look 
 o ti curs love still approv 
 when women can not love belov 
 silvia when proteu can not love belov 
 read julia heart thi first best love 
 for whose dear sake thou didst rend thi faith
 into thousand oath oaths
 descend perjuri love 
 thou hast faith left unless thou dst two 
 and far wors none better none
 than plural faith much one 
 thou counterfeit thi true friend 
 proteu in love 
 who respect friend 
 silvia all men proteu 
 proteu nay gentl spirit move words
 can way chang milder form 
 i woo like soldier arm end 
 and love gainst natur love forc ye 
 silvia o heaven 
 proteu i forc thee yield desir 
 valentin ruffian let go rude uncivil touch 
 thou friend ill fashion 
 proteu valentin 
 valentin thou common friend without faith love 
 for friend treacher man 
 thou hast beguil hope nought mine eye
 could persuad now i dare say
 i one friend aliv thou wouldst disprov 
 who trust one right hand
 is perjur bosom proteu 
 i sorri i must never trust thee 
 but count world stranger thi sake 
 the privat wound deepest o time accurst 
 mongst foe friend worst 
 proteu my shame guilt confound 
 forgiv valentin hearti sorrow
 be suffici ransom offenc 
 i tender i truli suffer
 as e er i commit 
 valentin then i paid 
 and i receiv thee honest 
 who repent satisfied
 is heaven earth plea 
 by penit th etern wrath appea 
 and love may appear plain free 
 all mine silvia i give thee 
 julia o unhappi swoon 
 proteu look boy 
 valentin whi boy wag 
 what matter look speak 
 julia o good sir master charg deliv ring madam
 silvia neglect never done 
 proteu where ring boy 
 julia here ti 
 proteu how let see whi ring i gave julia 
 julia o cri merci sir i mistook 
 thi ring sent silvia 
 proteu but cam st thou ring 
 at depart i gave unto julia 
 julia and julia give 
 and julia brought hither 
 proteu how julia 
 julia behold gave aim thi oath 
 and entertain em deepli heart 
 how oft hast thou perjuri cleft root 
 o proteu let habit make thee blush 
 be thou asham i took upon me
 such immodest raiment shame live
 in disguis love 
 it lesser blot modesti find 
 women chang shape men mind 
 proteu than men mind ti true o heaven man
 but constant perfect that one error
 fill fault make run th sin 
 inconst fall ere begin 
 what silvia face i may spy
 more fresh julia constant eye 
 valentin come come hand either 
 let blest make happi close 
 twere piti two friend long foe 
 proteu bear wit heaven i wish ever 
 julia and i mine

 outlaw a prize prize prize

 banish valentin

 hi bodi girl love

prologu 

 florish 

new play maydenhead near kin 
much follow much moni g yn 
if stand sound well and good play
 whose modest scean blush marriag day 
and shake loos honour like hir
that holi tye first night stir
yet still modesti still retaines
mor maid sight husband pain 
we pray play may for i sure
it nobl breeder pure 
a learn poet never went
mor famou yet twixt po silver trent 
chaucer admir stori give 
there constant etern live 
if let fall nobleness 
and first sound child hear hiss 
how shake bone good man 
and make cri ground o fan
from witl chaff wrighter
that blast bay fam work make lighter
then robin hood thi fear bring 
for say truth endless thing 
and ambiti aspir 
weak almost breathless swim
in deep water do hold out
your help hand shall take 
and someth doe save us you shall heare
scean though art may yet appeare
worth two hour travel to bone sweet sleep 
content if play doe keepe
a littl dull time us perceave
our loss fall thick must need leav florish 

act i

scen 1 athen befor templ

 two nimph wheaten chaplet head then

the song musik 

rose sharp spine gon 
not royal smel alon 
but hew 
maiden pinck odour faint 
dazi smel less yet quaint
and sweet time true

with bel dimm

th honour bed sake
of cleer virgin advocate
for us distress thi good deede
shal raze th book trespasses
al set down

hippolita 
stand

no knee 
what woman i may steed distrest 
doe bind 

theseu 
what request deliv 

1 queen 
we 3 queen whose soveraign fel before
th wrath cruell creon endured
th beak raven tallent kight 
and peck crow fowl feild theb 
he suffer us burn bone 
to urn ash take th offence
of mortal loathsomen blest eye
of holi phoebu infect windes
with stench slain lord o pitti duke 
thou purger earth draw thi feard sword
that good turn th world give us bones
of dead king may chappel 
and thi boundl goodn take note
that crown head roof 
save lyon bear 
and vault everi thing 

theseu 
pray kneel 
i transport speech suffer d
your knee wrong i heard fortunes
of dead lord give lamenting
a wake vengeanc reveng em 
king capaneu lord day
that marri season 
a i met groom 
bi marsi altar time fair 
not iuno mantl fairer tress 
nor bounti spread your wheaten wreathe
wa threashd blast fortun you
dimpl cheek smile hercul kinesman
 then weaker eie laid club 
he tumbl down upon nemean hide
and swore sinew thawd o greif time 
feareful consum devour 

1 queen 
o i hope god 
some god hath put merci manhood
whereto heel infus powr press forth
our undertak 

theseu

vnto helmet belona use 
and pray souldier 
troubl i turn away 

2 queen 
honour hypolita 
most dread amazonian hast slaine
th sith tuskd bore thi arm strong
a white wast neer make male
to thi sex captiv thi lord 
born uphold creation honour
first natur stild shrunk thee into
th bownd thou wast ore flow subduing
thi forc thi affect soldiresse
that equal canst poiz sternen pitti 
whom i know hast much power him
then ever thee ow st strength
and love servant for
th tenour thi speech deer glass ladi 
bid flame war doth scortch 
vnder shaddow sword may cool us 
requir advanc ore head 
speak woman key like woman
a us three weep ere fail 
lend us knee 
but touch ground us longer time
then dove motion head pluckt 
tell th blood cizd field lay swoln 
show sun teeth grin moon 
what would doe

poor ladi say 
i leif trace good action you

went i will way my lord taken
hart deep distress let consid 
ile speak anon

your greef written cheek

o woe 
you can not read tear 
like wrinckl peobl glassi streame
y may behold em ladi ladi alack 
he treasur know th earth
must know center fish
for least minnow let lead line
to catch one heart o pardon 
extrem sharpen sundri wit 
make fool

pray say noth pray 
who can not feel see rain 
know neither wet dri were
th ground peec painter i would buy you
t instruct gainst capital greef inde 
such heart peirc demonstr ala 
be natural sifter sex
your sorrow beat ardent upon 
that shall make counter reflect gainst
mi brother heart warm pitti 
though made stone pray good comfort

forward th templ leav iot
o th sacr ceremoni 

1 queen

wil long last costli then
your suppliant war rememb fame
knowl ear th world doe quickly

then other labour medit premeditating

what bed slain king

that deer lord none

of fate wedlock

or futur cope 

1 queen 
the proclaiming
our suit shall neglect armes
 lock iov synod shall
bi warrant moon light corslet thee oh when
her twyne cherri shall sweetn fall
vpon thi tasteful lip wilt thou thinke
of rotten king blubberd queen care
for thou feelst thou feelst able
to make mar spurn drom o thou couch
but one night everi howr will
tak hostag thee hundr and
thou shalt rememb noth what
that banket bid thee 

hippolita 
though much unlik kneel 
you transport much sorry
i suitour yet i think 
did i th abstayn joy 
which breed deeper long cure surfeit
that crave present medcin i plucke
al ladi scandal therefor sir 
a i shall make tryall prayr 
either presum forc 
or sentenc ay vigour domb

your sheild afor heart necke
which ffee i freeli lend
to doe poor queen servic

our caus cri knee

mi sister petit forc 
with celer natur which
she make henceforth ile dare
to ask thing hardy
ev take husband

that kneel pyrith

in pretend celebr queen

scene 2 theb 

 enter palamon arcit 

arcit 
deer palamon deerer love blood
and prime cosen yet unhardn in
th crime natur let us leav citty
theb tempt further
sulli gloss youth 
and keep abstin shame
a incontin swim
i th aid th current almost sinck 
at least frustrat strive follow
th common stream twold bring us edy
wher turn drown labour 
our gain life weaken 

palamon 
your advice
i cride exampl strang ruins
sinc first went school may perceive
walk theb skar bare weedes
th gain th martialist propound
to bold end honour golden ingot 
which though flurted
bi peac fought shall offer
to marsi scornd altar i doe bleede
when i meet wish great iuno would
resum ancient fit ielouzie
to get soldier work peac might purge
for replet retain anew
h charit heart hard harsher
then strife war could 

arcit 
are 
meet ruin soldier in
th cranck turn theb begin
a met decai mani kind 
perceiv none doe arows pitty
but th un considerd soldier 

palamon 
ye i pitty
decai ere i find most
that sweat honour toyl 
are paid yce cool em 

arcit 
ti this
i begin speak thi vertue
of respect theb i spake thebs
how danger keep honour 
it resyd everi evill
hath good cullor eve ry seem good s
a certain evil ev n iumpe
a stranger and
such thing meer monster 

palamon 
ti power 
 vnless fear ape tutor to
b master manner need i
affect anoth gate catching
wher faith fond upon
anoth way speech mine owne
i may reason conceiv sav 
speak truli i bound
bi gener bond follow him
follow taylor hapli long untill
th follow make pursuit let know 
whi mine own barber unblest him
mi poor chinn ti cizard iust
to favorit glass what cannon there
that command rapier hip
to dangl hand go tip toe
befor street foul either i am
th fore hors team i none
that draw th sequent trace poor sleight sores
need plantin that rip bosome
almost th heart 

arcit 
our vncle creon 

palamon 
he 
a unbound tyrant whose successes
mak heaven unfeard villani assured
beyond power noth almost puts
faith feavour deifi alone
volubl chanc one attributes
th faculti instruments
to own nerv act command men servic 
and winn boot glori e 
that fear harm good dare let
th blood mine sibb suckt
from leech let break fall
off corrupt

let leav court may noth share
of lowd infami milke
wil relish pastur must
b vile disobedi kinesmen
in blood unless qualiti 

palamon 
noth truer 
i think eccho shame dea ft
the ear heav nli iustic widdow cryes
descend again throat not

 enter valeriu 

due audienc god valeriu 

valeriu 
the king cal yet leaden foot 
till great rage phebu when
h broke whipstock exclaimd against
th hors sun whisperd too
th lowdeness furi 

palamon 
small wind shake 
but what matter 

valeriu 
theseu threat appal hath sent
deadli defyanc pronounces
ruin theb hand seale
th promis wrath

but fear god bring not
a jot terrour us yet man
third own worth case 
when action dregd mind assurd
ti bad goe

yet neutral dishonour 
rebelli oppos therefor must
with stand merci fate 
who hath bound last minut

ist sed warr foot shall 
on fail condit 

valeriu 
ti motion
th intellig state came instant
with defier

a quarter carrier honour which
hi enemi come blood venture
should health spent 
rather laid purchas ala 
our hand advanc heart will
th fall th stroke doe damag

that never er arbitratour tell us
when know selv let us follow
th beck chanc exeunt 

scene 3 befor gate athen 

 enter pirith hipolita emilia

no 

hippolita 
sir farewel repeat wishes
to great lord whose succ i dare not
mak timer question yet i wish him
exc overflow power might 
to dure ill deal fortun speed 
store never hurt good gouernour 

perith 
though i know
hi ocean need poor drop yet they
must yeild tribut my preciou maid 
those best affect heaven infuse
in best temperd peic keep enthroand
in dear heart 

emilia 
thanck sir rememb me
to royal brother whose speede
th great bellona ile sollicit and
sinc terren state petit not
without gift understood ile offer her
what i shall advis like hearts
ar armi tent 

hippolita 
in bosom 
we bin soldier wee can not weepe
when friend helm put sea 
or tell babe broachd launc women
that sod infant eat 
the brine wept kill em then if
you stay see us spincster we
should hold ever 

perith 
peac 
a i pursu war shall then
beyond requir exit pir 

emilia 
how longing
follow friend sinc depart sportes
though crave seriousn skill past slightly
hi carel execut gaine
mad regard loss consid but
play one busin hand another
direct head mind nurs equall
to diffr twyn observ 
sinc great lord depart 

hippolita 
with much labour 
and i love fort two cabind
in mani danger poor corner 
peril want contend skift
torr whose rore tyranni power
i th least dreadful have
fought togeth death self lodgd 
yet fate hath brought their knot love 
tide weau intangl true long 
and finger deep cun 
may outworn never undon i thinke
theseu can not umpir himself 
cleav conscienc twain doing
each side like iustic love best 

emilia 
doubtlesse
ther best reason manners
to say i acquainted
onc time i enjoyd play fellow 
you war grave enrichd 
who made proud bed took leav th moone
 which lookt pale part count
wa eleven 

hippolita 
twa flaui n 

emilia 
ye 
you talk pirith theseu love 
their ground matur seasond 
more buckl strong iudgement needes
th one th may said water 2 hears ready
 palamon arcit 3 queen theseu his
 lord readi 
their intertangl root love i
and shee i sigh spoke thing innoc 
lou like elements
that know yet doe effect
rar issu oper soules
did one anoth lik 
wa approov condemd 
no arraign flowr i would plucke
and put between breast beginning
to swell blossom oh would long
til shee anoth commit it
to like innoc cradl phenix like
they dide perfum head toy
but pattern affect pretti 
though happ carel i followed
for seriou deck mine eare
stoln new air adventur humd on
from musical coynadg note
whereon spirit would sojourn rather dwell 
and sing slumber thi rehearsall
 which ev ry innoc wot well come in
lik old import bastard end 
that true love tween mayd mayd may be
mor sex idividual 

hippolita 
i breath
and high speed pace say
that shall never like maid flavina
lov calld man 

emilia 
i sure i shall 

hippolita 
now alack weak sister 
i must beleev thee point
 though i know thou dost beleev thi self 
then i trust sick appetit 
that loath even long sure sister 
if i ripe perswas you
hav said enough shake arme
of nobl theseu whose fortunes
i kneel great assur 
that piroth possesse
th high throne heart 

emilia 
i not
against faith yet i continew mine exeunt cornet 

scene 4 a field thebe dead bodi lie ground 

 a battail strook within then retrait florish then

friend thee ever

all good may
b wishd upon thi head i cri amen 

theseu 
th imparcial god mount heavens
view us mortal heard behold err 
and time chastic goe find out
th bone dead lord honour them
with trebl ceremoni rather gap
should deer right would suppli 
but deput shall invest
y digniti even thing
our hast leav imperfect so adiew 
and heaven good eye look what exeunt
queen 

herald 
men great qualiti may judgd
bi appoint sone theb told s
they sister children nephew king 

theseu 
bi th helm mar i saw war 
like pair lion smeard prey 
make lane troop agast i fixt note
constantli marke
worth god view prison told me
when i enquir name 

herald 
wi leav r call arcit palamon 

theseu 
ti right they dead 

herald 
nor state life bin taken 
when last hurt given twa possibl 3 hearses
readi 
they might bin recov yet breathe
and haue name men 

theseu 
then like men use em 
the lee million rate 
exceed wine other surgions
conv behoof richest balmes
rath niggard waft live concern us
much theb worth rather em
fre plight morn state
 sound liberti i would em dead 
but forti thousand fold rather em
prison us death bear em speedily
from kind air unkind minister
what man man may doe sake 
sinc i known fright furi friend beheast 
love provoc zeal mistri task 
desir liberti feavour madn 
hath set mark natur could reach too
without imposit sickn will
or wrastl strength reason for love
and great appollo merci best
their best skill tender lead citti 
where bound thing scatterd post florish 
to athen e armi exeunt musick

scene 2 the prison 

 enter palamon arcit prison 

palamon 
how doe nobl cosen 

arcit 
how doe sir 

palamon

and bear chanc warr yet prison 
i fear ever cosen 

arcit 
i beleev 
and destini patiently
laid hour come 

palamon 
o cosen arcit 
where theb nobl countri 
where friend kindr never more
must behold comfort never see
th hardi youth strive game honour
 hung paint favour ladi 
like tall ship sail start among st em
and eastwind leav en behind us 
like lazi clowd whilst palamon arcit 
even wag wanton leg
out stript peopl prais garland 
ere time wish em o never
shal two exercis like twyn honour 
our arm again feel fyri horses
lik proud sea us good sword now
 better red eyd god war nev r wore 
ravishd side like age must run rust 
and deck templ god hate us 
these hand shall never draw em like lightn 
to blast whole armi 

arcit 
no palamon 
those hope prison us are
and grace youth must wither
lik time spring age must find us 
and heaviest palamon unmarri 
the sweet embrac love wife 
loden kiss armd thousand cupids
shal never clasp neck issu know us 
no figur selv shall ev r see 
to glad age like young eagl teach em
boldli gaze bright arm say 
 rememb father conquer 
the fair eyd maid shall weep banish 
and song curs ever blind fortun 
till shee shame see wrong done
to youth natur thi world 
we shall know noth one anoth 
hear noth clock tel woe 
the vine shall grow shall never see 
sommer shall come delight 
but dead cold winter must inhabit still 

palamon 
ti true arcit to theban hound 
that shook age forrest eccho 
no must halloa shake
our point iavelyn whilst angri swine
fly like parthian quiver rage 
struck well steeld dart all valiant uses
 the food nourish nobl mind 
in us two shall perish shall die
 which curs honour lastly
children greif ignor 

arcit 
yet cosen 
even bottom miseri 
from fortun inflict upon us 
i see two comfort ryse two meer bless 
if god pleas hold brave patienc 
and enjoy greef togeth 
whilst palamon let perish
if i think prison 

palamon 
certeinli 
ti main goodn cosen fortunes
wer twyn togeth ti true two soules
put two nobl bodi let em suffer
th gaul hazard grow togeth 
will never sinck must say could 
a will man die sleep done 

arcit 
shall make worthi use place
that men hate much 

palamon 
how gentl cosen 

arcit 
let think prison holi sanctuari 
to keep us corrupt wors men 
we young yet desir wai honour 
that liberti common convers 
the poyson pure spirit might like women
woo us wander what worthi blessing
can imaginations
may make and heer thu togeth 
we endl mine one anoth 
we one anoth wife ever begetting
new birth love father friend acquaint 
we one anoth famili 
i heir mine thi place
i inherit hard oppressour
dar take us littl patienc 
we shall live long love no surfeit seek us 
the hand war hurt none seas
swallow youth liberti 
a wife might part us law busin 
quarrel consum us envi ill men
grav acquaint i might sicken cosen 
where never know perish
without nobl hand close mine eie 
or praier god thousand chaunc 
were henc would seaver us

you made me

that wooe wil men vaniti

to tell world ti gaudi shaddow 
that old time pass take 
what bin old court creon 
where sin iustic lust ignorance
th vertu great one cosen arcit

and epitaph peopl curs

scene 3 the countri near athen 

 enter arcit 

arcit

a merci i must thank em banishd
th free enjoy face i die

beyond imagin such vengeance
that i old wick sins
could never pluck upon palamon 
thou ha st start thou shalt stay see
her bright eye break morn gainst thi window 
and let life thee thou shalt feede
vpon sweeten nobl beauti 
that natur nev r exceed nev r shall

tempest make wild rock wanton 
come come

scene 4 athen a room prison 

 enter iailor daughter alon 

daughter 
whi i love gentleman ti odds
h never affect i base 
mi father mean keeper prison 
and princ to marri hopeless 
to whore witl out upon 
what push wench driven 
when fifteen found us first i saw 
i see thought goodli man 
he much pleas woman

thes eye yet lookt next i pitti 
and would young wench conscienc 
that ever dream vow maydenhead
to yong hansom man then i lov 
extream lov infinit lov

but heart palamon 
lord coyl keep to hear him
s even heaven

to bring water morn first

and much see miseri

for i would fain enjoy say i ventur d
to set free sai law thu much
for law kindr i doe 
and night morrow shall love exit

scene 6 befor prison 

 enter iaylor daughter alon 

daughter 
let duke divel rore 
he liberti i venturd 
and i brought littl wood
a mile henc i sent cedar 
higher rest spread like plane
fast brook shall keep close 
till i provid fyle food yet
hi yron bracelet o love 
what stout heart child thou art my father
durst better indur cold yron done 
i love beyond love beyond reason 
or wit safeti i made know 
i care i desper if law
find condemn wench 
some honest hart maid sing dirg 
and tell memori death nobl 
di almost martyr that way take 
i purpos way sure cannot
b unmanli leav 
if doe maid easily
trust men again and yet thank me
for i done much kist 
and think well scarcely
could i perswad becom freeman 
he made scrupl wrong did
to father yet i hope 
when consid love mine
wil take root within let doe
what use kindli 
for use shall ile proclaim 
and face man ile presently
provid necessari pack cloath 
and patch ground ile ventur 
so hee by like shadow 
ile ever dwell within hour whoobub
wil ore prison i then
kiss man look farewel father 
get mani prison daughter 
and shortli may keep self now 

act iii

scen 1 a forest near athen 

 cornet sundri place nois hallow peopl a
may 

 enter arcit alon 

arcit 
the duke lost hypolita tooke
a several land thi solemn right
they owe bloomd may athenian pay it
to th heart ceremoni o queen emilia 
fresher may sweeter
then hir gold button bow all
th enamelld knack th mead garden yea 
we challeng banck nymph
that make stream seem flower thou iewell
o th wood th world hast likewis blest place
with thi sole presenc thi rumination
that i poor man might eftsoon come betweene
and chop cold thought thrice bless chanc 
to drop mistri expectation
most giltless tell o ladi fortun 
 next eme soveraign far
i may prowd she take strong note 
hath made neer beuteou morne
 the prim st year present with
a brace hors two steed might well
b pair king backt field
that crown titl tride ala ala 
poor cosen palamon poor prison thou
so littl dream st upon fortun that
thou thinkst thi self happier thing be
so near emilia thou deem st theb 
and therein wretch although free but if
thou knew st mistri breathd that
i ear languag livd eye o coz 
what passion would enclos thee 

 enter palamon bush shackl bend fist at
arcit 

palamon 
traytor kinesman 
thou shouldst perceiv passion signes
of prison hand
but owner sword by oth one 
i iustic love would make thee
a confest traytor o thou perfidious
that ever gentli lookd voydest honour 
that eu r bore gentl token falsest cosen
that ever blood made kin call st thou hir thine 
ile prove shackl hand 
void appoint thou ly st art
a theef love chaffi lord

and hous clogg away

deer cosin palamon 

palamon

a thou hast shewd feat

wer tyde

hi ear disdain

come

th trespass thou hast done yea life 
if thou carri brave soul shades
that dyde manli seek me
som new earth shall get none 
that thou art brave nobl

in kind bold

sweet palamon

scene 2 anoth part forest 

 enter iaylor daughter alon 

daughter 
he mistook brake i meant gone
aft fanci ti welnigh morn 
no matter would perpetual night 
and darken lord th world hark ti woolf 
in hath greif slain fear one thing
i care noth palamon 
i wreak wolv would jaw so
h file i hallowd 
i can not hallow i whoop 
if answeard i call wolf 
and doe servic i heard
strang howl live long night may be
they made prey weapon 
he can not run iengl gives
might call fell thing listen them
a senc know man unarmd can
smel resist ile set downe
h torn peec howld mani together
and fed so much 
be bold ring bell stand i 
all char gone no i lye 
mi father hang escap 
mi self beg i prizd life much
a deni act i would 
should i tri death dusson i mop 
food took i none two dai 
sipt water i closd mine eyes
sav lid scowrd brine ala 
dissolu life let senc unsettl 
least i drown stab hang self 
o state natur fail togeth 
sinc thi best prop warpt so way 
the best way next way grave 
each errant step besid torment loe 
the moon crycket chirp schreichowle
cal dawn offic done
sav i fail but point 
an end exit

scene 6 same scene iii 

 enter palamon bush 

palamon 
about hour cosen gave faith
to visit again bring
two sword two good armor fail 
he neither man souldier when left 
i think week could restord
mi lost strength i grown low 
and crest faln want i thank thee arcit 
thou art yet fair foe i feel selfe
with refresh abl againe
to dure danger to delay longer
would make world think come hear 
that i lay fat like swine fight 
and souldier therefor blest morning
shal last sword refus 
if hold i kill ti iustic 
so love fortun o good morrow 

 enter arcit armor sword 

arcit

i debt honour duti

a beneficial foe embraces
might thank ye blow

a nobl recomp 

palamon

defi fair term show
mor mistri anger
a love thing honour 
we bred talk man arm d
and upon guard let furi 
like meet two tide fli strongli us 
and birthright beauty
tru pertain without obbraid scorn 
dispis person powt 
fitter girl schooleboy seene
and quickli mine wilt pleas arm sir 
or feel self fit yet
and furnishd old strength ile stay cosen 
and ev ry day discours health

though i dide but love lady
and justifi love i must fli

 enter theseu hipolita emilia perith train 

theseu 
what ignor mad malici traitor

bi castor shall dye

think well deserv arcit

wa begd banish contemn thee
and thou dar st doe disguise

and first bequeath soul justly
i dare think

the true descid injuri

theseu

a i love faith perish 
a i brought life confirm 
a i serv truest worthiest

whi fair eye command me
stay love say traytor 
i villain fit lye unburi
