saf banish can two live
and agoni love em 
and kill one anoth everi day

in publiqu question sword be wise

and oth equal i said die 
better fall th law one anoth

your reason hold vowes
stand express world must perish 
besid i anoth oth gainst 
of author i sure love 
not made passion neither good heed

perith 
vrge home brave ladi 

emilia

fit modest suit free grant

think maim honour

to compass how lives
might breed ruin name opinion 
shall thing love perish 
that cruell wisedom doe men proyne
th straight yong bow blush thousand blossom 
becaus may rotten o duke theseu 
the goodli mother groand 
and long maid ever lov 
if vow stand shall curs beauti 
and funeral song two cosens
despis cruelti cri woe worth 
till i noth scorn women 
for heaven sake save live banish em 

theseu 
on condit

to make content know 
to tread upon thi dukedom 
where ever shall travel ever strangers
to one anoth

on peec earth

knight 

arcit 
farewel sir 
knight kinsemen lover yea sacrific 
true worshipp mar whose spirit you
expel seed fear th apprehension
which still farther goe me
befor god profess there
requir heart lyon and
th breath tiger yea fearceness 
yea speed also goe i mean 
els wish snayl know prize
must drag blood forc great feate
must put garland stickes
th queen flower intercess then
must make camp cestron
brymd blood men give aide
and bend spirit toward they kneel 
thou mighti one thi power hast turnd
green neptun purpl whose approach 
comet prewarn whose havock vast feild
vnearth skull proclaim whose breath blow down 
the teem cere foyzon doth plucke
with hand armypot forth blew clowdes
th masond turret mak st break st
the stoni girth citti thi pupl 
yongest follow thi drom instruct day
with militari skill thi lawde
i may advanc streamer thee 
be stil lord th day give great mar 
some token thi pleasur 

 here fall face formerli heard
 clang armor short thunder burst a
battail 
 whereupon rise bow altar 

o great corrector enorm time 
shaker ore rank state thou grand decider
of dusti old tytl healst blood
th earth sick curst world
o th pluresi peopl i doe take
thi sign auspici thi name
to design march boldli let us goe exeunt 

 enter palamon knight former observ 

palamon 
our star must glister new fire be
to daie extinct argument love 
which goddess grant gives
victori blend spirit mine 
you whose free nobleness doe make cause
your personal hazard goddess venus
commend proceed implore
h power unto parti here kneel formerli 
hail soveraign queen secret hast power
to call feircest tyrant rage 
and weep unto girl ha st might 
even ey glanc choke marsi drom
and turn th allarm whisper canst make
a cripl florish crutch cure him
befor apollo may st forc king
to subject vassail induce
stal graviti daunc pould bachelour 
whose youth like wonton boy bonfyr 
have skipt thi flame seaventi thou canst catch
and make scorn hoars throat 
abus yong lai love godlik power
hast thou power upon to phoebu thou
add st flame hotter heavenli fyres
did scortch mortal son thine huntresse
al moyst cold say began throw
her bow away sigh take thi grace
m thi vowd souldier doe bear thi yoke
a wer wreath rose yet heavier
then lead self sting nettl 
i never been foul mouthd thi law 
nev r reveald secret i knew none would 
had i kend i never practised
vpon man wife would libel reade
of liberal wit i never great feastes
sought betray beauti blush d
at simpr sir i been harsh
to larg confessor hotli ask them
if mother i one woman 
and women wer wrong i knew man
of eighti winter i told who
a lass foureteen bride twa thi power
to put life dust age crampe
had screw squar foot round 
the gout knit finger knot 
tortur convuls globi eye 
had almost drawn spheer life
in seem tortur anatomie
had yong fair phear boy i
beleev swore 
and would beleev brief i am
to prate done companion 
to boast defyer 
to would can not rejoyc 
yea i doe love tell close offices
th fowlest way name conceal in
th boldest languag one i 
and vow lover never yet made sigh
truer i o soft sweet goddess 
give victori question which
i true love merit bless signe
of thi great pleasur 

 here musick heard dove seen flutter fall
 again upon face knee 

palamon 
o thou eleven nineti raign st
in mortal bosom whose chase world 
and heard thi game i give thee thankes
for fair token layd unto
min innoc true heart arm assur they bow 
mi bodi business let us rise
and bow goddess time come exeunt 

 still musick record 

 enter emilia white hair shoulder wear a
wheaten wreath one white hold train hair stucke
with flower one carri silver hynd is
conveyd incens sweet odour set upon altar of
diana maid stand loof set fire they
curtsey kneel 

emilia 
o sacr shadowi cold constant queen 
abandon revel mute contempl 
sweet solitari white chast pure
a windefand snow thi femal knights
alow st blood make blush 
which order robe i heer thi priest 
am humbl fore thine altar o vouchsaf 
with thi rare green eye never yet
beheld thing macul look thi virgin 
and sacr silver mistri lend thine eare
 which nev r heard scurril term whose port
n entr wanton found petition
seasond holi fear thi last
of vestal offic i bride habit 
but mayden hart husband i point 
but doe know two i should
choos one pray success i
am guiltless elect mine eye 
were i loos one equal preciou 
i could doomb neither perish should
go unsentenc therefor modest queen 
he two pretend best love me
and truest titl let him
tak wheaten gerland els grant
th fyle qualiti i hold i may
continu thi band 

 here hynd vanish altar place ascends
 rose tree one rose upon 

see general ebb flowes
out bowel holi altar
with sacr act advanc but one rose 
if well inspird battail shal confound
both brave knight i virgin flowre
must grow alon unpluck 

 here heard sodain twang instrument rose fal 
 tree vanish altar 

the flowr faln tree descend o mistri 
thou dischargest i shall gather 
i think i know thine own 
vnclasp thi misteri i hope plea 
her sign gratiou they curtsey exeunt

emilia

i like engyn bent sharp weapon

ar bedfellow visag palamon
ha menac aspect brow

wil dwell upon object mellencholly

stick misbecomingli other them

so charm thought alcid was
to sow lead i could praise
each part th i spoke arcite
did loos for thu good

two emul philomel beat ear th night
with contenti throat one higher 
anon again first 
and breast sence
could judg between em so far d
good space between kinesmen till heaven did

you sould em cheap

that dearli sweet bitter

hath wakt us dream 

perith 
list cosen 
mount upon steed emily
did first bestow black one owing
not hayr worth white say
weaken price mani buy
hi goodness note which superstition
heer find allow on hors arcite
trot stone athen calkins
did rather tell trampl horse
would make length mile plea rider
to put pride thu went counting
th flinti pavement danc wer th musicke
hi own hoof made say iron
cam musick origen enviou flint 
cold old saturn like possest
with fire malevol dart spark 
or feirc sulphur els end made 
i comment hot hors hot fire 
took toy fell disorder
hi power could give bound come end 
forget school doo therein traind 
and kind mannadg pig like whines
at sharp rowel freat rather
then jot obai seek foul meanes
of boystrou rough iadri di seate
hi lord kept brave nought serv 
when neither curb would crack girth break diffr plunges
di root rider whenc grew that
h kept tween legg hind hoof end stand 
that arcit legg higher head 
seem strang art hand hi victor wreath
even fell head presently
backeward iad come ore full poyze
becom rider load yet live 
but vessel ti float for
th surg next approach much desires
to speech loe appear 

 enter theseu hipolita emilia arcit chair 

palamon 
o miser end allianc 
the god mighti arcit thi heart 
thi worthi manli heart yet unbroken 
give thi last word i palamon 
one yet love thee die 

arcit 
take emilia
and world joy reach thi hand 
farewel i told last hour i fals 
yet never treacher forgiv cosen 
one kiss fair emilia ti done 
take i die 

palamon 
thi brave soul seek elizium 

emilia 
ile close thine eye princ bless soul thee 
thou art right good man i live 
thi day i give tear 

palamon 
and i honour 

theseu 
in place first fought ev n here
i sundr acknowledg gods
our thank live 
hi part playd though short 
he well day lengthn and
th blisseful dew heaven arowz 
the powerful venu well hath grac altar 
and given love our master mars
hath vouch oracl arcit gave
th grace content so deities
hav shewd due justic bear henc 

palamon 
o cosen 
that thing desir doe cost us
th loss desir that nought could buy
dear love loss dear love 

theseu 
never fortune
did play subtler game the conquerd triumph 
the victor loss yet passage
th god been equal palamon 
your kinseman hath confest right th lady
did lye first saw and
even proclaimd fanci he restord her
a stoln iewel desir spirit
to send henc forgiven the god justice
tak hand become
th execution lead ladi 
and call lover stage death 
whom i adopt frind a day two
let us look sadli give grace unto
th funeral arcit whose end
th visag bridegroom weel put on
and smile palamon hour 
but one hour sinc i dear sorri 
a glad arcit glad 
a sorri o heavenli charmer 
what thing make us for lacke
w laugh sorri still
ar children kind let us thankefull
for leav dispute
that question let goe 
and bear us like time florish exeunt 

epilogue

i would ask ye ye like play 
but school boy can not say 
i cruell feareful pray yet stay 
and let look upon ye no man smile 
then goe hard i see he has
lov yong hansom wench show face 
ti strang none heer will
against conscienc let hiss kill
our market ti vain i see stay yee 
have worst come now say ye 
and yet mistak i bold 
we caus if tale told
 for ti way content ye
 for honest purpos ment ye 
we end ye shall ere long 
i dare say mani better prolong
your old love us might
rest servic gentlemen good night florish

act i

scen i sicilia an antechamb leont palac 

 enter camillo archidamu 

archidamu 
if shall chanc camillo visit bohemia like occasion
whereon servic foot shall see i said 
great differ betwixt bohemia sicilia 

camillo 
i think come summer king sicilia mean pay bohemia the
visit justli owe

wherein entertain shall shame us justifi our
lov for inde 

camillo 
beseech 

archidamu 
verili i speak freedom knowledg we can not such
magnific rare i know say we give sleepy
drink sens unintellig insuffici may 
though can not prais us littl accus us 

camillo 
you pay great deal dear given freeli 

archidamu 
believ i speak understand instruct mine
honesti put utter 

camillo 
sicilia can not show kind bohemia they trained
togeth childhood root betwixt such
an affect can not choos branch sinc more
matur digniti royal necess made separ their
societi encount though person royally
attorney interchang gift letter love embassi that
they seem togeth though absent shook hand a
vast embrac end oppos wind the
heaven continu love

i think world either malic matter alter 
you unspeak comfort young princ mamilliu it a
gentleman greatest promis ever came note

one inde physic subject make old heart fresh they that
went crutch ere born desir yet life see a
man

had one

scene ii the a room state palac 

 enter leont polixen hermion mamilliu camillo attend 

polixen 
nine chang wateri star hath been
th shepherd note sinc left throne
without burden time long again
would fill brother thank 
and yet perpetu 
go henc debt therefor like cipher 
yet stand rich place i multiply
with one thank mani thousand more
that go 

leont 
stay thank 
and pay part 

polixen 
sir tomorrow 
i question fear may chance
or breed upon absenc may blow
no sneap wind home make us say
 thi put forth truli besid i stay d
to tire royalti 

leont 
we tougher brother 
than put us 

polixen 
no longer stay 

leont 
one seve night longer 

polixen 
veri sooth tomorrow 

leont 
we part time that
i gainsay 

polixen 
press beseech 
there tongu move none none th world 
so soon could win 
were necess request although
 twere need i deni my affairs
do even drag homeward hinder
wer love whip stay
to charg troubl save 
farewel brother 

leont 
tongu tie queen speak

y drawn oath stay you sir 
charg coldli tell sure
al bohemia well satisfaction
th gone day proclaim say 
he beat best ward 

leont 
well said hermion 

hermion 
to tell long see son strong 
but let say let go 
but let swear shall stay 
we thwack henc distaff 
 _to polixen _ yet royal presenc i adventure
th borrow week when bohemia
y take lord i give commission
to let month behind gest
prefix part yet good deed leont 
i love thee jar th clock behind
what ladi lord you stay 

polixen 
no madam 

hermion 
nay 

polixen 
i may verili 

hermion 
verili 
you put limber vow i 
though would seek unspher star oath 
should yet say sir go verili 
you shall go a ladi verili is
a potent lord will go yet 
forc keep prison 
not like guest shall pay fees
when depart save thank how say 
mi prison guest by dread verili 
one shall 

polixen 
your guest madam 
to prison import offend 
which less easi commit
than punish 

hermion 
not gaoler 
but kind hostess come i question you
of lord trick boy 
you pretti lord 

polixen 
we fair queen 
two lad thought behind
but day tomorrow today 
and boy etern

wa lord
th verier wag th two 

polixen 
we twinn lamb frisk th sun
and bleat one th what chang d
wa innoc innoc knew not
th doctrin ill dream d
that had pursu life 
and weak spirit ne er higher rear d
with stronger blood answer heaven
boldli not guilti imposit clear d
hereditari

bi gather
y tripp sinc 

polixen 
o sacr ladi 
temptat sinc born for
in unfledg day wife girl 
your preciou self cross eyes
of young play fellow

grace boot 
of make conclus lest say
your queen i devil yet go 
th offenc made answer 
if first sinn us us
you continu fault slipp not
with us

i yet

he stay lord

at request would 
hermion dearest thou never spok st
to better purpos

never 

leont 
never 

hermion 
what i twice said well 
i prithe tell cram prais make s
a fat tame thing one good deed die tongueless
slaught thousand wait upon 
our prais wage you may ride s
with one soft kiss thousand furlong ere
with spur heat acr but th goal 
mi last good deed entreat stay 
what first it elder sister 
or i mistak o would name grace 
but i spoke purpos 
nay let i long 

leont 
whi when
thre crab month sour death 
ere i could make thee open thi white hand
and clap thyself love didst thou utter
 i ever 

hermion 
 ti grace inde 
whi lo i spoke th purpos twice 
the one ever earn royal husband 
th friend 

 _give hand polixen _ 

leont 
 _asid _ too hot hot 
to mingl friendship far mingl blood 
i _tremor cordis_ my heart danc 
but joy joy thi entertainment
may free face put deriv liberty
from hearti bounti fertil bosom 
and well becom agent may i grant 
but paddl palm pinch finger 
a make practi smiles
a look glass sigh twere
th mort th deer o entertainment
mi bosom like brow mamilliu 
art thou boy 

mamilliu 
ay good lord 

leont 
i feck 
whi bawcock what hast smutch thi nose 
they say copi mine come captain 
we must neat neat cleanli captain 
and yet steer heifer calf
ar call neat still virginalling
upon palm how wanton calf 
art thou calf 

mamilliu 
ye lord 

leont 
thou want st rough pash shoot i have
to full like yet say are
almost like egg women say 
that say anyth but false
a er dy black wind water false
a dice wish one fixes
no bourn twixt mine yet true
to say boy like come sir page 
look welkin eye sweet villain 
most dear st collop can thi dam may 
affect thi intent stab centr 
thou dost make possibl thing held 
communicat st dream 
with unreal thou coactiv art 
and fellow st noth ti credent
th may st co join someth thou dost 
and beyond commiss i find 
and infect brains
and harden brow 

polixen 
what mean sicilia 

hermion 
he someth seem unsettl 

polixen 
how lord 
what cheer how best brother 

hermion 
you look
a held brow much distract 
are mov lord 

leont 
no good earnest 
how sometim natur betray folli 
it tender make pastime
to harder bosom look lines
of boy face methought i recoil
twenti three year saw unbreech 
in green velvet coat dagger muzzled
lest bite master prove 
a ornament oft danger 
how like methought i kernel 
thi squash gentleman mine honest friend 
will take egg money 

mamilliu 
no lord i fight 

leont 
you whi happi man dole my brother 
are fond young princ we
do seem 

polixen 
if home sir 
he exercis mirth matter 
now sworn friend mine enemi 
mi parasit soldier statesman 
he make juli day short decemb 
and vari child cure me
thought would thick blood 

leont 
so stand squire
off we two walk lord 
and leav graver step hermion 
how thou lov st us show brother welcom 
let dear sicili cheap 
next thyself young rover s
appar heart 

hermion 
if would seek us 
we garden shall attend 

leont 
to bent dispos found 
be beneath sky _asid _ i angl 
though perceiv i give line 
go go 
how hold neb bill 
and arm bold wife
to allow husband 

 _exeunt polixen hermion attend _ 

gone alreadi 
inch thick knee deep er head ear fork one 
go play boy play thi mother play i
play disgrac part whose issue
wil hiss grave contempt clamour
wil knell go play boy play there 
or i much deceiv cuckold ere 
and mani man even present 
now i speak hold wife th arm 
that littl think sluic absenc 
and pond fish next neighbour by
sir smile neighbour nay comfort 
while men gate gate open 
a mine should despair
that hath revolt wive tenth mankind
would hang physic none 
it bawdi planet strike
wher ti predomin ti power think 
from east west north south be conclud 
no barricado belli know 
it let enemy
with bag baggag mani thousand us
hav diseas feel how boy 

mamilliu 
i like say 

leont 
whi comfort 
what camillo 

camillo 
ay good lord 

leont 
go play mamilliu thou rt honest man 

 _exit mamilliu _ 

camillo great sir yet stay longer 

camillo 
you much ado make anchor hold 
when cast still came home 

leont 
didst note 

camillo 
he would stay petit made
hi busi materi 

leont 
didst perceiv 
 _asid _ they alreadi whisp ring round 
 sicilia forth ti far gone
when i shall gust last how came camillo 
that stay 

camillo 
at good queen entreati 

leont 
at queen good pertin 
but wa taken
bi understand pate thine 
for thi conceit soak draw in
mor common block not note 
but finer natur severals
of head piec extraordinari lower messes
perch busi purblind say 

camillo 
busi lord i think understand
bohemia stay longer 

leont 
ha 

camillo 
stay longer

ay 

camillo 
to satisfi high entreaties
of graciou mistress

leont 
read indict 

offic 
 _read _ hermion queen worthi leont king sicilia 
thou art accus arraign high treason committing
adulteri polixen king bohemia conspir camillo
to take away life sovereign lord king thi royal
husband pretenc whereof circumst partli laid open 
thou hermion contrari faith allegi true subject 
didst counsel aid better safeti fli away by
night 

hermion 
sinc i say must that
which contradict accus and
th testimoni part other
but come shall scarc boot me
to say not guilti mine integr 
be count falsehood shall i express 
be receiv but thu power divine
behold human action 
i doubt innoc shall make
fals accus blush tyranny
trembl patienc you lord best know 
who least seem past life
hath contin chast true 
a i unhappi more
than histori pattern though devi d
and play take spectat for behold 
a fellow royal bed owe
a moieti throne great king daughter 
the mother hope princ standing
to prate talk life honour fore
who pleas come hear for life i prize it
a i weigh grief i would spare for honour 
 ti deriv mine 
and i stand i appeal
to conscienc sir polixenes
cam court i grace 
how merit sinc came 
with encount uncurr i
hav strain appear thu one jot beyond
th bound honour act will
that way inclin harden hearts
of hear near st kin
cri fie upon grave 

leont 
i ne er heard yet
that bolder vice wanted
less impud gainsay did
than perform first 

hermion 
that true enough 
though ti say sir due 

leont 
you 

hermion 
more mistress of
which come name fault i must not
at acknowledg for polixen 
with i accu i confess
i lov honour requir 
with kind love might become
a ladi like love even 
so command 
which done i think me
both disobedi ingratitude
to toward friend whose love spoke 
ever sinc could speak infant freeli 
that now conspiraci 
i know tast though dish d
for tri i know it
i camillo honest man 
and left court god 
wot i ignor 

leont 
you knew departur know
what underta en absenc 

hermion 
sir 
you speak languag i understand 
mi life stand level dream 
which i lay 

leont 
your action dream 
you bastard polixen 
and i dream as past shame
 those fact past truth 
which deni concern avail as
thi brat hath cast like 
no father own inde 
more crimin thee thou
shalt feel justic whose easiest passage
look less death 

hermion 
sir spare threat 
the bug would fright i seek 
to life commod 
the crown comfort life favour 
i give lost i feel gone 
but know went my second joy 
and first fruit bodi presence
i barr like one infecti my third comfort 
starr unluckili breast 
 the innoc milk innoc mouth 
hal murder everi post
proclaim strumpet immodest hatred
th child bed privileg deni longs
to women fashion lastli hurried
her place th open air before
i got strength limit now lieg 
tell bless i aliv 
that i fear die therefor proceed 
but yet hear mistak life 
i prize straw mine honour 
which i would free i shall condemn d
upon surmis proof sleep else
but jealousi awak i tell you
 ti rigour law your honour 
i refer oracl 
apollo judg 

first lord 
thi request
i altogeth therefor bring forth 
and apollo name oracl

 _exeunt paulina ladi hermion _ 

apollo pardon
mi great profan gainst thine oracl 
i reconcil polixen 
new woo queen recal good camillo 
whom i proclaim man truth merci 
for transport jealousies
to bloodi thought reveng i chose
camillo minist poison
mi friend polixen done 
but good mind camillo tardied
mi swift command though i death with
reward threaten encourag 
not done he humane
and fill honour kingli guest
unclasp practic quit fortun 
which knew great certain hazard
of incertainti commend 
no richer honour how glisters
thorough rust and piety
do deed make blacker 

 enter paulina 

paulina 
woe 
o cut lace lest heart crack 
break 

first lord 
what fit good ladi 

paulina 
what studi torment tyrant hast 
what wheel rack fire flay boiling
in lead oil what old newer torture
must i receiv whose everi word deserves
to tast thi worst thi tyranni 
togeth work thi jealousi 
fanci weak boy green idle
for girl nine o think done 
and run mad inde stark mad all
thi gone fooleri spice 
that thou betray dst polixen twa noth 
that show thee fool inconstant
and damnabl ingrat much
thou wouldst poison good camillo honour 
to kill king poor trespass 
more monstrou stand whereof i reckon
th cast forth crow thi babi daughter 
to none littl though devil
would shed water fire ere done 
nor directli laid thee death
of young princ whose honour thought 
thought high one tender cleft heart
that could conceiv gross foolish sire
blemish graciou dam 
laid thi answer last o lord 
when i said cri woe queen queen 
the sweet st dear st creatur dead vengeanc t
not dropp yet 

first lord 
the higher power forbid 

paulina 
i say dead i swear if word oath
prevail go see bring
tinctur lustr lip eye 
heat outwardli breath within i serv you
a i would god but o thou tyrant 
do repent thing heavier
than thi woe stir therefor betak thee
to noth despair a thousand knees
ten thousand year togeth nake fast 
upon barren mountain still winter
in storm perpetu could move gods
to look way thou wert 

leont 
go go 
thou canst speak much i deserv d
all tongu talk bitterest 

first lord 
say 
how er busi goe made fault
i th bold speech 

paulina 
i sorri 
all fault i make i shall come know 
i repent ala i show much
th rash woman touch d
to th nobl heart what gone past help 
should past grief do receiv affliction
at petit i beseech rather
let punish mind you
of forget now good lieg 
sir royal sir forgiv foolish woman 
the love i bore queen lo fool 
i speak children 
i rememb lord 
who lost take patienc 
and i say noth 

leont 
thou didst speak well
when truth i receiv much better
than piti thee prithe bring me
to dead bodi queen son 
one grave shall upon shall
th caus death appear unto
our shame perpetu onc day i visit
th chapel lie tear shed there
shal recreat so long nature
wil bear exercis long
i daili vow use come lead me
to sorrow

 _exit _ 

antigonu 
come poor babe 
i heard believ spirit dead
may walk thing thi mother
appear last night ne er dream
so like wake to come creatur 
sometim head one side anoth 
i never saw vessel like sorrow 
so fill becom pure white robe 
like sanctiti approach
mi cabin i lay thrice bow 
and gasp begin speech eyes
becam two spout the furi spent anon
did break good antigonu 
sinc fate thi better disposit 
hath made thi person thrower out
of poor babe accord thine oath 
place remot enough bohemia 
there weep leav cri and babe
i count lost ever perdita
i prithe call for ungentl busi 
put thee lord thou ne er shalt see
thi wife paulina and shriek 
she melt air affright much 
i time collect thought
thi slumber dream toy 
yet yea superstiti 
i squar i believe
hermion hath suffer death that
apollo would inde issue
of king polixen laid 
either life death upon earth
of right father blossom speed thee well there lie thy
charact 

 _lay child bundl _ 

which may fortun pleas breed thee pretti 
and still rest thine the storm begin poor wretch 
that thi mother fault art thu expo d
to loss may follow weep i can not 
but heart bleed accur i
to oath enjoin farewel 
the day frown thou rt like have
a lullabi rough i never saw
th heaven dim day a savag clamour 
well may i get aboard thi chase 
i gone ever

 enter old shepherd

an thi

act iv

scen i 

 enter time choru 

time 
i pleas tri joy terror
of good bad make unfold error 
now take upon name time 
to use wing imput crime
to swift passag i slide
o er sixteen year leav growth untried
of wide gap sinc power
to erthrow law one self born hour
to plant erwhelm custom let pass
th i ere ancient st order was
or receiv i wit to
th time brought shall i do
to th freshest thing reign make stale
th glister present tale
now seem your patienc allow 
i turn glass give scene growing
a slept leont leaving
th effect fond jealousi grieving
that shut imagin 
gentl spectat i may be
in fair bohemia rememb well 
i mention son th king florizel
i name speed pace
to speak perdita grown grace
equ wonder what ensues
i list prophesi let time news
b known ti brought forth a shepherd daughter 
and adher follow 
i th argument time of allow 
if ever spent time wors ere 
if never yet time doth say
h wish earnestli never may

scene ii bohemia a room palac polixen 

 enter polixen camillo 

polixen 
i pray thee good camillo importun ti sickness
deni thee anyth death grant 

camillo 
it fifteen year sinc i saw countri though i most
part air abroad i desir lay bone besid the
penit king master hath sent whose feel sorrow i
might allay i erween think anoth spur
to departur 

polixen 
a thou lov st camillo wipe rest thi servic by
leav need i thee thine good hath made 
better thee thu want thee thou made
m busi none without thee suffici manag must
eith stay execut thyself take away thee very
servic thou hast done i enough consid too
much i can not thank thee shall studi my
profit therein heap friendship of fatal countri sicilia 
prithe speak whose name punish the
remembr penit thou call st reconcil king 
mi brother whose loss preciou queen children even

graci lose approv their
virtu

may unknown i missingli note late
much retir court less frequent princ exercises
than formerli hath appear

hav eye servic look upon removed i
hav intellig seldom hous most
hom shepherd man say noth beyond
th imagin neighbour grown unspeak estat

not report extend thought begin
from cottag

scene iii the a road near shepherd cottag 

 enter autolycu sing

_when daffodil begin peer

whi come sweet year 
 for red blood reign winter pale _

doth set pug tooth edg 
 for quart ale dish king _

i servic

and i wander 
 i go right _

 and bear sow skin budget 
then account i well may give
 and stock avouch _

mi traffic sheet kite build look lesser linen my
fath name autolycu i litter mercuri

and knock power highway beat hang are

scene iv the a shepherd cottag 

 enter florizel perdita 

florizel 
these unusu weed part you
do give life shepherdess flora
p april front thi sheep shearing
i meet petti god 
and queen 

perdita 
sir graciou lord 
to chide extrem becom 
o pardon i name your high self 
the graciou mark th land obscur d
with swain wear poor lowli maid 
most goddess like prank but feasts
in everi mess folli feeders
digest custom i blush
to see attir swoon i think 
to show glass 

florizel 
i bless time
when good falcon made flight across
thi father ground 

perdita 
now jove afford caus 
to differ forg dread your greatness
hath us fear even i tremble
to think father accid 
should pass way o fate 
how would look see work nobl 
vile bound what would say or how
should i borrow flaunt behold
th stern presenc 

florizel 
apprehend
noth jolliti the god 
humbl deiti love taken
th shape beast upon jupiter
becam bull bellow green neptune
a ram bleat fire rob god 
golden apollo poor humbl swain 
a i seem their transformations
wer never piec beauti rarer 
nor way chast sinc desires
run mine honour lusts
burn hotter faith 

perdita 
o sir 
your resolut can not hold tis
oppo must power king 
one two must necess 
which speak must chang purpos 
or i life 

florizel 
thou dearest perdita 
with forc thought i prithe darken not
th mirth th feast or i thine fair 
or father for i can not be
min anyth if
i thine to i constant 
though destini say be merri gentl 
strangl thought anything
that behold your guest come 
lift counten day
of celebr nuptial which
w two sworn shall come 

perdita 
o ladi fortun 
stand auspici 

florizel 
see guest approach 
address entertain sprightli 
and let red mirth 

 enter shepherd polixen camillo disguis clown mopsa 
 dorca other 

shepherd 
fie daughter when old wife liv upon
thi day pantler butler cook 
both dame servant welcom serv 
would sing song danc turn here

on shoulder face fire
with labour thing took quench it
sh would one sip you retir 
a feast one not
th hostess meet pray bid
thes unknown friend welcom is
a way make us better friend known

that mistress th feast come 
and bid us welcom sheep shear 
a good flock shall prosper

it father i take me
th hostess ship day

give flower dorca reverend sir 
for rosemari rue keep
seem savour winter long 
grace remembr 
and welcom shear 

polixen 
shepherdess 
a fair one well fit ages
with flower winter 

perdita 
sir year grow ancient 
not yet summer death birth
of trembl winter fairest flower th season
ar carnat streak gillyvor 
which call natur bastard kind
our rustic garden barren i care not
to get slip 

polixen 
wherefor gentl maiden 
do neglect

for i heard said
ther art pied shares
with great creat natur 

polixen 
say 
yet natur made better mean
but natur make mean so art
which say add natur art
that natur make you see sweet maid marry
a gentler scion wildest stock 
and make conceiv bark baser kind
bi bud nobler race thi art
which mend natur chang rather but
th art natur 

perdita 
so 

polixen 
then make garden rich gillyvor 
and call bastard 

perdita 
i put
th dibbl earth set one slip 
no i paint i would wish
thi youth say twere well therefore
desir breed here flower 
hot lavend mint savori marjoram 
the marigold goe bed th sun
and rise weep these flowers
of middl summer i think given
to men middl age you welcom 

camillo 
i leav graze i flock 
and live gaze 

perdita 
out ala 
you lean blast january
would blow _to florizel_ now fair st
friend 
i would i flower th spring might
becom time day 
that wear upon virgin branch yet
your maidenhead grow o proserpina 
from flower fright thou let st fall
from di waggon daffodil 
that come swallow dare take
th wind march beauti violet dim 
but sweeter lid juno eyes
or cytherea breath pale primros 
that die unmarri ere behold
bright phoebu strength malady
most incid maid bold oxlip and
th crown imperi lili kind 
the flower de luce one o i lack 
to make garland sweet friend 
to strew er er 

florizel 
what like cors 

perdita 
no like bank love lie play 
not like cors buri 
but quick mine arm come take flower 
methink i play i seen do
in whitsun pastor sure robe mine
do chang disposit 

florizel 
what do
stil better done when speak sweet 
i ever when sing 
i buy sell give alm 
pray ord ring affair 
to sing when danc i wish you
a wave th sea might ever do
noth move still still 
and function each 
so singular particular 
crown present deed 
that act queen 

perdita 
o doricl 
your prais larg but youth 
and true blood peep fairli 
do plainli give unstain shepherd 
with wisdom i might fear doricl 
you woo fals way 

florizel 
i think have
a littl skill fear i purpose
to put but come danc i pray 
your hand perdita so turtl pair
that never mean part 

perdita 
i swear em 

polixen 
thi prettiest low born lass ever
ran green sward noth seems
but smack someth greater 
too nobl place 

camillo 
he tell something
that make blood look good sooth is
th queen curd cream

come strike

now good time

 _music here danc of shepherd shepherdess _ 

polixen 
pray good shepherd fair swain this
which danc daughter 

shepherd 
they call doricl boast himself
to worthi feed but i it
upon report i believ 
he look like sooth he say love daughter 
i think never gaz moon
upon water stand read 
a twere daughter eye and plain 
i think half kiss choose
who love anoth best 

polixen 
she danc featli 

shepherd 
so anyth though i report it
that silent if young doricles
do light upon shall bring that
which dream 

 enter servant 

servant 
o master hear pedlar door would never
d tabor pipe bagpip could move 
he sing sever tune faster tell money he utter as
h eaten ballad men ear grew tune 

clown 
he could never come better shall come i love ballad even
too well dole matter merrili set pleasant
th inde sung lament 

servant 
he hath song man woman size no millin fit his
custom glove he prettiest love song maid so
without bawdri strang delic burden dildos

act v

scene i sicilia a room palac leont 

 enter leont cleomen dion paulina other 

cleomenes
sir done enough perform d
a saint like sorrow fault could make
which redeem inde paid down
mor penit done trespass last 
do heaven done forget evil 
with forgiv 

leont 
whilst i remember
h virtu i can not forget
mi blemish still think of
th wrong i much
that heirless hath made kingdom and
destroy sweet st companion e er man
br hope 

paulina 
true true lord 
if one one wed world 
or took someth good 
to make perfect woman kill d
would unparallel 

leont 
i think kill 
she i kill i thou strik st me
sor say i bitter
upon thi tongu thought now good 
say seldom 

cleomenes
not good ladi 
you might spoken thousand thing would
hav done time benefit grac d
your kind better 

paulina 
you one those
would wed 

dion 
if would 
you piti state remembrance
of sovereign name consid little
what danger high fail issu 
may drop upon kingdom devour
incertain looker what holy
than rejoic former queen well 
what holier royalti repair 
for present comfort futur good 
to bless bed majesti again
with sweet fellow 

paulina 
there none worthi 
respect gone besid gods
wil fulfil secret purpos 
for divin apollo said 
i tenor oracl 
that king leont shall heir
til lost child found which shall 
i monstrou human reason
a antigonu break grave
and come life 
did perish infant ti counsel
mi lord heaven contrari 
oppos will _to leont _ care issu 
the crown find heir great alexander
left th worthiest successor
wa like best 

leont 
good paulina 
who hast memori hermion 
i know honour o ever i
had squar thi counsel then even 
i might look upon queen full eye 
have taken treasur lip 

paulina 
and left them
mor rich yield 

leont 
thou speak st truth 
no wive therefor wife one wors 
and better us would make saint spirit
again possess corps stage

and begin whi 

paulina 
had power 
she caus 

leont

to murder i marri

i 
were i ghost walk i bid mark
her eye tell dull part t
you chose i shriek even ears
should rift hear word follow d
should rememb mine

affront eye

a former shall such

g way seen sir yourself

 _exeunt _ 





a lover s complaint



from hill whose concav womb reworded
a plaint stori sist ring vale 
mi spirit attend doubl voic accord 
and i laid list sad tun tale 
ere long espi fickl maid full pale 
tear paper break ring twain 
storm world sorrow wind rain 

upon head plat hive straw 
which fortifi visag sun 
whereon thought might think sometim saw
th carcass beauti spent done 
time scyth youth begun 
nor youth quit spite heaven fell rage
som beauti peep lattic sear age 

oft heav napkin eyn 
which conceit charact 
laund ring silken figur brine
that season woe pellet tear 
and often read content bear 
a often shriek undistinguish woe 
in clamour size high low 

sometim level eye carriag ride 
a batt ry sphere intend 
sometim divert poor ball tied
to th orb earth sometim extend
their view right anon gaze lend
to everi place nowher fix 
the mind sight distractedli commix 

her hair loos tie formal plat 
proclaim careless hand pride 
for untuck descend sheav hat 
hang pale pine cheek besid 
some threaden fillet still bide 
and true bondag would break thenc 
though slackli braid loos neglig 

a thousand favour maund drew 
of amber crystal bead jet 
which one one river threw 
upon whose weep margent set 
like usuri appli wet wet 
or monarch hand let bounti fall
wher want cri excess beg 

of fold schedul mani one 
which peru sigh tore gave flood 
crack mani ring posi gold bone 
bid find sepulchr mud 
found yet mo letter sadli penn blood 
with sleid silk feat affectedly
enswath seal curiou secreci 

these often bath fluxiv eye 
and often kiss often gave tear 
cri o fals blood thou regist lie 
what unapprov wit dost thou bear 
ink would seem black damn 
thi said top rage line rent 
big discont break content 

a reverend man graze cattl nigh 
sometim bluster ruffl knew
of court citi let go by
th swiftest hour observ flew 
toward afflict fanci fastli drew 
and privileg age desir know
in brief ground motiv woe 

so slide upon grain bat 
and come distant sit side 
when desir sat 
her grievanc hear divid 
if may aught applied
which may suffer ecstasi assuag 
 ti promis chariti age 

 father say though behold
th injuri mani blast hour 
let tell judgement i old 
not age sorrow hath power 
i might yet spread flower 
fresh i self applied
lov love besid 

 but woe too earli i attended
a youth suit gain grace 
o one natur outward commend 
that maiden eye stuck face 
love lack dwell made place 
and fair part abid 
she new lodg newli deifi 

 hi browni lock hang crook curl 
and everi light occas wind
upon lip silken parcel hurl 
what sweet aptli find 
each eye saw enchant mind 
for visag littl drawn 
what larg think paradis sawn 

 small show man yet upon chin 
hi phoenix began appear 
like unshorn velvet termless skin 
whose bare bragg web seem wear 
yet show visag cost dear 
and nice affect waver stood doubt
if best best without 

 hi qualiti beauteou form 
for maiden tongu thereof free 
yet men mov storm
a oft twixt may april see 
when wind breath sweet unruli though 
hi rude authoriz youth
did liveri fals pride truth 

 well could ride often men would say
that hors mettl rider take 
proud subject nobl sway 
what round bound cours stop make 
and controversi henc question take 
whether hors becam deed 
or manag th well steed 

 but quickli side verdict went 
hi real habitud gave life grace
to appertain ornament 
accomplish case 
all aid made fairer place 
came addit yet purpo trim
piec grace grac 

 so tip subdu tongue
al kind argument question deep 
all replic prompt reason strong 
for advantag still wake sleep 
to make weeper laugh laugher weep 
he dialect differ skill 
catch passion craft 

 that gener bosom reign
of young old sex enchant 
to dwell thought remain
in person duti follow haunt 
consent bewitch ere desir grant 
and dialogu would say 
ask will made will obey 

 mani pictur get
to serv eye put mind 
like fool th imagin set
th goodli object abroad find
of land mansion thought assign 
and labour moe pleasur bestow 
than true gouti landlord doth owe 

 so mani never touch hand 
sweetli suppo mistress heart 
mi woeful self freedom stand 
and fee simpl part 
what art youth youth art 
threw affect charm power 
reserv stalk gave flower 

 yet i equal 
demand desir yield 
find honour forbid 
with safest distanc i mine honour shield 
experi mani bulwark builded
of proof new bleed remain foil
of fals jewel amor spoil 

 but ah who ever shunn precedent
th destin ill must assay 
or forc exampl gainst content 
to put pass peril way 
counsel may stop stay 
for rage advic often seen
bi blunt us make will keen 

 nor give satisfact blood 
that must curb upon other proof 
to forbod sweet seem good 
for fear harm preach behoof 
o appetit judgement stand aloof 
the one palat hath need tast 
though reason weep cri it thi last 

 for i could say thi man untru 
and knew pattern foul beguil 
heard plant other orchard grew 
saw deceit gild smile 
knew vow ever broker defil 
thought charact word mere art 
and bastard foul adulter heart 

 and long upon term i held citi 
till thu gan besieg gentl maid 
have suffer youth feel piti 
and holi vow afraid 
that ye sworn none ever said 
for feast love i call unto 
till ne er invit never woo 

 all offenc abroad see
ar error blood none mind 
love made actur may 
where neither parti true kind 
they sought shame shame find 
and much less shame remain 
bi much reproach contain 

 among mani mine eye seen 
not one whose flame heart much warm 
or affect put th smallest teen 
or leisur ever charm 
harm i done ne er harm 
kept heart liveri mine free 
and reign command monarchi 

 look tribut wound fanci sent 
of pallid pearl rubi red blood 
figur passion likewis lent me
of grief blush aptli understood
in bloodless white encrimson mood 
effect terror dear modesti 
encamp heart fight outwardli 

 and lo behold talent hair 
with twist metal amor empleach 
i receiv mani sever fair 
their kind accept weepingli beseech 
with th annexion fair gem enrich 
and deep brain sonnet amplify
each stone dear natur worth qualiti 

 the diamond twa beauti hard 
whereto invi properti tend 
the deep green emerald whose fresh regard
weak sight sickli radianc amend 
the heaven hu sapphir opal blend
with object manifold sever stone 
with wit well blazon smil made moan 

 lo trophi affect hot 
of pensiv subdu desir tender 
natur hath charg i hoard 
but yield i must render 
that origin ender 
for forc must oblat 
sinc i altar empatron 

 o advanc phraseless hand 
whose white weigh airi scale prais 
take simil command 
hallow sigh burn lung rais 
what minist obey 
work audit comes
their distract parcel combin sum 

 lo devic sent nun 
or sister sanctifi holiest note 
which late nobl suit court shun 
whose rarest have made blossom dote 
for sought spirit richest coat 
but kept cold distanc thenc remove
to spend live etern love 

 but o sweet labour leave
th thing mast ring strive 
plane place form receiv 
play patient sport unconstrain gyve 
she fame contriv 
the scar battl scapeth flight 
and make absenc valiant might 

 o pardon boast true 
the accid brought eye 
upon moment forc subdu 
and would cage cloister fli 
religi love put religion eye 
not tempt would immur 
and tempt liberti procur 

 how mighti o hear tell 
the broken bosom belong
hav empti fountain well 
and mine i pour ocean among 
i strong er er strong 
must victori us congest 
a compound love physic cold breast 

 my part pow r charm sacr nun 
who disciplin diet grace 
believ eye assail begun 
all vow consecr give place 
o potenti love vow bond space 
in thee hath neither sting knot confin 
for thou art thing els thine 

 when thou impressest precept worth
of stale exampl when thou wilt inflam 
how coldli impedi stand forth 
of wealth filial fear law kindr fame 
love arm peac gainst rule gainst sens gainst shame 
and sweeten suff ring pang bear 
the alo forc shock fear 

 now heart mine depend 
feel break bleed groan pine 
and supplic sigh extend 
to leav batt ry make gainst mine 
lend soft audienc sweet design 
and credent soul strong bond oath 
that shall prefer undertak troth 

 thi said wat ry eye dismount 
whose sight till level face 
each cheek river run fount
with brinish current downward flow apac 
o channel stream gave grace 
who glaz crystal gate glow roses
that flame water hue enclos 

 o father hell witchcraft lies
in small orb one particular tear 
but inund eyes
what rocki heart water wear 
what breast cold warm 
o cleft effect cold modesti hot wrath 
both fire henc chill extinctur hath 

 for lo passion art craft 
even resolv reason tear 
there white stole chastiti i daff 
shook sober guard civil fear 
appear appear 
all melt though drop diff renc bore 
hi poison mine restor 

 in plenitud subtl matter 
appli cautel strang form receiv 
of burn blush weep water 
or swoon pale take leav 
in either apt best deceiv 
to blush speech rank weep woe 
or turn white swoon tragic show 

 that heart level came
could scape hail hurt aim 
show fair natur kind tame 
and veil win would maim 
against thing sought would exclaim 
when burn heart wish luxuri 
he preach pure maid prai cold chastiti 

 thu mere garment grace 
the nake conceal fiend cover 
that th unexperi gave tempter place 
which like cherubin hover 
who young simpl would lover 
ay i fell yet question make
what i sake 

 o infect moistur eye 
o fals fire cheek glow 
o forc thunder heart fli 
o sad breath spongi lung bestow 
o borrow motion seem owe 
would yet betray fore betray 
and new pervert reconcil maid 




the passion pilgrim

i 

did heavenli rhetor thine eye 
 gainst world could hold argument 
persuad heart fals perjuri 
vow thee broke deserv punish 
a woman i forswor i prove 
thou goddess i forswor thee 
mi vow earthli thou heavenli love 
thi grace gain cure disgrac 
mi vow breath breath vapour 
then thou fair sun earth doth shine 
exhal vapour vow thee 
if broken fault mine 
 if broke fool wise
 to break oath win paradis 

ii 

sweet cytherea sit brook
with young adoni love fresh green 
did court lad mani love look 
such look none could look beauti queen 
she told stori delight ear 
she show favour allur eye 
to win heart touch 
touch soft still conquer chastiti 
but whether unrip year want conceit 
or refu take figur proffer 
the tender nibbler would touch bait 
but smile jest everi gentl offer 
 then fell back fair queen toward 
 he rose ran away ah fool froward 

iii 

if love make forsworn shall i swear love 
o never faith could hold beauti vow 
though forsworn thee i constant prove 
those thought like oak thee like osier bow 
studi bia leav make book thine eye 
where pleasur live art comprehend 
if knowledg mark know thee shall suffic 
well learn tongu well thee commend 
all ignor soul see thee without wonder 
which prais i thi part admir 
thi eye jove lightn seem thi voic dread thunder 
which anger bent music sweet fire 
 celesti thou art o love wrong 
 to sing heaven prais earthli tongu 

iv 

scarc sun dri dewi morn 
and scarc herd gone hedg shade 
when cytherea love forlorn 
a long tarrianc adoni made 
under osier grow brook 
a brook adon use cool spleen 
hot day hotter look
for approach often 
anon come throw mantl 
and stood stark nake brook green brim 
the sun look world gloriou eye 
yet wistli queen 
 he spi bounc wherea stood 
 o jove quoth i flood 

v 

fair love fair fickl 
mild dove neither true trusti 
brighter glass yet glass brittl 
softer wax yet iron rusti 
 a lili pale damask die grace 
 none fairer none falser defac 

her lip mine often hath join 
between kiss oath true love swear 
how mani tale pleas hath coin 
dread love loss thereof still fear 
 yet midst pure protest 
 her faith oath tear jest 

she burn love straw fire flameth 
she burn love soon straw outburneth 
she fram love yet foil frame 
she bade love last yet fell turn 
 wa lover lecher whether 
 bad best though excel neither 

vi 

if music sweet poetri agre 
a must need sister brother 
then must love great twixt thee 
becaus thou lovest one i 
dowland thee dear whose heavenli touch
upon lute doth ravish human sens 
spenser whose deep conceit such
a pass conceit need defenc 
thou lov st hear sweet melodi sound
that phoebu lute queen music make 
and i deep delight chiefli drown d
whena sing betak 
 one god god poet feign 
 one knight love thee remain 

vii 

fair morn fair queen love 
 
paler sorrow milk white dove 
for adon sake youngster proud wild 
her stand take upon steep hill 
anon adoni come horn hound 
she silli queen love good 
forbad boy pass ground 
onc quoth i see fair sweet youth
her brake deep wound boar 
deep thigh spectacl ruth 
see thigh quoth sore 
 she show saw wound one 
 and blush fled left alon 

viii 

sweet rose fair flower untim pluck soon vade 
pluck bud vade spring 
bright orient pearl alack time shade 
fair creatur kill soon death sharp sting 
 like green plum hang upon tree 
 and fall wind fall 

i weep thee yet caus i 
for thou left st noth thi 
and yet thou left st i crave 
for i crave noth thee still 
 o ye dear friend i pardon crave thee 
 thi discont thou didst bequeath 

ix 

venu young adoni sit 
under myrtl shade began woo 
she told youngl god mar tri 
and fell fell 
even thu quoth warlik god embrac 
and clipp adoni arm 
even thu quoth warlik god unlac 
a boy use like love charm 
even thu quoth seiz lip 
and lip act seizur 
and fetch breath away skip 
and would take mean pleasur 
 ah i ladi bay 
 to kiss clip till i run away 

x 

 crab age youth
 can not live together
 youth full pleasanc 
 age full care 
 youth like summer morn 
 age like winter weather 
 youth like summer brave 
 age like winter bare 
 youth full sport 
 age breath short 
 youth nimbl age lame 
 youth hot bold 
 age weak cold 
 youth wild age tame 
 age i abhor thee 
 youth i ador thee 
 o love love young 
 age i defi thee 
 o sweet shepherd hie thee 
 for methink thou stay st long 

xi 

beauti vain doubt good 
a shine gloss vadeth suddenli 
a flower die first gin bud 
a brittl glass broken present 
 a doubt good gloss glass flower 
 lost vade broken dead within hour 

and good lost seld never found 
a vade gloss rub refresh 
a flower dead lie wither ground 
a broken glass cement redress 
 so beauti blemish ever lost 
 in spite physic paint pain cost 

xii 

good night good rest ah neither share 
she bade good night kept rest away 
and daff cabin hang care 
to descant doubt decay 
 farewel quoth come tomorrow 
 fare well i could i supp sorrow 

yet part sweetli smile 
in scorn friendship nill i constru whether 
 t may joy jest exil 
 t may make wander thither 
 wander word shadow like 
 as take pain can not pluck pelf 

xiii 

lord mine eye throw gaze east 
mi heart doth charg watch morn rise
doth cite move sens idl rest 
not dare trust offic mine eye 
 while philomela sit sing i sit mark 
 and wish lay tune like lark 

for doth welcom daylight ditti 
and drive away dark dismal dream night 
the night pack i post unto pretti 
heart hath hope eye wish sight 
 sorrow chang solac solac mix sorrow 
 for sigh bade come tomorrow 

were i night would post soon 
but minut ad hour 
to spite minut seem moon 
yet shine sun succour flower 
 pack night peep day good day night borrow 
 short night night length thyself morrow 



the phoenix and the turtle



let bird loudest lay 
on sole arabian tree 
herald sad trumpet 
to whose sound chast wing obey 

but thou shriek harbing 
foul precurr fiend 
augur fever end 
to troop come thou near 

from session interdict
everi fowl tyrant wing 
save eagl feather king 
keep obsequy strict 

let priest surplic white 
that defunct music 
be death divin swan 
lest requiem lack right 

and thou trebl date crow 
that thi sabl gender mak st
with breath thou giv st tak st 
 mongst mourner shalt thou go 

here anthem doth commenc 
love constanc dead 
phoenix turtl fled
in mutual flame henc 

so lov love twain
had essenc one 
two distinct divis none 
number love slain 

heart remot yet asund 
distanc space seen
 twixt turtl queen 
but wonder 

so love shine 
that turtl saw right
flam phoenix sight 
either mine 

properti thu appal 
that self 
singl natur doubl name
neith two one call 

reason confound 
saw divis grow togeth 
to yet either neither 
simpl well compound 

that cri how true twain
seemeth concord one 
love hath reason reason none 
if part remain 

whereupon made threne
to phoenix dove 
co suprem star love 
a choru tragic scene 


 threnos

beauti truth rariti 
grace simplic 
here enclo cinder lie 

death phoenix nest 
and turtl loyal breast
to etern doth rest 

leav poster 
 twa infirm 
it marri chastiti 

truth may seem can not 
beauti brag ti 
truth beauti buri 

to urn let repair
that either true fair 
for dead bird sigh prayer 



the rape of lucrece

 to the

 right honour henri wriothesli 

 earl of southampton and baron of titchfield 

the love i dedic lordship without end whereof this
pamphlet without begin superflu moieti the warrant
i honour disposit worth untutored
lin make assur accept what i done what
i part i devot were
mi worth greater duti would show greater meantim is
bound lordship i wish long life still lengthen with
al happi 

 your lordship duti 
 william shakespear 

 the argument 

luciu tarquiniu excess pride surnam superbu he
had caus father law serviu tulliu cruelly
murd contrari roman law custom requir or
stay peopl suffrag possess the
kingdom went accompani son noblemen rome to
besieg ardea dure sieg princip men army
meet one even tent sextu tarquiniu king son 
in discours supper everi one commend virtu of
hi wife among collatinu extol incompar chastity
of wife lucretia in pleasant humour post rome 
and intend secret sudden arriv make trial of
that everi one avouch collatinu find his
wif though late night spin amongst maid the
oth ladi found danc revel several
disport whereupon noblemen yield collatinu victori and
hi wife fame at time sextu tarquiniu inflam with
lucrec beauti yet smother passion present departed
with rest back camp whenc shortli privily
withdrew accord estat royal entertained
and lodg lucrec collatium the night treacherously
stealeth chamber violent ravish earli the
morn speedeth away lucrec lament plight hastily
dispatch messeng one rome father anoth camp
for collatin they came one accompani juniu brutu the
oth publiu valeriu find lucrec attir mourning
habit demand caus sorrow she first take oath of
them reveng reveal actor whole manner his
deal withal suddenli stab which done one
cons vow root whole hate famili the
tarquin bear dead bodi rome brutu acquaint the
peopl doer manner vile deed bitter
invect tyranni king wherewith peopl so
mov one consent gener acclam tarquins
wer exil state govern chang king to
consul 

_______________________________________________________________

from besieg ardea post 
born trustless wing fals desir 
lust breath tarquin leav roman host 
and collatium bear lightless fire
which pale ember hid lurk aspire
 and girdl embrac flame waist
 of collatin fair love lucrec chast 

hapli name chast unhapp ly set
thi bateless edg keen appetit 
when collatin unwis let
to prais clear unmatch red white
which triumph sky delight 
 where mortal star bright heaven beauti 
 with pure aspect peculiar duti 

for night tarquin tent 
unlock treasur happi state 
what priceless wealth heaven lent
in possess beauteou mate 
reckon fortun high proud rate 
 that king might espous fame 
 but king peer peerless dame 

o happi enjoy 
and possess soon decay done
a morn silver melt dew
against golden splendour sun 
an expir date cancel ere well begun 
 honour beauti owner arm 
 are weakli fortress world harm 

beauti doth persuade
th eye men without orat 
what needeth apolog made 
to set forth singular 
or collatin publisher
 of rich jewel keep unknown
 from thievish ear 

perchanc boast lucrec sovereignty
suggest proud issu king 
for ear heart oft taint 
perchanc envi rich thing 
brave compar disdain sting
 hi high pitch thought meaner men vaunt
 that golden hap superior want 

but untim thought instigate
hi timeless speed none 
hi honour affair friend state 
neglect swift intent goes
to quench coal liver glow 
 o rash fals heat wrapp repent cold 
 thi hasti spring still blast ne er grow old 

when collatium fals lord arriv 
well welcom roman dame 
within whose face beauti virtu striv d
which underprop fame 
when virtu bragg beauti would blush shame 
 when beauti boast blush despite
 virtu would stain silver white 

but beauti white intitul 
from venu dove doth challeng fair field 
then virtu claim beauti beauti red 
which virtu gave golden age gild
their silver cheek call shield 
 teach thu use fight 
 when shame assail red fenc white 

thi heraldri lucrec face seen 
argu beauti red virtu white 
of either colour queen 
prove world minor right 
yet ambit make still fight 
 the sovereignti either great 
 that oft interchang seat 

their silent war lili rose 
which tarquin view fair face field 
in pure rank traitor eye enclos 
where lest kill 
the coward captiv vanquish doth yield
 to two armi would let go 
 rather triumph fals foe 

now think husband shallow tongu 
 the niggard prodig prai 
in high task hath done beauti wrong 
which far exce barren skill show 
therefor prais collatin doth owe
 enchant tarquin answer surmis 
 in silent wonder still gaze eye 

thi earthli saint ador devil 
littl suspecteth fals worshipp 
for unstain thought seldom dream evil 
bird never lim secret bush fear 
so guiltless secur give good cheer
 and reverend welcom princ guest 
 whose inward ill outward harm express 

for colour high estat 
hide base sin plait majesti 
that noth seem inordin 
save sometim much wonder eye 
which could satisfi 
 but poorli rich wanteth store 
 that cloy much pineth still 

but never cop stranger eye 
could pick mean parl look 
nor read subtl shine secrecies
writ glassi margent book 
she touch unknown bait fear hook 
 nor could moral wanton sight 
 more eye open light 

he stori ear husband fame 
won field fruit itali 
and deck prais collatin high name 
made gloriou manli chivalry
with bruis arm wreath victori 
 her joy heav hand doth express 
 and wordless greet heaven success 

far purpos come hither 
he make excus 
no cloudi show stormi bluster weather
doth yet fair welkin appear 
till sabl night mother dread fear 
 upon world dim dark doth display 
 and vaulti prison stow day 

for tarquin brought unto bed 
intend weari heavi spright 
for supper long questioned
with modest lucrec wore night 
now leaden slumber life strength doth fight 
 and everi one rest betak 
 save thiev care troubl mind wake 

a one doth tarquin lie revolving
th sundri danger obtain 
yet ever obtain resolv 
though weak built hope persuad abstain 
despair gain doth traffic oft gain 
 and great treasur meed propo 
 though death adjunct death suppo 

those much covet gain fond 
for possess
they scatter unloos bond 
and hope less 
or gain profit excess
 is surfeit grief sustain 
 that prove bankrupt poor rich gain 

the aim nurs life
with honour wealth eas wane age 
and aim thwart strife 
that one one gage 
a life honour fell battl rage 
 honour wealth oft wealth doth cost
 the death togeth lost 

so vent ring ill leav be
th thing expect 
and ambiti foul infirm 
in much torment us defect
of neglect
 the thing want wit 
 make someth noth augment 

such hazard must dote tarquin make 
pawn honour obtain lust 
and must forsak 
then truth self trust 
when shall think find stranger 
 when confound betrays
 to slander tongu wretch hate day 

now stole upon time dead night 
when heavi sleep close mortal eye 
no comfort star lend light 
no nois owl wolv death bode cri 
now serv season may surprise
 the silli lamb pure thought dead still 
 while lust murder wake stain kill 

and lust lord leap bed 
throw mantl rude er arm 
i madli toss desir dread 
th one sweetli flatter th feareth harm 
but honest fear bewitch lust foul charm 
 doth oft betak retir 
 beaten away brain sick rude desir 

hi falchion flint softli smiteth 
that cold stone spark fire fli 
whereat waxen torch forthwith lighteth 
which must lode star lust eye 
and flame thu speak advisedli 
 as cold flint i enforc fire 
 so lucrec must i forc desir 

here pale fear doth premeditate
th danger loathsom enterpris 
and inward mind doth debate
what follow sorrow may aris 
then look scorn doth despise
 hi nake armour still slaughter lust 
 and justli thu control thought unjust 

 fair torch burn thi light lend not
to darken whose light excelleth thine 
and die unhallow thought blot
with unclean divin 
offer pure incens pure shrine 
 let fair human abhor deed
 that spot stain love modest snow white weed 

 o shame knighthood shine arm 
o foul dishonour household grave 
o impiou act includ foul harm 
a martial man soft fanci slave 
true valour still true respect 
 then digress vile base 
 that live engraven face 

 yea though i die scandal surviv 
and eye sore golden coat 
some loathsom dash herald contriv 
to cipher fondli i dote 
that poster sham note 
 shall curs bone hold sin
 to wish i father 

 what win i i gain thing i seek 
a dream breath froth fleet joy 
who buy minut mirth wail week 
or sell etern get toy 
for one sweet grape vine destroy 
 or fond beggar touch crown 
 would sceptr straight strucken 

 if collatinu dream intent 
will wake desper rage
post hither vile purpos prevent 
thi sieg hath engirt marriag 
thi blur youth sorrow sage 
 thi die virtu surviv shame 
 whose crime bear ever blame 

 o excus invent make
when thou shalt charg black deed 
will tongu mute frail joint shake 
mine eye forego light fals heart bleed 
the guilt great fear doth still exceed 
 and extrem fear neither fight fli 
 but coward like trembl terror die 

 had collatinu kill son sire 
or lain ambush betray life 
or dear friend desire
might excus work upon wife 
a reveng quittal strife 
 but kinsman dear friend 
 the shame fault find excus end 

 shame ay fact known 
hate hate love 
i beg love 
the worst denial reprov 
mi strong past reason weak remov 
 who fear sentenc old man saw
 shall paint cloth kept awe 

thu graceless hold disputation
 tween frozen conscienc hot burn 
and good thought make dispens 
urg worser sens vantag still 
which moment doth confound kill
 all pure effect doth far proceed 
 that vile show like virtuou deed 

quoth she took kindli hand 
and gaz tide eager eye 
fear hard news warlik band 
where belov collatinu lie 
o fear make colour rise 
 first red rose lawn lay 
 then white lawn rose took away 

 and hand hand lock 
forc trembl loyal fear 
which struck sad faster rock 
until husband welfar hear 
whereat smile sweet cheer 
 that narcissu seen stood 
 self love never drown flood 

 whi hunt i colour excus 
all orat dumb beauti pleadeth 
poor wretch remors poor abus 
love thrive heart shadow dreadeth 
affect captain leadeth 
 and gaudi banner display 
 the coward fight dismay 

 then childish fear avaunt debat die 
respect reason wait wrinkl age 
mi heart shall never countermand mine eye 
sad paus deep regard beseem sage 
mi part youth beat stage 
 desir pilot beauti prize 
 then fear sink treasur lie 

a corn ergrown weed heed fear
i almost chok unresist lust 
away steal open listen ear 
full foul hope full fond mistrust 
both servitor unjust 
 so cross opposit persuas 
 that vow leagu invas 

within thought heavenli imag sit 
and self seat sit collatin 
that eye look confound wit 
that eye behold divin 
unto view fals inclin 
 but pure appeal seek heart 
 which corrupt take worser part 

and therein hearten servil power 
who flatter leader jocund show 
stuff lust minut fill hour 
and captain pride doth grow 
pay slavish tribut owe 
 by reprob desir thu madli led 
 the roman lord marcheth lucrec bed 

the lock chamber 
each one enforc retir ward 
but open rate ill 
which drive creep thief regard 
the threshold grate door heard 
 night wand ring weasel shriek see 
 they fright yet still pursu fear 

a unwil portal yield way 
through littl vent cranni place
th wind war torch make stay 
and blow smoke face 
extinguish conduct case 
 but hot heart fond desir doth scorch 
 puff forth anoth wind fire torch 

and light light spies
lucretia glove wherein needl stick 
he take rush lie 
and gripe neeld finger prick 
a say glove wanton tricks
 is inur return hast 
 thou see st mistress ornament chast 

but poor forbid could stay 
he worst sens constru denial 
the door wind glove delay 
he take accident thing trial 
or bar stop hourli dial 
 who linger stay cours doth let 
 till everi minut pay hour debt 

 so quoth let attend time 
like littl frost sometim threat spring 
to add rejoic prime 
and give sneap bird caus sing 
pain pay incom preciou thing 
 huge rock high wind strong pirat shelv sand 
 the merchant fear ere rich home land 

now come unto chamber door 
that shut heaven thought 
which yield latch 
hath barr bless thing sought 
so impieti hath wrought 
 that prey pray doth begin 
 as heaven counten sin 

but midst unfruit prayer 
have solicit etern power 
that foul thought might compass fair fair 
and would stand auspici hour 
even start quoth i must de flower 
 the power i pray abhor fact 
 how assist act 

 then love fortun god guid 
mi back resolut 
thought dream till effect tri 
the blackest sin clear absolut 
against love fire fear frost hath dissolut 
 the eye heaven misti night
 cover shame follow sweet delight 

thi said guilti hand pluck latch 
and knee door open wide 
the dove sleep fast night owl catch 
thu treason work ere traitor espi 
who see lurk serpent step asid 
 but sound sleep fear thing 
 lie merci mortal sting 

into chamber wickedli stalk 
and gazeth yet unstain bed 
the curtain close walk 
roll greedi eyebal head 
bi high treason heart misl 
 which give watch word hand full soon
 to draw cloud hide silver moon 

look fair fieri point sun 
rush forth cloud bereav sight 
even curtain drawn eye begun
to wink blind greater light 
whether reflect bright 
 that dazzleth els shame suppos 
 but blind keep enclos 

o darksom prison die 
then seen period ill 
then collatin lucrec side
in clear bed might repos still 
but must ope bless leagu kill 
 and holi thought lucrec sight
 must sell joy life world delight 

her lili hand rosi cheek lie 
cozen pillow law kiss 
who therefor angri seem part sunder 
swell either side want bliss 
between whose hill head entomb 
 where like virtuou monument lie 
 to admir lewd unhallow eye 

without bed fair hand 
on green coverlet whose perfect white
show like april daisi grass 
with pearli sweat resembl dew night 
her eye like marigold sheath light 
 and canopi dark sweetli lay 
 till might open adorn day 

her hair like golden thread play breath 
o modest wanton wanton modesti 
show life triumph map death 
and death dim look life mortal 
each sleep beautifi 
 as twain strife 
 but life liv death death life 

her breast like ivori globe circl blue 
a pair maiden world unconqu 
save lord bear yoke knew 
and oath truli honour 
these world tarquin new ambit bred 
 who like foul usurp went about
 from fair throne heav owner 

what could see mightili note 
what note strongli desir 
what beheld firmli dote 
and wil eye tir 
with admir admir d
 her azur vein alabast skin 
 her coral lip snow white dimpl chin 

a grim lion fawneth er prey 
sharp hunger conquest satisfi 
so er sleep soul doth tarquin stay 
hi rage lust graze qualifi 
slack suppress stand side 
 hi eye late mutini restrain 
 unto greater uproar tempt vein 

and like straggl slave pillag fight 
obdur vassal fell exploit effect 
in bloodi death ravish delight 
nor children tear mother groan respect 
swell pride onset still expect 
 anon beat heart alarum strike 
 give hot charg bid like 

hi drum heart cheer burn eye 
hi eye commend lead hand 
hi hand proud digniti 
smoke pride march make stand
on bare breast heart land 
 whose rank blue vein hand scale 
 left round turret destitut pale 

they muster quiet cabinet
wher dear gover ladi lie 
do tell dread beset 
and fright confus cri 
she much amaz break ope lock eye 
 who peep forth tumult behold 
 are flame torch dimm control 

imagin one dead night
from forth dull sleep dread fanci wake 
that think hath beheld ghastli sprite 
whose grim aspect set everi joint shake 
what terror ti worser take 
 from sleep disturb heed doth view
 the sight make suppos terror true 

wrapp confound thousand fear 
like new kill bird trembl lie 
she dare look yet wink appears
quick shift antic ugli eye 
such shadow weak brain forgeri 
 who angri eye fli light 
 in dark daunt dread sight 

hi hand yet remain upon breast 
 rude ram batter ivori wall 
may feel heart poor citizen distress 
wound death rise fall 
beat bulk hand shake withal 
 thi move rage lesser piti 
 to make breach enter sweet citi 

first like trumpet doth tongu begin
to sound parley heartless foe 
who er white sheet peer whiter chin 
the reason rash alarm know 
which dumb demeanour seek show 
 but vehement prayer urgeth still
 under colour commit ill 

thu repli the colour thi face 
 that even anger make lili pale 
and red rose blush disgrac 
shall plead tell love tale 
under colour i come scale
 thi never conquer fort fault thine 
 for thine eye betray thee unto mine 

 thu i forestal thee thou mean chide 
thi beauti hath ensnar thee night 
where thou patienc must abid 
mi mark thee earth delight 
which i conquer sought might 
 but reproof reason beat dead 
 by thi bright beauti newli bred 

 i see cross attempt bring 
i know thorn grow rose defend 
i think honey guard sting 
all beforehand counsel comprehend 
but deaf hear heed friend 
 onli hath eye gaze beauti 
 and dote look gainst law duti 

 i debat even soul 
what wrong shame sorrow i shall breed 
but noth affect cours control 
or stop headlong furi speed 
i know repent tear ensu deed 
 reproach disdain deadli enmiti 
 yet strike i embrac mine infami 

thi said shake aloft roman blade 
which like falcon tower sky 
coucheth fowl wing shade 
whose crook beak threat mount die 
so insult falchion lies
 harmless lucretia mark tells
 with trembl fear fowl hear falcon bell 

 lucrec quoth night i must enjoy thee 
if thou deni forc must work way 
for thi bed i purpos destroy thee 
that done worthless slave thine i slay 
to kill thine honour thi life decay 
 and thi dead arm i mean place 
 swear i slew see thee embrac 

 so thi surviv husband shall remain
th scorn mark everi open eye 
thi kinsmen hang head disdain 
thi issu blurr nameless bastardi 
and thou author obloquy 
 shalt thi trespass cite rhyme 
 and sung children succeed time 

 but thou yield i rest thi secret friend 
the fault unknown thought unact 
a littl harm done great good end 
for law polici remain enact 
the poison simpl sometim compacted
 in pure compound appli 
 hi venom effect purifi 

 then thi husband thi children sake 
tender suit bequeath lot
th shame devic take 
the blemish never forgot 
wors slavish wipe birth hour blot 
 for mark descri men nativity
 are natur fault infami 

here cockatric dead kill eye
h rouseth make paus 
while pictur pure pieti 
like white hind grype sharp claw 
plead wilder law 
 to rough beast know gentl right 
 nor aught obey foul appetit 

but black fac cloud world doth threat 
in dim mist aspir mountain hide 
from earth dark womb gentl gust doth get 
which blow pitchi vapour bide 
hinder present fall divid 
 so unhallow hast word delay 
 and moodi pluto wink orpheu play 

yet foul night work cat doth dalli 
while hold fast foot weak mous panteth 
her sad behaviour feed vultur folli 
a swallow gulf even plenti wanteth 
hi ear prayer admit heart granteth
 no penetr entranc plain 
 tear harden lust though marbl wear rain 

her piti plead eye sadli fix d
in remorseless wrinkl face 
her modest eloqu sigh mix 
which oratori add grace 
she put period often place 
 and midst sentenc accent break 
 that twice doth begin ere speak 

she conjur high almighti jove 
bi knighthood gentri sweet friendship oath 
bi untim tear husband love 
bi holi human law common troth 
bi heaven earth power 
 that borrow bed make retir 
 and stoop honour foul desir 

quoth reward hospitality
with black payment thou hast pretend 
mud fountain gave drink thee 
mar thing can not amend 
end thi ill aim shoot end 
 he woodman doth bend bow
 to strike poor unseason doe 

 my husband thi friend sake spare 
thyself art mighti thine sake leav 
myself weakl ensnar 
thou look st like deceit deceiv 
mi sigh like whirlwind labour henc heav thee 
 if ever man mov woman moan 
 be move tear sigh groan 

 all togeth like troubl ocean 
beat thi rocki wreck threaten heart 
to soften continu motion 
for stone dissolv water convert 
o harder stone thou art 
 melt tear compassion 
 soft piti enter iron gate 

 in tarquin like i entertain thee 
hast thou put shape shame 
to host heaven i complain 
thou wrong st honour wound st princ name 
thou art thou seem st 
 thou seem st thou art god king 
 for king like god govern everi thing 

 how thi shame seed thine age 
when thu thi vice bud thi spring 
if thi hope thou dar st outrag 
what dar st thou thou art king 
o rememb outrag thing
 from vassal actor wip away 
 then king misde can not hid clay 

 thi deed make thee lov fear 
but happi monarch still fear love 
with foul offend thou perforc must bear 
when thee like offenc prove 
if fear thi remov 
 for princ glass school book 
 where subject eye learn read look 

 and wilt thou school lust shall learn 
must thee read lectur shame 
wilt thou glass wherein shall discern
author sin warrant blame 
to privileg dishonour thi name 
 thou back st reproach long live laud 
 and mak st fair reput bawd 

 hast thou command gave thee 
from pure heart command thi rebel 
draw thi sword guard iniqu 
for lent thee brood kill 
thi princ offic canst thou fulfil 
 when pattern thi fault foul sin may say
 he learn sin thou didst teach way 

 think vile spectacl were
to view thi present trespass anoth 
men fault seldom appear 
their transgress partial smother 
thi guilt would seem death worthi thi brother 
 o wrapp infamies
 that misde askaunc eye 

 to thee thee heav hand appeal 
not seduc lust thi rash relier 
i sue exil majesti repeal 
let return flatter thought retir 
hi true respect prison fals desir 
 and wipe dim mist thi dote eyn 
 that thou shalt see thi state piti mine 

 have done quoth uncontrol tide
turn swell higher let 
small light soon blown huge fire abid 
and wind greater furi fret 
the petti stream pay daili debt
 to salt sovereign fresh fall hast 
 add flow alter tast 

 thou art quoth sea sovereign king 
and lo fall thi boundless flood
black lust dishonour shame misgovern 
who seek stain ocean thi blood 
if petti ill shall chang thi good 
 thi sea within puddl womb hear 
 and puddl thi sea disper 

 so shall slave king thou slave 
thou nobli base base dignifi 
thou fair life thi fouler grave 
thou loath shame thi pride 
the lesser thing greater hide 
 the cedar stoop base shrub foot 
 but low shrub whither cedar root 

 so let thi thought low vassal thi state 
 no quoth heaven i hear thee 
yield love enforc hate 
instead love coy touch shall rude tear thee 
that done despit i mean bear thee
 unto base bed rascal groom 
 to thi partner shame doom 

thi said set foot upon light 
for light lust deadli enemi 
shame fold blind conceal night 
when unseen doth tyrann 
the wolf hath seiz prey poor lamb cri 
 till white fleec voic control d
 entomb outcri lip sweet fold 

for nightli linen wears
h pen piteou clamour head 
cool hot face chastest tears
that ever modest eye sorrow shed 
o prone lust stain pure bed 
 the spot whereof could weep purifi 
 her tear drop perpetu 

but hath lost dearer thing life 
and hath would lose 
thi forc leagu doth forc strife 
thi momentari joy breed month pain 
thi hot desir convert cold disdain 
 pure chastiti rifl store 
 and lust thief far poorer 

look full fed hound gorg hawk 
unapt tender smell speedi flight 
make slow pursuit altogeth balk
th prey wherein natur delight 
so surfeit take tarquin fare night 
 hi tast delici digest sour 
 devour liv foul devour 

o deeper sin bottomless conceit
can comprehend still imagin 
drunken desir must vomit receipt 
ere see abomin 
while lust pride exclamation
 can curb heat rein rash desir 
 till like jade self doth tire 

and lank lean discolour cheek 
with heavi eye knit brow strengthless pace 
feebl desir recreant poor meek 
like bankrupt beggar wail case 
the flesh proud desir doth fight grace 
 for revel decay 
 the guilti rebel remiss pray 

so fare fault lord rome
