who accomplish hotli cha 
for sound doom 
that length time stand disgrac 
besid soul fair templ defac 
 to whose weak ruin muster troop care 
 to ask spot princess fare 

she say subject foul insurrection
hav batter consecr wall 
and mortal fault brought subjection
h immort made thrall
to live death pain perpetu 
 which prescienc control still 
 but foresight could forestal 

even thought dark night stealeth 
a captiv victor hath lost gain 
bear away wound noth healeth 
the scar despit cure remain 
leav spoil perplex greater pain 
 she hear load lust left behind 
 and burthen guilti mind 

he like thievish dog creep sadli thenc 
she like weari lamb lie pant 
he scowl hate offenc 
she desper nail flesh doth tear 
he faintli fli sweat guilti fear 
 she stay exclaim dire night 
 he run chide vanish loath delight 

he thenc depart heavi convertit 
she remain hopeless castaway 
he speed look morn light 
she pray never may behold day 
 for day quoth night scape doth open lay 
 and true eye never practi how
 to cloak offenc cun brow 

 they think everi eye see
th disgrac behold 
and therefor would still dark 
to unseen sin remain untold 
for guilt weep unfold 
 and grave like water doth eat steel 
 upon cheek helpless shame i feel 

here exclaim repos rest 
and bid eye hereaft still blind 
she wake heart beat breast 
and bid leap thenc may find
som purer chest close pure mind 
 frantic grief thu breath forth spite
 against unseen secreci night 

 o comfort kill night imag hell 
dim regist notari shame 
black stage tragedi murder fell 
vast sin conceal chao nurs blame 
blind muffl bawd dark harbour defam 
 grim cave death whisper conspirator
 with close tongu treason ravish 

 o hate vapor foggi night 
sinc thou art guilti cureless crime 
muster thi mist meet eastern light 
make war proport cours time 
or thou wilt permit sun climb
 hi wont height yet ere go bed 
 knit poison cloud golden head 

 with rotten damp ravish morn air 
let exhal unwholesom breath make sick
th life puriti suprem fair 
ere arriv weari noontid prick 
and let thi misti vapour march thick 
 that smoki rank smother light
 may set noon make perpetu night 

 were tarquin night night child 
the silver shine queen would distain 
her twinkl handmaid defil 
through night black bosom peep 
so i co partner pain 
 and fellowship woe doth woe assuag 
 as palmer chat make short pilgrimag 

 where i one blush 
to cross arm hang head mine 
to mask brow hide infami 
but i alon alon must sit pine 
season earth shower silver brine 
 mingl talk tear grief groan 
 poor wast monument last moan 

 o night thou furnac foul reek smoke 
let jealou day behold face
which underneath thi black hide cloak
immodesti lie martyr disgrac 
keep still possess thi gloomi place 
 that fault thi reign made 
 may likewis sepulchr thi shade 

 make object tell tale day 
the light show charact brow 
the stori sweet chastiti decay 
the impiou breach holi wedlock vow 
yea illiter know how
 to cipher writ learn book 
 will quot loathsom trespass look 

 the nurs still child tell story
and fright cri babe tarquin name 
the orat deck oratori 
will coupl reproach tarquin shame 
feast find minstrel tune defam 
 will tie hearer attend line 
 how tarquin wrong i collatin 

 let good name senseless reput 
for collatin dear love kept unspot 
if made theme disput 
the branch anoth root rot 
and undeserv reproach allot 
 that clear attaint mine
 as i ere pure collatin 

 o unseen shame invis disgrac 
o unfelt sore crest wound privat scar 
reproach stamp collatinu face 
and tarquin eye may read mot afar 
how peac wound war 
 ala mani bear shame blow 
 which give know 

 if collatin thine honour lay 
from strong assault bereft 
mi honey lost i drone like bee 
have perfect summer left 
but robb ransack injuri theft 
 in thi weak hive wander wasp hath crept 
 and suck honey thi chast bee kept 

 yet i guilti thi honour wrack 
yet thi honour i entertain 
come thee i could put back 
for dishonour disdain 
besid weari complain 
 and talk virtu o unlook evil 
 when virtu profan devil 

 whi worm intrud maiden bud 
or hate cuckoo hatch sparrow nest 
or toad infect fair fount venom mud 
or tyrant folli lurk gentl breast 
or king breaker behest 
 but perfect absolut 
 that impur doth pollut 

 the age man coffer gold
i plagu cramp gout pain fit 
and scarc hath eye treasur behold 
but like still pine tantalu sit 
and useless barn harvest wit 
 have pleasur gain
 but torment can not cure pain 

 so hath can not use 
and leav master young 
who pride present abus 
their father weak strong 
to hold curs bless fortun long 
 the sweet wish turn loath sour 
 even moment call 

 unruli blast wait tender spring 
unwholesom weed take root preciou flower 
the adder hiss sweet bird sing 
what virtu breed iniqu devour 
we good say 
 but ill annex opportunity
 or kill life els qualiti 

 o opportun thi guilt great 
 ti thou executest traitor treason 
thou set st wolf lamb may get 
whoever plot sin thou point st season 
 ti thou spurn st right law reason 
 and thi shadi cell none may spi 
 sit sin seiz soul wander 

 thou mak st vestal violat oath 
thou blow st fire temper thaw 
thou smother st honesti thou murther st troth 
thou foul abettor thou notori bawd 
thou plantest scandal displacest laud 
 thou ravish thou traitor thou fals thief 
 thi honey turn gall thi joy grief 

 thi secret pleasur turn open shame 
thi privat feast public fast 
thi smooth titl rag name 
thi sugar tongu bitter wormwood tast 
thi violent vaniti never last 
 how come vile opportun 
 be bad number seek thee 

 when wilt thou humbl suppliant friend 
and bring suit may obtain 
when wilt thou sort hour great strife end 
or free soul wretched hath chain 
give physic sick eas pain 
 the poor lame blind halt creep cri thee 
 but ne er meet opportun 

 the patient die physician sleep 
the orphan pine oppressor feed 
justic feast widow weep 
advic sport infect breed 
thou grant st time charit deed 
 wrath envi treason rape murder rage 
 thi heinou hour wait page 

 when truth virtu thee 
a thousand cross keep thi aid 
they buy thi help sin ne er give fee 
he grati come thou art well appay d
a well hear grant hath said 
 my collatin would els come me
 when tarquin stay thee 

 guilti thou art murder theft 
guilti perjuri suborn 
guilti treason forgeri shift 
guilti incest abomin 
an accessori thine inclination
 to sin past come 
 from creation gener doom 

 mi shapen time copesm ugli night 
swift subtl post carrier grisli care 
eater youth fals slave fals delight 
base watch woe sin pack hors virtu snare 
thou nursest murtherest 
 o hear injuri shift time 
 be guilti death sinc crime 

 whi hath thi servant opportun 
betray hour thou gav st repos 
cancel fortun enchain me
to endless date never end woe 
time offic fine hate foe 
 to eat error opinion bred 
 not spend dowri law bed 

 time glori calm contend king 
to unmask falsehood bring truth light 
to stamp seal time age thing 
to wake morn sentinel night 
to wrong wronger till render right 
 to ruinat proud build thi hour 
 and smear dust glitter golden tower 

 to fill worm hole state monument 
to feed oblivion decay thing 
to blot old book alter content 
to pluck quill ancient raven wing 
to dri old oak sap cherish spring 
 to spoil antiqu hammer steel 
 and turn giddi round fortun wheel 

 to show beldam daughter daughter 
to make child man man child 
to slay tiger doth live slaughter 
to tame unicorn lion wild 
to mock subtl beguil 
 to cheer ploughman increas crop 
 and wast huge stone littl water drop 

 whi work st thou mischief thi pilgrimag 
unless thou couldst return make amend 
one poor retir minut age
would purchas thee thousand thousand friend 
lend wit bad debtor lend 
 o dread night wouldst thou one hour come back 
 i could prevent storm shun thi wrack 

 thou ceas ess lackey etern 
with mischanc cross tarquin flight 
devis extrem beyond extrem 
to make curs curs crime night 
let ghastli shadow lewd eye affright 
 and dire thought commit evil
 shape everi bush hideou shapeless devil 

 disturb hour rest restless tranc 
afflict bed bedrid groan 
let bechanc piti mischanc 
to make moan piti moan 
stone harden heart harder stone 
 and let mild women lose mild 
 wilder tiger wild 

 let time tear curl hair 
let time rave 
let time time help despair 
let time live loath slave 
let time beggar ort crave 
 and time see one alm doth live
 disdain disdain scrap give 

 let time see friend foe 
and merri fool mock resort 
let time mark slow time goes
in time sorrow swift short
hi time folli time sport 
 and ever let unrecal crime
 have time wail abus time 

 o time thou tutor good bad 
teach curs thou taught st ill 
at shadow let thief run mad 
himself seek everi hour kill 
such wretch hand wretch blood spill 
 for base would offic have
 as slander deathsman base slave 

the baser come king 
to shame hope deed degener 
the mightier man mightier thing
that make honour beget hate 
for greatest scandal wait greatest state 
 the moon cloud present miss 
 but littl star may hide list 

 the crow may bath coal black wing mire 
and unperceiv fli filth away 
but like snow white swan desir 
the stain upon silver stay 
poor groom sightless night king gloriou day 
 gnat unnot whereso er fli 
 but eagl gaze upon everi eye 

 out idl word servant shallow fool 
unprofit sound weak arbitr 
busi skill contend school 
debat leisur serv dull debat 
to trembl client mediat 
 for i forc argument straw 
 sinc case past help law 

 in vain i rail opportun 
at time tarquin uncheer night 
in vain i cavil mine infami 
in vain i spurn confirm despit 
thi helpless smoke word doth right 
 the remedi inde good
 is let forth foul defil blood 

 poor hand quiver st thou decre 
honour thyself rid shame 
for i die honour live thee 
but i live thou livest defam 
sinc thou couldst defend thi loyal dame 
 and wast afear scratch wick foe 
 kill thyself yield 

thi said tumbl couch starteth 
to find desper instrument death 
but slaughter hous tool imparteth 
to make vent passag breath 
which throng lip vanisheth
 as smoke aetna air consum 
 or discharg cannon fume 

 in vain quoth i live seek vain
som happi mean end hapless life 
i fear tarquin falchion slain 
yet self purpos seek knife 
but i fear i loyal wife 
 so i o can not 
 of true type hath tarquin rifl 

 o gone i sought live 
and therefor i need fear die 
to clear spot death least i give
a badg fame slander liveri 
a die life live infami 
 poor helpless help treasur stolen away 
 to burn guiltless casket lay 

 well well dear collatin thou shalt know
th stain tast violat troth 
i wrong thi true affect 
to flatter thee infring oath 
thi bastard graff shall never come growth 
 he shall boast thi stock pollute
 that thou art dote father fruit 

nor shall smile thee secret thought 
nor laugh companion thi state 
but thou shalt know thi interest bought
bas gold stolen forth thi gate 
for i mistress fate 
 and trespass never dispens 
 till life death acquit forc offenc 

 i poison thee attaint 
nor fold fault cleanli coin excus 
mi sabl ground sin i paint 
to hide truth fals night abus 
mi tongu shall utter mine eye like sluic 
 as mountain spring feed dale 
 shall gush pure stream purg impur tale 

bi lament philomel ended
th well tun warbl nightli sorrow 
and solemn night slow sad gait descended
to ugli hell lo blush morrow
lend light fair eye light borrow 
 but cloudi lucrec shame see 
 and therefor still night would cloister 

reveal day everi cranni spi 
and seem point sit weep 
to sob speak o eye eye 
whi pryest thou window leav thi peep 
mock thi tickl beam eye sleep 
 brand forehead thi pierc light 
 for day hath nought done night 

thu cavil everi thing see 
true grief fond testi child 
who wayward mood nought agre 
old woe infant sorrow bear mild 
continu tame one wild 
 like unpracti swimmer plung still
 with much labour drown want skill 

so deep drench sea care 
hold disput thing view 
and sorrow doth compar 
no object passion strength renew 
and one shift anoth straight ensu 
 sometim grief dumb hath word 
 sometim ti mad much talk afford 

the littl bird tune morn joy
mak moan mad sweet melodi 
for mirth doth search bottom annoy 
sad soul slain merri compani 
grief best plea grief societi 
 true sorrow feelingli suffic d
 when like semblanc sympathiz 

 ti doubl death drown ken shore 
he ten time pine pine behold food 
to see salv doth make wound ach 
great grief griev would good 
deep woe roll forward like gentl flood 
 who stopp bound bank erflow 
 grief dalli law limit know 

 you mock bird quoth tune entomb
within hollow swell feather breast 
and hear mute dumb 
 my restless discord love stop rest 
a woeful hostess brook merri guest 
 relish nimbl note pleas ear 
 distress like dump time kept tear 

 come philomel sing st ravish 
make thi sad grove dishevel hair 
a dank earth weep thi languish 
so i sad strain strain tear 
and deep groan diapason bear 
 for burthen wise i hum tarquin still 
 while thou tereu descant st better skill 

 and while thorn thou bear st thi part 
to keep thi sharp woe wake wretch i 
to imit thee well heart
wil fix sharp knife affright mine eye 
who wink shall thereon fall die 
 these mean fret upon instrument 
 shall tune heart string true languish 

 and poor bird thou sing st day 
a shame eye thee behold 
some dark deep desert seat way 
that know parch heat freez cold 
will find unfold
 to creatur stern sad tune chang kind 
 sinc men prove beast let beast bear gentl mind 

a poor fright deer stand gaze 
wildli determin way fli 
or one encompass wind maze 
that can not tread way readili 
so mutini 
 to live die twain better 
 when life sham death reproach debtor 

 to kill quoth alack 
but bodi poor soul pollut 
they lose half greater patienc bear it
than whose whole swallow confus 
that mother tri merciless conclusion
 who two sweet babe death take one 
 will slay nurs none 

 my bodi soul dearer 
when one pure made divin 
whose love either nearer 
when kept heaven collatin 
ah bark peel lofti pine 
 hi leav wither sap decay 
 so must soul bark peel away 

 her hous sack quiet interrupt 
her mansion batter enemi 
her sacr templ spot spoil corrupt 
grossli engirt dare infami 
then let call impieti 
 if blemish fort i make hole
 through i may convey troubl soul 

 yet die i till collatine
hav heard caus untim death 
that may vow sad hour mine 
reveng made stop breath 
mi stain blood tarquin i bequeath 
 which taint shall spent 
 and due writ testament 

 my honour i bequeath unto knife
that wound bodi dishonour 
 ti honour depriv dishonour life 
the one live dead 
so shame ash shall fame bred 
 for death i murther shame scorn 
 my shame dead mine honour new born 

 dear lord dear jewel i lost 
what legaci shall i bequeath thee 
mi resolut love shall thi boast 
bi whose exampl thou reveng mayst 
how tarquin must use read 
 myself thi friend kill thi foe 
 and sake serv thou fals tarquin 

 thi brief abridg i make 
mi soul bodi sky ground 
mi resolut husband thou take 
mine honour knife make wound 
mi shame fame confound 
 and fame live disbur be
 to live think shame 

 thou collatin shalt overse 
how i overseen thou shalt see 
mi blood shall wash slander mine ill 
mi life foul deed life fair end shall free 
faint faint heart stoutli say 
 yield hand hand shall conquer thee 
 thou dead die shall victor 

thi plot death sadli laid 
and wip brinish pearl bright eye 
with untun tongu hoars call maid 
whose swift obedi mistress hie 
for fleet wing duti thought feather fli 
 poor lucrec cheek unto maid seem so
 as winter mead sun doth melt snow 

her mistress doth give demur good morrow 
with soft slow tongu true mark modesti 
and sort sad look ladi sorrow 
 for face wore sorrow liveri 
but durst ask audaciously
 whi two sun cloud eclips 
 nor fair cheek wash woe 

but earth doth weep sun set 
each flower moisten like melt eye 
even maid swell drop gan wet
her circl eyn enforc sympathy
of fair sun set mistress sky 
 who salt wav ocean quench light 
 which make maid weep like dewi night 

a pretti pretti creatur stand 
like ivori conduit coral cistern fill 
one justli weep take hand
no caus compani drop spill 
their gentl sex weep often will 
 griev guess other smart 
 and drown eye break heart 

for men marbl women waxen mind 
and therefor form marbl 
the weak oppress impress strang kinds
i form forc fraud skill 
then call author ill 
 no wax shall account evil 
 wherein stamp semblanc devil 

their smooth like goodli champaign plain 
lay open littl worm creep 
in men rough grown grove remain
cav keep evil obscur sleep 
through crystal wall littl mote peep 
 though men cover crime bold stern look 
 poor women face fault book 

no man inveigb wither flower 
but chide rough winter flower hath kill 
not devour doth devour 
i worthi blame o let hild
poor women fault fulfil d
 with men abus proud lord blame 
 make weak made women tenant shame 

the preced whereof lucrec view 
assail night circumst strong
of present death shame might ensue
bi death husband wrong 
such danger resist belong 
 the die fear bodi spread 
 and can not abus bodi dead 

bi mild patienc bid fair lucrec speak
to poor counterfeit complain 
 my girl quoth occas break
thos tear thee thi cheek rain 
if thou dost weep grief sustain 
 know gentl wench small avail mood 
 if tear could help mine would good 

 but tell girl went stay d
till deep groan tarquin henc 
 madam ere i repli maid 
 the blame sluggard neglig 
yet fault i thu far dispens 
 myself stir ere break day 
 and ere i rose tarquin gone away 

 but ladi maid may bold 
she would request know heavi 
 o peac quoth lucrec told 
the repetit can not make less 
for i well express 
 and deep tortur may call hell 
 when felt one hath power tell 

 go get hither paper ink pen 
yet save labour i 
what i say one husband men
bid thou readi bear
a letter lord love dear 
 bid speed prepar carri 
 the caus crave hast soon writ 

her maid gone prepar write 
first hover er paper quill 
conceit grief eager combat fight 
what wit set blot straight 
thi curiou good blunt ill 
 much like press peopl door 
 throng invent shall go 

at last thu begin thou worthi lord
of unworthi wife greeteth thee 
health thi person next vouchsaf afford
 if ever love thi lucrec thou wilt see 
some present speed come visit 
 so i commend hous grief 
 my woe tediou though word brief 

here fold tenor woe 
her certain sorrow writ uncertainli 
bi short schedul collatin may know
her grief grief true qualiti 
she dare thereof make discoveri 
 lest hold gross abus 
 ere blood stain stain excus 

besid life feel passion
sh hoard spend hear 
when sigh groan tear may grace fashion
of disgrac better clear her
from suspicion world might bear 
 to shun blot would blot letter
 with word till action might becom better 

to see sad sight move hear told 
for eye interpret ear
th heavi motion doth behold 
when everi part part woe doth bear 
 ti part sorrow hear 
 deep sound make lesser nois shallow ford 
 and sorrow ebb blown wind word 

her letter seal writ
 at ardea lord hast 
the post attend deliv 
charg sour fac groom hie fast
a lag fowl northern blast 
 speed speed dull slow deem 
 extrem still urgeth extrem 

the home villain court sie low 
and blush steadfast eye
rec scroll without yea 
and forth bash innoc doth hie 
but whose guilt within bosom lie
 imagin everi eye behold blame 
 for lucrec thought blush see shame 

when silli groom god wot defect
of spirit life bold audac 
such harmless creatur true respect
to talk deed other saucily
promis speed leisur 
 even pattern worn age
 pawn honest look laid word gage 

hi kindl duti kindl mistrust 
that two red fire face blaz 
she thought blush know tarquin lust 
and blush wistli gaz 
her earnest eye make amaz 
 the saw blood cheek replenish 
 the thought spi blemish 

but long think till return 
and yet duteou vassal scarc gone 
the weari time can not entertain 
for ti stale sigh weep groan 
so woe hath weari woe moan tire moan 
 that plaint littl doth stay 
 paus mean mourn newer way 

at last call mind hang piece
of skil paint made priam troy 
befor drawn power greec 
for helen rape citi destroy 
threat ning cloud kiss ilion annoy 
 which conceit painter drew proud 
 as heaven seem kiss turret bow 

a thousand lament object 
in scorn natur art gave lifeless life 
mani dri drop seem weep tear 
shed slaughter husband wife 
the red blood reek show painter strife 
 the die eye gleam forth ashi light 
 like die coal burnt tediou night 

there might see labour pioner
begrim sweat smear dust 
and tower troy would appear
th eye men loophol thrust 
gaze upon greek littl lust 
 such sweet observ work 
 that one might see far eye look sad 

in great command grace majesty
y might behold triumph face 
in youth quick bear dexter 
and painter interlaces
pal coward march trembl pace 
 which heartless peasant well resembl 
 that one would swear saw quak trembl 

in ajax ulyss o art
of physiognomi might one behold 
the face either cipher either heart 
their face manner expressli told 
in ajax eye blunt rage rigour roll 
 but mild glanc sli ulyss lent
 show deep regard smile govern 

there plead might see grave nestor stand 
a encourag greek fight 
make sober action hand
that beguil attent charm sight 
in speech seem beard silver white 
 wagg lip fly
 thin wind breath purl sky 

about press gape face 
which seem swallow sound advic 
all jointli listen sever grace 
a mermaid ear entic 
some high low painter nice 
 the scalp mani almost hid behind 
 to jump higher seem mock mind 

here one man hand lean anoth head 
hi nose shadow neighbour ear 
here one throng bear back boll n red 
anoth smother seem pelt swear 
and rage sign rage bear 
 as loss nestor golden word 
 it seem would debat angri sword 

for much imaginari work 
conceit deceit compact kind 
that achil imag stood spear 
grip arm hand behind 
wa left unseen save eye mind 
 a hand foot face leg head 
 stood whole imagin 

and wall strong besieg troy
when brave hope bold hector march field 
stood mani trojan mother share joy
to see youth son bright weapon wield 
and hope odd action yield 
 that light joy seem appear 
 like bright thing stain kind heavi fear 

and strond dardan fought 
to simoi reedi bank red blood ran 
whose wave imit battl sought
with swell ridg rank began
to break upon gall shore than
 retir till meet greater rank 
 they join shoot foam simoi bank 

to well paint piec lucrec come 
to find face distress stell 
mani see care carv 
but none distress dolour dwell 
till despair hecuba beheld 
 stare priam wound old eye 
 which bleed pyrrhu proud foot lie 

in painter anatomiz d
time ruin beauti wrack grim care reign 
her cheek chop wrinkl disgui 
of semblanc remain 
her blue blood chang black everi vein 
 want spring shrunk pipe fed 
 show life imprison bodi dead 

on sad shadow lucrec spend eye 
and shape sorrow beldam woe 
who noth want answer cri 
and bitter word ban cruel foe 
the painter god lend 
 and therefor lucrec swear wrong 
 to give much grief tongu 

 poor instrument quoth without sound 
i tune thi woe lament tongu 
and drop sweet balm priam paint wound 
and rail pyrrhu hath done wrong 
and tear quench troy burn long 
 and knife scratch angri eyes
 of greek thine enemi 

 show strumpet began stir 
that nail beauti i may tear 
thi heat lust fond pari incur
thi load wrath burn troy doth bear 
thi eye kindl fire burneth 
 and troy trespass thine eye 
 the sire son dame daughter die 

 whi privat pleasur one
becom public plagu mani mo 
let sin alon commit light alone
upon head hath transgress 
let guiltless soul freed guilti woe 
 for one offenc mani fall 
 to plagu privat sin gener 

 lo weep hecuba priam die 
here manli hector faint troilu swound 
here friend friend bloodi channel lie 
and friend friend give unadvis wound 
and one man lust mani live confound 
 had dote priam check son desir 
 troy bright fame fire 

here feelingli weep troy paint woe 
for sorrow like heavi hang bell 
onc set ring weight goe 
then littl strength ring dole knell 
so lucrec set work sad tale doth tell
 to pencil pensiv colour sorrow 
 she lend word look doth borrow 

she throw eye paint round 
and find forlorn doth lament 
at last see wretch imag bound 
that piteou look phrygian shepherd lent 
hi face though full care yet show content 
 onward troy blunt swain goe 
 so mild patienc seem scorn woe 

in painter labour skill
to hide deceit give harmless show
an humbl gait calm look eye wail still 
a brow unbent seem welcom woe 
cheek neither red pale mingl so
 that blush red guilti instanc gave 
 nor ashi pale fear fals heart 

but like constant confirm devil 
he entertain show seem 
and therein ensconc secret evil 
that jealousi cold mistrust
fals creep craft perjuri thrust
 into bright day black fac storm 
 or blot hell born sin saint like form 

the well skill workman mild imag drew
for perjur sinon whose enchant story
th credul old priam slew 
whose word like wildfir burnt shine glory
of rich built ilion sky sorri 
 and littl star shot fix place 
 when glass fell wherein view face 

thi pictur advisedli peru 
and chid painter wondrou skill 
say shape sinon abu 
so fair form lodg mind ill 
and still gaz gaze still 
 such sign truth plain face spi 
 that conclud pictur beli 

 it can not quoth much guil 
 she would said lurk look 
but tarquin shape came mind 
and tongu lurk can not took 
 it can not sens forsook 
 and turn thu it can not i find 
 but face bear wick mind 

 for even subtl sinon paint 
so sober sad weari mild 
 as grief travail faint 
to came tarquin arm beguil d
with outward honesti yet defil d
 with inward vice priam cherish 
 so i tarquin troy perish 

 look look listen priam wet eye 
to see borrow tear sinon shed 
priam art thou old yet wise 
for everi tear fall trojan bleed 
hi eye drop fire water thenc proce 
 those round clear pearl move thi piti 
 are ball quenchless fire burn thi citi 

 such devil steal effect lightless hell 
for sinon fire doth quak cold 
and cold hot burn fire doth dwell 
these contrari uniti hold 
onli flatter fool make bold 
 so priam trust fals sinon tear doth flatter 
 that find mean burn troy water 

here enrag passion assail 
that patienc quit beaten breast 
she tear senseless sinon nail 
compar unhappi guest
whos deed hath made detest 
 at last smilingli give er 
 fool fool quoth wound sore 

thu ebb flow current sorrow 
and time doth weari time complain 
she look night long morrow 
and think long remain 
short time seem long sorrow sharp sustain 
 though woe heavi yet seldom sleep 
 and watch see time slow creep 

which time hath overslipp thought 
that paint imag hath spent 
be feel grief brought
bi deep surmis other detriment 
lose woe show discont 
 it easeth though none ever cur 
 to think dolour other endur 

but mind messeng come back 
bring home lord compani 
who find lucrec clad mourn black 
and round tear distain eye
blu circl stream like rainbow sky 
 these water gall dim element
 foretel new storm alreadi spent 

which sad behold husband saw 
amazedli sad face stare 
her eye though sod tear look red raw 
her live colour kill deadli care 
he hath power ask fare 
 both stood like old acquaint tranc 
 met far home wonder chanc 

at last take bloodless hand 
and thu begin what uncouth ill event
hath thee befal n thou dost trembl stand 
sweet love spite hath thi fair colour spent 
whi art thou thu attir discont 
 unmask dear dear moodi heavi 
 and tell thi grief may give redress 

three time sigh give sorrow fire 
ere discharg one word woe 
at length address answer desir 
she modestli prepar let know
her honour ta en prison foe 
 while collatin consort lords
 with sad attent long hear word 

and pale swan wateri nest
begin sad dirg certain end 
 few word quoth shall fit trespass best 
where excus give fault amend 
in woe word depend 
 and lament would drawn long 
 to tell one poor tire tongu 

 then task hath say 
dear husband interest thi bed
a stranger came pillow lay
wher thou wast wont rest thi weari head 
and wrong els may imagined
 by foul enforc might done 
 from ala thi lucrec free 

 for dread dead dark midnight 
with shine falchion chamber came
a creep creatur flame light 
and softli cri awak thou roman dame 
and entertain love els last shame
 on thee thine night i inflict 
 if thou love desir contradict 

 for hard favour groom thine quoth 
unless thou yoke thi like 
i murder straight i slaughter thee
and swear i found fulfil
th loathsom act lust kill
 the lecher deed act be
 my fame thi perpetu infami 

 with i begin start cri 
and heart set sword 
swear unless i took patient 
i live speak anoth word 
so shame still rest upon record 
 and never forgot mighti rome
 the adulter death lucrec groom 

 mine enemi strong poor self weak 
and far weaker strong fear 
mi bloodi judg forbad tongu speak 
no right plea might plead justic 
hi scarlet lust came evid swear
 that poor beauti purloin eye 
 and judg robb prison die 

 o teach make mine excus 
or least refug let find 
though gross blood stain abus 
immacul spotless mind 
that forc never inclin d
 to accessari yield still pure
 doth poison closet yet endur 

lo hopeless merchant loss 
with head declin voic damm woe 
with sad set eye wretch arm across 
from lip new waxen pale begin blow
th grief away stop answer 
 but wretch strive vain 
 what breath breath drink 

a arch violent roar tide
outrun eye doth behold hast 
yet eddi boundeth pride
back strait forc fast 
in rage sent recal rage past 
 even sigh sorrow make saw 
 to push grief back grief draw 

which speechless woe poor attendeth 
and untim frenzi thu awaketh 
 dear lord thi sorrow sorrow lendeth
anoth power flood rain slaketh 
mi woe sensibl thi passion maketh
 more feel pain let suffice
 to drown one woe one pair weep eye 

 and sake i might charm thee 
for thi lucrec attend 
be suddenli reveng foe 
thine mine suppos thou dost defend me
from past help thou shalt lend me
 come late yet let traitor die 
 for spare justic feed iniqu 

 but ere i name fair lord quoth 
 speak came collatin 
 shall plight honour faith 
with swift pursuit veng wrong mine 
for ti meritori fair design
 to chase injustic reveng arm 
 knight oath right poor ladi harm 

at request nobl disposition
each present lord began promis aid 
a bound knighthood imposit 
long hear hate foe bewray 
but yet sad task hath said 
 the protest stop o speak quoth 
 how may forc stain wip 

 what qualiti mine offenc 
be constrain dread circumst 
may pure mind foul act dispens 
mi low declin honour advanc 
may term acquit chanc 
 the poison fountain clear 
 and i compel stain 

with began say 
her bodi stain mind untaint clear 
while joyless smile turn away
th face map deep impress bears
of hard misfortun carv tear 
 no quoth dame hereaft live 
 by excus shall claim excus give 

here sigh heart would break 
she throw forth tarquin name he say 
but poor tongu could speak 
till mani accent delay 
untim breath sick short assay 
 she utter he fair lord ti 
 that guid hand give wound 

even sheath harmless breast
a harm knife thenc soul unsheath 
that blow bail deep unrest
of pollut prison breath 
her contrit sigh unto cloud bequeath d
 her wing sprite wound doth fly
 life last date cancel destini 

stone still astonish deadli deed 
stood collatin lordli crew 
till lucrec father behold bleed 
himself self slaughter bodi threw 
and purpl fountain brutu drew
 the murder knife left place 
 her blood poor reveng held chase 

and bubbl breast doth divide
in two slow river crimson blood
circl bodi everi side 
who like late sack island vastli stood
bar unpeopl fear flood 
 some blood still pure red remain 
 and look black fals tarquin stain 

about mourn congeal face
of black blood wateri rigol goe 
which seem weep upon taint place 
and ever sinc piti lucrec woe 
corrupt blood wateri token show 
 and blood untaint still doth red abid 
 blush putrifi 

 daughter dear daughter old lucretiu cri 
 that life mine thou hast depriv 
if child father imag lie 
where shall i live lucrec unliv 
thou wast end deriv d
 if children pre deceas progenitor 
 we offspr none 

 poor broken glass i often behold
in thi sweet semblanc old age new born 
but fair fresh mirror dim old 
show bare bon death time outworn 
o thi cheek imag thou hast torn 
 and shiver beauti glass 
 that i see i 

 o time ceas thou thi cours last longer 
if surceas surviv 
shall rotten death make conquest stronger 
and leav falter feebl soul aliv 
the old bee die young possess hive 
 then live sweet lucrec live see
 thi father die thi father thee 

bi start collatin dream 
and bid lucretiu give sorrow place 
and key cold lucrec bleed stream
h fall bath pale fear face 
and counterfeit die space 
 till manli shame bid possess breath 
 and live reveng death 

the deep vexat inward soul
hath serv dumb arrest upon tongu 
who mad sorrow use control 
or keep heart eas word long 
begin talk lip throng
 weak word thick come poor heart aid 
 that man could distinguish said 

yet sometim tarquin pronounc plain 
but teeth name tore 
thi windi tempest till blow rain 
held back sorrow tide make 
at last rain busi wind give er 
 then son father weep equal strife 
 who weep daughter wife 

the one doth call 
yet neither may possess claim lay 
the father say she mine o mine 
repli husband take away
mi sorrow interest let mourner say
 he weep mine 
 and must wail collatin 

 o quoth lucretiu i give life
which earli late hath spill 
 woe woe quoth collatin wife 
i owe ti mine hath kill 
 my daughter wife clamour fill d
 the disper air hold lucrec life 
 answer cri my daughter my wife 

brutu pluck knife lucrec side 
see emul woe 
began cloth wit state pride 
buri lucrec wound folli show 
he roman esteem so
 as silli jeer idiot king 
 for sportiv word utter foolish thing 

but throw shallow habit 
wherein deep polici disguis 
and arm long hid wit advisedli 
to check tear collatinu eye 
 thou wrong lord rome quoth aris 
 let unsound self suppo fool 
 now set thi long experienc wit school 

 whi collatin woe cure woe 
do wound help wound grief help grievou deed 
i reveng give thyself blow 
for foul act thi fair wife bleed 
such childish humour weak mind proce 
 thi wretch wife mistook matter 
 to slay slain foe 

 courag roman steep thi heart
in relent dew lament 
but kneel help bear thi part 
to rous roman god invoc 
that suffer abomin 
 sinc rome doth stand disgrac 
 by strong arm forth fair street cha 

 now capitol ador 
and chast blood unjustli stain 
bi heaven fair sun breed fat earth store 
bi countri right rome maintain 
and chast lucrec soul late complain d
 her wrong us bloodi knife 
 we reveng death true wife 

thi said struck hand upon breast 
and kiss fatal knife end vow 
and protest urg rest 
who wonder word allow 
then jointli ground knee bow 
 and deep vow brutu made 
 he doth repeat swore 

when sworn advis doom 
they conclud bear dead lucrec thenc 
to show bleed bodi thorough rome 
and publish tarquin foul offenc 
which done speedi dilig 
 the roman plausibl give consent
 to tarquin everlast banish 






 venu and adonis



 _vilia miretur vulgu mihi flavu apollo
 pocula castalia plena ministret aqua _




to the right honourable
henri wriothesley earl of southampton 
and baron titchfield 

right honour i know i shall offend dedic my
unpolish line lordship world censur me
for choos strong prop support weak burthen if
your honour seem pleas i account highli prais vow
to take advantag idl hour till i honour some
grav labour but first heir invent prove deform i
shal sorri nobl godfath never ear so
barren land fear yield still bad harvest i leav it
to honour survey honour heart content 
which i wish may alway answer wish world hopeful
expect 

your honour duti 
william shakespear 






 venu and adonis

even sun purpl colour face
had ta en last leav weep morn 
rose cheek adoni tri chase 
hunt lov love laugh scorn 4
 sick thought venu make amain unto 
 and like bold fac suitor gin woo 

 thrice fairer thu began 
 the field chief flower sweet compar 8
stain nymph love man 
more white red dove rose 
 natur made thee strife 
 saith world hath end thi life 12

 vouchsaf thou wonder alight thi steed 
and rein proud head saddl bow 
if thou wilt deign favour thi meed
a thousand honey secret shalt thou know 16
 here come sit never serpent hiss 
 and set i smother thee kiss 

 and yet cloy thi lip loath satieti 
but rather famish amid plenti 20
make red pale fresh varieti 
ten kiss short one one long twenti 
 a summer day seem hour short 
 be wast time beguil sport 24

with seizeth sweat palm 
the preced pith livelihood 
and trembl passion call balm 
earth sovereign salv goddess good 28
 be enrag desir doth lend force
 courag pluck hors 

over one arm lusti courser rein 
under tender boy 32
who blush pout dull disdain 
with leaden appetit unapt toy 
 she red hot coal glow fire 
 he red shame frosti desir 36

the stud bridl rag bough
nimbl fasten o quick love 
the steed stall even now
to tie rider begin prove 40
 backward push would thrust 
 and govern strength though lust 

so soon along 
each lean elbow hip 44
now doth stroke cheek doth frown 
and gin chide soon stop lip 
 and kiss speak lust languag broken 
 if thou wilt chide thi lip shall never open 48

he burn bash shame tears
doth quench maiden burn cheek 
then windi sigh golden hairs
to fan blow dri seek 52
 he saith immodest blame miss 
 what follow murder kiss 

even empti eagl sharp fast 
tire beak feather flesh bone 56
shake wing devour hast 
till either gorg stuff prey gone 
 even kiss brow cheek chin 
 and end doth anew begin 60

forc content never obey 
pant lie breatheth face 
she feedeth steam prey 
and call heavenli moistur air grace 64
 wish cheek garden full flowers
 so dew distil shower 

look bird lie tangl net 
so fasten arm adoni lie 68
pure shame aw resist made fret 
which bred beauti angri eye 
 rain ad river rank
 perforc forc overflow bank 72

still entreat prettili entreat 
for pretti ear tune tale 
still sullen still lour fret 
 twixt crimson shame anger ashi pale 76
 be red love best white 
 her best better delight 

look can not choos love 
and fair immort hand swear 80
from soft bosom never remov 
till take truce contend tear 
 which long rain make cheek wet 
 and one sweet kiss shall pay countless debt 

upon promis rais chin 85
like dive dapper peer wave 
who look duck quickli 
so offer give crave 88
 but lip readi pay 
 he wink turn lip anoth way 

never passeng summer heat
mor thirst drink good turn 92
her help see help can not get 
she bath water yet fire must burn 
 o piti gan cri flint heart boy 
 ti kiss i beg art thou coy 96

 i woo i entreat thee 
even stern dire god war 
whose sinewi neck battl ne er bow 
who conquer come everi jar 100
 yet hath captiv slave 
 and begg thou unask shalt 

 over altar hath hung lanc 
hi batter shield uncontrol crest 104
and sake hath learn sport danc 
to toy wanton dalli smile jest 
 scorn churlish drum ensign red
 make arm field tent bed 108

 thu overrul i oversway 
lead prison red rose chain 
strong temper steel stronger strength obey 
yet servil coy disdain 112
 oh proud brag thi might 
 for mast ring foil god fight 

 touch lip fair lip thine 
though mine fair yet red 116
the kiss shall thine well mine 
what see st thou ground hold thi head 
 look mine eyebal thi beauti lie 
 then lip lip sinc eye eye 120

 art thou asham kiss wink 
and i wink shall day seem night 
love keep revel twain 
be bold play sport sight 124
 these blue vein violet whereon lean
 never blab know mean 

 the tender spring upon thi tempt lip 127
show thee unrip yet mayst thou well tast 
make use time let advantag slip 
beauti within wast 
 fair flower gather prime
 rot consum littl time 132

 were i hard favour foul wrinkl old 
ill nurtur crook churlish harsh voic 
o erworn despis rheumat cold 
thick sight barren lean lack juic 136
 then mightst thou paus i thee 
 but defect dost abhor 

 thou canst see one wrinkl brow 139
mine eye grey bright quick turn 
mi beauti spring doth yearli grow 
mi flesh soft plump marrow burn 
 my smooth moist hand thi hand felt 
 would thi palm dissolv seem melt 144

 bid discours i enchant thine ear 
or like fairi trip upon green 
or like nymph long dishevel hair 
danc sand yet foot seen 148
 love spirit compact fire 
 not gross sink light aspir 

 wit primros bank whereon i lie 151
these forceless flower like sturdi tree support 
two strengthless dove draw sky 
from morn till night even i list sport 
 is love light sweet boy may be
 that thou shouldst think heavi unto thee 156

 is thine heart thine face affect 
can thi right hand seiz love upon thi left 
then woo thyself thyself reject 
steal thine freedom complain theft 160
 narcissu forsook 
 and die kiss shadow brook 

 torch made light jewel wear 
dainti tast fresh beauti use 164
herb smell sappi plant bear 
thing grow growth abus 
 seed spring seed beauti breedeth beauti 
 thou wast begot get thi duti 168

 upon earth increas shouldst thou feed 
unless earth thi increas fed 
bi law natur thou art bound breed 
that thine may live thou thyself art dead 172
 and spite death thou dost surviv 
 in thi like still left aliv 

bi love sick queen began sweat 
for lay shadow forsook 176
and titan tire midday heat 
with burn eye hotli overlook 
 wish adoni team guid 
 so like venu side 180

and adoni lazi spright 
and heavi dark dislik eye 
hi lour brow erwhelm fair sight 
like misti vapour blot sky 184
 sour cheek cri fie love 
 the sun doth burn face i must remov 

 ay quoth venu young unkind 
what bare excus mak st thou gone 188
i sigh celesti breath whose gentl wind
shal cool heat descend sun 
 i make shadow thee hair 
 if burn i quench tear 192

 the sun shine heaven shine warm 
and lo i lie sun thee 
the heat i thenc doth littl harm 
thine eye dart forth fire burneth 196
 and i immort life done 
 between heavenli earthli sun 

 art thou obdur flinti hard steel 
nay flint stone rain relenteth 200
art thou woman son canst feel
what ti love want love tormenteth 
 o thi mother born hard mind 
 she brought forth thee die unkind 204

 what i thou shouldst contemn 
or great danger dwell upon suit 
what thi lip wors one poor kiss 
speak fair speak fair word els mute 208
 give one kiss i give thee 
 and one int rest thou wilt twain 

 fie lifeless pictur cold senseless stone 
well paint idol imag dull dead 212
statu content eye alon 
thing like man woman bred 
 thou art man though man complexion 
 for men kiss even direct 216

thi said impati choke plead tongu 
and swell passion doth provok paus 
red cheek fieri eye blaze forth wrong 
be judg love can not right caus 220
 and weep fain would speak 
 and sob intend break 

sometim shake head hand 
now gazeth ground 224
sometim arm infold like band 
she would arm bound 
 and thenc struggl gone 
 she lock lili finger one one 228

 fondl saith sinc i hemm thee here
within circuit ivori pale 
i park thou shalt deer 
feed thou wilt mountain dale 232
 graze lip hill dri 
 stray lower pleasant fountain lie 

 within limit relief enough 
sweet bottom grass high delight plain 236
round rise hillock brake obscur rough 
to shelter thee tempest rain 
 then deer sinc i park 239
 no dog shall rous thee though thousand bark 

at adoni smile disdain 
that cheek appear pretti dimpl 
love made hollow slain 
he might buri tomb simpl 244
 foreknow well came lie 
 whi love liv could die 

these love cave round enchant pit 
open mouth swallow venu like 248
be mad doth wit 
struck dead first need second strike 
 poor queen love thine law forlorn 
 to love cheek smile thee scorn 252

now way shall turn shall say 
her word done woe increas 
the time spent object away 
and twine arm doth urg releas 256
 piti cri favour remors 
 away spring hasteth hors 

but lo forth cops neighbour 
a breed jennet lusti young proud 260
adoni tramp courser doth espi 
and forth rush snort neigh aloud 
 the strong neck steed tie unto tree 
 breaketh rein straight goe 264

imperi leap neigh bound 
and woven girth break asund 
the bear earth hard hoof wound 
whose hollow womb resound like heaven thunder 
 the iron bit crusheth tween teeth 269
 control control 

hi ear prick braid hang mane
upon compass crest stand end 272
hi nostril drink air forth 
a furnac vapour doth send 
 hi eye scorn glister like fire 
 show hot courag high desir 276

sometim trot told step 
with gentl majesti modest pride 
anon rear upright curvet leap 
a say lo thu strength tri 
 and i captiv eye 281
 of fair breeder stand 

what recketh rider angri stir 
hi flatter holla stand i say 284
what care curb prick spur 
for rich caparison trap gay 
 he see love noth els see 
 nor noth els proud sight agre 288

look painter would surpass life 
in limn well proport steed 
hi art natur workmanship strife 
a dead live exceed 292
 so hors excel common one 
 in shape courag colour pace bone 

round hoof short joint fetlock shag long 
broad breast full eye small head nostril wide 
high crest short ear straight leg pass strong 
thin mane thick tail broad buttock tender hide 
 look hors lack 
 save proud rider proud back 300

sometim scud far stare 
anon start stir feather 
to bid wind base prepar 
and run fli know whether 304
 for mane tail high wind sing 
 fan hair wave like feather wing 

he look upon love neigh unto 
she answer knew mind 308
be proud femal see woo 
she put outward strang seem unkind 
 spurn love scorn heat feel 
 beat kind embrac heel 312

then like melancholi malcont 
he vail tail like fall plume 
cool shadow melt buttock lent 
he stamp bite poor fli fume 316
 hi love perceiv enrag 
 grew kinder furi assuag 

hi testi master goeth take 
when lo unback breeder full fear 320
jealou catch swiftli doth forsak 
with hors left adoni 
 as mad unto wood hie 
 outstrip crow strive overfli 324

all swoln chafe adoni sit 
ban boister unruli beast 
and happi season fits
that love sick love plead may blest 328
 for lover say heart hath trebl wrong 
 when barr aidanc tongu 

an oven stopp river stay 
burneth hotli swelleth rage 332
so conceal sorrow may said 
free vent word love fire doth assuag 
 but heart attorney mute 
 the client break desper suit 336

he see come begin glow 
even die coal reviv wind 
and bonnet hide angri brow 
look dull earth disturb mind 340
 take notic nigh 
 for askanc hold eye 

o sight wistli view
how came steal wayward boy 344
to note fight conflict hue 
how white red destroy 
 but cheek pale by
 it flash forth fire lightn sky 348

now sat 
and like lowli lover kneel 
with one fair hand heaveth hat 
her tender hand fair cheek feel 352
 hi tend rer cheek receiv soft hand print 
 as apt new fall n snow take dint 

oh war look 
her eye petition eye su 356
hi eye saw eye seen 
her eye woo still eye disdain woo 
 and dumb play act made plain
 with tear choru like eye rain 

full gentli take hand 361
a lili prison gaol snow 
or ivori alabast band 
so white friend engirt white foe 364
 thi beauteou combat wil unwil 
 show like two silver dove sit bill 

onc engin thought began 
 o fairest mover mortal round 368
would thou wert i i man 
mi heart whole thine thi heart wound 
 for one sweet look thi help i would assur thee 
 though noth bodi bane would cure thee 

 give hand saith dost thou feel 
 give heart saith thou shalt 
o give lest thi hard heart steel 
and steel soft sigh never grave 376
 then love deep groan i never shall regard 
 becaus adoni heart hath made mine hard 

 for shame cri let go let go 
mi day delight past hors gone 380
and ti fault i bereft 
i pray henc leav alon 
 for mind thought busi care 
 is get palfrey mare 384

thu repli thi palfrey 
welcom warm approach sweet desir 
affect coal must cool 
els suffer set heart fire 388
 the sea hath bound deep desir hath none 
 therefor marvel though thi hors gone 

 how like jade stood tie tree 
servil master leathern rein 392
but saw love youth fair fee 
he held petti bondag disdain 
 throw base thong bend crest 
 enfranchis mouth back breast 396

 who see true love nake bed 
teach sheet whiter hue white 
but glutton eye full hath fed 
hi agent aim like delight 400
 who faint dare bold
 to touch fire weather cold 

 let excus thi courser gentl boy 
and learn i heartili beseech thee 404
to take advantag present joy 
though i dumb yet proceed teach thee 
 o learn love lesson plain 
 and made perfect never lost 408

 i know love quoth know 
unless boar i chase 
 ti much borrow i owe 
mi love love love disgrac 412
 for i heard life death 
 that laugh weep breath 

 who wear garment shapeless unfinish 
who pluck bud one leaf put forth 416

they wither prime prove noth worth

 loseth pride never waxeth strong 420

 you hurt hand wring let us part

 dismiss vow feign tear flatt ry

 but oh banquet wert thou tast 445

 should steal disturb feast 448

like red morn ever yet betoken d
wrack seaman tempest field

 gust foul flaw herdmen herd 456

thi ill presag advisedli marketh

 or like deadli bullet gun 
 hi mean struck ere word begun

but bless bankrout love thriveth

fair fall wit well defend 472
 for grass lie slain 
 till breath breatheth life

he chafe lip thousand way seeks

 will never rise kiss still 480

 but crystal tear gave light

 that star gazer writ death

 pure lip sweet seal soft lip imprint

 and coal black cloud shadow heaven light
 do summon us part bid good night

 incorpor seem face grow face 540

till breathless disjoin backward drew

 their lip togeth glu fall earth

 plant oblivion beat reason back

and everi beauti robb effect 1132
 wonder time quoth spite

 sinc thou art dead lo i prophesi 
sorrow love hereaft shall attend 1136
it shall wait jealousi 
find sweet begin unsavouri end 
 ne er settl equal high low 
 that love pleasur shall match woe 

 it shall fickl fals full fraud 1141

with sweet shall truest sight beguil 1144

bi boy side lay kill d
wa melt like vapour sight 
and blood ground lay spill

 resembl well pale cheek blood
 which round drop upon white stood

 she drop stalk breach appears

 poor flower quoth thi father guis 
sweet issu sweet smell sire

 and ti thine know good
 to wither breast blood 

 here thi father bed breast

lo hollow cradl take thi rest

 wherein i kiss sweet love flower

and yoke silver dove whose swift aid
their mistress mount empti sky

 hold cours papho queen
